ttnaɣen ɣef teqbaylit
acuɣeṛ i tegganemt aṭas
ur asen-yebni ara axxam
ttcemmiṛeɣ iɣallen-iw
tufa iman-is
i wacu i tɛeṭṭleḍ annect-a
yemmut unaẓur ɣas ma yeǧǧa-aɣ yeǧǧa-d lǧerrat ur ntekkes
setti tga-yi aɣi n tafura yekkes-iyi tifiḍli
int-as iruḥ i teεzizt am rruḥ mi ara d-tekker
ini-as aql-i ɛyiɣ
yettɣaḍ wi ur nesɛi imawlan
wissen ma ad d-truḥeḍ wiss ma ad kem-waliɣ
nekk ssumreɣ-d tizlit-a ma ad tt-id-necnu
ini-asen kan xaṭi
nella ɣas ini-as ur nesεi kra deg tkuzint
a wi iṛwan udem-is a wi iẓran amek tella
a rewlet a wi ara irewlen
ihuh ur teṭṭiseḍ ur teǧǧiḍ wi ara yeṭṭsen
imawlan-is εawnen kra wi i sen-yessutren timεiwna
Ɛeddi ma ad d-yekker seg usu
acḥal tuɣ tesεiḍ di leεmer-ik mi akken tekker lgirra
calwaw d aṭan yettaɣen allen iẓri yettanqas mi ara txaṣ tafat
iwedder temẓi-s
texṛam tala
d acu i am-in-yefka
ad tban mazal tayeḍ
lekteb imzenneq tacemuxt terreẓ zzit iɛelleq
tiɣrit tedber iberdi rwiɣ-tt akken i tt-yeṛwa umcum
tfukk tegmat gar watmaten
acuɣeṛ ugadeɣ tili
takuski n wul tif tin n wudem
ay aɛekkaz wwet tehriruc yugi ad yečč imensi ma d imensi semmeḍ
ass n ṛbeɛtac di yunyu d ass deg tbeddel tmuɣli-w ɣef lezzayer
ilul-d s teqbaylit
icennu s ṭṭelq n ugerjum-is
ur tnuda fell-as ur tt-tufi
Ččan aksum-iw
ur ẓriɣ ara d acu i ten-yuɣen
iteddu ihedder
win yesɛan izimer iwell-as iziker
uliɣ deg tmacint-nni iteddun ɣer london
yiwen yeɣli-d ṭṭlam fell-as yessebzeg-it
taḍsa war tilas
ur inuda fell-asent ur tent-yufi
d acu akka i txedmeḍ almi tbeddleḍ udem
tfuk tirzi ar ɣur-wen
tamedyezt d iḥulfan n umdan
ulac i diri am timuɣbent
teεceq deg-s
yella walebɛaḍ i m-d-isawlen
swant aman isemmaḍen
iṛuḥ udfel-nni
nemneε merra-nteɣ
aɣbub yuɣal d adalku
tettarum s tutlayt taqbaylit
ttwalin-it-id s yir tiṭ
yiwen yekkat snitra armi i tt-yerra d tazegzawt
ad ɣ-zellun yiwen yiwen
yettwali-t-id s yir tiṭ
smeḥsisemt i yemma-twent
bɣiɣ ad aruɣ ungal maca wissen melmi
izri d ayen iɛeddan imal d ayen id-teddun tudert d imir-a
a dda qasi
isenta tuccar-is
tagi d talwest-iw
d timsetḥit ur thedder ara aṭas
agellid yeǧǧa tagelda i wegdud tuɣal d tadimuqṛaṭit
uɣent-d aɣrum
heḍremt-iyi-d
a-t-a kraḍ n wussan ayagi ur ccucfeɣ
fiḥel tuzzma
ayɣer i tesxeṛbemt tibḥirt-nsen
isem-s ittwassen si zik
s tayri i theddṛemt taqbaylit
uɣen-as awal dɣa ddan yid-s
tettarum taqbaylit
glu yis-s
begsen-d ɣur-neɣ
asefrak n tbanka yella yettkukru yiwen seg wid yettilin ɣer tsenduqt
lɛid ad tɛeddi am aḍu awi-d kan lehna d ṣeḥḥa
sdat-s yella ubrid aɣelnaw
yuker-ik
cebbḥeɣ tazeqqa-nni
iḍelli
ttaruɣ aṭas s teqbaylit
ansuf s useggas amaynut
ddant-ak di nneqma
amer am wayen yeshel
yak bxir
tettumt d acu i sent-txedmemt
muqel kan anwa i d-ikecmen
yeddez afus-is s tefḍist
d acu i kem-yewwin ad d-tneṭqeḍ
amek ara tsuqqleḍ tafyirt-a seg tegnizit ɣer tefransist
d lawan ad tebdumt tikli
ur yeẓri anwa ara yaf dina
d taqbaylit i tlemdeḍ ar yemma-k
dewweṛ
gen di talwit a gma buremuɛa zahir d awezɣi ad k-nettu
Ṛwan lmeḥna
teḍεef am yetbir
ur daɣ-ttaǧǧat neḥṣel
nniɣ-as ad neffeɣ ad nečč imensi
gen di talwit a gma ircan kamal d awezɣi ad k-nettu
agdud ur nefriẓ lehna
yal yiwen wissen d acu n tmentilt i t-yerran d aḥerki
d taqbaylit i lemdent ar yemma-tsent
yewwi-d ayaziḍ yenncew
gen di talwit a gma akkuc abdeṛaḥman d awezɣi ad k-nettu
yiwen ɣer sin ad d-fken tlata
mazal ffudeɣ
ata wayen i d-trebḥeḍ si ɛecra iseggasen n tira ɣur apulo
ur cukkeɣ ara tesεiḍ lextyar
afud deg ufus iwakken ad nessali taqbaylit
Ɛni tettum
Ɛni tuḍnem
ad yettsewwiq fell-aneɣ
iwacu ur yi-d-fkin ara amkan-nni uxeddim
yezmer lekdeb ad d-yezzi i ddunit ur tettlus tidet asebbaḍ-is
yedda kra n yisurifen deg ufrag yettnadi ad yuɣal s wansa i d-yekka
sɛant aman
tessakiḍ wid yeṭṭsen
anta i k-tt-igan
besmelleh ad nebdu ccekran
caɛban n at lḥaǧ iǧǧa-d Ḥmed Ḥmed iǧǧa-d limix
Ǧehden ifassen n tom
bḍant-asent-t-id
yegla yes-kent
ad d-yeddu yid-i
Ɛeddan i udrar akkin
Ɛawen-aɣ
yettban yezɛef ass-a
ad kent-ten-tefk
ada yella uɣerbaz-ik
steqsi baba
d aqbayli
dayen meqqreɣ
ur msefhamen ara ɣef ssuma
semmḥen deg-s ṭṭebba
wagi d tom
snulfan-d tilafsiwin
mačči d lemqam
ukiɣ-d
ass-nni axeṣṣaṛ
waqil iεǧeb-am gma
meyyez
yella lmus da
keṛhen-t
xeṛṣum limer d tidet
kemmel ajgugel
ayɣer i theddṛemt fell-i
ad ten-yeddem
tfukk-aɣ internet ilaq ad tt-txellṣem ass-a
axaṭer kra n win yessuturen ittaṭṭaf-d
abrid n uḍar
d asebɣes n yimdanen akken ad uɣalen ar laṣel-nsen
d alef u xems meyya u ɛecra
mkul yiwen ad yexdem ccɣel-is s ṣṣwab d lqanun ad naweḍ ɣer wanda nebɣa
yezmer ad yeddu yid-sent
wali axxam-agi
aṭas n yiselmaden i yettcetkayen ɣef ubeddel n tmawalt n uselmed sya ɣer da
Ɣer wumi ara metleɣ lǧil-agi
terriḍ-iyi-tt-id
yella
ur ttissineɣ ara isewwi
ad uraren yid-neɣ
negra-d deg yir lweqt
iwet-itt s zzemt
teḍṣa-tt-id
d aferdis n lbaḍna anda amaru ad d-yefk timseɛreqt
d abrid n baba-k i tuɣeḍ
iḥemmel iman-is
yuba iḥemmel ustṛalya
sḍemɛen-iyi s udrim
tewwiḍ yakan timgreṭ
yewweḍ laɛfu n rebbi
iḥuss-as yuba i lfeṛḥ
tettwalimt-iyi-d

ur sɛiɣ ara igerdan
yebḍa-yam-t-id

wwet wwet
rwel

trewlemt
akka imaṣriyen ad steɛeṛfen belli nekk d ameɣlal
fakk-ikent imeṭṭawen
tesseɣtamt aya
wissen ahat tuḍen
inna-asen d acu i yexdem n wayen n diri

tubeṛ yella yewɛeṛ

ttṛajun meṛṛa

d acu i kem-id-iwwin ɣur-i
txil-k a dadda mmel-iyi

ulac maḍi
yekna zznad i tiyita

d timelḥanin
ur tt-id-beddu s “besmelleh”
lqaεa n talsa akken ma tella
tfukkeḍ axeddim-ik
nettawi deg ul-nneɣ tutlayt taqbaylit
ass n lḥedd ḥman iqerra

twala-t kra yekka yettnaɣ akken yezmer
tesεiḍ ugur deg tkeṛṛust-ik

kra ur t-ttrajuɣ sɣur-m

ad yertiḥ i ddin amcum
iwacu ur tettaḍsim ara merra
n wi t-ilan ukamyun-aki
amek teẓriḍ belli d tidet
ur ɣ-εriḍen ɣer tmeɣra
nga tazrawt i tsertit tadamsant unabaḍ
snulfut-d iglan imaynuten
nutenti ttxemmiment kan ɣef teqbaylit
ad ɣ-ixdeɛ Ṛebbi

d tugniwin

Ɛni teɛyam
yuker-itt-id dɣa seg wass-nni ibxeṣ-it rebbi

d yiwet n tmacahut tamecṭuḥt i iyi-d-tettmal yemma mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ
teččḥeḍ
gen di talwit a gma sadet yusef d awezɣi ad k-nettu
sεan ẓẓher
iɛceq-itt

yeswa lbira

d anezgum meqqren

ih ih tesεiḍ lḥeqq

tluɛaḍ

d argaz-nni temlaleḍ ass-nni
tella tleḥḥu

zgan deg tneččiyin n marseille

d ferḥat i ttɛassan amar ad d-yini kra
kerhen-k merra

d asḥissef imi ur tezmireḍ ad d-taseḍ

a nnger n wergaz-nni

sima teḥbes

isem-iw sima

yiwen ur yezmir ad ayi-d-yefhem
ur d-tkeččmemt ara s axxam
mačči n wid yecban igerdan
ur itett ara imensi
iɣallen imhersanen εeyynen aṭas iqerraṣen i yeffren deg tmennaṭ-a
ayen akk iceɣben imddukal n maziɣ
Ṭul n yiḍ ur yeḥbis axemmem
wama a-t-an nemlal
maca acḥal ur steqsaɣ fell-as
ul-is yefreḥ
lḥedd-ayi i d-iteddun ad k-sskneɣ amek ara tseyyḍeḍ lḥut

acimi ur asen-d-tettarraḍ ara awal
ad awen-serḥeɣ
gar leḥbab beddeɣ am lexyal

ad d-yawi lhemm

iya meqqar ad nemsaɛaf

a-t-an newweḍ-d

aman ur-d tugim yemma ur tekkesen fad ay-atma

ad teddu cetwa
amaẓuẓ n twacult
ma d kečč ay apukimun yesɛukkuzen ɣef lbaṭel
agezzer-nni n taddart ufella yenɣa tameṭṭut-is
ad nɣiwel
am win yeṭṭamaɛen urḍan di lmegget
ad nurar ileqqafen neɣ timɛennu
ammud-a d win yebnan ɣef snat n tewsatin timuta d tigejdanin tasarit  tamedyazt

ad iyi-tessurfeḍ
awi abrid ayeffus
yettmeslay-d wungal-a ɣef yiwet n tmeɣrast n tegrawla deg taddart n yiɣil umsed iwumi qqaren faḍma ibelɛiden
acḥal ara neqqim deg udrar
ldi adli-is ar isebter wis xemsa utlatin
armi tuɣal d taselmadt mebla ma tfaq
ahat aɣwali-agi d ameddakel-ik
d iǧadaṛmiyen i s-d-yessutren tijɛal dɣa makken yugi qqeṛsen fell-as s ṛsaṣ
ad t-reǧmeɣ s yeẓra am cciṭan
ad ak-d-rreɣ s wawal asmi ara yi-d-terreḍ uqble kečči s wawal
ur imerreɣ ara ass-a
ad merrɣeɣ deg wakal
ad neḥnucceḍ deg udfel
ad naf isental-is zzin ɣef wazalen n teqbaylit
awi-d kan anda ad yeffer umdan iman-is ɣas ad yili d aẓekka
aɣyul yettwaxneq yezder s ttɛebga iwḥel deg wasif
acku ayen ira yewwet-it umezwi-nni
acuɣeṛ i tneɛɛlemt
ad xedmeɣ ayen bɣiɣ anda i bɣiɣ melmi i yehwa
kaṭalunya d tamnaḍt di spanya imezdaɣ-is ttmelayen takaṭalant
tettnadi zzalamiḍt akken ad tessiɣ tafat ma yella kra i d-yellan
imi d-tewwi
i d-yenna si muḥ i wumi ara ceyyɛeɣ azul akken iwata lḥal

acḥal cebḥit lecfaṛ-im a lwiza
afriwen refden
anwa i yuran ungal iḍ d wass
leḥsab-iw mi ara t-fakeɣ a leḥbab ad aken-in-awḍeɣ ma yebɣa llah Ṛṛeḥman
at wexxam ṣebṛen imɛezzan kefṛen

ad t-xenqeɣ
ur teqqimemt ara
di tefsut taberkant imsulta n unadabu azzayri nɣan ddeqs n yilmeẓyen iqbayliyen ddeqs-nniḍen ɛeggben ilebda
wa ufan-t wa eǧǧan-t
ax-n affus-iw a win yes-s yegla wasif
akken yeffeɣ ɣer tejmeεt ufella yemmuger-d axenfuc-nni n ccix n taddart

acimi ur d-tsawleḍ ara iḍelli
ad necḍeḥ

a ṛṛay-iw
wayeḍ nettmenni awer d-yezzi (ala aḍar-is)

mi i d-yemmekti

musa iburek-iten
ttkemmilen wussan idelsanen deg temdint n wehran imi yal akud s wanaw adelsan i as-iwulmen

icennayen n unebdu fkan tiyita i teqbaylit
ur t-ttxalaḍ ara
times tecεel akk tamiwin
ur iqṛis wara
win izzuɣren afurk izzuɣer taseṭṭa-s
agerfiw d wid akk yellan si ṣṣenf-is
ula d nekk ṛuḥeɣ
Ṛebbi d bu tsuqas
tsebɣeḍ-iyi-tent
sseṛɣent-asent-t
i d-yeqqaren timsirin lqayen
asenfaṛ ur t-sεiɣ
yuba ikerrec mary
yenna-yi-d kullec
d ayen kan i yesserwayen laẓ-ik n wazal i tẓerreḍ
bateɣ maḍi kan
nekk d win yeṣfan ɣur-m
ad iyi-tt-id-tawimt
ad ten-tɛeqlem s lfakya-nsen
d hilisa i yebnan qerṭaj
teḥrured tɛedda sdat n webduz akken ur yesɛi tiwwura
tebram-as
zeddig wul-is
Ɣurr
yerra-yam-tent-id
yella wasmi i d-mmektant
ad tt-id-tekkseḍ
yettriḥi d aẓidan
ad t-sseɣlint
sseṛɣent-ak-tent
yeqqim ɣef ublaḍ
ur yezmir ara ad isenqed aselkin-agi acku aselkin n udabu n uselken mačči d ameɣtu
riɣ aṭas n yefsan
nezga nettwali tiliẓṛi
yuba d imennecṛaḥ
d tuttra igerrzen
ssneɣ kra seg warrac-nni
ffɣet si tudert-iw
Ṛuḥemt ar uɣerbaz
suref-iyi ɣef tfinyent-a
ffɣet seg uxxam-iw
awal yeqsed win yeɛna tarṣaṣt teqsed win tenɣa
ad isserɣ tassemt rriḥa-s ad teɛǧeb i umeɣlal
atan tekkat lgerra
d amsaltu i lliɣ
yuba yettban meẓẓi
ad ɛeṛḍeɣ
yella yettuɛewweq
tebɣiḍ tawlaft-iw
tḥemmel seksu s buzelluf
dɣa yenna-d “nefreḥ aṭas s ugemmuḍ n uɣerbaz-a tajmilt ad tuɣal i yiselmaden d unemhal d yixeddamen merra"
tḥemmleḍ ad tiliḍ weḥd-m
d tumert a wid iḥemmlen taẓuri
yezmer ad ɣ-d-iẓer
umnen-t dɣa
akken d aɣbel
yella yeεya mliḥ
d awezɣi akk
ismektiyen n tefsut n tmanyin d tefsut taberkant i d-yellan deg wussan iɛeddan
wehmeɣ imi k-ẓṛiɣ
tettuzur taɣect-is
yella kra i yeḍṛan
tufrar-d gar tizyiwin-is
qqimet yid-i kra
yelha lḥal ass-a
yal yiwen ila uffuren-is
tḥemmleḍ tamwansa n tom
akka axiṛ akya
bḍant-iyi-tent-id
tmecḥeḍ-d aɣebbar
d tamihawt tmes
ad tt-ileqqem
anda tettedduḍ
tom yedda d tetrarit
yuba ffɣent waman
tettamen-itent
la kem-sseqdacen
tuffɣiwin-a n usiḍen n yigḍaḍ ttilin-d tanezzayt maḍi
Ṭṭfeɣ tabrat sɣu-k
lameɛna ma sdensen ayen iqedsen ad mmten
ad cekreɣ lǧid n tɣezza mmi-s n lbaz bu timmi
sseṛɣent-aɣ-tent
tebɛet tirga-nwen
lameεna ccbaḥa d thuski n ugama deg teẓgi-a tejbed-iten-id i tikkelt tayeḍ
acuɣer i tṛuḥemt ɣer din
yesεa tirmit
ad nečč ad nsew
tawwet-it tbucḥiḍt
ttuɣ uṭṭun-nkent
ttzuxxun s tqenṭert-nsen
sers-itt ɣer lqaεa
deg wass ttḥulfuɣ gerrzeɣ xas akka allen-iw ttbanent jjxent kra
bɣiɣ ad t-snamreɣ
yennerna-d i tsekla taqbaylit umaynut s wazal-is yerna tikkelt-a yemgarad ɣef wayen i nuɣ tannumi nettwali-t
ur ẓriɣ ara a baba d kečč i d bab n rray ad sutreɣ tifrat s ɣur-k
iɣunfa-tent
mi d-ffɣen sɣur ferɛun mmugren-d muḥend akked mḥend i ten-yuṛǧan di beṛṛa dɣa ɣlin deg-sen
taqbaylit d awal aẓidan
ssaɛa deg ufus n yilemẓi yal ddqiqa ad tt-ittnadi
Ɛni iqṛeḥ-it lḥal
Ԑyiɣ deg usqizzeb
d acu i tebɣamt sɣur tom
tuɣaleḍ d amehbul
nefren yakan
muḥemmed uharun d yimdukal-is d wid ur nerri ara aḍar ɣer deffir
ma d tamsalt n unadi acu ara ten-yesddukklen i wakken ad negrawen ɣef yiwen yiswi
siwel-iyi-d mi ara terseḍ
yebɣa ad yessers allaɣ-is akken ad yili seg wid ifazen
ad s-tiniḍ bellɛen imeẓẓuɣen-is
ur iḥemmel ara timellalin deg waman
d wigi i d isteqsiyen-nkent ineggura
ulac aṭas n yinelmaden
inimt-asent fiḥel ma tusamt-d
yeččur wul
teǧǧa-t tmacint n lxemsa d tin n setta
d acu i yura
ur t-id-ttekkes ara mazal ur yewwi ara
hwari bumedyen yemḍel ɛmiruc ddaw n texzant deg yiwen n uxxam n yiǧadarmiyen
i wacu annect-a n yesɣaren
ad ak-gerrzen wussan
maɛna ass-a
dɣa seg wass-n i as-d-eǧǧa sin n yinzan
tettuḍ d acu i sen-txedmeḍ
la itezzi leɛqel-is
d leḥmi i yeglan yess
Ɛeddi-k ma ad beddlen
aṭas i run fell-ak
aṭas n yisenfaren n usideg ɣer teqbaylit i yellan
aqemmuc s wansa i d-teffaɣen yimeslayen-is
ay ul-iw henni-yi
tebɣa ad teqqim iman-is
ddu nnican ssakin err zelmeḍ ad tafeḍ axxam n selyan tama n lakul
d wamek ara yebdu adrar s walluy
ayen xedmen deg sin
ayɣer i tḥemmleḍ ad teqqimeḍ weḥd-k
ayɣer i teffreḍ fell-asen akk annect-a
xdemt-as akken i wen-yexdem
teɣra di tmenqas
ladɣa ula d yiwen ur yeggar afus-is akken ad ten-iɛawen
bdan yeqjan-nni ashewhew
teddunt-asent di nneqma
aṭas i ḥemmleɣ yemma
yezmer lḥal akken
tura kan i d-ikcem seg uɣerbaz
d acu i turam
kemmel asmeḥses
ibbuḥra-d lḥal tameddit-a
sima ur as-iɛedda ara wayen i as-d-yenna maziɣ kan akka
d ayla-k
lukan mačči d iḍarren-iw i yi-isellken tili ass-a aql-i ddaw wakal
tessardem akk leqlud-nni
tettbuddu temɣart arraw n yelli-s
targit-is teffeɣ
issirid iman-is
amsarag yefka-d kra imedyaten  itruskiyen iztiken ifersiysen
ur tenneḍ ara di berra
iwwet udfel isseɣli-d ifurkan igla ula s lesluk n trisiti
ad teččem čekčuka d tmellalin
wissen ma tesla-iyi-d

ad tḥebsem deg tasaft neɣ deg iɣil n wammas
mačči d aqcic ad as-tkellxeḍ
yuɣal d amnafeq
d baba-k i lliɣ a luc
awimt-t ma tṛuḥemt

ttarraɣ-t deg uɛewwiq
ihi ur ttṛuẓut ara akk iqeṛṛa-nwen sya d afella
ad d-uɣalent
beṛka aqelleq

yal yiwen s tigawt-is
ad ak-d-inint azekka
i wacu-t tura wagi
ihi ɛlem belli tilelli iɣef tettḥewwiseḍ
iwɛer wugur n ṭṭlam
dduklent ɣer tala ad d-agment
wissen d acu i tt-id-yewwin gar-asen

taččrant
Ḥebseɣ akeyyef n ddexxan
ad iyi-t-id-yawi azekka
ifqeɛ fell-as aṭas i mi mačči d netta i s-yennan
iḥucc-as iḍarren
yendem mi i tt-yeǧǧa
mi d-yehder umulli n yemma-s yidir yettawi-yas-d lḥaǧa
acḥal qeṛṛiḥet tegrest deg tmurt-a
teǧǧa-ten tmacint
ur ḥeqqer ara wiyiḍ
mi ara texdem akka
ur ssemɣaret ara iman-nwen
Ɛmiṛuc u muḥ iḥemmel ad yili d tiziri tagawawt
ma ur teswi ara lqahwa ur tettnekkar ara
tedda-yasent di nneqma
yeǧǧa-d rrehba deg-neɣ
yewwet-it ur t-yezgil
iban ɣef wudem-is yefreḥ

zik ara d-tuɣalem

a ctaɛtaɛ
wa iteẓẓu wa iqelleε
ur tufiḍ d acu ara d-iniɣ
aql-i deffir-s
ad aɣ-yessuffeɣ deg yir timetti nesɛa
acḥal d abrid i tt-yurga
Ḥsu tuget deg-sen kecmen deg usugen
urgaɣ abrid yessa d ijeǧǧigen
walaɣ-t mi d-yeffeɣ seg usensu
ur ak-t-ttakkeɣ ara
mi yendeh unayna ffɣen-d yinelmaden ɣer ubraḥ ad uraren

nteddu-yasen di nneqma
ar deqqal
ayen tebɣum tinim-t-id ma d nekk ṭṭfeɣ deg wawal i fkiɣ

akka ara illiɣ
znuzayen ayefki
ad asent-tekkseḍ ameẓẓuɣ

ad sεuɣ ayla-w

texṛaḍ tala

a tamurt ideflawen

a win ileḥḥun deg yiḍ

anda ara tt-afeɣ
ad d-tas teslit n unẓar

a leḥbab tikkelt-a yid-wen dayen
fell-am i nettkel
ad n-awin s yiɣsan-iw

a win i ak-inan ma teḥṣiḍ

akka i yeḥṣa
a txaṛṛeq targit yes-i
tenna tewwurt "err-iyi ad rreɣlada"
amek i tt-ufan
yerra-d udrar ṣṣut
teččiḍ lekwaɣeḍ-ik
zdat llufan bbi neɣ ɣebbi
urar n uɣyul d aɣẓaẓ
a yemma ur d iyi-sseḍlam
leqbayel d neyyat ad mmten d neyyat deg tsartit mazal lxir ɣer zdat
a Ṛebbi lmeɛbud rnu-d rɛud
ur yessin ad ixid yerna yessiɣzif lxiḍ
amek i t-walan
yelha ma teqqaremt tidet
ad d-teḥkum ayen teẓṛam
anda ara t-afeɣ
d acu i teččiḍ armi i kem-teqreḥ tɛebbuḍt-im
a lkaysa eǧǧ-iyi
acimi akka neggugem

aberrani ad iwexxer
nuker-ak tikti-k
a ṣṣalḥin n tmurt-iw
a zzin arqaq ur kesbeɣ
ur fhimeɣ tigert
ad teṛbun maḍi
amyag amagnu yemmal dacu yexdem
irgazen ad kkaten settin n imelyan s unerfud n yiffasen
ur qqimeɣ ara
amyag arlugan neɣ anammum
aseqqamu n umyezwer
tasdawit n mulud at mɛemmeṛ
salem yedda di lmendad i baba-s
nekk d netta d imeḥrac
iḥedducen
tirni n yiɣallen inemlayen
a yeli a yelli tecbiḍ tiziri
ad nesmekti kan belli deg wussan-agi iɛeddan xedmen yakan snat temliliyin-nniḍen
zedɣent nnig n ttjuṛ
amussu n yiɣelnaẓriyen ilelliyen
iɛecciwen/tagrarajt
ad d-yili diɣ uskasi ɣef temsal akk icudden ɣer tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ
bdiɣ ttwaliɣ deg udlis-nni

taɛzibt
i d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n ayt smaɛel

yebwi arrazen

Ččant aɣṛum
vuzexri
aseqqamu n uwanek
acḥal n lesnin nekk ttṛaǧuɣ
tamettant n wid yemmuten ɣef tugdut d tlelli ur yessefk ara ad tetwaɣbaṛ
lɛali ittnuzu ɣali
nehreɣ aɣyul ɣer tala akken ad agmeɣ aman i dda Ḥemmu
neɛya di lhemm
assa i t-ḥwaǧeɣ
tella tin i iɣelḍen
yectaq rriḥa n tmurt

iqqel uxilwan d abucic
fiḥel temses d imeṭṭi
tɛedda tefsut ur nesli i ufrux
allaɣ i yexla laman
yeḍra leɛǧeb numen s tegmat n lekdeb
bɣiɣ ad waliɣ udmawen-nsent
sani tttedduḍ a yaḍaṛ s aẓar
axaṭer nnuɣen yid-s
awer tt-iwzen Ṛebbi fella-neɣ
mačči d tamdint meẓẓiyen
amakraḍ ur itettu ara tanuga-s
irra luḍa d asawen

ulac ṭṭbel ur newwit
s ufus ḥeḍment s umger reḍbent
d at Ṛebbi i as-d-iqeṭṭun
tga-t yemma deg umkan-iw
amek ara d-tessumreḍ ad yemmag
ssuq d ṣṣbeḥ ddunit d temẓi
treffu fell-i kul ṣṣbeḥ ziɣen ittaɣ-itt ujenniw
ilha cckal i uclal xas di leḥlal
win tuɣ imma nekk d arbib-is
awer icbek Ṛebbi fell-aɣ
ur cbiḥeɣ ara
ittṛuẓu fell-i kawkaw
yiwen ur d-yehdir yid-i
yir tanumi ad tt-nekkes
awer ikkes i wallen ayen ẓṛant
iwwet-it-id s nnquṛ
tid i yi-skersen wussan
xas kkaten ṭṭbel ttɛassan aɣyul
tasa tendef-d mi tt-walaɣ tezzi s axxam
cukkeɣ mačči d arrat-nni ilaqen i yi-d-tceyyεeḍ
laqent-iyi nnwaḍer
isḥaq iɛeṭṭel di tmurt-nni
ddunit d mm leɣṛuṛ
mara iheddeṛ yettara iffeẓ
ur d issusuf ḥedd tament seg imi
iger itett zzerriɛa
d leqdic ara d yilin s lmendad n nadiya meɛtub d tidukla meɛtub lwennas
turiḍ ungal-ik ɣef yiwet n taluft i iceɣben aṭas medden di tallit-a
amek armi dewwiren igarfiwen deg temdint
els akebbuḍ-ik d asemmiḍ deg berra
tidet ad yi-tetteẓẓem
ur din ccaɛ ur din acbaɛ
anta lficṭa i k-iεeǧben
nnan nnan ad d-yuɣal ar wi t-innan
simmal ad ttwaliɣ deg-m rennuɣ di tayri-m
nadya meɛtub d taǧǧalt n ucennay ameqqran meɛtub lwennas
ttagadeɣ tigḍaḍ n yiḍ
amzenzu-nni n lxeḍra d lεali-t ɣer yimsaɣen-is
ayen ittwaksen i tezdemt yifsus
semḥeɣ tafsut deg i nemlal

ad ak-issinef Ṛebbi ɛinttu
ur t-infiɛ uxbaḍ wala armaz
ittenkikiz am win ččant telkin
ssexdem-itent akk
tom d aqcic-nni ɣer yeffus
anwa ara yelsen wa
ur xẓireɣ ara tom
ul-iw idehhu yes-sem
d acu i kem-ixuṣṣen
tečča-t tmes
bu tissas ittarra laɛdu ar tilas
taɣawsa tif azal-is
deg wass ikkat-iyi yiṭij
terẓiḍ-iyi anzaren-iw
seg widen ugadeɣ
ad d-ffɣen seg-s igelliden n waṭas n yegduden
tlata n yeqjan i yesseglafen maca sliman iεedda ur yecliε
yemɣumbas yigenni
tzemreḍ ad tfehmeḍ anamek n tefyirt-a
axaṭer tugwad dɣa inna-yas nniɣ-am teḍṣiḍ
a tayri n lebda yezzuɣuren deg-i
iǧǧa-t d abandu
jebbdent iman-nsent
yusef iwwi baba-s si mḥemmed iqeddem-it i ferɛun
ur tḥemmlem ara tusnakt
akka i sen-ixdem
s lǧib-is kan i iruḥ
aleqqim aleqqim taẓallit teqqim
ad t-tefk lɛid i tɛacuṛt
zwarent-aɣ s tmussni
"leɣrur tibratin" d tullist n naǧib meḥfuḍ
sarameɣ mačči d tuccḍa
izad wi izaden
tezzi-d fell-asen ddunit
imenna-d ad iḥewwes ar legniz
masinisa yella iseɛɛu aṭas inebgawen igrigiyen
ur ixeddem ur igeddem
irra-yas ur briɣ ara
wwet-it ɣef walim ad ittu timẓin
lkimya tekkat abrid
tettwaɛeṛḍemt meṛṛa
teẓriḍ acḥal yellan
ihi din i d-bdant lmertat-is d icaliyen-is
meεna mi wwḍeɣ ɣer taggara n tira
ikcem-iyi-d yiwen uvirus akken d ixxan
Ẓẓay ccɣel-ik
Ṭṭbiɛa n ugertil ur tettbeddil
ur ččiɣ acemma
muqel s udem-is ad tissineḍ ul-is

yettwali-aɣ-d s yir tiṭ
znuzayeɣ ayefki
ur inuda fell-as ur tt-yufi
temliḍ-iyi-d d acu ara xedmeɣ
muqran yerfed aqrab-is iṣub ɣer ugezdu anda yeɣɣar
ttwalin kan taqbaylit
yettmeslay s teqbaylit
Ɛni tessnem ad tarum taqbaylit
s teqbaylit i d-tekkreḍ
tebdam tettissinem imdanen
ad ihḍeṛ s teqbaylit
tḥemmlem ad tceḍḥem
ad isteqsi rebbi fell-as s lxir
tessen amek ara s-telḥu
d taqbaylit i d tudert-iw
ur nudaɣ fell-awen ur ken-ufiɣ
tafat yečča-tt usigna tafukt tbeddel tamurt
nettargu s tutlayt taqbaylit
zik-nni tilawin tiqbayliyin xeddment ticraḍ af udem iɣallen akked d yedmaren-nsent
tqeddcemt ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
tettzuxxum s tutlayt taqbaylit
nlul-d s teqbaylit
tekkateḍ ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
tebɣamt ad tesɛumt takeṛṛust
bɣan ad sɛun takeṛṛust
a leɛmer-iw a leɛmer-iw d idurar i d leɛmer-iw
ur bɣin ara ad d-smeḥsen
d acu i aɣ-yewwin ad d-nenṭeq
tessnemt amek ara s-telḥumt
tehbel ɣef teqbaylit
anda akk i teffɣeḍ
s teqbaylit kan i ttzuxxun
tettnaɣemt ɣef teqbaylit
di tudrin ur ufin ad d-aɣen aɣrum di lezzayer kullec yeldi
iẓi
d taqbaylit kan i ɣ-yerḥan
acuɣeṛ i tegganeḍ aṭas
wa samir awi-d ibarriqen-nni ad nandi yis-sen i yefrax
txeddem ɣef teqbaylit
aṭas i s-yenwan lɣerba d urar
dayen ur yi-tḥemmleḍ ara
d taqbaylit i d yemma-tsent
ur ẓran ara anda ara gnen iḍ-a
yebna-asen axxam
tutlayt-ik d taqbaylit kan
tutlayt-iw d taqbaylit kan
yal ass ttargunt s teqbaylit
swiɣ qeḍran akked ilili fell-ak
ttnaɣent ɣef teqbaylit
d lawan ad ncemmeṛ iɣallen-nteɣ
yečča lbaṭata d taḥmayant
theddṛem s teqbaylit
ttḥebbiṛeɣ ɣef teqbaylit
ur yeḥtam ara deg ayen yexdemɣer ɣures dayen ilhan
ar wanwa ara tili
d taqbaylit i d iseɣ-nteɣ
iɣder-it yiḍesur-d yuki ara
aṭas i yezha di lexrif
d taqbaylit i d tafat-nwen
Ḥemleɣ ad qimeɣ akked yemɣaren iwakken ad lemdeɣ anamek n tudert
ur nudaɣ fell-am ur kem-ufiɣ
werǧin i d-mlaleɣ tom armi d ṣṣbeḥ-a
nekkni si zik akka
tusa-d ar ɣuṛ-i
ad teffɣeḍ seg uxxam

ad teqqim deg umezruy
mi ara heddrent teffẓent imeslayen
zedɣen tama n wedrar
nek ma ḥemleɣ yiwen qqareɣ-as-t
s teqbaylit kan i ttzuxxunt
ad tewwet ɣef teqbaylit
ur ssineɣ ara ad urareɣ ddabex

s teqbaylit i ttxemmimen
qqimeɣ d εemmi
aṭas ara yeffɣen tamurt-nsen

anta deg-sent i yeččan
ad nali ma yella tuli teqbaylit
ur yi-teǧǧam ara ad tt-waliɣ
nheddeṛ s teqbaylit

ur assent-yebni ara axxam
ar wanwa ara d-yeffeɣ

teẓṛiḍ dacu i tebɣiḍ

yenǧer webrid i teqbaylit

ur fhimen tigert

tefrari tafat ɣef teqbaylit
yal mi ara nennaɣ qqareɣ-as wellah ma tɛawed-as
akka i d-tella tudert n maziɣ
tuɣal-d neɣ mazal
yettunefk i yir rray
yessewhem-itt wayen itt-yuɣen
fudeɣ bɣiɣ ad sweɣ
ala ɣur-s i ttafeɣ laman
d acu kan yal yiwen s tmuɣli-s
ilha waddal i tnefsit
yettu yidir ur d-isawel ara
asma ara yestewtiw gar netta d yiman-is
ur ttettu ara tiliɣri-k
keččmen-d wid ara yuraren tacequft-nni
walaɣ itran deg uzal
aqel-in yid-s azal n sin n yiseggasen-a
Ɣur-k ad teɣliḍ deg aluḍ
argaz yelluẓen yeɣli ɣef učči
am wakken tettɛassa as-d-yehder
yeḥka-yasen taluft akken tella
arumt taspenyulit
yessefraḥ yidir imawlan-is s leqder i ten-ittqadar
ur aɣ-d-yefki ara udem
ayen yesɛan lqima
iḥemmel yidir ddabex n uḍar acu kan di tiliẓri
ur tent-id-iṣaḥ ara wawal
ihi wwet aqeṛṛu-yim ɣer lḥiḍ
ur ttmeslayemt ara yid-sent
ayɣer i teffremt fell-asen akk annect-a
kecmen ɣer daxel
ahaw tura ur reffut ara aseggas-a s wakraren qabel ma nedder s yikanicen
ad qeyyleɣ
ala ur iḥemmel ara aman
ad d-ttfeǧǧiǧen am lefnaṛ lexwan deffir-nsen
ad yidir uɣref aqbayli di tlelli
ad ṛuḥent mi ara bɣunt
ad yeskuruy ixunčeṛ s udebbuz n telkin
aḍummu n terkabin ibeddu s uwessawen
nnan-d tewteḍ tameṭṭut-ik daɣen ay udem n uḥuli
ticulliḍin n plastik ččant ddunit
inuda fell-awent yufa-kent
ur tt-yettawi ara yid-s
taɣara n yiḍrisen-is tuweḍ s igenni
ur yeẓri ara imiren d akken yuḍen
asmi d-tewwet lgerra s waṭas neflen-d yisaffen
yuɣal uqelmun s iḍarren
s wacu i d-cnan s teqbaylit neɣ s tefṛansist
yerzef ɣer xwali-s
Ḥṣiɣ d tidet i iyi-infan acḥal d amedyaz tenfa
yettkukru ad iǧelleb s aman
ad nɛeddi ɣer useɣti n yiluɣma
mektaɣ-d ussan-nni deg nella lwaḥid dɣa ruɣ
tikwal ikess ulli d wakraren-is
yewweḍ-d unekcum aɣurbiz inelmaden ur rwin ara imuras
yuɛer lḥal ad d-tessuqqleḍ tamseḍsut ɣer tutlayt-nniḍen
sεuẓẓeg-as
ddant-as di nneqma
weḥd-i i lemdeɣ tira s teqbaylit
wissen ma ad teqqim yid-neɣ
taqcict-nni tceffu mačči d kra
isbehdel baba-s di tejmaεt
melmi ara d-teffɣeɣ
s tmuɣli n umusnaw
rziɣ ɣer umejjay n wuglan
aydi yesseglaf ma yuggad
tawaɣit yeḍran yid-s ḥed ur yezmir ad as-tt-yefru
ilaq tura ad kecmeɣ s axxam
tuget n yinelmaden ɣuccen amezruy
tugim ad d-tneṭqem
akka i iḥemmel ad yeṭṭes uqbel ad yekcem tamurt n tirga-s
win yebɣan yeqqar amek win ur nebɣi yeqqar ulamek
yewɛer ubrid ɣer lakul-nneɣ deg wass n udfel
neffud tamussni n tira n umezgun
teεceq deg-i
ma yella nekk ttwaḥebseɣ tikta-inu berra ttcalint
ad ruḥeɣ anda ara iyi-yawin yiḍarren-iw
arut senfalit s tutlayt-nwen
wa iferru wa yessemnacay
susmemt kan
zzin yezdeɣ zehwa ma terna teqqen taziba
ilem i d-yeǧǧa meqqer
izad-as rrcem
ur teẓriḍ ara acḥal ara d-tesqam
urǧin yenɣa usgunfu yiwen
ula d yemma-s ur as-tenni kra
yeqqim akken cwiṭ iman-is tama ufella n tḥeddanin
asentel n tuget n yisefra-inu itezzi ɣef tnagmit tamagant
mi ara iliɣ yid-k ferḥeɣ
tanemmirt mi tebḍiḍ ayagi yid-i
cfiɣ ɣef ass mi nettara tamzizelt deg ulqaḍ n uzemmur
negrareb ɣef telqimt
asmules seg wansi i d-ttlalent
tawekkiwt ha-tt daxel n ugummu
ddayxa urɛad teqfil tlatin n yiseggasen deg tudert-is
azen-asen tabrat
wissen d acu i aɣ-ḥesben
ur sliɣ ara d acu i d-tennamt
myejraḥent
ddayxa i ssneɣ mačči d kemm
alqaḍ n uzemmur d aɣbel n twacult merra
wa iserreḥ-as wa icudd-itt
tṛuḥ ad tens tmes-nni
yeqquṛ uqeru-is
mi ara tetteddu tettecrurud am tsekkurt
yezdel deg uxxam ur d-iteffeɣ ara akk
kra n umurḍus yellan idellu fella-s yifis
fkem-iyi-d tasarut n uɣrem-a
ad tesɛu udem amaynut udem usnan
uggadaɣ ad nuɣal d ayen ur nelli ma tkemmel akkagi
yessers-d ifassen-is ɣef yedmaren-iw qrib yedda laɛmer-iw
a wi iwalan tamurt ula deg targit
yugi ad yefhem
rnu ɣef waya yiwen neɣ sin n wussan
aɣ-d sin n yizgaren ad trebḥeḍ
tettarraḍ-ten deg uɛewwiq
ass amaḍlan n temsetla talsant
sliman d muḥend rẓan asalu
yugar-aɣ akk muḥend ayen yenḥaf di rebbi n tmurt-agi meskin
wwten-aɣ merra ɣef walim ad nettu timẓin aclim
wissen ma ad d-yeffeɣ
d ixef-is kan ur s-ufiɣ i tudert n lehna ulac
ur asen-t-ttakkeɣ ara
ad am-tent-in-awiɣ azekka
yennayer agellid n wayyuren
yeddem acacfal yeffeɣ ad d-yekkes akermus
tamsalt n tririt n ttar tecɣeb-it aṭas
tufam iman-nwen
uɣal-d
mačči akken i ilaq ad txedmeḍ
ttxemmimeɣ d acu akka ara aruɣ
aguẓ d aṭṭan yettaɣen amgerḍ n tlawin
tafellaḥt tesrusuy aqerruy tettaččar aεebbuḍ
yella wabɛaḍ ad iyi-iɛiwnen
fetlent seksu n tmeɣra n tissulya n maziɣ
tanalt nreffed-itt gar yimekli d yimensi
yal ass s uɣilif-is
fkant-as ddḥis
Ḥemmlen warrac ad uraren tuqemca tuffra
iselman ur d-sneqben ara
d izem i d agellid n teẓgi
iberdan mačči yiwen win tebɣiḍ awi-t
acimi ur d-tettakem ara afus
timẓin i yekrez uzger i tent-iɛelfen d aɣyul
Ɣas ma yessen tansa-s ur yessaweḍ ara ad t-id-yaf
ur yeffiɣ ur yekcim
yegguma ad yeṭṭef iles-is
nniɣ-d ala lmeɛna-s ala
yebɣa ad tesbur talwit tanezzayt akked tmeddit
at-en-an ad d-teddun zziyyaṛ kkan-d si mekka
mi d-yeffeɣ seg yixeddim yečča tanalt-is n tmeddit
mačči yiwet n tikti i yellan deg uqerruy
yufa-kent tettheggimt iman-nkent ad truḥemt s amahil
reḍleɣ-am adlis ad t-teɣreḍ
tufiḍ iman-ik
d aneɣlaf n daxel i yefkan ttesriḥ ad qerṣen s ṛṣas ɣef imesbaniyen iqbayliyen
ay udem n tqejjunt
cerqen-iyi waman
iger aḍar
Ɣezzifit yimuras n unebdu
yeffeɣ ad t-id-iwwet ubeḥri
yiwen ur yezmir ad iyi-irnu
ulac am uɣrum aquran s zzit n uzemmur
tayri-s tezger-d igarawen
inuda fell-asen yufa-ten
yiwen ur yufi iman-is
Ɛebbaɣ-as i weɣyul ticekkaṛin n zbel
ilaq ad as-hedreɣ fell-aneɣ
akli yeṭṭef azrib alemmas yettarran metwal tajmaɛt
a yemma awi-d ad eččeɣ cwiṭ n cikula
tikkelt-a azemmur yurew ma d ilindi ulac maḍi
azekka ad ruḥeɣ anwa ara yeddun yid-i
nurar tiqqar ass mi nella meẓẓiyit
ugiɣ ad amneɣ yemmut
aneggaru ad yemdel tawwurt n ubalku
tom d nekk nettmeslay i sin tafransist
yettfelliq deg yikiddiben i d-yeɣlin ɣef tmurt-is
yeqqim ɣef tesɣimt yettxemmim d acu ara d-yini
bedd ad twaliḍ ddu ad d-tawiḍ qqim ulac
ttheggin-ten ad ttaɣen awal i wid yuɣalen d lerbub
nekk d taqbaylit ttidireɣ deg tmurt n leqbayel
yekker-d zik akken ad yeṭṭef tamacint
nedda-yasent di nneqma
Ɛemmi yezdeɣ deg madrid tamanaɣt n spenyul
tawacult-a tamesbaɣurt ɣur-s aṭas n yiqeddacen
fkem-d tikti tamatut n uḍris teɣram
cbant-d ɣer yimawlan-nsent i yesɛan ssifa yelhan ula d nutni
nadi
ur tufiḍ anda yettawi yikiddib
yemlal-ikent-id deg ubrid yedda yid-kent

tmerru tɛebbuḍt-ik

ad d-awiɣ lhemm

ad n-sawaleɣ

yettgalla iḥennet
ffɣet
seg wid yesɛan cci
s anda i truḥeḍ yella yiṭij
win iteddun ɣef tidet yessawaḍ
yudan uyaziḍ yefrari wass
ur ḥsiɣ ara ad yili d asaru imeɛnen
ihi dayen ibegges-d ur yeɛdiz i kra
tuli lḥamu ɣer ṛebɛin n tseddarin
yegergeɛ-d
ur ḥsiɣ ara d akken tom yessen ddeqs ɣef mary
ur gganeɣ alma izeggen yiḍ
kksen-as-d tuɣmas n leɛqel i brian
tikti-k tgerrez

d yiwen urgaz yuklalen tajmilt tameqqrant

ala meqqran ur yelli d amaxuf
kullec yebna ɣef ddin
ayen akk i d-nniɣ n d tidet

ad yaru tafyirt

anaddal yettliwi tafekka-s
wa yefhem wa yewhem
ameddakel n tom isem-is pierre
ad d-gren tasɣart anwa ara yebdun

ulac win ur nettasem

akud ur yettraju yiwen
nteddu-yak di nneqma
mary d tamɣart-iw
yemma tefhem ddunit

ur asent-yefki ara ayen i as-d-ssutrent

ires uferṭeṭṭu ɣef ujeǧǧig
yestewtiwen
s yin akkin dliɣ ɣef yiḍrisen n udlis
nettan ur yezgil ara tamacint
neḥma nugad ad nismiḍ
ufiɣ iman-iw lbenna n teswiɛt-nni
ad tt-terr i ddel d tɛekkmin
lmizirya mi ara teɣli ɣef yiwen tettarra-t d ilef aderɣal ur yeẓri anda iteddu
d acu-tent tikta-inek timenza
teddun yiwen yiwen am yizmawen
ziɣ mačči d kečči i dir
samil rezki nunu samya mark facebook yeṣṣawaḍ tizeɣwin n uheggi ṣṣawaḍent
am yal tikelt nettaɣ-d tasebḥit iɣmisen akken ad nḍal ɣef tlufa n wass yezrin
ur telli wara neɣ ur tt-temmed ara
isallen qqaren-d katia tugi ad tdel iman-is
d ayen ara nẓer deg wuṭṭun i d-iteddun ma bɣan at numidya
taggara ara yissin
di tegrest nessawel i tmes
a gma ɣas beddel tikli-ik
tadyant meqqren i d-yeǧǧan deg-neɣ ccama acku nella d isnawanen
netta izgel tamacint
am akken yebɣa ad yerwel i ɛeyyu i t-yurzen maɛna ulamek
win ur nerri aḍaṛ si temsirin i d-yettmuddu umezruy ad asent-yales tudert
ad tt-id-nessukkes si tebrek ideg texnuber
iɣil d netta ay d-iḥerren tamurt
nekni teḍṛa-yaɣ am uḍebbal yetthuzzun tuyat ula mi yesselqaf
ferḥat mhenni ilul deg xemsa meɣres alef u tteɛmiyya u yiwen uxemsin deg illulen umalu
ihemmej yesseḍ
iṛuḥ-d umẓabi ar ugellid
ihi tanemmirt-nwen
terfa tmeṭṭut
ibḍa-ten wasif
mmi-s n temɣart
ṭṭuqqutent-d tkerkas afus ad ten-tyefsin yefcel
yewwi-d ad tesɛeddi tallit-a uqbel ad as-yekkes waṭṭan-a ad iruḥ
akken giɣ i iga
tarbibt s tzeggart
kanada akked marikan zgant-d di temrikt n ugafa
gar-asent feḍmuca xelluǧa kuka d waṛduca
s ipuṛsyunen
farid yusa-d d sliman
a sellaḥ n at dwala ḥerzet taṛwiḥt n mumuḥ
llan widen yebɣan ad bbuḥrun ɣas ɣef unyir wicqa ttif akken wala lɛeṭṭ ddaw ubeḥnuq
rran-iyi-d s usrugmet ur tfehmeḍ tigert deg yimeslayen-nni
l ḥara n tessirt
din-a ad afent akk imagraden i ttnadint

azzel ad d-tawiḍ
ur yeswi tibṣelt yerkan

Ṣaḥḥa n tɛebbuḍt-ik
ulac win teǧǧa ur t-id-jbid ara ɣer ɣur-s
d acu-ten isental id tewiḍ deg amud-nni inek n isefra
anwi i kent-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi
ad iɛawen win ur nezmir
yettaǧǧa-t ad s-d-yawi asirem
ur asent-teǧǧiḍ acemma
kemmel awal-ik
sliman u muḥ yeṭṭeɛwec
ur ttruḥu ara
acḥal i tettlusum
ad iger iẓuran deg tmetti
werǧin tefra-tt d yiman-is
ad t-awint yid-sent
ma ulac aɣilif awi-yi-d ahamburger
deg imal i nra taswiɛt ad tbeddel
bɣan ad nadin ula d nutni
si lxedma n lluzin s axxam tafat ur tt-ittwali
akken kan i iteddu maziɣ ad tt-yeǧǧ
tetteẓmaḍ ɣer ɣur-s ad as-tiniḍ tugad a as-yerwel
d amerbuḥ uqcic-nwen
ad am-tt-id-aɣeɣ
d acu i yuɣen imawlan-ik
igerrez ukalas-agi-inek
meẓyan u muḥ ur yefhim ara tiziri tagawawt

d tibehbit
tger aḍar anda leɛmer tekcim

simmal tetteddu tceqquft
d ayen iyi-ǧǧan qqareɣ-ak-d ad tt-ǧǧeɣ
Γrant di tmenqas
maziɣ mi i d-isub deg lkar
tbeddel tudert n sima
tenṭeq ɣur-s sima ten-yas
aserwal-nni i d-uɣeɣ iḍelli rriɣ-t
ilaq ad tceggɛeḍ ɣer fransa ɣef ddwa-agi
ayen txedmeḍ ad m-yuɣal
asyafa n usriḥ ɣur uqjun yeǧhed ugar ɣef win n umdan
Ɣur-wet ad yenz nnif-nwen
yiwen ur tt-id-iwala
Ǧeɛfer yettẓalla
ur ak-d-tewwi ara ad teččeḍ
ulac aṭas n yisura s teqbaylit
Ḥbes kan tura ad temɣureḍ
ur walaɣ tigert
baba-s n maziɣ yewweḍ leɛfu n rebbi
yal yiwen d acu ara iẓer deg-s
yugurten u muḥ inermes tiziri tagawawt
ad ternuḍ ɛad ttnefxa
maca aya
uɣalen-d waman
tufam-as ixf-is
ddem ajenwi yelhan i uksum
yugurten u muḥ qrib yejreḥ tiziri tagawawt
amek i tuḍnem
tfaqeḍ i yiman-im
d acu-ten wuguren i d-temlaleḍ
d acu kan ul-is ḥnin
myerjamen
ayɣer i teffreḍ fell-as akk annect-a

nemlal-d di ssinima
selbent

ad t-id-yemmekti

d lebɣi-s ara ixeddem
twalaḍ asaru-nni amaynut

nekra lkaṛ

lqed n usaru

ffeɣ a taqufet
kra n win ijehlen yers-d ayen yexdem ad as-yuɣal
win yettnadin yettaf
siwa kemm i d tameṭṭut n lebɣi-w
anda akken i turzeḍ tikerrist taneggarut
mliḥ ma ulac aɣilif
Ɣleq-it

meẓẓi maḍi deg lqedd
sew kra
tamurt n spanyul

iteddu tom
acimi tezga tcennef
yeɛni illu-iw illu-iw acuɣer i yi-teǧǧiḍ
ayen nemmeslay akk ɣef umdan drus
bḍut-iyi-tent-id
sḥassfeɣ aṭas
teffrem fell-i tidet
Ṭṭuqten fell-as yiɛdawen
ayen i wen-qqareɣ s ameẓẓuɣ berrḥet-tt ɣef lesqaf
yuba d amerkanti
brant-awen
ad nezmer ad nwali taglisya dihin
kemmini i lexla
rrant-akent-ten-id
ula d ahil n tmeɣra-agi yella-d d anesbaɣur si tama n ccna
d acu i teḥseb iman-is

yečča s tmuɣli ssqef

ibekkem-it Ṛebbi
ziɣ yal wa abrid-is yiwen

nekk d acinwat

yezmummeg iεedda iruḥ

d lehyuf i teččiḍ

ad tiliḍ tmeyyzeḍ kan i kra

Ɛni tluɛamt
amek tεelmeḍ d ṣṣeḥ
cemmṛet iɣallen-nwen ay iqbayliyen
nebbeh i uvirus ad yekkes
ad tlemdem tutlayt taqbaylit s wul-nwen
ahat ad tafeḍ deg tilawt
mačči d yiwen wass ad yecnu acku yebbeḥbeḥ
Ččan-t wuccanen deg lexla
ttilin deg teftist n bulimaṭ
ur cukkeɣ zemreɣ ad εaceɣ war yess-m
nekk gganeɣ s teqbaylit ma kečč gen s wayen i tebɣiḍ
lhu-d d ccɣel n wergaz-nni
ulac tacemmaεt ur yessens
uɣalen watmaten-nkent s axxam
ayan akk ara neɛteb ad yili i tutlayt taqbaylit
add yeğğ iwweṭṭen
gen di talwit a gma aribi yamina d awezɣi ad kem-nettu
ur ilaq ara ad tettafseḍ akken deg učči
gen di talwit a gma merzuqi arezqi d awezɣi ad k-nettu
tεedda tgarfa nnig yeɣẓer

d nettat i d bab n uxxam-a

tenwiḍ mxelleɣ

d acu ara tgeḍ d amenzu
Ɛni tettuḍ
ur yeẓri tom anda tebɣa marie ad tesεeddi imuras-is deg unebdu-ya
ur s-ttaɣ ara awal
gen di talwit a gma Ḥannic Ḥamid d awezɣi ad k-nettu
win yugaden yiwen ur yugad ula yiwen

tḥukk tselmadt ifassen-is ɣer uṭablu
usmeɣ
Ẓer ma tṣeḥḥa tririt-iw
tuḍnemt
xaqeɣ fell-ak s tidet
caɛban d wakli d imsebblen imecṭaḥ
win ur nessin tussna yettarra-tt ar ddin
ad nṛuḥ ar tmurt n Ṭelyan
gen di talwit a gma meǧǧan farid d awezɣi ad k-nettu
nutni ur ssinen acu d tugdut s ddin kan i leḥḥun
aɣyul ma yeɛya yessefk ad yesgunfu
meqqar mi nella akk da ad nemcawar ɣef melmi ad nerzu ɣer at waɛli
d axerfi-nni i d-iṛebba i yečča
tutlayt taqbaylit d ayen i yezdin iqbayliyen
tafsut tettarra ama amadan ama agama yefreḥ yezga yettaḍsa segmi ara d-yali wass
Ḥader lfayda n gma-k
yuker-awen tikti-nwen
tecfiḍ teẓriḍ-iyi uqbel
acḥal swant tɣawsiwin am tidak
nesεa ayen ilaqen d lweqt
d acu i d-theyyaḍ i tagara n ssmana-ya
gen di talwit a gma neǧma faḍila d awezɣi ad kem-nettu
iḍelli walaɣ asaru n kirk douglas
snulfuyen kra n wawalen i tmaziɣt d igejduren
yuɣal mačči d ayen inefεen

yemmut cceṛ-is
mazal nesnernay tutlayt taqbaylit
gen di talwit a gma sebbaɛi yeḥya d awezɣi ad k-nettu
tufamt kra
gen di talwit a gma benabdeṛeḥman mennad d awezɣi ad k-nettu
blajuṭ yeẓẓa taneqlet imir-nni kan yettraǧu-tt ad as-d-tefk tibexsisin
llan lulen-d akken ad ččen kan
ur faqeɣ ara mi yeffeɣ
tafawet ur tufi tiɣersi
afet-tt uqbel ad ken-ifat neɣ akken ifat
uɣeɣ-d tamacint n txeyyaḍt d tajdidt
iceḥḥed mliḥ ublaḍ-nni
ur ttkeyyifent ara ɣur-neɣ tlawin
gen di talwit a gma mihad mestafa d awezɣi ad k-nettu
wissen amek ad as-nḥulfu i lmut ass tmijalt-nneɣ
akka i yelha
yuḍen tom
ikad-iyi-d twejdeḍ
ssaεa d uzgen nekk ttrajuɣ
d aya i kkateɣ ad k-d-iniɣ
ata-ya tom
lehna ur tt-ibennu yiwen
mazal llant tidak i yekkaten ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
layla tesla i lharaǧ di veṛṛa
ass n lǧemεa i yettsewwiq
lluẓeɣ
Ččar acmux-im truḥeḍ
d taqbaylit i d-ṭṭḍeɣ ar imawlan-iw
gen di talwit a gma xelfuni kamal d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ziɣ ur tettbeddileḍ ara a mass gringoire
srid seg barsaluna
d tutlayt-nneɣ i nebɣa ad tali
kerheɣ taxsayt
waqila aṭas ara yemten mi ara walin tuli teqbaylit
tettawi-d isefra s teqbaylit
bɣan ad qeḍɛen awal deg yimi
tfeqɛemt
gen di talwit a gma xennac idir d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ur hennaɣ ara skud ur k-xellṣeɣ
istummen-as i wass-a abeḥri tili
erriɣ zzit ɣef bazug-nni n uḍar-iw
iqbayliyen ttɛassan ɣef tutlayt-nsen
yezdeɣ deg lemsaq-nni kan
Ɛni d kemm ara ydebbṛen fell-i
gen di talwit a gma belhewane azeddin d awezɣi ad k-nettu
acḥal ad yi-id-tekker
ulac ɣur-i
kra ur t-ttrajuɣ sɣur-k
fell-asen i la tetzuxxum akka
aɛrur-ik senned-it ɣer lḥiḍ
d tilawin i iḥudden
nerra-ken deg uɛewwiq
anwa ara s-yecfun ma yella ur tt-uran ara
s lebɣi-w i tt-giɣ
kem d asegzawal yesɛan iḍaṛṛen
am win icetkan i lexla
nudaɣ fell-as ufiɣ-t
fehmen akk
isem-is n tidet d lisa
gen di talwit a gma arab nuṛdin d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ur tettafemt ara ayen ara txedmemt
beethoven d ajenniw deg uẓawan
yefud yebɣa ad isew
walaɣ yemma di tala tessefsay taduḍt
ilef d ilef
iwacu tlemmdeḍ taglizit
ur tt-id-yuli ara wawal
lebɣi meqqer afus wezzil
ur tεeṭṭleḍ ara
gen di talwit a gma benḥamidi lḥaǧ d awezɣi ad k-nettu
rexsen iselman assa
neḥḍer i tlata n lgirrat
amek lwiza tamaẓuẓt teqqar-d imeslayen iweznen am wi
yebɣa ad yečč
bezzef sin n yiseggasen n uraju
lemmer cebḥent ur teččḥent
laqan-d anezgum d aɛfiẓ
uɣal s axeddim
nniɣ-as ad tiliḍ da lawan n lefḍur
gen di talwit a gma bayu idir d awezɣi ad k-nettu
imensi yettwačča s tdukli
ansa i d-yewwi tom tajilbant-nni
aql-aɣ da weḥd-neɣ
d amesfizik
nekk d tidet kan ara wen-iniɣ…
i ak-in-uzneɣ d talwit ay aɛziz-iw
meyyez i tudert tatrart
Ḥerrek iman-ik
gen di talwit a gma messalti Ḥafiḍ d awezɣi ad k-nettu
d aseggas ajdid ara ilalen
ttǧenǧunen yizan
iεǧeb-iyi uɣanib-ik
yečča lekwaɣeḍ-is
yiwen n uɣrib yekker ad d-ikcem ɣer tmurt yekcem di lḥiḍ
ah ya tulawin bdumt tiɣratin
wissen ma tecfa ɣef ussan ur nesɛedda
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem n wegdud
acḥal aya ɣunzeɣ lemri
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem-nneɣ
anda akka i teffɣem
yya-d εawen-iyi
ttmerriɣent aggur-a
iruḥ seg wexxam i tella uletma-s
d ungal d-yewwin asentel amaynut di tsekla taqbaylit
d netta i iɛerken d netta i imeslen d netta i isewwayen
dɣa crurqent-d wallen n lǧuher ahat tebɣa ad tfaṛes tagnit deg yisikwan n tira n at wasif
ur teḥnuccḍeḍ ara makken yekkat ugris
ur s-uffiɣ ddwa i fad n tmara ar ɣur-s i yesenned lmuḥal
anwa-k kečč 
i yi-d-yenna
Ẓẓu kra n tzemrin ara d-afen warraw-ik
udem-is yekkaw yuza-t lḥif t-yeṭṭfen gar wuglan-is acḥal n yiseggasen-aya
inna-yasen-t-id
ssnen kan ad wten deg wiyaḍ
gar tizyiwin ttilin-t tismin akked umyezzwer
idegger-itt ɣer zdat usebɣes n twacult d medden
ur wefqeɣ ara tikti-nni acku am zik am tura yal yiwen ɣef wacu i yebbuṣa
kra n udellel iṭṭafaṛ tirza inek γer izmal web Γas ur tsit ara γef udellel
tenna yas aẓ-d ɣur-i a win ḥemmleɣ
dda qiqi ad sent-id-yebḍu i seṭṭac
ma tesɛa tyaẓiṭ awren qqaren-as medden lalla
iyyaɣ ar da a dadda
d amezdudgan
tamenɣast d tamdint n yitergiyen i d-yezgan deg unẓul n zzayer
tesɛa tfunast taseṭṭa d taɣezzfant
aɣlif n tnazent n tiliywalin n tiknussniwin d wumḍin
amussu n umtawa aɣelnaw
di ṭerḥa n fetter zik iḥbuben s ufella n yiferrugen
netta yezgel tamacint
tetett ayen d-yefka ugama
azul a mmi ḥebbu
ɣas ulama aseggas n rebɛa u ttɛin d win n uheggi n ugerdas aneggaru n unekcum ar tesdawit
deg iseggasen n ttɛin nella neqqaṛ deg uɣerbaz unnig n tsenselkimt di zzayer tamanaxt
attan tansa-w i tira  yidirnatbelqas ar yahoocom
daymi ddunit tezga tettemhaz tettbeddil
fell-ak ur yeddes lbaεḍ
tamedyazt taqbaylit tatrart d tin yesnernan tamdyazt tamensayt
ad fell-aɣ cehhden s ẓẓur
d acu issaɣay urkaḍ deg ulawen
ata wul-iw irkeb-it wurrif abbuh ya laṭif lɛid-iw akked imeḥbas
nger tamawt d akken yella-d ubeddel deg-s si tama n talɣa ayen i d-yeslalen asefru ilelli
tasdawit akli muḥend ulḥağ n tubiret
nugad ad aɣ-d-ilḥeq yiḍ
at wezzit
tifelwiyin n tseftit di amyagcom
i aɣ-d-yenna uselmad-is n tmaziɣt
aqedruref i teqqedruref ur yezmir yiwen ad t-yektil
tamurt tquc
ad nidir yid-s tiswiεin-nni n uceṭṭen d lḥir 
ihegga ad yesrifeg
ɣas ma nettmagar-d yal-as ẓẓerb
tessen ad teffer fell-as
ddari ddaw n ssiwan
ttṛajun akk medden ansa ara d-yekk
deg-s tarwiḥt n lmalayek
lbena-m deg-s teγli
teqqur tala
d tameɣar ad thuzz tammast
anta tama anida i tzedɣeḍ
a ssiɛqa lmumnin 
s tidet kan
tatut d anagraw yettṛebbi udabu azzayri ama s uɣerbaz neɣ s leǧwameɛ
nniɣ d anẓad n silyuna i yufa ugeldun di tala ma tecfam ɣef tmacahut ihi tecfam akk ɣef taggara 
ad nezzi i yemma akken ad aɣ-d-tawi tamacahut
ugin ad fken
iṭerkiyen d waɛraben akken kan yewweḍ lqern segmi ntin ttarun ungalen
ihi walit-tt di tensa-agi
yal ass yettawi-d amur-is n tekriḍt lmut lejruḥ lbumbat leḥbus timenfi
tidet ma tenna-d tidet ilaq ad t-xelleṣ̣ amur-is
aseqqamu aɣerfan aɣelnaw
d wid amzun bran i ṭbel deg aman
nekkni nerra ɣer tama
agellid yenna ad sbeddeɣ taqbaylit
ih awi-t-id
aɛmar at Ḥemmuda aẓar-is n taddart n tasaft ugemmun deg tama n ibudraren
llant tedyanin-iḍen ara tafem deg ungal n wanẓaden msakit mi ara t-teɣrem ur ttkalet ara fell-i ad awen-d-feḍḥeɣ lbaḍna n lynda cwitem
nettat tessenṭeq-d anẓaden “nettat” d lynda cwiten i yuran ungal anẓaden msakit ziɣ ɛeddan di ẓẓmik
nteddu di lḥif i d-nɛedda
Ɣef wi yewwin taḍuṭ yerkeb ma d wayeḍ zdat-s i t-yenher
ad imerreɣ ma yufa
teḍra-as am uḥuli yefkan azuɣer ɣer zdat
ad yenfeḍ ula d ciṭ yebnan
din-a i tegzem tmiḍt-is
afeggag n udrurem aglawan
ad ruḥeɣ ad qqimeɣ dinin ɣef lbenk ɣer yiri n llamba n webrid
ad dduɣ sanda ad yeddu d iɣeẓṛan neɣ d tiɣaltin
ad tuḥwaǧeḍ ad ak-d-fken afus
akken tesliḍ
ala xaṭi
acuɣer ur d-tusiḍ ara ɣer tmeɣra
ad tedduḍ yidi ɣer lqahwa
ad ninig ɣer iṭalia qabel
adɣaɣ i ẓriɣ deg yifri anectilat
d awezɣi ad t-id-tafeḍ
mazal lxir ar zdat
abrid i tt-yettawin ɣer tesdawit ibeddel
tebɣa ad tehder ayen tesḥusay
yuɛer ad tafeḍ tin ara ak-d-yeldin ul-is
yeggugem am yisɣi
saɛid u muḥ yers
uɣalen beddlen leɛwayed-nsen
iḍ-a yuɣal-as d netta i taduli-s
bɣiɣ ad zziɣ kra zdaxel n temdint n bgayet
Ɣilas akked amayas tessaki-ten-id yemmat-nsen tessarred-asen tesles-asen syin akkin tewwi-ten ar uɣerbaz
ay aḥeqqar n tullas
yewwi-d tafat s wudem
d akud ara ɣ-d-iseknen kullec
yeffeɣ-d seg texxamt
a lbabur a bu uqamum
netta d massi ttemlilin sbeḥ deg lkar
d acu tessewwayeḍ
ur yeẓri d acu ara d-yehder
baba-m yettselim-d fell-am
amejjay idawa lǧarḥ-is
aṭas i d as-yenwan lqahwa d aman
lemmer ar lqed i tt-tella tili ad yettarra tili
bɣan akk ad unagen ɣer tmura n tmeddanit
saɛid u muḥ yerra-d ṭṭlem meṛṛa ɣef tiziri tagawawt

kkren i tmeɣra ur as-zmiren
tettgalla di mmi-s
terra srid ɣer maziɣ ad tzer ma yella neɣ ulac-it
tin ahat ara sen-d-yeldin tiwwura
aṛju ad ak-werriɣ amek i iteddu
ad d-tuɣalemt

awal itezzi kan ɣef yiwen n usentel
d alexxax

tebɣam ad teččem
iṭṭef-iten ccambiḍ gezzmen tizmerin deg udrar
armi i tt-cerweɣ meṛṛiɣet i sen-slemdeɣ tussna n yimenɣi n ṛṛuman
akken qqaren “d acu ara trajuḍ deg win ur newwit izan ɣef wallen-is
llan miyya u xemsin medden i yulin ar tmacint
taxxamt n yidir tezga zeddiget
yettraǧu kan melmi ara d-tɛeddi tin yewwin leɛmer-is
sliman u muḥ d akanadi
d acu i ak-nexdem a winnat
ad tizmireḍ ad yid-tɛawneḍ tikkelt-nniḍen

ur fhimen ara d acu i d-tenniḍ
azul a maziɣ

amenṭas mi ara yeḥṣel

a-t-an yenquqel lsas-iw

ur smeḥsis ara i theddurin n medden

a talwit win yeṭṭsen di tṛakna ad as-yini ccetwa teḥma
iyya-n ɣur-i ma tebɣiḍ
imawlan-is ffɣen ar uzemmur makken i tefka ttiɛad i rabeḥ ucaɛban
iḍelli uɣeɣ-d adlis n tmedyazt
akken i tyewweḍ ufus-iw yesrafeg
tamedyazt d tin yellan d lemri n wayen akk yettidir umdan aqbayli
ass-a d tameɣra n lbaz d tnina
hedṛeɣ-as ɣef nger iqqar-iyi-d acḥal i d-iǧǧa
uɣaleɣ s iḍes
d aberrani ula d netta di tmurt n medden
acu ik-d-yewwin ɣur-i
ad serseɣ afus-iw ɣef ul-im
axaṭer mačči kifkif-itent akk
zemreɣ ad ak-slemdeɣ yiwet n tɣawsa neɣ snat
abbuh a lɣaci
tifunasin sɛant timaẓẓagin
ɣur-s lhiba meqqret
ad ḥlun yideddicen-a
merrɣen ticki yella uzɣal
ad s-tiniḍ d akniwen nekk yid-k
ad nadin ɣef tidet yeffren
acmumeḥ
tom ur d-yettaɣ ara aɣṛum
teḥnucceḍ akken tufa
ad ruḥeɣ
tudert n ben muḥemmed
akken i neɣṛa nekk yid-s deg yiwen n uɣerbaz
acuɣeṛ i tettsebbilem
d acu kan  taḥbult ur tettewwa ɣef yiwen n wudem
ad ɛeddiḍ tikkelt kan f ubrid dɣa ad cfuɣ fell-as
ad nleɛbet nnuba n tinis
akken ad yettwassen s ulac
ad ffɣeɣ d yemma azekka
xuylen dɣa bedden di rrif ugin ad aẓen iḍaṛṛen
tecnam akk ɣef zzin-iw tecnam lḥerma i kesbeɣ
akken d aḍaɛfan
ajenwi i y-iḥuzan yenta gar wul d tasa
ad iniɣ yewwet-ik wugur
acḥal n medden illan deg terbaεt-nwen
agu yedla tiqucac
acekkuḥ-is ɣezzif armi yewweḍ lqaεa
acu yellan akka acu kem-yuɣen
ad yawi abrid-is
tubiret tezga-d deg tmurt n yiqbayliyen
ad nqeṣṣer meqqar
swiɣ yiwet n lattay ɣer itargiyen tekkat ɣer uqeṛṛu
tcennuḍ s teqbaylit
ur inuda fell-am ur kem-yufi
ad tewteḍ ɣef teqbaylit
nekcem s axxam naf-itt tgen
a yemma bɣiɣ ad becceɣ
ur ufant ara acu ara xedment
d aslemad asdawan deg uɣerbaz agtatwil
ttarunt s tutlayt taqbaylit
mi ara heddreɣ teffẓeɣ imeslayen
s teqbaylit ara idirent
ad teffeɣ seg uxxam
a yemma mmi-m ṛebbi-t
mazal tettali tutlayt taqbaylit
ad tlemdeḍ tutlayt taqbaylit
Ččan lekwaɣeḍ-nsen
tettmeslayem s teqbaylit
ad theḍṛeḍ s teqbaylit
ad d-taɣemt ayefki
ttawint-d isefra s teqbaylit
ncemmeṛ iɣallen-nneɣ
yiwen irebba lehnak mmuten-as
kkateɣ ɣef teqbaylit
txeddmemt ɣef teqbaylit
acuɣeṛ i tegganem aṭas
ur tebɣi ara ad d-tessemḥes
nudaɣ fell-awent ufiɣ-kent
gǧan-as-d tarda leḥwal
yettwali kan taqbaylit
anta i d-yennan akka
tebɣa tutlayt taqbaylit
anda tufiḍ taqendurt-nni
d taqbaylit i d tudert-nwen
ad lemdeɣ tutlayt taqbaylit
yelsa takiluṭ-is
theblem ɣef teqbaylit
anwa i k-yifen a mmi-s n yetran
tḥemmlem ad turarem
beccen aserwal-nsen
iqeggel di lexla
kkaten ɣef teqbaylit
anda i yeǧǧa aserwal-nni
s teqbaylit i nettxemmim
meqqṛeɣ-d s teqbaylit
tabadut s tmegdiwt
yemla-akent d acu ara txedmemt
ur ufan ara acu ara xedmen
ar dinna i tetteddu
ur tnuda fell-i ur iyi-tufi
yettwali-ken-id s yir tiṭ
yella ulac-it
Ḥemmlent ad cnunt s teqbaylit
a lmus-iw a lmusi-w ccḍeɣ yeɣli ubernus-iw
afus deg ufus a leqbayel
kemmel kan akken ar zdat
anda akka i teffeɣ
ar dinna ara naweḍ
gǧan-asen-d tarda leḥwal
acuɣeṛ i teggan aṭas
yekkat ɣef teqbaylit
netta i ifazen akk deg-neɣ
anda ara kent-id-afeɣ
yebna-aɣ axxam
yefka-yak abadaṛ
anagraw yesselkimen tinaḍin n uselkim
ur ẓriɣ wara
ad d-ilal deg yidisan-is
wissen anda i teddun warrac-ihin
drus-aya seg mi yemmut
anamek n wawal
qqimeɣ d xali
ur ẓriɣ ara d acu i k-yuɣen
yuɣ-d taḥellabt uqbel tafunast ṣṣrima uqbel aserdun
d lawan ad tkecmem
ar wanwa ara tt-yaf
tettḥebbiṛem ɣef teqbaylit
heblen ɣef teqbaylit
s teqbaylit i tettwaṛebbaḍ

n yilindi

d lawan ad kkreɣ fell-i

ur tettaf ara ayen ara texdem

d taqbaylit i d iseɣ-nsen

tettarumt s tutlayt taqbaylit
ur yezmir ḥedd ad yefk deg-s laman seg akken yezga yeskiddib
d allen n weqjun i yesɛa
tḥemmel tiɣawsiwin tiqbuṛin
ad tewtem ɣef teqbaylit

a dda Ɛisa

ad tissineḍ taqbaylit

yiwen ur t-yettamen

acimi akka nessusem

yessen ayen yessen yibki awessar
fkan-ak abadaṛ
nekk d aselmad n tidderwect
d lawan ad tuɣal

tettnadim fell-i
Ɛinani leɛmer yeffer tidet yeqqar tqerreḥ
ama deg tɣerma ama deg yidles
d acu i k-yewwin ad d-tneṭqeḍ
irman i ten-yessemrasen anagar imazzagen n kra n taɣult
acuɣeṛ i yeggan aṭas
ur lliɣ d amasiḥi d aɛrab neɣ d ineslem nek d aqbayli
akka i yesla
yettwali-k-id s yir tiṭ
d lawan ad tekcem
belɛid at Ɛli d netta i yuran ungal amezwaru s teqbaylit lwali n wedrar
igerrez usnulfu n wissen
nḥemmel akk tutlayt taqbaylit
di temẓi-s yezga muḥend s yiqeẓẓulen
ma ulac aɣilif mudd afus i sliman u muḥ
gen di talwit a gma abdu mduwad d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ikad-yi-d d ayen tuklaleḍ
kemm tettxemmimeḍ kan ɣef teqbaylit
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem n imawlan
aserwal-nni iruḥ akk d tifawtin
aql-i kettbeɣ tabrat
tuḍnemt akk
gen di talwit a gma arezug sliman d awezɣi ad k-nettu
tasuta n tmanyin ɣef tmaziɣt i twet mačči ɣef teqbaylit
Ẓriɣ d ayen ur nettεawad ad d-yeḍru
ma yella wayen illan yeḍra-d wakken amek ara tgeḍ
zemreɣ ad tt-afeɣ
assa yerxes lḥut
cemmṛemt iɣallen-nkent a tiqbayliyin
Ẓriɣ-t mi d-iεedda deg uxnaq
gen di talwit a gma harem sliman d awezɣi ad k-nettu
wissen ma yella ad d-yennulfu wejdid
nniɣ-as ad k-yeεǧeb
dayen teεyiḍ
lliɣ aken tedduɣ ad ruḥeɣ
tezriḍ lxilaf
ur cɣileɣ ara ula d nekk
ad d-tas
maca deg wayen ara iruḥ ad iseṭṭel i yinuwar yekcem deg yiwen n weɣsur
cfiɣ fell-ak
ad yesɛu idrimen
ad ṛuḥeɣ ar tmurt n Ṭelyan
ssarameɣ iḍ ad yeɣli d ass ad d-yali ad ifakk fell-i uxemmem
tom ɣas ini ur yettili ara yakk deg uxxam
yezmer lḥal teɣli temgerḍt gar-asen tiririt n ttar tezga yiwen ur tt-itettu
at mendas d at buɣerdan
ad ferneɣ abrid ara yaɣeɣ
azekka d aɣebbar
ad k-id-neɛreḍ ar iwannuɣen
akka ttwaliɣ tira-m teččuṛ d tuccḍiwin
ad zzizfent maḥyaf gar yimdanen
d tayri i yebnan tudert
qqaṛen zik tirga mxalfa
yettgallan s Ḥemza
d tunḍa d tuzzya
adrar n ukfadu yeččur d tizantin
ad ak-d-yefk ṛebbi tazmert
akked imurar-nni swayes yejgugel
deg-s tamɣart d mmi-s d teslit-is
tmerrɣem ɣef tferracit
alɣem yettwali kan taɛrurt-nni n gma-s ur iwala ara akk tinn-is
acḥal i uɣalen a lɣiḍa
Ḥnuccḍent iḍelli di taddart
ad ffɣeɣ ar taddart azekka
leɛbbaja
tiɣilt ali uyeḥya
ṣṣuṛa-m tugi ad temḥu
tibyarin-a tekksent fad
tteḥnuccuḍet di zzit
limer d lebɣi-ik ay ul
yega-as isem s tefransist
d urfan i d-smarent ur d-yettqadd
ur nberru i kra
tin yellan tessewḥac-itt
kečč tebɣiḍ ad tessewḍ aṭas n waman maca drus ay d-yeggran deg ubuqal
katia taqcict n sbeɛṭac n yiseggasen tesseɣli-d rrehba deg ulawen n luluf n yinselmen irebraben armi ssawḍen ar tmenɣiwt-is
a-t-an iman-ik tettenderkaleḍ err-itt-id ɛad mi ara tiliḍ d teqcict
maca ɣur-s mazal ixus kra
d tagrurt d taneqlet neɣ d tameɣrust n ubrid
tekker seg wussu ahat ad t-tettu kra
ala ma ur yesɛi ara leqraya i tt-yettara ɣer lxedma
iḥemmel taẓuri
ur ibɣi ara unefray ad iɣiwel s asufeɣ n tkerḍiwin tiwraɣin
Ɣas akka s unecraḥ i ak-d-ttaraɣ
acimi i t-tkerheḍ
sima kra tezga ixeddem akken d nettat teṭṭalay-it-id seddaw n tiṭ
izimer inheṛ-d izimer ula wi yemlan abrid i wayeḍ
ttazzaleɣ axaṭer ɛyiɣ di tikli
amuḍin ata iwet-it yiwen usebbit meqqren
Ččiɣ-d deg berra
ula d imeqqranen ttun belli ula d ilmeẓyen d imdanen yettxemmimen
ayɣeṛ ar a-k-ttejgugulen deg uqenduṛ
terra akk ayen yellan yesɛa azal deg rrif
d kečč iyi-ɛerqen
ma yella ur tkemlem ara
ad truḥemt ass-a ɣer lexla
d ulaqrar ak-id-yeṭṭef ubrid
ilha waddal i wallaɣ
nekk rẓiɣ-as aqerruy-is s temɛayin am tigi
ur tezmirem ara ad ṭṭfen deg yiwen neɣ deg yiwet alamma d taggara
isem-is baba-k
i yemudden tiṛwiḥin-nsen akken ad tidir tmurt n zzayer di talwit di tlelli di teɣdemt tinmettit
Ɣad bbubent arraw-nsent ur d-ttcetkayent ɣef leɛtab
ayaw ad nɛerḍet
ma tewwweḍ-ik-d
nurar ddama
jebbden-tt ɣer wayen leɛmer tesli
fren-tt meɛna tettban-d d akessar
tɛemmer-d taqendurt-is n tmeɣra s tɛeqqcin
ih ula d nekk
Ɛni yuɛeṛ mliḥ
kker a mmi ad theggiḍ iman-ik ad truḥeḍ ɣer lakul
ar ass-a ur fhimeɣ tamsalt-a
ternuḍ-aɣ-d dduminu
iḍelli yusa-n yidir ɣer ssuq ur k-in-yufi ara
ileḥḥu i yizilan
aṭas aya ur d-terri lwelha-s ɣer walebɛaḍ
aqel-ikem deg tesdawit
maziɣ d amdan ur tettḥusuḍ yes-s
war ma nettu anecraḥ d uqessar d yimddukal
yenna-as wuccen semmum lbeṛquq
ihi yal lheddra tɣelli-d deg umkan-is
imi izemmmen leεmer i t-kecmen yizan

d acu-t umsedday n uɛqal n taɣect

tuzzel tɛebbuḍt-iw
teqqes-it times n waḍu
ass kamel lwaḥid
wissen iwacu ur ttilin ara am nekki
tamɛict n ukessar d usawen
ay abunniḍ
iḥɣa ad iḥbes akeyyef n ddexxam meɛna ur yezmire ara
aqjun-iw ɣur-s taseṭṭa ɣezzifet
bɣiɣ ad ṛuḥeɣ yid-s ɣer sinima
ayen iḍerrun deg yinurar iḍerru deg yexxamen
yessexreb-as targit-is ur yebni ara ɣef wannect-a

awal d awal-im
ur yečči acemma ass-a

Ḥemmleɣ tutlayt takatalant
yedda-yasen di lebɣi
tesneḍ ad telseḍ
akken ad d-uɣalen s axxam
sima i tikkelt tamezut i teldi tawwurt i ḥedd akken ad yemmeslay yid-s
d aymi i d-reggleɣ ɣer umezgun
ur ifeɣ ara yidir di tefransist
di tilawt falisṭin kecmen-tt waεraben am akken i d-kecmen tamazɣa
win yezgan yettaf-d awal ilaqen i yal tadyant
ma yella d maziɣ ibedd yettraju
izdeɣ ar yixef n ubrid
sima mi tekfa lhedra d maziɣ
d aya kan i tebɣamt
mačči d yiwet akken ad tt-qablen
ili-k d umɛin
ixḍa-kem ccɣel
txeddem ayen tebɣa
ffer tiktiwin-ik i yiman-ik ma ulac ad k-snegren
aql-aɣ daɣen lwaḥid
sima tesɛa ixeddim ɣef ttmenya alamma d lweḥda
acḥal i tt-id-yeɛnan
tleḥqeḍ ɣer daxel n wallaɣ-iw
teẓriḍ a maziɣ
yeḍfeṛ acrured n tsekkurt tikli n tyaziḍt teɛreq-as
iɛǧeb-ak lḥal anaɣ
Ḥemmleɣ imdanen i yeqqaṛen tiktubin
ya ad tent-yegleb neɣ ad glunt yes-s
ad yeqqim neɣ ad iruḥ
yeɣreq lbabur-iw
d tidet
leqbayel asmi bɣan ad ččen aɣerda nnan-as d “ačuṛbiɛ”
akka i tt-id-nufa
iṛuḥ lḥal iyaw ad nruḥ
yerna akken itt-yebɣa lxaṭer-nwen
ur tbexxel ara fell-as
d dda brahem itt-yeṭṭfen
akken kan taxṛen i weyefki uɣalen ar ubaṭaṭiw
d tidet tennad oprah ayagi
d asmeḥtel kan
tetten-tt s wallen
sima tewwi-tt tnafa akken gar yifasen n maziɣ
Ǧǧet-it ad yexdem ayen n diri
argaz d asalas tameṭṭut d ajgu alemmas
yewwet-itt d ibeddi seg bgayet ɣer tezmalt
wissen ma teɣriḍ tullisin-a
llant kra alamma d asmi ar ad-ɛiun widak-nni ar ad-tent-tid yaweḍ umeṛḥul-nni n tqeffilt i d-ttafent fiḥel taftilt
zik seg tala i d-ttagment tlawin aman
seqdaceɣ taqbaylit yal ass deg yal taɣult
yeɛfes tirgin
dominique strauss kahn ḥebsent di marikan ass-mi yetɛedda ɣef yiwet n tmeṭṭut taberkant
tseččeḍ-iyi iḥeckulen ttewteɣ fell-am
Ḥader ad tettuḍ ur as-tettarraḍ ara i tebrat-is
yuweḍ almi d imi n tala yuɣal-d akken ur d-yeswi
sliman ad k-izzenz ad k-id-yerr
ziɣ tebbehbaḍ
i nessaram d tujjya iɛǰlen i kra yellan d amuḍin
seg wasmi yeffeɣ tamurt ccix lḥesnawi ur d-yuɣal
ur telhi ur tecmit
win yettun iman-is amek i tebɣiḍ ad d-yemmekti wayeḍ
kečč deg yimi-k tidet tezga
ur tettruḥuḍ ara
d Ṛemḍan umusa i yuɣen akal deg at ɛebbas
tecɣeb-iten yiwen n taluft iɣef i ten-id-iwessa nnbi
yennuɣ yid-s
dhu d yiman-ik
awer tawḍeḍ
aɣeggad izerreb

aṭas i ččant
Ɣur-i tif akk tutlayin
cedhaɣ-kem a yemma
ayen tebɣuḍ tiɣzifeḍ ay iḍ d ulaqrar ad yali wass
ihi d acu ara nexdem tameddit-a

ar webrid-nnayeḍ

Ɣur-s d ass yecban akk wiyaḍ
ur tesliḍ ara
yeqqes-iyi uzrem
llan kra n yiberčečča neqqen wid i ten-itetten
ibunda kkaten-d deg tsemhuyt n umwan
ad teččeḍ čekčuka d tmellalin
ddiɣ ḥafi ɣef ddjaj
d acennay ameqqran
tessegdel fell-i awal
yugi ad as-yerr awal
mi ara yili yid-s akud ur as-yettaki
tazwara n tmacahut d tasneknayt
nutni akk d imellalen ala netta i d azewwaɣ
d acu kan iɛǧeb-asen lḥal
seg ansi i kent-d-kan idrimen-nni
am ugugam yuɣalen ihedder
yugi wul ad yennecraḥ mi yugi yimi-m ad d-yecmumeḥ
seksu asgal
yezmer lḥal selbeɣ maca ur lliɣ d ɛelluḍ
ur ttrut ara fell-asen
selleɣ kan yes-sen
yeččur usefru-inu d asirem
deg leɛmeṛt ma ihḍeṛ-iyi-d yiwen akka
maɛna yiwen ur yeẓri d acu i aɣ-d-ittheggi uzekka
Ččureɣ akufi d tazart
iceyyeɛ-iyi baba ad as d-aɣeɣ ccemma
anwa ur d-nusi
ziɣ tčefčefeḍ
yečča imekil-s mi izeggen wass
yufa-aɣ-d nettheggi iman-nneɣ ad nruḥ s amahil
wwet ṭṭbel i wiw ara k-iceḍḥen
feṛḥat at sɛid d aselway n tmurt taqbaylit
yufa-awent amahil
yugurten u muḥ qrib yeɣreq
aql-i heddreɣ deg tilifun
tekcem ɣer fasebbuk
mačči d ayen akken i tenwiḍ i d-iḍerrun
ziɣ yeffeɣ-ik laɛqel
yenna-asent aql-i yid-kent alma d lmut
terram-aɣ deg uɛewwiq
tewwet agejdur
teddam-asent di nneqma
sɛiɣ yiwen n umeddakel yettidiren deg kyoto
aru taqbaylit a taqbaylit
issebbaḍen i d-uɣeɣ iḍelli ur iyi-d-zgin ara
d acu i d-yufa akka
yunef-iyi ad ɛeddiɣ
ibɣa ad yennaɣ mgal maḥyaf
eǧǧ-iyi ad d-kfuɣ awal
tabrat i awen-d-tuzen teṭṭfem-tt
as-d tura yakkan
imarawen-nneɣ ur xememmen ara fell-aneɣ
ur iḥemmel ara yidir ad iŵeel deg yid di berra
ur yečči ur yeswi deg wayen akk i d-yuɣ
pinukyu mi ara yeskiddib yettimɣur yinrez-is
bɣiɣ ad sɛuɣ aqjun g uxxam
qeflen merra tiwwura
Ɣellint-d tillas imdanen keččmen s ixxamen-nsen
yenna-d mmi "ḥemleɣ-k"
ssentaɣ tisegnit deg ddjaj win i d-ineṭqen yebɣa zzwaj
kečč tebdiḍ
axxam ur nesɛi tamɣaṛt am wurti ur nesɛa tadekkaṛt
ttaruɣ yiwen n udlis
tiẓurin d tbexsisin quccent
nenwa bucḥiḍ yenqeḍ ziɣen yuɣal-d s wadda
inuda fell-am yufa-kem
iḥemmel aqellal n tmurt n yeqbayliyen
anwa i yeẓran
nefka-as i wuccen ad iɛas tiɣeṭṭen
leɛmer i d-yenna tidet
mačči d učči akk ad tiniḍ s iḍarren-is i t-id-yexdem
ad asen-tt-in-awiɣ azekka
izuxx aṭas s mmi-s
Ḍsan-d medden d tirni yerna qesren
teddun-asent di nneqma
mi ččiɣ imensi ffɣeɣ ɣer berra ad dduɣ cwiṭ
ayen txedmeḍ ad t-tafeḍ
tudert wezzilet aṭas
kemmlen-as s uqessar d unecraḥ
yugi ad yeɛfu
yettkel ɣef yiman-is
yenna-asen akk ayen yettxemmim fell-asen
Ɣezzif umecwar
ini-as i tom xir nekk ur ẓriɣ ara
yella tom d yiwen n unelmad iṭagen
myezɛafent
ack-it uqcic-a
kra yekka yiḍ ur qmiceɣ tiṭ-iw
yečča aɣṛum
wa yebɣa wa yugi
berra tekkat lgerra
mazal yeḥma uɣrum
nemmeč si lḥif
yenna-as a wi yufan ilel d iɣi ma d igenni d tameḍluɛt
tidet d lɛafya yerɣan ẓẓaẓneɣ-tt tečča-iyi nnekwa
qeyylem
baba yuḍnen dima yeṭṭef ussu
yemma d tamurt d tameslayt d tameddit d tamaziɣt
ur rejjmeɣ yiwen
tura-as tabrat
yurew lexrif aseggas-a ilaq ad nheggi iferrugen
lliɣ ur sεiɣ ara ččeɣ
d tikkelt tamezwrut i d-yusa ɣer tazmalt
teεreq-aɣ tenhert
yuḍen aɣbel
nettarra-tent deg uɛewwiq
beṛka-k abessel
tedduɣ-asen di nneqma
ur ak-t-id-yuwi ara
d ɛemti iyi-tt-id-ixaḍen
Ɣur-s tayuga n yizgaren
tismin neqqent
qqim fell-ak
terram-tt deg uɛewwiq
ini-iyi-d anwa i tettxalaḍeḍ ad ak-d-iniɣ amek i tgiḍ
d ijmuyaɛ i asen-yebḍan taferka i d-yeǧǧa baba-tsen
yemla-as abrid yelhan
ttxil-k a εemmi furar rḍel-iyi-d yiwen n wass
uɣaleɣ-d akken yiwen n uslem ur t-id-ṭṭifeɣ
ireqq cwiṭ cwiṭ
tesɛiḍ rray ula deg tuffɣa
llan mmuten yagi
ruḥ s leɛqel
yenɣa sami imcac
yeskaddeb tom i umsaltu
ugint ad amnent s wayen yeḍran yid-sent
iɣeẓẓa-t uqjun yerna yesseḍ
tettarram taqemmuct
anta i d tamurt-ik
s yidrimen nezmer ad naɣ kra yellan
Ɛeǧben-iyi ileɣman
ad t-teǧǧ tmacint
akken bɣuɣ xedmeɣ mačči akken
tedduɣ-ak di nneqma
yemla-asent-d abrid yelhan
tuɣmas-is tekfa-tent lfula
yiwen ur iyi-iɛmid ad geɣ kra neɣ kra
ur yuli ur issubb
ruḥ di sslama n rebbi
kra ar tecwirt kra ar tayeḍ ma ulac ad ɣlint
tiremt n tnezzayt d lqahwa
lufan ad teẓreḍ acḥal i kemm-ḥemmleɣ
yenna-yid ufermasyan belli ur ilaq ara ad nḍeqqer ddwa ɣer ugudu
akken i sent-txedmem kifkif
ulac d acu i yuɛren am win iɣuccen iman-is
arbaɛ n weǧda ddurin tarakna di lawan n tegrawla
yettaru yuba akken i ilaq
nwiɣ d netta
yefka-tt i jjiḥ
ittergigi am usaflaw
ur yettḍurru yiwen
ireggem-as lǧennet
ad nezhen deg-neɣ medden
dayen tegzem-itt deg rray anzaren-is ad ten-id-tseggem
cɛel tafatin n texxamin i meṛṛa
yuɣ-d taculliḍt n uyefki
anecraḥ d u cmumeḥ
ad as-tiniḍ tidyanin i d-ɛacen gar lxedma d leqraya iten-yerran d imeqqranen
wa ad t-tḥemmel
Ɛmiṛuc u muḥ ɣezzif
tekker-d sbeḥ zik akken ad teqqim sdat n lemri
tbeddel lqecc-is
ula d nettat tettḥusu akken yettḥusu urgaz
ur aɣ-d-iṣaḥ ara wawal
arnaflasen ttwaḥeqren aṭas deg zzayer
theggaḍ ad tessutred
ur zmireɣ ara ad aruɣ yakan
ttnejban am ddkir q wuzzal
ayɣer tseqsayeḍ
cekkṛent-d tesɣunin adlis-is amaynu
i kunwi d acu i kwen-id-igren di tessirt
awal am teṛṣaṣt mi yeffeɣ ur d-ittuɣal
i neẓra mazal ad nẓer
ur iyi-d-yuli ara wawal
ur ḥemmleɣ ara youtube ad yaker akud-iw
d aya kan i tebɣiḍ
acku sina i d-ttɛeddayent teḥdayin yeqqaren deg tesnawit
ilha uqader n unefray
ammer d nekk iman-iw ur yi-d-tecqi ur yi-d-tewqiɛ
yerra-as-d ula d netta
tin yesɛan ul
ifka iman is d asfel  ihemmel tamurt is
ggugmen ibeckiḍen
amen belli d ayen illan
iban ad d-yaweḍ deg lawan ilaqen
ddiɣ d temdakelt-iw
ala maziɣ ara tt-id-ifehmen
ddu akken iwata
Ḥsu dakken terna lqima-m ɣer ɣur-i
izga ikkat-it wugur imi izzuɣur iḍarren-is
d acu i k-tewqeɛ g acu ara tles teqcict
ayen akk iceɣben medden d adrim
yuba u muḥ ur yezmir ara ad yaf tiziri tagawawt
ur sbuḥruyemt ara
lemden leqran
george tejreḥ tasa-s
ccah deg-m i mi tḥemmleḍ ad tt-tamneḍ
ur tkebbir ara
ilaq ad as-d-afeɣ ixf-is i ulaɣmu-agi
yeṭṭef abrid-is qbala ɣer lkar
Ɣeṛ aṭas
waqila yettasem yidir si newwara
maziɣ ur yefhim kra
ar melmi ara tkemmel akka
ulac ul ara ixedmen
maca yeǧǧa-tt lweqt
ziɣen ɣelḍeɣ
aql-aɣ da
yefka-t unebdu i lexrif
ass n lḥedd ɣef ttnac n uzal
rwint-iyi temlella
am netta am yimdukkal-is
d tawacult yesɛan azal
mazal-ikem da
azekka ur ttiliɣ ara da
iwet-iyi-d s rrkel ɣer yimellalen
Ɛmiṛuc u muḥ igzem-itt d tiziri tagawawt
ass-a ur neẓri ara ayen ara d-yeḍrun azekka
ula d sima akken i as-teḍra
tḥemmel ad tesqerdec timsal
ma ulac aɣilif sɛeddi-yi-d sskeṛ
teddewer-d ɣer massi
aɣbel ttaran-t i wid ixusen msakit
anwa i wen-d-innan belli ad ken-ɛawneɣ
mi tfuk lqahwa-s
nekk nwiɣ-k tfehmeḍ timsal akken llant
awi-d ukkan ad yi-d-terreḍ zik s wawal
waqil teɛyiḍ
iselman ma ulac aɣilif
acku icɣeb-itt
sliman u muḥ yečča s uɣiwel
nekk ad ldiɣ taḥanut
qrib ad yali wass
wama dayi deg tesdawit
ma ɣef ayen irzan aɣawas ajdid ur k-wufqeɣ ara di rray
bɣan ad sirden allaɣ-nteɣ
iẓẓa ṭumaṭtic d texsayt bdan ttemmɣin
izdeɣ-iten ulac
bɣiɣ ad tesɛuḍ tameṭṭut am kečč am tezyiwin-ik
deg unafag i telliḍ
yiwen ur yelli fell-as d aḥkim
sliman u muḥ yewweḍ-n ar din send tiziri tagawawt
ahat ad ḥefḍeɣ lɛum
ittbeddil uzrem taglimt
ilaq ad tettekleḍ f yiman-ik kan meɛna mačči s waṭas
melmi i d-ilul deg tsekla taqbaylit
d nekk i yebɣan ad naweḍ ɣer da
Ǧǧem-t ad yexdem ayen n diri
ama deg tsekla taɛrabt neɣ tin n tefaransist
ma mačči akka anef i tessirt n wawal ad tẓeḍ awren-is ad t-yeddem waḍu ad t-yeḍlu i tɣeltin n tatut
ad as-d-fkeɣ taktubt-nni azekka
iqeṛṛeḥ-iyi lḥal
ttekkarent-d akken ad gnent
nekk zgiɣ qqneɣ imal-iw ɣer lutu ara xedmeɣ i leɛmer-iw
di tikli iḥwağ aḥellel yewwi lmelḥ ɣef tbarda
neɣ ma yella tuḥwaǧeḍ kra aru-yi-d
yal tamenaḍt n ddunit tesɛa ammud-ines n tsekla s lesnaf-is
ibedd ɣef nnaquṛ
ula deg wasmi i tessɛa d amddakel deg fasebbuk
anwa aselway i tḥemmleḍ s waṭas
Ḥadrem
ma ulac aɣilif efk-iyi ad sweɣ aman
d amejjay n tuɣmas wis tlata i iwala deg sin n wussan
d targit
ad as-tent-yefk i yemma-s
tin yesɛan akk ayen tettmenni yal taqcict
mačči ɣer tmeɛnanc ur nesɛi azal
lkar n tmerrit yezger tilisa
acimi ur iyi-d-tettarraḍ ara awal
ad ten-tuḥwaǧeḍ ad k-ɛiwnen
acḥal yettaɣ uxeddam ma drus di tuṭrict
deg uḍellaɛ i d-qeṭṭuɣ si ssuq
idegdeg deg uḍaṛ
ilaq ad nexdem kra
ad iteddu ɣer nnger
ad tizmireḍ ad iyi-d-tesɛeddiḍ lubyan
ad ten-id-afen
iban belli tessnem-ten mliḥ
ad nesseqḍeɛ ajenwi akken ad nezlu axeṛfi
d tilawin i d timezwura
Ḥemmlen warrac lejdud-nsen axaṭer ttbuddun-ten
iḥninet-d fell-i ciṭuḥ
melmi ara d-nruḥ
ur ddiren ur mmuten
d saɛid seɛdi i yettaken abeḥri i turet
izem iẓeddem ɣef teɣzalin isehlen
mačči d tin ara ixedmen axxam
ad aɣ-tɛawneḍ ama tebɣid ama tugiḍ
mi ara awḍeɣ ad d-siwleɣ
akud yettɛedday ur t-nettwali
imawlan-iw rwan aḥewwes fell-i
di tmurt iderɣalen bu-yiwet n tiṭ d agellid
amḍan n tissulya skudmal yettuɣal ɣer deffir
aman n nnisan yeffeɣ lhemm tistan
azwu yesɛa taẓẓayt akked tufsin
ayen it-yerḥan
amulli-inu iɣelli-d deg tefsut
Ḥsen u muḥ yugad
d tidet s imal yettnerni wegraw
Ɛebban-as i weɣyul
uɣalen-d zik s axxam
tutlayt-nsent d taqbaylit kan
Ḥala zzit-nwen i d-yegran ad yeṭṭeṛḍeq yiles-iw
ha-t-an da iferres ha-t-an dihin ileqqem iẓebbjan
ass n letnayen ad ṛuḥeɣ ar lalman
tufamt-as ixf-is
tenniḍ-as i baba-m
ass-agi yuɣal d argaz
timellalin n tyuẓaḍ n tmurt ifent tid n tyuẓaḍ n trisiti
a gma ṛwaḥ ad nurar ileqqafen
ala asaḍuf ara tt-id-iḥudden
yeḍra-d deg tegnatin d tiberkanin
izga ikellex-asen Ǧeḥḥa aqbayli
iɛreḍ yidir ad yali ɣef tzemmurt
yufa-tt ur inuda fell-as
ur ittektili ara lehḍur-is
Ɣef tgecrar-iw i ɣliɣ mi d-tres tyita s tirac
ass-a nuɣal d ijeɛbab n wučči
taqcict mm ukebbuḍ azegzaw d yelli
acḥal aya i d-nemsefraq
icudd amḍelliw
yiwen ur tt-ittelḥaq
ur ttruḥunt ara
leɛtab ur yettneḥsab
nesɛa aṭas n tmucuha
efk-iyi-d dduṛt
maɛna ur tugadeḍ ara ɣef yiman-im
yella kra i t-id-iṣaḥen
aru-yi-d ur tettuy ara
aɣ-d aɣrum ternu-d ayefki d aya i ulac
kkateɣ ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
serkem-d aman
ad as-d-tketteṛ lɣella
simmal tettali tutlayt taqbaylit
sliman u muḥ yefka afud i tiziri tagawawt
iswi-nneɣ d asnerni n teqbaylit
tewwet-iyi tmagart-nkent
zgiɣ d axemmem
nadi ɣef lefhama
tettak-d daɣen timsal ur nelhi am lekteb
iɛedda tura lawan i wakken ad tsutreḍ ssmaḥ
igerrez wayyur iḍ-a
amecwar mazal ɣezzif
yerna-d sami yiwen n umeddakel amaynut
ifecka umḍinen s teqbaylit d ayen igerrzen
aregnet yerza taserdunt
ad tessineḍ lbaḍna-s
Ḥeffḍeɣ tulayt takičwatt
ismendaga isɣaren akken ad ikker ujajiḥ n tmes
yumer unefray ad d-uɣalen yemyurar s annar
yak nhedder nettfaka
yečča aksum-is
aql-aɣ deg tmurt n leqbayel mačči deg qandahaṛ
acku yuɛer-as akke ad iṭil ɣer wallen-is
ikemmel yettaru tiqsiḍin ɣef yiɣersiwen
seg wasmi i iruḥ ur d-yezzi
ur tewɛir ara tseftit taqbaylit
tmugeḍ am weltma-k
anta i tcukkeḍ tuker taxṛiṭ-ik
d asfaεfaε
ttḥewwisen kan anda ara senden

anda i tettaruḍ
d lawan ad tuɣaleḍ

ad k-wwteɣ ad ak-teεreq yemma-k

ad yuɣal ad ifhem
yif-it lḥif
deg tazwara ad awen-d-sekneɣ amek i tetteddu
aql-aɣ nettaẓ ar zdat
lliɣ di wizgan
d tigzirt ur yezmir ad yaweḍ yiwen ala s teflukt

acku d nettat i d tameqqrant deg twacult-is
ad izhu win ixaqen

d acu ara tles
yessames-iyi-d akk mi iṛuḥ ad yerwi s uxebbaḍ
ula d nettat tezmer ad s-yeɛǧeb ḥedd acku tiktiwin am wallen
lkas n waman ttxil-k
ddu d uḍaṛ-ik
ijapuniyen ḥedqen nezzeh
anef-as ad yenced ayyur
ilaq-aɣ uqeṛṛuy amaynut
teǧǧelleb-d seg umkan-is
ur tent-kkateɣ ara
win ara iyi-ikksen tilelli-inu
ad sen-neḍlu amsiḥ
d acu i tebɣam ɣur-i
yessen yuba ad yemmeslay s tefransist
asaru-a yessagad s tidet
ur ilaq ara ad geɣ aya
tura kan i t-ssawḍeɣ ar usafag

d acu-ten wuguren i d-tufiḍ
uɣeɣ-d aǧarnan i jeddi iḍelli
ddan-ak di nneqma
uzneɣ-as tabrat
d isem-is i d awal-is
deg tmura n ugafa tagrest qessiḥet
acu i txuṣṣeḍ ay aɛeyan
lhu-yi ad ak-lhuɣ
ddu kan s leɛqel
melmi i d-inna ad d-iruḥ
ur ččint acemma ass-a
terra-as tasselt i lbaṭaṭa-nni
amek akka amdan deg umḍiq ad yerr agrud ɣer dduḥ d akanic ara yeṭṭfen amḍiq n ugrud

d acu kan ɣur-nneɣ
iseɛyay mliḥ
d ussan n lyali yettneqlab yigenni
d allen n weɣyul i tesɛa

d acu-ten iɛewwiqen i d-temmugreḍ
ad ɛiwneɣ yal amdan
qqimen deg-s
ad ddunt ɣer tizi n at Ɛica neɣ s at Ɛemṛan
yuyes-it dɣa iṛuḥ

ma d wiyaḍ am wakken ulac-iten

yettaɣ awal kan i yiman-is
s teqbaylit kan i tettzuxxumt
kra yekka yiḍ d lgerra tekkat

Γezzif ufus-ik
d učči i ttetteḍ abrid mi ara tnehhreḍ
tceggeb-it taluft-nni
Ɛni d kemm ara ydebbṛen fell-aɣ
sεuẓẓgen rran iman-nsen ur d-slin ara
nḥemmel ad nexdem ticeɛbanin
kerheɣ mara d-yeḍru
tegganemt ɣef udekkan
dacu i teččamt
yehwa-yam kan
Ẓṛant belli tasertit d askeɛrer
uḥwaǧeɣ kan ad yi-iɛawen kra n yiwen
aṭas ara s-yecfun
yeshel ucucef
rjiɣ ad d-yaweḍ lkar
ilaq ad teččeḍ kra n tɣawsa
d ucmiten i yettcemiten
amzun d abrurri
d aεdaw-iw i telliḍ
ufan agerruj mi ttaɣzen lbir
icebba-yi Ṛebbi yella wi yellan di taxxamt-nni n zdat
fkan-aɣ-d snat n tkaṛtin n lyawert
d ul-iw yes-m i d-imeǧǧden
maca err iman-ik am akken aqli-k ɣef tizi lmut i telliḍ
Ɛeddant tilas
iḥemmel ad yefhem u ad imeḥḥeṣ di kra yellan
isqeḍ am tin ittiniten
teɣṣeb di tikli
ur qqerṣen ara seg uxeddim
ugin ad serrḥen
beṛka-ken imenɣi di leɛnaya-nwen
ziɣ akken ad d-nawi imekwan
ur bɣin ara medden tasertit
ass mi ten-id-wweḍ ɛeddan
bɣiɣ ad issineɣ amek i ttxemmimen
ar tagust yewweḍ rrebg-iw
yeẓra aṭas i yebɣan yelli-s
d axlaf lǧil-agi
d ifelfel atunsi
nebɣa kra i yellan d ajdid
ittawi afrag ɣef acciwen
siḥ ay iẓri idim ifna
itett uqjun-im
nnwaḍer-ik ɣlint ɣer lqaεa
mqeṛṛacen cclaɣem
anga teddiḍ lhu
ala ma yeḍla-t i gma-s
Ẓṛan belli tasertit d askeɛrer
ayes-iyi ad kem-ayseɣ
amcum i ɣ-icekben ass-n ad ten-iru
iteddu s uɛijel
yiwen ur iḥess i usarag-is
ur qqerṣeɣ ara am kečč
d imaynuten kunwi
ur yesɛi ara tasa
iqṛeḥ-iyi weɛrur-iw
ukren-as takeṛṛust-is iḍelli
ittaf d tifucal
rremt-d i yisteqsiyen-iw
di leɛnaya-nkent susmemt
annaɣ a Ṛebbi
ansa i trewleḍ
ay akken i ktaleɣ ur telhi
ur tessinemt ara tasertit
tḥemmel tiẓidanin
ad s-tiniḍ yečča aɣrum n yisiḍ
ansa i d-ffɣen izamaren-nni
qqaren-d ilaq ad tqadrem wid yuẓamen
am uxxam ideg i tḥekmeḍ
ay yeḍran d wayen ara yeḍrun
ulac-iten deg temdint
anef akka ay amedεus
yettban-d yeqwa tom
iɛḍem-it wayla n medden
fell-as akka i d as-teḥkem
di lebɣi-s ḥeṣleɣ
Ɛeṛṛqen-iyi leḥsabat-iw
ttxemmimen yibekkan
d acu tettagadeḍ maḍi
ulac ula d aṭaksi dɣa wteɣ-t ɣef uḍar armi d axxam
yettal-d fell-awen
uḥwaǧeɣ-k ad txedmeḍ yiwet n tɣawsa
azrem ileḥḥu ɣef uɛeddis
ilaq-aɣ ad d-naf kra n yiwen i izemren ad ɣ-iɛawen
tettum kra n tɣawsa
itteɣraṣ lkettan-a
zgant ttḥewwisent ar tmurt-nni
d kemm i d taselmadt n mmi
aḍu i d-iruḥen ad t-yawi
ttlussunt iserwula d izeggaɣen
iwacu ur tetteṭṭfeḍ ara tizmilin
a win iɛebbden ddunit
akken ad d-yesfeḍ lğerḥ-is
kemmel kan ar zdat
sɛan snat n teqjatin
Ḥaca lmuṣenntin
ilha wi iteddun s lqis
ayen akk tesɛedda fell-i
ur tessinemt ara ad turaremt
Ɣliɣ gar warrac la ttruɣ gar-asen
ur ceffun ara
ur yessin ara ad yurar
temyagreḍ iḍelli d lwiza
aẓawan d tutlayt icerken talsa
iḥemmel-ikent tom
ad sweɣ lqahwa s uyefki
amek txedmeḍ
mliɣ-tt i udrar inhez
ad cnunt di temdint n bgayet
aẓ akkin fell-i
itett s wallen
ad nsemmeḥ i twenza iɛeksen
rẓan-asen snat n tqermudin
ad t-kkseɣ deg leḥsab
amek ara tnaqleḍ timmi-m
yella walebɛaḍ i wen-d-iluɛan
dacu i teččam
allen-iw ddant d uḍar-is
iẓri-w yekkawen
a wi i m-yeḥkan
yella win i d-iẓeḍmen ɣef tom
tella tin i tebɣiḍ ad twaliḍ
ur tettemmatem ara daki
ass mi tekker di tmanyin
ur nezmir ad tt-negzem di rray gar yiḍ akkeḍ wass
Ṛebbi ittxelliṣ s ṭṭul
aql-aɣ deg ass n lexmis
seqdec akud-ik akken ilaq
mačči dayen ara nettu
cfiɣ fell-akent
beddlem iceṭṭiḍen-nwen
amkan i d-teǧǧiḍ
yella win i wumi tebɣam ad teɣṛem
ad teswem lqahwa s uyefki
ansa ara ɛeddiɣ
yella kra n yiwen i tettṛajumt
aḥuddu aḥunnu
nuɣal nbeddel tikli nettu wid leɛmer ṛwan
mɣunzan ur nnuɣen
anwa ara tissineḍ
rrant-tt kan i ucali
semmumit tqaṛestin
izerman weɛren deg unebdu
yuwi-d yiwen wass ttɛebgga n tpurfit seg tmurt n wefniq ad tt-yesenz
assa tekcem-asen taɣaṭ ɣer lǧameɛ n tẓallit deg Ǧelfa
zemmem qemmem
"lǧetta iwumi d-zzin" d tamezgunt n kateb yasin
zzuɛama i tt-id-iḥellen
efk-iyi-d yiwet n lqehwa di leɛnaya-k
d agerbi kan ay zedɣen ikemmel yeɣli
Ṭṭfeɣ-d sin idredras
welleh ara ken-in-dehneɣ
aneɣlaf ur yuklal amkan-is s tidet
tiqenṭert-a temmug s ublaḍ
tettuḍ kra n tɣawsa
zgiɣ ttinigeɣ
mačči d ben badis i d agensas n tmusni
ilaq-iyi ad stεerfeɣ belli d tawnaft i lliɣ
nebɣa kra n lḥaǧa tajdidt
asegbar d win yetturaren deg umezgun neɣ deg isura n ssinima
drus akya i d-yecfan
tewqeɛ deg-sen tmellalt
ixdeɛ tagella d lemleḥ
yelha kullec di tama-nwen
tezza tasa-s
sfuḥeɣ-d kra n tɣawsa teṛɣa-d
daɣen ad as-nefsi
ata umnafeq
lmaɛun yuli-t ṣdid
rɣiɣ ad ɛemmdeɣ i ccyaḍ-iw
ad yettwiɣ lḥal maḍi tameddit-a
ayɣer i tettezriri nettat zeɛma s lḥiǧab
s kra la d-yettales yettarra kulci ɣer yir ẓẓher i t-yeṭṭafaren
acḥal t- yebɣan ur tufin-ara
amek i d-tqesdeḍ ad yi-εawneḍ
ad k-t-id-yawi
ad tent-tesseɣli
aql-i weḥd-i

tebriḍ-iyi
tfukkem-tt
d amedyaz i lliɣ
ad temmeslayem taswidit
tsellek-aɣ-d merra
timḍerrit n yimuḍan di remḍan
udem-is yezga yecmumeḥ
yessi-s n Ḥewwa i iḥer stukhulm ɣer tqarnit
rran-akent-tent-id
ulac-it dagi
ad nruḥ ma tebɣam
tweznemt iman-nkent
ad ten-id-mmektiɣ yerna ad d-mmektiɣ tamurt
tɣaḍem-tt
anda-yi
d aɣiliw deg učči
cedheɣ-k aṭas a tom
anwa i ibeṭṭlen
akka d acemma
qlil wass ideg cennuɣ
mmutent tgeẓẓal-is
d aydi amecṭuḥ
wukud qiment
ahat ad rewleɣ
nɣaḍ-iken
tenheṛ mary
tettwaɛeṛḍem meṛṛa

nettnadi tifrat

acḥal iyi-txuṣṣeḍ
yuba yugad
s tezmert-ik amerreḥ
ikkes-d ferɛun taxatemt seg ufus-is iqqen-as-tt i yusef

yuba yettban yerked
d ayen i k-iwulmen
ur awen-d-nniɣ ara awit-iyi-d ɣer da

drewceɣ cwiṭ

yella yemmug s ufus
surfemt i tom
yessefqed-itent
sseṛɣeɣ-awen-tent
yeɣza yuba aṭuṭuc
ur llint d aggaz
netta ur yettsetḥi ara s leḥmala
ulac acu yuklalen ad tenɣeḍ iman-im fell-as
yif-it ma tenniḍ-d tidet
tudfem
tazmamt gar yifassen-is
yessemlal tmanya n wudmawen i yekkin di tmesbaniyin am tari aziz terki zubir d wiyaḍ
yeffeɣ-as afus
nnumeɣ azɣal
yufa iman-is yid-s
ur ttḥerrikemt ara
rrant-ak-tt-id
ma ɣef yisuḍaf n tikkin di tfaska-a yessefk ɣef yimedyazen ad aznen kraḍ n yisefra s tmaziɣt
ad ɣ-tent-tɛeṛḍem
tameddit ulint-d tjirra ɣumment amkan-nni anda i sbedden wat Ɛebbas iqiḍunen-nsen
wufur-nni n tudert unamek-is
tesfaqemt-t-id
yifliw
yettmerriɣ deg uɣebbaṛ
ibuγerdanen
ad ilint d timezwura ara iɛassen amek teddun lecɣal
wid iqqal uṛumi neɣ wid i d-iqqimen seg-sen segmi ikfa tṛad
akken kan sleɣen ajḍaṛ telleɣ-it tfunast
tfuk ddurt-nni n lɣerba n tyaziḍt s aqwir
amzun akken teḍfer-iyi tucerka
tamarit tamatut n tenbaḍt
yeddem -awent-tent-id
bennun ixammen
lḥiɣ sakin ɣer umkan ideg teḍra tmenɣiwt
di later-ik ayen iɛeddan
ajeḥniḍ umenferriw annect-ilat
bdiɣ keččmeɣ cwiṭ cwiṭ deg udlis
d izmawen i trebba tsedda skeɛwiwen d wuccanen
ddeqs n tid neɣ widyettazzalen ɣef tugdut ass-a uɣalen ddan akked udabu azzayri
akken iruḥ ad yeɛḍesiserreh i ugidun dɣa sbeṭ srid ɣer uḥecraruf
agdal n zzna d yiwen seg iṭabuten iqburen maḍi n talsa
mačči anagar nettat i yeǧǧlen mačči anagar arraw-is i yeggujlen
iḍ ur semmeḍ ara s waṭas xerṣum tisaεtin timezwura
a kenza a yelli sbeṛ-as i lmeḥna d iseflan neɣli ɣef lezzayer uzekka a kenza a yelli ur ttru yara
udem-is iccur d sser xas akken ikwmec akw si tewser
lemɛatqa ar mirabu
akken i yekfa asefru-ya n si muḥend u mḥend
tbeddel i yiẓṛi-w tammuɣli am tin n uggujil yettɣiḍ
mazal lḥamu n uzal am akken tettali-d si tmurt

ayen i nnuda nufa-t

ad as-ten-yazen
ḥala tasleḍt n tfekka i izemren ad aɣ-yinin acu yeḍran s tidet
taluft qerriḥet isalli yesgugum imi iẓri yeqquṛ taɣect tebbuḥbeḥ imi yekkaw
ɣas asirem-is d aẓayan
imir-n kan i faqeɣ yemmut mmi-s
agraw aɣelnaw amagday
inumak si tama
agraw i yidles d tugdut
ad ṭṭsen d tzizwa
tadukli taɣelnawt tamsegdudant
abeddel yekcem deg tikli tagamant n tudert
neɣ beddel iɣewwaṛen akken ad ten-teǧǧeḍ
ttasen-d yal aseggas
akken ad aɣ-d-lhun wussan
tasertit n tbaḍnit
tizi wezzu d taqbaylit
ttwasusfen wid yemmuten ɣef teqbaylit
taɣdemt tunnigt
tala teqquṛ
nna Ḍrifa teɣra cwiṭ ar yimṛabḍen n iṛumyen
tasa muḥ usliman
dda lmud at mɛemmeṛ
uklaleɣ ad yi-tkeṛhem
d acu i d agerruj n talsa
tinzer
Ṭṭfeɣ aɛekkaz deg ufus-iw
taɛwint n aɛli u brahim
wigad-nni i yettawin lewhi-k
adlis-agi yura s teqbaylit
i jeddi yeǧǧa-t-id baba-s
ay irgazen a tifeɣwa
ad nerreẓ wala ad neknu
tadyant-is tesban-d amennuɣ gar tlelli d uzaglu gar tafat d ṭṭlam
teɣli-d gar-aneɣ yiwet n tsusmi d taẓayant tesxelxel-iyi mliḥ teɛreq-iyi tririt
yeṭṭef afus i tin iḥemmel
ala truḥ-d ɣur-i ass-a ɣer tnarit-inu
i wumi ccbaḥa am tagi
azekka ad t-id-yawi
ad truḥ teqcict
limer mmuteɣ meqqar d ayaziḍ yecbeḥ fell-i lḥal
tamaziɣt d asenfar n tmetti seg bulifa ar mɛemmeri abrid yenǧer
nekk d kemm netturar
yura di lkaɣeḍ
ass-a d tameɣra n lbaz bu lḥerma
ur yettuɣal timendeffirt
ečč tekkreḍ
ad as-ten-d-yawi
deg useggas n walef u tteɛmiya u setta usettin muḥend aɛrab besɛud yesbedd agraw amaziɣ
seg uẓeffun ar at yeğğer
ticki iɛedda
amer yella wacu deg i txuss
yerna tneddef tasa-s tettqeḍririf
seg yimezwura i yegren asurif deg usefru ilelli ad naf ben muḥemmed
ad d-ssisneɣ iman-iw deg temlilit
kker akken ad yurar
d tasemmamt d tazefrant texleḍ deg-s tidi akked waman n leɛṭer i d-yerra ḥqaḥqa
tessardemt akk leqlud-nni
tella yiwet n lqahwa
ma ur tesɛiḍ ara idrimen neɣ ur texdimeḍ ara lutu
tegziḍ timsal bexlaf wiyaḍ
acuɣer ulac ass-a imceyyɛen n Ṛebbi
ur teččiḍ acemma ass-a
tettaruḍ taqbaylit
ad ldiɣ tawwurt ad yeffeɣ ucayaḍ
tessnemt ad tesselḥumt tamacint-a
melmi ara iruḥ yidir ad d-ixḍeb newwara
ixeyyeb-itt aṭas yidir
Ḥebber i tmeddit-ik
ladɣa ɣef usentel n tezrawt-ik
iger-iten-id seddaw n tqendurt-iw
am tin isetḥan i tetteddu
ur tebɣi ara akk ad as-tesserreḥ
yerna ddunit tettkemmil
yiwen wass mi sɛeddayen ikayaden
qqedmen-d akken ad ččen
ijeǧǧigen s wunjigen
nehhren-t medden am uɣyul
yuɣal deg wawal
deg tnezzayt-is yerɣa umelɣiɣ-is
tuɣal-d zik s axxam
d acu i ken-id-yewwin ɣur-i
simmal trennu sdat n lemri i as-tettruḥ teflest
tḥemmel aqellal n tmurt n yeqbayliyen
aṭṭan yesselmad-aɣ acḥal i teswa tezmert
tḥemmel ad teqqim d yid-s akken ad ḥkunt
maziɣ mi ara ad iẓer akken amddakel-is zgant wallen-is lesqent ɣer ubrid
melmi ara d-tuɣaleḍ s axeddim
tuɣal tedyant deg ccfawat kan
anti i kem-yewwten
yella kra ara nečč
asmi i meẓẓiyit nerwa urar n uḥnucceḍ
ixelleṣ-iyi yidir imekli
imferrǧen-nneɣ ur qebblen ara lexṣara
am umeqqran am umecṭuḥ ddbedben akk
aql-i εummeɣ deg iɣeblan
taceqquft qrib ad tebdu
ussan zerrin
tefka-as snat tcakulatin d tanalt i yelli-s
waqila txuṣ deg leɛqel
yella yeqqim iman-is deg uxxam anda tella tdukkli
iseggasen ttɛeddin
sɣur wumi i k-d-kan idrimen-nni
bɣiɣ ad sweɣ aman
deg useggas n alef u tmenmiyya u sebɛa u xemsin tamurt taqbaylit tuɣal ddaw n uzaglu afṛensis amhersan
yuker-asent
bɣiɣ ad k-maɣeɣ creḍ ayen tebɣiḍ
maca ilaq ad tqewwet
texreb nniyya-w

ur tebɣi ara ad iwexxer fell-as
ddu
alugen n uwgelhen n isefka
akken isehlen ad iɛeddi umdan deg yiwen ɣer wayeḍ
ur tewwiḍ ara lebɣi-s
issewway yidir
d nutni i d tidett ma ɣas
yedrem-as lferḥ i d-tewwi deg yiḍ iɛeddan
yal yiwen ɣef acḥal i tt-yebḍa yal yiwen i ɣer yettara talalit n tmedyazt tatrart 
uɣalent-d zik s axxam
ddabex n uḍar iga d amubrin
ur ak-d-tuqiɛ ara
yejba-d di tiɣilt
ttfarasen-tt akken i asen-yehwa
mačči d win yettaṭṭafen ccḥani
mi d-tewweḍ ɣer tesdawit
ad t-nerfed deg sin
iles d taqabact
Ɛni tettḥessisem-asent i tidak
d axxam-is
acabcaq d ilem
yugurten u muḥ irḍel-d idrimen ɣer tiziri tagawawt
maziɣ yezga d yid-s
d fransa i yewwin taqbuct n ddunit n ddabex n uḍar aseggas-a
taluft tettabaε tayeḍ
awi-d kan ad iffeɣ useggas
aṭas n yemferrǧen i yellan
anda-t ukursi-nkent
tili ad ten-tafeḍ deg tesdawit i qqimen
Ḥeqren-t warrac deg uɣerbaz
err-as tibṣelt tazṛudiyat d snat tbaṭaṭayin
tuqiɛ-yi-d nekkini
ur ttett ara imensi
ugin ad zedɣen di taddart
ass-a a-t-an tagnawt teččur d asigna
teḥbes temilit axaṭer kecmen-d yemferrĝen s annar
ala i netta iwumi ur ssutureɣ timεiwna mačči d win iɣef ara tettekleḍ
izdeɣ ccwal imferrǧen
teffeɣ ɣer ufrag
ur asen-teǧǧiḍ acemma
iwwi tt yid-s

kan akka
ur wwiɣ ara amḍiq-iw
terwel ar ɛemti-s
at meẓyan
wis kraḍ yeḥbes-d ɣur-i
tettawimt aɣyul-nkent
d taryel
nugad ass-a d uzekka
teddunt yid-s
ur d-tusi ara
iban yella kan kra n wassaɣ gar usuqel neɣ mara yaru yiwen isefra s yiman-is ma d acu-t wassaɣ-a ur ẓriɣ ara

aseggas-a ulac aẓerẓur
ula d yiwen ur t-yefhim
i nutni d acu i ten-id-igren di tessirt
isteqsiyen-is cudden srid ɣer leqraya
inha-yi
ass-agi d ass n tlelli
akken iyi-teǧǧiḍ zgelli
di leɛnaya-k ṛuḥ-d
d aqemmuc i t-id-yennan
meqran d aselmad deg tesdawit
tettfelsifeḍ a yargaz
melmi ara ččen imensi
ruḥen akk ɣer lexla qeccuc meccuc
anef-as kan
iɣeẓẓa-tt uqjun
tessawel-as-d Ɛemti-s seg tilifun
d akud ara d-iseknen
meẓyan u muḥ ur yeḥbis ara tiziri tagawawt
ayen akk ara isernin allaɣ ur tettara ara deg ṭṭerf
ur yeḥmil ara timellalin
anwa yeskidiben
zik ara d-uɣalen
teḍra yidi tedyant ur zmireɣ ad ḥkuɣ
err-d ɣef usteqsi
deg tazwara n wawal
zik ara kkreɣ azekka
ilaq ad nexdem annect-a lwaḥid
tebɣam ad teččemt
yeɣleb tisirt
kra ikka wass nettat tessemsaway lqecc d yedlisen di texxamt-is
cfiɣ-d am wass-a
ass wis tlata n tlalit-ines yebda yesrugmut
idrimen d wamek i yezmer ad yexdem lutu i yiman-is d wid i t-id-iqesden
terra-tt kan i tɛellumin
yella kra i tent-id-isaḥen
teẓriḍ a massi
sliman u muḥ yettban yeɛya
refdeɣ aqerruy-iw
ula d imesllayen-is s leqder d ccan
ula deg uɣerbaz jmiɛ i ttɣaman
tteddu-yas di lebɣi i teslit-is
ad as-iɛeddin lhem-a
deg wayen i semmeḍ lḥal axenziz-ik ad ibedd dinna deg ukfadu
massi yella-d ujdid deg tudert-is
tedda-d akka kra a-t-an iqubel-itt-id maziɣ
ad d-awin lhemm
ay aberkan uqerru
ur yefris ara tizemmrin-is aseggas-a
Ɣef wacḥal ssaɛa i d-yekker
ur sɛint ara zzerb
tteddun ttqesiren
temlek-itt lqahwa
yeqqen ɣer lferḥ ara s-d-yawi maziɣ mi ara heddren
Ḥemmleɣ ad azzleɣ
d asemmiḍ
ur tettafeḍ ara iman-im di tmetti-a
seld aya yuɣal heddren udem ɣer udem
yefres tizemmrin-is aseggas-a
llant dima la d-ttcetkint ɣef leɣla n temεict di tokyo
ad tekkreḍ neɣ ala
deg temsal n yimeqqranen

tekker-as yemma-s
yal wa lutu i yexdem i yiman-is
d sellum n yiɛdawen
di leɛnaya-k qqim

ičča-ten iḍelli

ayen akk i teẓẓar deg-sen diri-t mi ara as-d-ttmeslayen ala ɣef tfekka-s
ur tesɛim ara ccɣel

ar wanda i tent-tefkiḍ

ulac fell-as

di leɛnaya-k ɛijel
kker fell-ak
ur yečči ara imensi
aḥay aḥay
ula d sima
seg zik i rriɣ akal i tudert-iw

d tatrajdidit
i yiselmaden akked yinelmaden
anwa i yeddmen aselkim-iw
di leɛnaya-nwen uɣalem ar deffir s kra n isurifen
yekkes-d akk tuɣmas-is
