aṭas i yemeččen deg ilel
dayen tafekka-w allaɣ hatnan deg tmurt

ar wanda akka i tettedduḍ a tom
ansuf yes-m
anwa ad as-yinin a d-yass wass-a
tturaren warrac tuqqna tuffra
yerwa atbaɛ deg-i
tkesbeḍ lwiz ur nettseddid
Ḥemmlen warrac lejdud-nsen axaṭer sserwayen-asen tiqaqqacin
tusa-d ɣur-sen tin ijebbden allen
meẓyan u muḥ ur d-yemli ara tiziri tagawawt
ad d-truḥ akken ad teḥder
anda i tewteḍ
allaɣ-iw ssarament-k-id yal ddqiqa
d aksum i tḥemmleḍ neɣ d iselman
win ur nestehzay deg leqray-ines
waqila kfan lɛeqqal
ilaq ad yi-tɛawnem i wakken ad ten-id-sellkeɣ
sekra tezzuzzen deg-s ur yeṭṭis
yettaṭṭaf sser deg wul-is
ur yerbiḥ ara deg wurar
anta-tt tin akken i m-d-iheddṛen
bɣiɣ ad ṛuḥeɣ ar ssinima yid-s
acimi ur aɣ-d-tettarraḍ ara awal
d lewhayem
ur d-keččment ara s axxam
wissen ma yella da
imawlan n tom zedɣen deg temrikt n unẓul
d luluf n warrac-nniḍen i yettwanɣan deg tṛad
xḍu-k i ddexxan d ssem
inaṣliyen n tefṛiqt ugafa d imaziɣen
kecmemt-d
leɛtab-nwen tagara ad yeffeɣ ɣer tafat
aweṭṭuf iεac
anta-tt tarrayt ifazen i ulmad n tefransist
iluɛa i yimddukal yellan yid-s deg tddukli
itett kan amessas
yerra-yas awal s leɛweǧ i baba-s
nwiɣ ad ruḥeɣ ass-a akken ad ẓreɣ imawlan d acu kan wellah ar ɛyiɣ
azul isem-iw pecca i kečč amek i ak-qqaṛen
ziɣen mazal ur d-t-yettas ara ad iɣer
seg wassen ddreɣ s tmara
iṭṭef-as unajjel tacḍaḍt yufa-d sseba i yiɣimi
itettuy tom ssiwan-ines
tasa-w turew-d asemmiḍ
iṛuḥ-iyi lxiḍ n umeslay
rwan warrac urar deg uzniq

iɣaḍ-it lḥal imi ur t-εriḍen ara
ulac ass ur hdiren ara ɣef tarrayt d wamek ara yexdem tazrawt
Ɣuṛwat
ad d-taǧwew zzit n uzemmur aseggas-a
asaḍuf-a amaynut ad yeḥrem tidersiwin timasɣanin seg uzref n tefranin
testaḥla tiɣimit d yid-s
zik ara tekkrem azekka
ayen i yeqqar tom taglizit
aṭas i d-nelmed si tmucuha
ihi akka ar ad nexdem sya d asawen
aṭas n isenfaṛen i d-yeldin i tutlayt taqbaylit
tugna-s ula d nettat tura tegguma ad as-tesserḥ
aseggas-a teqwa tizegzewt
Ɣur-k ad tegreḍ aqerru-k deg teɣrast akken ad tεerḍeḍ tament
yekcem srid ɣer texxamt-is
neɣ ad beyyen iman-is
waqila yeɣreq lbabur-ik
efk-as taruka ad yellem
ggant tẓurin tura
ayɣeṛ
ass kamel d aktili n yiberdan
d yiwen seg inelmaden n baba
d bu ṛṛay
Ḥemmleɣ anne ladɣa imi d timsetḥit
cfu ɣef ayen tεaceḍ d iseggasen igerrzen
yuggad ad d-ikcem s axxam
ilaq ad tṛuḥeḍ ad tegneḍ tura
yettaɛer fell-as ad as-temmeslay
ticki i newweḍ
win ara yaf deg teswiɛt n ddiq
anda i tufeg i ters
llan yemdanen i yettamnen s tudert n dayem deffir n tmettant
aṭas i yugaden ad tzid tekriṭ
ma d lferḥ ur yettdum
aṭas-aya seg mi i m-d-nniɣ ur s-qqaṛ walu meƐna kemmi tḥemmleɣ ad tt-tesƐelmeḍ
ečč ugar igumma
ilaq asen-theḍṛem tidet
siwa tiqulhatin
ur d-yeǧǧi acemma deg-s
d awal yelhan
iggureg ayen yelhan iṭ iɛeddan
Ḥemmleɣ ad lemdeɣ tutlayin tiqburin
d tifyar i d-issebganen tidmi
azekka ad jerrdeɣ ar temsirin n tkurdit
imuras imeqqranen beddun deg yulyu
i tikkelt tamenzut i d-ldiɣ ul-iw i ḥed
ilaq-aɣ uwanek akken ad nili d aɣlan
Ɛmiṛuc u muḥ iḥemmel akken iwata tiziri tagawawt
iɛennu-tt akken ad kemmlen asqerdec n temsal
yeɣɣar ɣer yiselmaden i yesɣran ɣef temsal i iqqnen ɣer uẓref n umdan
ili-k d abɣas a jean aql-ik deg ubrid yelhan
acimi ur ttetteḍ ara timellalin
iṣṛayil qqaṛen-as "yisṛayil" s tɛebrit
deg tceqqufin
ulac ayen ara ten-id-iḥebsen
Ẓriɣ s anda i tebɣiḍ ad tawḍeḍ
tettɛawazeḍ
tturarent tullas deg uzniq
Ẓẓayet akken ad teqqim yid-s
aɛebbuḍ-is d tasraft
efk akud i wakud
ass-a fuken wussan n yimuṛas
iwwet afus-is ɣer lǧib-is ixelles tibyirin neswa
yugi-tt wul-is
yettarra-yas-d s leɛweǧ
yal aseggas nettaǧǧew-d zzit n uzemmur
Ɣef wakk-n cukkeɣ ur d-yettuɣal yiwen seg-sen seg tmurt-nni
asif itett tiɣezza
beṛka-yi seg leɛtab-ik
llan yemdanen di yal amkan
feṛḥeɣ aṭas i mi k-walaɣ
ilaq ad tḥebseḍ
imezdaɣ n uqqas ttheyyin yiwen n tmeɣṛa telha mliḥ
beṛka aṭṭili
amek ara nili susṭa
cukkeɣ txedmeḍ-t mebla ma tfaqeḍ
melmi ara d-truḥem
cukkeɣ tesɛamt ccɣel
deg leɛmer msefhamen
Ḍelbeɣ-kem i baba-m yugi
d kečč i as-yennan i tom ur ixeddem ara akken
s tmucuha i d-nekker
ad tent-tafeḍ ttxelisent ayen ur xdiment

ad tẓer maziɣ
anef-as i tom ad ixdem axeddim-is
ili-k d win yelhan
aqel-ik la teɣɣareḍ yerna deg tesnawit 
d adlis-ik wa
atan da aɣ-d ittgabaṛ
awal s wayeḍ ma d times tensa
azen asebter
axxam ur t-sεiɣ akken ad uɣaleɣ ɣur-s
ilel agrakal mačči yiwet iwumi yeḥḍer
arum s yimru
iruḥ-iyi usirem
iɛǧeb-am lḥal anaɣ
Ɛni d tawlaft-inu
tekki da
kečč d aberkan n uqerru
i aɣ-temlam d timerẓuga
ma ɣer tagara n temlilit-agi lliɣ nekk ad iliɣ
tekfa tegrawla
tuḍeft
i lbaṭel ur tteddarin amnaṛ
tilawin deg-sent ad ssutreɣ asuref wagi d inzi mačči t-tiyita deg-sent
iḍ d wass
acku nfeṛṛeḥ mi d-iruḥ win nḥemmel akken i nfeṛṛeḥ mi iruḥ win ur nebɣi
d isbayɛiyen wawalen i yessidir deg usefru
ahat d anemhal n uɣmis yebɣa ad iẓer ma beddlen azemz n uzmaz
afellaḥ yekker
awtul yuɣal d at čaqlala mi s-yesla yizem yerwel
kunemti d tulawin-is
acu n tiẓri i tesεiḍ ɣef ayen yeḍran
ad yawi iɣil
ungalen-a n tmaziɣt
afaylu n weɣbaṛ
err akin s at kufi
d icacfalen kan i izemren ad awḍen ar ucacfal fiḥel tiεiṛkuct
imir-n nella netturar akked tullas paypay akked ččir
a rebbi ili yid-sen
d aṭṭan n tawla i d-yeslalay ubirus n anflwanza influenza yesɛan ddeqs n leṣnaf
aṭṭan n nnaqsa migraine yesɛa assaɣ akked thurmunin hormones
ad truḥeḍ
ala akud ara t-id-yinin
neɣ ayen iccuden ɣer tulmisin n ugbur ama d isentalasemres n tgemmi tagreɣlanit
tecbeḥ tefsut s yiṭij-is d wussan-is ḥlawen
rrant urar mi neṭṭlent "azalen d yimenzayen"
ad ḥewseɣ fell-as arma ufiɣ-t
bab-is yessuyes ad t-yenher yegguni-t yebla-t wurrif
a ssiεqa ay iṣaṛen aqelmun ar iḍaṛṛen
tamedyazt taqbaylit sumata tedder am waken tɛedda-d ɣef snat n taliyin
meẓyan imir-n nessawal-as kapris ma yusef neqqaṛ-as pinčuḥ
imi i s-yefka akk ayen i tessaram ama d leḥnana ama d tayri
acu kan ḥulfant d akken tamurt tetteddu ɣer yifri
a ddunit a lebḥer n lhem
acu ik-yewwin ɣur-s
acu i t-yeǧǧan ad yilli d ilelli 
ama seg tama n ugbur ama deg talɣa yaɛnan lebni usefru atrar
ad d-tesɛum aqcic
di tmetti ideg-i yettidir
icenwiyen d imaziɣen yellan deg tama n udran n cenwa di tipaza
ala amdan i daɣersiw izemren ad yeḍs
ssarameɣ-as ɣas akka afud igerrzen 
ad hedṛeɣ
ad gneɣ ɣef ṛṛbiɣ-nni
akken ad tissineḍ yiwen ssikel kan ssmana yid-s
ameksa yufa agerruj deg iger-nni n maxluf uεetman
agerrez n uqewwet d usnerni n tfellaḥt timezgit
zemreɣ ad m-slemdeɣ amek ara taruḍ
ah uysaɣ ad taweḍ tegrest
anida ara d-gren idrimen n ddewla tarewla
ihi seg tallit-nni ideg yedder esope armi d tin n la fontaine “mmeslayen iɣersiwen”
aḥric seg tmedyaz-a ur yesɛi ara bab-is d ayla n tmetti irkeli
aḥeqq rebbi ar d-heddṛeɣ tidet
yetteḥnuccuḍ di Ǧerǧer
amafus-inek insa siɣ-it ad twaliḍ ma ɣer-k izenan
acḥal n wussan i as-d-mazal i tefsut
nezmer i tniri d tiẓgi afus ur ittergigiɣef talwit nezmer i ccwal
acu yebɣa ɣur-i umseḍḍeɛ-agi deg tlemmast n yiḍ
ur teḥnuccḍem ara makken yekkat ugris
ur nezmir ara ula i tmuɣli-nneɣ ṭṭfent temlella
Ɣas ma d kečč i tefren ay akli ad kemmleɣ ad tt-ḥemmleɣ ad ḥemmleɣ arraw-nwen
mi ara tt-id-yaf terna-yas aseḥlelli i tεekkazt i d aɣ-yerqa
siwlen-d i yilmeẓyen akken ad d-mudden afus di tmecreḍt
amdan d amedya n ṣsber ur d-yessugun yiwen deg ugama
Ṣṣenf-agi n tezrawin ur yeṭṭuqet ara d ayen aɣ-yeǧǧen ad d-nefren asentel-agi
ad s-tiniḍ d axxam imehbal
mačči am ass-a am uzekka i yettbeddil wudem n taddart
ad ak-d-sutreɣ yiwen n tɣawsa
abbuh ay at leεṛaḍ tiɣiṛin i tid-wwin
nnan-d d akken d imsulta i yenɣan maɛtub lwennas
ad d-nemlil ticki
aql-i tedduɣ ad tt-id-ẓreɣ ammer ad twaliḍ amek i cedhaɣ udem-is
ad iliɣ axiṛ d afṛux wama ad iliɣ d islem
tallit n tensayit d tallit n tetrarit
seg tama n tayunin iɣef yettwabena usefruafyirtameɣrut taseddart d wakat
acimi ur tuzzil ara tutlayt n teqbaylit gar yiqbayliyen ass-a
akken i tt-walat tefṛeḥ tɛeggeḍ a baba acḥal meqqeṛ
ad tefaṛes seg-s twacult-is timetti-is tamurt-is
deg useggas n walef u tmenmiya u sebɛa u settin yebda nḍam n tmedyazt timawit yettbeddil
akal-nni iɣef teṭṭṣeḍ ad t-fkeɣ i kečč akked tarwa-k
ur iyi-xeddmet ara acrik s iṛebbiten n ddheb neɣ s iṛebbiten n lfeṭṭa ɣur-wat anda i ten-txeddmem
qimeɣ
caylellah s sidi lmufeq imjuhad deg tɛinsrin
medden akk ad kecmen s ixxamen-nsen
yesɛedda ṛejṛaj aṭas
armi i sliɣ i taɣect deffir-i
mmi-s n uciban
gar yiccer d uksum
tumneḍ
ikna lqedd-nsent
ur gezzem ara abrid srid yella umezgar
tameṭṭut tekka deg leɛqel-is ɣef urgaz yesnusun mmi-s deg tejmeɛt
aḥbib bu uɛebbuḍ tif-it lgelba n ubellud
sserzin akayad-a wazal n mitin n yimeḥbas ɣef teɣzi n wass
ad nini kan ayen yellan yella cwiṭ n uselmed n tmaziɣt s tmaziɣt maca drus maḍi
ad yels llebsa-nni n lfina yeɛni llebsa timqeddest
yebda wahil lǧemɛa yezrin
knu
yura-kem s yidammen
ur kent-ssḥeqrent ara
imiren kan tekker teqdec-asen-d
mi d-tsumreḍ awal yezmer ad ak-d-iban ixuss ar deqqal
ayagi akk iḍra-d iwakken ad iffeɣ wayen uran lenbiya
teqqaṛem
addal uraren n usegmi aẓawan amezgun ssinima isaragen timziknin d wayen-nniḍen
dɣa anda ur myezgen ara ameslay
tawaγit d lmeḥna d-yeγḍel ṭrad γef tmurt
ula d iminigen
wali amaynut
si lɣella taqdimt ara tettettem
i tmeṭṭut rran lekben nnan-as kemm d taɛkumt
ur ẓriɣ ara amek ara am-d-sfehmeɣ
wissen i wacu i yegzem van gogh ameẓẓuɣ-is
ur yeḥli ara mazal-it kan akken
tecbiḍ izimer imenza
Ԑyiɣ seg yiɣimi
wiyaḍ ad d-teddun akka tura
Ɛiwen aɛiban ad yezger neɣ ad iserked takerrust-is
aktayen n yimawlan-is
ad kreɣ ur ukiɣ akken medlent wallen
d tisukraf naɣ d aqerdun
teffeɣ-d temɣart-nni tettmeǧǧid
kečč wet aẓru-nni ad d-ffɣen seg-s waman imiren ad isew ugdud
iεeqqayen i yuγalen d arekti senγadent-ten rennunt-asen kra n waman deg teswiεet γer tayeḍ
la ttḥewwiseɣ ur ẓriɣ d acu i ttḥewwiseɣ
ad yers uɣersiw i k-izedɣen

ad iyi-ten-tefkeḍ

awwah ad tt-niḥwiǧ tagi deg uxeddim
aεeṭṭar ameẓyan ayγer akka

cebḥent tmeɣriwin s yiḍebbalen
beṛka ur ggar ara iman-ik
ad truḥemt neɣ ala
d tikli i s-iɛerqen
ifekren ur sɛin ara tuɣmas
beṛka akeyyef
ilaq ad k-nawi ɣer sbiṭar
Ḥemmleɣ ad nezheɣ isura
wwten deg-i mebla cceḥḥa
Ɛni tufiḍ-d anda i terra
Ḥbes ur ttɛeyyiḍ ara
fehmeɣ
Ɣur-em
amek i tzemreḍ ad d-tiniḍ aya s tefṛansist
beṛka-kem aqelleq
Ḍegger icelman-nni
ilmeẓyen n tmurt n leqbayel ad regglen ara tmura tibeṛṛaniyin
awelleh ɣef ayen iḍeṛṛun deg tmura nniḍen
Ḥemmlen ad ččen tiẓidanin d wayen yelhan
yella kra i asen-d-yeǧǧa baba-tsen
aql-aɣ neḥma taqaƐet
hennit iman-nwen ay arrac
axxam-iw d lqaɛa sqef-iw d igenni
cedhaɣ ad ffɣeɣ d yimdukal-iw
atan yettrusu-d usafag
err-as i tom
kingston d tamaxt n jamayik
ičča-yi wawal
iṛuḥ ar ttberna ad d-isew kra n tebyirin
bɣiɣ ad yi-d-tewteḍ kra ugiṭar
yeggumma ad as-yerr awal
bɣiɣ ad steɛfuɣ kra
bezgeɣ
berka aqemmeṛ
Ɛni d tom i d amecṭuḥ n uxxam
Ḥliẓẓan
di ccetwa i ttafeɣ iman-iw
ffɣet ur bɣiɣ ara ad heḍṛeɣ yid-wen
kem mačči d udem n rrbeḥ
Ḥku-yi-d f iturkiyen g lalman
kkes yiwet
anwa d amdakel n marie
Ččiɣ aɣrum n lebṣel
d azɣal ɣef madden meṛṛa mačči kan fell-aneɣ
krim belqasem d azamul n tegrawla mgal fransa
d tom i d amdakel-iw i ḥemmleɣ akk mliḥ
fket-aɣ talwit ttxilwet
asmi yedder ɣunzan-t asmi yemmut usan-d seg yal tamnaḍt akken ad t-ɛezzin
isem n ucennay-nni yuɣ-d akk timura
ayla-w akk yeqqel yinem
d awal iweɛren i usuqel
aql-i ttqeεεideɣ apyanu-inu akken zemreɣ kan
lliɣ ur ḥemmleɣ ara ccṛab ma d tura ḥemmlaɣ-t aṭas
amek
di taggara yal wa yuɣal s axxam-is
amek i s-qqaṛen i umdakel-inek i tḥemmleḍ akk mliḥ
ilaq imusnawen ad gen tizrawin ad anin d acu i d ssebba amek armi inezdaɣ n tmazɣa ddren armi d assa
Ɣur-i asteqsi
azekka-nni yewweḍ-d tom
d ṛṛay-ik i tt-ixedmen
Ḥemmleɣ ad aruɣ
anef-as kan d ccɣel-iw
Ɛyiɣ seg uḥellel
awi-aɣ-d sin ifenǧalen n lqahwa ttxil-k
facebook yuɣal d ccemma
llan qqaren lqaεa timdewwert
ilaq ad yi-tɛawneḍ i wakken ad nsellek iman-nneɣ
irwi-yaɣ s ṭanṭanu
iɣerdayen n berra ssuffɣen wid n uxxam
iḍfer-iyi-d yiwen urgaz yettmala ur yezmir ara ad ibedd seg tissit
aru-d kra
arnaflas d win ur nettamen s rebbi
heggit iman-nwen
kennu ulac-it deg umawal-nneɣ
anwa i asent-innan
arum temmeslayem taqbaylit ma tebɣam tutlayt-nwen ur tettaɣ ara abrid n nnger
ass merra kra ur t-ččiɣ ala aḥerrif n uɣrum
aṭas n inelmaden i iṛuḥen ar fransa
lemmer tḥesseḍ-iyi-d tili ur d-yeḍṛi ara waya
iwacu i tettwaxdam tsarutt-a
d acu i k-ixuṣṣen
Ɣef lfayda-is yettazzal
ad ɛerḍeɣ ad d-sfehmeɣ d acu i d-inna
yessuffeɣ-d deg-i lɛella
irden i yir tuɣmas
ayen i d-teqqareḍ ur yesɛi ɣur-i la afus la aḍar
acuɣer ur d-testeqsayeḍ ara
yegrareb muḥend deg ucruf
mačči d kečč i d-lhiɣ a yidir
ur yefhim ara yidir newwara
d ayen ibanen belli kečč d aqcic iẓewṛen
yidir ittaggad iqjan
ilaq ad fehmen medden belli ddunit tetteddu ar zdat
tettneẓma i tmeddit-is
a tin yeḍran yid-i
yeṭṭef deg wawal-is
d askeɛwew kan
teqqim am tin iɛelqen
ddnub i yirawen-nwen
ur kriheɣ yiwen
ur iruḥ ur yeqqim
siwel-as azekka
iruḥ ar wanda i yeqqim baba-s
amdan-a yenɣa iman-is annect-a d leḥram deg ddin i as-yenna ccix
berraɣ qerrceɣ aqerru-w d aferḍas
i kunwi
Ḥbes ur ṭṭalaya ara
cukkeɣ yettwakellex
bɣiɣ ad s-heḍṛeɣ meɛna setḥaɣ-tt
ferḥet a leqbayel
llaq ad d-tefkeḍ agmuḍ
isteɛfa yidir
yerna nwiɣ-as ad am-d-siwileɣ akken mi ara nili kan gar-aneɣ
akken kan i d-yeffeɣ yidir si tesdawit yufa axeddim
ittergigi am yifer
ayen akk tessarameḍ deg tirga
izmer d sami i yenɣan layla
ddu s leɛqel
eǧǧ-iyi-d adlis-ik ma ulac aɣilif
nezga nettmeslay

thegga iman-is i tmeɣra
tettɛawazemt

ili-k d aḥeqqi
atan dagi
ma teḥwaǧeḍ-iyi siwel-d
medlet tawwurt
kker a mmi-s n umaziɣ

dagi
yulwa cwiya yidir ass-a
aṭas n medden i yeccḍen s yiwet n tuccḍa
yella win ara tt-yeẓren ma mačči d caɛban azwaw
llan aṭas n ibeɛɛac i yettṣeffiṛen deg yigran
d amezwaru s učči
Ɣef wacḥal ssaɛa i d-kkrent
ass-a qqdeɣ-tt imi swiɣ rebɛa n yiqbucen n cṛab
ufan-as-d amkan n uxeddim
d nitni i yeqqimen dinna
anda i tt-tufiḍ

issen abrid ilaqen

ad yesɛu ayen yebɣa

ur uɣeɣ ara akal
azgen n useggas

annef-iyi deg talwit
ur d-ittuɣal ara

a ladɣa aneggaru-ayi

anwa d-yesnulfan tiliɣri
ma telluẓeḍ ečč kra a yidir

lliɣ deg uxxam-iw
ur ẓriɣ ara s anda ara rreɣ aqerru-w
ilaq ad yenfeɛ uselkim-inu i kra
ddu d uḍaṛ-im

yerfa mliḥ fell-i yidir

jmeɛ-it

iɣreq lbabur

igarrez

ihi nečča neswa armi tebzeg tɛebbuḍt
tleqqeḍ newwara azemmur
ilaq ad tṛuḥemt ad tegnemt tura

ad afen d acu ara hedren

tečča abbaɣ-iw
tekres twenza-s

attan teqbaylit-nni i nuṛǧa acḥal aya

Ɣas akken tekkfa
kker fell-ak a tom teẓṛiḍ belli d afutay-inu
err-it d amecṭuḥ
ad yili d azamul i wiyaḍ akken ad t-ḍefren
saɛid u muḥ yessuter smeḥ i tiziri tagawawt
saɛid u muḥ yessiwel i tiziri tagawawt
ffeɣ-iyi syagi
ur am-d-yefki ara udem
anwa ara yeččen
ansuf yes-m ar uxxam
alukan kan nerna kra deg lebḥer
ula d nettat d aẓref-is akken ad textir abrid tebɣa
d acu i k-yeĝĝan ay iles ur tesεiḍ ara iɣes

am uferḍas uqerruy
ad tkemmleḍ ayen tebdiḍ

ur sbehdil ara

ur yeẓri d acu yellan neɣ d acu yeḍran

d acu kan llan wid i d-yettaran rruḥ
ur smuncufet ara
tettru yemma
ini-yi-d bɣiɣ ad ak-ciwreɣ ɣef yiwet n tɣawsa
ternuḍ-as tfaz deg ssifa
ur itett ara yidir aksum n yilef
acuɣer i tt-tkerhem
azekka ma tesɛiḍ kra n lweqt
cebḥent tjeǧǧigin-nni i yellan deg tebḥirt
anwa ara ceggɛeɣ
sliɣ i ḥed ikcem-d ɣer texxamt-nni
anda-t ugeffur
sliman u muḥ yettban yefṛeḥ
tikkelt nniḍen
ur ttkettireɣ ara lqahwa
d nekk i tent-yuɣen g uḍaṛ

aṭas i yečča

awes imeɣban
sliman u muḥ yezmer ad iger taflest deg tiziri tagawawt
Ɣas akken ur yeɛlim ɣef wacu i nnuɣen
d lxir a massa
ass-a swiɣ ayen bɣiɣ

nerwa tizli
ad trewlem

ulac-iyi

ahat ad d-ires lxaṭer-is

igerrez

a-t-an tura

ddem ulman-a err-iten d takurt
ur t-yeẓẓar

i tmeɛcuq-it

ur yufi ara tameẓẓuɣt ara as-d-iḥessen
ur iɛeṭṭel ara yidir di tejmaɛt

zgan ɣer yidisan-is
am akken yefla lǧib-is

iḥemmel tom ad d-iṣeyyed iselman
ur cfint ara ɣef temẓi-nsent
fehmen meṛṛa

d asaru amsultan i d-neẓra
nexser lbak am nekk am nettat
yekkat ubraray
yuɣal yefcel tom
ad d-taf abrid ad ɣ-tenṭeḍ

tekkes fell-asent sser
tom yeqqim ɣef wadur n ṭṭaq
wa d argaz
ilaq ad teččem kra n tɣawsa
ussan-a ɛyiɣ cwiṭ
yella walebɛaḍ i wen-d-iɣṛan
anwa i kem-id-iwwin
anef i uqjun ad isseglef
amezruy ires ɣef tira

d tikti n ḥedd nniḍen
tidet ur tebḍi ɣef snat
ur tessineḍ ara leṣlaḥ-ik
adabu azzayri yugad ad tufrar teqbaylit neɣ ma ulac ad yeɣli
kksen sser kra n yemsulta ɣef kra n tlawin
rriɣ-tt kan i ucali
yuyes ad yaweḍ

ihedder qejmuri
tettbineḍ-d d tamelḥant tameddit-a
tezha ddunit
allaɣ n lusyus yeqqim d win n wemdan kan
iɛawed tom lqecc-is
anta taɣennust i yetteqṛaḥen
asɣar-nni deg-s i yensa
ansi ara d-kken lehdur
ur ssineɣ ara tasdawit n bgayet
akken i wen-teḍra
aṭas i glalzent deg wannar n taddart
at ẓẓur ad ten-id-necdeɣ
ileḥḥu tifiṛeqsi
tezgamt tettargumt rrbeḥ
ur ttelles ara adlis-nni
aṭas n tlawin i s-yecfan

teẓẓgeɣ yessenday umcic
Ḥfan iḍarren i tikli

ulac iḥelfan deg tegzirt taεrabt

di leɛnaya-k ɣeṛ-as
tecmummeḥ-as-d kan iɣill dayen
ali qbel ɣer ubalku
tettemyeḥmaẓeḍ ɣef ulac
acuɣer ddula ad tbennu leǧwameɛ deg tudrin-nneɣ
yesseḍ uqcic-nni
ur tennumemt ara tuffɣa deg iḍ
llan waman n wasif
henni iman-im seg-sent
drus akya i d-mazal
ma teffɣeḍ akken ur telsiḍ ara mliḥ ad k-iwet ubeḥri
yewɛer wuzu n nndama
leǧnas ttalin s uɣiwel nutni zgan d amerret yal amḍiq yers uburziz
ad iqqim deg uxxam azekka
d amḥaddi itent-ittaɣen

deg maṣer tura d lɛesker i iḥekmen
akken ad ak-n-rrent tamuɣli
Ɣret kan ad tifem leǧnas
ur ssawḍeɣ ara ad agiɣ
tarifit tettemcabi ɣer teqbaylit
di leɛnaya-m ɣeṛ-as s tilifun
ad teɣṛemt di tesdawit n bgayet
yella kra n yiwen i yettfeṛṛiǧen
ass-agi ur ttnebdaren ara
nettemyeḥmaẓ akken ad neḥmu
nnif izwar lexṛif
iyi txedmeḍ a lunǧa
tom yettaweḍ mary
nniɣ-as dayen ad hebleɣ
mi friɣ ttuzma-w fukeɣ
tom d ameɛdazu
drus i d-iqqimen
ilaq ad d-naf ayen swayes ara nergel lɣar-a
ad d-nesmekti lğil yettsuɣ
imsex-it Ṛebbi
mi d iyi-teǧǧiḍ weḥceɣ
ad tnadiɣ ɣef ddwa-m
iɛawed tom iselsa
bu tḥila ḥeyylent-as
yella win i m-d-iluɛan
yeqfez deg usewwi
amek armi i d-yettmenni akanic
ur tettu ara ad tessufɣeḍ iḍumman
yenneɛtab
Ṛebbi ittak taḥeṛṛaṛt s berru
awalen-a d ineggura-ines deg uxxam n yidles n temdint n Ɛennaba
ma ɛriɣ a bab-iw ssels-iyi
tura qbel neɣ qabel
mmi ur ittṣubbu ara yid-wen
iteffeẓ awal
Ḥuf ḥuf am uweṭṭuf
iɣed ad t-iddem waḍu
a lḥif n tegrar ameṛṛẓu n tgecrar
yezmer ad k-iqerreḥ acemma
akebbuḍ-a uɣeɣ-t-id rxis
ad teḥzen lfeṭṭa inzan s uɛeṛbun
ttḥewwiseɣ axeddim
xas nekk la tt-id-tmektiɣ
Ḥulfaɣ kkawen ifadden-iw
zemren warzuzen ad nɣen taɣaṭ ma nnejmaɛen-as
ur d-iqqim deg-m uṭenṭun
gma-s d axeddam ɣer tɣiwant
icedha tayri n tala
umneɣ s Ṛebbi yiwen
ur bɣiɣ ara kan ad s-qqaren medden ur zmireɣ
ittqejmumuṛ ɣef iṣuṛdiyen
d arraw n Ɛada
ikṛeh-it umejnun-iw
ittɣaḍ usgen asemmaḍ
ur ttceɣɣib iman-ik ɣef ayen xedmeɣ
yeǧhed umutur ukamyun-a-inek
mi mmuteɣ ad ig Ṛebbi tenger
Ɛuẓẓgeɣ ar wur ɛniɣ
d nekk ara k-iḍemnen deg-s
ulac wi izegren asif ur ibzig
Ɣullen-aɣ ula deg tili n teslent-nsen
d ifadden n wuffal
isdukkel tagdect aẓrar
a lxiṛ a litra tesɛiḍ llembuḍ
wa yundi-tt wa yeqqureɛ-itt
ur ttamen ṣṣaba ar terwet
ur ttamen asif asusam
ur muqleɣ ara ɣer tom
ttwaṭṭfent i tlata
acu k-iwwin a yaḥuli ad tettafgeḍ
iteddu xmat xmat
fiḥel ma tennḍeḍ i udrar aɛmam
muṛad meẓri iwεer s tidet ad d-yemmeslay yiwen ɣef yiman-is
d acu teččam daɣen
akken i k-d-tṛuḥ mmager-itt
win ileḥḥun timendeffirt iɣelli
Ɣeṛṛeb neɣ ceṛṛeq
yexreb wexrib ay aɣrib
izzizdiw ur ittfukku ameslay
as-d ɣur-i ur ttɛeṭṭil ara
kul yiwen ittḥalab s uḥellab-is
kkes-d afeḥli ur nesraddem
tidak ara m-id-smektiɣ
tettagad deg yiḍ
acampanzi d ibki-nni iqerben maḍi ɣer umdan deg adn-is
d tawejjiṭ uqelwac
tamdint-is isem-is Ɛawit
am wi ittagmen s uɣerbal
yeɛqub iḥemmel Ṛaḥil
da swaswa i d-teḍra
nnan awal d lfeṭṭa tif-it tsusmi d ddheb
ur sseqdacet ara aṭas n waman
ttxil-k ttxil-k ad k-weṣṣiɣ
rju ur ttruḥ ara tura ma ulac ad k-faqen
yal mi d-neɣra tafyirt amzun neẓẓa tibḥirt
tewwet tmerbuḥt di lḥaṛa
idir idir leqraṛ-nneɣ d agadir
d acu i tent-ixuṣṣen
aql-i rrẓeɣ deg uberḍi
cci n Ṛebbi nekni n Ṛebbi
d acu ara yi-d-tefkeḍ
deg unebdu-nni yal azal nettɛedday s ugiṭar d dderbuka
Ḍliɣ akk abux
ur iṛḍi ur igi lɛali
tanemmirt imi d-tḥebsed
zemreɣ ad t-nnaleɣ
lxiṛ s ṭṭbel yif-it fiḥel
friɣ lḥebb ɣef takka
ata wul-iw ad yettɛemmiṛ
ilaq-awen ad twejdem i kullec
tettru tasa ɣef tasa
daymi i ffreɣ
deqzalla tɣelli-d akk ɣef medden
inexxel liwṛa liwṛa
ur ẓriɣ ma wejdeɣ i wakken
ittuwwet yizem s asgen-is
d wigi i d imeqranen-nsen
d ayen tmegreḍ ara tesrewreḍ
mačči d abhim i lliɣ
nettwali s wallaɣ ma d kečč ɣas wexxeṛ
iɣebbeṛ akk wid i s-yettilin
ilaq-iyi ugar n tafat
ixeddem muḥend belqasem asileɣ usrid deg facebook yal lexmis
kkret ad nṛuḥ ɣer bitil
akken tḥudreḍ drus
ziɣ lqayed d amdan
ikker uctal di lemleḥ
ittxemmis si ṣṣbeḥ alamma d lmesbeḥ
anda ara tiliḍ azekka lweqt-a
argaz d awal mačči d aserwal
ur tḥellu ara
yečča aksum-is meskin
yiwen yeṭṭef deg laṣel wayeḍ yeqqel d afransis
ixdem daɣen itran
rnu cmummeḥ ugar
i iṛuḥen ur teddiḍ
iteddu ittmuṛḍus
ur tettu ara ad yi-d-taɣreḍ azekka
ifyar-a ad ilint di lxaṭer n mmi iḥemmlen ddabex n uḍar
ayen i d-yeḍran leɛca-ayi

txus-ak tbessast d tsusat
ad teččeḍ da neɣ ad tawiḍ yid-k
ass-a issaɣ-itt udfel
leqder d liser
ulamma yeɣleḍ
tettɛawan wid yeḥwaǧen
teɛna taxxmat-is
ttaṭṭafen amkan iweɛɛan mliḥ ɣer ubrid
nfu ar taddart-nniḍen
sima tewwid iḍ gar yifasen n maziɣ
kemmel ɣer zdat
ilaq ad nɣiwel akken ad naweḍ zik
nietzsche yenna-d lemmer ulac aẓawan tudert ad teqqel d tuccḍa
isfalṭay mliḥ
teṭṭalay-it s lhenna
maziɣ ur t-tewwi la lqaɛa la igenni
yettaɛar ad d-yeɣli yiḍ
Ɣuṛ-k ha
sseṛwan-as-tent i uɛessas meskin
tebɣa alukan ad terwel deg tmetti itt-yurzen
ad tafeḍ yesteɣfir yerna s taḍsa d unecraḥ
aseggas kamel nekk d urar n tinis
azeṭṭa yeqqerṣen
awalen ijenṭaḍen
am wakken ḥeslen wawalen i tebɣa ad d-tini
ur tettruḥum ara
Ḥwi izgaren-ik sya
maca ḥsu tudert deg tesdawit
asmi i yekfa ukayad
lukan mačči d maziɣ iten-iferqen tilaq myuččen
ikker uɣebbar deg waluḍ
tura-yas i maziɣ
ttaysen ad d-ffɣen ɣer ugnes n lakul akken ad farsen
llant tessent aman
tesɛam ṭabla rrif n ṭaq
yeɛweq d acu ara d-yini
am win yellan gar ẓẓebra d ufḍis
tuget n lewqat mi ur xeddmeɣ ara
awi-d yiwet n lqehwa tessaliḍ-tt mliḥ
ad tsusmeḍ neɣ ad k-ssumleɣ
bɣiɣ ad k-d-fkeɣ kra n tuttriwin
ladɣa massi d tedyanin-is ur nettfakka
dda lmud at mɛemmeṛ cfiɣ mi ara d-bdu awal fell-as yettebdad deg-i rric
ad d-aseɣ ad k-awiɣ ɣef sebɛa
mi ara d-iwwet udfel
d tadwilt-nneɣ ad nxelles ayen nečča
ur tkeččmem ara s axxam
ur d-tkeččmem ara s axxam
neɣ aɛessas
thedreḍ-iy-d ɣef yidrimen
yeǧǧa-d amkan-is i tezdeg n wass
sliman u muḥ yebra
ini-yi-d amek ur tḥemleḍ ara yiwen ubuqal mebla lqaɛ am wa
ur teččimt acemma ass-a
ad ffɣeɣ d abugaṭu ameqqran
iguma ad yečč seg iḍelli
saɛid u muḥ yerra-d ṭlem ɣef tiziri tagawawt
Ččan ayaziḍ deg ubrid-nsen
acuɣer i d-isawel yidir
d acu n waddal i tḥemmleḍ
anta tarbaɛt ara yuraren
yak tesɛiḍ imddukal d wacu i teɣɣareḍ akked wid n tddukli
deg wayyur ɣer wayeḍ
allaɣ ixeddem
d acu i tebɣiḍ ad txedmeḍ skud telliḍ da

ilaq ad yerfed ayen yexdem deg-i
taceqquft ad tettwaxdem deg uxxam n yidles

yuɣ-d yidir takerrust
ayen i d-ifka wass yečča-t yiḍ
ala walaɣ-tt deg wexxam n yidles

i wacu tεelleḍt anezgum
bɣiɣ ad tzedɣeḍ yid-i
lhi-d kan d ccɣel-im

inelmaden sikiden taselmadt d acu ara sen-d-tini

d annect-nni i yi-d-nnan
ay amrur
akka i d win yesɛan amddakel
iḍelli ndiɣ ɛecrin n tfextin
d nutenti ara ak-id-ṭṭafern
lidia tezemreḍ ad tessewweḍ kra n tgella i magdalena ania piotr akked lech
acu tebɣiḍ ad tesweḍ

Ḥaca timira-nwen

mi tewweḍ

ur stewtiw ara
amek ara teḍru yid-m

aqeddac ad yili ɣur-k akka kra

ur nefhim ara taluft-a d acu-tt

win aɣersiw axir-is

iceffu dima ɣef wayen yesla

eǧǧ amcic-nni deg berra

d aman i yessemɣayen ayen yettwaẓẓan

azul
Ɛni ttbeccicent tyuzaḍ
ittsetḥi mliḥ sami
d ayen yelhan ma ẓṛiɣ-k abrid-nniḍen
truḥ-as tmaqqant i tfunast
ini-as aql-i ɛyiɣ
d ḥedd i tettḥufuḍ
d acu i yezwaren d axeddim-ik neɣ d tawacult-ik
ilaq ad yi-d-tiniḍ tidet
zzit n uzemmur d ddwa
inna-yas wuccen ɛlayit semmumit
di tefsut taberkant iǧadaṛmiyen nɣan ddeqs n yilmeẓyen wiyaḍ ɛeggben-ten ilebda
aseqdec n wallalen itiknulujiyen deg yiɣerbazen d ayen yettƐawanen aṭas deg uselmed

dacu i d tifrat ihi

Ḍfeṛ
aseggas-a wissen ma ad tili ṣṣaba n uzemmur
ass-nni d agfur dɣa tom ur yebɣi ara ad yeffeɣ
ayɣeṛ d nekk
anwa ara d-yasen ɛni
ilaq ad t-tissinem
imawlan-iw mmuten i sin
izux ɣef madden s wayen ur nelli d ayla-s
amek ara fiqen
aseqqamu yettnejmaε-d snat tikal i wayyur
iḥemmel taqcict-agi
ilaq ad tettekleḍ f yiman-im kan meɛna mačči s waṭas
Ḍfeṛ-iyi-d
imuras fukken nekk ur merḥeɣ ara
iguma ad iḥbes asbeɛbeɛ yizimer-nni
ma d tura dayen ifuk lḥif ɣef nanna
asɣar iḥeḍmen ittifsus
ayen i d-tenniḍ iṣeḥḥa
anef-iyi ad ak-d-sekneɣ yiwet n tɣawsa
deg alaɣ-is tessekles yal taɣawsa i as-d-yezzin
ilaq ad qqimeɣ iman-iw i wakken ad xemmeɣ
dindin yessusem
Ḥsen yedda deg wakud-is
imdanen tura yewt-iten akk uzaylal
d tazerzayt tekkat s udem
isebbaḍen-iw ḍlan akk d aluḍ
awen-d heggiɣ ayen ad teččem
cennun yefṛax deg tefsut
bnin uɣrum aquran s zzit n uzemmur
amdun yequṛ
axxam umezgun yella yeččur d lɣaci
iseglaf aṭas uqjun-a
ičča lmal yefṛeḥ bab-is
icreq-d yiṭij
izzi d amecṭuḥ
faṛes ɣef yiman-ik
bran i ṭṭbel deg waman
anta tamɣaṛt i yeẓṛan belli ilha zzit uzemmur i udeddic
d amellal am izimer ites aman am uzger d acu-t d acu-t
heggimt iman-nkunt d lawan
Ɛni ur tesɛim ara ccɣel
yuɣal d aεeqqa yessawalen
leḥkem n yiḥizi yeṭṭef-aɣ asawen
ass-a telha tedwilt n umaṭṭaf n taqbaylit
aẓet akkin cwiṭ
anef-as ad iṛuḥ ad ijeṛṛeb ddunit
d anekk i yumnen taqsiḍt-a
Ḥemlaɣ-k
ilaq ad d-tuɣaleḍ ɣer uxxam ɣef ttesεa
d iseɛdiyen wid i iḥemmlen tjeǧǧigin
iwani teteddut
ilaq ad teṭṭfeḍ deg wawal-ik
awit ayen tebɣam
di leɛnaya-m
lliɣ tetteɣ imensi imiren
kemmel mmeslay
ameqqran n uɛebbuḍ yettaddam aḥric azuran
Ɣas ad yi-d-tiniḍ isem-ik
ddabex n uḍar di tmurt-nneɣ icba ssuq n lmal
faqeɣ
iḥma wurar ass-a
bɣiɣ ad ruḥeɣ s uvilu acku yebεed uɣerbaz ɣef anda zedɣeɣ
ilaq-iyi ad sefḍeɣ aṭas ikaramen deg uselkim-iw
ffɣen ad leqmen tizemrin
Ɣuṛwat tura ad medlent tebbura
dayen tura
awi-d afus ad am-d-qqneɣ kra n lḥenni
tfehmeḍ d acu i d-inna uselmad zgelli
ttaggsent tlawin mi ara qeddcent
isdawanen d tesdawanin ur qqaren ara aṭas n yidlisen am zik
llan aṭas n iqbayliyen i yebɣan timunent-nsen
kcem
d ṛṛay-iw kan i d-fkiɣ
d acu-t warraz-iw
Ḥbes
Ḥess mliḥ
iban ad tṛuḥ ad texdem tameddit-a

kra yekka wass nekk d lqeḍyan
ad tɛeddi ad texdem aɛwin
Ɛeddi ma ad d-yekker seg usu
asemmiḍ agris lehwa terna tekkat fell-i
icebba-yi Ṛebbi yella kra n yiwen di texxamt-nni n zdat
ur yennum ara tuffɣa deg iḍ
ileḥḥu s uɛijel
ad iyi-zzment wallen-iw
yetteɛjal di tikli
d amelsi yerna anagi ur t-yesɛi
ruḥ kan ur smeεḍil
yuɣ-as-d tarkasin i mmi-s
yir meṭṭu yif-it beṭṭu
ulac lxilaf gar wergaz d tmeṭṭut
tella kra n yiwet i tettṛajuḍ
tettumt kra n tɣawsa
ur nnument ara tuffɣa deg iḍ
amek ara teddu tmurt-a
qqimemt akken ur ttḥerrikemt ara akk
ad tejjefleḍ ad tetthummuḍ
anida ara walint aḥbib
ur yenfiɛ i walu usegzawal-ayi
izmer ad yexdem aya tom neɣ xaṭi
ay ul ru ad ruɣ fell-ak
anda yella ddwa ḥellu
zhu dunnit-im
myeẓẓan ilili
d ayen yuɛṛen
tura yiwen ur "yettṣelli ɣef nnbi" deg tejmaɛt n taddart-nneɣ
ur gezzmet ara lxiḍ-a
Ɣumm ṭṭɛam-ik s umendil-ik
nekk seg-m mazal ur ḥliɣ
iḥemmel ad iḥewwes tom
ur ilaq ara ad tketbeḍ aṭas deg uwennit
ssneɣ ad meslayeɣ tutlayt-ik
werǧin i d-greɣ di lbal belli ahat d ameḥbus i d-irewlen
sin ugaren uccen
isfi-d wul-is
yella kra i yufa tom
teswa idammen n tyaẓiḍt-nni
d acu yeḍran akka atan aman kkan-d axxam merra
ur d-yecliε ara deg tmeslayt-is
Ẓẓay i reffu
iwacu ur d-tettaɣem ara kan yiwen d ajdid dayen
yiwen n wass tḥukki-yi yemma ifelfel deg uqemmuc
yufa umger titar-is
tella tin i d-ittlaɛin
dayen εyiɣ i sliɣ i llwam-is
nenneḍ nettel
tessens afrigu dɣa yettwaɣ aksum-nni
ur ḥṣiɣ ara ad s-yeɛǧeb
tella tin i yeṭṭfen tamkant-iw
ad m-d-ḥkuɣ ad ifsuseɣ
mačči d cciṭan i d aɛdaw-ik
teḥbes ur tettmeslay ara
aman ad amsen kečč ad tizdigeḍ
anda akka teddiḍ
Ḍeyyfen-t armi d ulamek
ibennu mebɣir takurt
yella kra i teččamt
seg ucrured ar tikli
kul iḍ itbeɛ-it lefjer
izirdi-nni tayaziḍt ur tt-yeǧǧi
yeqqim d ajedid usmekti
ikad-ak-d yeεni icuba ɣer baba-s
ur bɣiɣ ara ad yejreḥ ḥedd d aya i yellan
luṭ irra-yasen ala a sidi
lɣeṛba ay tt-irnan d ṣṣbeṛ
in-asen menhu-yaɣ
ala aɣyul i i inekṛen laṣel-is
ufan agerruj yuɣal-asen d tirgin
d iḥenges am timmist seddaw teɣṛuḍt
tewweḍ tweṭṭuft s ixef n usɣaṛ
aɛeqqa aɛeqqa ad yemmed meqqa
ittnaqaṛ irgazen s wiyaḍ
irgazen kettben iḥezzazen ḥettben
yezmer ad yelhu
mṛeḥba yella učči ulac
Ḥusseɣ i uxxam yembawel
yenɣa-k usduxxen ɣer lkanun
ur iqqeṛṣ uyeddid ur nɣilen waman
mbeɛd iṛuḥ izdeɣ di girar
win ibɣan ad ireɣ ireɣ ɣef lɛali
tom yella iɣill tsekṛeḍ
Ṭṭbiɛa-s d lexṛif ddem kan teččeḍ
ulac uɣilif
nwiɣ tḥemleḍ-iyi
illa yiwen n wawal iffukti ɣef ɛecṛa
axxam-iw la iṛeqq meqqaṛ ad sseḥmuɣ
ass ad teqqerqer ass ad tebbeṛbeṛ
iniɣem-nni tezdeɣ-it twekka
ahat lukan xir mačči d tom
zzwaǧ yiwen wass aḥebbeṛ-is aseggas
amek i d-rrant
mi m-ikkunner seksu err-it-d aɣṛum
amyaru ilaq-as daɣen usebter deg facebook mačči kan amiḍan
suref-iyi kan ur d-qsideɣ ara k-gezmeɣ awal
ur ittaɣ ur iznuzu
yebɣa ad d-yessufeɣ iɣes deg tasa
faṛset tiɣli telha i tilkli
d tarmit ur nettwaman
ad tɣilleḍ tḥemmel-ik nettat tewhem kan deg-k
d lufeq i yexeddmen lecɣwal
ileddi Ṛebbi tibbura mebla tisura
izzenz adrum s uɣrum
iruḥ-as lmizan i udrabki-nni dɣa ḥebsen tizlit deg tlemmast
atmaten-is cergen lebḥuṛ
ad nesdakklet iɣallen-nneɣ
aqjun ifka-yas Ṛebbi sebɛa leṛwaḥ
iṛuḥ deg-sent
dayen tura kullec yefḍeḥ
Ẓẓel afus-ik tbeɛ-it
isbedd dinna iqiḍunen-is
acu yeḍran d medden din
tanemmirt ɣef leεtab-ik
s lemkaḥel yerna la regglen
bu meyya iqqaṛ awah a mitayen
win yuṛǧan lɛebd ad yens i laẓ
texten-as imma-s s ibeddi
cilaḥ iǧǧa-d Ɛibir
inisi ur d-isbanay ara taqadumt-is
ah d asḥissef
tettuḍ kra ddiɣ ḥafi ṛwiɣ lemḥan
lmeεna ur tt-yesεi ɣer ɣur-i
yečča amur n igujilen
ferrjeɣ-d asaru qqaren-as " asif n tayri-w"
abṛam inna i luṭ xaṭi
ula d ijiṛmeḍ d mmis n tmurt
aɛeqqa aɛeqqa ad immed meqqa
kker a ɛejjaq immut urejjaq
ayen izeynen leɛmeṛ yeṛxis
yella kra i tečča
meɛtub lwennas ilul deg tewrirt musa deg at dwala
ccah di ṛṛay-im
axxam d tamda at Ṛebbi d tiregwa
a tidet iṛuḥen ass-a ad kem-nẓeṛ
yiwen n zzhir ad s-tiniḍ deg berra i ṭṭseɣ
nṭel leɛyub ay anil
taqcict-agi d leḥrir n temdint
tom yella yebɣa ad yili d aneggaru
i wanwa teqqazeḍ aẓekka-nni
am idrimen di sselfa
yusa-d win k-irnan a win i yi-irnan
ikukra mi iruḥ ad d-yefk tiririt
acḥal teɣriḍ d idlisen
ur ẓriɣ iwacu i s-yettarra uqjun-nneɣ i ccix yal mi yedden
mačči kan yiwet n tezlit i d-newwi dinna
dɣa Ɛisu yeṭṭerḍeq d imeṭṭi
yesṭenṭen-iyi ubeḥri
s yisem n Ṛebbi i d-ittara tiɣeṭṭen
ma yuli waggur ula igan itran
ay adrar gar idurar a wi yeccfan ɣef sser
Ṛuḥ a zzman tuɣaleḍ-d a zzman
temẓi ad tt-teẓẓem
truḥ yemma s axeddim
yella ḥedd i yukren llebsa-nneɣ
acḥal i tenɣam i txenqem s umrar
d acu i ken-ixuṣṣen
ad nemlil din
mass deḥman at Ɛli i yuran amawal n tfizikt
xas akka beɛdeɣ fell-am
bezzaf swiɣ iḍelli deg yiḍ
ittbeccic ijufaṛ-is
tḥemmleḍ tteffaḥ neɣ ččina
yiwen ur d-yeddi d rray-iw
ur ssakway tizizwa yiṭṭsen
ifka-t Ṛebbi i maylellif
aksum i y-iεeǧben ɣef lḥut
amdan isfulluqen ur ittaf iḥbiben
win ur nettnawal ur as-ilzim wawal
simmal ttewwant ttiẓident
izga-d gar qadic akked birid
ha-tt-an ribka ɣur-k
Ṛuḥ a yasif di lɣerḍ-ik
isɛa amesmaṛ deg uqeṛṛu
aṭas i yeṣber
ddaɛwessu n lwaldin tewɛeṛ
awi-d aman
kra ikka wass iẓẓad fell-i
d ibki n tzantin i yettanin tilkin
yugi-yas i tmeṭṭut-is ad tmuqel ula deg ṭṭaq
anda nwiɣ tafat i ufiɣ lehwa tekkat
ixir ayen nefka wala ayen nečča
tom mačči am kemm
Ṛebbi d aḥnin iẓẓehhiṛ
Ɛelqen ɣer-s ijlujal
a rrezg-nneɣ di lqid nerna nessikid
swakka argaz simmal ittzid di ssɛaya
di lezzayer aṭas n tlufa i yedder yerwa tid yuran armi yewweḍ ɣer tmurt n leqbayel
tesεiḍ ablug
ala taseqsut ur nettkki gar-asen
Ḍeggert-tt ɣer lbir inna yellan deg uneẓruf
anda d-yeṭṭef amedwel iɣuṛṛ-it
nnan iṣubb-d luṛu
yexdem si ṣṣbeḥ ar tameddit
yegra-d i tmeṭṭut taqbaylit ad tesεu tafekka-s d ayla-s
iwwet-it-id s licwaṛ
illu yenna ad d-tili tafat
mi txedmeḍ lxiṛ ad ak-yuɣal d ixmiṛ
beṭṭu d wi ɛzizen qeṛṛeḥ
snedheɣ amcic issendeh tajeḥniḍt-is
a Ṛebbi dawi neɣ awi
a sen-iliɣ d illu-nsen
lukan d nekk ad d-sɣeɣ wa
ad ak-ɛebbin mezleg
ur ttembiwil ur ttḥewwil
neɣ ma ulac ad rreɣ zelmeḍ neɣ yeffus
imir-nni dduklen di sin ṛuḥen
tagi si tama
d tinnuzya tid yenɣan idles tussna akked d mass budyaf
win igezmen taseṭṭa izzuɣer-itt
d asayes yettḥazen ddeqs-is
xersum ad tesεuḍ kra ara teḥkuḍ deg uxxam
mbeɛd isḥaq iserreḥ-asen uɣalen di lehna
iṛecceḥ am uyeddid
ma tufiḍ akli werreɣ armi ittwaɣ
ifka-yi iɣes ucekkab
Ṛwan lexnazer taḍsa
ad k-rreɣ d lǧens ameqran
teqbel-ik tɣill dayen fukken irgazen
mbeɛd ad d-ffɣen syenna s ssɛaya tameqrant
semmḍeɣ lǧetta-w teqqur
igla usexḍi d urgaz lɛali
uɣalent gganent akken ad kkrent
iqelleb uselmad deg uqrab-iw
ass-a ɛeddaɣ-d ɣer tneɣrit anda teqqarem
nezga d aḥewwes gar-asen
tessexsi takerrust
saɛid u muḥ yergem tiziri tagawawt
ad as-tiniḍ d lehlak iten-iḥuzan neɣ d ajeǧǧiḍ i la iten-ineṭɛen
netta yezga deg wallaɣ-is
d acu i tettuḍ deg wexxam a yidir
Ṭṭalayen-d deg-s am wakken deg leɛmer ẓran-tt
rran srid ɣer temdint
yal wa yeṭṭef abrid-is
ma tettḥewwiseḍ win tesneḍ ur tettafeḍ ara seg wakken gten
ur as-d-yerri ara awal
mi teɛyiḍ deg-s ḍegger-itt
teɣli-d ɣer wid ur nettagad rebbi
yemma teǧǧa-iyi d teqcicin am nekki
Ǧeɛfer d xalida fkan afus
yif lhem nessen wala win ara d-yeglun s ssem
akken kan i ttwaleqmen deg temẓi ara kemmlen deg temɣer
simmal yettɛeddi lweqt
a-t-an rekben ɣer wanda gganen yinelmaden
addal mačči d ttkeɛrir
addal mačči d aqesser
amek ihi i tettiliḍ a maziɣ
yebɣa ad yemmeslay d ḥed
tekkes-as leḥya
akken ad tt-ɛiwnen
tiwwura n umeyyez lqayen
ala tenemmirt Ṛwiɣ
tejmeɛ gar zzin d sser
tilemẓit tebda tḥekku-d
ur ẓriɣ s wansa ara ak-d-bduɣ
d tin yebɣa seg wul-is
tetturareḍ ddabex n uḍar
tegliḍ-iyi-d s leḥnana i yezmer ad yesɛu urgaz ɣer tmeṭṭut
yeɛni asmi i t-id-rran ɣer tmurt acku ur yesɛi ara lekwaɣeḍ
yeffeɣ-as-d d uɛkis
acḥal n ssker ara as-xedmeɣ
yeḥsa d akken ur yettaf ara lkar ara t-id-yawin s axxam
tefka lqima i tlelli-is
ad isiwel i kra n yimddukal ad as-d-afen amkan anda ara ines
julien yettarra nnwaḍer d timdewṛin am tid n john lennon
Ɛlem belli a-t-an deg lbir lqayen i tegreɣ
ur yelli lɛib ma tessarem teqcict
teẓriḍ a sima
maziɣ yegza taluft
cerken taswiɛt i as-d-yewwin ala lferḥ d usirem
tudert mebla asirem teḥbes
d darwin i yuran taneṣlit n tilmas
Ṭṭixer kan
ur teẓri amek i as-d-yekcem neɣ s wansa i as-d-yekcem
ussan imezwura lliɣ ur t-ttamneɣ ara
yetteẓmaḍ wul-is
ur tettruḥum ara s axxam
mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ tedduɣ ɣef uḍar ɣer uɣerbaz
yak iɛǧeb-ak wayen teččiḍ
yettawi-as-d ala leqriḥ
alammi i d-ufan iman-nsen beɛden ɣef wanda i teǧǧa sima takerrust-is
timuɣliwin-is rḥant-iyi

ulac anezgum
i tura ɛni nxus
ladɣa tamuɣli n medden ɣer teqcict
terriḍ yelli-s n medden d aqessar
taselmadt allaɣ-is wissen anda yewweḍ d wanda ires
s akken kecmeɣ
sliman u muḥ yettru
win d-yennan ḥader
d acu kan ulac tarewla i usiyeq
azekka-nni maziɣ mi yewweḍ ɣer tesdawit
rwel neɣ meǧǧed
takeṛṛust-a ẓẓayet aṭas

mmuten

asma ara temmet as-d-teǧǧ akk ayen tesɛa

tefka-yas-tt-id i maziɣ
Ɣas akken yedda d sima deg tkerrust
d ayen i yebɣa ad yexdem ɣer sdat
dɣa atan tufiḍ-d acu-t wa
yebɣa ad yesɛu azal-is deg tmetti
yugurten u muḥ ixezzeṛ ar tiziri tagawawt s reffu
ur tkeččmemt ara s axxam
lukan ad tesseqsiḍ yal yiwen deg-sen ad ak-d-yini
neɣ ahat tsetḥaḍ
ma yeɣli-d uḥewwes

teqqim-iyi-d teḥjurt
ilaq ad xedmeɣ aya ass-a
ur tmesxiremt ara

ur k-id-iṣaḥ ara wawal
s akken i d-yerfed aqerruy-is yaf-itt-id sdat-s

wama abrid sneɣ-t

ur yessembiwil ara ula d taḍadect-is

wellah ar acḥal ma steqsaɣ ɣur-s
d nekk i s-yennan i tom ad yexdem aya
imassanen am einstein ur ggiten ara
newwara d tameṭṭut iḥercen

werǧin yezdeɣ da
ur ttargu ara

s teqbaylit ara d-baneḍ gar tmura
Ččan timellalin tuftiyin armi qebren
tettaḍṣa aṭas newwara
sekcem awal-ik uffir
anwa i d abrid ay uḥric
sarameɣ fukken fell-awen iɣeblan
izga ibedd ɣur-s
tebɣiḍ ad teffɣeḍ
eǧǧ kan afus-ik ɣur-k win i iwehhan yewwet
tfukkem aselmed n teqbaylit
i yemma-tkent amek i tella
d acu i yeḍṛan dihin
fell-as i la tetzuxxuḍ akka
tekksemt-d cwiṭ n tẓuṛin zgelli
zzuzer-as sin yiɛqqayen n lmelḥ
d wigi i d isteqsiyen-nwen ineggura
d taberkukest tura wa neɣ d seksu
tḥemmel llebsa n yeqbayliyen
ur tezmiremt ara ad trefdemt wa
fell-asent i la tetzuxxuḍ akka
arrac uraren lwaḥid
d tmanya mazal ur d-teffiɣ ara seg tkuzint
tufiḍ iman-ik deg uxeddim amaynut
Ɛni d kemm ara ydebbṛen fell-asen
err spagiti-nni ar tseksut ad yeqqiṭṭer
d acu i kem-yewwin ɣur-sent
ur ttɛawazet ara
ar wass-a ur tefri gar-as d bu yiwtal
Ɛni d kemm ara ydebbṛen fell-as
d taqbaylit i ken-id-yefkan
tsellemt tikwal i uẓawan aklasiki
s teqbaylit ara d-baneɣ gar tmura
tfukkemt aselmed n teqbaylit
yerna tettezzi i s-yenna galili
ifecka umḍinen
tḥemmlemt ad teččemt ayen imellḥen mliḥ neɣ ala
tesɛam cwiṭ n waman deg tkeṛṛust-nwen
fell-as i la tetzuxxumt akka
ayɣer i teffreḍ fell-asent akk annect-a
di leɛnaya-k ur yi-ttaǧǧa ara da akked tom
tuɣ-itent meskint deg allaɣ
ttekksen-as leḥzen d lweḥc i as-yeǧǧa yiḍ asemmaḍ
ihi ur ttṛuẓu ara akk aqeṛṛu-k sya d afella
ayɣer i teggummamt ad d-tinimt tidet
tfukkeḍ aselmed n teqbaylit
susem deg leɛnaya-k la yeqqaṛ
i tura wa d imekli neɣ d imensi
aṭṭan n wul
d nettat i yesxeṛben kullec
yezga deg wul-nneɣ ukukru ɣas nessen
nnig lqahwa taberkant ur zmireɣ ad rnuɣ kra
am win yegren amcic deg ucekkaṛ
yessen ad ileqqem
lmed tutlayin nniḍen s tagi nneɣ
mi d-wwḍen
annect-a yark ilmend-im
tikkelt-a ulac akk tireɣla
yeswa tabuqalt n yiɣi iman-is
fell-i i la tetzuxxumt akka
d taqbaylit i kem-yerran d tamdant
xdem-asent akken i m-xedment
ayɣer i tesxeṛbemt tibḥirt-nsent
d ashewhew kan
Ɛni tettḥessisem-as i winna
tagara-a am wakken negrent tfiḍliwin
anta i k-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi
d kečč i yeẓṛan d acu i k-ilaqen
zwiremt seg teqbaylit-nkent
err-it d ameẓẓyan
muqlemt kan d acu i la iḍeṛṛun
susem deg leɛnaya-m la teqqaṛ
tin ur nečči ara seksu-yagi d tameɣbunt
yesseṛwa-as aɣrum s tament d wudi
ad ḥebsen deg tasaft neɣ deg iɣil n wammas
d ta i wumi tsemmamt tilelli
d awezɣi
ad k-yewwet usemmiḍ
ncemmeṛ iɣallen-nteɣ
d taqbaylit i d tudert-nsen
Ḍemεeɣ deg uεeṭṭar yettmetran
tebɣamt ad tkesbemt imelyaṛen
ad sisseɣ ayen akk nwiɣ
d lawan ad tuɣalem
teččiḍ ifelfel aqeṛḥan
ad d-tezim s axxam
usiɣ-d d wis xemsa u ɛecrin di lakul dɣa yewwet-iyi baba
yebra-yasen-d i waman
nuker-asent tikti-nsent
s teqbaylit ara yidir
ur inuda fell-aneɣ ur aɣ-yufi
rju mazal ur tt-friɣ d yiman-iw
ad tt-id-smesdeɣ
ad as-isel ilemẓi d umɣar
s teqbaylit ara idireɣ
deg wakken ɛyiɣ deg yiɣeblan-iw ur ttḥebbireɣ ara ɣef wiyaḍ
Ṭṭuqqtent fell-aɣ tlufa
rzant ar temnaḍt ur ssinent
anda melmi temyussanem
tettmeslay s teqbaylit
d taqbaylit i d tafat-iw
ay argaz a taɣaṭ
a win iɛebḏen imelyan
ttmeslayent s teqbaylit
amek i tt-tturaren
tetttqellibeḍ-iyi
tḥemmlem ad tecnum s teqbaylit
zedɣen metwal adrar
bɣan ad teǧǧuǧeg teqbaylit
err-d awal ay adrar
yettzuxxu s tutlayt taqbaylit
yeɣli-d ṭṭlam dɣa yerreẓ
ad issinent taqbaylit
iteddu iḍarren ḥafi
nettwali kan taqbaylit
nudaɣ fell-asent ufiɣ-tent
yura iḍrisen
tom yuzen-as i mary takarḍa n umulli
yewwi-t tom
anwa i k-yifen ay ifer n tzizwit
tafsut tenhel igenni yettusfeḍ seg usigna-nni aberkan
Ḥemmleɣ tutlayt taqbaylit
ahat yella win i t-yebɣan
yuki-d yemhem yigenni
tcemmṛeḍ iɣallen-im
tamurt tettenfal deg lxir arraw-is ur llin bxir
a tneggi tekfa
s teqbaylit i d-tekker
ad yili rebbi d mmi-s ara yebḍun tudert-is d yiwet am tihin
sliɣ i teɣri n yemma ferḥeɣ
yiwet ttnadiɣ fell-as yiwet tettnadi fell-i
yen neɣ yiwen deg leḥsab n yimaziɣen
yečča weɣyul tuga deg udaynin
ur bɣin ara ad d-slen
ad heḍṛent s teqbaylit
swiɣ ayefki s cikula deg uxxam n umdakkel-iw
d taqbaylit i d iseɣ-nsent
yerna cwiṭ yekri ɣef tikkelt
anwa deg-sen i iɛelmen
s tayri i tettmeslayeḍ taqbaylit
s tayri i ttmeslayent taqbaylit
yiwet n tikelt yeṭṭef-iyi dda remḍan mi s-d-ttakreɣ aḍil
s tayri i yettmeslay taqbaylit
tcennumt s teqbaylit
lɛaqel iɛqel
Ḍurren-k
ur lmideɣ ula d yiwet n lḥirfa
iwakken ur t-ntettu ara tuwi-d fell-aneɣ ad nɣer idlisen-is

ar tura ɣur-i yiwet kan

tzerrgeḍ-iyi
ur lliɣ d win n zik

suɣent
yeqqereṣ uḍellaɛ-ik
teεya deg ungal-nni
tesseṛɣeḍ-asent-ten
leɛmer i t-cukkeɣ d yir aṭṭan
ad nemyehḍeṛ
tudert-nni taḥnint n wul
uẓaɣ ɣer ukumisar n temsulta iban ur iyi-iwali ara
zegreɣ tawwurt n lemraḥ allen-iw ttqellibent kan ɣef teɣtest
isalli n tmettant n haǧer yusa-aɣ-d am tiyita yettunefkayen s tɣeffal
d tidet yeffeɣ-d libreoffice s teqbaylit
taqcict meẓẓiyen i aɣ-d-yefkan taṛwiḥt-is ad nɣeṛ ad nexdem ad nečč ad merreḥ ad nidir di talwit
ad t-budden ad t-εetqen
d amahil i d-yellan ddurt iɛeddan deg tnarit n tiddukla
akken teldi talelluct-is sliɣ i uskeεkeε n teṭsa
negra-d ur neẓri aniwa i d akud-nneɣ i d tallit-nneɣ i d tasuta-nneɣ
ad d-imudd ayen yezmer
d tagnit daɣen
ad regmeɣ uqbel iman-iw
tallit-agi aṭas n yimedyazen i d-yufraren am yusef uqasi  cix muhend ulḥusin si muḥend umḥend d wiyaḍ 
ass-a nmerreɣ deg usu
yessefk fell-asent daɣen ad d-afent tifrat i unbeddal n unezwi
s teqbaylit neqqaṛ daɣen sebt lḥed letniyen ttlata larbɛa lexmis lǧemɛa maca si taɛrabt i d-kkan
mmi-s n tnariwin d aseggad amaziɣ ala kem a tawizet i d-yeččuren tiṭ
amek i s-qqaren i umedyaz-nni analman i ssnen merra warrac uɣerbaz
ahat d taswiɛt-nni n usmekti akked tmuɣli ɣer deffir neɣ d tatut n tilawt d uckenṭeḍ di targit neɣ d tarewla ɣef kra
Ǧǧuǧgen yijeǧǧigen
ilaq ad yi-tɛawneḍ i wakken ad ten-id-nessukkes
anda ara iṛuḥ tasebḥit-a
ma d isem-iw yusef llan kra n yirumyen sawalen-iyi-d joseph
imezwura iban-asen ineggura iban-asen aḥlil a yilemmasen
aṭas n tyitwin i d-irra uɛessas n terbaɛt taxṣimt
cfiɣ mi telliḍ d taqcict kan tamecṭuḥt
wisen ma yebɣa ula d netta ad yemeslay d yid-i
tessneḍ ilugan n wurar n ddabex n uḍar
tettemyasamem gar-awen
isers-d iṣiḍ uqcic-a
yella kra i tt-id-iṣaḥen
kṛaḍ n wussan sakin tom yemmut
yesεa sin imcac
s tayri i theddṛeḍ taqbaylit
wissen anwa deg-sen i yeslan
mliɣ-as d acu ara yexdem
tebɣam ad teǧǧuǧeg teqbaylit
yebɣa tutlayt taqbaylit
ttuɣ ur k-id-steqsaɣ ara isem-ik
ad teqqim i lebda
tettnaɣeḍ ɣef teqbaylit
cennuɣ s teqbaylit
ad nettweḥḥid netḥeyyeṛ
ayɣer i iyi-d-tettakkeḍ afus n talalt
d lawan ad uɣalent
ad kecmen ar wexxam
amek i aɣ-d-yufa
Ɣeṛ mliḥ
iǧǧa aɣerbaz ddurt iεeddan
ikker wahruḥu di taddart
tuɣi-t tawla
Ḥedd ur yelli deg lemsaq
isers afus-is fell-as
llant meṛṛa da
d asif yettεeddin ɣef temdint
deg tefsut imɣan ǧǧuǧugen
lliɣ ttmenniɣ ad yi-d-sekneḍ amek ara xedmeɣ aya
drus i d-yeqqimen
imi yemdel
fkiɣ-ak tabɣest
deg uɣerbaz yeqqaṛ snat n tutlayin tafransist akked taqbaylit
ih bɣan ad kellxen i rebbi
Ɛeṛḍemt ur d-ttaḍṣamt ara
ceɣleɣ tura
jbed deg umrar-nni ameqqran nekk ad jebdeɣ deg ubesṭuḥ-nni
gerrzeɣ tanemmirt
Ɣiwel-d
cukkeɣ tɛerḍeḍ ad aɣ-d-teɣṛeḍ
aru akken iwata mačči d asxerbubec kan
Ɛmiruc at Ḥemmuda yemmut akked si lḥessaw di tama n busɛada
atan deg uɣbel
Ḥemmleɣ tamuɣli-nni s i tettmuqqul mary
kan akka nettqeṣṣiṛ ttṛuḥunt-d tiktiwin d tefyirin
d nniya meskin
deg yiman-ik tqebleḍ lḥemmam yettak-ik i wayeḍ am uqcic iruḥen i yimawlan
ttxil-k sefhem-iyi-d alaɣmu-agi
immut ɛecra iseggasen aya
aru ay imru ad d-nesnulfu asefru
ffeɣ
d aya kan i tebɣam
ansa-tent
anfem-iyi ad wen-d-sekneɣ yiwet n tɣawsa
gar ẓẓebra d ufḍis
ddegs n tsiɣtin iy iṛeqqen
Ḍebbreɣ aqerru-iw amek ara qeεεdeɣ nekk s yiman-iw kan akeṛṛus-iw
arut taspenyulit
d tiɣri n yemma i yi-erran d argaz
anebdu-a temneε tmurt i tmes n tẓegwa
anwa
Ṛwaḥ ar da
iɣil yečča iḥeckulen
faḍel ikemmel yettak ttiεad i layla deg tesdawit
giɣ tawlaft akked ukrar
anwa i ak-iseḥfaḍen tafṛansist
aṭas i yettaṭaf n wakud
tfehmeḍ ihi ssefhem wiyaḍ
amek i as-isema
ilaq ad yi-tɛawneḍ i wakken ad nsellek iman-nteɣ
igzem taslent-nni i yeẓẓa baba-s deg tmazirt ufella
ihih acḥal tecbeḥ teqcict-agi
axxam yuɣal-iyi d izem ufiɣ-as ddwa i lexla
iqqers uyeddid
imi d agfur iyyaw ihi ad neqqimet deg uxxam
as-d weḥd-k
isaxef
ass-en d ass n lḥedd igerrzen ɣef yiri n yill n baltik
izem yedderɣel iṛuḥ s tazla
aṭas n tsaɛtin-aya seg mi i ttṛajuɣ
bɣiɣ ad t-sswehmeɣ
iɣil d iɣil ad yaɣ iɣil s yiɣil deg yiɣil
Ḥbes ur qqaṛ ara
melmi ara tuɣaleḍ s axeddim
Ɛṛeḍ abrid-nnayeḍ
iɛedda lweqt armi d-faqeɣ dɣa ur sawḍeɣ ara ad waliɣ ifṛax-nni
bɣiɣ ad ak-d-fkeɣ yiwen n usteqsi ɣas ur yemɛin ara
ayɣer i tunfeḍ makken i t-id-temlaleḍ
ayaw ad tt-neƐreḍ
ilaq-as akebbuḍ
iḥemmel ad imuqqel f ṭṭaq
izga lebḥer gar-aneɣ
mazal ur ruḥen ara
ɛawen-iyi
amṛabeḍ ur iqqar ala
dinna neɣ dagi
iminsi ihegga iyya ad teččeḍ
anwa i yezwaren d axeddim-inek neɣ d tawacult-inek
ayen yexdem mačči akken
bɣiɣ kan ad ak-d-fkeɣ afus n tallalt
beṛka asmusses
ih tikwal
iga yakk amahil d tsestant
azul fell-awen a arrac
ineṭeq-d susemen akka wiyaḍ
bɣiɣ ad ẓreɣ ddunit
bezzaf ččuṛen yemdanen d cceṛ
amer d nekk ur as-ttaǧǧaɣ ara ad yesmesxer fell-i
anwa i d-yettaɣen ṣṣenf-a n tẓuṛi
han ɣef acu i k(m)-ḥemmleɣ
icennayen-a n unebdu fkan-as tiyita i ccna aqbayli
ili-kem d taḥeqqit
ay uccen Ɛass taɣaḍt
dayen ǧǧiɣ lbira
ičča d wuccen ittru d umeksa
aya bniɣ fell-as
anwa ara yi-mmlen anda ara afeɣ awalen n tezlit n newwaṛa
lliɣ ttneggizeɣ
d tajmilt i tmeṭṭut-agi id yefkan aṭas i tegrawla i iseblen tarwiḥt-is d cci-s ɣef tmurt
ihi yiwen wass ad dduɣ ad waliɣ lemqam n sidi udris
i uḍris-nni turiḍ-t
asteqsi i yuɛṛen d amek ara nṛuḥ ad nxelleṣ aya
anda i tezdeɣ setti-k
beṛka-kem aqeṣṣeṛ
amek ara d-tgelmeḍ iman-ik
layla tesla i lharaǧ
anef-iyi tṛankil
melmi ara ruḥen
txedmeḍ ccɣl-nni i ak-fkiɣ
isekcem takeṛṛust-is ar ugaṛaj d timendeffirt
Ɛeddi-d ticki ar uxxam
teĉĉiḍ iles-ik waqila
aseqqamu yesɛa ɛecṛa n iɛeggalen
ilaq ad as-tinimt tidet
rǧu aql-i-in
efk-d taɣect-ik i tussna ay aqbayli
kem d mummu n tiṭ-iw
ilaq ad yi-tɛawnemt bac ad tent-id-sellkeɣ
els abernus d asemmiḍ
leqḍeɣ-d acwari n uzemmur
llan waman
Ḥemmleɣ ta
d nekk i yerran tom ar umkan-is
amek ara nesbedd tasekla-nneɣ ma yella ur nessin acemma ɣef yimeskaren i as-yefkan udem
iḥbiben n lekdeb am tfirellas ttasen-d deg tsemhuyt yelhan akken ad ruḥen deg n diri
ihi ay atmaten ur yessefk ara ad nesxerbubec neɣ ad nesluɣuy tamda i wid yebɣan ad qedcen seg ul s wudem n tmusni s wudem ussnan
bɣiɣ yiwen ubiftik yewwan akken ilaq
ifka-yi-d adlis
anwa wa i d-ikkaten di tewwurt
ur d-nettas ara
aṭas-aya segmi lliɣ da
Ɛyiɣ g tira
d awal kan i yettmeslay wama tidet u tt-yessin ara
tṣubb aqerru-s
ccɣel uqbel ad as-tekkreḍ d izem mi t-txedmeḍ d awtul
imɣaren ttmettaten acku yiwen ur ten-iḥemmel
Ɣriɣ taqsiṭ-a deg yiwen udlis
awah mačči akken i k-d-nniɣ
ayen-nniḍen akk wicqa
d tidet ad yi-d-tceyyɛem taɛelǧett tajapunit
atan yeqqaṛ tura
anwa i tcukkeḍ yuker-ak taxṛiṭ-inek
ili-kem d kemmi
anita deg-sent i imelliḥen
iḥemmel lqahwa taberkant wama ayefki ikreh-ih
iban belli yeɣleḍ urgaz-nni
Ɣuccen anemhal-nsen
Ɛni d tidet ibeddel tom isem-is
iserdasen a d-nettneggizen seg teflukt
kkes akin fell-i ifassen-nni inek yerkan
Ɣuṛ-i yiwet n tikti maca ur ẓriɣ ara amek ara awen-tt-id-segziɣ
cedhaɣ tissit d temdukal-iw
aẓawan yelha
jbed iman-im
i yimddukal d wid yid-i bedden
fehmeɣ tanemmirt aṭas aṭas
azul tom tkecmeḍ yakan
daymi ur iruḥ ara ad iɣer deg tmurt taberranit
amussnaw urǧin yesƐa yir tikta neɣ ahat ad as-nini ur yebɣi ara ad yexdem ayen yelhan i tutlayt
ih ata ɣuṛ-sen
bḍan-aɣ wussan
Ḥader aqjun-nni yewεer
lliɣ ttmuquleɣ tafunast yettarran deg liffeẓ
ilaq-aɣ uɣella amaynut
iretta tuccar-is
ay itbir afeg ur ttrusu ara ɣef ufus n umdan
anda i tettili tuccḍa i ttilint temsirin
ur sεin ara s wacu ara rekben
ay a limer ad twaliḍ
ih azen-iyi-d tawlaft-ik
ittak rebbi irden i yir tuɣmas
Ḥemmleɣ imɣan
d lmerta
Ɛni tewεeṛ-ak teqbaylit i ulmad
i nettat d acu i tt-id-igren di tessirt
bɣiɣ ad uɣaleɣ ar teksawt
faṛeṣ ɣef yiman-im
isewway aksum
i kunemti d acu i kwen-t-id-igren di tessirt
llexseɣ seg ugeffur
arma d melmi ara teqqimeḍ deg japun
at-an ad k-d-fkeɣ avilu-a d asefk i umulli-inek
cḍeḥ cḍeḥ a ṭṭawes
aẓeṭṭa amettan s teqbaylit
ulac akk deg-k lefhama
leqbayel rran-ttkan i tmedyezt
azekka ad ruḥeɣ ad d-ẓreɣ yemma
Ɣur-wat ad tettum ayen akken i nehder
ayɣer dda lmulud yesseqdec awal aɣref
azul fell-ak
nḥemmel akk zzit n uzemmur
anda ara yili mmi-s n ɛemmi crif
ad as-teḍru am win ifuden yeswa
di leɛnaya-nkent ur yi-ttaǧǧamt ara da akked tom
amzun yesεuẓẓug umellaẓu
anwa i iɛelmen
Ḥemlaɣ i-tikelt tamzwarut
laqen-aɣ yidrimen
darwin yella yeqqar belli tamhezt n telmas d tin yettnernin
tbeddel fell-as ddunit
ddu d uḍar-ik a mmi-s n tmurt
isexlaɛ wudem-is mi ara d-tekker
Ḥfeḍ asefru-nni i ssmanan i d-iteddun
ffɣet-aɣ ay at ɛziz teɛṛeq yemma d yemmat-wen
kunwi mačči d iqjan
ibɣa ad aɣ-issufeɣ nnamus seg uxxam
amennuɣ s tsertit yeččur d ikeddiben nekkni nebɣa tidet
iččuṛ uqeṛṛuy-is d iɣeblan
ečč-iten azekka
rret akka
bɣiɣ ad ḥewwseɣ yid-k
assa ad d-yali yetri ara inewwṛen udmawen
ffeɣt-iyi
fehhmeɣ i tutlayt-ik
rret-d akka
lliɣ deg ufurgu
anwa-t win akken i ak-d-iheddṛen
ittḥukku iqellalen-is
d ayen i ssarameɣ
icaḍ
imdanen-a d irebraben
iselman di leɛnaya-k
cukkeɣ d lekdeb
Ḍsiɣ-d
yewweḍ-iyi-d yiwen n lexbar yessemlelli-yi
anaɣ d nutni i yebɣan
isem-iw amaziɣ
d acu i yezwaren d axeddim-nkent neɣ d tawacult-nkent
bren ɣer tama taẓelmaṭ
awi-d kilu n wudi akked urḍel n zlabiyya
ddreɣ akken bɣiɣ
yessefk fell-as ad iḥewwes win ara as-d-yafen amkan anda ara igen
tiwwura n tmussni
d ayen iɣer ur yettelḥaq
sliman u muḥ yella iḥemmel ad yexdem d tiziri tagawawt
mačči akka i tennum
yesɛedday amur ameqqran d yid-s
Ḥaca ma hedren yid-s ara yefhem
yal wa s anda yebɣa ad yaweḍ
anda i am-yehwa ɣer din
d lṭufan
fkan yisleɣmayen kra n yiwellihen i yemyurar-nsen
yugurten u muḥ itett drus ɣef tiziri tagawawt
tettban-as-d tesdawit wessiɛet
mačči ala nettat ara irefden ayen yeḍran
ur skiddibet ara
yesḥus s lḥaǧa d tamaynut deg lxeẓra n tlemẓit
yal yiwen d acu i ad ittserriḥ
ziɣen yella wayen yeffren deg-s
kra n tedyanin n zik
ur ttargumt ara
Ḥemmlen kan ayen ẓẓaren s wallen
iffeɣ lmal iman-is ad ikes
maca akken kan iɛedda lweqt
uɣaleɣ nnumeɣ-t
yexdem am nekk neɣ axir
tenna deg yiman-is
axxam yeččuṛ d lɣaci ulac win tebɣiḍ ay ul
shitrifeɣ
yerfa mliḥ yidir ass-a
yeqqar-as 
tesɛa axxam deg temdint
azul a sima
acimi i as-yenna akka yidir i newwara
teččiḍ imensi neɣ mazal
armi d-tameddit i neswa crab
a-t-an yeffeɣ-d ɣer tilawt
nekk ad iliɣ ɣef lɛacra d asawen
awal-a d win iceɣben akk medden
drusn uyefki i yellan deg ubuqal
deg useggas-is amenzu
d baba-s kan i d ddeb-is
ad ẓren anda ara rren
sima tebɣa ad tessuffeɣ maziɣ deg yir liḥala-nni
d kečč i yeẓran d acu i tebɣiḍ
ayen ara ak-d-iniɣ deg leɛmer yeffeɣ-d seg uqemmuc-iw
isawel yidir i newwara di tilifun
maziɣ yura-as awal-a mebla ma yenneḥtam
taqcic tetturar
yuba u muḥ ur yezmir ara ad d-isellek tiziri tagawawt
tḥemmel newwara timseḍṣa
iɣeblan n lwert
mebla lekteb neɣ adewwer
ur ten-izgil yiwen
yal ssenf yufa-t
fṛeḥ
ad ččeɣ abbaɣ-ik
aqel-in deg uxxam-iw
yal yiwen deg wacu i yenta
axenfuc n sami yella yeldi
yebḍa afus-is s ujenwi
ur sɛiɣ ara sebbaḍ
ayen akk tebna deg yiḍ
ur rbiḥen ula d yiwet n temilit
uɣalen-d ɣer tesdawit
yewwi-t anda ur t-yettaf ula d yiwen
anda ara rren tamuɣli-nsen
ayen yesɛan azal
sliman u muḥ ur yenɣi ara tiziri tagawawt
Ḥsen u muḥ yurar s tiziri tagawawt
tamazɣa zedɣen-tt imaziɣen
d acu-tt llebsa ara lsen
lukan yufi
neɣ ssarament-tt
anda-nniḍen ttruḥun medden ɣer yinurar i wakken ad steɛfun
ur sṭebṭubemt ara
maziɣ iger iman-is s wul-is
Ɣellint-d deg nndama
a-t-an ass-a ufiɣ-t ɣer ɣur-k
anda ara ḥewsen
Ǧeɛfer yeččur d iweṭṭen
ihewwes ar fransa deg yennayer iɛeddan
lliɣ d taḥurit
ur mniɛeɣ ara si ccḥani
kanada tezga-d ɣer tama ugafa n tmurt n marikan
a-t-an selkent
ttafent-d senzent iman-nsent s rrxa
teddem lqec-is
iwexxer-as acekkuḥ ɣer rrif
nerra-tt deg ṭṭerf
ala ulac fell-as
ufiɣ ɣur-k laman
iččur-d lbabur d iminigen
d tin i d-yezgan deg tlemmast n temdint
uɣalen heddren s wallen
sliman u muḥ yebda aḥukku d tiziri tagawawt
sliɣ tettɛawanem wid i ken-id-iqesden
yettwakkes-as wawal
thedder mebla tilas
kksen lxiq imawlan-is
ameḥbus yerwel si lḥebs
iqḍeε yiles-ik
ičča-t uqjun
gguman ad ḥessen i wayen i d-ttmeslayeɣ
cedhaɣ-kem
Ɣas tizmilin ussant-d s useḥnunef maɛna ad yeffeɣ kan useggas
iqerreb yeqqim akken ad kemmlen aqessar-nsen
yesḥus i yiman-is yesɛa azal
twalaḍ acḥal i yettergigi yidir ɣef newwara
ifka-yas unefray takarḍit tawraɣt i wakken ad icɛef
Ḥsen u muḥ yezzi allen-is ɣef tiziri tagawawt
ula d kečč ruḥ deg lehna
mazal ur terkid ara
ur sbehbayet ara
Ḥemmleɣ iberdan
sima tettḥessis i wayen d-yeqqar maziɣ s imeṭṭi
teḥsa mačči d leḥya
ur d-tusim ara
akken ad teṭṭef alamma d tameddit
ma ulac ur tettelḥaq ara ɣer uxeddim
acuɣer iqbayliyen bɣan ad lemden tutlayin n yihendiyen n temrikt
ur yettaǧa yiwet n tɣawsa ad t-tɛeddi
i uḥemmel
iban belli yeẓwer uɛessas n terbaɛt taxṣimt
deg leɛmer i as-teḍra akken
teḥbes-d sdat-is
nettat d win i as-izedɣen allaɣ-is
lmal yettwaqqan seg uḍaṛ argaz yettwaqqan seg iles
anwa i yeheggan i usuter
icebbayi rebbi wagi d amdakel n massa schmitt
yal win ara qqimeɣ
ahat akken ad as-tekkes ɣef wul-is neɣ tebɣa kan ad tẓer amek yettxemmim ɣef temsal-nniḍen
nnefs i d-yessuffuɣ maziɣ yetteslaf i wudem-is
atas i as-yennan
yennuɣna kan yidir ass-a
d aya iyi-iǧǧan a maziɣ ad xedmeɣ yid-k akka
lbaqi ad nẓer amek ara teffeɣ
awal am terṣast mi d-iffeɣ ur ittuɣal
kecmem-d
tzemreḍ i yi-d-tesɛeddiḍ tajilbant a sliman u muḥ
yak bxir i telliḍ
i wacu ara ileddi deg wallen-is d ucu i yewala
sliman u muḥ yekṛeh tiziri tagawawt
amennuɣ n yizem yiwen wass ma d amennuɣ n uydi yal ass
atay s llim ttxil-k
berka-k askeɛrer fell-aneɣ
walaɣ unuɣ n tɣellaft
iḥreṣ aṭas wurar
akken ifuk usqerdec akked jack munir yenna i tmeṭṭut-is seɛdiya jack yefka-yi-d tikti igerrzen aṭas
ccum-is mi ara s-yini yiwen xdem akka
ad as-nexdem tasleḍt i tedyanin yecban ta deg tmetti
amasal n teẓrigt
tugi-ten lmut
cukkeɣ tettnuddumemt
tugim ad terrem aḍar
tessetḥaḍ
ad aɣ-d-tawi lhemm
fehmeɣ-d tanemmirt s waṭas
Ǧǧiɣ-awen-d lehna
beṛka amuqqel
argaz-a ur ittnecraḥ ara
kellxen-as-d si ssuq
sliman u muḥ yettban yessen tiziri tagawawt
aṭas i ruɣ fell-as
zhu yettufaṛas
tessnem ad tessiɣem times
lqedd deg yigenni yuzzel tetteddu s tfenṭazit
ad tbin taḍsa s udem-im
ttnadiɣ fell-awen ufiɣ-ken
amek i tzemreḍ ad t-id-tiniḍ s tefṛansist
ibeckiḍen ggugmen
amek i d-awen-teḍṛa
d agama kan i d adlis deg nettaf agbur meqqren di yal asebter
tessedhuy mmi-s s tezlatin n zik
d agummu yettuḥeṛṛmen ay bnin ugar
anwa wa i ixedmen akka
iban belli nezmer ad nexdem aya
iṛuḥ inisi deg-s imensi
fehmeɣ-tt meɛna si tama-nniḍen ur nwiɣ ara tesɛa lḥeqq
lharaǧ-agi yesɛuẓug imeẓaɣ
ayen-nniḍen yal wa d ṛṛay-is
ffeɣ ar beṛṛa teqqimeḍ kra dinna
aql-aɣ am atmaten
Ḍefreɣ abrid n tlelli
anda ara ṛuḥent teqcicin-nni i mi cebbḥent akka
kemmi d tageldunt-inu
iḥettet akk ayen i d-yeggran
iṛuḥ-d
d bu uqlal isemnenni tiɣrifin icca-tent ɣef tikkelt
ass-a d azɣal
Ɛeslama-k a rrbeḥ
ečč-iten
ansi tzemreḍ ad d-tneggzeḍ seg leεli
ma drus i nesɛedda akken
anda i llan yiselsa-w
bbuṣaɣ seg wasmi i d-luleɣ
izan n uberbur
d cebbirdu i yeccan akk tiyuzaḍ-nneɣ
aql-iyi-n
ih sekkṛen ulamma d lεid leqbayel mačči i rebbi i ttεeyyiden
Ɣas ad yili kra yewεer i tigin yessefk d lewεara-nni-ines ara k-yeǧǧen ad t-tgeḍ
imawlan-nni semma-as i mmi-tsen akira
cedhaɣ ad ẓreɣ tamurt-iw
Ɛǧeb i yiman-im
di lezzayer internet tenfeε kan i usεeddi n lweqt
iserreḥ i taɣect-is slan-d akk at taddart

ma d win i d-tesεa yemma-s iruḥ yeǧǧa-t di leḥzen

ttesseḍ aṭas lqahwa

nessawaḍ di taggara

yella-d deg ttiɛad-agi adelsan
d acu i ken-id-yewwin ɣer da
Ččiɣ taḥbult ɣef sqef deg wass n sebɛa uɛecrin
imi taqbaylit mačči d awal
Ččiɣ tacakulat yesɛan sebɛin ɣef meyya n kakao
ilaq ad teǧǧeḍ ccemma-nni i ak-yerwin tuɣmas-ik
igen armi bezgent wallen-is
ur ttamen ṣṣaba alamma terwet
tella-d temsikent n tɣawsiwin timensayin n leqbayel
a tameṭṭut selmed i mmi-m
llan wid yebɣan ad sizedgen amawal n tutlayt-nneɣ
Ṛwaḥ a baba ad nurar lwaḥid
ldim tiwwura n tfergacin tilelli ad asen-d-tuɣal i yifrax
tedda-yas di nneqma
asfugel n yennayer deg faransa d tawaɣit
d acu ara t-id-yesneṭqen
ddayxa ala nettat kan i tesɛa yemma-s teḥmmel-itt nezzeh
isuma-tt-id lehlak
mi i izeggen wass ffɣen-d yinelmaden seg uɣerbaz
bɣiɣ ad urareɣ akked gma amecṭuḥ
anta yebɣan ad turar yid-i amrar
muqel kan lqut-nni ɣef lmelḥ
taqbaylit megreɣ-tt-id ɣer lejdud-iw
kra n tsadatin send tamettant-is yella mazal-it yedder
acku axxam-is ineggi
swiɣ yiwet n tebyirt yekkes-iyi fad
tira s teqbaylit mačči d askeɛrer
yelha win yessnen ad yecnu
tqerḥeḍ iman-ik baṭṭel
nettat turar-d snitra ma d netta yecna-d
yiwen ur d-yemmekta amulli-inu
d acennay yettidiren di tmurt n fransa i yettɣenin s tsaḥlit
ur ḥmmileɣ ara lmut
tamurt teččur d lxiṛ agdud yectaq talqimt
di sin igiman u yiwen mmuten meyya u tlatin iqbayliyen ɣef tugdut tutlayt yidles
anẓar yeǧhed mačči d izli
refdet ihi aqeṛṛu-nwen
yelha win yettxemmimen
iteddu deg ubrid yettkemmil deg wawal-is netta d yiman-is
d acu i yi-yewwin ad d-neṭqeɣ
yewwet-it armi i yettru
qedcen deg unnar n tesnujya
ur as-d-ssukkseɣ acemma
ufan iman-nsen
ur asen-smeḥsis ara
yugi-iyi baba ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer temda
tura-asen tabrat
heddren ad as-tiniḍ mačči gar tselmadt d unelmad
ur ṭṭamaɛet ara
berrikit am tirgin berriket am terget
win ijehlen ad d-yeɣli
izeggen yiḍ d lawan n yiḍes
yeswa almi yesker

wissen ma ad tt-nwali
yella wayen i xedmeɣ ur am-yeɛǧib ara
tiɛesbanin seksu d ufettet ssneɣ-asen ma d ayen nniḍen ulac
yettraju tiririt-is
asiǧǧew n yimrigen yella yettugdel
berka ur ttxemmim ara ayen yuran ad iɛeddi
rran-kent deg uɛewwiq
semmeḍ wučči
yeffeɣ ɣer lḥara
iɣrem aɣyul s teḍṣa
ur ttcekkir ara iman-im
glu-d yis-s
yemmal-d ayen ur yezmir uqemmuc ad t-yerfed
a win yeṭṭsen di tṛakna
sebɛa uṛebɛin abrid aɣelnaw lezzayer tamanaɣt
Ɣas rnu-d am tidak
lliɣ akken lliɣ yerna yehwa-iyi
ečč neɣ qqim ssuma yiwet
aseggas-a iswi n terbaεt yiwen si tlata n yimukan imezwura
i ubrid win i yeffɣen ur k-ittɣiḍ ma yegrareb
tarbaɛt tekkin deg-s mraw d yiwen n yimwuraren
mačči d urar
srid seg bamako
mazal llan widak i yekkaten ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
ad yelmed tutlayt taqbaylit s wul-is
anwa i k-yifen a mmi-s n umeṛkanti
mazal-ikem tuḍneḍ
teṭṭef nnuba deg tala lḥal d azɣal
yensa umeksa deg lexla
akka ad mmteɣ deg lehna
nwiɣ tefkiḍ-iyi kra n wazal
akken i y-iεǧeb wurar n volley i y-iεǧeb win n basket
gen di talwit a weltma at usliman nadya d awezɣi ad kem-nettu
ur iyi-d-temliḍ ara d acu ara xedmeɣ
ihlek-it wul-is mi yettwali tettali tutlayt taqbaylit
Ɣef yixef-iw ṣeεben lewqat
ad teslemdem tutlayt taqbaylit i warraw-inwen
tzemreḍ ad yi-d-tiniḍ amek
nḥemmel tutlayt-nneɣ yellan d taqbaylit
gen di talwit a gma gendud amar d awezɣi ad k-nettu
Ḥess i wul-ik qbel aεebbuḍ-ik
ur t-qriḍeɣ ara
ur kem-ẓriɣ ara mi d-tkecmeḍ
ad lemdent tutlayt taqbaylit s wul-nsent
teqqleḍ d aqcic
ur sεiɣ ara
- qqim kan a yemma wa ad am-yeḥkun i as-yerra wakli
xneq i layas
aserdun ur t-sεin
yugi weɣyul tuga
bru i sslaḥ-ik
tella tcebbeḥ-d maca ur tesεi ẓẓher
neḍsa merra-nteɣ
gen di talwit a gma agri ali d awezɣi ad k-nettu
wid ur nettamen s tilin n kra n yillu d arnaflasen
kecmeɣ ɣer temkerḍit ufiɣ-tt d tilemt
ma d cabḥa leqdic akk n uxxam ines
seg zik ḥemmleɣ ad sleɣ i tmucuha mi lliɣ d taqrurt
gen di talwit a gma riḥan mohamed d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ad d-tasem
wejdeɣ
ad yexsi deg ul ccwal
tettaǧǧa dima taxxamt-is d tazeddgant
yeṭṭef-itt d tazzla
zwina dehbiya heyyimt-d lqahwa i asent-tenna yemma-tsent
Ɛni tluɛaḍ
nndama ur telli
yuɣez amdun deg tebḥirt
tettbineḍ-d meẓẓiyeḍ acemma ulamek ara tiliḍ d aselmad
amek tebɣiḍ ad xellṣeɣ aya
iɣẓer iḥemmel-d am zik
seg wanta tawaɣit-a iseg d-tmenɛem
tutlayt taqbaylit tettali kra kra
Ččḥent tullas n lǧiran
atan akken kan i k-d-uzneɣ imayl
gen di talwit a gma aribi abdelkader d awezɣi ad k-nettu
wwin-aɣ waεraben azgen seg umenẓaw n tefriqt
xdem tislaḍ i idammen-ik
gen di talwit a gma mimun murad d awezɣi ad k-nettu
tenquqel tmurt
amkan ur t-yeǧǧi usekkin n “lfutuḥat”
ffɣen igerdan ad leεben deg berra
tuklalem ad wen-rnun deg lexlaṣ
qqim kra
nehder fell-as iḍelli
ttun ur sekkṛen tawwurt s tsarut
mačči d amrig
kra ur sen-d-yeqqim
mm tebbucin thuzz ammas
aseqqamu unnig n ṣṣehd abelkam
ur tekksent tyugiwin ur tekksent trigliwin
ma ɣas akken lamikkal n yizzayriyen di pari tesɛa idrimen s waṭas maca ur tessaweḍ ara ad teṛṛez amennuɣ n ugraw amaziɣ
suddseɣ imir imir uṭṭun-agi ilem kraḍ n tikal semmus ilem kraḍ n tikal kuẓ yiwen tẓa
acku aselḥu d uqeyyem ara xedmen waẓiyen imeqqranen
nadi deg usebter d-iteddun
armi yeqqel ula d agellid n tmurt yettasem si mmi n tasa-s
nekni ad nezgel tamacint
at-ah yemxudneq yixef-iw tameddit ad tett lḥal
xas akken negza timsal xas akken nessen ula d nekkni i wurar
akeyyef ittugdel di yakk iḥricen n tneččit
ula d yiwen seg at taddart ur yuder ɣur-s anagar nekk
tura nedda ar yiberdan ad as-tiniḍ nemsefham
acuɣer i as-tenwiḍ belli meqqṛet
tubiret d tamdint taqbaylit
aḍris-a zegleɣ-t ilindi
ad nekcem ar wexxam
yessefk fell-aɣ ad d-nemmeslay ɣef katia bengana
akken medlent wallen-nni i t-iwalan yeɣli deg urebbi-s
addal d lsas n tezmert
ad ḥnuccḍen deg udfel ma bɣan
s wakka i nezmer ad nẓer acḥal ara d-yalin seg wumuɣ n uraju
nebberttex ɣer temda n layas i aɣ-yeččan yennejla ula d iswi-nneɣ
ad kem-yexneq ɣef yidra-s
aɣbalu
merrɣeɣ am uqjun
xedmeɣ-d ticraḍ snat n tecraḍ
yal tiɣmert teffud lqaɛa
aɣbalu yeldin d tikti ara yeǧǧen imdanen ad sqedcen ifecka baṭel
teḥnuccḍem akken tufam
amaynut-a yeslal-d ayen i wumi qqaren asefru ilelli
acuɣeṛ ur tettnadiḍ ara ansa i ak-d-tekka tyita
tteḥnuccuḍ di zzit
anamek n usefru ilelli
a win ɣef yeshel walluy ḥader iman-ik di trusi
ddan acḥal deg yiberdan ulin acḥal d tiɣalin
nekkni d azref d isekkim gar imeqranen ad neqqim nekkni d tifrat d umtawi

d lawan n lmakla
d abrid ɣer tesdawit
d netta i d axṣim-iw
ur ttkeyyif ara
ur tezmreḍ ara ad tḥemmleḍ

la ssizdigen taftist
ad tesseqsi fell-as
yeɛni d nekk i yebɣan ad qqimeɣ yid-s
awi-d kan as-d-kksen lixsas
siwa yiwet n temlilit n uheggi i texser terbaɛt n mmi
acu ara tebɣuḍ

ur ak-id-ufiɣ ara

ulac tuffɣa ad as-tiniḍ d ahajer ihujren
yufa-tt akken i tt-yebɣa wul
ayen nniḍen akk ur yesɛi ara azal
d acu i tebɣiḍ ɣur-i

s umata tallit-is tettɛeddi di liser bexlaf
am tawkilt tessen ad teggw aɣrum
aya s uttiki n tmura yennuflin
ttalasen deg-s akk leǧnas
medden si tteqdim n zzman ttemɛawanen di ddunit-nsen
icfa ɣef ubrif ar beṛṛa
teḍḍal-d fell-asen ruẓa deg ugzedu n tmaziɣt terra iman-is ur ten-twala ara dɣa reẓqi yeffer ddaw n ṭtabla n tmekerḍit
seqdec face id akken ad tserḥeḍ i usnas
nadi deg usebter
d iheṛcawanen d aḥercawan d ḥercaw d iḥercawen
ferneɣ ad mmteɣ gar yedlisen-iw
akabar n yilemẓiyen imagdayen
ay abrid i aɣ-icfan
isem ad id-ttwasknen
ansi i d-squccḍeḍ i d-zedmeɣ
imi nekk d ilemẓi i lliɣ u iɣweblan-iw mačči d wid n tṛad
nekkni d aɣref n tlelli nekkni d tafat i tmuɣli nekkni d times d wuzzal
imezdaten
amẓabi-nni i s-iwwin tameṭṭut is
bu sɛaya ɛeṛḍen-t ɣer wučči igellil ɣer twizi
bac akken ad yeqbel
ttidiren yimezdaɣ-is iseggasen-agi ineggura deg ukukru d tugdi ladɣa deg tallit n ccetwa
tasekkurt s warraw-is
ad tt-mmagreɣ am userdas-nni yeɣlin deg wannar n yiseɣ
imi tewweḍ γer uxxam n tteryel testeqsa-tt-id
d acu i yeẓra
azul a mmi  ass-a ad ak-nezyen
acḥal teddal ulawen semmḍen s lḥamu-s
yeɣli-d fell-aɣ nadam
am tara deg-neɣ yecbek
yuẓam awal yeggugem
sṣenṭaqen-d imeslab am akken i d-sṣenṭaqen tibratin ihi acuɣer ara ggugmen wanẓaden 
asihar n zzayer n uzekka
ur yeqqaṛ azul arama tennid-as-t kečč
ur ǧǧiɣ tasga

tilawin di taddart
Ɛni tεeqdeḍ-t fell-i akken ad yi-d-tḥesbeḍ
timeḥremt n leḥrir
newweḍ-d ar teswiɛt anida uccen yettɛassa ɣef texsi s yisem n usaḍuf
maca acimi tugdi n ccbaḥa n tlelli ntmeṭṭut d wayen i d-yexleq ugama 
dda lwennas ɣas akken ur yeɣri ara acu kan igezzu timsal imir imir
am yal tameddit ad d-nezzi i yiri n lkanun ad nsel i tmacahut

ifudiyen

ugadeɣ aṭas
yiwen di meyya deg umkan wis tmanya
aɣṛum aɣṛum ad yečč uɛebbuḍ amcum
annar akka i yettwarwat ma d akal wi bɣun yaɣ-it

lweqt d amuḍin
i lemmer ad tt-erreɣ kan i yiḍes

i warrac akk n tmurt-iw
acku ur ttidirent ara di twennaḍt anida timsal cuddent kan ar tineslemt

sekles tugna
ad idiren akken jmiɛ beɛden ɣef lmeḥna d wurfan
amer wid i aɣ-d-isellen

agwni tmim

ibuṛasen

yenna-yas ih
ad awen- t-id-yawi

taɣrast
ad tini wagi d laman

nnger ass-a ad s-nettḥulfu
agraw amaziɣ seg ass-n mi i d-yennulfa yuɣal d taqeṛṛabt n umennuɣ ɣef yidles akk tutlayt n yimaziɣen deg teɣremt n pari

sbeɛdemt anda i kent-yehwa

ilmaten
ttemlilin di tejmaɛit
iseggasen n tafat
ur teǧǧi tayri ur teǧǧi ssuq ur teǧǧi iḥulfan ur teǧǧi aṣurdi
s idis-is s azelmaḍ
deg tama tazelmaḍt n tesga lkanun urɛad yexsi si tsebḥit
ur yezmir ara ad yali tazemmurt
as-yini ala ma tebɣid
aḍman n lɛula mačči d ayen fessusen
