umlil
ass-a yella gar-aneɣ yiwen wugur
Ḥemmleɣ aṭas ad sleɣ i tmucuha
argaz yesla tameṭṭut tedla
netta ur izgil ara tamacint
yefka i yirgazen ayen yellan ɣur-s
gar-asent tamezwarut-nni n mass musa imarazen
akka kečč d usemmiḍ d amennuɣ alamma yuli wass
ur ččiɣ seksu ur seqqaɣ s lexliɛ
turew-d tayaziḍt
ur tewwim ara amḍiq-nken
ad k-ceyɛeɣ ruḥ s leɛjel
yiwen n umalu
kkreɣ ad d-cnuɣ taɣect-nni n mengellat "rğiɣ i turğa teryel"
nekk zegleɣ tamacint
ass-agi tanemmirt i nutni imi amennuɣ yewweḍ ar uzgen ameqqran deg iswi i yefka i yiman-is
yerra-as-d ur ttaggad a Ḥlima azekka ad n-aseɣ ad sutreɣ zwaǧ ar baba-m ad d-awiɣ imawlan-iw yiwen ur isel tseqsiḍt teẓriḍ ḥemmleɣ-kem
yemlal-d yiwen seg imeddukal-is di numidya
armi i d-izger
ay ul-iw gezment temqestin tura yegra-d yebḍa ɣef sin
nettan yezgel tamacint
aql-ak tettedduḍ ad teffɣeḍ si firefox ios
bu εeddis yeṭṭalay deg ugama ttazzalen idamen-is
ṣṣenf amenzu
uleḥlu yenna ɣef lwennas at mengellat afiluẓuf-nneɣ yeɛya yuɣal yettseṛfiq-asen
azekka ad n-iliɣ din-a di taddart
neqqar-as kan neẓra ulac win ara tezgel
akken i tettleɣway i yettferfir yid-s wul-iw
d acu i d anamek n wayeḍ
akal amenzu i walaɣ di tmurt
i zeggwaɣit tcenfirin-is
ay itri igenwan mmel-iyi-d amkan anda tettilli
d abudali ma tebɣam neɣ akken i awen-ihwa get-as isem
lmut tezga yid-neɣ ur ilaq ara ad tt-naggad
miyya igṛamen n lḥmeẓ
d asteqsi ɣef wamek i ibeqqu ad yuɣal umdan d wayeḍ (mačči d netta)
aseqqamu aɣelnaw n yizerfan n umdan
ddiɣ d gma
yečča yerna yeswa
nekk welleh ar s nniya-w i yuzzleɣ ɣur-s ad t-id-sellkeɣ
seqdec-it d iminig uslig
ahil yettwahegga yettkemmil
afud igerzen i kra n wid d tid iqeddcen seg ul
yenɣa tamgerḍt
tḥemmel-it seg wasmi tella d tabesṭuḥt
maca gar lebɣi d wayen yessaram akked tidet yettnadi
teṭṭef-as afus i yugurten tetteddu yid-s deg ubrid krim belqasem di tizi dɣa yeḍḍal-d baba-s
yeẓẓul fell-as deg iɣeẓran
kra wass ad awent- id-yawi
nutenti ad zeglent tamacint
m leḥnak n sisnu
tudert teqqel d tamettant
iwala-ten
aqwiṛ
ur zmireɣ ara ad s-fkeɣ lḥeqq i dda qiqi i ikerhen tulawin
amek teḥsam ad teddu teqbaylit ma yella ur tekcim ara ar umaḍal umḍin
ma d leḥsab n wid ur t-d-newwi ara yewweḍ ɣer teltmiyya u sebɛa uɛecrin n yinelmaden
seg wayen yecna maɛtub lwennas ay izem ifenanen tagrawla-nneɣ aqlaɣ ay a lferh-iwleḥbab-iw
tirni tazzayrit i tneflit d tlelli d teɣdemt
seg wass-n mi ḥebsent tefranin neɣ ahat uqbel
ad dduɣ d temdakelt-iw azekka
dɣa tečča-yi-d s wallen am d nekk kmumseɣ ar tama-s
ttruḥun yal ass ar lexla
later-nsen yegra-d ɣur-i
tazrut gezlan
illa uzeddam ɣur-s sin warraw is ma d aẓeddam ulac
d imelyaren i ččan deg yiseggasen n zuǧ alaf segmi i d-yusa butefliqa
taḥbult n tatut d tiɣwist n win ittwaqerḥen sdat tmara
tiɣilt uḥemza
iruḥ d tazzla ɣer wasif userdun akken ad as-tt-yerr
iɣill d netta i d aɛessas
ma tufiḍ sin εedlen ḥṣu ttεebga tmal ɣer yiwen
acku yemmeslay-d ɣef yiziɣer n umdan yettwanɣan
zerbeɣ ar tferka akken ad ẓerbeɣ ayla-w
teẓṛa i ḥemmel-itt wul-iw ur tezmir ad testeqsi
agraw n yidles d tugdut tirni n yiɣallen inemlayen
akken akk i d-kkren warrac di tallit-nni
acḥal tura
akabar n yimekdiyen i uɣlan
wa ččan-t wa swan-t
akken iwala lǧuheṛ tawasift argaz ɣlin-d wuglan-is
i zgiɣ zlazeɣ ɣef tikli n wakud ibeṭṭun tasa d wayen turew
wali ar tedmarin-is
akken kan ad as-yebru mmi-s
taqcict akken kan i d-tewweḍ ad tmudd i tmetti
ldiɣ tin i izemmen
ɣeḍlen-tt yiɛdawen n tudert
ɣer tagara n temlilit-agi
astan n tmetti d usili n lxedma
Ɣef cwiṭ n tewlafin-a ur ilaq ara lḥerṣ am wa uma nekk aql-i gar yimeddukal lemmer ad d-txedmeḍ am nekk ahat ad neskasi akken iwata lḥal imi k-qerḥen waktayen ahat ur tesɛiḍ ara widen yelhan 
netta ad izgel tamacint
ul-iw leεtab-is yufat
am yiḍ am ass ad ttemsetbaɛent
ad tawimt abrid-nwent
kunwi ur tezgilem ara tamacint
kan akka ukiɣ d yiman-iw am win ihuzzen axxam
sfeḍ inagan n tuqqna akked umazray n tunigin d unadi
win iruḥen ad t-nɣen wurfan
ansi i s-tekkiḍ i lqelɛa d asawen
dda qiqi di tannumi yezga yessaḥab tabeḥlust-is
aya i tent-yettarran d tushilin
cedheɣ-kem a tin ḥemmleɣ
lebɣi yella tazmert teǧǧa-t
yugi wul ad iyi-ihenni yebɣa ad s-ihdeṛ ɣef zwağ-is
i yettwassnen a bu tqerruyt
iγil umencar
bɣant d ttar ad-terrent deg twacult-is
axxam d axxam-iw
isemma-as bab-is taḥbult n tatut
deg rebɛa yunyu zuǧ alaf u ɛecṛa aselway ferḥat mhenni yesbedd anabaḍ aqbayli uɛḍil
ula d uxeldun yebder-iten-id yura fell-asen
mi twala aqcic-nni bu teclaɣmin tarqaqanin d wallen tizṛaṛaqin dɣa ul-is yeddeqdiq seg tayri
di lkaṛ n at yeḥya musa i yewala taqcict i d-yexḍeb
dɣa twala-yi-d akken kan i d-ukiɣ seg ussu
ama s tezrawin n unadi neɣ s tselḍin n yimussnawen n tmedyazt
yiwen uqjun
i yeẓran ala win yewwten akked win yeččan tiyita
kkert ar tejmaɛt ad ttrebḥeem
nekkni nessaweḍ-d tallit n sliman Ɛazem i yefkan awal i yiɣersiwen
ad d-yader ayen yellan seddaw ubagus ma d nekk zerbeɣ cwiṭ
tṛuḥ seg umkan i yella ɛemmi-s
acḥal ẓid-it i usuden
dda lmulud at mɛemmer d amyaru d amdan yefkan azal ameqqran i yidles d tutlayt n tmaziɣt d netta d amezwaru i yeslemden tamaziɣt di tseddawit n zzayer
sliman Ɛazem yemmut berra n tmurt-is d twacult-is n tmurt ass n tmenya u ɛecrin yennayer alef u tteɛmiyya u tlata u tmanyin
yejreḥ yiman terna tasa
tesɛa-d taqcict tsemma-yas Čabḥa n at ubetṛun
usiɣ-d ad qeṣṣreɣ cwiṭ d yemɣaren-ayi n twaɣit
d wayen i ɣef i yi-weṣṣa ass-n
wid iceffun i tlufa
ur tett ara ayen n dir
akka si zik si zik akka si zzman n zik seg wasmi heddren iɣersiwen
ticki neḥka-d ass-a taqsiḍt n tmenɣiwt n katia i yilmeẓyen
sliman Ɛazem d amedyaz anaẓur d ameskar d acennay aqbayli ilul ass n seɛṭac ctember alef u tteɛmiyya u tmeṭac di taddart agni geɣran di tama n iwaḍiyen
ur tewwim ara amḍiq-nwen
ad teččem abuchiḍ
yeqqim deg uxxam
yenna-d meṛṛa ayen yessen
llan widen i yebɣan timecḍin ur ten-njerreḥ ara mačči am widen i tent-yugin
tutlayin akk kifkif-itent
yufa tayri-nniḍen tayri n tutlayt d idles amaziɣ 
bucaciw
amcṛas d iwaḍiyen
ul yekwa tazmert tekfa
ttwaregmen imeɣnasen ass-a
maca terna-d daɣen tabɣest i wid yesseḥbibiren ɣef tmurt n zzayer ɣef izerfan
axxam-agi sneɣ-t segmi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ
semεun
tɛeddan ɣef teqcic n sbeɛṭac n yiseggasen 
tiqcicin n taddart ama d tid yeɣɣaṛen di tesnawiyin tisdawiyin
yessefk daɣ ad sɛun taɣlent tazzayrit yernu ad sɛun aswir asdawan
nutenti ur zgilent ara tamacint
ad d-tḍil tafat-iw
ar ass-a mazal tugna n wussan-nni deg wallaɣ-iw
leεyaḍ yellan ɣef uccen rran-t-id af uyaẓid
ur tufiḍ win ara yeslen yis-sen
iselmaden yuɣalen d imaswaḍen yella yiwen deg uɣerbaz amezwaru wagi d mass Ɛli bufruc
di tegnit-a tuḥzint i d-yerzan ur nebni fell-as
ma d win i tt-iwalan ɣas lukan yiwet n tikkelt ad d-ɣlin iwerrafen-is
deg ussan i d iteddun ad awen-d-nernu tayeḍ sɣur mass yazid bulma
d urḍan-is i yegan akka ay akka d rriḥa i d-ttaken
argaz d targa tamettut d tamda
Ɣef wammud n yisefra n mexluf n at qasi u sɛid
ečč a lḥaǧ ass-a azekka d asfaḍ n yimi
Ɣur-k ad tḍefṛeḍ abrid-nniḍen nsemma-k d aselmad n tusnkat
ula d annect-nni n ɛeyyu ur yezmir ara ad as-tent-yeqqen
am uɣerda n lexla llaẓ d usemmiḍ
d aɣbalu i win yebɣan ccbaḥa n wawal akked telqayt n umeslay
azger ur ireggel ara ɣef yicc-is
akabar n tafrara tamaynut
amek i as-qqaṛen i nanna-k
i dda ṣɛid at mɛemmeṛ akli buṛennan dda muḥend wakli Ḥmiṭuc aɛli akked caɛban abelqas
ilaq ur yettnal akal
saɛid seɛdi d aduktur n yiderwicen yenna-as ucennay uleḥlu Ṭbib n yimexlan yemxel neɣ seččen-as iḥeckulen
tesɛiḍ aɣbalu n tudert mačči d lḥerma n taddart gar yiḍarren-im
iqqim-d ɣer tama-w
ikrez-itt uzger yečča-tt uɣyul
sneṭqen-d aɛeqqa uzemmur sneṭqen-d iɣersiwen sneṭqen-d amdan ameɛdur sneṭqen-d win iselben sneṭqen-d medden leḍyur
d ameqqran n yimeqqranen
ula wi yewwten agejdur s uqerdac
d ukebbuḍ-iw
ma d lεebd yellan d aḥrur
a yemma deg wesfillet ḥbes
wid yeɣran llif el ba
ulac win yettawin učči ar umeẓẓuɣ medden akk ttawin-t ar yimi
atan ar ad tettwaliḍ mačči drus n twuɣa i aɣ-iccan aksum d yiɣsan
amzun kra yellan d ahuski yelha
am win yeččḥen di tebburt n ssuq
dayi iwehha s uṭad-is ɣer kra n teḥdayin εeddant zdat-neɣ
ɣilleɣ d lxir i s-xedemeɣ
neḥsel gar-asen
argaz ikerrez tameṭṭut tḥerrez
acku amdan akken i isseḥluy lejruḥ i yettili d yir ṣṣbuḥ
armi i d-yufa tifrat i wugur
ad ten-yessenger dda qiqi
dda lmulud ilul ass tmenya u ɛecrin duǧember alef u ttɛemya u sbaɛṭac di tewrirt mimun deg at yanni
muḥend u yaḥya
Ɣef tuyat yeɣli-d umzur-is
win ur lemmed si tuccḍiwin yezrin
assa ur nekfi ara abrid s tikli mi aɣ-yefka yinijjel i yifri
agellid yenna-yas deg awal-is  a tagelliḍt ur umineɣ s tgeldunt d ugeldun
ala netta i yellan ɣur-s
argaz d tiqqit tamttut d tabaqit
ar tama-nniḍen n lkanun wallaɣ-tt tesfeḍ allen-is s yijufar-is
tetteɣiḍ tejra n lim mi isɛawden ttelqim teḥced tuɣal d isɣaren
maca nekcem di tmuɣnest
ass-a ad-neqqim kan di tidet
ad uɣaleɣ d agellid ɣef tegduda n bururu s teɣratin n tulawin
ferḥat at said mmusan ferhat mehenni neɣ ferhat imazighen imula d aqerru n umussu n timanit n tmurt n leqbayel
ad yettu uḍebbal ahuzzu n tuyat
yeṭṭef-itt-id qasi waɛli zdat-s yiwen ufus ɣef wayet tayeḍ deffir n temgerḍt iẓmeḍ-itt-id ar yidmaren-is yenna-yas Ḥemmleɣ-kem a faḍma lḥusin
n wid-n txennqem s umrar
nettru ɣef lweqt i aɣ-yeǧǧan
ikutamen d imaziɣen n skikda mila qul akked temnaḍin i asent-id-yezzin
taɣerdayt d tamdint n yimẓabiyen i d-yezgan deg unẓul alemmas n zzayer
aɣlif n ṣṣehd
azal n sin neɣ tlata n yiseggasen aya ɣer deffir i tura adlis-a
tikelt-a timlilit tella-d deg tzeqqa n uɣerbaz alemmas "qasi usmaɛil" n at wasif mačči deg temkarḍit n tɣiwant am wakken i nennum
tabaṣkit d tutlayt i ttmeslayen imezdaɣ n temnaḍt n bask gar spanya d fṛansa
iḥemmel-itt wul ɣas tettu-t iḥemmel-itt aṭas
rewlent zik iḍelli
Ṭbib n yimexlal yemxel neɣ seččen-as iḥeckulen
nettan izgel tamacint
ad teḥnucceḍ deg udfel
batent d tamdint n yicawiyen i d-yezgan deg yiɣil ufella n zzayer
ineffusen d imaziɣen izedɣen adra n neffusa deg libya
azul i wid yemmuten ɣef nnif d tlelli d asfel
win iɛerḍen tament ur yesseqneɛ
tala umalu
limer i tent-iḥesseb ufellaḥ ur tent-ikerrez ara
tetteḥnuccuḍemt di zzit
tetteddu di ddiq d uxessu
yeɣra deg uɣerbaz aɣelnaw n tsenselkimt sakin yedda ar franṣa anida ihegga tazrawt n duktura
lḥiɣ s temɣawla deg tlemmast n yixxamen ijdiden yeṭṭsen deg tsusmi d ṭṭlam
yezga yessawal i yicennayen iqbayliyen akken ad cnun ɣef timmuzɣa
d ass-a i d ass n tlelli d ass ideg aɣlan aqbayli yufrar-d ger tmura
caɛban n uqasi
nettmerriɣ azekka deg ufrag
ad yesbedd iɣerban d lḥara
ay icenga wexxeṛt aḍaṛ
iγli wass yuli-d yiḍ
rrus d tamurt i d-yezgan gar sin n yimenẓawen turuft akked asya
ad tawim abrid-nwen
ur yeḥnucceḍ ara makken yekkat ugris
ay acḥal yeččuṛ uḍaṛ n teslit-agi
yuɣal d akli
aṭas deg-sen daɣen inɣan u i d-eǧǧan d igujilen d tuǧal
hemleɣ cṛab
tteḥnuccuḍemt di zzit
bijjweɣ 
armad n uɣewwaṛ-agi izmer ad yeglu s kra n wuguren di kra n yisebtar
acimi ulac anagraw n wammud s teqbaylit
ittwaseqdec i welqqaḍ  aslaḍ d uktili n wamud am usekcem n isekillen akked usenned
adrim kan ur tehbis texriḍt ur teḥetteb d ras lmal
iḍegger-it-id am uqjun
kemm tzegleḍ tamacint
iǧa-t din
ungal anza yura-t fahim meɛudan
ussan iɛeddan tella d taqcict am yakk tiqcicin tefreḥ taḍsa tezga deg yimi-s
netta d nettat d iɛeggunen
ur tewwimt ara amḍiq-nkent
kamal buɛmaṛa yella zik d aselway n usqamu ussnan n tesga n tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt n tesdawit n bgayet
asmi yella d acawrar yeqqar di llakul ccix-is ula d netta iɣil-it yebbuhel
jemmɛet iqjan-nwen xaṛsum ɛellet-asen snasel
afiluẓuf yeṛṛunda yuɣal yettseṛfiq-asen
nekkni d tamurt d igenni nekkni d agur d tziri nekkni d iseɣ d wazal
sidi Ɛic d tamnaḍt i d-yezgan deg waɣir n bgayet
paris d tamanaxt n frans i d-yezgan deg umenẓaw n turuft
nekk d kemm ara yessalin axxam
ufiɣ tizya-w tettkeyyif tiḥdayin di rrif arrac deg uzniq la ttqessiṛen
teḥnuccḍemt akken tufamt
tettawim aɣyul-nken
acḥal daɣen n tṛumyin i sseglalzeɣ di paris
taḥbulut ur tebḍa aqjun yečča lmal yeksa tamɣart ur tris
ass-a d tameɣra n lbaz d temtilt-is
eg deg-sent ayen i k-yellan deg wul d wallaɣ
tuget n wučči ar leqbayel zik yebna ɣef iniɣman zit uzemmur timẓin irden lbecna ajilban abelluḍ
ini-yi tidet yiwen was ɣas skiddib ar temteḍ
agerwaw
win iḥnuccḍen deg ubrid
tettmerriɣemt ilindi
s leḥzen d ameqqran i yi-d-yewweḍ lexber n tmettant n temdakelt-nneɣ dihya lwiz
tizi wezzu d tamanaxt n Ǧerǧeṛ
xas ma tikwal nγelliurǧin neḥbes tiklinessawaḍ di taggara
yiwet n tikkelt issuter-as yiwen umsebrid ad t-yessens
ad yeḥnucceḍ deg udfel
lukan teɣra teqcict tili truḥ
icenwiyen ttmeslayen tacenwit tutlayt-nsen tettemcabi ar teqbaylit
abrid-is ar yilel
tarwiḥt a-tt-a di cedda-s sseɛd yugi ad inaqel
ad d-yas wass ideg ara tissin Ḥayat taqbaylit
yeḥnucceḍ di Ǧerǧer
ur merrɣen ara deg annar n userwet
ay ifassen ur kkatet ṭṭbel ay timeccacin ur kkatemt zzedwa
ad tmerrɣeḍ di leḥcic
walit anida ara wwten nekni ur nennum ara ddel
aniɣer a bubriḍt ar tmurt n ugawa
awi-d afus-ik ad ak-neqqen lḥenni keččini a yisli ṛebbi ad k-ihenni
d acu i d aɣ-d-ssegra tedyant n katia bengana
tamedyazt neɣ tamedyezt
tilufa icudden ɣer rrebrab
acu ur fhimeɣ ara ma yella win ara aq-t-id-isfehmen
flan meṛṛa
yettnadi kan ad isewweq ɣef selfa
gar wayen yelhan di tudert d cwiṭ n tseddarit
Ḥnuccḍen iḍelli di taddart
mačči d aḥebbaṛ d yineẓman i t-iceɣben
Ḥnucceḍ iḍelli di taddart
am aakken i d-yenna ben  yiwwas ad yerwi uqerru seg yimeẓẓuɣen ad yini abbuuuh 
deg ddunit ad d-naf amdiq anida medden walan
ur newwi ara amḍiq-nneɣ
ini-as i m leɛyun Ṭawes balak ad tayes aql-iyi-n deg wussan-a dayen tura tekfa lɣerba-s
asefru n ben muḥemmed "tecnam" tecna-t newwara deg yiwen seg iḍebsiyen-is
ssusem ay ul-iw i d-yettmektin
ttmerriɣen ass-a
abazin arkul tabsist tirkimt d učči aqbuṛ di tmurt n yiqbayliyen
win ara yeḥnuccḍen deg wakal
ass-a d tameɣra n lbaz bu timmi
ttmerriɣeɣ deg usu
Ɣezzif webrid wezzil ubrid
imezdaɣ n tegzirt n jeṛba di tunes qqaṛen-asen ijeṛbiyen
ur merrɣeɣ ara iḍelli
s ttɛebga d win tt-irekben ur yebni ɣef taḍuṭ yeswan
ad ninig tuffɣa uberiq nzad ad neǧǧ amkan
ur teḥnuccḍemt ara makken yekkat ugris
zemreɣ ad ak-slemdeɣ amek ara taruḍ
yenwa ad izger s laman yuzzel yengez ɣer waman
ula d arraz n temlilit ad yili daɣen d imezdi
amedyaz-a d win yesɛan tuget n yiseraf d ilelliyen yeffɣen ɣef leqwaleb imensayen icudden ɣer talɣa
ur nmerreɣ ara aseggas-a
iswi-nneɣ ad nessaweḍ ad d-nemmel acu akk n yilelli i d-ikecmen tamedyazt taqbaylit
imi d taḍuṭ i iɛebba wayeḍ idda kan s leɛqel
uccayen ad gezzren di medden ayen ara ǧǧen irebraben ad t-kemmlen
win yeɣɣazen lsas iṣṣeḥa
ad ruḥeɣ akin i tagut
tafunast tettezzeɛ izan s tseṭṭa-s
zemreɣ ad m-slemdeɣ amek ara tecnuḍ
iluxert llan d icawraren icawraren ad uɣalen d iluxert annect bɣun kken-t
ur netteḥnuccuḍ ara makken yekkat ugris
tafriqt neɣ taferka tamrikt n unẓul tamrikt n ugafa turuft asya ustṛalya d imenẓawen n umaḍal
mi ixulef abrid yeğğa-t di lkaf yewḥel uḍar-is
tmerrɣemt deg uɣebbaṛ
akken ad aɣ-d-iban umaynut i d-yewwi deg yiferdisen yerzan talɣa lebni n tseddarttameɣrut akat
cerweɣ-tt merriɣet akken ad rreɣ tikerkas d ṭṭlam deg idis
tettmerriɣem iḍelli
amedyaz ur yeṭṭafar ara nḍamat n usefru amensay d utrar deg isefra-nsen
win ara iḥnuccḍen deg wakal
llan mraw sin n wagguren s teqbaylit yennayer fuṛar meɣres yebrir mayyu yunyu yulyu Ɣuct ctamber tuber wamber dujember
tesḥissif deg yiman-is
kulci ad yefḍeḥ
imawlan ur d aɣ-ǧǧin ara ad neddu akken nebɣa ɣef sebba n teswiɛt n yimir-n
ad tili ugar gar sin imeddukal
tajmaɛit uffela
idɣaɣen igenwan d waḍu
ad awint abrid-nsent
ad awiɣ abrid-iw
aɣlif n teɣdemt
ad ḥnuccḍent deg udfel
tanaṣlit d taqbaylit i d-yekkren di temdint n wehran
s yin akin ad nawwi awal ɣef unamek n usefru ilelli deg tsekla taqbaylit d tulmisin yerzan talɣa-is
amedyaz atrar isenfalay-d tiktiwin-ines s wudem ilelli udem yeffɣen i wayen yellan d amensay
mi akken i d-yenher s uɛekkaz sin n yeɣyal deg ubrid
afyir tameɣrut taseddart akat
isellek-d iman-is yerwel yeṭṭef abrid yezger weḥd-s
ttqeṣṣiren ttaḍsan
si tallit tamensayt yettuɣalen armi d lqern wis sbeɛṭac
ur d-tettaɣ ara marie aɣṛum
si kra n wayen ara yexdem ṛṛay yelha ma iwzen-it
iḍelli meggleɣ tineqlin-iw rniɣ rekkleɣ kra n yisegman
tettawi-d asnulfu deg ugbur d talɣa akken yenna Ǧebur Ɛebdnur
imaziɣen n zwaṛa deg libya qqaren-asen iwilulen neɣ at wilul tameslayt-nsen d tawilult
tteḥnuccuḍent di zzit
afran-a yella-d s tmentilin-agi imi d amezwaru i d-yeskecmen amaynut di talɣa n usefru
zikk-nni tella laεnaya yal taddart tezmer ad tger laεnaya deg umdan i d-yusan seg taddart-nniḍen
talallit n usefru ilelli deg tmedyazt taqbaylit
agadir d tamdint n yicelḥiyen i d-yezgan deg at mellul di tmurt n merruk
tafaska n ufexxaṛ neɣ n talaxt tettili-d di temnaḍt n mɛatqa di tizi wezzu
kra n win ar ad ixedmen yid-s am umzerfu itetten tijɛal
tzemrem ad terǧum kra
tatrarit d awal yesɛan aṭas n yinumak d lemɛani yemxalafen
asnulfu amaynut i d-yernan ɣer tsekla tatrart d tin yeǧǧan anamek n tetrarit ad yemxlaf ɣef yinumak n tsekla tamensayt
sbeḥ meddi d arkaɛ d asjad lemer d tayerza neɣ d tamegra mačči xir
zemreɣ ad ak-sḥefḍeɣ amek ara tnehṛeḍ
akken armi wwḍen s asif tiqenṭert akken ad tt-zegren
anda di tazwara n usefru ibeggen-d tamuɣli i d-as-fkan twalin
ad teḥnuccḍemt deg udfel
tura akken d-fɣaɣ seg ttberna deg ukfadu
acḥal d ilemẓi i wwin ar lambaz d beṛwagiya
imi amur wis sin d tasleḍt n yisefra-ines deg wayen yaɛnan amek yebna talɣa n yisefra-ines
zemreɣ ad ak-slemdeɣ amek ara tecnuḍ
agezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ
amdakel-is mi d-yettwali yettu acu ɛebbant tuyat
Ḥedd ur d-yemmetkti lḥeqq-iw d lmal i ttuneḥsabeɣ
aɣlif n ulmud unnig d unadi ussnan
aakken ad d-nebgen amek i d-tella tlalit d tulmisin n talɣa iɣef yettwabna usefru ilelli
ad tmerrɣemt ticki yella uzɣal
iqbayliyen negren mmawin ass-a ččan-tt ibeɛtiyen iɛerbuben inselmen
ad nawi abrid-nneɣ
seg useggas-agi armi zrin ɛecrin n yiseggasen ɣef udlis-agi n hanoteau yella-d unadi wis sin ɣef tutlayt n tmaziɣt
aḥric amezwaru ad d-yawwi ɣef unamek n tetrarit d tulmisin n tmedyazt taqbaylit tatrart
tatrarit anamek-is dayen yerzan amaynut i d-yernan ɣef wayen yellan d amensay
tulmisin n tmedyazt taqbaylit tartar
seg wayen id-neḥka ad nefhem d akken yal wa di ddunit
d tajmilt i tmeṭṭut-agi id yefkan aṭas i tegrawla ig seblen tarwiḥt-is d cci-s ɣef tmurt
sṭif d tamdint taqbaylit tezga-d ar tama n unẓul n bgayet
ma yella deg uḥric wis tlata ad d-nawwi ɣef tudert n ben muḥemmed d wayen yexdem deg wunar n tsekla taqbaylit
aman n tala umalu d ddwa ḥellu i yimuḍan
d wayen akk icudden ɣer lebni n usefru sumata
zemreɣ ad m-sḥefḍeɣ amek ara tecnuḍ
s yin d asawen tekcem tmedyazt taqbaylit deg tatrarit
amaynut id-tewwi tetrarit ur yili ara deg tensayit
zemreɣ ad ak-sḥefḍeɣ amek ara tecnuḍ
abeddel deg lbeni n ufyir d tlelli seg tama n tmeɣrut d tesddarin d wakaten
neɣ deg wayen yaɛnan alalen swayes sawaḍen isefra-nsen i umseflid s tisefifin iḍebsiyen neɣ ayen-nniḍen
ur yerri aqerru-s ar wanida yebɣa baba-s
turda-nneɣ d akken asefru ilelli yettili d ilelli mi ara ad yesɛu ifyar-is d tmaɣrut-is d wakat-is d ilelliyen
tulmisin n talɣa n usefru ilelli deg tama
telmed tira n tmaziɣt di tiddukla numidya n wehran
ad ak-heggiɣ tameɣra s yiḍebbalen
kksen-as tuṭṭḍa s wacburen
ilmend n temsirin d tɣuriwin nexdem ɣef tmedyazt taqbaylit
dd tafeḍ deg-s tamusni d tzemna
netteḥnuccuḍ amzal am yiḍ
aseqqamu unnig n tneslemt
d tiremt tis snat n temlilit-agi
irgazen d tilawin nwan ad ferḥen
yessewa-as qeḍran d ilili
ur newwi ara amḍiq-nteɣ
ḍeggreɣ tiṭ-iw ɣer beṛṛa
Ɣef aya ilaq ad nwali d acu i tatrarit
uqbel ad-igen
yal ass nettaṭṭaf tiɛebbiḍun-nneɣ
Ḥnuccḍet iḍelli di taddart
yella zik yiwen n urgaz yetteddu am ugellid
farzen-d yinagmayen izzayriyen ladɣa mulud mɛemri yusef nasib d salem cakir talliyin n unerni n tmedyazt taqbaylit
seg tama n tmeɣrut tiseddarin d yifyar d wakaten
d wayen yettḥulfutelḥa-d seg tallit ɣer tayeḍ seg tsuta ɣer tayeḍ
d win-inu
d isastalen igejdanen iɣef ad d-nerr fell-asen deg unadi-a-nneɣ
teɣli-d tduli
afulay yezdem seg-sen
ijemɛ-d ugar n settemya u waḥed uɛecrin n yisefra
acḥal ay-agi la nxeṭṭeb ur nufa nnuda idurar ar at dwala
zemreɣ ad ak-sḥefḍeɣ yiwet n tɣawsa neɣ snat
asemres n tgemmi
galɛum i wid d-isellen mi d-neḥka ayen yellan
Ṛuḥ deg ubrid ayeffus
aɣyul yeddan ɣer zdat yebɣa ad yexdem rray-is
deg tezrawt-agi-nneɣ nefren-d asentel asefru ilelli deg urti asefran atrar aqbayli
tamedyazt taqbaylit tatrart
wi icqa anwa-t wi t-ilan seg wayen id-walan wallen
ad d-yawi
sfadayent ammus
iɛedda waggur
a ṛebbi kečč d lfakir ad k-id-nettfekkiṛ efk-as ayen tebɣa nniya-s
ɣas ma ḥebsent tiɛeqqacin-a leqriḥ-is ur yettruḥ ara deg wussan-nni imezwura
taɣuri tekfa
qleb tablaḍt ad tafeḍ miyya
azen imayl
ṭṭfen amẓabi
tufa idrimen
ur ḥnuccḍent ara makken yekkat ugris
tekker-d teslit tenna-yasass-a ad eččeɣ yemma-k
ad ffɣeɣ azekka
tsemmḥeḍ i wid izellun ad tneqqeḍ leqbayel
tinfaliyin am tigi eǧǧi-tent kan ɣur-k
aɣref yedduklen ur t-yettṛuẓ yiwen
ad merrɣen azekka deg ufrag
asmi meẓẓiy d amaɛlal kan yeṛwa lehlak d axessar
tadukli i ugraw aɣelnaw
tiqbayliyin zik tegent tameɣra ticki yiwet seg-sent tger-d aẓeṭṭa
sewḥel ineḍfaṛen nniḍen n ugbur
ladɣa ayen icudden ɣer tuttriwin gar igzumen
ṣṣeḥ akk din-a ad tafeḍ-t
yeṭṭef addud
nɣan-t iḥerkiyen imi yegguma ad d-yezzene imjuhad di tallit-nni
ad ten-id-yawi ɣer uxxam
ad ruḥeɣ ad bedleɣ tamurt ad nadiɣ tafat
tas n aɛli tawaqqurt
ffɣen meṛṛa iḍelli
ur iḥnucceḍ ara makken yekkat ugris
wiyaḍ la seqḍaɛen tigusa d wuglan
smaεil iseddad-d ula d isefra am di tullist lunğa
llan mraw n yizwilen s teqbaylit ilem yiwen sin kraḍ kuẓ semmus sḍis sa ṭam tẓa
lyaqut teqqel-d i tmeddit
war ma yella yeẓra Ṭeyyeb‟ tamentilt n lɣiba-yagi dɣa yuɣal-d
sumata aṭṭan n nnaqsa yettlal ɣer teqcict segmi ara tebdu tarda umbeɛd telṭac n yiseggasen
ixef wis setta ajenniw yeqqeḍ-d ar taddart
d acu-tent tulmisin timuta n usefru ilelli
ansuf yes-s

ttawimt azduz ad tesseftutusemt

mεella
maḥsub ttaken
ah lemmmer yesεa afriwen acu yesεa allen
fren afeggag n tansa
ur yelli ufran wis sin i s-qqaren wid yennumen d umenṭer
ur tmerreɣ ara aggur-a
tɛedda-d si tallit ɣer tayeḍ tegla-d s waṭas n tmusniwin yurzen yal taɣult
abrid n zzayer ɣezzif yak yenğer s lḥif nekk bdiɣ-t-id d iqnaqen
tagrayt ammud tiɣbula amawal
aqbayli ur d-yusi ara
yezmer ad yili weḥd-s
i wakken ad issineɣ
ass-n mi yebda uslilu ass-n mi d-ilul lwennas
teḥnuccḍeḍ akken tufiḍ
tasekla-nneɣ ddeqs segmi tenti asikel-ines
dɣa ttaḍṣaɣ ula d nekk yid-sen
nadi deg usebter yezrin
timenɣiwt-is tesdduqqes-aɣ-d ugar n tidyanin-nniḍen n tmenɣiwt imi seg tama d tameṭṭut
lemmer ad tefru tili tefra gar rrus d marikan
llan sa n wussan s teqbaylit acer arim aram ahad amhad sem sed
ihi isɣi-nni ameɣbun d uwtul-nni n lexla ddan deg wawal-is
tirni taɣelnawt tamagdayt
tettawim aɣyul-nwen
melmi ad nɣer ammud n yisefra n rabeḥ kadduṛ
asmi ilaq ad tt-nɣer ur ttneɣri ara
nettawi aɣyul-nteɣ
iɣef wis tlata akli n tayri
manama d tamanxt n beḥrayn
nefka aεejmi i wuccanen
yessefk kan ur as-neqqaṛ ara dayen adabu yefsi tiyersi dayen newweḍ s iswi nezmer a nuɣal ar yiḍes
d Ɛemmaṛ mezdad i yuran imeslayen n taɣect yemma tedda ḥafi
ad ččen abbaɣ-ik
acḥal i d-tuɣeḍ izimer-nni
ad yaɣ awal tom
akka kan ara tt-tkemmleḍ keččini
acuɣeṛ i tettrum
ad steɛfuɣ kan kra
amcic berrik neɣ mellul kifkif awi-d kan ad d-yeṭṭef kan iɣerdayen
acuɣeṛ i tettazzalemt
acuɣeṛ i treggmeḍ
weḥlen deg yiwen n lawan deg yiwet n tegnit raben
aḥeqq rebbi ar d nettat i yessnen wala nekki
aɣerbaz-nneɣ yezga-d deg tewrirt
ad d-tafem kra n tɣawsa ara wen-iɛeǧben
acuɣeṛ i k-id-sṭaxṛen
ad tt-ssdendneɣ tameddit tuɣal-d lyaqut a tawaɣit
akken ula di lalman
amcic-nni d amellal
ad k-iṣeḥḥi ṛebbi
ad d-tres talwit fell-awen
acḥal n wagguren i tettɣama teqjunt i wakken ad tarew
a wer tesεuḍ aɣilif
acḥal n wussan i d-mazal akken ad yebdu wurar n teqbuct n ddunit
ad aɣli lehwa
a zzin arqaq udem-im ireqq d asafu
acu kan ɣezzif azuḥ
afus n tsebbalt yeṛṛeẓ
acḥal n yedlisen i teqqaṛeḍ deg wayyur
ad sendiɣ i waman di tala
ad wen-tent-id-awiɣ
ad tweḥmeḍ deg-sen ur gganen ur ssganen ur ttanfen wi ara inen
ad truḥeḍ qabel ɣer marikan
acku iεac xemsa iseggasen di marikan
ad bduɣ seg usali n ufaylu n yimsaɣen akked yisaǧǧawen
ad tekkat lehwa nezzeh seg zgelli
afeggag n udrurem ubdid
ah tagi d tamsalt-nniḍen d agama i k-id-yefkan akka ɣas ɣef wannect-a ur yecni lewnis
af-d acḥal i yi-d-ikker
akken kan i t-id-neẓra
ad ṛuḥen ar lebḥer ssmana i d-iteddun
aɛqal aɣectan
akken bɣun sgelfen yiqjan nukni ad nɛeddi
ad tent-taɣ tudgi
ack-itt a fazya d tizlitt iḥemmleɣ aṭas segmi lliɣ d acawrar
ad d-kksen tibexsisin akked tṛemmanin
d win ɣur i tensa
ad d-iniɣ
ad nẓallet
afeggag n tansa
aɣṛum ɛerken-t seksu fetlen-t
ad d-afeɣ tifrat
a wigi sṭeṛṭuṛen kan s yilem yemxel win i asen-iḥessen
ad tent-id-afent
al-waɣlisi yura-d aṭas n yidlisen s taɛrabt maca win yettwassnen win is yettwassen d adlis umi semman "al-waɣlisiya"
amacekk-itt tmeɣṛa-nni
acuɣeṛ yiwen ur yi-d-ittḥessis
ad as-d-awiɣ tameqṛuḍt i yemma
ad t-neḥbes
makken yefka aɣrum i said
ad ɣṛeɣ adlis

ad nebdu

ad lseɣ ayen i bɣiɣ
amdan yettwaxleq neɣ yekka-d seg yibki
ad nehḍeṛ

tura ur uɣaleɣ ad amneɣ yiwen
ad d-rreɣ ttar
acu i tḥemmleḍ ad teččeḍ akken ad am-t-id-sewweɣ

acuɣeṛ ur k-yebɣi ara da tom
a wi yufan taqbaylit d tilellit

acḥal qedmen yidlisen-a
aceṭṭiḍ-a yettɣersa

acuɣar
amalah ɣef asmi lliɣ d acawrar
acḥal i tesɛam g leɛmeṛ-nwen
ad teččeḍ tiḥebbuyin-iw n ččina
acuɣeṛ ur iḥemmel ara tom ad yečč iselman
amasay n tsiḍent yefreḥ nezzeh acku sya d afella mačči d netta ara yessekcamen meṛṛa isefka icudden ar tceqqufin n tsiḍent
acuɣeṛ i yettsetḥi mliḥ
akken ad yettu ayen iεeddan akk d ineḍruyen deg ass yessens tafat iεedda yerra-tt i yiḍes
ad neslex akrar-nni

ahat teẓra-yaɣ-d
acu tenniḍ di tmendawt n zzayer
acuɣeṛ i tebɣamt ad d-teffɣemt d tifremliyin
aɣbel deg-sen mačči deg-i
acraḍ asnalɣan aseddasan d tukksa n ubnunek i wawalen
ad asseɣ

zegren aṭas n yiɣezṛan suggten tikli ayen din
am mmi-s n dda remḍan yefkan idrimen deg wurḍan
afrux d-ilul di lqefz yettɣili affug s aṭṭan
agem aman sain awi-d taga
lḥedimu
ahat tesεiḍ lḥeqq maca nekk ur k-wufqeɣ ara di rray
ihi tikwal ur gezzunt ara akken iwata tamsalt n tmenɣiwt n katia
acḥal yeswa kilu n uksum
ahat lluẓen

alim-t
ad ḥnuccḍen deg udfel

ala nekk ur nettwaɛreḍ ɣer tmeɣras-nni

a ssiɛqa
afus deg ufus
aha ṭṛan frut-aɣ-ttid send ad texnez
akken kan taxṛen i uyefki uɣalen ar ubaṭaṭiw
yefsex yiṭij n unebdu leḥzenṭṭlam aḥlalas
muḥend aɛrab besɛud ilul deg useggas n walef u ttɛemya u rebɛa u ɛecrin deg tgemmunt lejdid deg tɣiwant n at dwala
acuɣer ur tṛuḥem ara ad teẓrem tamsulta
qqareɣ asefru deffir wayeḍ
kamirun uganda sinigal mali nijer nijirya d timura i d-yezgan deg unẓul n tefriqt neɣ n tferka
ayagi i d-yefɣen seg yimi-k yessefraḥ ad yili imeṭṭi n lferḥ
ad qerṣeɣ fell-as
argaz d lsas tameṭṭut d ajgu alemmas
ur yi-d-tṣaḥ

nettat ur tezgil ara tamacint
ad nezwir ass-a s tullist "kker a mmi" n umeddakel-nneɣ smaɛil
ur teḥnucceḍ ara makken yekkat ugris
ad ten-cedhiɣ s waṭas
di tesnawit deg usssan-nni

ad yi-teǧǧem
ben ԑebderraḥman d lefḥel
ur neqqim ara
ifrax d idurar

ad yelhu kullec ma yella tzemreḍ ad d-taseḍ tura

acuɣeṛ i tcebbḥeḍ akka a linda
adfel yuɣ-d akk tiɣaltin
acḥal i yettnuzu
afsax n waggur
ad tt-tettarfademt s nnuba arma tiwḍemt ɣer uxxam
ad ḍelqeɣ
acimi akka teqqimeḍ di txelwit ffeɣ ad k-iwwet ubeḥri
am ucebbub fell-am ul-iw yeshebhub
ad bennun di leǧwameɛ akken ad dɛun Ṛebbi ur ttaḍnen ara alḥif
Ṣuɣ-d a lwennas seg uẓekka ala keččini i tt-itteqden
ad mmesleɣ teckrurt tacmuxt tabuqalt tabaqit tasebbalt lmeṣbeḥ akked lǧefna
acḥal ara yesɛu di leɛmeṛ-is jeddi-s
aḥeric wis sin asefu ilelli
amennuɣ n nnif d lḥeṛma
afaylu s tengalt n ascii
ad cfun ad yecfu ad t-id-mmektin ad t-id-yemmekti
akken yebɣu yiɣzif yiḍ d ulaqṛaṛ ad yali wass
akken ad tlemmedeḍ tameslayt ilaq ad tissineḍ taseftit n yimyagen
afus-is deg ufus-inu lḥess-is agemmaḍ-in d acu-t d acu-t
acuɣer i tsetḥaḍ ad as-theḍḍṛeḍ
aḥawec d aleqqeḍ n uzemmur i d-yettɣimin deg wayen leqḍen medden
tmerrɣeḍ rrif n umcic
acu tebɣiḍ ay aderɣal d tafat
aɣ-as awal i gma-k ameqqṛan
adlis-nni i s-reḍleɣ i tom mazal-t ɣur-s

ad t-neɛṛeḍ
ad tent-cedhiɣ s waṭas
acuɣeṛ i treggmem
acḥal n tkeṛyas i yesɛa
alluy n tseddaṛin s tikli s uɣiwel d addal s wazal-is
aḥric wis sin ad d-yawwi ɣef unamek n usefru ilelli deg tsekliwin tigraɣlanin
ad d-asseḍ neɣ aṣṣel
acuɣeṛ ur txeddmeḍ ara kra

acimi i truḥeḍ ɣur-s
af-d acḥal i yi-d-tekker

ad iliɣ da ass n letnayen

aḍu-ya d tazawwa ara d-yawi
ad fell-as yeɛfu yerḥem yazen ssber i yimawlan-is
am win yettaken lesfenǧ i weɣyul

a kra yesseqdacen awal init-aɣ-d ayen yellan

a win yeṭṣen fiḥel ma tuṛǧaḍ nnuba-k
acḥal n tektubin i teqqaṛeḍ g ccheṛ

drus yid-sen meɛna lebɣi meqqer
ad seglafen yeqjan

llan widen yeqreḥ lḥal imi i ten-id-qelɛen seg yiẓuran
s yiwen u sebɛin tezga-d tizi wezzu deg umḍiq amezwaru

ad nmerreɣ ɣef tferracit

a nnger-ik ad yenger iles-ik d idles-k

ur texdimeḍ ara ccɣel-ik
melmi i d-nnant ad d-ruḥent
ekk seg tezniqt-agi ssakin af teffeɣḍ ɣer unnar n ddabex
llan zewṛen
amtafeq ma ur t-ḍfirent tigawin lmeεna ur tt-yesεi
d rray-ik i ak-tt-igan
ansa i tɛedda tecict-nni tabesṭuḥt
d bucḥiḍ i t-inɣan
beṭṭu n tassa yesnulfuy-d lɣec d usḥissef
ammer ad yi-tsurfem nekki ɣur-i ciṭ n wakud kan dɣa ad ɣiwleɣ deg tira n uḍris
d asaru i d-iḥekkun ɣef yiwet n tfunast i d-yeɣlin seg igenni
iẓẓan
ikad-iyi-d rennuɣ daɣen ttufayeɣ
cukkeɣ yezweṛ
deg furar tetteffeɣ-d tzermemmuyt si lɣar-is
amezruy win ur t-nura bab-is ad t-yalles azekka arut amezruy-nwen
d nutni i d ageruj n yal ass
Ḥmed yella ilebbes ttjur ɣezzifen mi yella aqrur
Ḥku-yi-d ɣef tsudent-ik tamezwarut
mdel tawwurt
iluɛa-yas karim i tom
d adeg n teksawt d win ibeεden ɣef taddart semman-as akka acku yettjal lmal ɣur-s
lliɣ zzenzeɣ yakan adlis-nni mi yi-d-yessawel
isawel-asen meṛṛa iḍelli
d aneklaw i yella maca ur yessawaḍ ad yeklu s uɣanib acinwa
Ɛemman d tamaxt n uṛdun
aḥay aḥay ma d wa i d ccɣel
Ḥemmeleq aṭas tawacult-iw
d acu daɣen i tebɣiḍ
lidiw (ɛiwaḍ) ad yessenkeẓ učči akken ad yeṛhef netta irennu ittett akken ad yafway
ittuɣ-int abḥal d ayetmaten ass-n anken
ekker
awi-d tadawsa kan
isem n tunes yusa-d seg uẓaṛ ens
lmed akken ilha timsirin-ik a mmi
ansa-k
imi d-nuder aẓawan aklasiki anwa ameẓẓawan i tesmenyifeḍ
iɛac tom da tlatin n iseggasen
d leqrun segmi i sen-truḥ i yedrimen tengawit-nsen n lkaɣeḍ neɣ n umɣuz ma d tura dayen uɣalen d izwilen an deg uselkim
Ɣummen idurar
d tameṭṭur s uxxam-is
ceqqṛen akk medden
sseṛɣen-t s zzit
ur ttqadaren ara
itteḥizwir
dehmiẓen kan widak nni
greɣ-as irebbi n wurfan
d leqrun i iεeddan ɣef tefransist d wamek reṣṣan ilugan-is n tira i nesseqdac ass-a
iḥemmel ad icc tanalt s uɣrum d zzit n uzemmur
deg wayen i yeḥma lḥal alɣem izmer ad d-ifunzer dinna deg sedduq
qrib ad leqḍen medden azemmur
ilaq ad asen-theḍṛemt tidet
berka-ken ashewhew
anda i llan yiceṭṭen-iw
iban-d ddexxan
ilaq ad yi-tɛawneḍ bac ad t-id-sellkeɣ
Ḥemmleɣ učči d leqbayel
gneɣ aṭas
il sont parti avec les keffaf
a Ṛebbi efk-d ameččim ad d-naf ssebba i weḥlul
d nekk i yekcem uɣbel f aya
Ḥemmeleɣ-kem a mary
ittuɣ zun di d-yaru kra
anta ara d-xebbṛeɣ
d as-d-unt-awiɣ mi di d-yaweṭ lawan
asafag akken kan yebda yettrusu-d
illa wumḍiq anda nezmer ad nmeslay di lbaḍna
layla tella tessaram ad tesεeddi iḍ akked uḥbib-is
aḍebsi n llubyan s tfelfelt taqerḥant
amawal n tussniwin n wakal n yidir Ḥmed zayed
ccna d yiwen seg wallalen yesseqdec ugraw amaziɣ akken ad yessiweḍ izen-is
tameṭṭut-is d taneɛmart
dayen yeqḍeɛ layas acku ass-a tuɣal d tameṭṭut
yesfex yiṭij deg unebdu yeɣli-d lxuf d lweswas
Ɣas akken tezweǧ s warraw-is yemmeɣ yeẓmeḍ-itt-id ar wul-is yenna-yas tura argaz-im d baba-m mmuten ad kem-yehdu Ṛebbi ula d nekk d tarwiḥt
yettmuqul deg-s s tmuɣli n umuḍin ur nezmir ad yekker seg tesga i t-yeṭṭfen
d acu i izemren ihi ad aɣ-d-issukkes seg wayen i aɣ-yurzen sennig n usnulfu
tettawi aɣyul-is
d acu i d amgared gar wa d wihin
skud yettaẓ ɣer daxel taɛkemt iɛebba tneqqes
mi i s-yessiwel alḥaǧ alḥaǧ yezzi-d ɣur-s yenna-as snat i s-ɛiɣ
imummuyen n wallen-is d izegzawen am igenni
tidet tettcebbiḥ bab-is
baba ismeḥsis i uẓawan aqdim
Ɛli ideflawen d Ḥsen ziyani cebbḥen taqbaylit
ansa i d-tekkiḍ ay amsebrid
lliɣ ttgennizeɣ
d kečč i iḥeṛcen fell-i
nadi ad tt-id-tafeḍ
igdel walluy ɣer ttjuṛ deg upark-ayi
ilaq ad neg kra
anwa iwalan isallen ass-agi
la xeddemeɣ
Ɛerḍeɣ ad ruḥeɣ ɣer lxedma s uvilu maca ɣer tagara ufiɣ mačči d ayen i y-iwulmen
cukkeɣ taqemǧet-a ur terra ara ɣef tekrabaṭ tazeggaɣt
i temẓin anwa ad ten-t-iɛelfen ma ulac am wagi
izmer ad ken-ineɣ ssem
Ɣef wakk-n d-qqaren azekka ad d-yas uselway n tɣiwant ɣer tama-nneɣ
Ɣer uɣrab yellan ɣef yeffus rsen sin n wusawen
d azɣal aqli sekkfeɣ snat n tebyirin
d acu kan i yugadeɣ d yessi-s n medden
iqbayliyen ḥemmlen tutlayt-nsen
dɣa meẓyan yuɣal yekreh tamsirt n tutlayt taqbaylit
Ɣriɣ tamahut n uɛeqqa yessawalen
buṛǧ buɛrirej d tamdint taqbaylit tezga-d ar tama n unẓul asamar n bgayet
ttɣimiɣ tettɣimiḍ yettɣimi ittɣimitettɣimi
igen
d yelli-s n waman d tala umalu
iberdan ugten maca ttawin akk ar taddert
eǧǧ-iyi ad ak-d-sfehmeɣ amek i iteddu
d acu i d-rebḥeɣ
Ḥwejeɣ aṭas n yimedyaten akken ad ẓreɣ amek yettwasemres wawal-agi
ala win kan ara as-d-ihedren ɣef tuffɣa neɣ ɣef temɛict
maziɣ ihuz kan aqerruy-is
am wakken win yeffɣen i wayen i d-neǧǧren nutni
ittruḥu mmi ad inezzeh timliliyin n ddabex n uḍar
ur tesɛi ara ul ara ihedren
ur as-yessal ula d yiwen
maziɣ mi tt-yeẓra akken deg yir liḥala-nni iẓmeḍ-itt-id ɣur-s
ad iyi-d-tafeḍ deg temkerḍit
keyfeɣ aṭas zik ma d tura ḥebseɣ-t
yak ur aɣ-tettuḍ ara
sliman u muḥ yebda yettmeslay
thegga-d ad tessutreḍ tura
ibɛid akkin
yiwen ur yeṭṭalay ɣer wayeḍ
ur tenwi ad s-d-yelḥeq wass am wa
ayen yettɣimi d imuras akter n wayen ixeddem
acḥal ur d-rzin imeslayen am wi ɣer umeẓẓuɣ-is
ayen yuɛren qubleɣ-t
lecɣal-nni n uxxam
am wakken nettat tettxemmim
acku ala win yebɣan annect-nni ara yawḍen ɣer din
mi ara ten-teẓreḍ ad as-tiniḍ jmiɛ i tteffɣen neɣ acḥal n lesnin i ddan
tetteddu tettxemmim ɣef wayen hedren
deg ubrid n tlelli taqbayli ad tali
yak kulec iban
d ayen i t-yettaǧǧan ad yesɛu tabɣest akken ad iɛawen yal win ara ten-id-iqesden
ula d tiqcicin sɛan-t amur-nsent deg wannect-a
dima awal-is
ayen akk tugad neɣ teffer ɣef yirgazen-nniḍen
ad twehmeḍ amek i d-mmezgen neɣ amek i ttemsefhamen
iccud yimi-s
yewwi-t maziɣ deg yiwen n yiḍ
taččaray-d tzeqqa-nni s kra kra
tbeqqa i temddukal-is slam
ur nečči acemma ass-a
mačči bessif neɣ s uḥras ara d-tas
luɛaɣ-as i tom
tɛelmeḍ tuget n yirgazen ẓẓaren tiqcicin neɣ tullas ddaw-tsen
i tikkelt tamezwarut i ẓriɣ iman-iw sɛiɣ azal ɣer umdan-nniḍen
awal ɣef yidrimen
d acu kan tegzem-itt deg rray-is
siwel i sliman u muḥ tura
ayen tesɛa akk
saɛid u muḥ yerra-t-id d ṭṭlem ɣef tiziri tagawawt
teččam abbaɣ-iw
yettaf-as-d dima tifrat
sima tella tḥemmel ad tas ɛemti-s d dderya-s ɣer uxxam-is
qqim kra n tewiɛt dina
yella d tayet iɣef serseɣ aqerruy-iw
yessureg-d kra n waman ɣer ugdur
nekk deg uqerruy-iw
d ayen tgezmeḍ-tt yakan di ṛṛay ɣef wayen ara tessutred
ur ttettu ara tiliɣri-m
almi i d-mɣuren akka i gzan timsal akken llant
mi ara tfak asɣaray
teffeɣ newwara d yemma-s ad merrḥent
tzemreḍ ad yid-tawiḍ taɣejayt
yura-as i tselmadt akken ad as-d-tefk rray-is
d wer neḍṛi
tfaz deg lecɣal-a
ur smurḍusemt ara
ih a massa
Ḥemmleɣ mi ara akem-waliɣ
tin itent-yifen akk
nruḥ ɣer lebḥer
imiren ma yella ur tezmir ara i wayen tebɣiḍ
d tiqcicin i yesheblen yal yiwen deg-sen
ssarament ad ilint am nettat
am netta am tiziyin-is
ad as-tiniḍ yeḥya-d deg-s taftilt yexsin acḥal-aya
ur bɣan ara ad tfak
yerna d nekk i as-yefkan ttiɛad
ihi nekki ad ak-ǧǧeɣ a maziɣ
ur as-ufun ara aqerru i ccwal deg yinurar
tḥuza-t taluft
ur t-izgil yiwen
Ɛmiṛuc u muḥ iḥulfa yeɛya
a nnger-ik ay ul
d lɛib ad ḍelben i yimawlan-nsen idrimen
d acu kan ur as-yefki ara azal nnig n wannect-a
rwan aḥewwes d temɛict jmiɛ
ussan imezwura mi d-kecmen
taqcict teṭṭerḍeq d imeṭṭi
Ɣas akken iḥemmel taḍsa d uqesser
yeɛna tasga n uxxam
mačči dayen ara d-tgelmeḍ
ad tebɣu ad tettu
kra ur k-itt-xasa
ddemmar d aṭṭan uffir
ssaɛa ad tili d zzuǧ d uzgen
ttun medden anda tteddun
ur ḥebbesen ara taḍsa
Ɣas d tanelmadt tettɛawan newwara yemma-s di ccɣel n wexxam
a-t-an d ikayaden
tikkelt-nniḍen ala yid-s i ad tt-id-yettawi
tilelli-inu s dreɛ-iw i tt-id-ḥellaɣ
segmi i d-tɛddaḍ ddurt iɛddan
ur ttruḥumt ara
rewleɣ-as i tmetti yeǧan asirem-is deg tlemmast n ubrid
ma yella d ayen yerzan iḥulfan n maziɣ
sebbaḍ ɣlayen d wamek i ilaq ad tbaneḍ s tugna iwatan
tzemreḍ ad yi-d-tesɛeddiḍ lmelḥ ma ulac aɣilif
neɣ ahat d nekk kan i iɛewjen
ayen yeffren deg-i ssawḍeɣ-ak-t-id mebla akukru neɣ ahezzeb
anda tewwḍed din i d axxam-ik
ula mi yekcem ɣer tddukli-nni
ur d-keččmen ara s axxam
tegger-itt imi teɛyiḍ
yesɛa yiwet n tmuɣli i yezreɛ deg wallaɣ-is
iḍ iɛeddan i sḥuseɣ ɛawdeɣ-d talalit
sber kan ad twaliḍ amek ara yexdem dada-k massi
teggummaḍ ad d-terreḍ awal
rran tameṭṭut i ccɣel d urebbi
wwḍen-d imddukal-nniḍen
neɣ amek ara as-semmiɣ i win i am-ixedmen aya
gneɣ
tettmektay-d ayen i yeḍran leɛca-nni gar maziɣ d nettat
win ur nesɛi
acku tura kan i d-wwḍen ad sefrurin tidyanin
iḥemmel ad isɛeddi ussan-is deg umerreḥ akked uqesser
sima teṭṭal akka d wakka anda ara tẓer maziɣ
mačči d ahwawi am wid yellan deg leɛmer-is
ilaq ad truḥ ad texdem
tuɣal tebɣa ad tehder iḥulfan-is
yella wayen i ak-d-uriɣ d wayen i ak-d-ceyɛeɣ ɣef usentel i teddmeḍ
tura-yas sbeḥ-a ur as-d-yerri ara
teɛam ṭabla anida nezmer ad nwali agaraw
ur tmerrɣeḍ ara ilindi
d argaz yessnen kan axeddim-is d twacult-is
Ɛmiṛuc u muḥ iḥemmel ṣyada
ladɣa nekk si zik mi iyi-meḍlen
ur smurḍus ara
sliman u muḥ yewweḍ ar din uqbel tiziri tagawawt
wissen anda yunag
sima tettserriḥ i wayen yessenguglen ul-is
yettaǧǧa-yas-d ala ayen ẓiden deg yimi
Ɛmiṛuc u muḥ igerrez deg urar-a neɣ ala
ya rebbi
ulayɣer ad yili uḥras gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut
hwan tiseddaṛin
yerna uriɣ-ak-d acḥal d abrid
ad tent-yeqbel akken llant
teɛreḍ akken ad as-tessettu aya
massi deg leɛmer ihder-as-d akken umddakel-is
tḥuza-tt tirɣi-nni bla times
ɛdidi teččuṛ d nniya
awi-d ukkan ma terriḍ-iyi-d s wawal zik
sliman u muḥ yeẓdem ɣef tiziri tagawawt
deg leɛmer teɛba-yasen
maziɣ iṭṭal ssaɛa-ines yufa-tt d ssebɛa n tmeddit
ur ttbeddileɣ acemma
yeɛweq anda ara yerr
d awezɣi ad tɛeddi sdat-k ur tt-ttetmuquleḍ ara
d wa i d imensi i nḥemmel akk mliḥ
tudert-nsen meẓẓiyet
lutu ur k-d-ittak yiwen
zdem ɣer sdat
tewwi-as-d aman
ur asen-terbiḥ ara
iletha kan d umddakel-is
temmekta-d d akken wakil i tikkelt tamenzut i temmeslay d yilemẓi ur tt-yečči ara s wallen
trefdeḍ-ten mebla acetki
tegguma ad taweḍ
teẓra d akken tufa win ara as-d-yesslen mebla ma yewwet deg-s
segmi i yemmut baba-s ur qesren akka
ad as-tessiwḍeḍ mebla leɛyaḍ d yimenɣi
yerna ur yesɛi uma d kra ara yexdem
d nettat i d-yellan d lmendad ɣef tezrawt n turagt-ines
saɛid u muḥ yesseww i tiziri tagawawt
yuba u muḥ ur yettargu ara tiziri tagawawt
amek mazal kan akken tebɣiḍ ad tt-teǧǧeḍ neɣ dayen tbeddleḍ rray-ik
imi d amulli n zzwaǧ-is yuɣ-as-d taferracit
ad tt-yeḍfer s wallen alamma tɛedda
d acu i d taynisemt
iɣul-iyi umeddakel-iw asmi d-wwiɣ araz n unuɣ dɣa iɣuṛṛ-iyi
mi ara teṭṭileḍ deg yinelmaden-is
neɛreḍ ad ten-nessusem ur nessaweḍ
cidden asaɣuṛ-nni iḍelli
maca ur as-d-yewwi ara lehna iɣef tettḥewwis
ur sṭeẓṭuẓet ara
Ḥemmleɣ tarbaɛt n barcelona n ddabex n uḍar
a-t-an yuli-d wass ɣef tɣiwant
anef-as ad d-isuffeɣ taɣennant-ines
acimi ur aɣ-d-terriḍ ara awal
isem-is
ur sṭerṭuret ara
terwa tuffɣa d ukeččum
isawel-as i umddakel-is massi
lferḥ izdeɣ-itt
lukan kan yal yiwen iletha d lecɣal-is
anda i yessen yidir newwara
terra ɣer texxamt
ur smuɣbun ara
fehmeɣ amek ara fruɣ tallet-nni
Ɣas mačči d netta i iḍelmen maca ad tabba kulec
abeḥri i d-yettɛeddin yetteslaf-as i ucekkuḥ-is
tewwi awalen i as-d-yenna maziɣ
meẓyan u muḥ ur ifehhem ara tiziri tagawawt
annect-a icuba-iyi rebbi ttidiren-t akk wid yetteffaɣen
kkes ur xdimen
ur ttkeyyifet ara
neɣ ma yella ur iyi-ixdim ara azal
Ɛeddi-d ad nemlil
Ṭṭafareɣ arricaɛban azwaw
err-itt ɛad ar uɛezri am nekki
a-t-an ak-rrent tselbeḍ
asma ara sawḍen i umddakel-is ɣer sseḥ ad d-yuɣal ɣur-s
teɛya deg tudert iman-is
yessefk ad sen-nini
ula d addal d tussna
ad s-tiniḍ d ẓẓkarat i xeddmeɣ
meẓyan u muḥ ur d-yebdir ara tiziri tagawawt
deg-sen i ttafeɣ lehna d wazal uffir n umdan
a-t-an tsewqeḍ
yif ad qqimeɣ iman-iw wala ad sleɣ neɣ ad heddreɣ i wid ur nfehhem ara ayen d-qqareɣ
tɛebba-yas barcelona xemsa n teɣyal i real madrid
ala amlili ur ttemlilin ara
Ɛṛeḍ ad twennɛeḍ tagnizit-inek
wayeḍ akken ad iḥewwes
ad xedmeɣ abrid i wid teǧǧa tebɣest
yal yiwet tessen abrid-is d umkan iɣer tettuddu
tenna-tt-id rradyu-agi
ad tebɣu ad s-tebru i waṭṭan i tt-yeṭṭfen
iṣṣeḍ uqjun-ihin
acḥal ur d-tufi win itt-iwalan amek tella
Ɛyan deg uktli iyi-ttektilin s wallen am wakken nekk ur sɛiɣ ara iḥulfan
ur ttneẓnuẓemt ara
ay ul yebḍan ɣef sin yebɣa Ḥsen yebɣa lḥusin
ayen d-yersen sdat-i iɛedda
mačči s usmesxer i asent-ittekkar i tlufa
d timezzungit win iḥebbsen agrud deg texxamt-is
deg txeqqufin neɣ ahat deg tezlatin kan
am win yettṛebbin ibki ulac taduḍt ulac ifki
imi tebɣam akka
rewleɣ-d deg tlemmast n yiḍ ɣer uxxam-nneɣ
mi ara wwḍen yal wa ɣer ccɣel-is
ulayɣer leɛyaḍ
imdukkal-is akk ttḥibin ad qqimen yid-s
ass-a tin i d-yerzan fell-as yettu ayen iɛeddan ifat
iṛuḥ ad d-iseyyed deg wadeg ara yurar tinis
ad as-t-id-tɛemmer ula i maziɣ
Ḥemmleɣ ad sweɣ crab n ukarṭun
tettesmumi deg lɛibad am wi
yal wa lutu i yebɣa ad d-yenǧeri yiman-is
icaṭ ay teqqleḍ d aṭufan
acku tuget n tiziwin-iw
saɛid u muḥ yerẓen
inerza yakk ttuɣalen s axxam wa deffir wa
Ḥbes aqemmeṛ
allen-is ttecruruqent-d d imeṭṭi
ata yečča ticeṭṭaḥin-a s wallen
ur ttihiyemt ara
ttrebbint tmucuha
a sstut
tirag-inu
d ayen isehlen
ar melmi ara nessusem ɣef wayen ay aɣ-yeḍran
Ɣer wallen-is
nrennu i wid yesɛan mačči i wid ixussen
cɛel aselkim-inek traǧuḍ kra n lweqt
Ɣef lutu-inem
akken kan ad taweḍ iwakken ad as-d-tehder ayen tebɣa
meḥsub d netta akk i yeɛlayen deg tɣiwant
yiwen ur tt-yezgal s wallen
akken i d-tenna tussna amdan yekka-d seg yibki
yettarra-yas awal s leɛweǧ i yemma-s
armi ugadeɣ imi ur-d-tekcimeḍ ara ar internet ass kamel
yerra-iyi aman ɣef usawen
tkenned ɣef wussu
d ssinima i ixeddem mi ara yeṭṭes
atan iεessasen n lḥebs ad gen yiwen usunded ad yeṭṭfen tlata n wussan si ttnac n yiḍ d asawen
Ǧǧiɣ-tt deg tkuzint teskayar učči
yerra-as akka ilmend n leqder
Ɣucceɣ-kem
jiniral de gaulle yerza ar taddart tizi hibel
ad teddumt yid-neɣ ɣer lexla
Ɣlint-d ɣer wid teffeɣ talsa
sliman u muḥ ur yerri ara ṭlem ɣef tiziri tagawawt
ur sṭerṭur ara
ur smuslubemt ara
ala ur sriɣ ara tawlaft-ik
jean iṣadd iḍelli ɣer fransa
lemer gzan akk medden taluft tili ur tennḍen ara deg-s
anwa i izemren ad iɛlem ayen ara yeḍṛun azekka
iban-d wabu
terna ɣer ɣur-sent akken ad ččent jmiɛ
yella yettmeslay kan d yid-s s ttawil n fasebbuk
ass-nni d agfur dɣa sliman u muḥ ur yebɣi ara ad yeffeɣ

anta taqcict ur nebɣi ara ad tettwaqader s wayen tesɛa deg wallaɣ mačči s wayen terfed deg tfekka
d acu di d-nini yemmenṭaṭ yimi yeččan aslay
Ɛerqent-awent
eǧǧ-iyi ad k-id-smektiɣ ɣef yiwet n tɣawsa
tḥemmleḍ ad telseḍ llebsa n yeqbayliyen
gar-asen azal n sin n yidudan akken ad mlilen
mi ara ineqqec iger wellah ar yif tayuga
ur fhimeɣ acemma
ur ken-ɣaḍen ara
henri genevois yexdem yiǧ n unadi ɣef temnaḍt n ayt smaɛel
ad d-nezhen leɛrac
aṭas-aya ma yewweḍ-iyi lexbeṛ n marie  ssarameɣ ur tt-yuɣ walu
yessaram ad ad ibeddel timuɣliwin alukan deg taɣult-is kan
Ɛni tettḥessiseḍ-asen i widak
ad d-awiɣ iseɣ
tekkes-as tadimt akken ad t-terwi
nusa-d ad nẓer addal-a amaynut
tberzeḍ-d taxxamt-ik
i sin yid-sen ṭṭalayen deg lebḥer
imsidag iqbayliyen ur berrun i ṭṭbel deg waman
faḍel yegra-d d ameεcuq n yiwet n teqcict timeslemt n maṣer
ijmeɛ-iten ala sbaḥ lxir d mselxir
ula d imawlan-nsen ahat d ttarika n lejdud-nsen neɣ d ddeɛwessu iten-izedɣen
imddukal uɣal am wakken llan iseggasen imezwura deg tesdawit
akken i d-hwan deg lkar
ad testufum umbɛed
Ɛebderreḥman al-waɣlisi yeɣra am ibn xeldun ɣer wedris di temdint n bgayet
kkert ar tejmaɛt ad ttrebḥem
iḥrec aṭas Ǧeḥḥa aqbayli
imru i ṭṭfeɣ akka tura mačči d ayla-k
anda-t ukursi-nwen
icennu deg unebdu netta d imeddukal-is
awimt-tt ma truḥemt
ur tbeddleḍ ara akk
yessal akken ad yefhem mačči akken ad iyi-d-yerr
tanemmirt-nwen
yesnuɣna yidir newwara
yuzzel
ikad-ak-d yeεni nezmer ad nerbeḥ
ur d-tenni ara awal
d kemm i d ssebba n waya
d wi i d idrimen-nkent
fell-i i turamt asefru-nni
ad tḥebsemt deg tasaft neɣ deg iɣil n wammas
daye iyi-ǧǧan sufɣeɣ-ak-d ayen yellan deg wul-iw
Ḥsu d ifassen-ik i d imezwura i d-yersen fell-i seld lweḥc-nni iyi-ɛedmen temẓi-w
ttaɣeɣ-d aɣrum yal ass
yewwet-it yiṭij s aqerru
itett s tɣawla
azzel neɣ qqim
lukan kan nbeddu lxedma neɣ taɣuri ɣef lɛecra n sbeḥ
yenɣes usemmiḍ ɣur-k
yenwa ala yes-sen i tzemreḍ ad ttɛiwneḍ medden
d leqrun segmi i sen-truḥ i yedrimen tengawit-nsen n lkaɣeḍ neɣ n umɣuz ma d tura dayen uɣalen d izwilen am deg uselkim
bdan asḥaḥi n uẓerẓur
lfeṭṭa xelḍen-as aldun
tom yessuden tiziri tagawawt
d acu ara txedmem ma d ageffur
Ɣef leqwaɛi
yennum yettmeslay d tcixet-is
iḥebbes-iten deg uxxam
yuker-iten
wissen amek ara tefru
ayen ur zmireɣ ad d-rreɣ
teɛreḍ ad tessers aqerruy-is
fkem-iyi-d ssmana
ffer
teḥla cwiṭ yaya-k
ad d-gezmen tamtunt-nni
tuɣ-d aɣrum
ur t-terzi ara taluft
nuɣ-d ayen kan iwulmen
ad ṛuḥen ɣer sedduq neɣ ɣer sidi Ɛic
ur yettcukku ara yidir di newwara
ad t-tawiḍ yid-k
Ɛni d kečč i ten-iɛeggcen
a tirgara-m
myenɣent
anti i wen-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi
d wi i d idrimen-nwen
maɛna nekk ur bɣiɣ ara ad tfehmeḍ s nnaqes
kemm tessneḍ amek ad as-tṛuḥeḍ i ddunit
nwiɣ ayen akken akk ur ufiɣ ara ɣer temddakelt-iw
i txatemt yexdem s lqis yeqqen-itt uḍad wis rebɛa
tuker-asen
tugar-it faḍma-nsen s sin n yiseggasen
ala kennemti i yeẓṛan amek ara ad txedmemt
mazal ur fhimen ara taluft-nni
aya giɣ-t
ay cebḥent tjeǧǧigin-a
d lḍufan yettmuruden ass-a ara yuɣalen d amɣar uzekka
Ṛṛẓet iqeṛṛa-nwen cwiṭ
yufa-t-id lḥal di lexla
akken ad tzemreḍ ad txedmeḍ tazrawt fell-as
anwi i k-d-yeɣṛan
sɣur wumi i sen-d-kan idrimen-nni
txeddem kullec
xeddment kullec
sarameɣ fukken fell-ak iɣeblan
ur tettruḥumt ara
wtet afus a lɣaci
ad truḥeḍ neɣ ala
cukkuɣ mačči d taswiεt iwulmen akken ad nmeslay ɣef annect-n neɣ ala
s tilin-ik
ahat tebɣamt ad d-terremt
aah a tibratin ma yeḥla neɣ d amuḍin
ulac win ara sen-yeṭṭfen afus akken ad ten-yessiweḍ anda bɣan
susem deg leɛnaya-k la qqaṛen
ad t-awin yid-sen
ur sεuẓẓug ara
ur as-yeɛǧib ara userwal-nni i mmi
awi-d dduminu-nni taɛzizt
acimi i nugi ad nemyeεqal
ad yawi cwiṭ yid-s
fkiɣ-as amawal i gma
iɛḍes-d
ur ttruḥun ara
heddreɣ-as yeggumma ad ifhem
ad sen-d-inint azekka
temɣur lqima-m ɣur-i
efk-iyi-d ssmana
iger-iyi-d amcic s aqelmun
yerra s iɣẓer
buhegguh ɣef ayen yeṭran
ur ixeddem ara yidir maḥyaf gar warrac d tullas
yerna ttrajun akk deg-s ad ten-tessuffeɣ deg yir tudert i ttidiren
aql-i di lhemm-iw
yuɣal-it-id rruḥ
ur iṣeḥḥa ara yiẓri-m i tenhert
anezgum izdeɣ-aɣ
wakil d iḍ s tebrek-is i aɣ-d-yettakken tabɣest
telha tberkukest i aɣ-d-tesres
d lɛib ma tenniḍ-iyi-d ala
tettuḍ d acu i s-txedmeḍ
nettat i iḥemmlen ticuqufin umezgun
ur tettawḍeḍ ayen tebɣiḍ
ur tḥemmlemt ara ad theḍṛemt d wid ur tessinemt ara
aselmad-iw n tefransist yenna-k kečč ilaq ad d-teffɣeḍ d ameksa
ay agejdur a tasilt
iḥemmel ad iɣer yidir idlisen ladɣa ungalen
d idlisen i d-ittaken tafat n tmussni
ur ttiddimeɣ ara akka
ad tettedduḍ s tfenṭazit
d aqjun-im ad ččeɣ tisugar
imi tebɣam akka ihi ad neḥbes kullec
xezzṛemt kan agejdur-agi
ur t-kkateɣ ara
ur tettruḥu ara ɣer tesdawit
yella-d ujdid fell-as neɣ ala
nnumen tetten s tɣawla
ur yesɛi la lmelḥ
Ɛni ṛṛẓiɣ-awen iqeṛṛa-nwen
melmi i yebda tanhert
d tigi i d tisutriwin-nkent s umata
tbeɛɛdeḍ tura i tlufa dayen
msawalent
ad tt-awint yid-sent
dhu kan d yiman-ik
acḥal i kent-d-mazal
d ta i d ayla-nwen
alammi wwḍen ɣer tkerrust n sima
isetḥa ara tt-iqablen
ayen i d-iseww ad as-d-yeffeɣ d ččekčuka
tessnem ad theḍṛem d igurdan
uma d iṭij ḥlaw ɣef wudmawen
anwa i k-d-yeɣṛan
mulud mɛemri yefka-d anamek-nniḍen ɣef wawal n tatrarit
iḥulfan-is ala taqbaylit i ten-id-yessakayen
isawel yidir i newwara
itbeɛ-tt
Ɣaben iḍellaɛen si leswaq
ttmektin-d tiqdimin
iḍla-as-ten i tmeṭṭut-is
ay aḥnin ḥun
yettu belli deg uxxam n sima i yella
ad tidireḍ iḥulfan-ik akken iwata ɣas ulamma d asugen kan maca sɛan tizeḍt
deg-s d amedya
d acu akka i la txeddmemt din
d talexxaxt
neɣ d ssifa-s i tt-id-ijebden
yewwet-iyi wugur
d wa i d agdud iwumi yeɛreq ubrid
fell-asent i turiḍ asefru-nni
ttmektiɣ-d kan ayen yeḍran iḍ iɛeddan
melmi i am-yehwa
walit kan ma jban-d
eǧǧ-iyi ad sirdeɣ iqbac
ayen yeqquṛen yessefk ad-t tefeẓẓeḍ s laɛqel s tuɣmas-ik
Ɣef wannect-a ilaq ad tt-ǧǧeɣ
yufa-t yqqim iman-is deg ṭṭabla
ass-a ad tt-newwet ɣer lebḥer
anwa-t bu tjellabt-ihin yellufḍan
ula d tarrayt s wacu i ten-tesɣar d wamek i tettmeslay yid-sen
la tameṭṭut
ad iyi-tawimt ɣer sbiṭaṛ
srid ad yerwel ɣer berra
susem deg leɛnaya-k la qqaṛent
ttsewwiqeɣ yal ttlata
yal yiwen d acu i yessaram
ad d-yas wass anda ara tendemmeḍ
ggumaɣ ad d-ffɣeɣ sina
ula d taẓrudiyat ur tessin ara ad tt-tesseqbec
nezga nettnaɣ
lɛibad yiwen-nsen deg tfekka
mazal azal n xemsa n ikilumitren ad awḍeɣ
tsellemt i ṛṛadio taqbaylit yal ass
eǧǧ-it ad t-ixelleṣ
ur ḥesseb ara iman-ik d lfahem
lḥut syagi
iḥemmel ad isel yidir i newwara
yeǧǧa-tt ad tettru war ma yesseḥbes-itt-id
sɣur wumi i wen-d-kan idrimen-nni
ma ulac aɣilif awi-aɣ-d sin ifenǧalen n lqehwa
ur ḥerreṣ ara iman-im deg uxeddim a yidir
maca tiyitiwin n wul d tid n wallaɣ
ibeddel lebɣi-s
teqqur tasa-s
wid teǧǧa rreḥma
yewwet ugeffur iḍelli deg yiḍ
ur ttqelliq ara
ayɣer i tḥemmleḍ ad teqqimeḍ weḥd-m
txeddem lmeǧhud-is akken ad tefk afus n tallelt i wid i tt-id-iqesden
ad ṛuḥeɣ ad d-aɣeɣ ayen ara ččeɣ
tin i tebɣiḍ tugi-k
ad sseweɣ tibḥirt-iw ma d-uɣalen waman
tettru tiṭ yeggigem yimi
tuɣ-d newwara amendil i yemma-s
yessefk ad d-yas
melmi ara d-truḥeḍ
acimi i tugi ad terfed tmurt aqerru-s
yiwen wass tmudd ula d tamsirt ɣef tudert tabadnit tumḍint
am rrezg-ik a yaqbayli
ttɛebga n weɣyul tefsusi tuyat-is d tilmawin
ad d-tuɣal ya
anamek n tetrarit
awal i t-iferrun d awal
i lbiɛ
yurew-d abarrar
imawlan n yidir ḍemεen ad d-iffeɣ d ṭṭbib
tekki ɣef tqeffilt tayeffust
senned ɣef tqeffalt sfeḍ akken ad tekkseḍ isebtar yettwarzan inadiyen inagan n tuqqna akked wawalen uffiren
aniti tisebbaḍin i m-iɛeǧben
acimi yugi ad yidir ad yeqqim
Ɣas rẓaget tidet telhan tmenna-is
mazal ur yefri ara wawal
ldi
mačči ɣef wannect-a
tufa d maziɣ
ur tewwiḍ ara amḍiq-ik
tuker-it
ad yi-teǧǧeḍ
akabar nnur azzayri
d awway i t-yewwi
yuɣal d win n ufella
mazal alamma ifuṛ-d snat tikkal
mbeɛd ad t-nwali
yiwet am ta ur d iyi-teḥqiṛ mm taɛyunin n ṭṭiṛ tessen-iyi nekk d aḥewwas
seqdec touch id akken ad tserḥeḍ i usnas
tameɣra teqqel d tanṭelt
atan yekkat afus aḍar
aql-ik deg tqacuct
efk-asen tiẓurin atenta am skeṛ
acu ara tebɣuḍ ad tesweḍ
eɣli-d ṭṭlam ur faqen
wa yeqqar i wa kečč d amcum
mazal ur fhiment ara taluft-nni
dhut kan d yiman-nwen
twalaḍ tura
ala kečč kan ara tt-yefrun
am ujeḥlum n tyaẓiḍt
txuṣ-ik lqahwa
asmi d-wwḍen yikayaden imezwura ara sɛeddin deg tesdawit
anda teḥma ad greɣ icci-w
anwi i wen-d-yeɣṛan
ad tt-tawi yid-s
tezgiḍ din
tfaqem-iyi
tameṭṭut-iw aɛzizen fell-i
tekkseḍ-d cwiṭ n tẓuṛin zgelli
d tayunin akken ad siwelen
ad iniɣ tḥemmlemt-t
ur yelli fessus akken ad tḥemmleḍ
ɛeddan wussan smanat agguren imenza seg mi teḍra tedyant
yal yiwen ad-d ittwali taseddaṛt fiɣef nuli nnig-s ur d-ikki kra
yekker ad yeffeɣ
ad iniɣ tḥemmleḍ-t
nekk bniɣ-tent s uɣanib n tira-w
diri-t wurar-ik
ilaq ad yerbeḥ
i nutenti i wumi txedmem akk annect-a
Ɣas akken ula d netta tecɣeb-it temsal n lweqt-is
akken i sen-txedmem kifkif
ad t-id-alin yidamen
awi-d kan amek ara d-banen s tugna yelhan
ahat d lebɣi-s akken ad tẓer maẓiɣ
deg leɛmer niɣ-t-id
d netta i d tigejdit
d acu i tugademt ma tennamt-d tidet
yella lgaz deg taddart-ik
Ɛni tettḥessisemt-asent i tidak
acḥal ur d-tbaneḍ
ur ttɣimit ara yid-s
ayen ffreɣ lesnin
txuṣ-iken lqahwa
am wakken d nutni kan i yellan neɣ d nutni i yesɛan lḥeq
yezmer i usemmiḍ am wa
ayɣer i tesxeṛbeḍ tibḥirt-is
asirem-is yettimɣur deg wass ɣer wayeḍ
tebɣa kan ad tezhu
ayɣer i tesxeṛbem tibḥirt-nsen
Ɣas akken meẓẓi
lemmer ad kent-ssutreɣ kra ad tagimt
susmet deg leɛnaya-nwen la qqaṛen
am wakken qqaren yeshel ugelzim deg ufus n ɛemmi
d ul i t-yebɣan
ur heddeṛ ara yid-i
ma tenna-d rray-is
akked wumi i tennuɣem
anda i llan warraw-im
ad s-tiniḍ deg tmucuha n zik i ddren neɣ ahat ggran-d kan d azamul iwakken ad ffken asirem i yimdanen ifazen
teḥla cwiṭ yaya-twen
mɣin-d ibawen deg tebḥirt-im
walimt kan ma yejba-d
ttxil-k da tlaq tsusmi
Ɛni d kemm ara ydebbṛen fell-asent
ala nekk
wali kan ma jbant-d
ur tezmireḍ ara ad trefdeḍ wa
ur ttmeslayemt ara yid-sen
tzemrem i usemmiḍ am wa
akken yuɣ tanumi
iteddu ɣer temkerḍit akken ad iẓer sima
deg leɛmer mlalent
tettum d acu i s-txedmem
d ta i d tilelli iwumi ur zmireɣ ad as-serḥeɣ
diri-t wamek i tetturarem
la yekcem deg yixemmimen-is
d tigi i d tisutriwin-nwen s umata
ma yella txedmeḍ lutu i yiman-ik
sarameɣ fukken fell-akent iɣeblan
xdmemt-as akken i kent-texdem
aɣlif n tdawsa d yimezdaɣ d useggem n sbiṭrat
ačewčew azewwaɣ yennejla
neqqim teqqimem teqqimemt qqimen qqiment
teɣriḍ di tmenqas
ad aɣ-d-awint lhemm
kaisa khalifi
widak iteffren deffir n tsebbalt neɣ deffir n tedmarin n jacqueline dihin di fransa
akken i ilaq ad yili
ayefki n tyemmat ur yesɛi tamtilt
yeǧǧa-tt teqqim iman-is
yettserrif mebla cceḥḥa
ɣur-k ad t-yečč ubeɛɛuc
ad d-yeqqel daɣen lawan ideg d-yettecrurud yiṭij am tsekrin γef tɣaltin
yufa-am amahil
tinɣiman
agraw i zzayer
dɣa nnulen lqaɛa teɣli-d fell-asen lihana d tameqqrant
cqerrweɣ-k
tarbibt ay ameksa ur teẓriḍ ara anida i iεedda uγerbal
am kemm am netta
yennecraḥ wudem n umsaltu sakin yečča-yi s wallen ɣas akken tetwelles liḥala
mi i nɛedda ad aɣ-d-imuqel
nugad leεtab n uẓekka
ad ak-ten-in-awiɣ azekka
terram-ten deg uɛewwiq
dima nteg aya
ur k-tewwi ara lqaɛa ɛni
d wa i d imensi-w
yeddem -ikent yerna yeɣra
ihi imi kifkif-itent acimi ur teɣriḍ ara s teqbaylit
ilaq ad tesweḍ kra a yidir
aṛubu-nni yessexlaε seg akken yettbin-d s tidet d amuddir
cnant-d d temɣart
awit-ten yid-wen
myeḥmmalen
wa zur wa rqiq
yura-aɣ-d tabrat
iseṭṭel acekkuḥ-is
tḍemɛeḍ kra seg-i
teddamt-asen di nneqma
tettzad deg uɣewwes
meddlet tawwurt mi ara d-tkecmem
rriɣ-k deg uɛewwiq
ru ɣef yiman-ik
yuwi-akent-tent-id
ad d-tasem imuras-a
yuwi-asen-tent-id
mačči d nekk d netta
ittas-d deg unebdu
yerna unefray lweqt i temlilit axaṭer yejreḥ yiwen n umyurar
aman d tudert
yemla-ak-d abrid yelhan
ad as-t-id-ifek
tukarḍa d ayen ur nelhi
ur d-tsawaleḍ ara
wa yeḥdeq wa yeqbeḥ
acu tenniḍ deg wugar n uṛuti n uzger
yuwi-asent-tent-id
kra n wussan mbeɛd mḥend yuɣal-d
ur ken-id-ufiɣ ara din iḍelli
wissen ma teqbel
yefka adlis i gma-s
asentel agejdan n udlis-a yerza tagrawla tamarikanit
aṭas n yidammen i yeddan
timetti skudmal tettbeddil udem
imḍebṛen-nneɣ sɛan akk snat n tɣelnawiyin
ur ḥsiɣ ara ad zemreɣ ad t-xedmeɣ
ziɣ tekfiḍ
ur ssalay ara taɣect-ik
turew-d tfunast-nneɣ aɛejmi d aberqac
amsiɣret n lezzayer "qassaman" yuɣal d "aɣurru"
ziɣ tmexleḍ
yekker zik ad d-yelwi iniɣman
nettarra-kent deg uɛewwiq
ewwet-iyi-d
tamurt meqqert imezdaɣ drus
seg wass-mi zewǧeɣ ur ihenna wallaɣ-iw
takuski-ines iman-is
atan imecceḥ tarbut
aẓrem ameqṛan d win deg yettaṭṭaf waṭan n krhon
ayɣer i tesxeṛbem tibḥirt-is
yufa-ak amahil
i wayen icebḥen
yelli-m ha-tt-an s tadist
yettmeslay diɣen yuba taɛrabt
nwiɣ imeddukal-iw akk tifeḍ-ten
nedda-yas di nneqma
aqraḥ yuɣ merra lǧett-as
tnuda fell-asen tufa-ten
xedmen deg-neɣ axessar
uzneɣ-am-in tabrat
ideflawen fessin deg tefsut
iman-is deg telwit
tuklaleḍ nnig n waya
iqaqqaḥ mmi tabasast-is
yeffeɣ s tuffra
ad iyi-texḍumt neɣ ala
diri-t wurar-im
tḍemɛeḍ kra seg-sen
mazal-iken kan akken
tḥeṛcem kenwi
anda i yezdeɣ tom
amek i tuḍneḍ
ad tt-tawiḍ yid-k
tettfaras ayen akk ara as-d-yawin lferḥ d talwit
fkiɣ-tt d asfel i win tt-yebɣan
win ur nečči ara seksu-yagi d ameɣbun
anta i ken-yewwten
tekka-d seg-s
tfaqemt-iyi
xeddmen kullec
d lɛib ma tennam-iyi-d ala
yeṭṭef taqcict seg ufus
ala kenwi i yeẓṛan amek ara ad txedmem
meɛtub lwennas yebɣa mliḥ ad yili uwanek aqbayli ɣef aya i t-nɣan icenga n teqbaylit
tebɣa ad tettru s wayen i as-d-yenna maziɣ
yerra-tt ddaw uḍar-is
susmet deg leɛnaya-nwen la teqqaṛ
ur as-ttgen ara azal i wayen tesḥusay
beṛkat ur ttṛebibbet ara ɣef wanwa i tettkellixem
xas neqḍen acḥal d itri igenni ur inegger ara
wid ixeddmen leqder d lḥerma i yixxamen-nsen
yeǧǧa-t di tazzla
ur yenneḥtam ara alammi i as-tuker lmut gar wallen-is
d abrid i ten-yettawin tasebḥit
deg yimuras n tegrest i nleqqeḍ azemmur
Ḥsiɣ d akken ayen iɛeddan ur d-yettuɣal
bururu ittseyyid-d iɣerdayen
tifranin ttwasfesxent sɣur lɛeskaṛ n lezzayer ass mi i tent-rebḥen isenselmen
ula d nekk walaɣ d acu i k-iceɣben
ulac am warrac i ten-iceɣben ala turart

anfem-iyi ad arguɣ

win yettnadin ittaf

yessusem yebra i wallen-is
bururu d agḍiḍ n yiḍ
yerra-tent deg uɛewwiq
cukkeɣ ur s-ɛǧibeɣ ara i baba-m
akka tura nneɣniɣ
nesra kra n wumlan ɣef teɣremt

aragon icudd ɣer tnigilawt
awal d awal tisusaf d aman
glu-d yis-sent
aqenduṛ tačamart ma d aqarruy yenneḍ-as taɛmamt
anda i tezmer ad tili

taqbaylit d tutlayt n tyemmat-nneɣ
iɛedda useggas yuwi yid-s acḥal d tarwiḥt

tom itess ayefki tal tanezzayt
susmemt
ferseɣ tileqqamin iwakken ad gmunt
yeẓmeḍ-iyi mmi ger ifassen-is
iḥar ad inaɣ diɣen
mlem-iyi-d d acu i d-tesnulfam
tiɣimit urǧin tenɣa yiwen
ad d-ffɣeɣ seg yixeddim ɣef tis sḍis

ay udem n ikerri

ur ttmenṭaren ara yidrimen

Ɣur-s yiwen n udem n uneglus
ziɣ qeṛsen-ak lexyuḍ
ben bella yenna-d  "nekni d aɛraben d aɛraben d aɛraben"
tedda-yaɣ di nneqma
ad asen-tent-in-awiɣ azekka
ad as-tt-in-awiɣ azekka
yulli ɣer el-kkaṛ
aselmed deg zzayer yif-it lḥif
ur d-yenni ula d yiwet n tikkelt tidet
aweḍ-d
yif-it win yeqqimen deg uxxam
yezzi-as-d aɛrur i teslit yezzeḥweḍ yeffeɣ
nekcem deg waggur n meɣres
yekkat tiryalin lǧib-is dima yeččur
tuḍen yemma teṭṭef ussu
ini-iyi-d ma kra dagi akk tuɣeḍ-t-id s tkarḍa-w
rrbeḥ mi d-yedla fell-i ur iyi-d-yufi ara
ad awent-t-id-ifek
deg tegrest ssaɣayen times deg lkanun akken ad ẓẓiẓnen
tewwet-as tisegnit deg taɣma-s
ruḥ ad d-teqḍuḍ
iḥemmel ad yečč iberčečča
kksem aɣilif d nekk ara t-ixedmen
d acu-t yennayer ɣur-k
melmi ara iyi-t-id-tiniḍ
ur iyi-terri ara tmara ad iliɣ akken tebɣiḍ

yettarra-ken deg uɛewwiq
ad awent-yanef ad tɛeddimt
imulliyen zerrin ccib irennu-d
ur yeqqim ur ibedd

ur yebɣi ara ad tt-iwali tettru
win ineqqen arrac mačči d alsi
rran-tent deg uɛewwiq

yegzem yid-s akk assaɣen i t-yeqqnen ɣur-s
wissen melmi ara yeẓẓed uzemmur-nni

yuzen-awent-in tabrat
wa ibedd wa yeqqim
ur aɣ-t-ttakk ara

err kan kra ṛṛuz ifetti
ttǧellibent teqcicin s umrar

selbeɣ fell-am

teεreq-iyi tenhert
d louis pasteur id-yufan ddwa mgal tuṣḍa
Ɣur-i yiwet n tmeddakelt yettidiren deg kyito

aya yezmer ad d-yeḍru i win yellan d ccaṭer

tessenked-iyi i uletma-s
ad ak-t-id-yawi azekka
yesteḥq umuḍin asgunfu

ahi aṛǧumt din

yenɣes usemmiḍ ɣur-kent
ad m-senseɣ tafat
d acu i k-yewwin ɣur-s
ur ttɣimimt ara yid-sent
timeẓda yeffeɣ rruḥ beddent ddaw n yigenni

iruja sami diɣen sḍis n wayyuren
anwa deg-wen ara yeffɣen iḍ-a

d aseggas ara aɣ-d-yawin ala ayen nebɣa

ad awen-yanef ad tɛeddim

umneɣ s tmelsa-ines

gan yiwet n tmeɣra urǧin d-teḍri yiwet am tin

yeɣra aṭas n yidlisen ilindi

d acu n ṣṣenf n yisura i tḥemmleḍ a yidir

uriɣ isem-im s lmus ɣef yiɣil-iw
eǧǧ-iyi abrid ad ɛeddiɣ
yeṭṭef tamacint iruḥ
bumedyen yemḍel akulunil Ɛmiruc di lkazirna n iǧadarmiyen yerna ddaw texzant
ur bɣiɣ ara ad ikes umeksa war tajewwaqt

ddayxa d tamellḥant i tt-icemten d anzaren-is ifayanen
yerfed afus-is akken ad d-yehder
di sin igiman u yiwen ttwanɣan meyya utlatin iqbayliyen s ifassen iǧadarmiyen
ttuɣ ur asen-tt-in-fkiɣ ara
tabrat i iyi-d-tuzen ṭṭfeɣ-tt
aneɣlaf n tdamsa akked win n tmerrit mlalen iwakken ad snarnin tamerrit di tmurt
yuɣal yefreḥ acku fehmen-t-id akken i iwata yimeshanayen
tisellet n tom texser
abrid ɣezzif kkrem ad nebdu tikli ma tebɣam ad naweḍ
tutlayt-iw ugin-tt nutni bɣan ad bɣuɣ tayla-nsen

deg tneɣrit ttɣimin deg yiwet n tgida
zzher-iw d aɛeẓẓug ssawleɣ-as ur d-yesli

Ɛeffeṭ
ttarguɣ-kem yal iḍ

aglaway d aṭan n tmiḍi
ur bɣiɣ ara ad qqiment teqcicin war tayri
tugadeḍ a yiwet n tbandit
nemla-awen-d abrid yelhan
nennum nettakk azal i wayen ur neswi
susmet deg leɛnaya-nwen la yeqqaṛ

wissen ma ad issewweq
d tidet kemm d tahuskayt

temlel n udfel tesdderɣil

tutlayt-inu d taqbaylit
wa yezwar wa yegra

ur tufiḍ d acu i iyi-d-yefka
tiqucac n yidurar mellulit seg udfel

mi i tt-iḥemmel yekker yuɣ-itt
ur tufiḍ i yettraju n wayen yelhan

nerra-t deg uɛewwiq
tekker akken ad tesseḥmu d acu ara ččen
anwa ara d-yedhun deg wayen i d-yeggran

yettaḍsa tom s uɣdebbu n maria
ur skiddibeɣ ara akk
ur ḥsiɣ ara ad iyi-d-isel tom

d acu akka i kem-yuɣen a cabḥa
seg wass-nni ur d-iban anda yerra
ad yerwu rray-is

deg ublug-inu llan ddeqs n yiḍrisen iseklanen

tumert ur tt-tessin ara akk amek i tga
anda-ken a wid nḥemmel
tikti-a d ayen i t-iceɣben seg wasmi i d-yekker
ruḥeɣ ɣer umejjay n tuɣmas axataṛ sɛiɣ lfula di tuɣmest-iw n leɛqel
ini-as akk ayen yellan
ttkel kan ɣef yiman-ik
serreḥ i firefox ios di yal tulya akken ad tesweḥleḍ anekcum ur ilaqen ara
ansa i d-ɛeddan d taneẓruft rrbiɛ urǧin ad d-yemɣi
maca katia ur tettwassen ara yakan gar-aneɣ send timenɣiwt-is
bɣiɣ kan ad nemmeslay
ass-a iselkimen ṭṭfen amkan meqqren di tudert n umdan
ayen i d-iɛeddan deg uqerruy-iw ad t-aruɣ
tettarra-ten deg uɛewwiq
ur bɣiɣ ara ad iyi-iɛiwen tom deg waɣanen-iw
walim a-t-an la yekkat udfel
ur nessaǧaw ara zzit n uzemmur
nesɛa sebɛa tyuẓaḍ ticebḥanin akked yiwen uyaẓiḍ azeggaɣ
fkan-as tiyita n leɣder

d adlis-ik ara yesnernin tamussni-k

nteddu-yawent di nneqma

aṭas aya ur as-d-yemmeslay yiwen am maziɣ

yemla-asen-d abrid yelhan
meskin yeɣli-d si tzemmurt dɣa seg wass-nni yewwet-it karaf ɣer iḍaren
ad k-yebxes Ṛebbi am buxus
mi akken yekkat ugeffur tuɣ-iten di lexla
s yiferrawen-iw yeẓdan tettddarim i tili-w yal ass
ad t-yeg rebbi d amezyad n lehna

tenna-d yelli "ḥemleɣ-kem"
s tfinaɣ irgel ilmawen yessakay deg tmital-is
tettarram-tt deg uɛewwiq
Ṣaḥḥa n tɛebbuḍt-nwen
aṭas aya ur myeẓren ara
ikemmez aqerruy-is
ayen ur sƐiɣ ḥedd

i iɛeddan d tletmiyya u xemsa u settin n wussan
ad tafeḍ yettsuɣu
ur ẓriɣ ma ttqenniɛeɣ iman-iw neɣ regleɣ i wayen yellan
meḥsub ur tetteɣ ara akk igumma
Ṭṭfen-d azemmur d amnaṣef
yeṛwa wegdud ameslay ur teḍfir tigawt
efk-iyi tagnit-iḍen
tal tanezzayt yettseṭṭil i yiman-is tamart
ssuma n pitrul tettali trennu

wissen anda akken i tezdɣeḍ
d acu i tɣileḍ εni
izga yessefreḥ-iyi ucmumeḥ-im
deg tegrest d asemmiḍ deg tmurt n leqbayel
yenna-d tom ur yebɣi ara ad yehder yid-i
yiwen deg teqrint wayeḍ deg tayeḍ
aqecwal neɣ aqelwac
deg wakken deg drus yid-sen

cennun yigḍaḍ
ur ittwakellax ara
zik wa ihedder-itt i wayeḍ
d anecreḥ kan i ttnecraḥeɣ
Ɛriɣ deg uɣerbaz amenzu deg uzemmur umeryem
asugen d tarewla seg yir tillawt
yir tudert tif-itt lmut
ay aḥlili d rray-iw i yebɣan tigi
reḍleɣ-asent adlis ad t-ɣrent
inced-d aṭas seg yimeddukal-is
yeḍfer tizrawin-is deg tesdawit n bgayet
ur iḥemmel ara yidir asṭuqqet n wawal
akal ṭṭfeɣ-t s yiẓuran
ur bɣiɣ ara ad rɣen yirden u ad ixaṣṣ uɣrum
ur tettret ara
Ḥuccen ass-a leḥcic
ur yezmir ara ad d-yaf tamentilt n yiɣeblan-is
arnaflas d win ur nettamen s tilin n kra n yillu
texdem akken tettxemim
Ḥulfaɣ s uzɣab
iɣucc sami imcac
seg yifurkan-is irqaqanen ttaglen-d yiguza n tẓurin
nwiɣ ad ɛeddiɣ akken ad neffeɣ akka kra
nɣan akk wid ur yettẓallan ara
kennemti tessnemt amek ad as-tṛuḥemt i ddunit
zewwaɣet melliḥet tettiqi seg sser
wissen ma yufa-tt
fell-asen i turiḍ asefru-nni
Ɛeṭṭben-at ijeɣdanen-is iṭ iɛeddan
yettarra-k deg uɛewwiq
llan yimɣan ur tettḥamaleḍ
awit-tent yid-wen
amek i txeddmeɣ akka akken ad tesxesreḍ kullec i lebda
kewweṛeɣ-d yiwet n taɣect d asdegdeg
Ḥemmlen yigerdan imsexsayen n tmes
yettak azal i wayen tehmel tmetti
anda ara yafeɣ win yeznuzayen iselkimen yelhan
umuɣ n yinelmaden n uswir wis ukkuẓ ɣezzif cwiṭ
cwi kan tella lmut
teddamt-iyi di nneqma
mačči d ul kan i teḥwaǧ teqbaylit d allaɣ daɣen
ikad-ak-d yeεni yelha win yeɣran adlis-a
izewwi-d iɛeqqayen n uzemmur s umextaf
hḍeṛ-d akken iqwem
tenced-d akk timeddukal-is deg usfugel n tissulya-s
tazemmurt-nni akken i ẓẓiɣ tuɣ
iles-is yeṭṭeḍ tasedda
ad awin cwiṭ yid-sen
imeṭṭi n uzger
nekk yakan wellah ma ẓriɣ
Ɛelmen belli itteddu-asen deg lebɣi
beṛka ur ggar ara iman-im
ur zmireɣ ad xedɛeɣ ameddakel
kra n wass ad nḥewwes ar lhend
isem-is ujeǧǧig-nni
tikwal tettafeḍ-tt-id
bdan ttqessiren
rran-ten deg uɛewwiq
tanqelt d aseklu i d-imeqqin anda yella uzɣal
d acu i d-snulfamt akka
seg wasmi i t-ɛerben aɣerbaz-nneɣ yuɣal ur yeswi
atta baqi tewweḍ-d lǧemεa-nni
deg leɛmer izleg-ak-d wawal nnig wazal-is
ur ten-yettawi ara yid-s
jida imiren ɣlin as-d imeṭṭawen seg allen
lhemm irennu-d ɣef lhemm ar tura ur tufi iman-is
tceggeb-itent taluft-nni
yal ass yettaru-as yiwet n tebrat
anti i kent-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi
tettarra-tent deg uɛewwiq
alaḥal ad ifakk useggas
angeẓwer yezgan azbu sdat icenga ahat ttekkin di tmentilt
yefka-as-t
yettaweḍ yuba zik s aɣerbaz
di sin igiman u yiwen nettwet yerna nettwanɣa
tettemsefhamemt yid-sent
ayen i tzerεeḍ ad t-tmegreḍ
d taqbaylit i kent-id-yefkan
yuba d anelmad amaynut n uɣerbaz-nneɣ
fkan ṭṭuɛ i lebɣi-nsen
cabḥa ur tettthenna ara teḥqer iman-is
ur yuki ur igen
ur walaɣ ara anda ara rreɣ aglaway-inu
ilaq ad xedmeɣ kra
ssarameɣ tufiḍ iman-ik deg uxxam-nneɣ
Ɣur-s amḍan ameqqran n yidlisen
anda akken i teffreḍ asefk-nni n nuwel
tura llan ttawilat n ulmad n teqbaylit
Ḥader ad as-tinim d tillas n yiḍ i t-yerran d amaggad
d tameṭṭut n yidir tihin
wid iẓewren ttheggin usu uqbel naddam
ttxemmim fell-asen
ur bɣiɣ ara ad iyi-ttseddiɛ unarag sdat tewwurt
ah a wi yegnen yid-k yiwen n yiḍ
yemmut yeqqed-i yedder yeqqed-i
heggaɣ-d asefru tebɣam ad awen-t-id-ɣreɣ
anwa ara yeṭṭfen adeg-is
win i iyi-iẓẓan iɣellet yal aseggas
temsel tabuqalt n talaɣt
asentel n tceqquft-nni yella-d ɣef wazal tesɛa tmetti deg urebbi neɣ usedrem n warraw-is d wamek i ḥekkmen medden deg tudert ɣef wiyaḍ mebla ma ssnen-ten
lufan ad teẓreḍ acḥal i ɛyiɣ
tamsalt ɣef wacu i d-temmeslay
d zzbel i d-tessuffuɣeḍ seg yimi-k
testeqsa-t amek i d tazmert-is tuḍen weḥdes s tuffra
wa yefreḥ wa yeḥzen
jeddi-tkent mazal-it yehlek
agḍiḍ daxel n tfergact am umdan daxel n usekraf
tanhert-is d tazwawaṭ
ilaq ad negzu d acu akka i tt-izelgen
yettwali-tt amzun d tislit s axxam-is mi ara teddu
ttcetkin akk deg waya
terwa llebsa d tukksa
seṭbeṭbeɣ ɣer merra tiwwura yiwen ur iyi-d-yeldi
ur yeẓri d acu-t amek-it win akken i as-d-ittebdaden
di leɛya-k ɣiwel
bɣiɣ ad fakkeɣ urar-a di taggara n ssmana-ya
ad aɣ-ṭṭfen ad aɣ-cneclen
amejjay n yigerdan yellan di buɣni yeḥrec aṭas
tajnant d aseklu i d-imeqqin anda yella uzɣal
ddunit seg zik tessaram ad tt-id-mmagrent treḍbanin
i wakken ad teddu tigawt-agi ddu ɣer iɣewwaṛen sakin efk tasiregt n tkatut i usnas
yuba u muḥ ur yessehbes ara tiziri tagawawt
yettru uqcic yugi ad yessusem mi as-rẓen alelluc-is
amek ara tgeḍ ilugan i tutlayt ma ur tettaruḍ yess
iles yettḥawal-itent aqerruy yettaɣ-itent
llan ifecka neɣ isnasen yessnen ad mmeslayen s teqbaylit
Ḥku-yi-d tamahut a jeddi
seksu s ubiṣar
wayeḍ ḥsu belli ad s-d-yenni
almi d tura i bdan ttfaqen s tmagit-nsen
ad ak-t-id-ifek
yenwa nnig-s ḥed ur yella
mi ara d-nuɣal ɣer umezruy n yiqbayliyen
am yiḍelli am wass-a d tizlit-nni
ayen nɣan yisɣanen deg yimdanen yugar wayen yenɣa ddexxan
taqbaylit teḥwaǧ aṭas n isura i warrac
d imṣetḥi seg wass mi d-ilul
mel-iyi-d anida-tt teqbaylit deg ulugu-a amaynut
naɛdin yemma-k
tadlist-a d ammud n temsirin
tikti tatrart tettlal-d deg wallaɣ yeftin
yefka-iyi ddada aleffrank
deg temlilit taneggarut i d-yeḍran deg tlemmast n lezzayer
yelsa abidi
aɣyul ttawin-t-id d anzi yettcebbiḥ deg yimeslayen
Ɣas ur tdum d asensu
ikreh iman-is
iɣunza ayla-s
uccen d bu txidas
tezga tessawal-as-d ad yekcem ɣur-s ɣer uxxam
cfu mliḥ d acu i yi-d-tenniḍ
amek i tettilimt
ttǧellibent tnelmadin s umrar deg ubaraz n uɣerbaz
i wakken ad nẓer amek i d-yella usmekti
tessen ad tecnu
tasemhuyt n ugeffur adfel akked usemmiḍ tfuk teǧǧa nnuba-s i cbaḥa n wussan
wid i d-yeslan i usefru i d-ssawleɣ tezɣeb akk tfekka-nsen
smeḥsis i yemma-m
uriɣ tafyirt ɣef tfelwit
tabrat i awent-d-tuzen teṭṭfemt-tt
ur yemɛin ara akk wayen i d-teqqareḍ
ffɣent-d tlawin ad sirdent iberdan
syen akkin ad zellin tisigert i ugdud
yufa iman-is
mi ara theddreḍ ur teffeẓ ara imeslayen
llant tɣirdmiwin di tmurt n walman
deg teftist iteddu iḍarren ḥafi
iṛuḥ ad iɛum di temda
nniɣ-as kkes aɣilif
isefra-s kkan-d seg wul-is
teǧǧel mi tella mazal-itt meẓẓiyet
mačči win i d-yurgan kra kan ad t-id-yini dayi
teqqarem agdud d ameɣbun
ah lamer ad iyi-twaliḍ amek uɣaleɣ seg wass mi nemsebḍa
yiwen urgaz seg taddart ur yekkir yiwen n wass ad t-yelqem
nekk d aɛeggal deg tneɣrit ur lliɣ ara d inebgi
d tameṭṭut tamcumt i yettassmen si tarbibt-is
isekkeḍ-it
a yemma anda-t jeddi
isuffeɣ-d inelmaden seg texxamt
yefka-d aṭas i tutlayt d yidles aqbayli
reḍleɣ-ak adlis ad t-teɣreḍ
muqel kan ma yewwa yimensi
deg ugerjum yebleɛ wawalɣas ma ur d-nenṭiq neḍlem
menyif yiwet n tɣawsa sɛiɣ-tt wala snat ad tent-sɛuɣ
ixuss-ik leɛqel ma tkemmleḍ ixeddim deg wadeg am wa
aselkim-iw yeḥwaǧ iseɣẓanen atraren
Ẓẓebra n umzil ẓẓayet nezzeh
tettɣil d irden i tezreɛ teḍmeɛ ad tili lɣella
taqbaylit tettkel ɣef warraw-is yettxemmimen dima fell-as
ur neẓri ara d acu i aɣ-yuɣen
Ɣef waya i as-qqaren i umenzu n yennayer buyni
yeṭṭef-d idrimen-is
ittaɣ iznuzu
anta yebɣan ad turar yid-i taɛelǧett
nek akked gma amecṭuḥ nensa deg uxxam n jida
taqbaylit d tutlayt d yiwen seg yifurkan n useklu amaziɣ
iteqqen tom tisekkadin-is am lɛada mi ara yeqqar
anwa yesseknen annuz
ilindi yella-d uɣurar imi teqqim aṭas lgerra ur d-tewwit ara
sawleɣ-as s whatsapp
tutlayin tiqdimin am tmazight neqḍent
dehbiya akked meqran myeḥmalen di lbaḍna
win inejlan si tmurt-is wissen ma ilaq ad nlum deg-s
iwwumi-tt
tindaw mazal ur kkisent ara seg wallen-is
s taduṭ n yizamaren i yezḍa ubernus
ur k-yettawi ara yid-s
idir ass-a ur k-tuqiɛ la deg yiḍelli la deg uzekka
tesqeṛqiṛ tfunast izan s tseṭṭa-s
ur iyi-terri ara tmara ad rajuɣ
ixeddamen zgan ttnaɣen ɣef izerfan-nsen maca imɛelmen sɛuẓugen
yezɣeb uglim-is
lammer zemreɣ ad ɛiwneɣ akk medden a rbeḥ a tafat maca ur amek
gma n tmara i iyi-ittun yeswa-d seg waman n wanu n zemzem
yefka tameẓẓuɣt akken ad d-yessukkes seg tmeslayt-nsen wanisa-ten
suddsen irmad idelsanen
i nekni i wumi txedmem akk annect-a
acḥal n yiseggasen i n-teqqimeḍ dihin
yezger saɛid usliman ar tala yufa din tameɛcuqt-is dɣa tenna-yas a saɛid tesneḍ baba rzu-d tammedit-a ɣur-s
wa ihenna wa icewwel
amεellem iqelleb ɣer tidet akken ad tt-yesteqsi
imerreɣ gar tullas
wissen anda i tzedɣeɣ
lsan-d yinelmaden tibantiwin-nsen n uɣerbaz
tuɣ-it tawla n leḥmala acḥal n wagguren tura
teddamt-aɣ di nneqma
ur tesliḍ ara d acu i ak-d-nniɣ
ad n-tsiwlem
Ṭṭuqqtent-d fell-awen tlufa
ad as-t-id-tfek
ad sen-yezzi s uεrur
acetki ur kem-id-yuli ara
tefkiḍ-asen abadaṛ
ur ttɛassam ara
ad ak-d-teḍleq mebla tuɣmas
ad s-d-nenced ixṣimen
yefka-yi abadaṛ
yebɣeḍ ad iṛuḥ
temlal yid-i
yeqqerṣ ṭṭbel-nsen
fkan-asen abadaṛ
a wid iṛekḍen sekra n wayen yemɣin
ad n-aseɣ ad ken-ɣafṛeɣ
a win yeqqazen iẓekwan
d acu i ken-yewwin ad d-tneṭqem
fti ay agdud
nuɣ-d agmer i tessirt d amellal
amek i tt-bḍan
ad aɣ-tekkseḍ ameẓẓuɣ
sya ɣer da ad tẓebreḍ ad tessusiḍ
Ṭṭuqqtent fell-asen tlufa
Ḥezzeb uqbel ad d-ḍrunt
iga tameɣra i umulli-ines
tazitma d tamrart s wayes ttarzen atmun ɣer uzaglu
ad t-ḍemɛem tijaɛal deg-i
ur ttqellideɣ turda-w i yiwen
ad n-ternu ṣṣura-w yeεyan
ddabax n uḍar yuɣ-d amaḍal d tirni
ad kfunt deg-i nnehtat
ad as-nnḍen am ugraw
a wid iḥekmen ayenni
Ẓṛiɣ dacu i bɣiɣ
irem yezmer ad ibeddel anamek almend n taɣult
teznuzay ayefki
akka i ḥṣiɣ
akka i slan
ttaddameɣ-t
d lawan ad uɣalen
ddmeɣ-t-id
ur yi-teǧǧiḍ ara ad t-waliɣ
nebɣa ad nekseb imelyaṛen
s teqbaylit i tettwaṛebbam
netta axir-nneɣ merra
nunef i wegraw nerra-tt ar leǧwameɛ
ad ffɣent seg uxxam
s waya ay nezmer ad nessemgired gar-as d wuddis
anwa deg-sen i yeffɣen
ilaq ḥerrkeɣ iqejjaṛen-iw
yekkat ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
yal ass tettargum s teqbaylit
tettaruḍ s tutlayt taqbaylit
tettbinem-d tuḍnem
tettcemmiṛemt iɣallen-nkent
lliɣ bɣiɣ win n lεali yakk
d taqbaylit i d tafat-im
ur s-ssineɣ ara i ccɣel-aki
fkiɣ-as laman i umdakkel-iw ixdeɛ-iyi
tessnem amek ara s-telḥum
teǧǧiḍ-iyi deg yir liḥala
aɛewdiw yesneḥniḥ
ad xedmen i yexdem umger i yiger
ad tfettiḍ am tcemmaεt
d tudert n amadou yessishilen abrid i tkeṛyas d medden di tɣaltin n maristes
taqbaylit tettali
mi kkren ad t-uraren ad bḍun iman-nsen ɣef snat n trebbaɛ
isawel i ẓẓher-is ur as-d-yesli ara
s teqbaylit ara tidir
aserraǧi d yiwet n tewsit n uzemmur leɣella-s ufayet yettekkes-d zzit aṭas
ad n-afeɣ teεmeṛ lǧameε
yurǧa ad t-yawi uṭaksi taggara yewwi-t uberriḍ
ur tezmireḍ ad t-tessakreḍ ala ma tesεiḍ kra n ttbut
Ččant ifelfel aqeṛḥan
tekkatem ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
asmi tella nniyya aḥayek yeddal meyya
d kečč i d asaḍ-iw
ad bduɣ seg tmezwarut
yewwi-t s axxam-nsen
fell-awen i nettkel
s teqbaylit i tettxemmimemt
ilaq-asen uḥerrek ar zdat
tlulemt-d s teqbaylit

d allen n weɣyul i yesɛa
ilaq ad naẓ ar zdat
qrib ad d-yaɣ tamrart waqila
akka i nehder iḍelli
zedɣeɣ yakan ɣur xali
tettzuxxumt s tutlayt taqbaylit
anda i teǧǧa tiqnedyaṛ-nni
ur inuda fell-i ur iyi-yufi
aḥric n tesleḍt
tḥemmlemt ad turaremt
Ṭṭiq ijjiq iεeggalen ur neḥdiq
ad rewleɣ si lbaṭel-inem
uliɣ ɣef ugmer ṛezneɣ-as aleggam idda s taqlaqalt
yella win i yeṭṭalayen
lemmer d-tettuɣal temẓi
gǧan-asent-d tarda leḥwal
ger yiḍ d wass yefferten wissen amek
ad tlemdem tutlayt taqbaylit
ma tebɣiḍ ad texluḍ iman-ik xas ḥṣu ur yettili ḥed d amcafeɛ-ik
Ččant lbaṭaṭa d taḥmayant
mi tuner ḥedreɣmi yeggul umneɣ
tameṭṭut terra-tt i lwaɛd n yimeṭṭi
akka i teḥṣamt
teddmeḍ-t-id
nek seg tama-w d awezɣi ad siɣzefeɣ amrar i twaɣit-ik
a times ečč aɛekkaz aɛekkaz yugi ad iwwet tehriruc tehriruc yugi ad yečč imensi
tebɣam ad tkesbem imelyaṛen
ur tnuda fell-asent ur tent-tufi
afud-nsent d tutlayt taqbaylit
tcemmṛem iɣallen-nwen
d baba-s is-tt-yeksen
tnuda fell-aneɣ tufa-aɣ
aberray d allal swayes ẓẓaden azemmur yemmug s uẓru
d lawan ad cemmṛeɣ iɣallen-iw
d acu i kent-yewwin ad d-tneṭqemt
mi tfukkem iluɣma ad nɛeddi ɣer usteɣsi-nsen
bɣiɣ ad wennɛeɣ lecɣal-iw
s teqbaylit i ttxemmiment
yettaddam-it
ad tekcem ar wexxam
yella yirem yezmer ad yesɛu anamek deg yal taɣult
aḥeddad n taddart igerrez-as tisemmiṛin
ad am-d-ketbeɣ
yekfa fell-i lḥif
yefka-yaɣ abadaṛ
azwel n ungal amezwru yura umaru Ɛmar mezdad d iḍ d wass
iṛuḥ ad d-yesseww ayen i d-yeṭṭef deg tadduyt
bɣant ad dewwṛent
tettnadi fell-i
terzef ferruǧa ɣer xwal-is
yelha unecreḥ
ad tertiḥeḍ i ddin amcum
teǧǧam-asent-d tarda leḥwal
d idrimen i d tamentilt n merra iɣeblan yellan deg umaḍal
ad aken-imel amek i ken-ttarran
iḍ yezrin gneɣ iḍes yelhan yeffeɣ-iyi umɛuqqi lliɣ necraḥeɣ aṭas
a wiḍ iḥulfan
sarameɣ-ak timejja s temɣawla
cemmṛeɣ iɣallen-iw
ttmeslayeɣ s teqbaylit
ilinidi i d-teḍra
asɣar-inu yeqwan d aquran deg tegrest ssaɣayen yis-s timas
ziɣ cwiyya-k kan deg-ki
ad tehḍeṛ s teqbaylit
anwa ara ad yi-d-yinin dacu d anamek n tumert
anadaf ileddi-d tawwurt n uɣerbaz inelmaden keččmen s abraḥ
ilindi akka imir-a i d-tedda d tislit
bɣant ad kesbent imelyaṛen
a muḥ a muḥ kker ma tedduḍ ad nṛuḥ
s teqbaylit i nettwaṛebba
sliɣ i yiwet n teqcict teɣɣar i leεnaya
buḍellu d aṭṭan yekkaten irden yettarra tiyedret ur tḍeɛɛem zun d ambuxen
yiwen iεelleq ajellab-is yemmut
d allen n wuccen i yesɛa
ad sen-iniɣ nekk d amaziɣ
aniti ara ibedden i leqdic-nni
ikeččem gar yiccer d uksum

d ifassen n wemcic i tesɛa

amek i tt-xeddmen
ad nadiɣ fell-as ad t-afeɣ
ur yebɣi ara ad d-isel
yefka-yasen abadaṛ
a yul-iw i tettɣaḍeḍ
rnu akk ayen i d-yenna ar tkaṛnit-ik
nessaram ad bnun sbitaṛ amaynut di tizi wezzu
cerreg ayen umi tzemreḍ ad t-txiḍeḍ
fkan-awent abadaṛ
ad tennerni s waṭas lɣella-s
iṛwa amerret di ddunit
abrid i medden yella
akli ur yettayal ara deg yiman-is
iruḥ ad yezdem isɣaṛen
d acu i teṭallayeḍ akka
ad qeṭṭun seg-k wussan
a tawaɣit-iw ad iyi-regmen warrac
tira d assesfer
d kenwi i yeẓṛan d acu i wen-ilaqen
fakk tefɣeḍ
sizdeget iceṭṭiḍen-nwen
axeddim ara d-yasen seg wul
yesɛa tirtaw allen-is ssirtiwent aṭas
tebɛemt takeṛṛust-ayi
semmed i uqeddic
d lawan ad nebdu tikli
yal yiwet d acu i d-teččur
yeǧǧa gma-s di leḥzen
acḥal n tikal i yuɣal anadoluspor d alɣuɣ
yessufeɣ-d ɣur-i accaren-is
tbeccemt aserwal-nkent
d yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun i d-tturaren yimezdaɣ n taddart
tigemmi tamaziɣt d tamesbaɣurt
d tom i t-yewwin
nesnulfa-d ihi ansay
ayen icudden ɣer wansayen n leqbayel
tidet iqerrḥen wala lekdeb yessefraḥen
teɛreḍ acḥal d abrid ad tɣer adlis
yewwi-tt s axxam-nsen
bɣan tutlayt taqbaylit
tessen amek ara s-teddu
tekkat tagitaṛt akken iwata
nna cabḥa uran-as deg ufus-is uṭṭun n ukabar ɣef ialq ad tbuṭṭi
tmeqqeṛ-d s teqbaylit
yeqqim yettewhem
Ḥemmlen ad uraren
ad ṭerḍiqen yidmaren-iw
izad ccwal deg yinurar
deg yiwen uzniq i tzedɣem kečč akked umdakel-ik aɛziz
myezɛafen
mazal-it deg yiri n baba-s
akka i tenwiḍ
tellamt dinna yid-s
lufan kan i ḍefreɣ iwellihen n tom
rriɣ-ken deg uɛewwiq
ulac nudaɣ ur ufiɣ kra
cqeṛṛeɣ-k ddu d tidett
lehdur ɣef medden
ilaq ad iḥewwes ar legniz deg unebdu-ya
ama d tid yellan neɣ d tid ur nelli
arrac bɣan ad zewǧen
terriḍ-as i jacques iwensen ussiden ines
teɛweq s wansa ara d-tebdu
ssuffɣeɣ-d ayen i ḥulfaɣ
yenwa dayen yettu ayen i yettezzin seg wasmi meẓẓi
ad neqqel ɣer tmurt
ay adrar err-d awal
llan kraḍ n yirgazen akked d snat n tlawin deg texxamt-a
lliɣ di tumert
ur tzeggel ara ula d yiwet
ur as-smeḥsis ara
iwakken d aɣen ur tt-yeggar ara deg ddiq lukan ad as-isiwel s yisem-is
ulac d acu i aɣ-d-iṣaḥen
ad ččeɣ abbaɣ-nwent
initen mgaraden deg tal tutlayt
cɣel iman-ik axir
ixxamen-is d tirni bnan s uẓru d wakal
ticki i yeḥsel
keṛhent anemhal-nsent
seg yimir-nni i bdan yimaziɣen ḥessben ussan
nwiɣ ssawḍeɣ semmuset tmaḍ n tefyar ziɣen mazal yiwet
yuɛer fell-as ad tefhem
abrid-a i d-tewwim ur issefraḥ ara
rut ɣef ẓẓher-nwen
tugimt ad d-tneṭqemt
ziɣ yewwi-ken zhu n lxalat akked leqmeṛ
la ihedder wul-iw
ulac am waddal
maziɣ ur tt-yesteqsa ara anda i tella tceqquft-a
waɛli d magnus wa di tizi wayeḍ di conpenhagen
da i d amkan-iw
ad lemdent tutlayt taqbaylit
ddwa "d yal aɛeqqar izemren ad yejji aṭṭan n umdan neɣ n uɣersiw"
ixxamen-nniḍen ttbanen-d ddaw-s
yif-it cciɛa ad tt-tawim kunwi wala wiyaḍ
iweṣṣa-yi
dayen nekfa
kra ur ak-t-sseɣren deg havard
deg tesnawit i tt-ssneɣ
gen di talwit a gma cilla naser d awezɣi ad k-nettu
gen di talwit a gma becca masinisa d awezɣi ad k-nettu
nessaram ad d-nssader ssuma
steɛfum kra
d taqbaylit i nebɣa mačči d akersi
kbel ajernan-nni
d ayen txellṣeḍ kan ara tawiḍ
teṭṭef tijeǧǧigin deg ufus
axxi-buh ččar kemm
ad nelmed tutlayt taqbaylit s wul-nteɣ
akka
iwacu ur tcennuḍ ara
lemden tikli yiwen wass bɣan ad fken timsirin i ibabaten n umennuɣ
nekk zhiɣ
tebɣes s wawal kan
ur yi-d-tehdireḍ ara yakk ɣef akka uqbel
tizeṭ-is deg imi-s
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem-nteɣ
ini-d tidet
Ɣas ẓallet ɣef yiman-nwen ay atmaten yeččuren d taflest
iwacu ur nhedder ara ɣef ayen nniḍen
srid seg bgayet
iḥuǧǧ ad d-yessired iɣsan-is
tutlayt taqbaylit tettnerni kra kra
ula d uccen ur yufi ayen ara iqewwet
aṭas ara iḥewsen ar Ṭelyan
d afenṭazi
s teqbaylit i d-kkreɣ di tmurt-iw
s teqbaylit i theddeṛ yemma-tsent
Ɛni tettumt
anwa yekkaten akken avyulu
tessneḍ ad d-tessuqled seg teglizit ɣer tjapunit
gen di talwit a gma serray Ḥafnawi d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ad yezyen yisem-is
ilaq ad d-sɣeɣ yiwen d ajdid
din ay nemlaqa
yeḥṛec tom
nwiɣ ahat twellamt
tom ṭṭfen-t yeznuzu lehyuf i igerdan
steqsiɣ-t ma yeḥwaǧ ssaεa
surfet-iyi i iεeṭṭlen annect-a
Ɛni teččḥem
ad d-fkeɣ idlisen-iw iqdimen
tettarraḍ iman-ik d agrud
gen di talwit a gma at mansur saddek d awezɣi ad k-nettu
Ččar ul-im d asirem tbeddeḍ i uzekka
d aẓar i yeṭṭfen addag yettak-as aman
d imekdiyen i tellam
acu d win
ihi yewhem d acu d akken ibedd kan yettweḥḥid
tikkelt ad tafeḍ ikerrez tikkelt imegger neɣ isserwat
ungal mačči kan d tulsin n teqsiṭ
nettwali tutlayt taqbaylit amek i tettnernay
teṭṭeglelli teqcict

ad yezzenz imeṭṭawen-iw
d annect-en
iwacu i k-ttagaden medden
sfeqɛen-t warrac uɣerbaz
srid seg tizi uzzu
d igḍaḍ
inehhu yiwen win meẓẓiyen

yečča taεṣebant iεedda yeẓẓel

d tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat-nneɣ
gen di talwit a gma arkam salem d awezɣi ad k-nettu

nekni ur d-neslufuy ara awalen igejduren i teqbaylit
yettḥeddid Ԑetman aserwal-is
balak ad ak-gen leɣrur
dɣa akken kan yuẓa ɣur-sen rewlen fell-as
