meẓẓi deg leεmer meqqer deg allaɣ
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat-nsent
s tayri i iheddeṛ taqbaylit
gen di talwit a gma bettar yasin d awezɣi ad k-nettu
gen di talwit a gma Ḥamac arezqi d awezɣi ad k-nettu
yeskeṛ armi s-yeqqar i weɣyul “ssek” iɣill d axerfi
tom ur iḥemmel ara timdukal-iw
anef ad ḍebbreɣ aqerru-iw
tafriqt d yemma-s n ddunit
ulac taẓuri iqebḥen
tesεamt ẓẓher i ixeddmen
tamẓabit d tutlayt mačči d tantala
acu ara k-in-iniɣ lliɣ tedduɣ ad seṭṭleɣ i kra n medden

ih deg useggas-nni n cceṛ
mačči d sslaḥ
s ifukal i tteskasin medden mačči s tekriṭ
tεebba-yas ddunit armi d ulamek
gen di talwit a gma yeḥya crif karim d awezɣi ad k-nettu
imuqel s itran yetwehhem
d taqbaylit i d-ḥefḍeɣ ar imawlan-iw
nella ɣas in-s ur nesεi kra deg tkuzint
ur d-tettbineḍ teεyiḍ akk
yedden ccix yexleε uqjun-nneɣ
ad iḍum i win yellan uqbel-is
Ԑawed ini-d anda tzedɣeḍ
ur ẓriɣ amek i iεawed yeḍra-d waya
gen di talwit a gma buɣrara arezqi d awezɣi ad k-nettu
deg lawan n uzemmur deg tissirt n ugummu-a i yettmahal
cnu ay agambar n Ԑebdennur
ilaq ad tesɛumt lḥir ɣef teqbaylit
yella wamek i s-tettili
tettwaεrḍem akk
d Ḥmanu i yesserɣen akk tiẓgi-nni
ma d cabḥa d tilemẓit s tezmert-is teqqim ɣef yiwet n tqermet
d nekk i d-tqesdeḍ
simmal tettnerni tutlayt taqbaylit
Ɛni teshiḍ
tagrest d tasemhuyt tuḥzint
amaḍal ḥudden-as tilas
yebbuḥbeḥ umedyaz seg teɣri
si zik mi t-ssnen d ahuẓẓi
ula deg surya yella uzemmur
tom yufa takaskiṭ-is
tullist-a d yiwet si tid yettwassnen nezzeh gar yeḍrisen-is
d acu tettwaliḍ ad t-xedmen
ur ittɛeṭṭil ara ad immet i mi tettali teqbaylit
yufa-d itri d ajdid
yekker-d seg wussu-s yelsa arkasen-is tawwurt tefk-it
tom yella iḥemmel marie nettat ur t-tḥemmel ara maḍi
tezham akk
gen di talwit a gma sebbas laḥsen d awezɣi ad k-nettu
mačči aṭas i as-mazal ad tt-tfakk akken ma tella
d ayen i ttεaraḍeɣ ad k-d-iniɣ
mi ara d-yekcem ad t-waliɣ amek ara nexdem akk
iluεa-yi-d yiwen ubeṛṛani deg lkaṛ
anda iḥerrek lɛesker afransis ad yeḥsu
cukkeɣ d axatar ukalas-a
Ԑyiɣ i uḍneɣ
aɣella-nni ahat yeɛdez yessendeh tarbaɛt-is ad tkemmel abrid-is
Ḥemmlen-kem
uccen-nni iwmi qqaren mḥend d awadem ameqqran
tqadd-d tfawet i ucerrig
d taqbaylit kan i d tutlayt n imawlan-iw
ur bɣiɣ ara ad tilim theddrem fell-i deg sin
adrar ad t-yeṣṣer
ur tettafeḍ ara ayen ara txedmeḍ
ur ttḥamaleɣ ara add y-rren am teqcict tabestuḥt
Ԑetmani d lmeḥna i t-id-iṛebban
lemmer ufin d nutni ara ɣ-d-yeqqaren melmi ara neg asarag neɣ xaṭi
adif yegguğ seg yiɣes-iw
aḍu ad s-d-ikeččem
tayeḍ d iceṭṭiḍen izeddganen i d-ssardent tlawin n taddart n tewrirt
d tasdawit i d-yekkren d umennuɣ ɣef tugdut
ad yettarra ttaṛ
wehmeɣ amek armi kunt-ǧǧan yimawlan-nkunt tusamt-d ɣer weḥd-kent
ad twalid lemri-w yeḥzen
yeɣra-tt seg tazwara-s almi d taggara-s
heyyan-as-d asarag
tenwiḍ yeεni yelha ma telsiḍ asured-ik assa
bḍiɣ tateffaḥt-nni
anwa ara tifeḍ ma yella ur txeddmeḍ ara
tuklaleḍ ad k-rnun deg lexlaṣ
heddren kan s yimi deg unnar ulac
tilelli ula i tmeṭṭut-ik d yelli-k mačči i tiyaḍ kan
tesexleε-itt tegḍiḍt n yiḍ
"acemma ur yettruḥ acemma ur d-yettnulfu kra din yettbeddil" i yenna lavoisier
bɣiɣ ad truḥeḍ ɣer ṭṭbib
tɣucc-it
Ḥareɣ ad kem-mlileɣ
ah ur d-mgireɣ ara
ur tebɣiḍ ara ad teẓreḍ amaḍal
Ɛni tuḍnemt
mačči d tameṭṭut n wexxam
ur nettwaεreḍ ara ɣer tfugla n uledduy
gen di talwit a gma masinisa germaḥ d awezɣi ad k-nettu
taɣaṭ-nni taberquct am uṭarus
dihya tkufeḥ akken tezmer teggul ur tekni zdat waεrab
win yewwin yid-s llamba ubeεṛur ad tt-yaf kan
semsed lmux-ik
tewwi mmi-s ɣer uɣerbaz uṛebbi
tameddit-nni kan cabḥa isserzef-itt urgaz-is s axxam n yimawlan-is
s tdukkli kan i nezmer ad nefres iverdan i ɣef nteddu
wissen anwa meṛṛa i yeslan
waqila tečča-d ul-nsen teqbaylit-nneɣ
yal ta s tlelli-s
ihi aql-i ldiɣ imeẓẓuɣen-iw i sin ma ad tebduḍ
muqel kan iman-ik ay ameɣbun…
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem-is
mi yebna lḥaǧa ad tedrem
Ɛerqent-asen
ayɣer i tettaḍsaḍ
ur i-yeεǧib ara ucmumeḥ-ik
kerheɣ lecɣal n tedbelt
ma txedmeḍ akken ad k-sṭixreɣ
teččamt
d isalli ara yessiweḍ s tuffra kanakken yettfuru i yimjuhad
rnumt tifyar akken ad tali teqbaylit
tzemrem ad d-tawim lefḍur-nwen ɣer uɣerbaz
ihudd axxam ɣef llsas
kmez-itt kan weḥd-k
neffeɣ kan cwiṭ i taddart mmugren-aɣ yimcumen-nni n lɛesker
llsas ma ur t-tḥudreḍ ad irab
teẓram belli tom teεǧeb-as lbira
Ẓran ɣas akken ddreɣlen
win i as-d-yeffeɣen d uɛkis ɣef wayen tennum
ad teslemdeḍ tutlayt taqbaylit i warraw-ik
assa i t-id-tuɣeḍ neɣ iḍelli
ad yi-d-teɣli kan tegnit ad εawneɣ yemma-k ad tesbeɣ isefreg-nni
ur zmireɣ ad d-gelmeɣ ayen iss i ḥulfaɣ imir
kra ur yi-t-rnan d tissit
Ɣef lbaṭṭel i iḍerrun gar lǧiran
nfukk-it
d acu bɣant ad nexdem

bɣan-tt akk leǧnun-iw
ulac d acu i d-tenna

imawlan-nni fkan isem n akira i mmi-tsen
ata lqeḍ ata uqabub
ur d-stufiɣ ara i zzhu
iḥemmel ad iqeggel deg uzal
yewweḍ almi d tala yuɣal-d akken ur d-yeswi
dayen tura ifuk fell-as wasif akked ussifi n ṛmel
tebɣiḍ ad tbeddel teswiɛt fell-ak
aḥric wis sin
ttɛayaren medden yis-i abder-iw s ḥacakum
armi ḥuddeɣ iman-iw
awamma en
ur bɣiɣ ara ad gujlen warrac ad ǧǧlent telmeẓyin
d ccwal yellan deg yexxamen i ttawin ɣer wennar n ddabex
ur ḥsiɣ ara ad t-xedmeɣ
ayen akk i d-yenǧer deg temẓi-s
teǧǧam-iyi-d tarda leḥwal
anef-as ad t-ixelleṣ
tikwal diɣen ttaččaren tiqrinin n ucwari d leɣber n yiɣersiwen-nsen
yeǧǧa-d later deg-s
ccah axaṭer d kečč i d-yezwaren ar wannect-a
tuɣ-d taqendurt turqimt
yeεreḍ ad yenɣ iman-is
tessureg ayefki s afenǧal almi d nnig n uzgen tkemmel teččur-it s lqawa
don quichotte de manche d ungal i yura umyaru aspenyuli miguel de cervantes deg sin iḥricen

isuffeɣ-d tanegḥelt-ines
tewwet-it
truḥ ur teẓri sani la tessaram tcennu
yekkes usamuray aqerruy n ufna-ines s yiwet n tyita
beddel tawlaft-ik
d taqbaylit i d tudert-ik
sber i tesber urfan axir-is
yegguma tom ad yeheder
maca teɣra kan akka kra n yijerriden
llufan ilul di tirwal tiɣratin di tgemmunin
tselleḍ i ṛṛadio taqbaylit yal ass
ilaq ad llint wallen-nneɣ ɣef ayen i d-iḍeṛṛun
yiwen ur t-iṣebber
itess yidir

i tanta ara d-iniɣ

seg ansi i wen-d-kan idrimen-nni
wwḍeɣ-d uqbel wiyaḍ
ur d-ttaseɣ ara

nɣan akk tid ur yettlusun ara lḥijab
d acu yeḍan d yelli-m
acku ishel-as i urgaza ad yenser deg tlufa am tigi
aql-i ar tom
ass-a rziɣ ar tnarit
gen di talwit a gma maǧan mehdi d awezɣi ad k-nettu
teṭṭefi-t tawla
tnuda fell-asent tufa-tent
d tamsalt-a i t-yeǧǧan ad yemgired d tiziwin-is
lisseɛ yesɛa yesrus-d allaɣ
am wakken yal mi ara d-yehder yettekkes-as ameslay deg uqemmuc-is
acuɣer ur tḥemmleḍ ara iqjan
idrimen sseččayen tijɛal
Ǧeḥḥa d imegzi ulac win ur ikellex ara
kkren-d mgal tiẓri n temhezt n darwin
muḥend saɛid amlikec d ageldun n yimedyazen
ldi ul-im d yiman-im akken ad yeḥlu lǧerḥ i kem-iqerḥen
ayen akk ttmenniɣ yerẓag deg tegnit-nni
yufrar-d deg tusnakt segmi meẓẓi
tirmit-is meqqert
nna mennun tislit-is cabḥa d yemma-s nna Ǧuhra heyyant iman-nsent
bɣiɣ ad s-heḍṛeɣ meɛna bezzaf tettsetḥi
yerfed imru yura asefru
maziɣ mi yeẓra liḥali-nni
i nettat i wumi txedmemt akk annect-a
ur ttettu ara tilifun-m
acimi i yettaggad targit
ur as-tban ara tmeddit-is
ur d-ssutur ara ttxilk
yezdeɣ deg tnarga-ya

ur yebɣi ara ad t-yeǧǧ iman-is seld tadyant yeḍran
iḥuza-yi uzal di lexla
yiwen n ubabat yezga yesteqsay mmi-s

ma yella ur tcemreḍ ara i yiɣalen-ik
aql-i di maseṛ
ad ak-n-sawaleɣ yal ṣṣbeḥ

ad k-ttuɣ terra tmara
ad iliɣ d win tebɣiḍ

ad errent s tiɣratin
ad teddu ɣer tizi n at Ɛica neɣ s at Ɛemṛan

eqqel
maziɣ yebɣa ad inig ɣer kanada

Ḍfeṛ-it
init-as ad yeqqim
aselmad n waddal iɣɣar-iyi abelbul
wa ijebbed wa ikerref
acḥal ad yi-id-tesqam
amek ara yaruɣ s teqbaylit deg uselkim
yugi ufarmasyan ad yi-d-yefk ddwa-agi mebla ṭṭbib
ferḥent-as tullas
yettxemmim akken ad yaru
yezga umedyaz ineddeṛ
yekkat udfel deg tqucac n yidurar n tmurt n leqbayel
ečč-it
tarrayt n usɣray tbeddel
ad d-tawim iseɣ
ihi tzedɣeḍ iman-im
ur ɛdilen ara gar-asen
ayen xeddmen d nekkni i t-yettxellisen
melmi m-d-nniɣ akka
acḥal n yigezda iyellan deg hend
isseḍṣay-d yidir newwara s temseḍṣa
izmer ad k-iḥsed ula deg iẓẓan
ur iṣeḥḥa ara yiẓri-k i tenherk
ur d-tsawlemt ara
ssuffɣet-d ayen i tettḥulfum
iḥiqel d awtem n tsekkurt
atekki deg tatoeba d asεeddi n lweqt rxisen
ad as-tiniḍ d taɣrast i d-itt-serriḥen i tzizwa
iḥemmel ad iṭṭef iwtal deg ifassen-is
amek ara d-nsebgen tasekla-nneɣ ma yella ur nesƐi ara iḍrisen ara as-yefken udem

ad iyi-d-yettban uẓekka

kemm d mm yiqannan
mi yexneq iman-is s umrar yid-s yuwi lbaḍna-s

d lawan ad yuɣal

alaken d wid yeddan d tlaykit

yeḍfer iwellihen n umeqqran
ad n-tsiwleḍ
yessers afus-is ɣef lḥenk n sima
gen di talwit a gma hettak yusef d awezɣi ad k-nettu
iɣil iḥud-itt-id
zemreɣ ad awiɣ tura ayen i d-tessutreḍ
yefka-yas tiyita iṣreɛ-it
wakil nettu belli imdanen akk n umaḍal am nekkni neɣ ɛeddan-aɣ kra
yuɣal ar tiggad-is
inim-d tidet
agummu-w aẓidan ḥemmlent-t ad t-ɣeẓẓent tuɣmas
tella kra n yiwet i d-isawalen
tegganem ɣef udekkan
idamen-nneɣ yiwen yerna yiwet n tebbuct i ɣ-yesuttḍen
iseggex d ugadir
ad msenḍaḥeɣ yid-s
ay d-mmugreɣ d iman-iw
lemleḥ ufus ddaw ufus
anda i yi-iban wayla-w
amek armi i d-tettmenni akanic
muqel afus-iḍen ma yeṭṭef aɛekkaz
Ḥemmlent ifelfel
ungal-nni d apulaṛ
zhan akk warrac
ssnen ad sekren seksu
tezḍem fell-as
iɛdawen n tudert ma ṭṭfen-tt ad tenger
ziɣ ad mteɣ ur neṭleɣ
anda-nniḍen iḍac
Ɣef ass mi nemesbeḍa cfiɣ
am win i s-yennan ar k-wwteɣ
tiṭ d wul mxaṣamen mcaraɛen ɣef zzin
fad inɣa aɣunfu
win illan yif win ilan
tezdi-d lqedd-is
beṭṭu cubaɣ-t s aẓekka
inṭeḍ wanaɣ di teclalt
ass mi tegzem di ttnaṣif
ru a zzheṛ-iw ma truḍ
ur yesɛi ara tom lḥir
a mmi ur tesɛid ayen ččiɣ deg idmaren ad k-t-id-fkeɣ
d nutenti ara d-yekkren zik azekka
yiwen n wass ad d-nawi awal ɣef temsalt-a
wi d-iǧǧan izli maɛduṛ
teḥka-d ula ɣef aman ma wezzɛen
ičča deg iflu
Ẓẓiɣ tibḥirt deg izubaq
yettwaker tom
yeḥka-yi-d taqsiṭ n tudert-is
tettbinemt-d n luṛup kunemti
yerra-tt i lweɛd n tissit
xḍu-k seg aya
am terṣast deg uglim terṣa
hattan tura d tamɣart
tella kra n yiwet i yukren ṭṭezḍam-iw
ur s-nniɣ ara ad d-taseḍ
rjut ad nẓer amek ara tili lḥala
armi wwiɣ lεib
ssnen-t akk medden
ass-a ḍḥiɣ fecleɣ ɛyiɣ
inher-d aɣyul deg teqlaṭ iteddu ɣef uḍar
ad tṛeq deg-i am usafu
ameẓlu ur d-yelhi d ccɣel-is deg tɣiwant-a-nneɣ
ilaq-aɣ ad d-naf ḥedd i izemren ad ɣ-iɛawen
ufiɣ taqerεet-a mi lliɣ ttmerriḥeɣ deg teftist taṣebḥit-a
itess seg umeẓẓuɣ
yir wal issenday urfan
ilaq asebdeɛ deg tefyar mačči d yiwet kan iwmi ara nettɛawad
llant kra n layat deg leqran i ixuṣṣen deg tmeẓla
rran-tt i lweɛd imeṭṭi
anta tin ur d-nesteqsa
amyag yesεa anagar yiwet n twuri akken yebγu yili umkan-is deg tefyirt
mseḥṛaqen taswin
uhmeɣ amek meyyzen ɣer taɣaṭ
myejguglen am iselfan
yebɣa ad d-isuffeɣ adlis
tεezgeḍ
n wi-tt-ilan
a tewɛer tayri a winna
yegma ujeǧǧig i tigert
ssiriden tuɣmas-nsen yal ass
acu tenniḍ deg usenfaṛ-a
yiwen ur ak-d-isell
la εeṣreɣ de ul meskin
dɣa ɣer tagara yuɣal d axewni ameqqran ibedden i tillut i t-id-isellken
d ayen ur nemεin
d lfula seddaw tuɣmas
akken ad nezwi akufir
Ḥemmleɣ-ken i sin
yejbed-d amara yenhez udrar
yeqqim sdat n tḥanut n yiwen yesnuzun idlisen
kul wa efk-as lkaṛ-is
di tmura tutrimin selmaden i warrac tussna dagi selmaden-asen tamettant
aqaruy-iw seg zik yeččur d tikta n tnemḍar
teḍleb-d ad tt-nernu ɣer ugraw-nneɣ deg facebook
Ḥess i uẓawan acerqi tceyyxeḍ-as akken ilaq
attan theddeṛ
yessenta ubennay amesmaṛ s tefḍist
ssaɛid seɛdi tura yerra-tt kan i imagraden yettwennit-d ayen iḍerrun
ass-a ḥedṛeɣ temseṛwam
imi ibɛed-aɣ ɣef allen-im
ur yi-tettalseḍ kra
teqfez deg usewwi
anwa i d-tewwi
xdem akken xeddmen irgazen
msudanen wid yemḥemmalen
neṛwa tamɛict n ukessar d usawen
Ṛuḥ ad teddudiḍ
xedmemt-t tura
yezmer tom ad isker lmakla
wissen taneɣmast-nni ma teɣra
yella ḥedd i akent-id-isawlen
aḥiwel aɣiwel
Ḥemmleɣ taɣuri n yedlisen
ur cfin ara fell-as
akken i d-yuli deg ulawen
bɣan ad d-awin aknic ar wexxam
Ɛeddant leɛwayed ur nefṛiḥ
tenniḍ ad beddleɣ amḍiq
win iṭṭfen imi-s irtaḥ
deg leεnaya-k εreḍ amek ur iteffeɣ uqjun-nni ɣer berra
ur d-iqqim deg-wen uṭenṭun
nnan Ḥewwa yekkes-itt-id rebbi seg uberḍi n adem
ulac di teṛbut tekfa
amek ara yexdem win ur nečči
teẓda nanna abelluḍ akked d lbecna
Ẓẓher-iw i ẓriɣ yeɛkes
anta i yecfan fell-asen
Ɣas ruḥ ad tnadiḍ wayeḍ
acu i y-isswehmen maḍi ziɣ ur tḥemmel ara ayen isukṛin
Ɛawen-iyi ad ffɣeɣ
yemgarad yisem ɣef umyag deg umḍan n twuriwin
cceṛ akk yettmaggan ideg ilaq ad yettekki tikwal netta s yiman-is
yezzeqleṭ uɣyul-nni
rju ad beddleɣ tawlaft n tduli deg umaɣnu-inu
nebra i ṭṭbel deg waman
aqli-yi seg wid-nni tenɣiḍ
ma bɣiɣ ad m-heḍreɣ
tura drus i ikeččmen tinedlisin ttruḥun ɣer tpizziryatin
deg tmurt n ityupya i d-ufan lqahwa tikkelt tamezwarut
nekk i yeɣran tafusi n lehhu d wayen yelhan
sarament ad sɛunt aṭas n yedrimen
fell-am ẓemmeɣ-d allaɣ-iw
daffy duck d abṛik n wunuɣen urmiden
tɛedda fell-as
ad tkecmeḍ ar waxxam
ttkemmileɣ aɣenni
ur nettcuddu ur nfessi
yella walebɛaḍ i yeṭṭalayen tom
anwa i yecfan fell-asen
d tasnareft taserdasit i yettreṣṣin deg lezzayer
a tuzyint mm lqedd ubabmbu
lukan ad d-ɛiwdeɣ asemɣi
isem-im ad t-sefḍeɣ
yeggan ɣef udekkan
tizelgi ula sani
imlal wabbu-nneɣ
stqerreɣ-d s lfalṭa-w
ur d-ttawi ara lhemm i iman-im
argaz d tiqqit tameṭṭut d tabaqit
yella ḥedd i yeṛẓan taṣewaṛt-iw
tebɛem takeṛṛust-ayi
ur iseḥḥa ara lsas-is
Ɛeqlen-aɣ yizan nuḍen
yugem-d ccrif seg tala taqburt asmi i tt-iẓur
llant tuddar anda ttɣiman medden ɣef yiẓekwan
sliɣ i yemma tenna a mmi ifadden kkawen
meṛṛa-nkent kunemti d sut miḥyaf
di leɛnaya-m qqim da
Ẓeṛṛeẓ akin fell-i
tella kra n yiwet i d-yeɣṛan tura
tesɛamt lḥeqq
numidya tella teṭṭef-d agafa n lezzayer n tura d tuget seg tunes
yessusum tom
deg-s ɣerqeɣ dayenni
akken tesseklasem i tferreḥ yes-wen teqbaylit
yetteɣṣab di tikli
atan yeẓẓel ɣef ukanapi
zwir-it ɣer zdat-k ad t-twalliḍ
nettɣaḍ kemm d nekkini
inna-d  mmuh
annaɣ a sidi Ṛebbi err-iyi ɣer taddart
amek armi d-tettmennim akanic
wissen iwacu yeffeɣ ssaɛid seɛdi seg ukabar i d-yesnulfa
d idammen i yuzzlen ara ɣ-yezzmen
a bu snat yiwet ad ak-tṛuḥ
taklatin di tekwatin
tmeyyzeḍ i tikci-nneɣ
nebɣa ad nelmed kra n tuɣac s tsepenyult
tugi ad k-tettu
ad myeẓḍaḥent deg ussu
meqqer wungal-nni ahat yewweḍ alef isebtar
alluy tetbeɛ-it trusi
tom d mary ruḥen ɣer yiwen uqussis agmaẓri
tewwi-d akanic ar wexxam-is
win ara ken-i d-yerren
tarwa-m ad ɛassen fell-am i wakken cedda ad tixfif
anda i trewlem
tebɣiḍ kra isehlen ugar
d wagi i yes-s tebna tfekka
ejj dagi akk idlisen-ik jmeɛ-d iman-ik
aql-ikem ḥaca iman-im
awal-im d awal yenta deg ul yeggugem yimi
itett uqjun-nwen
iqquṛ am yiddew
iwacu ur tettruḥeḍ ara
bɣan ad ɣ-snejlin seg akal-nneɣ
Ḥemmlen akk tiɛelǧiyin
ddeqs n tefyar i yettwaskelsen
ttemyeḥmaẓen wa ɣer wa
iɣaḍ-iyi ad as-kemmkeɣ
sseb si temẓi
tella kra n tɣawsa i yesserfan tom
ur ɛeddan ara fell-as aṭas n wussan seg mi yemmut
Ԑreḍ ccrab-a teẓreḍ ma iεǧeb-am
berkat asmuhbel
nemsudan
sarameɣ yiwen ur ken-id-iwala txeddmem-t
bezzaf n rriḥa i d-terra marie
ur teẓrimt ara amek tuɣalemt
kullec ad iɛeddi imeṭṭawen-im ad kawen
d asif n nnil i imeqqren akk deg ddunnit
iwacu teqqimeḍ din
yezza-yas tasa meskint
twejdemt meṛṛa
gganent ɣef udekkan
uletma tennum tettarra ijerriḍen ddaw wawalen ur tessin mara teqqar
ay asmi iččiɣ baba
seg udaynin asmi s-d-bran ur yumin ad yesɛu ccan
ikcem-as uzrem deg ukebbuḍ-is
ixeddem tom imensi
ala taṛbut iwumi izmer
tefka-t tebburt
yettgami ad yi-d-yas yiḍes ah ya ddin qessam
si bgayet ɣer sṭif ay iẓri-w ifif
ur d-tbeddeḍ ara akken ilaq ɣer tama-w
amer ad tini
tom yezgel imensi yenna ulamek ara yečč seg akken yeεya nezzeh
theddreḍ qejmuri
ay tent-ijemεen d lbeṛṛani
ttqadar iman-ik a winnat

ihi d tilufa iwumi yeḥḍer i d-yewwi deg wullis-is
a dda Ɛisa ad nens ass-a

ulac akk amkan anda i walaɣ tom
zzelzen-iyi di nnif-iw
yeṛɣa-d tom
kemmleɣ axeddim
kul iḍ tessedhuyeḍ-iyi
iqfel useksut
iḥemmel-iken tom
fell-am ar d ad nettru
am nekk am netta ɣur-nneɣ ammur seg tdemɣit
amendil awraɣ yeḥzen
ma iɛedda lawan aṭas i rujaɣ
allaɣen tezdeɣ-iten falesṭin
lseq-it i yimeẓẓuɣen-ik
muqel kra ɣer deffir
yettɣawal di tikli
mkul yiwen ixelleṣ iman-is
cfu mliḥ ɣef awalen-a
ad cfuɣ ɣef lecɣal-nsen
awi-yaɣ ad d-nezzi
ad neɣret tifyar alamma nebbeḥbeḥ
tura kra din ur s-necfi nerna-ten ɣer wayen iɛeddan
yella win i yebɣan ad iffeɣ azekka
yella kra n yiwen i yukren idrimen-iw
amezruy xas d tira
tsewway-d yemma azegḍuf akked ubeqquq
ass-n tertaḥeḍ ur teẓriḍ
yesserɣ Ɛemru ben lɛaṣ tamkerḍit meqqren deg skandarya
anga teddiḍ cfu
Ḥfan yisebbaḍen-iw si tikli
d tayuga n yezgaren
ayen akkit tettugadem ataya deg aqerru-iw
tewwi-d yiwen n yinaw
ur ẓriɣ d acu tettnadim
mεen acemma ttxil
win yebɣan taqbaylit iɣeṛ idlisen-is
ad jebdeɣ leḥnak-ik
meskud ur medlent wallen-iw
anta ara s-yecfun
anda-t uxxam-ik ay ul-iw
uqmen-as algam
dayen tfukkem
tetteccef akken iqwem
tettbineḍ-d tufiḍ iman-im
yuzen-ak-n tom kra n tɣawsa
ad tɛeddiḍ ar wexxam
ad tɛiceḍ yid-s ur tebɣiḍ
ssfeqεeɣ-k
ssneɣ-kem qbel ad nemlil
aɣbel ur t-sεiɣ maḍi
deg tsuret imedyazen ameskar n leqran iwet-d deg wid akk yessefrawen
ula wi isuɣen ula wi innuɣen
win yebɣan taqbaylit ad yelmed tira-s
yettɣaḍ wi ur nesɛi imawlan
ul d agellid udem d ayeddid
ur ikkat wugur ala aḍaṛ yeddan ḥafi
Ḥesben-aɣ am ayt uxxam
ass n ttlata sin mraw u xemsa yunyu sin n wagimen u mraw yiwen
tettbin-d tecbeḥ s tidet
ggulleɣ ur teffiɣeḍ akken alamma teččiḍ
lemdeɣ amek ara ẓẓgeɣ tafunast
iseɣḍel-d igenni ɣef tmurt
amdan ur neɣri tif-it teqbuct uyefki
ur itett ara remḍan maca yečča lḥeqq igujilen
ay gar-ak d lǧennet a yamẓallu
ayɣer tettqazameḍ
aɛdaw am turet ansi tewɛiḍ bbi-t
Ɣilleɣ am medden akk ara ɛiceɣ
inisi d wuccen ur ttemkeyyaden
tom ur yessin ad yecnu
asawen ɣef wudem n uḥbib d akessar
iṭṭes-as ɣef wuḍṛef
ccedda i s-ilhan d ṣṣbeṛ
ur d-issusuf ḥedd tament seg imi-s
iṭṭeḍ yemma-s armi i tt-iṛwa
fki-yid aɛrab yeṣfan ad ak-fkeɣ adfel yeḥman
ad t-nfuɣ seg disan-iw
s limin n yirgazen ur nḥennet
ufhim imeddukal rezzun fell-as
ad k-id-afeɣ deg berra
lqum iceṛṛeḍ awezɣi
assa lemmer ad tedduklem ad tkesbem adrar luḍa
la izerreɛ lǧuheṛ i tyuzaḍ
yebda yettɛeyyiḍ a yemma ddreɣleɣ
d lqaɛ usafu
abuseqqi mebɛid i yettseqqi
ayen i aɣ-yettraǧun ad t-nbeddel yugar i d-ḥellant tid i aɣ-d-yezwaren
ma tzemṛeḍ-iyi swireb-iyi
yenna-yas i Ṭabu ma yeḍmeε ad yuɣal d aselway n lezzayer
tlata iseggasen segmi nxeddem akka
iruḥ baba s axeddim
ccah di ṛṛay-is
netta yettaɣ yemma-s tettellif
attan akken kan i d-tfeṣṣel yiwen n weḥram
ur ẓriɣ d acu iṣeḥḥan
ata wul-iw itxeyyeq ibɣa ad ifelleq
ar teqlibin timenza ɛeddant
isseḥsab i wass-a d uzekka
d ibki n zzan i yettɣeẓẓen izan
iɛac ur yeksib yemmut ur d-yeǧǧa
tinna yefka-tt-id rebbi s wul-is
ikeččem gar uɣeṛbal d teṛbuḍt
ttwaliɣ-tt amzun seg umtiweg-iḍen i d-tusa
xdem-as akken i m-ihwa
win i d-yessuffeɣ ɣer tezrigin tafat
ababat d argaz yesɛan dderya
heddṛeɣ ṣṣwab ismeɛṛiq
ttkellixeɣ deg yiman-iw
ufan lɛib ula di tmellalt
kkes iɣemran-ik seg ṭṭabla
iṭij ageffir d tameɣṛa n wuccen
ur ssaram ttelqim di ttejṛa n llim
afus iqquṛ imi isfiṭṭuṛ
wi m-illa
ar d iǧǧuǧeg ilili
ur yeṭṭif ara tunt-nni yenna-d timecreṭ-a d leḥram
ur ssinen isem-iw
iṛwa uɣbub tasumta
tsemma-yas acir yeɛni sseɛd
mi tt-bniɣ thudd ɣer llsas
fiḥel ṭaṭa baṭaṭa
mačči tikelt i s-yecceḍ i rebbi leqlam
aḥbac ur t-ikkat buseṭṭaf
iles ma ur nerri deg-s igenni ad t-id-yesseɣli
aqerwac-nni zlan akken d aqejbabbaṛ
nedmeɣ imi ur ṣfiɣ yid-wen
ur iraɛ ufus-iw wala uḍaṛ-iw
yecreq yiṭij yuli wass teḍwa tafat ɣef medden irkulli
yettzad simmal zeddreɣ
ay aggur lemmer ad tt-teẓṛeḍ
iruḥ-d ugensas ukabar-nni ad yeg tawayt-is deg tɣiwant-nneɣ
aɣyul n leḥbas ɛebbi u rkeb fell-as
yiwen wass i tt-id-iwala tesserɣ lḥaṛa
win yettun yedder yemmut
tasuqilt n ugbur ilelli
ikkes-as lbur d lkeslan
dɣa iburek-it
mḥend d uccen aqbayli
a tulmut teḍra yid-i tmacahut
yugi ad ken-iffeɣ ubeḥri
amenqus ixeddem ḥaca di tmenqas
s leεtab kan ara d-yawi yiwen kra
kul aɛeggal s uyaziḍ
iwacu theddnen akka merra
acmux ineɣlen d acmux iṭenṭunen
yeqqim abeḥri tili
ur iẓri ḥemza anda tenza
simlil-itt neɣ ad tt-simlileɣ
sseqdec-itent merra
win akken yugi wayla-s
yuɣal-d la d aṣuṛdi la d cci
mi tt-iwala akken s taqendurt-nni tenṭeḍ ɣef yedmaren-is iger-d nnehta
els akebbuḍ-im d asemmiḍ deg berra
ffɣen-d ad cqirrwen adabu
mi yeɣli uzger ṭṭuqqten tferyin
ur iḍeṛṛig ar ad yellaẓ
ur igget ujṛad armi igget lqewt
yiwen wass i tt-id-iwala tesseṛɣ lḥaṛa
wwiɣ-d lviza ar kanada
ur xemmemeɣ ara ɣer wakken
a yul-iw ifna-k ssbeṛ
a nanna teqqar-d tayi d lɣula ad ɣen-tečč
irṣa-k d ccahed i uẓekka
Ḥaca aẓekkun i t-ixuṣṣen
d axbac i ixebbec mačči d anqac
annect-agi i tɛac di ddunit
yeḍfer abrid igelliden-is
irna aḍar fell-asen
Ẓriɣ-ten d inelmaden n tmaziɣt ur sɛin ara anasiw n temɛemmrit
ula d kečč aql-ik twennteḍ-d s tefransist
tesεeddaḍ anebdu yelhan
Ṛṛuḥ ccaqi ad ittuneggel di nneɛc
ur ḥemmleɣ ara ad y-isteqsi ḥedd
iwweḍ-iyi-d bubriṭ s amnaṛ
tizizwit tenfeɛ ma d areẓ xaṭi
mi iḥmel wasif ḍeṛṛef-as
ur d-tettekk tafat seg uddaynin
ma d netta rjan-t-id meskin ikayaden uselḥeq
tezdeg s tɣiɣact ticṛad s idammen
mi neṭleɣ aqejjir ad d-iffeɣ ufettus
d ayen iṛexsen i yeẓellṭen
"arraw n lḥuma-nneɣ" d ungal n naǧib meḥfuḍ
armi t-ɛerran i yettazal
ma telliḍ s idis-iw ur sriɣ i kra nniḍen
nnejmaɛet-d tḥessem-d ay arraw n yeɛqub
icneɛ ifẓeɛ sakin yerwel
tezdeg tettas-d s wammus
refden-t medden d aseɣwen
mbeɛd talalit n yirid mahalalil iɛac tmen meyya utlatin n iseggwasen yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas
laban inuda aqiḍun n yeɛqub aqiḍun n liya akked uqiḍun n snat n tqeddacin-nni lameɛna ur yufi acemma
tekcem-iyi tiẓẓit ɣer wallen-iw mi nesserwat akken izgelli
ur d ayen ara m-iεeǧben
arraw n isasxaṛ tulaɛ fuwa yub akked cimrun
tuget n yilemẓiyen ass-a ur d-cliɛen ara
adɣaɣ ifsi akerra acu ar ad d-yini
ruḥeɣ ɣer usalay ad d-ẓreɣ timumyatin n yiferɛunen
axaṭer nedmeɣ imi i ten-id-xedmeɣ
Ṛṛay ɣuṛ bu usaku
abṛam illa d ameṛkanti
bab n leqṛan ittɛaṛṛeb
ibubb ini azeggwaɣ
yeffeɣ-d yiwen n weqjun akken d agehguh
cukkeɣ nεeṭṭel maḍi seg tura
nwan s "besmelleh" ara tali tmurt
sidali lahdir yewwi arraz amezwaru racid Ɛellic
ur d-yecliɛ ara seg wiyaḍ
uɣalen-d s anda akken bɣan ad ilin
yal ass n lǧemɛa ad d-ffɣen ad kksen ɣef ulawen-nsen u ad uɣalen
rẓan-as sin iberḍiyen
bdiɣ ttɣenniɣ mi lliɣ d agrud
amek ara nerr ɣef yiman-nneɣ
tesɣa-tt yiwet n trusit tewwi-tt ad tt-tṛebbi
anwa-k a mmi
isellem daɣen ɣef watmaten-is s imeṭṭawen
betty tenɣa yemma-s
acku walaɣ d akken ur iwulem ara
francis cabrel yecna deg lberkat n toulouse
ittuṛfeɛ am uzrem mi ara yejhel
ihedder s tunẓirin kan drus i s-ifehhmen
wissen ma ad d-truḥeḍ wiss ma ad kem-waliɣ
yeɛqub iɛeql-it inna d aqendur n mmi
akal d amassaṛ
ger timellalin deg mirruj-nni ad d-wwent
d argaz i tent-ittṣuḍun
d tamara i iteggen nnmara
laẓ d war imeẓẓuɣen
yeɛqub yuɣal d isṛayil yuɣal iqqim weḥd-s
yejjaɛṭet am uṣefṣaf
fiḥel ad tɣeṣbeḍ akken
truḥ uqbel ad yi-d-tban
iwwi zzit deg isni
mi twala iman-is s tadist tuɣal teḥqer lalla-s
Ṣerrfeɣ akk idrimen-iw yerna ur ɛad skiṛeɣ
ayen ixdem umger di texsayt
amek armi tezweǧ d gma-s uḍeggal-is
amek armi qquren akken wulawen-nwen
ur ẓriɣ anta i d-yusan deg-kunt d tamenzut
melmi ẓẓant ttjur-a
deg lemsaq-a i tzedɣeḍ
win yesεan deg d urar ur yettagad azaɣaṛ
argaz lɛali ur as-teṭṭebbil ara
nekni nettḥebbiṛ Ṛebbi ittḍebbir
yekfa-t ṣṣdid n tayri
d tiɣin n ṣṣrima uqbel aserdun
mi wwḍen watmaten n yusef seǧǧden zdat-s
iṛqeɛ-as tabarda i uɣyul
busmat tesɛa-yas-d raɛuwil
ay afenǧal n lqahwa a win i d-yettaldayen allen
di leɛnaya-k qqim da
iɣunza-yi d aḥeṛfi
iwwi-d timint s axxam-is
s wacu i kent-id-wtent
ur zmirent ad k-ssufɣent
qqiment kan akken i llant ḍeɛfent
undrulog d amejjay n yergazen
walit-t-id am semḥeɣ
iskef ar teblist ikkil
err alim gar iqellalen
s tidet sidna sliman yella yettmeslay d tweḍfin
imiren issufɣ-d cimɛun iwwi-yasen-t-id
mačči s uxewwef i ttṛebbin medden
ma teggul deg-k tmeṭṭut cfu
leḍyur daɣen ad fṛuṛxen di lqaɛa
d lḥila
di tazwara illu yexleq igenwan d lqaɛa
leqraya i ɣran nniɣ-d ur s-tezmireḍ ara
a tinna ttṛaǧuɣ kul iḍ
fell-as lḥiɣ ɣef udmim ḥafi
udem-nni i ttcedhin-t wallen-iw
yeɛqub irra-yas ala
Ṣṣran n muc d aqeffu
ur rǧiɣ ara ad ttwaferneɣ imi d asentel i yellan d aṭabu deg tmetti-nneɣ i ɣef i d-uriɣ
awadem-iḍen deg "akal d idammen" d yiwet n tṛumit qqaren-as marie
yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas
innuɣben am ugayemru
ad tesnegreḍ ula d lǧens ur nexdim acemma
Ṣṣbeḥ kan atta tɛedda-d tpulist s uqjun deg teqlaṭ
ixdem tameɣra iɛreḍ-d iqeddacen-is meṛṛa
ur fhimeɣ ara tamuɣli-ya-inek
luṭ illa yeqqim ɣer tebburt n temdint
iḥemmel ad iḥewwes
timeksawin-nni bɣant ad qeṣṣrent yid-neɣ maca yeɛreq lmal-nsent
Ččiɣ taktuniya yefulta yimi-w
issufɣ-it ɣer beṛṛa inna-yas muqel igenni
ma walaɣ deg-m ass-agi
aql-iken merra mgal-iw
yiwen ur yi-yumin
inna a sidi Ṛebbi azen-d ad nečč lbaṛaka-k
bɣan merra ad ruḥeɣ ma d nekk ur y-iεǧib ara lḥal
ulayɣer tmeyyzem ma ṭṭfen-tt
theddeṛ am yixef yettwakksen
nnan-d mennad yuɣal-d ɣer ccna maca ɣas ini tura ifat lḥal
Ṭṭmna-inu d akken ur d-ttilin ara idammen di zzayer
inna-yasen tessnem laban mmi-s n naḥuṛ
ad tt-ɣafṛeɣ di lɛid
mbeɛd sebɛa n wussan n tikli ilḥeq-it s adrar n gilɛad
Ɣur-m ad t-tḥemmleḍ winna d aḥewwas kan
ul-iw akked ṛṛay-iw mserfan
ad t-barkeɣ ad t-rreɣ d tayemmat n leǧnas
ay at lḥif xas cfut
abṛam akked naḥuṛ zewǧen
ikcem agraw ur issin ad iṣelli
lameɛna nutni ɣilen d akeɛrer kan i yettkeɛrir
yusef iṛuḥ d ticriḥin
ay hujṛeɣ rewleɣ
mi tbeddeḍ medden akk yinek
win iwɛan wayeḍ ad t-iqqes
xmesṭac azrug n tlelli bgayet
d ayen iεeǧlen
Ḥanux iǧǧa-d Ɛirad Ɛirad iǧǧa-d maḥuyayil
tom yeddem-d adlis seg leqjer
tameṭṭut d wawal
yegra-d d awḥid ur yesɛi lwali
seg zik leqbayel s tirugza i ttqabalen aɛdaw
ameɣlal ittili akked yusef
ur teḥwaǧeḍ ara ad tmeslayeḍ
tura ayen akk i k-d-inna yillu xedm-it
aṭas i yettneɛtab deg uxeddim
tḍeεfeḍ acemma neɣ
igguni am ugujil tabburt
d taɣaɣa i d aɣersiw meqqren akk deg ddunit
myeḥwaǧen am uɣṛum d waman
yewwet-itt-id qjuni
dderya tettcettil neɣ tettxewwil
d ussan ur yeḥbis ugeffur
ccrif xeddam d amedyaz n tidet
wehmen iwacu yettṛebbi ɛecrin n yemcac
takurazt d wayen akk yettiḥwiǧ umgara
iffeɣ fell-as waɛbaṛ
ur lliɣ d llufan ad iyi-tettleḍ
tesɛa-yas-d i ilifaz Ɛamaliq
iwwet-it s uɣwebbaṛ s allen
mi yekfa lhedṛa d abṛaham illu iɛella nnig-s
tameṭṭut mm tnebḍatin
Ǧamal Ɛellam d yiwen seg wid i d-yebdan tizlit tatrart taqbaylit
ur teččimt acemma
yella win i d-ittnezzihen deg-k
assirem-nni deg-s yeɛkes
temleḥ am waggur iwumi zzin yitran
Ɛeddan yiwen ur t-tɣellteḍ
tissirt-ik tẓad amegruc
Ḥerrek ssbaɣ-nni s uεekkaz
ncalleh di lehna mačči di lehwa
yella win i yemmuten
acu kan mačči s yiwen neɣ s sin kan n yimyura i yettarun deg tili ara nessali tasekla-nneɣ
iṭṭes ɣef wawal
tiwwura n wexxam akk qqlent-d
ur iban d ṭikkuk wala d aẓaɛluk
ad twaliḍ nnbi ɣef taɛrict
lexbaṛ ttawin-t iɛeṭṭaṛen
ttuḥasfeɣ
yesserɣ-it-id s uḥlalas
sḥeḍṣu d timsegrit n laẓ
anect-a ur as-idum ara imi tiwaculin n tullas faqent i wassaɣ i yellan gar-asent
lɛaṛ iteddu am teṛɣi
bɣiɣ ad zweǧeɣ qabel
yeɛqub irra-yas d nekk
Ɣriɣ akk iwenniten-nni tiririt ur tt-ufiɣ
tasa ur tettɣunfu tasa
tebɣa ad s-tezweǧ i mmi-s
ruḥ alamma d amkan
igenni ur irfid lqaɛa ur tesseblaɛ
amɣar azemni ur mazal ad ittandi
ilsa talaba n sser
nekni am yiẓid ɣer tessirt
d afeṭṭaḥ n lembaḍen
wwint-d akanic ar wexxam-nsent
uftalmolog d amejjay n wallen
ass i d-yuɣalen
d win i yettnawalen i yessawalen
tettbinemt-d n japu kunemti
Ɣaf ass-n mazal cfiɣ
tqefzemt deg usewwi
inṭeq inna ay ameɣlal ay illu n sidi dda bṛahim
af nnif ur illi lxif d ukukru
imeṭṭawen deg-i ur llin ass-n mi ad d-ffɣeɣ
acḥal aya d anaḍeḥ
yif-it ma tkecmeḍ tura ar wexxam
tuɣ nniɣ-as truḥeḍ-iyi
iḍes ar azal učči ar tinzar
d nekk kan i terza tyita
si mḥemmed isellem ɣef lalla xelluǧa dɣa yeṭṭerḍeq d imeṭṭi
ur εlimeɣ anda txeddmeḍ
am ass-a ad tifrir tagut
ma ttaḍsan leɛwayeṛ ad nru
qessiḥeḍ
awi-add-it ɣel uwqas
Ṭṭbiɛa s teggerses
tettbinem-d tcebḥem
nekni d atmaten
ad s-qqaṛeɣ mazal
aql-ik ad tkecmeḍ tlatin
am win ittewten s ubeqqa
lebɣi-w akk deg-s ay tufiɣ
ad d-teffeɣ ṣṣadaqa si lḥebs
yusef iɛac meyya uɛecṛa n iseggasen
ttawḍen-t-id kkaten-t s tḥeṛbunin
ad am-ig Ṛebbi am tgejdit deg unnar
tusa-d ass-nni ad tɣer did-neɣ
immut yizem igra-d uwtul
tili xtareɣ isem useqdac wezzilen ugar
asmi lliɣ d askuti qeḍɛen fell-i aḥerrek
mi yeɛra yiɣes ad ak-t-id-yefk
ur nnumeɣ ara xeddmeɣ deg berra
kecmen-d wat icumar deg tikli dɣa ẓẓɛen-ten yimesbaniyen
yesseqseq s tujit
ula deg yisental ttawin-d amaynut ssnen ad mmeslen taqbaylit akken ssawḍen ɣer uḍris imeɛnen
amcic amakṛaḍ isgerwij leḥwal
yezmer ad ɣ-iwawen tom ass-a
ar melmi akka ara tekkatem nneḥ
lɛinṣeṛ n ugadir yessidir
ttɛeggiḍen zdat-s qqaren seǧǧdet
yella win i yettnezzihen
amexluq-ihin d axennab
ixṛez-iyi-tt am tin n musa usemmum
meqqeṛ ucekkuḥ-nsen
yiwet ur tezmir ad ɣ-twaɛen tura
am lexyal beddeɣ i ṣṣerṣer
ad k-yerr d amder i umdun
taɛekkemt-iw d leḥmala-m a seɛdiya
si ncaf-nni i necfen ṣelḥen izgaren
Ṛebbi irad tuzzma tekfa
aql-it deg unnar n tira akked usliẓri
ur ideyyir ur iṭṭeffiṛ
d tawenza tuɛkist
ur tesɛiḍ ara kan aswir swayes ara t-tegzuḍ
ma tebɣiḍ ad timɣuṛeḍ ssemẓi iman-ik
abugaṭu ar tura ṛṛay ur t-yeddim seg akken ur yesɛi akaram ikemlen
ur ttayes tibbura n Ṛebbi
axxam n leḥwaṣ d axxam n lexṣaṣ
ttif argaz iweɛṛen wala tallest
ula d lmakla ttawin-as-tt ɣer wusu
iwacu ur tettrajuḍ da
ibna dinna aɛalṭar i umeɣlal
yiwen diɣ ur yi-serfaw akken ad rewleɣ ɣef gma
amkan-im atan s idisan-iw
theddnent
ruḥemt kan i tziri ur yelli ara tagademt
ceɛlet-aɣ tafat ad nẓer acu ntett
twerrek tmaneɣt s lɣaci
yurew-d yiger-is actal
iṛwa ubujad tamuḍli
wi k-innan meqbuleḍ a ṛṛuḥ 
refdet afus-nwen mara d-aɣreɣ ɣef yisem-nwen
aql-aɣ di tizi wezzu
a-ten-an la ten-nettwali
akken yella wass ad t-iks umeksa
ur d-ittnekkar ṛṛuḥ alamma idub ṛṛuḥ
imi i nufa lemziyya ɣer sidi ad nuɣal d aklan n ferɛun
ilaq ad iẓer acu d ungalen n « temneyt taḥewwast »
ilaq-ak ad tuɣaleḍ
ammus ad t-yegzem dayen
lliɣ ur zmireɣ ad ggamiɣ
d ayen yesseǧhaden amaru yettak-as tabɣest i wakken ad yemhez deg yixeddim-is ɣer sdat
yahuda yenna ssufɣet-tt-id tesserɣem-tt
ttejṛa-s ihba-tt maras
immut nnzuɛ-is
yerka ulin-t akk ikeččawen
ilaq-iyi ad stεerfeɣ belli nekk d tafḍulit
seḥḥi llah beden-ik
taqellaɛt yeṭṭfen aɛeẓẓi ur txab
xḍeb yemma-s taɣeḍ yelli-s
Ṭṭiṛ aḥṛuṛ ma iḥṣel ur ittemqellaɛ
ar d-ilal tgeḍ-as hlal
issen yiẓḍi yall-is
sarameɣ ad sεuɣ axxam d ayla-w kra n wass
taxessaṛt teshel i yeṣṣeɛben d lewqama
qqerṣen si naddam
lemmer ur nniɣ ad d-iniɣ
ttkelliḥen-asen s “qassaman”
a win iɛebbden sselṭan
tezga tettferrij imazraren n tterk
tceɣɣeb-iyi taluft-is
aman iɣef mcenqaṛen idurar
ad s-yettwakkes uɣrum deg imi-s
d lɣemza seddaw timmi
acebbak n Ṛebbi ittaṭṭaf
ulac tagrawla iɣeḍlen kra n udabu akka kan s talwit
mačči wagi iḍla-yaɣ tamɛict
yettɣaḍ wul-im ad t-ɛeggbeḍ
illa d aṣeggad iẓewren zdat n umeɣlal
tafya temmug am teqcict icebḥen tettawi yid-s aɛekkaz n ssḥur
deggren luṭ dɣa ẓedmen ad rẓen tabburt
Ṛṛeẓq ur t-iṛwi ḥedd
yerna winna ɣef uɣyul i yeṭṭafar deffir
sal mmuten sal ddren
ayen teṛwiḍ ad t-tectiqeḍ
aẓay ad tteččeḍ ayen yewwan
amaqwa-k a gerninuc tesreɛriɛeḍ
ma txedmeḍ Ṛebbi ad ak-ixdem
xedm nnḍeṛ-ik teṭṭefḍ imi-k
Ṣebḥeɣ-d deg yemma-k deg temkerḍit
d nnmara n uẓrem di lkanun
swant aman n wasif
ikerri tberrez-it taɣaṭ
mbeɛd talalit n mahalalil qiynan iɛac tmen meyya u ṛebɛin n iseggasen yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas
d agezzar ičča s tebṣelt
ttalint iceṛfan ur zegrent iɣwezṛan
lameɛna nuḥ yufa lemzeyya ɣer umeɣlal
inna-yasen a ssyadi
ad nḍeqqer kra din
telba mmi-s tettel-it tsers-it deg dduḥ ad yeṭṭes
dɣa ameɣlal iɣleq tabburt n lbabuṛ deffir n nuḥ
ittuger tiɣersi tafawet
d abekkuc n ṛṛeḥma
Ɣef lḥub-iw yeqdem
ugdeɣ d awḥid ara mmteɣ
Ɛyant wallalen-iw seg tɣuri
mi k-ẓriɣ i k-d-mmektiɣ
ad n-wexreɣ kemm ad tezhuḍ
meεna iwεer akken ad t-id-yessufeɣ bnadem imi ɣlay nezzeh
ad truḥemt wakali
seg asmi d-cfiɣ ala adrar-nni i ttwaliɣ
Ččureɣ d tiktiwin
ur tεellmeḍ ara axir
welleh ar i y-iɣaḍ yiman-iw
ur ttɛemmideɣ ad t-jerrbeḍ
Ḥman waman-is
meεna zemreɣ kan ad d-iniɣ d akken nekk si lεerc n wat Ɛisi
ur bɣiɣ ara ad wen-d-rnuɣ ddiq
iṛuḥ iṭṭeṣ d hagaṛ dɣa terfed s tadist
Ṣṣeṛf ɣuṛ-s dima yewjed
wwin-t warraw-is ɣer tmurt n kanɛan meḍlen-t di lɣar yellan di tferka n maxfila i yequblen mamri
yemmut weɣyul seg uqeṛṛuy-nsen
lḥif illa lɛaṛ ulac
d hemingway i yuran " amɣar d yillel"
ula d uccen ireggel-as yugad mi ara tt-iwali
Ɣer tagara newwi-ken sanda nebɣa nekni
nnan-iyi-d ur xeddmeɣ ara aya
teɣleb tamcict ar lkanun
Ɣerqen deg-sen deg uxxam dɣa ttaken-asen ixeddim din ɣas ur s-ssinen
iṛẓa tiṛẓi ucemcaṛ n ugris
yenna- deg wawal-is deg usarag-is aneggaru timura i aɣ-yezwaren s wacu i aɣ-zwarent
ifat-wi ifuten
liya tenna a rrbeḥ-iw
ussan ad tt-id-smektin
yeqqim yettefriwis armi d tasint-is taneggarut
tettṛuḥu ar ssinima yal ssmana
mi sḍefrent wulli zdat n iɛekkzan-nni ttarwent-d imecṭuḥen iberqacen yesɛan izaggen yerna reqmen
isenna-yas asenni n wur nettawi
ikemmel budyaf amennuɣ-is deg fransa
issuffeɣ-d taciwin
xeddmeɣ ur qḍiɛeɣ
sawmen-k-id at laxeṛt
yeqqel d axeddaε
ad myeẓḍaḥeɣ yid-s
ccah di ṛṛay-ik
temmut dabuṛa tin akken i d-iṛebban ribika
aɣaref d bu ccwami
yemmut assa muḥemmed mursi aselway islamẓri i d-yeffɣen tuɣ s tefranin deg maṣer
ma tbezgeḍ din ttesḍila da
d tiririt kan i nerra i yesteqsiyen-is
zzayed ittcerrig tamekḥelt
Ṛaḥil tesɛa-yas-d yusef akked binyamin
Ɣillen d asɣan n tneslemt i yesselḥawen akk amaḍal
yebḍa samir tasufeɣt-ik
Ɣef wayagi i s-tsemma dan yeɛni iḥkem
ass-a mi d-yeɣli rrebrab
yexḍa akk wergaz-nni i tsertit
lḥubb-iw yeqdem d sḍid gar yiɣsan-im
yewwi-kem yakan yiḍes di kra n temlilit
d nekk yesselḥan tuɣḍaṭ-nni
Ẓẓur fell-as yeckunṭeḍ
di leɛnaya-k eǧǧ iqeddacen-ik ad zedɣen di tmurt n gucin
tawant n wallen tif tin uɛebbuḍ
netta n taddart n tala xlil
lliɣ ttamneɣ kan
newweḍ-d ɣer tizi n layas
ssawḍeɣ-t ar wanida yebɣa
yella ḥedd ad y-iεawen
d ayen illan d axatar
ur ittaɛqal ungif tafsut
Ɣucceɣ ad xedmeɣ
acimi i tebɣam a-tt-fehmem temsal
acu n tugniwin yesseqdac umedyaz
ur k-yuɣ walu
ikessu tundar xeṣṣfent
yella usɣawsa iεeǧlen deg ayen irzan tidarraqin
ur tettwaliḍ ara belli ceɣleɣ
yezmer tom ad iseww
d ameḍṛuṛ i yettnadin
seg iseggasen n walfin d asawen i yebda ccna n teqbaylit yettwaɣay
ara yeččaṛen aɛebbuḍ ala akal
yiwwas teεreḍ ad t-tεiwen s ukerrer akken ad yuɣal d igider
aṭas i glalzeɣ deg wannar n taddart
ur ẓriɣ amek ara t-id-ininɣ akken nniḍen
ur ẓwireɣ ara deg umettel
ad d-imɣi gerninuc gar yinyen
jebdeɣ amrar inhez udrar
ur d-iqqim deg-sent uṭenṭun
ur gezzem ara lxiḍ-a
lmal yeksa idis ɣer yidis
imi d aɣerbal iciwi d taṛbut
azgen ameqqran deg leqbayel txuṣṣ-iten tefrit ɣef tamagit-nsen
tettaru-yas tibratin yal aseggas
irra-yas ad tnadiɣ ɣef watmaten-iw
xdem lxiṛ tettuḍ-t
ifassen ur kkaten ara ala tira iwumi laqen
tettettem rruẓ deg tmurt-nwen
lhemm uzekka ad t-neǧǧ i uẓekka
ddheb ur t-ittali nnkel
nekk ssumreɣ-d tizlit-a ma ad tt-id-necnu
iwacu teqqimeḍ weḥd-m
yečča taxbizt iman-is
akken ad amneɣ tura izad neɣ yugar
ur qṛib ur ɛla ḥal
buxlifa tezga-d gar ikendiren d ticci
tikkelt-a ufraren kraḍ n yimyura deg warraz n tullist i yettuɣalen d tajmilt n belɛid at Ɛli
mačči d ayla-w umawal-a
ismigliz am igider ameṛẓu
"Ɛecrin n yemyalen ddaw waman" d ungal n jules verne
ur wwiḍent ara tlata n sswayeε i ɣ-d-yegran
ifukk ttmeṛ di nnxali
ddwa umencuf d azegḍuf
i wul-im uqbel ad tkellxeḍ-t
d axxam n tezyiwin

ur d-teffiɣ tiqit
serrḥen-awen ad truḥem
nfares
adrar-nneɣ ad t-ineɣ fad ma tkemmel akka
tesseṛɣem-iyi-ten
Ɣer din mi yewweḍ ad iru
xedεen-aɣ
serrḥen-asen ad ruḥen
tsawlem-d
Ɣef teqbaylit kan i ttmeslayen
laman ala d win ɛzizen
ad nadiγ tafat
as-d tura
kra
ass yelhan
yettfuktin yif tiɣezza
tudert-nneɣ d taceqquft
aman ttxil-kent
yenqer uqacir-ik
kul yiwen issen amek ara yenṭel jida-s
taqcict yesɛan zzin am wa d cwal
ugur yellan ad t-nezger
siwa tilin ara d-ilint sebbat n uɣelluy
ad k-ineɣ Ṛebbi s lmus ur nettwanebbeh
ur tettizmirem ara ad teṭṭfem zdat n yiɛdawen-nwen
ad yewwet s ugrez deg ussan-iw
ad tettɛeggideḍ lɛid n iɣerman ur nesɛi iɣes n temtunt
giɣ-t
tuffra n uɣyul deg utemmun
ad am-d-cnun s uẓawan
netta yeqqar-asen aneft-as terra-d tili
mmi ad yidir yili
tamaɣra ur tt-smaɣren ara
yettwassen mass idres ladɣa s ufaris meqqren d ugerruj i d-yeǧǧa
win ur nesɛi tarbaɛt ur ittɣimi deg tejmaɛit
yacuɛa yexdem akken i s-d-inna musa iṛuḥ ad innaɣ d wat ɛamaliq
yetturaǧu ad ccnun deg-s ma drus ɛecra n yicennayen ilmeẓyen n taddart-agi
ma yella d inelmaden n yiswiren ineggura mazal ttṛaǧun-ten-id yikayaden
ha kif kif-itent akk
ad gemẓeɣ ifṭiwjen
aqemmuc-is izeyyeb zun d anaẓur i t-yessunɣen
zwir deg tezmert-im d talwit-iw
tiyaḍ s lufanat deg yirebbawen-nsent mazal kfin tuṭḍa
ad as-txeddmeḍ akka ɣer tqerruyt n yiẓdi-nni
fell-i i tuggadeḍ s tidet neɣ ɣef yiman-ik
ad nḍent afrag neɣ tamazirt akken ad tizdig
imir ḥulfaɣ kan uḥwaǧeɣ yemma
yettwafres umkan-nni akken ad bnun deg-s lǧamaɛ
llan-d yikayaden deg wammas n uɛiwed n ttrebga
wi yebɣan ad yečč timẓin ad yaɣ agelzim d imceffaṛ
tɣaḍ-ik
d asqizzeb i yesqizzib
abbuh a lɣaci nɣant-iyi temsal
axxam i t-ibennun d tayri d lebɣi
tagara ḍsan fell-asen mi tawriqt-nsen teqleb
timeẓri
d tamuɣli ara ibedden s wudem n llsas d tumast tamaziɣt
Ḥesbet-ten neǧsen
s nnif d lḥerma ur yetthenni ara urgaz alamma yerra-d ttar-is
i lemmer ur telliḍ
s lferḥ n wid imeggren
balak ad k-ɛeǧben yisɣan d llebsa lsan
haṛun d warraw-is xedmen akken i sen-d-inna musa
yeεlem
nermes asaǧǧaw n umeẓlu-ik n yimayl akken ad ak-d-yefk tallelt
d acu i d-yettwasidgen ar tura ɣer teqbaylit d wanwi yifecka i yettwasseqdacen s waṭas
mbeɛd mi cnan ihellilen ulin s iɣil n uzemmur
ad mḥiḥdeɣ ɣer tama n yemma ad d-fakkeɣ allen-iw s yimeṭṭi
yuɛeṛ tom
idermen deg yinekcamen i d-yellan
kersen-t ifassen-is fsin-t wuglan-is
d baba iyi-ifkan isem-agi n tasedda
yiwet tẓeṭṭ-d asaru tayeḍ tferru-as-d lexyuḍ
i ubɣur ad n-yekcem
agzul-a ad yili ama s tugniwin neɣ s yiḍrisen
leɛtab n ṛṛuḥ d yiziɣer d tfekka d yiḥulfan aɛni mačči d leḥram
ma tebɣiḍ ad tent-id-tsedduḍ seddu-tent-id s wudem arusrid
akka i as-tessefhem zahra i rebbi
deg usamar n bgayet ideg ɛerḍen wid iḥeḍren ad walin liḥala n yigḍaḍ-a n waman
mi d-ilul uqcic-nni yahuda yufa-t-id lḥal di kazib
shiɣ
teshel teqbaylit i ulmad
melmi i tezmer ad tili deg-s s wudem azayez ɣef tmuɣli-k
tugart ma yella ur d-muggren ara uguren i d-nnan
err-as-d tacḍaṭ n nnbi
urzen-t wwin-t sellmen-t i lḥakem bilaṭus
rriɣ talaba ɣef yiri-w
newweḍ
iha iha leḥḥu-as asif asif
imlal fuffu ɣer fuffu cciṭan ad isseḥmu
taddart deg d-ilul d wanda d-yekker
limer ufiɣ luleɣ-d deg tmurt ara yi-ḥerzen
lmal-nwen gint at uɛjar n ccac
d acu kan sḥassfeɣ imi asefru-nni amezwaru i uriɣ iruḥ-iyi ur ẓriɣ anda yerra
tuzzel d idammen ugar n tikelt tamenzut
ttaken-as tikwal idrem akken ad yaɣ i as-yehwan
d ṛṛay-nwen i awen-tt-igan
d wagi i d lqanun yeɛnan ṣṣfa n igellil i ihelken lberṣ
Ṣṣeḥḥa ad tezdeɣ laɛḍam lebla ad yeffeɣ iɣess
yeččur d lḥud n txutam
nekk ɣur-i tudert d ayen nniḍen
ur d-uɣalent ur d-sawlent
d ayen kan umi zemreɣ ɛyiɣ ass-a
ečč kra n rruẓ d lɛali-t
sečč-iyi sers-iyi ssneɣ wi urwen-iyi
taqcict terwel ɣer baba-s akken ad tt-iḥudd
ay at lebḥur wiss d anwa i aɣ-yeggan leɣṛuṛ
tella kra n tin i t-iḥewṣen
win ur d-neɛni ara tameslayt-is ur yumin ara belli iman-is d amdan i yella
d acu iɣef ara ḍillent wallen
amek ara yeslugen tamaziɣt win ur nessin ara ula d tira tumrist
tewt-d mliḥ lehwa ɣur-neɣ iḍelli deg yiḍ
ziɣ netta yeẓṛa mliḥ d acu i ixeddem
d taččurant am wacemma allen d tiberkanin terna-asent tamuɣli yersen
sgel ul-nni n teqṛuṛt
llan kra n yisensa ideg ur ddin ara lecɣal akken iwata neɣ ɛad ur bdin ara maḍi
ihi nezmer ad nečč rfis-a
sifer tifidi ɣef mmi
wallaɣ-tt
abeɛda imi ur yelli d uffir
anda-tt leḥmala akked tayri-nni n zik
ha-ten-an ttawilat i sexdament
yusa-d lamer-agi akken ibulisen-a ad sǧehden laman deg unnar
afares n zzit s yiγallen i xeddment-t tlawin deg uxxam akked ufares anḍayan i xeddmen yirgazen
acu-t uxessar-aki
netta yeḥsa tudert maci d imenɣi
ur yelli d aḍeggal ur t-nnuseb
d awezɣi win i k-d-yennan akka yeskaddeb
mcettament seg yiḍaṛṛen armi d aqeṛṛu
ur zmirent ad walint wallen-iw tayeḍ ɣer yidis-ik
afṛux bu uḥelqum abṛik n lebḥeṛ aṛdaf
asiweḍ-agi s tilifirik yeqqen akka tura gar temdint n tizi uzzu alamma taɣrest n buhinun
i lmend n tfaska-nni dɣa yettunefk-ak warraz kaysa xalifi n usideg
ittqissi bnadem aḍaṛ-is ilmend n ṭlaba
mi ara ad nili d imecṭaḥ kullec yettban-aɣ-d meqqer
Ṛebbi ad isahel zewreɣ-am tacḍaṭ
eni mačči d nekk i yellan d ameɣlal
rran-as akk ad ittwaṣelleb
aten-a
ddu ɣer sdat tezziḍ yeffus
d acennay ameqqran maca ur yessin ad yehder gar medden
imceggeɛ ad s-isuref imiren ad teṣfu
ceyyɛen-iyi-d iznen steqsayen-d fell-i
kunwi ay at sellam ay at zerriɛa uleclac
tesseṛɣeḍ-aɣ-tent
nnan asif ma iḥmel-d ur t-id-iḥebbes wuffal
amɣar mi ibbehba i t-inefɛen ala lmuta
wi am-yennan rebḥeɣ tura
amedya n tɣiwant n ayt smaɛel deg unẓul-asamar n bgayet ideg ttwabnan ayyuren-a ineggura kraḍ n leǧwamaɛ
teẓriḍ belli yiweḍ-aɣ-d baba-s ɣer da s axxam
tagdurt yuzlen ad tzizdeg lfert
Ḥemmleɣ-kem tezgiḍ deg usentel
s wakka terẓam awal n yillu s lɛadda-nwen
ssali afrag ɛelleq aḥeckul i tebburt-is
ttmuqul zdat-k winnat
ahat txaqeḍ ala ur tufiḍ d acu d cwiṭ n ɛeyyu kan
ma ur tuli ara tagut-nni ur ttḥerriken ara alamma tuli
kemm smurǧuḥ
asuter n tukci n wazal i tutlayt n yimaziɣen
wiss ma mazal deg wulawen-nsen nettili
werǧin i as-d-teḍra taluft-a argaz-a werǧin i t-iwala
tedleḍ iman-ik d tesnakta-k sdaxel n tmuɣli d tesnakta n yiwudam-ik
nettat yuɣ-itt lḥal deg wunnig wis-tlata
mebla rebbi ar d-negri di craɛ
aggad illu-yik axaṭer nekk d ameɣlal illu-yik
iruḥ-d d tazzla γer uxxam yessawel-d a tameṭṭut d acu i d-tesεiḍ
sers tnejṛa gar uqiḍun n temlilit akked uɛalṭar ččaṛ-itt d aman
ass-agi d tiɣli d ccɣel seg ṣṣbah almi d tameddit
a mmi ussan-agi akk i tensiḍ deg tejmɛt yella d acu i k-iḥuzan
ur ufint ara abrid i adem d Ṛebbi-s i tent-yesseknan
yiwet n tebbuct i teṭṭdem
yiwen seg-wen ur ittkellix i lɣir-is
d aselmad n tmaziɣt
ad tt-reqmeɣ s yifeddixen akken ad tennecɛaf
musa yenna ad d-zziɣ i inijel akken ad waliɣ d acu-t leɛǧeb-agi
tameṭṭut s yimeṭṭawen d lxuf d taqcict
telli-d tewwurt yeffeɣ-d urgaz-nni
ad tuɣal d tuddsa yernu ad tesɛu isarrawen di yal lwilaya
si mḥemmed ixdeɛ laban arami irwel mebla ma ixebbeṛ-it
ur tezmir tmes n yiṭij
ih ččet nekk alemma fukeɣ tayerza
ad ihuzz Ṛebbiamud-ik ɣer at laxeṛt
serseɣ-d lḥenni cced-is werɛad yefsi
akka i d lεada tettwaḥettem-d si yal tama
a xuya ay ameṛẓuq a lbaz izedɣen leḍṛuq
xeẓẓṛem
urar n messaɛd Ḥimi ulac win i t-yewten
nniɣ-am kemm a tamɣart a mm igecrar wessaren
tɣilemt tilawin ur xeddɛent ara imi tuɣalemt akk d tilisbyanin
yiwet n tkebannit n uḥric n uznuzu d tiɣin
Ɣaḍeɣ-ten
uwin-ten srid ɣer sbiṭar n umenzu n wunbir ad skelfen s tdawsa-nsen
a Ṛebbi ḥerz-i musa
netta mačči d arraz i d iswi-s
tanelmadt-nni tazrazaɣt n surya teqqar deg uɣerbaz alemmas
ad tt-id-nmecceḍ umbeɛd ad tt-id-njebbed alma teffeɣ-d seg yimi n yimceḍ
ur d-yuki ara zik
akka i t-id-nnan kra n yimsuddsen n ugraw
atmaten d atmaten aɛubbuḍ yebḍa-ten
tettewtemt tiyita n lmut
tadrimit-agi tesqam-aɣ-d tẓa tmerwin d ukkuẓ n yimelyaṛen
mi yefka yasuɛ timɛayin-agi ittaxxeṛ syenna
imi kunwi tezgam tesduqsusem kra n wid igedzen s tewwurt n tatut
ur tufi tayet ara as-yellin d tasylelt mi aka knan ijufar-is
aẓem-d
am ma yennɣel yiẓi ɣef tasa
akken bdiɣ ttaḍlaqeɣ i yilellucen-iw bdan asberri deg-i
a yul ddu d uḍaṛ-ik ur leḥḥu ɣef lhawa
qqaren yelha leqyas diri wi i tefṛen iberdan
lukan ad t-tennalem d amcum-nwen
yal yiwen ad yessenqed tifyar-is
yemmekta-d mi i as-tenna yemma-s ul-nneγ d ddwa i leḥwat
ttkel
mi mṭakin deg yeftisen mi d-yenɣa deg-sen
a lmalayek tiɛzizin
tessexlelliḍ-iyi
lɣella n zzit n uzemmur d tbexsisin akked tamemt yettkemmil usefti deg-sent akken ad nessiweḍ ɣar lebɣi-nneɣ
timmuɛfent ad testufu i usefrurex n tatut
ay teferneḍ deg yiɛeqqayen wid kan imaɛnen
ad d-yawi rebbi ccfa
wali-d lǧens-agi yak d agdud-ik
efk i win ara k-d-issutren
Ɣaḍeɣ-kem
mi ara yuɣal ad t-yaf d ilem zeddig yerna yecbeḥ
mxellen
ruḥ ad tcucfeḍ tesnezfeḍ-iyi
deg useggas-agi n userwet mkul yiwen ad yuɣal s ayla-s
yasuɛ inna-as err ajenwi-ik s amkan-is
ma tkemmel akka ad d-ddun izuranen
ayen akken i d-nnan iɛǧeb i Ḥamur akked mmi-s caxim
zenzent-iyi tektiwin
slem-d
teffeɣ sudaba zik seg uxxam uqbel ad d-taki yemma-s
isalaɣen mačči kan d wagi ara yilin
acu-t ssirk-agi
yak tezriḍ belli adabu-agi yekkes-aɣ ayefki n tyemmatin-nneɣ
serrḥen-as ad iruḥ
timucuha n yemma daɛda ḥemmleɣ ad asent-sleɣ
neggzemt
ur lliɣ ara d yemma-s
Γileɣ werǧin lliɣ deg wallaɣ-ik imǧelleb
ad yelḥu ciṭ
wali akk tigrummiwin sɣuṛ aseqdac-agi
i lbiε
yal taɣawsa nga-as azal nnig wayen ilaqen
ma d ayen i d-iteddun zemreɣ ad am-tesselhuɣ
d acu yifen tudert kra ala win i tt-icebḥen s wayen yelhan
i lebda ad am fkeɣ lferḥ
Ḥulfaɣ s ḥellu
Ḥfan isebbaḍen-iw
semẓi i radyu mi ara tnehreḍ ahat ad tesleḍ i kra
tettwamḍel d tamuddurt
axemt
ad ten-id-mmagren
tẓerreḍ tigdi-nni i teẓẓiḍ deg ul-iw seg temẓi
d ta i d yemmat-nsen tin akken i ɣef ur ndimeɣ
ur ufin ara ddwa i s-iwulmen
ussu-w ma ur yeɣmi s yiri-iw ara ad t-seqqiɣ
tedreg tidet s ddaw tiret nger-d tukket tekkerfef d tizizet
tesseṛɣem-asent-t
asɣar bu twekka i t-ittṛaǧun d rekku
rriɣ-d akk iẓerman-iw
tzad di ṣṣifa
irra-as ad m-d-ceggɛeɣ yiwen n yiɣid si tqeḍɛit-iw
Ḥerzet leqwanen-iw xeddmet ayen i d-qqaren
yessekcem-as tugdi seg tazwara tuɣal mi tt-iqarreb kan ad tekmumec
teṭṭef-d adif iɣes
amek ara as-d-yeggurraɛ tidet
kkreɣ ad ldiɣ tawwurt ufiɣ-tt temdel si berra
ddunit trennu tettaẓ di lbaṭel
deg wannar n ccna agrawlan
d tagnit daɣen i usebɣes n yinelmaden-nneɣ i d-yufraren deg yikayaden-nsen
sudaba d taxemrit ma d zahra truḥ d tacawraɣt d tawezlant cwiṭ
d lgirrat i yettarran medden d izruzaɣ deg tmura n berra
stufaɣ-asen-d i warazen
daymi i as-fkan azal meqqṛen tmura n umaḍal
i iɛeddan deg lmuǧahdin ay igeḍman n uteffaḥ
musa iṣubb s agdud ihdeṛ-asen
tella tesɣimt ilmend n llufan tettrus s deffir
sin akin uɣalen ɣer tusna
imi imal d nekkni i t-id-ibennun
ur faqeɣ ara amek i d-ufiɣ iman-iw ssemririɣeɣ-t deg yidammen-is
yusef awcic iɛedda s ukabar n tirni n yiɣallen inemlayen
tesbumbxem turin-nwen s ddexxan
yezga-d gar tsedlist d yiwen i yeznuzun iḍebsiyen d ttesfifin n ccna
kul tikli itubeɛ-itt lkil
faṭma caɛbi d tanaẓurt si zik-is tḥemmel ccna aqdim
ttif aɛebbas aḥṛuṛ wala meyya di leɛṛuṛ
ama s ufus n umdan neɣ n zzman
inṭeq buṭrus inna-as sefhem-aɣ-d lemtel-agi
irden izellafen mmi d ssmid yufafen
d tabaḍnit gar-as akked win teɛna temsalt
Ḥṣiɣ lɣerba-w tḍul
ad yernu
sken-iyi-d
setta n wussan ara txeddmeḍ lecɣal-ik
ur tekkiɣ ara daɣen tura di tmegreḍt akken ad bedleɣ ayen yuran
awal-iw ɣer da ad snemmreɣ wid d tid i yi-d-yefkan tallelt
imiren ad iṣfu
ajṛad iɣumm meṛṛa tamurt armi i tuɣal tmurt d taberkant
aɛalṭar n lebxuṛ akked yeɛmuden-is heggan
kul yiwen iteddu d win ukud i d-imsuwa
azrug yeččur d tikeṛṛusin
nuɣal d timeddukal
mi tenheq a d-tebru i tala
ineqqec iferres tizemrin ileqqem iberrez iḥerqan
ssuddem a yibrir ad afent ayen ara brint
ad yewjed
Ɣaḍent-iyi snat yessi-s d tmeṭṭut ur nesɛi lwali
s lfeḍl-im i geɣ leqrar
acu a ḥebbu
ad k-id-isxeḍ Ṛebbi akken d-isxeḍ ibkan
ur t-tḥemmleḍ ara
nessaram timnaḍin-nniḍen ad ddment taɣiwant n iderginen d amedya
ma ur ssawḍeɣ ara ad ten-ceyyɛeɣ ɣer tseqqamut tamcarekt yettabaɛen ɣer tselwit n tesdawit n tizi uzzu
tisegnatin akken d tiɛeryanin di tlemmast n idurar n uɣrum tabernint terreẓ aman ẓeqfen
ur ifaq ara tama-s i tella tezzi-as si yal tama
tamda umalus yugar din mkul ɣerrus
yiwen n uqemmud d tis ɛecṛa n yiwen n uflis
sserɣen tiẓgi ilindi
lewkil inna-asen ad ken-ṭṭfeɣ deg wawal i d-tennam
tiɣri i yilmeẓyen iqbayliyen i iqeddcen
temlal tasa d wayen i turew
ula d win i d-ilulen deg uxxam-is ad yečč
ur tteẓẓuɣ ṭejra ur ččiɣ nfeɛ
mi d-teldi tawwurt n texxamt-iw tella tlehhet
neɣ ma ulac ad sen-sbibben ddnub ara d-iglun s lɛiqab
Ɣum ṣṣifa-m tesmundleḍ allen-nneɣ
akken ad d-teldi allen-is ad tt-ssudneɣ ad s-iniɣ acḥal i tt-ḥemmleɣ
i tura tfarḥem
tazrigt tamenzut tella deg zuǧ alaf u rebεa deg at yanni
deg uxxam-a n tmussni ttwajerrden akka tura tesɛin n yinelmaden gar warrac d tullas
nniɣ-ak ad yeddu
tafrirt tettengeẓwaṛ ulawen d ikerfafen
ttuḥettmen s yisem n usemsawi-a ad xedmen tigawin n tlawin-nsen
tamɛayt n sin n watmaten d acu i tennam
Ɣer taggara ufiɣ txedmeḍ anadi ameqqran ɣef yismawen n yidigan n dinna
tura zemreɣ ad xedmeɣ kullec ɣef yidra-s
win ara ten-innalen ad inǧes
tameɣra n ccna deg taddart n taḥanut
d baba d nekk i t-yessnen
awalnuten ttruẓen ccbaḥa n tsekla
maca taqbaylit tezga yid-i
ur tt-yettaɣ ur tt-ibellu ala lxir deg wul-ines
tikli tis mraw d kraḍ n yinelmaden n tesdawit
ad as-yini aqlih di lbiru
nebɣa ad yili usebddad-agi s unedrez ayagi ad aɣ-iḥettem ad t-id-nexdem deg blida
ad ilin tnac n yeẓra akken i llan yismawen n leɛruc n leqbayel
ad geḥleɣ ad ẓewleɣ ad zwireɣ sdat sidi
yeɛteq yebra-d i ṣṣnin
yettili s umata d tanga maca yezmer daɣen ad yili d timdeswelt
amdan lɛali ur iheddeṛ deg imi ur ili
seg-sen ay d-ggiḍ tara
ladɣa tin n mqidec d lunja
kra n wussan kan di leɛmer-is ur yesɛi ara amihi fell-i
d aɣbel-is ay uḍneɣ ugar n yiman-iw
ad trebḥeḍ
azekka ad d-nawi tislit
iḍudan d leqɛadi
nteddu s yisuḍaf akk yal wa deg umkan-is am teɣrast n tzizwit
ddem a mmi abernus-ik tefɣeḍ seg uxxam ruḥ ad tenseḍ deg tejmeɛt
ad yuɣal d ayla n lmuqeddem
Ɣer unnar ad srewten
ur bɣiɣ ara ad d-kkeɣ sya ur bɣiɣ ara ticraḍ
ad tt-tɛemmreḍ s ṛebɛa n idurar n yeẓra ɣlayen
simmal yettzid fell-as waṭṭan
yeqdec deg waṭas n yimukan

teɣramt

i wakken ad taf amkan i as-ilaqen ilaq ɣef tsedduyin d yimḍebbren d yimezdaɣ ad xedmen ayen zemmren
tettfuḥumt

sers-itt
tnawel seksu
nekk ẓerren-iyi d yiwet seg-sen
ur εad ṣaddeɣ
mi ɛellqent aẓeṭṭa ɛeddant snat sneltent-d ilni syen grent-d asaru
ad d-imdel tawwurt i lqahwa ḥed ur yettaẓ ɣer din medden akk myussanen

tɣaḍemt-tent
zik qbel ad ken-yissin nella nettidir di rrezg ar yiri
ass-a deg-s aḍu
rran-iyi-ten-id
ad sent-tt-teɛṛeḍ
ixdem iɛmuden s usɣar n lkasis yerna iɣumm-iten s nnḥas
muḥ lmulud isɛa-d tiyman umar Ṣafu gaɛatam akked qanaz
d netta i d illu n baba ad ssaɛliɣ di lɛaḍima-s
yebḍa-yakent-tt-id
akken ttwaliɣ nekni s yilemẓiyen ur nesɛi ara azref ad nextir
yuba yenkeṛ kullec
d argaz i yesεan tazmert n yifadden i tetteḥwiğ txeddimt n tmurt
la yi-teskerkiseḍ
ala d awezɣi

Ɣunfant-tt
seg udrar n ccelya
di tecmatin kan i ẓewren
theddreḍ taswaḥilit
serrḥen-ak ad truḥeḍ
tečča imensi-s
yessammes i laman yefka deg-s muḥend u yidir
ad fernen ayen i iwulmen maca s ṣṣwad d lmeɛqul
ufiɣ takaskiṭ-ik
dayen i as-yenna umeslatu-nni mi yekker
isefka-a ad ten-naf ɣer sdat ticki yekker uqeddic-a n tsuqilt tawurmant

ad ɣellin ur illi win i ten-id-itebɛen

bḍant-am-tent-id
akka akk i ttmeslayen

ur t-id-wwiɣ ara
yuba itettru
la t-ttnadin
d netta i d-sebba mi tettaxer seg uɣerbaz
imceyyeɛ ad iqeddem afṛux-nni ɣef uɛalṭar
deg snat n tmeslayin-a yeggugan i ttekkan ɣer yiwet n tutlayt

teṭṭfeḍ-ten-id
ur y-iḥeṛṛem acemma siwa kemm axaṭer d tameṭṭut-is
ibn xeldun amusnaw n tmetti anmezray
ad ten-tamnem
d lmut ara mmten ddnub-nsen i yirawen-nsen

ttett
imi ur ifki ara iẓuran ur ittaṭṭaf ara

jemɛent-tt
ulac argaz ara yi-nallen

yyaw ad neqdec

muqqlemt
inna-asen Ṛuḥet
melmi ara tzewǧeḍ
lukan ad tt-tennalem d amcum-nwen
axaṭer akka i yi-d-ittunefk lameṛ
maca asteqsi ayen ḍarrunt cwalat taggara-agi deg tesdawit n mulud mɛemmri

sčefčef-it
aseqsi agejdan d acu yezdin d wacu yemgaraden gar snat n tmeslayin-a
aṭas i tt-ḥiwten wat uxxam ad d-tenṭeq
lukan ad tzewǧeḍ yid-i ad am-sselseɣ tayri-w deg uḍad-im
akken daɣen bu sin-nni irbeḥ-d sin-nniḍen
ad t-nɣen ass wis tlata ad d-iḥyu

baba iḥres-itt nezzeh

ar melmi
deg wul-ik tebren testent

itbeε addal iǧǧa leqraya
iɛedda Ɛumer ɛzizen i tiṭ i t-iẓran
ihi ẓẓadent tlawin azemmur-a akkit deg yixxamen-nsent
akraren la ṭṭafaren

di lweqt-nni iban-d yuḥenna aɣeṭṭaṣ
ur d-ttbanen ara imusnawen
kerheɣ mi ara serḥen mliḥ i ṣṣut n tilifizyu
s tafukt ad telhu tfelwit
yenna-d "azul"

d iseɛdiyen wid yesɛan ṛṛeḥma axaṭer ad afen ṛṛeḥma

nɣant-am-tt
ad t-ǧǧeɣ ad yers
aggagen d yimsujjiyen d taluft n yimuḍan akked remḍan abeɛda wid yettidiren s waṭṭanen idumen
azul fell-awen meṛṛa
mačči d yir aterras
ttxil-k ɛiwed
rnan lexwal d yiderma
ad ixdem s idammen-nni ayen yexdem s idammen n uɛejmi
Ṭṭaq neɣ agnir
mbeɛd tizlit-nni “tulawin” n crif Ḥamani i d-ɣennant tullas n terbaɛt n ccna n tdukkkla imnar n tdukli
udem-is merra wwten-t yiḍerfan

ur iṛuḥ ḥedd ar dina
a-t-a ikcem-d wayeḍ
win yebɣan ad iyi-rreẓ ma yezmer kan i lxedma
ad d-kkreɣ ad ḥusseɣ i uqerruy-iw ẓẓay
anda-ten yimcac-ik
beṭleɣ aɣerbaz
ur tessuliḍ acemma
yeɣli wazal-iw
medlet adlis-nwen
iɛedda wayyur segmi i ssneɣ kahina
Ɣas ssensen itran deg tudrin
d baba-m tom
yenqec tizemrin-is
tḥemmel igerdan
yella kra ilaq ad t-ḥsuɣ
agdud ittlummu di musa iqqar-as d acu ara nsew
Ṣub d akessar
lqil nqeyyel
terramt-aɣ-ten-id
ad tt-id-tuqmemt
iyyamt ad tceḍḥemt
teǧǧa akk ixemmimen-ines di rrif
yecfa mi i d as-yenna ur tett ala s tamment
iniɣ-kem d lǧuher
tettkemmil tsestant
d lqahwa i itess
ur yettwaselkam ara
ad aɣ-d-ldint akk tewwura n rrbeḥ
awi-d ul-ik tuγaleḍ-d γer tmeγra
besseḥ ur ssineγ ara ad εummeγ
assaɣir d ajeǧǧig
kenwi d iselmaden neɣ ala
alɣem-a i nnu
si mḥemmed iburek daɣen ferɛun imiren iffeɣ-d sɣur ferɛun
ur tent-ttesseɣ ara
tikti n lebni n usebddad-agi n cacnaq tusa-aɣ-d asmi nesfugel yennayer iɛeddan
tḥemmel tidet deg tudert-is n yal ass
xdem cemma-cemma
mačči akka ara teḍru
summlen leεḍil meqqren yellan deg usenfar-agi n tnezduɣin i la traǧun ugar n xemsa n yiseggasen-aya
tameddit-a ad ak-n-ceggεeɣ tansa n usmel-nni
ad m-tt-fkent
akken tɣelli zzarriɛa i tmeɣɣi
yettḥawal tameslayt
deg tmurt i tezweǧ
twalam kan cci i yesɛa
Ṣekkṛem allen-nwen
dɣa yesker ssuq sdat uxxam-is
teglamt yes-s
sya ar yimir yegra-d kan ad awen-d-nini afud igerrzen
"a tagiṭart-iw" d tizlit n sliman Ԑazem
ma tebɣam
tebded
asmi ur d-leqqḍen ara aṭas n uzemmur zemrent ad t-zḍent tlawin deg yixxamen-nsent
illu isemma i tafat ass ma d ṭṭlam isemma-as iḍ
ssusef s igenni ad d-uɣalent s udem-ik
ad d-ccetkiḍ
drus
axxam-a deg sin ad t-nsali
teɛǧeb-iyi ustṛalya
mi refden wat Ɛebbas allen-nsen walan ferɛun itteddu-d dɣa fehmen belli iɛraben tebɛen-ten-id
win yessetḥan yeffeɣ s agni
tewɛeṛ tudert-iw
tella d lbaḍna-nneɣ
yeẓra yuba ugar
ad as-tt-tɛeṛḍeḍ
neḥder tudert tettfat
ruḥ ad teṭṭseḍ ruḥ

uccen ad yečč tizermatin
lɛebd alemmam iteẓẓu ilili deg uxxam

ur d-ttnekkaren ara

a la yettru kan

Ԑuhdeɣ-k ur k-ǧǧiɣ
ur teɣɣar ara aẓawan
d acu i kent-id-iwwin ɣur-i
anida tella nneyya aḥayek ad idel meyya
anwa i am-yeslemden ccḍeḥ

s lfeḍl n nnbi amerbuḥ

skaddbeɣ

nadit deg usegzawal
uzuren

ufan-t

ulamek

tesfeqdem-tt

nekreɣ

tesfeqdem-t

s lfeḍl-ik a bab n leḥsan
tura ɛeqleɣ-k

steɛṛef

tabɣest
ur iyi-iḥemmel ara

ad sseddun deg usebter i yiman-is isallen-a isem azemz d wadeg n tlalit uṭṭun n tilifun

yeẓweṛ

Ṭukkek

turwem-d isefra
d tidet dɣa iberdan akk ssufuɣen

ugint

ad asen-t-yefk

ttxil-wet afet-t-id

yuba yettaɣ awal

yenɣa-yasen-tt

aqendur-agi ad isɛu imi di tlemmast anda ara yettɛeddi uqerru
ayen akk ara yekk wass netta ad tafeḍ yettẓala neɣ ad yeṭṭef adlis n leqran gar yifasen

yenɣa-yam-t
mi kfiɣ regmeɣ iman-iw

twalam tura
tfaqeḍ-iyi
ad d-yas wass anda ara tendemmem
awi-d kan ad teḥluḍ
Ǧǧan-aɣ-d ala taleqqa
ad awiɣ takeṛṛust-iw
a dda brahem
a liɣir n wass
asedrem ishel d lebni d yiseɣ i yuɛren
anda yedda d leƐnaya
tzemreḍ ad tessuqleḍ aya ɣer tefransist
s teqbaylit i d-kkreɣ deg uxxam-nneɣ
nniɣ-as ad m-yeεǧeb
abrid-a i d-tewwid ad k-issegrireb
d ayen yelhan i yi-texdem
iɛedda tura azal n useggas
susmet merra ttxil-wat
ttzuxxuɣ s tutlayt taqbaylit
win yettmetran iɣi ur iteffer ara taqbuct-is
ur ttxemmimeɣ ara akk
tutlayt-iw nettaru-tt s yisekkilen ilaṭniyen
yenwa ass-a i d aneggaru-ines
tiɣremt meqqert
ur ikukra ara ad ineɣ gma-s
iwint yid-sent ayen akk ara iḥwiǧent
d netta i ten-id-yewwin ɣer da
massi yeẓra ayen iceɣben maziɣ
ad d-asen meṛṛa azekka
acḥal i tesɛiḍ di leɛmeṛ-ik
amdakel-inek i tḥemmleḍ akk mliḥ d argaz neɣ d tameṭṭut
ad ḥewwsen yid-sent
yexsef
tesseṛɣem-asen-tent
zzi-d udem-ik
wissen ma ad d-yuɣal kra n yiwen n wass
yugi-asent baba-tsent ad ffɣent deg yiḍ
taxxamt mačči yesεa-tt
yebda la yettazzal
ur ttqelliq ara iman-ik kullec ad iseggem
ur aɣ-izgil yiwen
imɣaṛen nwan d nutni kan i yesɛan lḥeqq
acuɣeṛ i d-tceyyɛeḍ winna
acḥal yeswa yiwen n ulitr n uyefki
awal s uqerru tbeɛ-it ar d ikfu
“at simpson” d amazrar n wunuɣen urmiden
mačči d ufur ara neǧǧ dima
qqimet deg imukan-nwen
asmi ara tuɣaleḍ ɣur-s ad k-kkateɣ alamma teεreq-ak yemma-k
ttcektin yiselmaden n uɣerbaz amezwaru seg lḥif i ttidiren
tiɣri-w ɣur-kent a tuddar
kemmel akin i udrar
acḥal akka tura
ɣef tlelli d tugdut
nniɣ-as ḥemdulleh imi tselkeḍ
tettuḍ kra ddiɣ ḥafi
tessṛeɣ-asent-t
ad d-nesmekti ɣer tagara d akken am wayen iɛeddan ad yili uselmed deg uxxam-a s tutlayt taqbaylit
a wi yellan yid-m cehrayen n lexrif
acuɣer leqbayel ur qqaṛen ara aṭas idlisen s teqbaylit
ad nezger da
ulayɣer wid nniḍen
icudd yimi-s
Ǧǧet-t ad t-yexdem
adlis d ameqqran
ass mi i d-yuɣal ad tt-yawi
d afelleq maḍi
teswiḍ
tiɣriw ar ccenwa d uheggeṛ
tetturar tnelmadt yes-sen
ad s-yeqqaṛ ad d-snulfum iẓẓan mačči d takadimit
ur tettxemmimeḍ ara akk
iwala-t-id rebbi
ur ttḥebbir ara
yufeg ufṛux
ayen akk ara yekk ɣur-s ad yili d axeddam n useggas
Ɛeẓgent
yuba werǧin isellem
tteffɣen-d seg uqemmuc srid ɣer wul
tiwwura n rrbeḥ d sɛaya
yeqqim-d akin ugemmaḍ yettgabaṛ am uccen
ččiɣ aksum-is
Ḥebbeṛ ay aseḍṛu uqbel ad tteḍṛu
ur ḥusseɣ ara εyiɣ akk
taqbaylit d tutlayt n yemma akked baba
telha mliḥ
tban d yiwet seg terxisin n tqaḥbiyin
mi d-tnehreḍ takerrust muqel deg lemri alemmas d yiqerniyen
lmuqeddem ad t-imuqel
tilifun akken ad yettwennes xerṣum s ṣṣut-ines
newweḍ-d
isem-is inuda-d leɛrac yerna-d timdinin
glan yes-wen
cabḥa tecbeḥ nezzeh
iɛǧeb-awen lḥal
melmi ara nečč imensi
Ṛṛeẓ aqeṛṛu-yim cwiṭ
txeddmemt kullec
ad kent-d-inin azekka
yeqqim ɣef lbuṭa n walim yettkiyyif nasim yettxemmim
lli ul-ik i tayri
yuggad ayen i d-iḍerrun
ula d netta ur as-yeffiɣ ara leɛqel seg wakken yennum d liḥala am tigi i d-yettɛeddayen ɣef tddukli
akka i yella lḥal
d acu i tettnadiḍ ay amuḍin
ala dagi i xedmeɣ zik uqbel ad uɣaleɣ d amastan
ama s uziraz neɣ s uselkim
yal ass nettidir-it s tugdi
akabar n ubrid n tidet
azul fell-awen ay imesfliden εzizen
anasiw n uselkim-iw ufgent-as aṭṭas n tqeffilin
iǧǧa-t din ɣef yiri n wasif
Ɣas iles-is qerriḥ uli-s zeddig
d acu yewwin irebraben inselmen ad nɣen katiya bengana
d win-inek
leḥsab-agi meqqeṛ
d ayen i wumi yezmer lǧib
acuɣeṛ ur tettaẓeḍ ara ar zdat
yebɣa ad yessew
ɣas akken ɛeqleɣ d acu-tt tɣawsa-nni taberkant
ad yezzenz axxam-is
said yennejla ar marikan
tezwar teqbaylit-nkent
Ṛṛẓemt iqeṛṛa-nkent cwiṭ
amek i yuɣalen warraw-ik
diri-t wurar-nkent
iqqim akken kra n tiremt ildi-d allen-is yessaked akin d wakka
d acu ara d-tiniḍ deg wa
tfehhem-it
anta taɣect i k-iεeǧben i ccḍeḥ
wa d wa ur ttrun ara
s wakka ara mmagreɣ lmut
atmaten-is ɛemmden fell-as
terza ar wexxam-nsen iḍelli
baba yuɣ-iyi-d lqec ajdid i wass n lɛid
eǧǧ-iyi iman-iw ad tt-fruɣ
amek ara iqabel azekka taḥbibt n wul-is
dayen tessaǧwem-iyi am sselɛa di ssuq
nexdem deg iḍ iḍelli
zuɣer
ttmeslayen s ustestew am temɣarin
senɣel a win ur nettagem
iḥemmel ijeǧǧigen n tefsut
acu ixeddem di tmurt-is
yebna-awen axxam
Ṭṭuqqtent-d fell-asent tlufa
tiswiɛin d ddexxan
anda-tt tsarut
di taluft ddreɣ
afus deg ufus nettnadi tiddukla
ah a muḥend ssaɛid

tiselnin
deg tɛecciwt
iwalayen
qqimen ttqessiren
ifaz
wa nettḥir s axxam ad d-yezzi
buḍahaṛ
ad d-yas wass ad neffeɣ ɣef tafat
ad d-sutreɣ deg-m ad yi-tsurfeḍ
ad k-id-azneɣ lexlaṣ-nni s ttawil n paypal
rnu-yi-d wayeḍ
taggara leqqmen-tt s el εa
yella-d usfugel ar tagara
ataya yennayer
ur fellu ara afus-ik
meqqer txeddmeḍ akka kra deg tezrawt-nni neɣ d lxir kan
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem-iw
d wanwa ara d-tedduḍ
nekni nettxemmim kan ɣef teqbaylit
teɣṛamt
cfiɣ akken i ilaq fell-am
imeɣnasen iqbayliyen nuḍḥen aṭas mgal tameḥeqqranit deg tudert-nsen
tneǧreḍ abrid gar inijel
ad s-qqaren yettwaqheṛ
tnuda fell-awen tufa-ken
učči am wa yif-it laẓ
yella waya yella wayen yugaren aya
cennun yefṛax
iqebṭiyen n maṣer ttwaḥeqren deg akal-nsen
ilaq ad yeqqim deg beṛṛa uqjun-nni
anda akka ara neffeɣ
yettu yidir lekwaɣeḍ-is deg wexxam
tizemmrin ttidirent aṭas
anwa i d nekk nekk d aseklu
issembab aqnuc ɣef wayeḍ
aɣamac lgerra teṣleb lɣella
yuɛeṛ bac ad yamen yiwen annect-aki
inna akka d wakka
ad taf tqabact afus-is
yeṭṭef-itt ccɣel n wexxam
maziɣ yeṭṭef kan imi-s
anda-tent tfelwa
mačči ɣer wiyaḍ ara ten-id-tɣer
yesbeɣ yidir axxam-is
nekk ɛerqent-iyi irkelli ur ẓriɣ ara acu i ilaqen ad xedmeɣ
tteryel teččur-as-d aγerbal-is d tiwiztin
yenna-as ala
tzemrem ad teččem arkul-a s tbexsisin d asisen
awal d awal
d acu i kent-id-yewwin ɣur-i
seg zik i tbelleɛ tawwurt akken ur d-ikeččem ḥed allaɣ-is
i d-yeglan s lmut n luluf n tlawin arrac d yirgazen
jeddi-s n jeddi d jeddi
ay abrid ttun medden
ayefki-agi d aman
kullec ɣlay ass-a
ad d-tawiḍ tafaliḥt
nnan-as i baba-s
ala lxir i m-ttmenniɣ
meslay
tfukk-iten akk
Ḥemmleɣ acqiṛew
smenyif
ur yesṛuḥay ara yuba akud
sgunfu kra
gen di talwit a gma wahab racid d awezɣi ad k-nettu
int-as bɣan-tt ifassen-iw
yeshel lmaεun deg ufus ideg ur yelli
theddreḍ d imacac-ik
aṭas i yeṣber ugdud yiwen wass ad d-yeṭerḍeq
wissen d acu i d-yenna
mi ara wwen yigumma ɣellin-d ɣef tmurt
bdiɣ tira n yiwen ungal amaynut
tessen ad turar agambar
zman yefḍeḥ
yewwi-t nadam
d kemm i yesxeṛben kullec
waqila xuṣṣen deg leɛqel
ixuṣ-ikent aɛeqqa n sser
d wi i d idrimen-im
d talwit i nebɣa
ar dinna i tleḥḥu
ur as-d-teǧǧiḍ acemma
yezri wass rnan wayyuren
ndekwal-d ay agdud
ur d-iqqim ara aṭas ad naweḍ
mačči d kečč i iḍebbiren da
tetteḥnuccuḍem di zzit
yestufa wagi
netta ad yezgel tamacint
ineggura tban-asen
rekben taflukt n lḥif
ur ittɛemmid ara yidir i warraw-iw ad ččen tiẓidanin
ilaq ad tegreḍ annect-a g ddehn-ik
teqqen temɣart lḥenni
acimi i teskiddibeḍ a yidir
aqerruy-is deg lqaɛa
melmi ara yetɛeqqel uqcic-a
aqjun-nni d adal yerna yecbeḥ
ur iyi-tteg ara deg uqerru-ik
lḥaṣun lliɣ ruḥeɣ
dayen ur k-uḥwaǧeɣ ara deg uxxam-iw
tugi ad timɣur

ad wen-ten-id-awint

init-asen aql-i da
Ɛni la ttrun
ad k-ifiq ḥedd
ttxil-wat wa deffir n wa
nekk qebleɣ awi-d kan ad yeḥlu
mi yekfa iteddu ad iruḥ ɣer tejmeɛt
teɛya
maca amennuɣ-is d amatu
kullec ibeddel
mmi-k d izem gar yizmwen
ttawiɣ aɣyul-iw

ruḥ di lehna
tekka-d seg-m
awi-ten ma tṛuḥeḍ
ad t-id-ḍeqqrent lemwaji
ayaziḍ yeskuɛu
acḥal n win i t-inudan
i tura amek i d ixef-is
awal-iw yuɣal-as d taqriḥt i yemma
irgazen d tilawin zewǧen
err-d imseddayen n unadi amezwer
si tasaft ar at yanni
ḥman idammen i tikli
ceεlet-aɣ tafat

aql-iyi akked gma
ikad-d yella wayen i d-yeḍran
amek armi i kem-mazal da
s talɣa tezzi s ukdu n ɛecra n lmitrat
tura dayen isehlen maḍi
darwin amussnaw ameqqran yenna-d ibki i yuɣalen d amdan
layetmas d isem n teqcict
iselman ttxil-k
anwa i as-yennan ad nuɣal akka
azger yettwaṭṭaf seg umeẓẓuɣ argaz seg yiles
kcem ma tebɣiḍ
sima teẓra d akken maziɣ isetḥa mliḥ
tettɛumu daxel n tsekla
mazal kan akka kra ad tfak
ttqabalen tafat n sbeḥ
ini-yi-d amek ara tili tegnawt azekka
anta-tt tin akken i ak-d-iheddṛen

iqlumen d agzam tifeɣwa d aceqceṛ
aru taspenyulit
yugi ad d-inṭeq
d taqbaylit i d idles-is

ur d-cliɛen ara

efk-as aftat-is n uksum ur tettu ara

iɣil-is ɣezzif
d asɣar i yulin di ssuma

akka ara d-yečč
yerna di lɛid ulac meṛṛa aɣafeṛ
i tikkelt tis snat i as-d-yerra ayen tebɣa ad tsel
d acu n tkeṛṛust i tesɛiḍ
akken tebɣu tili talɣa-s
akka i truḥ tanina tamɣbunt

ad d-taseḍ anebdu-a

ad-yezdi yid-m ugar
ad d-ddunt yid-s

ad as-d-tehder i maziɣ

slet-d tura
ad wen-t-id-yawi

yesrafeg rric ar yigenni
ma ffreɣ-awen leɛyub-iw

yecmet
mbeɛd talalit n sarug raɛu iɛac mitin u sebɛa n iseggasen
aṭas i ten-iwalan
nexdem akken
tudert i tlelli

a bu uqamum n uyaziḍ
times tettett ur trewwu
bezzaf fell-ak
sellem fell-asen akken ma llan

ufan-as ixf-is
yugi-yi baba ad nehreɣ takerrust-is
a tesɛiḍ gma-k ḥader-it
ass mi nella d imecṭaḥ nezga deg uxxam n jida
qqim raju nnuba-k deg tzeqqa-ihin
sɛant azref ula d nutenti
maca argaz ur yezmir ara ad yerkeḍ awal n yemma-s akked baba-s
yenger lateṛ-is
ur meččḥeɣ ara iḍebsiyen
a mmi tagi mačči d tameṭṭut
taqbaylit d tutlayt n usirem
iger-iyi ubrid ɣeṛ uxxam aqbur tazeqqa-nni deg ilulaɣ
yal wa iswan-is
ma yella fehmeɣ timsal akken llant
ur ttakret ara
karl marx yusa-d ar tmurt n yiqbayliyen
Ṭṭes ṭṭes mazal lḥal
syin d asawen
iban sruḥayeɣ aṭas n wakud deg isekkilen-a n tcinwat i lemdeɣ ilaq-iyi ihi ad issineɣ ugar udmawen-nniḍen n tutlayt-a
llan sin neɣ kraḍ n yimra ɣef tnarit
tettarraḍ-tt deg uɛewwiq
wissen anda i teffrem
inuda fell-as yufa-tt
acḥal netta yettnadi fell-as
yerra-kem deg uɛewwiq
yerra-d awal yidir
teǧǧiḍ weltma-k weḥd-s
maziɣ teṭṭef-it tergagayt
Ɣlayet zzit n uzemmur axaṭer tesɛa leɛtab
teččiḍ kra ṣṣbeḥ-agi a yidir
ur asent-d-teǧǧiḍ acemma
kemm ad tzegleḍ tamacint
amezruy yettuɣal-d
ta sennig ta
ad tṛuḥ tmacint
ad d-afeɣ abrid
a ssiɛqa d acu-t uxeṣṣaṛ-a
abujed ur yesɛi ara tilisa
ahat kifkif swaswa ula d netta
d tasekkurt i d-ifka ṛebbi deg-s
ad awin abrid-nsen

win yeffuden yeswa
d ta i d tiririt-nwen
ttxil-m ḍebbeṛ-iyi-d kra n lxedma
ur awen-d-tuqiɛ ara
yekker weqcic ad iruḥ
anda ara kent-id-afeɣ umbeɛd
tḥemmlemt llebsa n yeqbayliyen
si tama-nniḍen
acuɣeṛ i s ulac win i d-ittarran awal
deg yinig ihi ad ninig
sliman Ɛmiri yessidig di linuxmint s teqbaylit
yal abrid yettawi ar Ṛum
d awal kan i d-nenna
d nutenti ara yissinen
ur heddṛemt ara yid-i

d acu i kem-yewwin ɣur-s

yal mi ara fɣeɣ ad tkerseḍ i unyir-ik
ulac aselkim
illu yelli-as allen dɣa twala yiwen n lbir n waman
cfiɣ
ifakk-ak-tent
la qqaṛeɣ aḍris-nni
yiwen ur yecfi
d acu i tessneḍ
d acu ara am-iniɣ
tubiret d palisṭru
ɛemmi-s-nni akken
neɣ areṭṭal n yibbas
d abuneqqar akked inijel arad k-d-ittak
ula d wid ur nettamen s rebbi ɛawnen-d deg lebni n teglisya-nni
a lfahem yiɣṛan ssefru-yi-d lemnam
atnan zdaxel
ma teqqneḍ sseɣṛes
yugem-d uɣyul iswa-ten
d kenwi ara iruḥen
ur d-tban ara

win ara yeldin tawwurt
meɛna uɣal-d ttxil-k
d nutni i yesxeṛben kullec
ahat tebɣiḍ ad d-terreḍ
ttxil-wet da tlaq tsusmi
walimt kan ma jbant-d
ur heddṛet ara yid-sen
mi teqqen tabniqt am wezger yeqqnen azaglu
temmut-asen tyuga d snat testan d warraw-nsent
ttsellim akk fell-asen
uffan-d iman-nsen di taggara ḥeṣlen d acu ara xedmen
ḍrifa n taxlifawt
aggur d tziri
lemqeggel
bgayet d tamdint n yiqbayliyen i d-yezgan tama n tizi wezzu di zzayer
Ḥemmleɣ ad ččeɣ igumma n lawan
bɣiɣ afenǧal n lqahwa ttxil-k
ad aɣ-t-id-yawi azekka
ini-d yelha xdem yif-it
yettmeyyiz aṭas yidir
msebran ilindi
yuzzel yecceḍ yeɣli yekker
yella kra n tikkelt i tukreḍ
siwel-iyi-d azekka
iruḥ-as s leḥder
as-d tura kan
suter-asent
yuba yettxemmim
ad kent-t-fkent
ur nesɛi ara taqrurt
tfakemt-asen-tt
yella ujdid
ilikem d kemm
sḥeqrent-kem
ad nehḍeṛ s tagnizit
ad iwwet akken ad t-id-isellek
ad awen-d-ceyyɛeɣ tafakturt-nni
ad yuɣal tom mucaɛ
d zzhu kan i tebɣa
yesɛa aydi
tezmer i usemmiḍ am wa
Ɣur-k ad yenz nnif-ik
muḥend yekka di Ǧeḥḥa
anda akka lliɣ tura
ur nwiɣ ara ad teffeɣ akka
isɛedda muḥend temẓi-s akken kan i tt-yebɣa lxaṭer
tessers-it
d iwraɣen
tecqarrweɣ newwara yidir
ilemẓiyen msakit ḍaɛen teddun ur iban sani ass d yiḍ nutni ẓeṭṭlen
ayefki n tfunast sɛan-t ttaɣen-d win n tcekkaṛt
aderɣal yella ittemduduε akked uqjun-is
ttrağuɣ Ḥayat akked linda
acu tennam deg wayen lsi-iɣ
ma yella tenna-am-d ad akem-d-ssuγ leḥrir neγ tazeggart ini-as tazeggart
tezwar tfenṭazit tamusni
feṛḥent akk
aqcic yejreḥ afus-is
Ԑyiɣ seg ccḍeḥ
iɛewwel ad d-yerẓ idmaren-is akken ad d-yeffeɣ ɣer berra
yahuda yenna-as d acu i tebɣiḍ ad m-t-ǧǧeɣ d ṛṛhina
sfaqen-t-id
win iɣef terɣa tmiḍt-iw isderɣel tiṭ-iw
urgan
tuɣalemt d tuḥdiqin
am win yettaken irden i yir tuɣmas
acuɣeṛ i tessirideḍ ifassen-im
ad xaqeɣ mliḥ fell-asent
acuɣeṛ ur iṛuḥ ara
ad idireɣ akken bɣiɣ
ma d yemma-s d taciṭant
s tirrugza ara nebnu taqbaylit
teffeɣ ar beṛṛa
kunwi tzeglem tamacint
ddeqs n tlawin d yirgazen gar-asen katia tilemẓit
walaɣ-ten deg ssuq
asmi tbeddel tamurt i ẓṛiɣ tayri-nneɣ temmut i d-yeqqimen ala layas
ad yelmed azekka taqbaylit
d taqbaylit i d tafat-nneɣ
akken i ɣṛan deg uɣerbaz
ur inuda fell-akent ur kent-yufi
ttwalint kan taqbaylit
tettḥebbiṛeḍ ɣef teqbaylit
yettu akk ayen i as-nniɣ
ewt-as ad tekker
ur ttafen ara ayen ara xedmen
tlul-d s teqbaylit
tḥemmlem tutlayt taqbaylit
terwi tebberwi yegguma ad d-yeḍheṛ yixef-is
ayagi ad isireg asider d usali n tvidyutin
iẓra-k nettḥadar-iten
a kra ikersen tawenza
ayen ur nečči ad ten-sellek
ala leɛǧeb i d-yeḍran ass-a d maziɣ
anwa ttawil i tettwaliḍ ilaq bac ad tefru temsalt-a
ad ken-ɛas kečči asma ara tesɛuḍ idrimen
akk medden ala ɣur-sen kan i qqnen
texreb nniyya-k
yerna mačči ɣef leqraya kan ara nehder
mi d-tekcem
tenna-as
sliman u muḥ yefṛeḥ
yemla-awen d acu ara txedmem
yebna-awent axxam
yiwen n ugazu n tẓurin yezmer ad yewzen alma d sin ikiluten
milmi ara-dd yuɣal
bɣan ad ččen
d ass n letnayen
ur inuda fell-aken ur ken-yufi
selleɣ i kra n lḥaǧa
acḥal i ḥkiɣ ɣef ṣṣifa-m
axeddim-is d asewwi
ruḥeɣ ɣef ssaεa kan
izerreε igḍaḍ neqqben
fran-tt fell-aɣ zik-nni uqbel ad d-yeḥder wass-a

ma ad d-yas
tameṭṭut-ik  aɛni terwel
ssufeɣ azmam-nni aberkan
taṣaḍuṛt
netta d nekk nesdegdeg
meẓyan u muḥ qrib yeṭṭef tiziri tagawawt
Ẓẓayet tuyat i urfad n waya
mačči alamma tenṭeq-d
nessaram kan ur ttnaɣen ara yemyurar
urɛad tekfi newwara leqraya
akken ittruḥen sbeḥ
ur tezmir ara ad tuɣal s axxam-nsen
ula d maziɣ ur yeṭṭif ara iman-is
ilaq yiwen yeẓran azal-is
ur tneṭṭeq ur tsawal
asirem-nni n ssɛaya
ula d tiqcicin zgant ṭṭalayent-tt
ad as-d-inin azekka
tḥulfam-as i wezɣal
ziɣ tettwazedɣeḍ
imsebriden ttɛeddayen ttuɣalen
ziɣ ulac deg wallaɣ-ik
win akken ur neḥric d aɣyul akka i as-ssawalen
iqemmer yerbeḥ
ddu d uḍar-ik
d acu i d ssebba n umennuɣ-nsent
lufan ad teẓreḍ acḥal i kem-kerheɣ
yiwen deg-sen ur iwala udem n wagi yukren
ahat mazal tudert akin i lmut yella win i yeḥsan
ad tṛuḥem ad yi-teǧǧem
akken kan ad d-neqqel ɣer ṣṣeḥ ihi yella wayen i k-ttalaseɣ
tadukli n yiɣallen imagdayen imettiyen
ad wen-d-yazen ṛebbi sbeṛ
agezdu n bgayet
abrid ad s-tiniḍ ur yettfakka ara
akken i d-yettali yiṭij i ttɣiben yetran
acuɣeṛ
ad irbeḥ ukabar anemlay akken i walaɣ
ad d-asen ar wexxam-nneɣ azekka
ad iniɣ
ad nelḥu wa deffir wa wa sdat wa ad nawi izerfan-nneɣ
ad tɛawdeḍ tamuɣli i temsalt-anni
adiwan aɣelnaw n yizerfan n umeskar d yizerfan uqṛiben
akka i d taḥbult sin n wudmawen i tesɛa  udem iqebqeb udem d lemri
ttergigiɣ ɣef tasa-s
ddiɣ d baba
ɣlint-d fell-i tikta am uḥemmal n waman
taɛwint bbadda
yezdeɣ deg uxxam n gma-s
am win ittṛaǧun tamellalt si tyaziḍt
ttemɣuṭṭun am yifrax
bezzaf i d-yefka tom d tuttriwin
ur zmireɣ ad t-zzmeɣ
ad azzleɣ alamma dayen ɛyiɣ
sers lbaṣta-m ad yali uzeṭṭa-m
ad rreɣ tarwa-k am uɣebbaṛ n lqaɛa
tiwaculin ttwaqdent di tasa-nsent
yuqcan iǧǧa-d caba akked dadan
iɛzel iman-is ɣef watmaten-is meṛṛa
win izegren lebḥeṛ isehl-as iɣzeṛ
ad k-isgen Ṛebbi ɣef tzeggart
aman n nnisan iffeɣ lehzel iɣsan
yeɛqub isɛa tnac n warrac

tfakk-asent-ten

tfakemt-asent-ten
d aqjun lɛali
leɛmeṛ i k-zerrgen
sefti amyag-nni
ad tt-id-kksent

tislit n unẓar
cukkeɣ yeḥla tom

ihi snulfant-d yiwet n tiddukla semman-as tilmoz tilawin n mozilla

tekkat-aɣ tderrit ticki nteddu
ur ten-ɣaḍeɣ
ɣas rẓaget ad tt-sweɣ
kečč d nekk d irgazen
ma tekkseḍ-t-id ad yewḥel
tikkelt-nniḍen ad teɣli
saɛid u muḥ yessebɣes tiziri tagawawt
Ḥemmleɣ taqbaylit
s yes i ǧǧuǧugen yijeǧǧigen
kecmen-d yemyurar s annar
Ǧeɛfer yesɛa tilkin
tselleḍ tikwal i uẓawan aklasiki
ad tɣileḍ d berzidan si lketṛa n lɣaci
akken ara yili
amcic aberkan la yetett aɣerda amellal
ad cnuɣ
Ɣer tagara lqeddafi yemmut yir lmut
lqum-nni n zik yecceḍ
taglisya ssya lǧameɛ syihin
ur ttuɣal d aclim ad k-neqbent tyuzaḍ
meḥsub aɣyul ur yuklal ara timẓin
mačči d abrid ur n-ufiɣ
ansi k-d-tekka ccama-nni

iban ɣef udmawen-nwen
tezgamt din

tezwar teqbaylit-im
Ɛni yettaru deg ṭṭlam
ur ttmeslay ara yid-sent
din ara yaf amddakel-is massi
ass n lexmis taṣebḥit
imi k-ifut lefjer ay amɣaṛ xas sserked iman-ik
icaṛqed y iṭij
bɣiɣ aṭas n yedrimen
mi d-teffeɣ
anwa ur nesli ara s lexbeṛ n tlalit-ines
ittuɣaḍ ugeswaḥ
immɣi-d wadal ɣef uɣrab imi axxam-nni ulac wi t-izedɣen
sliman u muḥ yettkal ɣef tiziri tagawawt
heggimt isefra i wurar d tameɣṛa ass-agi
anda-ten iceṭṭiḍen-iw
tamurt n mečč-medden

rebḥeɣ
ur d-usint ara

ad tent-id-tuqmeḍ

sliman u muḥ d aferḍas
syin akkin

nɣiɣ-as-t

ussnan deg tallit tummast

aqcic-a yettarra taqemmuct

d wa i d asteqsi-nkent aneggaru

zaṛqun
kra n uqeddic sɣur akabar n yidles d tugdut di tizi wezzi d tajmilt
Ṭṭfen aɣṛum deg ufus-nsen
Ǧeḥḥa yuli-d abrid n tuḍeft yemmuger-d mmi-s n briṛuc
win iten-yesɛan isem-is mechur
allen n sima zgant lesqent deg maziɣ
eǧǧ-iyi ad ak-d-sekneɣ yiwen n tɣawsa
ur tt-id-yeẓri ara
ad tqabel tilufa akken d-ussant
yettruḥ deg-i nnefs

ibbuḥra wass-a d yiḍelli

kemmel anadi

muqqel
tebḍa-yi-ten-id
yeswa tabeyyirt
rran-asen s ih
ad tḥewwseḍ yid-sen
mi tt-yefka umnar n tewwurt ɣer ufrag temmuger-itt-id yemma-s s taḍsa
amennuɣ-is yewweḍ-aɣ-d nesla-yas
ma deg tama tayeffust ikufan akken llan zik ay llan tura reqmen

iznuzu-ten ad cikula
ad d-tuɣaleḍ fell-aneɣ d agellid

a kahinat n wass-a
tagrest aseggas-a teqqseḥ
tella dinna yid-s

tanemmirt i win i d-yefkan afus
dehbiya tefka axessaṛ i meqran
ad yili rebbi d yiderɣalen
iteddu-yi di nneqma
ssneɣ-tt seg wasmi i tella meẓẓiyet
ifermacen ur zmiren ara ad ɣeẓẓen
imuras n unebdu nesɛedday-iten ɣef yiri n yilel
ur awen-d-yuɣ ara baba-twen iserwula
tufiḍ iman-im
rriɣ-tt ala i ccḍeḥ nekk d mary
di tallit-nni n sebɛin ad d-tenṭqeḍ s teqbaylit ad k-refden

iruja sami ad d-tsubb ssuma

Ɣeṛ-iyi-d
amek yella sliman u muḥ

maca ulac-it
sliman u muḥ akken kan yeɛqel ciṭ tiziri tagawawt
d ameɣnas
ur ken-id-iṣaḥ ara wawal
am wakken d aɛessas ɣef tɣiwant
war ma tga lḥed i tiktiwin-is
anda ara tesɛeddiḍ imuras-ik n unebdu
yuker-aɣ
amek ara teḍru yid-sen
ur yewwi ur yerri
yal yiwen d acu i yesɛa d iswi deg wallaɣ-is
yuker-itt
ur as-d-tuqiɛ ara

akka i d axemmem
gar-aɣ yid-wen siwa lxir
din i tuḍen aḍar-is
a-t-an ffɣen ɣer temdint
rsen-d seg tkerrust

ayen ufiɣ ɣur-s d imeslayen

ula d maziɣ yuki-d

d aɣelluy i d-ɣellint ɣef uqerruy

d acu yeḍran
melmi i d-truḥem
Ḥsen u muḥ yuɣ-d kra ɣer tiziri tagawawt

anwa i d abrid i yettawin ar lundun

ukren-iyi di lkar
heddreɣ-asen ugin ad fehmen
isawel-as i tom
ur d-isawel ur d-yuri
yal yiwen ɣer ccɣel-is
amek ara nekcem ar uxxam

ulac win iḥemmlen ad iɣleḍ

Ɣur-k ad d-zeggreḍ talast-a
anwa akka i ak-d-yennan belli iɛedda-d sy-a
inɣa-t uqerru-s
yettak-asent azal-nsent
ikna lqedd-is

i d as-terra

ttwalin ddunit
yemla-yaɣ-d aɣersiw iḥercen win ixeddɛen win icebḥen win ifehmen akked win yekkaten ddreɛ
ishel
yuba yettutlay akken i iwata taqbaylit
Ɛelmeɣ ad s-tiniḍ d timmuxlelt maca ikad-iyi-d ḥemmleɣ uletma-k-nni tamecṭuḥt
at rebbi la d-sellen ugin ad d-neṭqen
Ɛeddan kra n wussan munir yuɣ-d akanic yerna-d abirmuda awezlan anect n tkiluḍt
Ṭṭfen amkan-nsen
huzz ammas-ik a dda ɛli bu yezgaren
yenna-d dɣa ur d-ittruḥu ara
ur εad temmuteḍ
abrid yergel s udfel
ur d-yenni ara akka tom

d aberǧeɣlal

yesɛa rbeḥ am baba-s

teqqar

lejnan

ttruḥuɣ yal ass ar umkan-nni
asmi i d-yenna
tbaneḍ-d di ṭṭlam i wazal

iberkanen iwraɣen

akabar aɣelnaw i twizi d tneflit

yemma ad iyi-tewwet

sekcem isem-ik da

d wanwa ddan

beṛka-k aqeṣṣeṛ

ccah deg-k i mi tettamneḍ tiqsiḍin-is

ulac aserreḥ

ulac aḥettem deg waya

mcawarent

ddut
d nnuba-k

seg wakken iḥemmel ayen yeɣɣar

isawel yidir i ubugaṭu-ines

akken kan i ttɣaman
qwan leṛyuy
acuɣer ur tṛuḥemt ara ad teẓremt tamsulta
akken-kan yesla s tmettant n yemma-s yexcawet
allen-is ččurent-d d imeṭṭi

amussu n unerẓem
ala adebbuz-ines
ad ibarek deg-k
abidun-a yeqqers
akken bɣunt cebḥent tullas ur ttagad tifeḍ-tent

ad d-tseɣli fell-ak deɛwessu

yewɛer lfiraq

adɣa lḥenni
ihi ulac tiḥbulin maca llant tmeqruḍin
a tid yenzan

ad tent-id-afen

ma ulac fell-as

wa rebbi
ur yeẓri acu iwumi i d-iberru

a tamɣart clex abzim-im

Ḥemleɣ aḍil

ttbeccicent iserwula-nsent
idles-inem d aqbayli

ur tessinem ara tasdawit n bgayet
ad ɣṛen di tesdawit n bgayet
truḥ ɣer Ṭṭelyan
tetḥeqqem belli tesɛam aṭas n yedrimen

ur imid akka wala akka

acḥal i m-yeṣber

daya kan

aɛerqub
ur ittbeddil ara mejjir aẓar

Ḥemmleɣ-k am jjenjaṛ i tiṭ
i tura melmi ara xedmeɣ ɣef wexxam-iw
ajenwi n lḥub i yi-zlan
ssif iɣleb-it leqlam
ad d-aɣen umsix

s tayeḍ ad kem-beddleɣ
a kwen icedhi lxiṛ d rrbeḥ
yekkat agiṭar deg yiwet n terbaεt icennun tuɣac n zik

imsidag iqbayliyen xeddmen am tweḍfin
lqanun n twacult yenqeḍ izerfan n tmeṭṭut

cedheɣ-tt

anwi i k-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi

leɛmer tuẓam

myencadent
ad yemmet yiwen ad d-ilal wayeḍ
