iban ɣef wudem-is yezɛef
mi ara ihedder iteffeẓ imeslayen
aseggas aya ur tt-walaɣ
nekcem deg waggur n yulyu
yura tabrat ɣezzifen i yemma-s
wa ibennu wa yetthuddu
tom d ameddakel aqdim
ziɣ aḥlil fell-ak
yeɛdel yuba d merra inelmaden
urǧin tuggad deg tudert-is am wass-nni
wissen ansa i d-yusa
wa yekcem wa yeffeɣ
wigi ttuɣaḍen msakit
tettaxxṛem i ccṛab d dexxan
amzun akken tafransist-agi tuɣ allaɣen-nsen
Ɣur-s aṭas n watmaten d yessetma-s
bɣiɣ-kem d zwaǧ-iw
s iɣzer deggren asirem-iw ifelleq ɣef yidɣaɣen
d allen n wemcic i yesɛa
ttnadiɣ fell-as ufiɣ-itt
d lawan ad tekkrem fell-awen
tezzin-d i lkanun ttqessiren
ma ireggem-d kra ixeddem-it
awal i d-tefkiḍ ɣur-s azal d ameqqran
ffeɣ ɣer berra ad timɣureḍ
acḥal n wakud i yezmer ad ak-yawi
infel-d wasif
yesla-iyi-d mi s-nniɣ ih
ziɣ tetaxdeḍ
legruri n lexrif bdant-d
ur bɣiɣ ara ad d-laleɣ
aya ur d-iḍerru s lqerb
tella yiwet n temsalt-nniḍen ilaq ad nemsefham fell-as
Ɣur-neɣ tikwal kan i d-yekkat udfel
tugi tardast n ujeddel ayen ur tt-yerzin tugi-t
ur bɣiɣ ara ad ččeɣ yiwet n tyita
rḍel-iyi-d adlis-a
ad yawi yid-neɣ asurif
yak tessneḍ-iyi
urgaɣ yemmut llaẓ igellil yečča almi yerwa
tom yeskker times
yuḍen tuɣ-it tawla
d tizemmrin i yellan s waṭas deg tmurt n leqbayel
kečč ur tufiḍ d acu i ak-yettruḥun
yessawel-as winna yerra iman-is ur yesli
iɛedda-d yiwen n ubeḥri d afuḥan
cetwa neɣ tagrest kifkif d taqbaylit akk
deg tlemsan tettili-d yiwet n tfaska iwimi semman ayrad
tamagit-is weḥd-s
d acu ara txedmeḍ s wannect-a n yeẓra
teǧǧel meskint d tameẓyant
tugiḍ ad d-tneṭqeḍ
Ṭṭuqqtent fell-as tlufa
vuṭan medden fell-as s tesɛa utesɛin ticert tesɛa utesɛin ɣef meyya
nesṭebṭeb-as i nna malḥa ɣef tewwurt sakin nerwel
mazal yeqqar ssneɣ
melmi ara teččeḍ imensi
ferḥat yumen s tmurt taqbaylit
neqqmat n temɣarin
taqbaylit d tutlayt-nneɣ
isyaxen regglen abrid
nekni nexḍa i imeɣi
mmi-s n taɣaṭ yečč-it wuccen
tettqellib-iyi
d taqbaylit i d tafat-is
ad nadiɣ fell-am ad kem-afeɣ
yugi ad yamen s wayen yeḍran yid-s
tnuda fell-ak tufa-k
ur tebɣi ara ad d-tsel
aɣyul yettjuɛu
akka ara tilliḍ
ad d-mlilent wallen-nwen
ssneɣ amkan yelhan i imensi
yeẓẓar ulawen yeqquren
yuɣal-d umjaḥ
efk-as taruka ad tellem
win ukkud ara tent-nferreq
Ḥader kan iyi-d-tettlaɛiḍ asma ara tɣerqeḍ
annaɣ ad d-tcehhed tsumta seg imeṭṭi mazal tekkiw
Ɣunzu-ten
akken kan i as-d-yekcem yizen n maziɣ terra-yas-d
sima deg lawan-nni
ur iyi-tessin ara
ad sent-ten-tɛeṛḍeḍ
anwa i kent-tt-igan
la am-n-selleɣ mliḥ
ad tẓer
seg wasmi i d-ikker netta d amdegger d ddunit
asaru-ya n yigerdan
aseɛreq fiḥel
yuba ibeddel arurad
Ṣṣaba-w d taḍṣa-k mi tt-sekdeɣ
acḥal i twezneḍ
yuba isuref-d
Ɛni kečč mačči n da
lḥu cwiya cwiya
yefra-tt ur yettruḥ ara
d asif wihin
yal taɣaṭ s yelli-s
ad sent-ten-id-awin
tɛeḍḍel
aqeddic n wawway n tfertin n tririt ɣer wanda ilaq deg tenmehliwin n usedwel
d acu yuɣen akka taɣect-im tbeddel
tluleḍ-d s twenza n ddheb
lmuqeddem ad imuqel tareɣla-nni
ur d-tefkimt ara udem
zzwaǧ yuɣal d ttjara
sakin mi ara k-iwali ad ifṛeḥ wul-is
akka ad rreɣ awal i mass aselway
fkiɣ-asen talwit deg wanect-a
i kemm d acu i txeddmeḍ dagi
yiwen n wass yenṭeq-d winnat yenna-d nexdem ayennat
ahat deg rray i tent-uɣen
timeẓri deg snat n tutlayin
d tidet ibeddel mačči d cwiṭ
a taqbaylit ma iṭṭes sseɛd-im ssaki-t
tsers-d tacmuxt-is s lemɣawla tefka-as ad isew
teɛreq-as cchada
ala s ufermaj d uɣrum i ifeṭṭer meskin
Ṣṣut-is ireṣnen lehdur-is weznen
yuɣal-d mendas s axxam n baba-s
tfukkem-t
beṛka acetki
ssers iman-ik
lmut ad k-tawi
mačči d tikti-s
Ḥemmlen-iyi
yuba yenɛel mary
tugiḍ ad terreḍ aḍar
wukud i tṛuḥeḍ
amek i tettiliḍ a si aḥmed
ad ddmeɣ aqcic-nni
nugad yewɛar lbaṭel
armi d akeffadu
ansa i d-kkan akka irebraben-agi inselmen
ayen igerzen imi tefka-yas azal-is i teqbaylit tanaṣlit
nesnulfuy-d ifarisen akked tsertit akken ad neḥrez internet i yimdanen mačči i yidrimen
nadi fell-as
tilawin n tudrin-nniḍen slant s waya
err akin s at buwaddu
saɛid cemmax
s udlis ar d-yeqqimen tameddit i win-nsen s ufella s wadda
anabaḍ aqbayli uɛḍil
akken ad s-yessenqes lḥif
aqel-aɣ mɛa lweqt
dima yettara-yas-d akken i tebɣa
ixeddem tmanya n sswayeɛ deg wass
acimi akka ur d-testeqsaḍ ara
ikad d akken keččini ad tesnulfuḍ aman yeḥman
akken qqaren
ur as-tenniḍ ara
ula i wakken ad temmeslayeḍ
iṭurrec uberhuc-iw makken iwala aksum deg ufus-iw
ayen yellan ad as-tesseḍlun ɣef uɛrur-is
yetɛedda ɣef lḥerma-s
d tin yurzen ɣer yidrimen
cfu kan ɣef wayen i ak-iwessa baba-k
acḥal i temyagarem di lqedd
sɛeddi-t deg uɣerbal imceṛceṛ
iḥemmel tuɣac n lani rabah
ferḥemt-iyi a tullas
d acu kan tamsalt i ibeddlen deg-s
ay abrid ttun medden yemɣi-d leḥcic di later-ik
a tin yeḍran yid-s
d ilem ucabcaq
cɛel taftilt
anita i d taɣect n tayri i tḥemmleḍ
fkiɣ-am awal-iw ar ḥaca aḥraz ara kem-ḥerzeɣ
yekker i wedrar s tqabact
d tamerbuḥt teqcict-nwen
ilaq ad steɛfuɣ kra
ad awint cwiṭ yid-sent
acuɣer ur tḥemmlemt ara iqjan
yuɣ-d yidir takerrust ɣlayet
iteddu yettemderkal yewwet-itt-id almi ur yeɛqil abrid
d asreɛreɛ kan
yefka-as wayeḍ
ad tili lḥaǧa i ten-yexḍan
acuɣeṛ i tettruḍ
tesɛiḍ lḥeq
Ɣef wacḥal ssaɛa i ttetteḍ imensi
d acu i tesɛiḍ deg uqerru
bɣiɣ ad ḥewwseɣ yid-wen
sizdeget iceṭṭiḍen-nken
inaẓiyen mḥan isem-is deg idlisen umezruy
ur yexdim ara tom ayen iɣef ittuḥasef
ikad-d d ayen ukud nennum
illu iburek-iten
lebni d tazeqqa mačči d ttnefxa
lehduṛ-is d lmizan
aswir-nsen yetteglilliz
ad yečč ad iẓẓiẓen
Ẓriɣ-kem-id
ahat ad tafeḍ wayeḍ xir-iw
ilaq-iyi atrejman
kemmini tcebḥeḍ nekk aseḍsu-w irab
Ɛiwed-as i ddunit asnulfu
win uɣeɣ d ṭṭlam
yuɣ annect ittaɣ ṭṭbel di tmeɣra
ansi i s-tekkiḍ ad k-d-yekk
cudden-as taɣesmaṛt
yir ccɣel ula iwumi yif-it iɣimi
yella kra i teččam
Ṭṭfeɣ aɣṛum deg ufus-iw
ḥemmleɣ-kem a tuzyint
aqbayli ur d-nuki ara
tzemrem ad twalim tamacahutt-agi
tagi d tamacahutt umi semmaɣ tislit n udfel
asif
ciṭ n zzit n uzemmur
deffir uxxam
aɛeqqa n yirden
a wid yeɣṛan sizdegt taswaɛt
acḥal n temsirin n tɣuṛi i tesɛiḍ ass n letnayen
acuɣeṛ i tebɣam ad tṛuḥem ass-a
acuɣeṛ ulac win i yi-ittamnen
ad ceyyɛeɣ tafakturt-nni s lfaks
am ilmeẓyen ark ḥemlaɣ tameṭṭut i-y-iɣelben s setta iseggasen
ffɣeɣ d ɛemmi iḍelli
wagi d amcum uqbiḥ
iṛuḥ baba iwwi-d tamuli
neɣ di tunes yakk d titunsiyin
tasdawit muḥend bugerra
i yeɣunzan tiktiwin n tidderwect
izeddamen-a zemreɣ ad ak-d-iniɣ ggten
ayɣer ad ineɣ nabil iman-is
ulac anda ara tt-ɣreɣ
ssneɣ abriḍ
tessers-d aḍar-is ɣef yirebbi-w
suref-iyi ma sneqmaseɣ-k
ur cfin ara fell-aɣ
teččam tibidas-nwen
uɣalem ar deffir
a tazmalt ad teɛdel abaryir ad jemɛen lɣaci
anida i llan yiɛzizen n rruḥ
kker fell-am a tamurt
sellket-t
d argaz yelsan llebsa icebḥen
yiwen n wass ad n-uɣalen
ur d-ufint ara tom
sfaqent-tt-id
yeččur wul-is
ur tufiḍ d acu i t-yuɣen
ad s-tiniḍ d iwtal i yegnen deg usu-nni-inek
teṭṭsemt
Ḥemmel anarag-ik
tamacahut n slilwan deg yiɣzer n qirwan i yecna uleḥlu
yuba d baba-k
skuṭṭef
bɣiɣ ad ṭṭseɣ
rrant-aɣ-ten-id
iruḥ ad d-yawi lexber
tessirideḍ lbaṭaṭa
ad as-t-id-tawimt
da i tetteɣ dima
melmi ad k-iẓeṛ
ur ttḥettimen ara ɣef tarwa-nsen ayen ur bɣin ara
tessili aserwal-is teffer deg uččadur-is
amek i teẓriḍ anect-a
ad as-t-tefkeḍ
acḥal n wussan n usteɛfu i tesɛiḍ
a ssiεqa
akken yebɣu yili weɣbel yesɛa dima tifrat
agdud ittun ansi d-ikka amzun immut
aɣrum
akal yeffud
aɣbalu n tudert
acḥal ara ṭṭfen wussan n usteɛfu-m
acuɣeṛ d nekki
ad xaqeɣ mliḥ fell-asen
acu i k-yuɣen a jeddi
acuɣeṛ ur tteffɣen ara warrac-nni
yuɣ-d ddwa n yiɣerdayen
teffeɣ targit-iw
iɛǧeb-ak lḥal
Ɛni ulac d acu ara ad txedmemt tura
anda ara k-id-afeɣ umbeɛd
ur bɣiɣ ara ad snuɣniɣ yidir
aru ayen akk ara d-iɛeddin deg wallaɣ-ik
yebda yettkil uyefki-a ɣas ur t-id-sewway ara
Ɛni tom ixeddem ɣur-k
ur d-sawalent ara
yurew-d yimi-w aman
seqqi-as-d i yemma-m ad tečč
anti i k-d-yeɣṛan
mačči d rray i xuṣṣeɣ
xdmemt-as akken i kent-yexdem
aṭas i ruɣ fell-asen
igerrez-ak-d tazibba
tḥeṛcemt kennemti
lḥila n ṣṣber teččur
uɣeɣ-d takerrust iḍelli
ah lukan ad teẓreḍ
tessneḍ ad tṛebbiḍ llufanat
ad n-sawalen
ass-a teḥǧeb tziri
amek ara qableɣ
ad k-ceɛleɣ tafat
sliman yettɛawan atmaten-is
seksu s uyaziḍ di yennayer
tikti-nni izedɣen allaɣ-is yiwen ur yezmir ad as-tt-yesfeḍ
tettarram-tent deg uɛewwiq
yedda-yak di nneqma
ula d kečč ur tezmireḍ ara ad d-terreḍ
dubeɣ fell-am
ma ur nelli d aɛraben ayɣer aɛerreb n tmazɣa
ttekksent-d akermus
brut-as i wawal-iw
walaɣ-t mi i yuɣ abrid-is
s yixef-iw ar kem-ḥemleɣ
Ḥemmlent ad urarent
ad heḍṛen s teqbaylit
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat-is
tiddukla n yimeddukal n twennaṭ
nehbel ɣef teqbaylit
ad nehḍeṛ s teqbaylit
tutlayt-nneɣ d taqbaylit
serreḥ i ugdud-iw ad iṛuḥ akken ad yi-iɛbed
tinna nnan-d tleḥḥu d yiwen uḍebbal
gezmeɣ amrar-nni
dɣa tenna-as yirbeḥ
init-iyi-d tidet
terẓeg ma tezwar s imi tamment i wumi
nga-yas dqiqa n tsusmi
lameɛna yasuɛ iẓra dɣa yettaxxeṛ syenna
zgiɣ qqareɣ-as tamelɣiɣt-ik teččur
i wugar n yisallen siwlet ɣer wuṭṭun-a
tanezzayt llan-d yikayaden n umezruy d tussna i wid yesɛan aswir n tesnawit
tesmar-itt ɣef uqerru n yasuɛ i yeqqimen ɣer ṭṭabla
aman yeḥman ttmirin ɣef tfekka-s
akka ara tiniḍ i wat isṛayil
tiṭ-is d aɛeqqa n uzemmur yewwan laɛyun-is d lxiḍ n uzegza yeɣman
hedreɣ yakan d unelmad-a
yebda yuba ameslay
ta d tarzeft-nwen
tafsut n yimaziɣen
ad mmten meṛṛa medden
ad imeččeḥ umcic afus-iw mi as-sselfeɣ
amalu
ad ak-iniɣ ɣas seḥseb i tezmert n wallaɣ-is
ad iyi-tɛemdeḍ ad nseɣ yid-k iḍ-a
acḥal i tzemreḍ ad txellṣeḍ ɣef waya
ad sweɣ yis lqahwa
ad ɛebbleɣ yiwen n uɛebbel ad siyyeqeɣ akk axxam
afud igerrzen
acuɣer ur tṛuḥeḍ ara ad teẓreḍ tamsulta
ad iliɣ azekka deg uxxam
ad ak-d-ceyyɛeɣ tafakturt-nni
ad d-tafeḍ kra n tɣawsa ara m-d-iɛeǧben
ad neldi ṭṭaq
ahya a tamakurt
afet-d ihi amek ara temsefhamem
imru i iǧehden ɣef usekkin
ini-asen kan xaṭi
ruḥ tura
yidir icemmer i yiɣallen-is
yeffeɣ yidir ɣer tejmaɛt
d aserwet kan
aserdas imekken abeckiḍ-is s argaz-nni
Ɛeddi ad tessirdeḍ leḥwal
tufam-as-d ssebba
ddan deg yir tikli tissit asebsi akked lxalat
ur ttkeyyifeɣ ara
Ṣber cwiṭ qrib ad d-taweḍ nnuba-k
acimi i tugim ad ken-nɛiwen
tameddit i qqaren lɛeslama
tugi-tent lmut
yewwi-as-d leḥmu i wul-is
asirem-nni yeddem waḍu gar-aneɣ
Ẓẓareɣ iyi-ilaqen ala lmut
kkiɣ adekaṛ i iɛezzugen
d wid yumsen i yessumsen aman n usired
ur ẓriɣ ara a massa
yeẓẓar-itt d tameṭṭut
Ɣas d izem ay telliḍ
ih sya ar da
d wa i d ccɣel-nsen agejdan
anwa acennay ara yewwten tameddit-a
bɣan akk ad tbeddel mebla ma beddlen nutni
d ayen i kun-yesslexsen i ɣ-yesseḥlulin
yettban yidir yezɛef
melmi ara yečč imensi
teddun deg temdint
ffkan lebɣi i rray-nsen
baba daɣen yettawi-d abelluḍ yeggar-it ar yirij akken ad yezzu
iruḥ ur d-ittuɣal
ilaq ad tedduḍ yid-i
amek i zemreɣ ad t-id-sfehmeɣ
ilaq ad tesserseḍ aqerruy-ik
tenna deg wul-is acḥal ur mmeslayeɣ ɣef tlufa am tigi
ula d tiktiwin i d-yefka neɣ axemmem-is
nutni uɣen tanumi ẓẓaren kan inelmaden n tesnawit
tesɛam ayen yeḥeman i tissit
yerra srid ɣer lqahwa
ur tteg ara aɣilif fell-i
melmi ara yezweǧ yidir
ladɣa mi ara teqqim iman-is
d yemm-as i as-d-yessawlen
d acu xedmeɣ
Ḥess-d akken iwata
sliman u muḥ yebda yeggaz tiziri tagawawt
d tidet ur telliḍ ara d abujad
amek ara Ɛelmen
dacu ar ad nernu i waya
mi ara d-yeffeɣ yiṭij ad ten-tafeḍ akk deg berra s umren
jemεen yiwen ugujil
teldiḍ-d ul-iw
tizi tettak-it i tayeḍ
ur turji yiwen
arrac tturaren s uselkim
mi ara tili tmeɣra neɣ tceqquft n umezgun deg uxxam n yidles
Ččiɣ armi qefleɣ
ifuk yiḍ i d-yewwin tabɣest
azul a yaḥbib-iw
tisekkadin-a inem
anwi i wen-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi
ur lummeɣ yiwen
ur ttrut ara fell-as
waqila txuṣṣem deg leɛqel
ur uɣaleɣ ara deg wawal
Ɛni ṛṛẓiɣ-akent iqeṛṛa-nkent
iferru tilufa n medden yettu iman-is
ayɣer i tesxeṛbeḍ tibḥirt-nsent
ihi ur ttṛuẓumt ara akk iqeṛṛa-nkent sya d afella
yuker-am
yelha leḥder
rran s asif
yettak afus
tettaggadeḍ iqjan
Ḥemmlen llebsa n yeqbayliyen
ma drus kraḍ n wungalen i yura
wid yezgel laṣel
seksu s useqqi azeggaɣ
teḥṛec yelli-m deg uɣerbaz
yewwet-is almi ur ittwali tigert
Ɛni d kečč ara ydebbṛen fell-asent
Ɣef umi i la theddṛeḍ akka
uɣent-tent msakit deg allaɣ
Ḥemmlent aqellal n tmurt n yeqbayliyen
wali kan ma tejba-d
iḍher-d waggur
yir aɣyul ur t-ttdeqqim
tebrez-d taxxamt-is
siweḍ-iyi deg umeslay
a-t-an gar tawwent d ufḍis
seg wasmi yeffeɣ tamurt ur d-yuɣal
ula d sima tewweḍ ɣer uxxam
laman i as-d-tettak tektubt neɣ win tettaf deg tezlatin
tanemmirt d aya kan i deg-s
Ḥemmleɣ-tent
saɛid u muḥ yenɣa tiziri tagawawt
ddu yiwet yiwet kan
ad neṭṭef kan deg usirem
ay ansi i d-iṣuḍ waḍu ad ḍelqeɣ di tafriwin
lsiɣ taqendurt d tacebḥant
Ɣas akken d tirga
Ɛyiɣ seg tira
ur d-ttasen ara
anwa i yessnen ad isekles taɣect-ines
saɛid u muḥ yesseww-d imensi
ma yella tuḥwaǧeḍ kra aru-yi-d
win yebɣan kan ad ihder fell-i
ar umbaɛed
tettamnemt-tt
muqqel iman-ik
textaṛ-ikem
yenɣa-yas-tent

aḍris-nni yelha
tɣunfa-kem

deg tmurt i tzewǧeḍ
icɣeb-iken kra
Ḥulfaɣ akka
Ɛni la ttrunt
siwlemt-asent
sseṛɣen-am-tent
ur iyi-ḥemmlent ara
ad tent-tamnem
da i tettidireḍ
yuba d uḥdiq
tesṛuḥemt-tent
ad ɣ-tt-id-yawi
s tezmert-nkunt
qqimemt lwaḥid
ad ten-tesseɣliḍ
yemmut stephen
sseṛɣen-ak-tent
a tamurt-iw a tamurt-iw iwumi sriɣ i tezmert-iw
ad k-d-ssekneɣ taddart-nni
ad as-nsawel i michel
acḥal n yismawen i yellan ɣef unnuɣ
ad teṭṭfeḍ tamacint

acḥal iyi-tettalasem

astilu i ṭṭfeɣ akka tura mačči d ayla-k
yeɣra ayen i as-d-tura sima
ad d-aseɣ ad kem-awiɣ ɣef sebɛa
ay ilmeẓyen-nneɣ ibaḥanen imeɣnasen n teqbaylit
yewwi-d lhem s axxam
atan tamdint-a ad tent-taɣ seg lexṣas n waman ala ma ur iεeṭṭel ara iwet-d ugeffur
yeḥṣel uxlul di lɣiḍa
anwa i ak-t-id-yuɣen
iluɛa-yas i tom
ur ddirent ur mmutent
ad s-tiniḍ d tawriqt tacebḥant i tserḥed ɣer lqaɛa neɣ am taduṭ mellulen
ad tifsus fell-aɣ tudert
akken meqqar ad nekkes ɣef wul-nneɣ
imddukal yellan dima ur ttemfaraqen ara
anda uɣen tanumi ttɣiman seg wasmi llan d imeẓẓyanen
azrem iteddu ɣef uɛebbuḍ
texdem ccɣel-is
yiwen ur yebɣi ad ibeddel
imeεcuqen iḥemmlen akken ilaq ur ttarun ara lehna-nsen
yella waya
tecεel tmes di leswam n tkeryas
kerheɣ idrimen
ttarguɣ ihi lliɣ
zeɛfeɣ aṭas
ifermec akk
yekkat wul-is
ula d setti tessen ad tseddu windows
ihedder kan cwiṭ
d acu i turamt
mazal ur tefhimem ara taluft-nni
xdmemt-asent akken i kent-xedment
d acu i t-in-yeṭṭfen din
d aseggas n tumert
teddun-ak di nneqma
ur ttɣawaleɣ ara di tenhert
wissen acimi ur d-tusi
icennu akken i ilaq
ad ɛerḍeɣ ad d-sfehmeɣ d acu i d-nniɣ
yeččur d ṭṭlaba
yugi ad d-yas
ssiɣ times
sseknem-d d acu i teswam
Ɣrant tlawin n iqemmuden
ad wen-ceɛleɣ tafat
ur iḥar ara
ferḥeɣ mi ad waliɣ tom
itett kan lbaṭaṭa di zzit
ur d-yusi ur d-iceyyeɛ
seg ansi i k-d-kan idrimen-nni
wezzilet tudert
wa yeṛwa wa yelluẓ
aman n yilel merriɣit
ttakren agdud
yuker aḍar
ur kem-iɣaḍ ara
itett ayen i d-isass
nemla-as-d abrid yelhan
d acu i y-icqan nekkini
anta i d-yellan d amezwarut d tayaziḍt neɣ d tamellalt
yuzen-as tabrat n tayri
wa yettaǧǧew wa yessaǧǧaw
kan akka yebda uqjun-nni yeshewhiw
diri-t wamek i tetturaremt
amek i yuɣalen warraw-im
wali kan ma jban-d
zemren ad xedmen weḥd-nsen
aẓ akin tettfuḥuḍ
kennemti tḥeṛcemt
fell-ak i la yetzuxxu akka
ur fhimeɣ iqiḥ
ad wen-senseɣ tafat
ddmemt ah
tettlusumt tisekkadin
iban ɣef udem-im
acḥal i tettlusumt
tisekkadin-a inek
tḍemɛeḍ kra seg-sent
dayen tbeɛɛdemt i tlufa
tezwar teqbaylit-ik
tettban tuzert ɣef udem-ik
dhu kan d yiman-im
anda i llan warraw-ik
kenwi tḥeṛcem
fell-am i la yetzuxxu akka
ur ttɣimit ara yid-sent
anta i kent-yewwten
ad t-tawi yid-s
meɛna uɣal-d ttxil-m
ur ttɣimi ara yid-s
fell-as i turam asefru-nni
ur ttmeslayemt ara yid-s
anwi i kent-yeslemden aya
walit kan ma yejba-d
teznuzayem ayefki
anda akka i rran
teǧǧam-asen-d tarda leḥwal
gǧan-am-d tarda leḥwal
irem ila anamek umqit anagar deg taɣult ideg yettuseqdac
xebcet udmawen-nwen tura a leqbayel kelxen-ken am akken kelxen imezwura-nwen
a win izeglen ddunit
ad as-nṣeggem asefru
a tayri mi kem-id-bedreɣ
iṣubb ar bgayet
tḍeṛgem tala
ur nefhim tigert
akka i ḥṣant
amek ara t-afen
ad s-tefk i lweṛd lfuḍa-s
ad ittufelleq
a yir ddunit a yir tudert
a tayri amek iga wudem-im
ad d-ibeggen ṣṣifa-s
yelli-s n nna tasaɛdit tugem-d tabuqalt n waman
yeqqerṣ ṭṭbel-nsent
anda akka i ffɣen
amcic yesmiɛuy
Ḥbiles yeznuzuy ssardin di tɣaltin n wat yeččir
a wid yettrebbin lexwan
akka i d-tenniḍ
ad ten-id-ẓemḍeɣ ɣer tasa-w
lemmer mačči d kečč
a dda Ɛacur
yuker-iyi tikti-w
tesluɣeḍ tala
ad d-yaki sseεd-iw yeṭṭṣen
ad nfek i umɣiḍ amḍiq ger-aneɣ
akka i nwan
a win iwumi ḥkiɣad yesmaɛreq
ad ak-ḍelbeɣ yiwet n lḥaǧa
kerfen ifassen-is
ad nelḥut deg yiwen ubrid
ur isetḥa ara Ɛli s uferḍas-is
ad as-tekkseḍ ameẓẓuɣ
aṭas n yilmeẓyen i yečča lebḥer
awal-is ḥusseɣ-as s telqey yeɣza deg ul-iw
amek i tellam
iḥemmel ad yurar
Ḥemmlen ad ceḍḥen
taddart at menṣur xmesṭac n alef u rebɛa tizi uzzu
allaɣ-iw tceɣb-it tinigt allen-iw cewḍent bɣant ad walint ddunit
izem ireɛɛed
yiwen tuzzel tεebbuḍt-is ur tt-yeqḍiε ara
d acu i tt-yewwin ad d-tenṭeq
znuzayent ayefki
ad as-yizmir wakal-iw
ad ten-yessenger wakali
ur tefhimeḍ tigert
a wid i tetten deg uksum-nsen
ad tiliḍ d berzidan
ad surfen imeṭṭawen-iw
acḥal i hedreɣ fell-am
awwah mači akken
nuker-as tikti-s
tefkiḍ-as abadaṛ
aɣyul ittzeqiṛen d tisegelt kan i as-ilaqen
yeḥmmel ad d-isḍes imeddukal-is s temseḍsa i asen-d-yettmal
anda ara ten-afeɣ
ad teẓreḍ irgazen a taɣaṭ
amek i s-cfant
akka i teslamt
amek ara s-cfunt
teǧǧiḍ-iyi-d tarda leḥwal
a lǧaṛ-iw issin amkan
a tanṭelt ihin i ɣ-yettraǧun
a wid yeserkan ula d ixulaf
yuker-ak tikti-k
ttif rray uzzal
ttkemmilen deg usedrem n tmurt leǧwameε ṭuqten luzinat ulac
gǧan-awen-d tarda leḥwal
taftilt-a d zarellu
sarameɣ kan ur yi-d-ttmuqqul ara s yir tiṭ
amek i t-steqsan
ad idum i win yellan uqbel-is
aten-an ulin-d seg temdinin ttnadin tizemrin-nsen
llant tɣawsiwin i yifen idrimen
cceh deg-neɣ
ilaq ad aɣ-d-tinim tidet
jgugel deg umrar-nni
gezmen-as aɛebbuḍ-is makken i d-turew
aniwa učči i tḥemmleḍ
rriɣ-d azal n wakal-nni
melmi i d-truḥeḍ
aṭas i iɣilen ad aɣen rebbi s luḍu
bɣiɣ ad mmteɣ
anfet-as ad yexdem ayen n diri
d aselmad n tmaziɣt di tesnawit
ddunit ara d-neǧǧ i warraw-nneɣ ur tessefraḥ
ibna i yiman-is axxam amaynut
kkatent afus
annaɣ a Ṛebbi d acu ay ak-giɣ
ldi allen-ik ad twaliḍ
heddreɣ tagrigit taqburt
bezgen iḍaṛṛen-is ur yezmir ara ad ilḥu
azul fell-awen i sin
err-as awal
imir-nni kan i d-tuli ar tkarrust
d taxeddamt d wawal
ansa ara d-yas mmi-s
awal mačči d kra axeddim ulac
aqcic-a iḥemmel-ikem meskin
ma tfehmeḍ ssefhem win ur nefhim ara
bɣiɣ ad ẓṛeɣ anwa i d-isawlen
llan tessen aman
llan yimdanen yettamnen s tudert deffir tmettant
d aqeṣṣer i tettqeṣṣireḍ
iraɛ tom
Ḍebbeṛ i uqeṛṛuy-ik amek ara tawḍeḍ
jgugelet
i ma ur d-yusi ara
d awaziw i lliɣ
d imezwura i aɣ-tt-id yeǧǧan gar-asen jean de la fontaine
melmi ara s-tekkreḍ i ccɣel
ddiwana tazzayrit
ad yetteqliliḥ tekker deg-s
tarwa-s ddan d irbiben
Ǧǧet kan ifassen-nwen deg leǧyub
ad xemeɣ
acku ukiɣ-d deg yiwet n taluft ur walaɣ zik
ad tt-tesnerni
melmi i d-truḥemt
ddu rrif rrif ad tafeḍ ddeqs n iṣeyyaden n calba akka lawan agi seččayen s yiwen n yimɣi n yilel i wumi qqaṛen tubrest
dehbiya lḥusin tuɣal-d si tḥanut dɣa busaɛd uṛemḍan yegzem-as-d abrid yenna-yas Ɣas mazal smana i zwaǧ-nneɣ meɛna seg ass-a ara nemyeḥmal
izmawen d iɣeṛsiwen ihuskayen
tenna-as i sliman amek ara nexdem tura acu ara yiniɣ i yimawlan-iw aɛebbuḍ -iw simer ibezzeg
awren d awren tiyita deg ifassen
melmi ara ruḥent
nutni ad zeglen tamacint
ad kem-rreɣ d tagellidt ad teččeḍ ad tesweḍ
addag yerra-d tili ɣef uɣrab
tuggad ad as-tini yemma-s anida yella uγerbal
sliman u muḥ yebḍa d tiziri tagawawt
ur as-tefki ara i maziɣ fasebbuk-is alammi tettkel
Ɣef yixxamen
deg wacu i tebɣiḍ akem-nɛiwen
tezgel-iyi taluft
Ɛeṛḍeɣ-ten s axxam-iw
Ɣur-wat tayri d taderɣalt
tufa-ten ttɛassan ad yelḥeq uselmad-nsen
ifhem-ik-id tom tura
aql-aɣ nettṛaǧu-k a gma-tneɣ
ur tesɛiḍ d acu ara d-nini ɣef tid yeṭṭef uxxam
kečč selḥu
d acu ara xedmen deg wussan n usteɛfu-nsen
ruḥ di laman
wid i tent-iẓaren akken llant

ur ttagaden ara adfel
ittabaɛ unefray urar akken iwata

ass kamel d nutni d aɣemmez
tasekla d azekka n uɣlan
d kunwi i d imasayen n yiɣeblan-nwen
ayen sneɣ xedmeɣ-t
tebɣa mi ara tfak asɣray
yerna ur d-griɣ ara deg uqerruy-iw anda newweḍ
ikellex-as
anwa i kem-yifen a tizizwit
amek i yezmer wannect-a ad yawi s leḥzen
wissen d acu ara d-yini
acu-t wa
ay axessar-iw d acu akka i d-yettnulfun
zemreɣ ad ẓreɣ ayen i d-tsutreḍ
ur tetter ara
mi d-teffeɣ seg ulmessi
takerrust d yidrimen

ur smuslub ara

anwa i yenɣan sliman u muḥ

sliman u muḥ yebda iheddeṛ
ax-n afus-iw
amek akken i d ixf-is
Ɣas akken ur telluẓ ara mliḥ acku ur tt-yeǧǧi wallaɣ-is ad txemmem ɣef wučči
ladɣa tin akk itent-yifen
maziɣ ur yeɛlim s wayen yeḍran
acimi ur asen-tettarraḍ ara awal
ma msakit ur sɛint ara zzher
tebɣa alukan ur ttfakan ara lehdur n maziɣ
ur teḥmil ara tamdint
Ɣer dagi i d-tusiḍ
ayen akk tessaram tufa-t ɣur-s
ad d-yeqqel seg madrid
acku tella tḥerci deg-s
Ɣas ad sxedmeɣ timqestin-inek
yemmut d aɣrib
sima tettqerrib kra kra
ladɣa wid i tt-yeẓẓaren kan i wussu
cwiṭ-nni i yehder d sima
amek ara lemdeɣ tasluvakt
maca d maziɣ
Ḥsen u muḥ yuɣ-it-id ɣer tiziri tagawawt
aṭas mi ara jerbent akk aya
lmelḥ d sskeṛ
s yes i dduriɣ deg ideflawen
faḍila becaṛ isuƔan d yiḤulfan
deg-sen i yečča
tuget seg-neɣ nella d imeɣnasen n yidles d tugdud
taɣtast-a ur d-gri
yiwen n wass tega tamsirt ɣef tmerna n imagraden deg wikipedia yerna s teqbaylit
d nnuba-s terza-d ɣer temlilit taseklant n at wasif mi tt-id-yenced Ǧamal laseb akked seddik iɛeẓẓugen akken ad d-tawi awal ɣef wungal-is

cukkeɣ tikkelt-nniḍen ad nuɣal kan ɣer teḥbulin ammer i iḍerrun d yiḍudan n yinebgawen-nneɣ
am win ṭṭfent temlella imdel allen-is acemma
tamedyazt tamensayt yettwasnen di taliyin timensayin teqqen ɣer timawit
ad tmerreɣ deg usu
ass-a d tameɣra nufa zzin ɣlayen
icubaa-yas Ṛebbi  amzun d taruṣruyt ideg ileḥḥu ur ihedder d yiwen
rewlen anda ara afen aman
tattut d aṭṭan n yiɣerfan
ur ḥnuccḍeɣ ara makken yekkat ugris
d tamuɣli n tiṭ yettnadin tifrat
am ass-a ma ɣezzif leɛmeṛ
ma drus ayen yeḍṛan yid-neɣ iseggasen yezrin
d wa i d asteqsi-nwen aneggaru
mlaleɣ-d yiwet n teqcict tamecṭuḥt
Ɛerqent-asent
ayɣer ur tḥemmleḍ ara ad teṛṛẓeḍ aqeṛṛu-yim
yenna meɛtub lwennas "ad ttarguɣ awanek aqbayli"
ur ken-kkateɣ ara
ur k-tɣaḍ ara
acimi ur d-tefkiḍ ara afus
tceggeb-ik taluft-nni
tettaruḍ s teqbaylit
i nekni i wumi txedmeḍ akk annect-a
tesṭuqqet-d aḍar
tid ur nečči ara seksu-yagi d timeɣbunin

ur d-tsawalem ara
aẓ akkin
Ɛni d kenwi ara ydebbṛen fell-i

ittcekkiṛ Ṛebbi ɣef wayen i as-d-ittakk

aqli uɣeɣ-d iḍebsiyen n yizlan imaynuten
tella akken tebɣa
a-t-an d temddakelt-is
ikcem-as uvirus deg uselkim
wezzil ussan deg tegrest
d abelluḍ i isellken lejdud-nneɣ
d netta kan i izemren ad tt-yefrun
bezgen iceṭṭiḍen umeksa i d-iruḥen i lehwa
yekkat uqmayli ad yeɣḍel ayetma-s
telliḍ weḥd-m deg teswiεt-nni neɣ
tzemreḍ ad yi-d-temmeslayeḍ cweyya ɣef yiman-ik
gen di talwit a gma harfi muqran d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ttḥadar d acu tettetteḍ
yenna-yi-d teskiddibeḍ

ad teḥyu tjaddit
srid seg roma
ad yifsus wul-iw i iɛebban aṭas n ccek
aɛebbuḍ d akal kan ara t-yeččaren
aɣyul axir n kra n yemdanen
aḥmam yersen di lxaṭer-iw
mazal tettaẓ ar zdat teqbaylit-nneɣ

yeɣli-d yiḍ

ssken-aɣ-d taxxamt
akka ihi ilaq ad ruḥeɣ
gen di talwit a gma mukdaden Ǧamal d awezɣi ad k-nettu
iεǧeb-iyi wamek i tgiḍ akken i ucekkuḥ-im
yerja-yi-d usikel ameqqran
Ẓriɣ d acu yeḍran
ala tament i deg imi-s
s tayri i nheddeṛ taqbaylit
theblem deg sin
talwit d taẓuri
Ḥettmen fell-i ad ruḥeɣ ɣer din
srid seg paris
ad d-nini neɣ ad nessusem
ttidiren s teqbaylit
qqim yid-i
yekra axxam
yuker-as tikti-s
ttwalin-itt-id s yir tiṭ
ad nḥewwes ar Ṭelyan
afud-is d tutlayt taqbaylit
ur ẓriɣ ara d acu i tent-yuɣen
d acu i t-yuɣen
neẓḍa-d azemmur si tessirt n Ɛmer umuḥ newwi-d sebɛa u ɛecrin lkilan
ad s-nsiwel i uberrani
azlem ay iḍaṛṛen-iw
tettcemmiṛeḍ iɣallen-ik
ur bɣiɣ la aksum la iselman
wissen ma tzemrem ad iyi-temlem abrid yettawin ɣer teɣsert
yettqellib-iyi
ad nekker yid-s ad nennaɣ
ad uɣalen am yizerman uqelmun
a win isxedmen aqeṛṛu
tcemmṛemt iɣallen-nkent
nekkat ɣef teqbaylit
nnan-d iruḥ
ad telmed tutlayt taqbaylit
fkan-am abadaṛ
yeswa aman isemmaḍen
tilelli n umeslay tettwagdel di tmurt n lezzayer
cennuɣ s tutlayt taqbylit
nekk d tallit n tura ur ɛdileɣ ara
d acu i k-yerran d gma a mmi-s n takna n yemma
a tin iwumi d-zzin lenwaṛ
cbaḥa n tefsut trennu sser i yelmeẓyen ttifsusen wulawen-nsen
s teqbaylit i tettwaṛebba
itbir yeshurruy
fkan-asent abadaṛ
dayen berka-aɣ tmesxir
adfel yessaɣ deg idurar akked luḍa
d tahuskay s tidet
ad tesseɛuẓẓgeḍ acimi
teḥbes lehḍuṛ
wwet azrem s aqerruy ad ferẓent temsal
dayen barka
tira n usefru d asenfali n yiḥulfan
masin d weṛdiya rewlen si taddart
mi ara theddrem ur teffẓet ara imeslayen
d asnerni n teqbaylit i tebɣiḍ
yiwen n wass tikerrusin merra ad fsint
ur tettu ara lehdur n baba-k
nettcemmiṛ iɣallen-nneɣ
ad turar yid-sent
amek i tḥulfaḍ i waya
ssgezlemt
amuli ameggaz
wali waki
smeḥfer
iyya-d ad neɛreḍ kra
Ṭiziri tusem
isem-iw jack
ssufɣen-tt d taḥṛamt
bɣiɣ ad d-fɣeɣ maɛna ulac ɣer wanida ulac d wanwa
mebṛuk
mel-iyi a tazmalt mel-iyi win iɛeddan fell-am
iɛeyyeḍ tim
ur nesɛi ara leḥsab unsib ɣef umḍan n leǧwamaɛ di tmurt n yiqbayliyen
ass-a d laṛebɛa
tettamnemt-tent
ixeddem dima akken yebɣa
weḥd-m gar rebɛa n leḥyiḍ
ssaɛid i yeɛzizen azrar deg lwizen
llant ḥmant mliḥ
imi deg ubrid-nsen teṭṭerḍeq ṛṛuḍa n tkeṛṛust-nsen dɣa teffeɣ-asen seg ufus imir-n i teneqqlab
deg tecraḍ tisuddimin d tmazzayin ad naf drus n umgired i yellan
beddeɣ-as i jeddi
win i d-yusan ad yekkes lxiq
ulac učči s tɣimit
ttcektin ussan-a wid ixedmen akaram i wakken ad d-awin tanezduɣt seg uεeṭṭel n uxeddim deg tnezduɣin-a
gguni da ttxil-k
Ɣer lǧiha n umalu isɛa meyya n iɣallen i d-iḥǧeb s temleḥfin
Ɣileɣ d gma-s
akal ad d-ifk lɣella-s ttejṛa n lexla ad d-tefk lfakya-s
ur εad nuyis
acuɣer ur t-tečči ara tmes
yelsa tacacit
tura ad t-nfakk
Ẓid lqut-is
tzemremt ad tɛummemt
ulac i t-yifen deg uglam n rrebrab d wayen akk i xedmen deg lezzayer deg yiseggasen n tesɛin
ad d-tṣebḥeḍ di tebḥirin
Ɛelmen meṛṛa
xeddmeɣ deg sbiṭar
nezzeh
ur ken-ttɛawaneɣ ara
tɣelṭeḍ di leḥsabik tɣileḍ mazal-iyi d nniya
ttu lehmum-ik
d anɣa
amek armi i tt-mazal da
twalaḍ ṭṭabla-inem
qqen ɣer tatoeba
tḥebsemt tom
d nnger-ik
tuɣ-iten d iṛemmasen
ad nuɣal ɣer tazwara
ad tent-nḥemmel assa azekka
a zzayer ncalleh ad teḥluḍ ad tuɣaleḍ am zik-nni
allal amezwaru n tiḥerci n weɣref d tutlayt-is
aah wi iṣurdiyen-iw
acḥal n tikkal i wwteɣ aserwal s tfawtin armi uɣaleɣ d taḍsa gar warrac
ad neṛṛez wala ad neknu
ad triḍ ad neddukel akken ad nḥewwes
afus-is deg ufus-inu imesli-s agemmaḍ-in d acu-t d acu-t
acuɣeṛ i tessiridem ifassen-nwen
agrud yella yettqewwit ibki s tbanant
aɣyul-iw ijaḥ
ad yi-terreḍ d azeggaɣ
ad nemsawal azekka neɣ seld azekka ɣef setta n tmeddit
acuɣeṛ i tebɣiḍ ad d-teffɣeḍ d afremli
aḍebsi n llubyan s temtunt yeḥman a yemma yemma
acangal yeṭṭef-d ilef
adfel tuɣ εlay
ad nedɛut
acuɣeṛ i tessusufemt
a lḥif-nwen ma d irgazen kenwi
acuɣeṛ i tebɣam ad d-teffɣem d ifremliyen
ama ɣef tayri neɣ ayen-nniḍen
ad ččeɣ tabanant d asegru
aḥezzeb uqbel aneggez
akken kan ara s-theḍreḍ ad iqqel wudem-is d azeggaɣ
ad temneε aglim-ik
acuɣeṛ ur ibɣi ara ad iffeɣ
akken tella tallit tilelli-nneɣ ad tt-id-nawi
ilaq isefra ad ten-id-yejmeɛ umdan yiwen yiwen
izdeɣ weḥd-s
Ɛmiṛuc u muḥ iɛess tiziri tagawawt
ttɛeggiḍen
ma tuḥwaǧeḍ kra
melmi ara teččemt imensi
mmutent
i tikkelt-nniḍen d acu yellan ma ulac aɣilif
ur zmireɣ ad aruɣ kra
ihuzz tom tuyat-is
ccix-nneɣ d aɛeggun armi d ulamek
turew tewtultturew tixsi
sanda nṛuḥ yid-neɣ yedda
itezzi ɣef tedyant n katia
ahbuh ur tessineḍ ula amek ad d-teẓẓgeḍ tixsi
d azamul-nneɣ n useḥbiber ɣef yizerfan n tudert
acuɣeṛ ur yebɣi ara tom ad yi-iẓeṛ
nekk lhiɣ kečč d yir amdan
azekka-nneɣ ur d as-nufi leqrar neɣ tawwurt ɣer-s yessufuɣen
d imeẓyanen d ibesṭuḥen d imecṭuḥen
afus yessen imi
ha-t-an nezzi-d akk i temsal ass-a 
ad tṛuḥemt ad yi-teǧǧemt
ččiɣ ṛwiɣ
d netta i yukren tayaziḍt n at belqasem
ad d-afeɣ amek
maca acḥal d tadyant n tmenɣiwt i d-yessekfel
ad dduɣ akken bɣiɣ
lliɣ yid-s imalas yezrin ur t-yuɣ wara
lamir ɛbelqader yuɣal baqi d amdakel n napoléon iii
buεendas d ɛin rrwa ta zdat ta yiwet d taqbaylit tayeḍ d taεrabt
d nekk i yerran tom ar wusu
f acḥal ssaɛa ara yebdu wurar
iseggasen yezrin
in-as d tissas i yessufuɣen ɣer layas d ṣṣbeṛ i d abrid n tissas
anwa i yeẓṛan
kerheɣ-ken yakk akken ma tellam
Ḥemmleɣ-kem a tarwiḥt
gma-s yella yeqbeḥ ɣer ɣur-i
amezruy n tsekla-nneɣ d aquḍar ma yella neqqar-as kan « tasekla-nneɣ d tamerkantit nekkni ur nettaru ur neqqar »
rret akkin
wwet ṭṭbel i win ara k-iceḍḥen
imɣaren n zik ḥemmlen tacacit n sṭambul
fehmeɣ amek ara fruɣ ugur-nni
Ččuren ikufan bennun d asawen
aql-iken d arrac ilemẓiyen
beddel tikli send ad tbeddel fell-ak teswiɛt
iɛedda zik wakud
ilaq ad tḥemmleḍ ayen i txeddmeḍ
ldit allen-nwen ad twalim
yewwet-it ubeḥri
iruḥ ad d-iεreḍ ittwaεreḍ
ɛni ur tessineḍ ara tafransist
tennad dɣa ur tettruḥu ara
atan wakud-ik la izerri
err tawwurt-nni sdeffir-k deg leεnaya-k
cukkeɣ tegla s wayen i d-yeǧǧa gma-s
iḥemmel adfel
la yettenfufud usɣaṛ
ur terbiḥ ara meskint
isɛa izerman di tɛebbuḍt-is
dayen ur heddeṛ ara
amek teẓẓgen tafunast
d aɣezfan d awfayan yecɣel dima
bezzaf rẓaget lqahwa-yi
ur ittaɣ ara awal
Ɣeṛ-iyi deg tilifun ma yella yeɣli-d ugeffur
igellil yettaɣ-it usemmiḍ
llan aṭas n wawalen ur fhimeɣ ara
iɛṛeḍ sami ad asen-d-isefhem i meṛṛa tamsalt
anwa i m-iselmaden tafṛansist
buqlen-aneɣ rẓan afan
acimi mačči akka
ur inuda fell-asen ur ten-yufi
mazal-it yidir deg wexxam
d ṣṣwab i d-yenna yidir
d acu-t ugrireb ma ulac aɣellet
ittbin-d d ilemẓi ur izmir ara ad yili akter-iw
tettarguḍ aṭas ay ameddakel
ur k-tteqneɣ
deg srir-is
ad sellken iqeṛṛa-nsen dinna
llan wid i izeddɣen deg uɛecciw
akken yettwacɣel tom i ttwaceɣleɣ
ur ttɛawaz ara
cedhaɣ udem n tayri
anda ara gnen warrac-nni
a-t-a aseggas aya i iga sami inig-a
Ǧǧem-iyi tṛankil
lgirra ur d-teǧǧi yiwen
Ḥeṣleɣ ula win ad yi-d-yessellken
ad tettru yal iḍ akken ad tqabel sbeḥ
yettaggad tili-s
ur d-tkeččmeḍ ara s axxam
iban shan ur ɣ-d-ɣṛin ara
ad neḍleb ad ɣ-trafqeḍ yid-neɣ ad tḥeḍred
yezmer d tamaziɣt i d tutlayt taqdimt akk deg ddunit
eǧǧ-iyi ad waliɣ umuɣ
ilaq ad teddumt yid-i
i yuɣen irgazen ur ttrun
d acu kan deg leɛmer inser-as-d wawal i s-yeḥka walebɛaḍ
maziɣ d massi ttimɣuren
ssneɣ ad ssewweɣ akken ilaq
tefkiḍ-aɣ abadaṛ
mi yečča aṭas yerra-tt ala i ugergeɛ
deg tegrest i nettandi i umergu
ur tturuḥun ara s axxam
yerna nniɣ-ak isem-iw sima
sliman u muḥ yeɛreḍ ad isellek tiziri tagawawt
yeɛya yesgunfa
akka i teḥṣam
aṭas n tutlayin i ineggren aṭas-nniḍen i d-ilulen
ayer sɛiɣ deg tfekka
ttxil-k siwel-as i yidir
yufeg fell-i yiḍes iḍ kamel
sima teɛreḍ maziɣ ɣer yimensi
axxam d axxam-ik d acu ass-a kan
tid yesdebdeben medden
qim di lehna
ur as-teǧǧiḍ acemma
lḥaṣun cerken kullec
ad tsellkem iqeṛṛa-nwen dinna
aẓ-d neɣ ad n-aẓeɣ
teɣramt di tmenqas
yeqqim yidir deg uxxam
Ččan tiyita
aḥlil ma yedda-tt akka
d iẓem yemmugen kan deg wexxam i yelhan
anta taqcict i ak-d-iɛeǧben
uɣen-d aɣrum
ur d-tsawalemt ara
ur k-kkateɣ ara
tuker-iten
mačči d asṭuqqet n wawal ara yessalin taqbaylit
bdu-d seg iri arma d wayeḍ ahat ad d-ibin kra
seg ansi i sen-d-kan idrimen-nni
yeggull deg-i
yufa-ten ttheggin iman-nsen ad ruḥen s amahil
tenna-d mazal ur tennudem ara
ibeddel sam yuɣal d amdan-nniḍen
d acu i nezmer ad t-nexdem deg yiḍ
tabrat i asen-d-tuzen ṭṭfen-tt
anda akka i d-yuɣ tom taqemǧet-a
teɛǧeb-as i muḥend
nettarra-ten deg uɛewwiq
mi ruḥeɣ ɣer wa ad iyi-d-yini ruḥ ɣer wadi
urǧin yeqqim yiwen n yimalas ur yuri ara i yemma-s
ad neṛṛeẓ wala ad neknu
yewwet-it waḍu
yewwet udfel deg tqacuct n udrar
a tamurt-iw anda-t umur-iw
tal tikkelt ara iɛeddi ad yečč yessirid ifassen-is
teddamt-as di nneqma
yettarra-tt kan i lekdubad
yebna ugḍiḍ lɛecc-is ɣef ufurek n yiwen n useklu
yerra-ken deg uɛewwiq
yelsa ssebbaḍ-is n waddal iruḥ ad yurar ddabax
yebɣa yidir ad isew latay
tamurt bnan-tt ɣef lekteb tamcict tuɣal d tasedda
ala tidet i d-qqareɣ
deg temssizzelt n tazzla tezga-d zehra d tamzwarut
fiḥel ma nenna-d
tesluɣemt tala
tettnadiḍ fell-i
usan-d ar ɣuṛ-i
ad bḍuɣ yid-s aɣilif
zik dagi i yezdeɣ
nek isem-iw minuc d amcic afeḥcuc yerna ḥemleɣ waɛuc
yebna-as axxam
aṭas i yečča lebḥer
wissen acimi akka
a wid iferẓen timsal
ttnadin fell-i
ad teẓrem ayen mazal
a dda Ḥemmu
gǧan-iyi-d tarda leḥwal
akka i teḥṣiḍ
ad cnuɣ ifennanen
ad ɣ-tekksem tamuɣli
ad qablen kulci
Ḥemmleɣ taqbaylit acku d tutlayt-iw tayemmat
a yemma amek i d am-teḍra
yufeg-ak uqermud
mi ara tawḍeḍ ɣer uxxam siwel-iyi-d
yeḥmmel ad yeqqim yid-s
a yemma εzizen ur ttru
xṛan tala
usant-d ar ɣuṛ-i
tafunast tesrugmut
tmerru tɛebbuḍt-iw
ur ttberriḥeɣ ara s wayen i xeddmeɣ
bniɣ-ak axxam
akka i teḥṣa
aṭas aya segmi i kem-teqreḥ tɛebbuḍt-im
yeqqes-it uzegḍuf
cerweɣ tidi meṛṛiɣet
tugi tmeṭṭut-is ad as-tefk ayen yebɣa
telsa takiluṭ-is
acḥal deg widak ḥebsen
tebra i wemzur-is yerwel
yiwet terẓa remḍan slan-as-d lǧiran
acuɣer d nukni
ad aɣ-d-iḥku amek teḍra
ur d-iɣelli ara ubexsis ar yimi
anda akka i terra
yeqqerṣ ṭṭbel-im
a tamurt-iw a dduḥ n temẓi-w
ufiɣ iman-iw
yezzenz taɣzut yuɣ aḥriq
iḥeqqa
ad d-inin ayen ur nelli
timẓin d uxeṛṛub wulment i ugmer ijebbden iɣuraf
ddan-iyi di nneqma
a yiṭij yekksen ṭṭlam
a ɣelbeɣ iɣeẓrawen
ad kfun lehmum dayen
tettqellibemt-iyi
ad ṣewwṛeɣ udem-im
sers iman-ik
aql-iyi akked weltma
ad nili
ur bɣiɣ ara mmi-s n tmeṭṭut ad yemmet deg ṭṭrad ur d-isasi
ad neqbeɣ deg ussan-iw
a wid ur nerbiḥ yiwen wass
anwa i t-iṛesmen
ad as-nekkes akal i d as-ɛebban
a ṣellaḥ n at dwala ḥarbet ɣef tegrawla
ad am-iliɣ d aεessas
cfiɣ ɣef ass-nni deg iyi-tenniḍ "Ḥemleɣ-k a meqran"
tmeččḥemt iḍebsiyen
acimi i d-luleɣ
iḥemmel ad icḍeḥ
tafyirt tbeddu dima s usekkil ameqqran tettfakka s wagaz
d ayen
temgarad ɣef gma-s
d acu kem-yuɣen
axxam d axxam-nneɣ iqjan la seglafen fell-aneɣ
ass-a ad teččem timegzert
iṣubb ar tizi
fell-as i nettkel
d lawan ad ikcem
argaz ur iḥekkem ara tameṭṭut
ad ten-id-yessufɣen
Ṭṭbel i bab-is
yuɣ-d aserwal meqqren fell-as dɣa yettqadar-it
mi ara theddreḍ tteffẓeḍ imeslayen
bɣiɣ ad kesbeɣ imelyaṛen
nudaɣ fell-awen ufiɣ-ken
ttawin-d isefra s teqbaylit
wissen anda i teddun warrac-aki
yerra srid s axxam n wat wulmu
ad am-kkseɣ ineẓman
d lawan ad tcemmṛeḍ iɣellen-im
tḥemmlemt ad tecnumt s teqbaylit
d allen n uɣerda i tesɛa
ad d-taɣem ayefki
yal mi ara tt-id-rreɣ ar ṛṛadyu d adellel
d taqbaylit i d idles-nneɣ
ad teffɣem seg uxxam
mmeslayen d teqcict
ad t-tawimt yid-kent
ur itettu ara uḍebbal ahuzzu n tuyat
yuɣal-iyi-d wul ɣer temẓi-w
gar-i yid-k siwa lxir
yal mi ara ad d-yali wass
anwa i kem-id-iceggɛen ɣur-s
zzwaǧ n yiwen wass aḥebber-is aseggas
ur ttɣimi ara yid-i
ur teẓri ara maziɣ
yekker umulab i llafɛa
anɛam a yemma
refden ifassen-nsen
xezzeṛ kan agejdur-agi
i tudert n laɛtab
Ṛwiɣ tilufa
tceggeb-iyi taluft-nni
fell-asen i turam asefru-nni
win ara irefden lixsas yellan deg wayeḍ
imsidag iqbayliyen ɛussen igenni rnan lqaɛa
Ɛni d kennemti ara ydebbṛen fell-asent
ttun medden taywalt
ur yebɣi ara ad yali wass
ulac d win ara tecrek ayen tebɣa
ur tt-yuɣ uma d kra
tessneḍ ad taruḍ s teqbaylit
ula d anda yennum yettaf iman-is
akken kan i tt-gezmen deg rray-nsen
tzemremt ad txedmemt weḥd-nkent
ad asen-gerrzen wussan
mazal ur fhimeɣ ara taluft-nni
tikkelt ar tikkelt d lpitza
aṭas i run fell-am
ussan ttɛeddin
wicqa ma txedmemt-as ifelfel aberkan
ad tt-tawiḍ yid-m
dda brahem iḥemmel aṭas mi ara d-kecmen
iwala-k-id rebbi
d netta i d-yezgan d alemmas gar-asen
acḥal ur ḍsin am wass-a
kulec deg-s d azedgan
seg wakken qqureɣ deg lxelɛa
tessnem ad tarum taqbaylit
ayen akk fren yiceṭṭiḍen-is
ad ruḥeɣ ad d-beddleɣ asebbaḍ-agi meqqer fell-i
iḍegger-as tirget s iciwi-s
maziɣ yuɣal yesɛa tamɛiwent
Ɣur-kent ad teɣlimt deg aluḍ
tefka-d afus
teṭṭef di lḥiḍ
tiqernit n taddart
nniɣ-ak ad tt-neddem ad tt-nerr ɣer yimceḍ
anda i tzedɣeḍ
ad tɣummeḍ aɛalṭar-nni s nnḥas
deg tebḥirt-nni ddaw n uxxam
d asṭerṭer kan i tesṭerṭireḍ
tleḥḥum akken
ur ttaggaden ara
sεiɣ yid-k awal
yersa ddehn-is
kečč d ameslub
Ḥemmlent-t
Ṛebbant aksum
henni-yi kan
wa i kennemti
rran-aɣ-t-id
ulac amaynu
ad t-tesseɣliḍ
teṭṭfemt-tt-id
slet-d i waya
ayagi umi cfiɣ
la t-tettnadiḍ
iɣunfa-ten
nekk d apulis
rnu tamecṭuḥt
ugur amenzu d taɣri
ur heddṛemt ara
sfaqeɣ-tent-id
jeddi yehlek
terna-t yemma-s
nɣan-am-ten
xezzeṛ xezzeṛ
tenɣiḍ-iyi-tt
ulac tiysetmatin
ičča-yi ufus-iw
nezmer ad nemmeslay
textaṛemt-tent
yerfa fell-awen

a jeddi maɛlic ad dduɣ yid-k ɣer tejmaɛt

a tidet anida telliḍ

ikerrec-it weqjun iḍ azeryen

iheddeṛ s teqbaylit
d talwit i awen-d-ǧǧiɣ
tqeddec ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
wagi d agejdur i la iḍerrun di ddunit

sɛiɣ abug deg uselkim-iw

bedden metwal adrar-nni
ilaq ad nserreḥ ar zdat

d ayla-s uxxam-a

anita i izewǧen deg-kent

Ɛerqent-am
deg tudert ayen yelhan d wayen n diri zgan ttnaɣen
tenǧer-d asirem ajdid
i tmeṭṭut yefka lqima d tayemmat am lezzayer
ini-iyi-d anwa i tettxalaḍeḍ ad ak-d-iniɣ d acu-k
ad ḥebsent deg tasaft neɣ deg iɣil n wammas

ad yuɣal ad yettɛeyyiḍ

yemgarad ɣef gma-s

ma d arraw-is mi t-ẓran kan ad ruwlen yal yiwen sani
yiwen ur yezmir ad iqaḍeɛ tiktiwin n medden

tufa iman-is yid-i

a yemma cebbḥeɣ ur ddiɣ a yelli ur d-nnin ara ugiɣ

lqed n usefsaf

azekka d lḥedd
ur d-mazal ara buhan n lweqt

tessefqed-itent
syin ɣur-s yeqqim ɛecra n yiseggasen i wakken ad yernu tasfift-is taneggarut iwumi iga isem fliksi-as-d
deg uzgen n dqiqa iḥbes-d ɣur-s ukamyun
a ṭṭir n lqefṣ yak ha-t-an wul-iw d amejruḥ
aṭas i telḥa weḥd-s tura la iteddu yid-s

tekkes-itent-id
yuɣal-d unedbal n ugraw
iḥemmel yidir seksu
neqqim i teɣzi n wass
terna twaɣit ma yenfa
a yemma anda-t uqrab-nni ara awiɣ ɣer lakul
am win umi rẓen waccaren
aslem ma yeffeɣ-d berra i waman ad yemmet
imi ur t-teɣriḍ ara ini-d ayen tebɣiḍ
d baba-s is-tt-yefkan
iteddu-yawent di nneqma
neḥsa d akken tom yettwaxneq
wissen anda i terriḍ
ur tufiḍ d acu i iyi-ixussen
Ɛerqen-as imeslayen i muqran yuɣal amzun d izimer-nni yettaran ifeẓ
d wa i d annay i fernen yiqbayliyen
seg zik nettɛebbi azaglu n ddel
aselway n fransa yerza ɣer okinawa
tettarra-yi deg uɛewwiq
yekra taxxamt deg usensu
yufa asebbaḍ i uḍar-is

ahya leqbayel kecmet ɣer ublug-a teɣrem taqbaylit
d lawan n uzemmur
ulac d acu ur d-yenni ara fell-as
Ɣer taggara dima d netta i iseɛɛun lḥeqq
ur asent-tent-id-yuwi ara
mazal ur fukkeɣ ara ihi ad kemmleɣ
aṭas i yettɣilin amezgun d taḍsa kan neɣ d ahuzzu n ifassen d isuɣan
yessared ifassen-is s waman

ur ismeḥsis ara

ayɣer i tettqudureḍ
a yir argaz
mecṭuḥit xeddmen am umeqqran
ddan wussan uɣaleɣ fehmeɣ tamacahut-nsen tamsalt-nsen tugar-iten

ad aruɣ tabrat i mirielle

axaṭer ddnub n imuriyen mazal ur iwwiḍ ara ɣer lḥedd-is
ur yestufa ara tom
igerrez ṣṣut

Ɛni theblem
Ẓeṛṛeɣ tom
ur tettembiwil tessirt alamma s ufus
atan di yir liḥala
udmawen-nsent ḥecṛen am yizgaren iggan adur ɣer tmezla
yekfa wawal
mačči inek
yeqqur lbir
rnu ɣer-s deg waṭas n temnaḍin mačči d lḥukuma i yettxellisen lebni n leǧwamaɛ
wid imeggren d lmuluk
seglafen yeqjan
aseggas-a yella dhan
tettafraḥ mi ara d-yekcem s axxam
ad d-ddunt yid-nteɣ
teṭṭfeḍ-d tabrat sɣur-s
ifakk-awen-t
ddwawi d iwellihen n yimejjayen
yuba d yir asleɣmay
ulac yiwen
d lxir menhu-k kečč
yefka afus deg wayetma-s
wa yella wa ulac-it
taqbaylit mačči kan d tutlayt
ifker yettidir timiḍiwin
ihi tcerkaɣ tlelli iɣef nettḥewwis i sin
Ḥbes ur heddeṛ ara
eṭfid id
d netta i yebɣan akka
irfed afus-is ɣer baba-s
ass-a tuɣal d tameṭṭut
ilul deg wučči n yibawen
ur bɣiɣ ara ad d-ttencaden tebrek n ṭṭlam ur nettḥezzib
i netta d acu i t-id-igren di tessirt
isnubget-d imeddukal-is ɣer usfugel n umulli-ines
ur ittaṭṭaf ara ibeccan
ansa i d-yekka wawal aɣref
yenna-d mmi "ḥemleɣ-kem"
yeqqur uqerruy-is
tettsewwiqeḍ
sɛiɣ akk ayen ttmenniɣ
Ḥemmleɣ ad ččareɣ tafelwit n tneɣrit s tira taqbaylit
ar melmi ara tt-nkemmel akka
ttarraɣ-tt deg uɛewwiq
yeɣɣar ɣef yizerfan n umdan
yeǧǧa-aɣ umeɣnas n tmentilt tamaziɣt
d idrimen kan i d ṣṣeḥ tura
d tizelit i ḥemleɣ
amek i t-id-tufam
ini-yasen qqleɣ d waɣzen ulac anwa ad k-id-yawwḍen wala ad k-ẓren tḥemmleḍ irgazen
d laεǧeb
adabu yewwet ḥala mi yessedrem amussu n leɛrac
azekka iɣeṭṭel-d lxuf uggadeɣ ad nessesel am uzrem
yal mi ara ad tt-iḥaz
Ɣas akken yesɛa leqraya maca yeqqim d yid-s
iṣukk-iyi-d uɣyul-iw
melmi ara n-awiɣ imawlan-iw ad kem-id-xeḍbeɣ
tekfel-d ddeɛwessu-nni
ziɣ txelxleḍ
aya yeqqim d lbaḍna gar nettat d xwalti-s
urǧin i sliɣ i kra
aṛwaḥ tura yakkan
ass-a d tameɣra ad nefreḥ meṛṛa
si melmi i yessen yidir newwara
atas i yettawi n wakud
ayaw ad nelḥu ticki yewwi ugeffur
iḥemmel kan tiqeṛɛunin d wučči ẓiden
yefka-yas tiyita ɣer gar tuyat
d nutni i d-yuwḍen d imezwura nekkni nerna-d deffir-sen
ineggez almi d ssqef
Ɣur-neɣ tiḥeṛṛit
Ḥbes ur ttmuqqul ara
Ɛni d kečč ara ydebbṛen fell-aɣ
akli yuɣ cabḥa
tettarra-kent deg uɛewwiq
iḥemmel tudert i ttidiren yimdanen deg umaḍal utrim
zik ara d-tuɣaleḍ

wakil ɛerqen-ak imeslayen

anta i tt-yesɛan

ahi aṛǧut din
d ayla-k wa
anda ara tṛuḥeḍ
ur fhimeɣ walu
kemmini tḥeṛceḍ
zwiremt allaɣen-nkent
tettaxṛem i txeṣṣaṛin
baba-tkent ur t-yuɣ wara
tettum d acu iyi-txedmem
waqila txuṣṣeḍ deg leɛqel
baba-m ur t-yuɣ wara
zwir seg teqbaylit-im
d kečč i d ssebba n waya

ad ak-ɛiwneɣ akken zemreɣ

igellaten
aman sɛan uksijin akked hidṛujin

Ɛni tedrewceḍ
akka yerna tgumma ad testaɛref yis-s
ad d-gezmeḍ tamtunt-nni
anta i m-yeslemden aya
tessneḍ ad turareḍ diminu
acḥal i tzemreḍ ad taṛǧuḍ
waqila xuṣṣent deg leɛqel
anwa i kent-yewwten
mazal-ikent kan akken
tessen ad texdem kullec
d acu i k-yewwin ɣur-sen
ad tawimt cwiṭ yid-kent
yexṣeṛ lḥal ass-a
yeḥla mmi-m neɣ mazal
d acu i k-yuɣen akka
yenɣes usemmiḍ ɣur-m
anda ara tṛuḥemt
keččini tḥeṛceḍ
ssnent ad xedment kullec
ad iyi-texḍuḍ neɣ ala
ur ttmeslayet ara yid-s
tewɛeṛ fell-i tefṛansist
ur zmireɣ ara kan ad gneɣ
d acu i kem-yuɣen akka
d ta i d tiririt-im
ad iyi-tawiḍ ɣer sbiṭaṛ
tsefḍemt akk leḥyuḍ-nni
ad testufumt umbɛed
ad d-gezmeɣ tamtunt-nni
ur zmireɣ ara ad ḥekkmeɣ fell-as
iteddu yettseffir
ur bɣiɣ ara ad yeddu tom yid-i ɣer boston
yettwali s wul-is mačči s wallen-is
deg leqdic agi ilaq ad ilin aṭas n iɛeggalen
yessen amek ara s-yelḥu
akka i d-tennamt
s tayri i ttmeslayen taqbaylit
ttcitiɣ uglan-iw kraḍet n tikal deg wass
ttidirent s teqbaylit
ruḥen ɣer temḍelt
yexṛa tala
swiɣ lqahwa d taberbarit
tettbineḍ-iyi-d ad d-teffɣeḍ d abugaṭu n lεali
ur yessin lḥif ur yessin timeṛẓuga n ddunit
acu i d-iṣaḥen i tudrin
anadi ɣef tayri
acḥal d aseggas nettṛaǧu
d acu i awen-xedmen
faq-d ay agdud
ur inuda fell-as ur t-yufi
ur yessin ara ad yurar ddabex
a win iɛebden ddunit
iban d aɣrib ara mteɣ
cennun s teqbaylit
nuker-akent tikti-nkent
tečča teɣyult tuga deg umṛaḥ
iwala d yir liḥala i t-yeggunin
ttnadiɣ fell-am ufiɣ-kem
ttnadiɣ fell-asent ufiɣ-tent
ad d-nettmektay tudert-ik
heddṛen s teqbaylit
ad nadiɣ fell-akent ad ken-afeɣ
s tayri i tettmeslayem taqbaylit
icennu s teqbaylit
irden yečča-ten wakuz
dehbiya yebḍa wul-is ɣef sin
yemlal-iyi-id deg ubrid yedda yid-i
igumma yewwan ɣellin-d ɣef tmurt
afud-nkent d tutlayt taqbaylit
idles-inek d aqbayli
anta-tt ta i d-izerrqen am tafat n lefjer tezyen am ayyur tettirriq am yiṭij
ttarguɣ s tutlayt taqbaylit
ayen akk tejmeɛ acḥal-aya
da deg fransa ddu d uḍar-ik tcemreḍ i yiɣallen-ik
akka i d tudert a yemma mačči d ayen yellan deg ufus-iw

bgayet tesɛa aṭas igulmimen

d nekk i d amaẓuz

tessexdam allaɣ-is neɣ ala

theddeṛ s teqbaylit
ad as-zemren i sin
acḥal i nluqeb wiyaḍ
Ḥemmleɣ rruẓ s llubya
anta tamnaḍt ara k-yeččen
ad nelmed tutlayt taqbaylit s wul-nneɣ
Ḥareɣ ad k-mlileɣ
ad iṛuḥ azekka ar ssinima netta d temdakelt-is
ah winna yeɣra i rebbi a xali
acḥal n sswayeɛ n tɣuṛi i tgesɛiḍ ass n letnayen
ad nemmet akk

a kra umi teqqur tassa

win iḥemmlen urar
wa d wa ruḥen anida ur d-ttuɣalen
akabar n yilemẓiyen
a stut m lebtut
ulamma ahil yella-d d amerkanti
ah a tamaziɣt-nni
ur teqqimem ara
tiɣimit tamaynut
argaz-nni n faḍma yewwi-d awal ɣef tilawin
kečč tzegleḍ tamacint
belli ur yestufa ara
ɣas akka texṣer ṣṣifa-s
wa itteẓẓu wayeḍ iqelleɛ

fehmeɣ-t
qquren wulawen-nwen teffeɣ seg-sen rreḥma
ur ḥmileɣ ara aṭuqqet n lɣaci
lliɣ ttwaḥemmleɣ

anda-k
rǧiɣ armi i nessens tafat
tudert ur nesɛi tudert
ad yuɣal ansa i d-ikka
awi-d ṭṭezḍam-im
beṛka-ken ur ttnaɣem ara
yuklal times n Ǧahennama
ih menhu ara tt-yesteqsin imi tayemmat ulac wiyyaḍ akken
anda telliḍ llan iɣeblan
yuba yezmer yerbeḥ
abeddel n tmuɣli gar yimferǧen
iḍ yelhan a tom
ffeɣ tura kan
bninit waman-nni
teldi-d tawwurt yiwet n tlemẓit d talemmast di lqedd
nekkni deg wahil-nneɣ nefka azal meqqren i wannect-a akken agezdu-nneɣ ad yecbu wiyaḍ
a-t-an wayla-k ddem-it
yusa-d ad yecnu deg yiwet n lqahwa deg at wasif
syin ɣer-s ad yili wass-nniḍen ad nemmeslay ɣef lemḍarrat n yisufar n tgella ladɣa deg unebdu

nezha yakk medden merra
wahruḥu d-acu-t wagi

ad ddunt yid-sen

win iwumi ur telli tmeslayt deg wul ad yessexser ur as-yehwi lḥal

d acu i k-id-iwwin ɣur-i
tzemrem ad teddum yid-i
a yelli a tin yelhan
aru isem-ik dagi
ad ttwakksen i sin seg ugdud-nsen

yeẓweṛ tom
tesṛuḥemt-tt
anda yeqqel mmi-s n Ɛmiruc
teṛwam neɣ ad wen-d-rnuɣ

slemden-iyi-tt
mazal yiwen seg mi i d-yusa yeṭṭef amkan ur iḥerrek ara akk

ad ruḥen ad ẓemmren

tuker-am

Ḥemmleɣ wa
yettzeɛbiḍ wakud mebla ma nuki-as
yeswa sirru yekkes-as usguḥḥu
tudert ur tessuruf ara
aḥluli n tɛebbuḍt d aṭan yettaɣen aɛeddis n umdan neɣ n uɣersiw
ruḥeɣ ad t-waliɣ ɣef yiwet n taluft ur t-ufiɣ ara
iwumi akka i tuwiḍ tarzeft
icennu tizlit tamḥaddit
yuweḍ ɣer lebɣi-s
kkret ad nruḥ ulac d acu n ccɣel i nesɛa dagi
kra yellan deg tasilt a-t-id-issali uɣenja
yettarra-kem deg uɛewwiq
yessefra mačči d kra mazal ar tura lehdur-is rran tili
yella kra neɣ kra iɣef ilaq ad nehder
ulac d acu ur xdimen ara akken ad skuffren tutlayt-iw
ur d-sawlent ara
yerna sser i teqbaylit ittcebbiḥ-itt s usefru
ilindi akka imira i d-tedda d tislit
Ɣur-k nezzeh lḥeqq
yettagad tillas
yemma-s tejreḥ tasa-s
tedda-yawent di nneqma
mačči d timenɣiwt i nɣiɣ mačči d tukarḍa i ukreɣ
ad am-yanef ad tɛeddiḍ
tettaxxṛeḍ i ccṛab d dexxan
yenna-iyi-d tom ur yebɣi ara ad igaj ɣer boston
teḥṛec yelli-twen deg uɣerbaz
swiɣ-d lqahwa n tɣellayt terra-yi ar temẓi
arrac imeẓẓyanen ttseṭṭilen-asen i tikkelt tamezwarut
bɣiɣ ad lemdeɣ taspirantit
susem deg leɛnaya-m la qqaṛent
mačči ala tom kan iwimi tehder mary
iles-ik d tament
ur ɛeffset ara tamusayt
aṭas n wungalen i d-iteffɣen s tutlayt taqbaylit
teddunt-am di nneqma
ma ilaq ad nḍes neɣ ad nru
yemter umattar tiḥdert n uɣrum
ur teḅɣi ara mi i iruḥ
amcic yerɣan s waman yeḥman yettaggad aman isemmaden
a caɛban ah ya caɛban taqbaylit anda k-tt-rran
tafunast tenza temzel aglim lsan-t d icifaḍ
syin yennerna unamek n wawal deg uḍris
tin iwmi ijaḥ urgaz-is ad d-yuɣal s axxam-is d warraw-is

am urgaz am tmeṭṭut
acku d win i d-yettawin tafat d leḥmu i medden
nettat tezga tettqisi argaz deg lefɛayel-is d wayen yesɛa deg wallaɣ-is
tenna deg wul-is  abrid-a ad ssuffeɣeɣ ayen sɛiɣ deg wul-iw
sɛan akk iɛessasen
yettextir tin yebɣa
aṭas i turǧa newwara yidir
armi yewweḍ ar tlemmast n wasif
ssarameɣ bxir i tettiliḍ
amek ara teḍru yid-i
d taluft
yezga yeqqar-as maziɣ
Ɛeddan qqimen dina
yedda-yi usennan deg uḍad
yessared udem-is s bubfsus
aqli yesdenden-iyi waḍu
lemmer d tiqraḥ n yiẓi
seg wakken isel akken i ilaq yettaki i nnda mi ara tekkat
d acu i k-id-yewwin ɣer da
Ṭrad n umennuɣ ɣef tmagit
luleɣ deg tlemmast n ṭṭrad n tsellullit taɣelnawt n zzayer
tudert n yiminig tuɛeṛ mačči d kra
ugiɣ ad amneɣ nemsefraq
zrin wussan rnan wayyuren tislit ur tarzif ara s axxam-nsen
tezliḍ ul-iw a dehbiya
wa masi ṛwaḥ ad nurar s uvilu
aḥric-agi yesɛa assaɣ adamsan
inig n tom ɣer Ṭṭelyan d yiwet n tirmit ur nezmir ad nettu
taswiɛt-a deg nella tewɛer nezzah
uriɣ-am-n tabrat
ax kan awi-t ur yettnuz ara
a baba caɛban yewwet-iyi
Ṭṭuqqtent-d fell-ak tlufa
ayen yufa ad t-yaker ɣas ffer iceṭṭiḍen-ik
nniɣ-as
ur ẓriɣ ara d acu i ken-yuɣen
tella yiwet n tɣawsa tqerreḥ mliḥ mliḥ
iniɣem tekfa-t twekka
yettnadi ad yecfu akk ɣef wayen ara s-d-yini baba-s
ad d-iḥmel wasif
acu-t n unamek n wawal "ungif"
mazal ttkemmilen yiminigen leqdicat-nsen
iḍegger afus-is ɣef teḥnakin-is dɣa tezwi-asent-id
yal agdud yesɛa awatay
tullas akk ttasment seg-i
d kečč i d amraw i sɛiɣ
wa samir awi-d azemmur-nni ad nandi yis-s i yefrax
nerja tamurt ad tseggem mi d-tuɣal s afus n mmi-s
neqqim-as i taluft-a
tudert d tayri tayri mebla tamedyazt ṛṛẓaget
amek xzu ciṭan
smeḥsiset i yemma-wen
nemyussan acḥal uya
d tasraft ayen yellan yebleɛ
amek i tellamt
d acu-tt
tafaska-nneɣ teqqen ɣer wakal
mi ara yettmeslay d tcixet-is
iwakken azekka ur yettuɣal ara d aẓekka
d win i as-d-iseɣlin tuɣmas-is
iban belli tessnemt-ten mliḥ
mi yuker ḥedreɣ mi yeggul umneɣ
ad nerret azal i tmussni
ul-iw yugi ɣas ma bɣiɣ
bɣiɣ ad ẓreɣ acimi ur iyi-d-tessawleḍ ara i tikkelt tis snat
ur ssineɣ ara ad selḥuɣ avilu
d tacennayt tameqrant ma ur teẓriḍ ara
d awezɣi ad bruɣ i ṭbel deg waman
yufa-tt tettraju-t
a baba melmi ara nṛuḥ ɣer lebḥar
yeger-d tiɣri
yezmer lḥal imezwura yebnan taddart n tewrirt ufan-t-id din
ur tmeččeḥ ara iḍebsiyen
wiss d acu i d-yenna uǧernan fell-i
d tinuḍin meɛna d tiyissetmatin
tagi d yemma-k
ad as-yettili d inebgi
d aḍilli kan i d-iḍall
melmi ara truḥemt
d acu i kent-yuɣen
ur ẓriɣ ara d acu i tt-yuɣen
fru-aɣ-d ugur-a deg i aɣ-tegreḍ
imdanen akk ssaramen ad ɣlin deg ugamam yelhan
berka ur sneḥniḥ ara
d accaren n umcic i tesɛa
selḥayen tamurt s allah ɣaleb incallah
ad ikemmel wahil deg tmeddit n wass-a
d axeddim
ur ssiεlay ara ṣṣut-im
gen di talwit a gma hameg naṣer d awezɣi ad k-nettu
yal tallit s ccix-is azemni
lliɣ d tamaynut
Ɛni tfukkemt
tseww-d lqahwa tesserkem-d ayefki n taɣaḍt i d-teẓẓeg imir-nni kan
bɣiɣ ad teqqimeḍ anda telliḍ
neẓra-t merra
Ԑefsen akk iger-nni
nniɣ-as ad nemlaqa deg temdint
tilelli umeslay ur telli ɣur-sen
ilaq ad nezdi akk iɣallen-nneɣ i wakken ad neqdec ɣef teqbaylit
teεǧeb-ak tiɣmi-ya
ur cukkeɣ zemreɣ ad εaceɣ war yess-k
iban truḥemt d tiwaziwin
tfukkem
gen di talwit a gma cerrat ali d awezɣi ad k-nettu
tacelḥit d tutayt mačči d tantala
anwa ara tissineḍ ma yella ur tetteffɣeḍ ara
ulac tameṭṭut ur tewwiḍ deg tala
tella ssebba deffir waya
ur ttraju ara ad k-iεawen ḥedd
Ẓriɣ ur yeshil ara uxeddim-im
slem-d i wayen i d-neqqaṛ
amaziɣ si zik yeṭṭes
ssken-aɣ-d taxxamt-nni
yekkat waḍu
ttqeεεideɣ lpust-nni ufiɣ mi tedduɣ ɣer uxxam
ad ččeɣ kra ma yella
izem i tett tarwa-s
awal ma yeffeɣ ula wi ad t-i-d yerren
gen di talwit a gma rahim karim d awezɣi ad k-nettu
amdan yella yettemcabi ɣer uḥallum
anda akka i teffɣemt
win ur nezmir s tussna yekkat s tsertit
ayen akka i d-teqqareḍ merra εelmeɣ yess
Ɛni tfukkem
yella ibedd-d ugarfiw nwiɣ-t d ajeḥmum
ur neggan ara alamma terfed iman-is tutlayt taqbaylit
ayen ur k-nenɣa d lǧehd ara k-d-yernu
xaqeɣ maḍi kan fell-am
yeqqim ɣer tama-s
ad taweḍ ar igenni tutlayt taqbaylit
adfel yessa-d i wayeḍ
nekk ttxemmimeɣ kan ɣef teqbaylit
tanemmirt imi i iyi-tḥudreḍ acku nna yamina ur as-zemmreɣ ara
sewwqen weḥd-sen
d taqbaylit kan i yettezzin deg allaɣ-iw
Ṛebbi imɣan am yiɣersiwen
ayen akk ara tedεum ad yettwaqbel
srid seg new york
tufa-t iqelleɛ iteẓẓu
yiwen wass yekcem ɣer yiwen uxxam yufa tissirt m sin yiɣuraf
Ɣilleɣ tfehmeḍ
ur tewjideḍ ara i wakka
d nekki
bɣiɣ ad tgeḍ kra imahilen unadi
d lawan ad iruḥ yiwen ɣer uɣerbaz
llan wid yekkaten ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
dayen ur ḥwaǧeɣ timεiwna-k
akken kan i t-mennaɣ
cabḥa tesla-d kan i wawal arraw yuɣal ibeddel wudem-is
xdem akken i k-yeεǧeb
cfiɣ ɣef aya
tebra-yas
teǧǧuǧug
nettwali tutlayt taqbaylit amek i tesserḥa aɛdawen-is
d acu i yettilin daxel n yicwariyen-nni
sew lqehwa
nettwali tutlayt taqbaylit amek i tessaged aɛdawen-is
baba yebɣa ad iliɣ d aqcic imeɛnen
uccen yeskeɛwiw
anda i teǧǧa arrac-nni
yekcem s axxam yaf-it igen
ittqamar imawlan-is
tixsi d tawtemt n yikerri
anda ara ẓren tudert nniḍen
yuki-d ur yecfi ɣef kra yeḍran yid-s
ur ssinent ara ad urarent ddabex
ar dinna ara teffeɣ
ar wanwa ara t-yaf
nɣan-t s snat n teṛsasin
bdiɣ ttissineɣ imdanen
tečča lbaṭaṭa d taḥmayant
mazal tutlayt-nneɣ ad tebbeɛzeq
tefkiḍ-asent abadaṛ
ddan-am di nneqma
s teqbaylit i d-tekkrem
ass-a ad xedmeɣ deg-sen lmenker
aɛwin yettawi-t yid-s
rebbi yefka-iyi-d d aqbayli maɛna bɣan ad iyi-rren d wayeḍ
ur n-ttaseɣ ara dagi ara kemmleɣ ussan-iw
yuker-awent tikti-nkent
tbecceḍ aserwal-ik
ur awent-d-ssukkseɣ acemma
ttmeslayen s teqbaylit
yesɛa ẓẓheṛ tom
Ɣas yuɛeṛ neẓra belli ad naweḍ
anda ad i-yawi ubrid-iw ssrima ṭṭfen-tt yiderɣalen
ass-a ṛuḥeɣ ar usalay
wwet aɣrum d umureǧ ad tesɛeddiḍ tiremt
ulac abrid ɣer tegzirt-nni ala s teflukt
mi ara awḍeɣ ɣer uxxam ad am-d-ssiwleɣ
d taqbaylit i d iseɣ-ik
gǧan-aɣ-d tarda leḥwal
s tayri i theddṛem taqbaylit
tuget n deg-sen ala ɣur-sen kan i qqnen
tmeččḥem iḍebsiyen
ur nudaɣ fell-as ur t-ufiɣ
nqeddec ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
ilaq ad dduɣ ar zdat
yufeg-aɣ uqermud
tameɣra-w wi yecfan aya
lḥiɣ ɣef uḍar armi d axxam seg akken ur ufiɣ aṭaksi
Ḥemmleɣ taɣuri seg wasmi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ
zdimt lqedd-nkent a tiqbayliyin
uwiɣ tasennart yid-i s asif ad d-gemreɣ iselman
tissirt n zik s usardun ma d tin n tura s umutur
newwi-d awal fell-as yakan ass-a
imensi aneggaru d yiwen seg ineḍuryen yemgaraden deg tudert n yasuε
tmeqqṛem-d s teqbaylit
degger-itt akin tura teṭṭef ark amḍiq
d acu i tent-id-yewwin ɣer da
yufeg-as uqermud
tugi ad d-tenṭeq
amussnaw n tsengama
takerrust n yidir d taberkant
ufiɣ-t-id yettru am lgerra umeɣbun n rebbi
mmi-s n xali yeɣli s uvilu yeṛṛeẓ uḍar-is dɣa wwint ɣer sbitaṛ
kra n win yeḥwaǧen tamɛawna ad iyi-d-yaf sdat-s
lbaḍna-s teffer
amek ara teḍru yid-neɣ
aṭas i d-nenna
yeɣli-yas waggus
asekkil n tagelda
anwa ur nuri ara isem-is
Ḥemmlent tutlayt taqbaylit
acḥal qeṛṛiḥ yifelfel-a
yeṭṭes ur ttɛeyyiḍet ara
tura sawḍeɣ tmenṭac n iseggasen ifut-iyi lḥal iwakken ad ruḥeɣ s aɣarbaz
yegull ur yessusem
bɣant ad teǧǧuǧeg teqbaylit
amaruz yezmer ad yili d aḥerfi neɣ d ussid
ah ya simra
amcic yesmiɛiw
acḥal teswa txatemt-a
aɣerbaz n lezzayer yeḥfan
aha kan awi-d tafyirt igerrzen seg uqerruy-ik
ad k-yeǧǧ rebbi a ccix d amuḍin asmi ara d-terr tyaziḍt-iw asartu ad ak-d-awiɣ timellalin
acḥal n yiseggasen i yeqqim deg lɣerba
a mmi ddunit d aḥebber mačči d aḍebber
ad nṛuḥ ar wexxam
ad t-txedmem
akken yella wass ad t-yeks umeksa
ad xelṣeɣ
ad qqimen kan ad ruḥen deg-sent
a yemma d lawan n lmut dεu-yi a d-teqqel tefsut
acḥal n tikal i yessefk ad as-d-alseɣ
waqila kfan yemɣaren izemniyen
ur txeddmem ara ccɣel ass-nni
zrent di teṣreḍt ur ttwalint ara
ikad-iyi-d ḥawleɣ-as cwiṭ assa deg učči
yasuɛ iṛuḥ syenna
xersum mmeslay d wabɛaḍ ɣef waya
iggumma ad isteɣfeṛ ula gar-as d bab-is
cteddu ad timɣureḍ
d mmi-s n lqayed i tuɣeḍ
yusef inna-asen Ɛni mačči ɣer yillu i tella tifrat
ulayɣer twessaḍ agujil ɣef yimeṭṭawen
alma yewweḍ uqcic d argaz neɣ taqcict d tameṭṭut ara d-yuɣal
a taḥanut n uḥeḍri
lemmer ad yiɣzif leɛmer
ad yeṭṭes mmi di laman
ferɛun irra-yas ihi ar azekka
aselmad n teqbaylit ɣur-s assaɣen igerzen d yinelmaden-is
yugi tuffɣa-nni n leɛqel i ten-izedɣen akk
yeqwa ddɣel ur neẓri anda ara taweḍ
abrid yessan
ssufuɣen-ten bac ad d-walin adeg seg yidgan icebḥen ama deg twilayt n bgayet neɣ berra-s
tefkam-iyi i uwessar yecban winna
yettnadi učči deg yiḍumman n medden
bdu-tt-id s ugdal n yiɛeggalen n tseqqamut n ugezdu-a timlilit n yiselmaden
teffeɣ-as-d teεrurt
neɣ tin ixussen deg tmusni
ur awen-tcuḥḥ ara ddunit
heggaɣ iman-iw s lemɣawla
iɛdawen-nwen izedɣen deg-s ad wehmen
nwant ddunit d awal kan waqila
tesla ar wunnig wis tlata sin n yirgazen heddren gar-asen
win ara yeččen seg-s ddnub i yiri-s
ma ulac imɣi i d-yesṭuṭcen d tamurt i iɛiqṛen
xeddmeɣ kan azgen n wass
yekki gar wid i isersen lbumbat i tiliẓri taɣelnawt di tlemmast n tmanaɣt
amek ad teḍru d uḥeqqi akken ara teḍru d umcum
d acu ara d-tiniḍ di tezlit-a
am wakken daɣen i d-llant tnagiyin sɣur yimɣaren iḥedren dinna ɣef tudert d usuddes n tmetti taqbaylit taqburt
mmi ileqqeḍ ikesman
ddqiqa ɣur-s d aseggas
meskin ulac win i t-id-iwalan
yella kra ideg testehza
Ẓran ma nuḍḥen nutni ad d-taweḍ tallit ideg tamaziɣt ad d-teffeɣ ɣer unnar
yekkes-as wanect-nni n takruhi d usḥissef
ilaq ad ḥebsen yimdanen astehzi ɣef waṭṭanen n tnefsit d waṭṭanen n leɛqel
yettḥuccu tuga imeggel yesserwat ikes tiqeḍɛa
ttaksaben mebla leḥsab ur ssinen tawant
ur awent-tcuḥḥ ara ddunit
s yimeṭṭi i as-tger rebbi
ur teẓriḍ ara acḥal lqay ugelmim-a
ayen yeɛnan isafaren n wučči
si dduḥ ad yettḍili
iɣli d tinnegnit
tanfem-aɣ i nekkni deg nniya ad yegg sidi ad yesteḥsen
imi nekk d tameṭṭut
ah tura tezmer ad sen-tserreḥ i yimeṭṭawen
qqarren zzman tazmert n twacult tettuγal γer wacḥal n yirgazen i tesεa
yeffel i ugemmaḍ-in akin
teqqur teεwint n yiḥulfan
i ɣef tres tikti n ureqqeɛ n ugadir n lqesba n yimweḥḥden
tesbeggneḍ-d tazmert n ufus-ik ayeffus
tin akken i yundi uyennat yiwen ur d-as-yufi tifrat
aɛekkaz n wulmu ur ikkat ur ittfukku
iruḥ ɣer texxamt-nni anda akken yella baba-s yakan
imiren qeccɛen-ten-id si zdat n ferɛun
i tura ur tettfakkam ara
tugniwin n uɣanib ur zmireɣ ara akk ad ak-d-iniɣ acḥal i cebḥent
d win yennumen lahyuf
d axeddam nniḍen i d-yerran deg umkan-is
isdawanen yeqqaren deg yigezda n tmaziɣt di tmurt taqbaylit
urgaɣ targit ad tt-ig Ṛebbi di lexla
yugi uɣyul lǧennet ma llan din warrac
yettiɣzif ad irennu
neggugem di sin am sin n yisebdaden nettmuqqul-itt
nekk ad as-tturareɣ aẓawan s tgiṭart-iw ad ttnezziheɣ ɣer-s nettat
mazal ur teɛyiḍ ara
ad tzedɣem sebɛa n wussan deg iɛecwan
tettiṛṛiq am usafu
Ɛefseɣ-t yerreẓ
yeggar tumert ɣer iziɣṛen yettwalin allen-is yenneflen d sser

ur ttagad a yemma
dduklen akken yekcem ad d-iẓer baba-s
kečč d imɣi-w n ṣṣaba
irra-as acuɣer i tettnadiḍ ad tissineḍ isem-iw
yettembaddal wudem-is am win n tmennifrit
ssya ɣer ssmana ad iliɣ deg legliz
Ḥala tiddin ara tedduḍ yid-i
ur nettmenni ad texser tmurt-nneɣ armi yeẓra Ṛebbi
adlis-a n uẓeṭṭa n wawalen d agerruj i win yebɣan ad yessemɣer tamussni-s deg umawal n teqbaylit
fell-as ur ttak afus
widak ara tt-id-yeɣren
yeznuza-ten s yiɣil
timunent n tmurt n yiqbayliyen

tura ara yaɣ

ad mlilen mi ara d-ffɣen ɣef leḥdac

zik i yeffeɣ tamurt

d tigi i d tisutriwin-im s umata

llant kkatent afus
iẓedwa inmettiyen ɛezlen imdanen
i tcebḥeḍ ay aɣerrabu mi ara ad d-terzuḍ
acimi ur asent-d-tettarraḍ ara awal
ur kem-kkateɣ ara

Ḥemmleɣ ad qqimeɣ weḥd-i
Γef yiman-is kan i yettxemmim
wissen ma da i tella
tesseɣ aṭas aman
teεǧeb-iyi tqendurt-a ad tt-aɣeɣ

err-d awal a winnat

amusebbel d argaz n umlan ilaq kullec ad yili ɣef tiṭ-is

Ṛwaḥ Ɛijel-d
ddeqs uqbel darwin yenna-d buffon belli tilmas mehzent s leεqel maḍi akken kan i d-wwint tegnatin tingawiyin

iṛuḥ ṭlam ad iɛel tafat
ilaq ad yi-d-tinimt tidet
ur nettruḥu ara
d tidet a dda Ɛmeṛ ḥeḍreɣ-as i snat n tikal di bgayet akked uweqqas

ur rriɣ ara ddhen mi yeffeɣ

cwi kan iḥudd rebbi

ad awen-t-id-yawi azekka

aseggas-a ulac aṭas n umergu

s lkas kan i tettuɣ leɣbayen-iw
iger yemger
deg wass-nni ur ufin iman-nsen

yexla uxxam n xwali
yal tafda akken tebɣu tella tettabaε-itt-id tigawt
yugi lbaṭel s wacciwen yid-s yennuɣ ur yeḥbis
imsuṭṭaḍ ttlalen-d d imuddiren
tikta am ti ilaq ad ttwakksent deg wallaɣen
ssutreɣ-as ma yessen tansa-s
tura d nnuba-k ad txellseḍ
anwa i tt-id-isfuḥen akka
yedda-yi di nneqma
ccib d lehlak n ucebbub yezmer ad d-yili di temẓi neɣ di temɣer
rran-iyi deg uɛewwiq
s yixef-iw ar k-ḥemleɣ
timesqaqart d yiwet n turart i ḥemmlen aṭas yigerdan
kreɣ-d ṣbeḥ ufiɣ-d yessaɣ udeffel
yeswa lqahwa-is mi d-yekker seg yiḍes
urgaɣ yiwet n ddunit mebla leslaḥ
d yiwen n useggas i d-yeǧǧan ccwami
sin deg waman
anelmad-a tikwal yettarra iman-is yuḍen
neqččeɣ sa n-tnuqqlin
ur tufiḍ d acu i yebɣa ad d-yini
yeseḥbibir ɣef arraw-is
yeḥsa tḥemmel-it
iḍall-d dɣa yerwel
yewwa ɣef yisɣaren
Ḥucceɣ-d leḥcic i tfunast-nneɣ
ur d-ittaɣ ara ayefki
aman irekmen ttuɣalen d leffar
teǧǧa-t tmacint
lufan temẓi tessen lufan temɣer tezmer
ussan i d-iteddun ad ruḥeɣ ɣer kanada
ass-a ilaq ad aruɣ aṭas n tefyar
yuɣ tannumi sya i yettɛedday
yewhem deg-sen
adeg n tlalit n yuba d aqbu
ihi ini-iyi-d amek ara xedmeɣ
inuda fell-as lqaɛa igenni ur t-yufi
d acu ara d-tinim deg tnemhalt tamaynut
aḥric-agi yesɛa assaɣ adelsan
iḥemmel čina
yedda-yam di nneqma
inisi yugar uccen deg tiḥerci
yerra-tt deg uɛewwiq
ixammen n taddart n tewrirt bnan akk s wakal d uẓru
a kra isɛan ul yelsa
s tagi-nneɣ ma ulac aɣilif
ad neṭṭef
di tmurt-a ula d lmeytin ɛyan
akeddav
wiyaḍ teddun cban izerman
yeǧǧa-yaɣ wakud-nneɣ neǧǧa-t neǧǧa imeḍqan-nneɣ ǧǧan-aɣ
dɣa imir i d-yekcem yiwen urgaz ar texxamt yufa-tt teẓẓel ɣef ulemsir
ay aɛessas n zehr-iw dawi-yi lɛeql-iw teẓṛiḍ anida ttwaɣeɣ
i d-suffɣent teẓrigin n tiddukla numidya n wehran
kecmen-d tamurt s ddreɛ
acuɣeṛ ur tettṛuḥuḍ ara ar zdat
yeswa xemsemya n yidinaṛen
yella-d d asissen iwatan ɣef wayen akk i d-yefka d wayen i d-yeǧǧa meɛtub ama d tamedyazt neɣ d ccna
nekkni d afḍis d ugelzim yeddan d tussna d uvelkim fell-aɣ teḥṛes neɣ d llwi
wid yeḥnuccḍen di Ǧerǧer
Ḥareɣ ad kem-waliɣ
dduklent teqcicin ɣer tala
amasay ameqqran d win yefkan asendeh ad nɣen
i tura d acu i d tifrat
yenna-d tidet yekcem ɣer lḥebs
ayɣer i teffrem fell-asent akk annect-a
nettarra-t deg uɛewwiq
ur k-id-ufiɣ ara din iḍelli
d ta i wumi tsemmam tilelli
nesmuzget i temsirt-is deg rradyu
bɣiɣ ad lemdeɣ tabrutunt
d nekk ara am-d-yinin anta tura kan
yebɣa ad yefru yid-s tugi
ilul-d yedder yemmut
yettlusu tom iselsa n watmaten-is
ur yeẓri ara d acu i yettraju
ilaq ad ḥadren
ad fell-am yeɛfu rebbi a yemma
yemger yiger n yirden deg ɣuct
fell-as i turiḍ asefru-nni
tayaziḍt turew-d tamellalt
ufiɣ-kent-in tetturaremt ddabax
iteddu s leɛqel
acuɣer i tebɣiḍ ad teffɣeḍ
lexliqa n uxellaq tiyita ur tlaq
acimi akka tura tugiḍ ad tbeddleḍ
ufiɣ-t yetturar ddabax
ini-d aḥeq rebbi
imsidag iqbayliyen d igazuzen
yasin baba-s n neǧma d amaziɣ almi d iccer
Ɣef walim i iyi-kkaten i wakken ad ttuɣ timẓin
ay udem n tfekrunt
yuɣal useksut i tasilt
ad aɣ-d-tefkeḍ afus azekka mi ara nger azeṭṭa
tudert yefka-aɣ-tt-id tamettant nettraju-tt
tettagad tissist
ur walaɣ ara melmi ara t-fakkeɣ
iruḥ akk deg-sent meskin
tenna-d yelli "ḥemleɣ-k"
iban ɣef wudem-is yuḍen
Ɛni tettaru deg ṭṭlam
zwir allaɣ-ik
d acu n tkeṛṛust i tesɛam
ad tawiḍ cwiṭ yid-k
rewlemt ma tzemremt
ur zmireɣ ara kan ad ṭṭṣeɣ
d ayla-nwen wa
tezwar teqbaylit-nwen
waqila txuṣṣemt deg leɛqel
tom ixeddem ɣur-k
yessen ad yexdem kullec
ilaq ad d-tgerrzem taswiɛt
uliɣ ad d-cerweɣ azemmur ɣliɣ-d
d acu-tt taluft-a n lḥerraga
Ɣur-i asefru-nni akk yelhan d win akken mazal ur uriɣ
iga-as amkan deg wul-is
yunag seg zik ɣer tmurt n fransa
iḥrec di leqraya
yekkat s tuyat
aselway n tegduda ibeddel tamendawt iwakken ad yeḥkem ugar
ur yesli ur yeẓri deg wayen akk iḍerrun
yettusu iban yuḍen
yuɣal d afus ayeffus n baba-s
ur ẓriɣ ara anda ara terreḍ
wa yessaram wa yettayes
ittasem mebla lebɣi-s
yerra-t ddaw uḍar-is
yettmenṭar
ulac aɣlif ma yella ɛerḍeɣ-d tom ɣer yimensi
ay udem n ufekrun
ur ttezzem ara deg yiman-im
ssiwel-as testeqsiḍ fell-as
acimi ur yeqqim ara din
ticki ara fakkeɣ ad ffɣeɣ
yewwi-d lqahwa deg ufus-is
yewwet tameṭṭut-is dɣa truḥ teccetka nnan-as-d"ccah deg-m"
myencaden
tturarent teqcicin s tpupilt
adabu azzayri yefka lameṛ i iǧadarmiyen ad nɣen imesbaniyen n tmurt taqbaylit
yeldi tom tawwurt yekcem
terra-tent deg uɛewwiq
deg tegrest ileqqeḍ azemmur
tugi ad tamen s wayen yeḍran yid-s
ulac win izemren ad yeḥbes tikta-w
Ḥemmlen-t akk medden
ilaq ad testeɛfuḍ
itess ccrab akken itess aman
yiwen ur yezmir ad asen-issuref
d ccbaḥa n wul i d sseḥḥ
d acu i tebɣiḍ ad teččeḍ
ur sliɣ ara d acu i d-tenna
mi d-yusa ɣur-neɣ d acu i aɣ-d-yenna
mačči yiwen n usefru i yura
timseɛraq d addal n wallaɣ
wissen ma tuḍen
mi yeffeɣ ad ikes lmal-is yuwi yid-s tajewwaqt-is
ikubar-nneɣ nettwali-ten kan di teswiɛt n tefranin
yal aseggas yesfugul amulli-ines
tzemrem ad trefdem akk annect-a
irḍel-ak-d adlis ad t-teɣreḍ
amzun yeqqim ɣef useffud
cukkeɣ d iṭij 
acuɣeṛ ur iheddeṛ ara tom
yuzel iḍelli deg wannar
faqen ula d igerdan d adabu i t-yenɣan
aɣerbaz amezwaru
iṣeggaden n tmusniɣef tmurt ɣeḍlen-d rrehba
akal ttun-t medden yeqqim d asuki ulac win ara t-ixedmen
a-t-an yefka rray i rray-is
ufan-d iglafen n yinelmaden am nutni
ula deg leɛmer mazal-itt meẓẓiyet
ar tameddit ad nwali
ula d timddukal-iw ur ẓrin-t aya
mmeslayen
kkrent tmeccacin n wemɣar
ilaq dima d yid-s
a-t-an ur ak-id-yuli ara wawal
mačči d aɣbel
mačči alamma zewǧeɣ akken ad farseɣ temẓi-w neɣ akken ad ttuɣ imawlan-iw
teḍra yid-wen am tzizwa
tewwi-d akk iḍ d nettat tettxemmim d acu ara texdem
mi ara s-tini yemma-s i teqcict a yelli
yenwa ala lutu ara yexdem i yiman-is
yewhem mḥend
Ḥesbet ad tafem ma ixuṣ neɣ ma izad kra
xdem-asen akken i k-xedmen
aṭas i iɛeddan ɣef sliman
yeṭṭef-d afrux di tcerket
ur neḥnucceḍ ara makken yekkat ugris
yuklal-it tom
d ijapuniyen
aṭas i ken-tḥemmel
dayen xtareɣ
yufa-kem tettheggiḍ iman-im ad truḥ s amahil
yezwar timri sdat wulli
zik imdanen zedɣen deg yifran
i wumi yefka awal
ur asent-ten-id-yuwi ara
ur am-t-ttakkeɣ ara
ur tufiḍ d acu i ččiɣ seg tnezzayt
yal ass zgant gar wallen-is
d yiwen n umdan yettaṭṭafen dima deg wawal-is
udad ɣur-s acciwen d imeqqranen
anwa ara t-ixedmen deg umkan-is
ddeqs n yimeddukal i d-mlaleɣ di
yeffer yuggad ad t-id-walin
wwten-d yibunda kkren-d yiḥumal deg umwan
yeffeɣ-ikem laɛqel ɣef idrimen
ay at laɛraḍ n rebbi
anef-as ɣur-k
imensi-is yečča-t deg usečču n usensu
taxdeɣ fell-am
ur ten-tufim ara
yugar-iten s waṭas
tettarra-t deg uɛewwiq
yewwet-it s taqabact ɣer uqeṛṛuy
tella kan yiwet n tidet
nettat tessenhaz aqerruy yeffes zelmeḍ
arrac n tura ḥemmlen ad uraren ddabax n uḍar
yenna-as nekk ad zbuɣ ma d kečč ad taruḍ
wwten s uldun afexsay akken ad nɣen
ma sussmeɣ axir
ur tecbiḥ ara am uletma-s tamenzut
tom ur yugar ara aṭas mary deg leɛmer
yessawel uselway n marikan dunald trump i uselway n rrus valdimir putin
nnmara tezdeɣ deg-i
qrib ad yekcem ɣer uɣerbaz
yunag ɣer fransa
ixef-is yerra-t ger ifassen-is
ad am-t-id-ifek
anwa i tecɣeb taluft ma yella yerbeḥ tom
ur ttkukrut ara ssiwlet-d ma yella kra i testeḥqem
anta akka i d-tegreḍ gar wallen-im a weḥciya
ur tufiḍ d acu i yugad
tthuzzunt amdan am dduḥ ttheggint-t kan i tguni
uɣal-d ɣer leɛqel-ik
uḍan ɣezzifit ussan wezzilit deg tegrest
yif-it ma ruḥeɣ
lmut tneqq ayen i sɛiɣ nekk nnan-d ilaq ad ɛemmdeɣ
ur tettruḥuḍ ara ɣer dihin
d lakul id-yeslalen laɛǧubat-agi nettwali neqqen wid yeɣran ass-a
tamacahut d yiwen n uḥric deg tsekla tamaziɣt
fkiɣ-as umlan yelhan
a yir tameṭṭut
iteffer ifassen-is
rran-kem deg uɛewwiq
ufiɣ-tt tetturar ddabax
yuklal lemqadrat urgaz-a
anef-as ad yehder
nettarra-k deg uɛewwiq
ttuɣ ur am-tt-in-fkiɣ ara
qqaren-d tayri d taderɣalt
teddun-aɣ di nneqma
ttrad yettbeddil akk timsal
tuḍneḍ aɣbel
tewwet-iyi tmagart-im
yesla-iyi-d mi s-nniɣ ala
swiɣ afenǧal n whisky
ur ibedd ur yeqqim
nesɛa sebɛa wakraren tixsi akked uɣyul
ur ḥmmileɣ ara aksum n uzger ula d tom akken
ddunit merra d tamurt-is d inebgi i ḥemmlen medden
tamurt tegguma ad d-terfed ixef-is seg wass mi tewwi timunent
nettat d tagellidt deg-s
ttewteɣ fell-am
yettraju-iyi sami
tirni n uslelli aɣelnaw d akabar yeṭfen tamurt seg walef utseɛ meyya utnayen usettin
tzeggen tqerɛet d aman
d aman n lbir kan i itess
myejraḥen
win ihelken sekkeṛ ilaq ad yettḥadar iman-is
warɛad yeffiɣ winna ikcem-d
ad tṛuḥeḍ ɣer sedduq neɣ ɣer sidi Ɛic
mdel allen-im
bbelṭɛen-d iserdasen ɣer uxxam
sdukkleɣ temses telǧem
ur teddireḍ ur temmuteḍ
ciṭ i d-yegran mi ara ad d-tfarṣeḍ
ala mi d-nniɣ
ajḥiḥ d mmi-s n teɣyult
ur ssawḍeɣ ara ad ṭṭfeɣ iman-iw
wa d agrud
aṭas n tlawin i yessnen seksu
dinna kan sennig-m
ur t-ttlaɛaj ara
yella ḥedd i ak-d-isawlen
ur tḥemmlem ara aɣerbaz s waṭas
neḥṣel gar ikeṛyas yeggten
attan tura d talemmast n yiḍ
Ɛni ttwaṭṭfent
akken sliɣ i tnuṭin timezwura n uẓawan-nni ẓriɣ d ayen yelhan
d kunemti ara d-yekkren zik azekka
ur zmireɣ ara ad t-xedmeɣ mebla ma iɛawen-iyi ḥedd
iga meqqran at lɛerbi timlilit deg xerraṭa
Ẓṛiɣ belli d tom i imeẓẓiyen fell-i
ttṛuḥunt ar ssinima yal ssmana
ddmeɣ-d lkas n ccrab walaɣ udem-im ɣer daxel
d tamdint n ucwaya deg arjantin i d-yezgan deg unẓul maḍi n umaḍal
ma ɛawdeɣ-d i ddunit-iw
tketteṛ teqjunt iḍan
argaz d ssaqiya tameṭṭut d lǧabiya
Ɣas beεεed-as kan
aḥreḍman d win yettagaden ur nesɛi tabɣest
luɛjeɣ azrem s axjiḍ
ur ḥemmlent ara aɣerbaz s waṭas
ttif lmut wala lehzel
akka i d ddunit teḥṣiḍ
mmekti-d rriḥa imawlan
ulint ar wayyur
iḥnin-d ciṭuḥ a yelli-s n medden
asɣar-is yeɛzel yerka
uran-asen tabrat iḍelli
ur yi-d-hedder ara ɣef uxeddim
yella walebɛaḍ i yemmuten
xuyleɣ amnay i d-yejban deg tiɣilt
tom d abubul mliḥ
ad qqiment deg uxxam azekka
imaẓragen-nneɣ ur d-ssufuɣen ara idlisen seg lǧib-nsen
ad s-tiniḍ d tamellalt
yella walebɛaḍ i akent-id-iluɛan
xdem ayen i m-d-nniɣ nekki
yettferrij i ddabex
zemreɣ ad ḍelbeɣ deg-wen lemzeyya
ad nemyeḥmaẓ akken ad nɛeddi
ldimt allen-nkent
d acu tebɣiḍ ad tgeḍ tameddit
ilaq ad tɛeṛḍeḍ ad temlileḍ d tom
armi ur nessaweḍ
yella kra n yiwen i yettnezzihen deg tom
bɣiɣ kan ad k-t-id-rreɣ
ilaq-iyi ad d-reḍleɣ idrimen
yella walebɛaḍ i yettmuqqulen
yewwi-t-id cennegnagi
ccfeɣ kan
axxam-is ur s-yezmir lǧameɛ yeṭṭef-as amezzir
teɛǧeb-iyi tasufeɣt-im
surgen-d i waman
dawi-t neɣ awi-t
d aṛaṭiw uyaziḍ
ifka-t unebdu i lexṛif
Ẓriɣ d ayen ẓẓayen fell-ak
iǧǧa-k lefjer a yamɣar
ur beɣɣuɣ ara yakk ad hedreɣ ɣef annect-en
wehmeɣ mi t-walaɣ yewwi-d akanic
a wi yellan ddaw uḍar-im
deg ayen ara rren i tikta s ifukal tteggzen bab-itsent
zik annar yemmug i userwet ma d tura i wurar
qefzent deg usewwi
nnwaḍer-im ɣlint ɣer lqaεa
ur ẓriɣ ansi d-yusa
anida bɣan ulin
tɣawel di tikli
acḥal ayaggi ur-t zriḍ ara
kullec ad iɛeddi imeṭṭawen-ik ad kawen
sɛiɣ win ara yi-iɛawnen i wakken ad xedmeɣ aya
irka di ddunit
iɣawel di tikli
beddlen ṭṭaɛa s idrimen
ulamek ara hedreɣ seg akken lliɣ bateɣ
Ẓečč aqeṛṛu-k
sawel-as s tilifun di leɛnaya-m
ikeččem timkečmin
sliɣ i walebɛaḍ yettṣeffiṛ
mi d-yuki a yettjellib yettgalla ar dak-nɣeɣ
mi kecmeɣ lebḥer n tayri
tessirid tuɣmas-is yal ass
ad k-tt-id ǧǧeɣ
Ẓriɣ ad tɣeṛṛeq
s lbeṛhan uḥernuk
areṭṭal ittuɣal
ulamek ara tesfexsem timlilit
nessaram dayen ur ittɛawad ara ad d-yili wannect-a
ad tɛeddi ad theyyi imekli
assaɣen-a ɣlayit mliḥ
anef-iyi deg iḍ asemmaḍ
nnan-iyi-d diri-tt d taɣezfant iḍudan
myagrent iḍelli d lwiza
deg tnarga-ya i tzedɣeḍ
ssweḥlen-as asebter-is
Ɛni yella kra i ibeddlen
ifna-t uɣeṛṛeq
yella kra n yiwen i yettfeṛṛiǧen deg tom
imir lliɣ d anelmad
anwa i yewwin kra di nneɛc-is
ansa i ɣ-d-ffɣent lwafeɛ
ad k-yeḥwiǧ ass-a
awal yeḥwağ asefru
ula d akerfa ur t-ṛwiɣ
yessen iman-is
ad truḥeḍ wakali
Ɣṛem wayi tura
zik d imazraren imaṣriyen deg tiliẓri tura d widak n tterk
dacu ara teččeḍ
berkat ur smuhbulet ara
slan i leɛyaḍ deg uxxam-nni
am wass-a di lehna ad d-tuɣal
ad tɣilleḍ mazal lliɣ
ur tessineḍ ara tasertit
buɣni tuɣal d tamdint meqqren
sin n medden kan i d-iwennten tawlaft-iw
lukan meqqar din i telliḍ
ur nwiɣ ara bɣan ad ddun
iḥemmel tameṭṭut-is am mummu n tiṭ-is
inṭeḍ idis-is di lqaɛa
laẓ fad
tɣileḍ ur zmireɣ ara ad ssiwleɣ i baba
nezzi-d i yidurar d yiẓuɣaṛ
ttxil-k a sidi Ṛebbi
ur tedduḍ ara d umcum mi ara d-icehhed s ẓẓur
xedmen-as sin n isura ɣef yiran n tuyat-is icudd-it yes-sen
iḍelli kan i as-d-cfiɣ yekcem ɣer uɣerbaz amenzu ass-a yewweḍ ɣer tsedawit
yezwi icuḍaḍ ubernus-is iṛuḥ
yekka tawwurt yeffeɣ
Ḥemmleɣ tamacahut n tfunast n yigujilen
win ur nesɛi nnif awer t-id-yaf lexṛif
tazzla ur yeǧǧi kra ma d tassemt tugi ad tefsi
Ɣer tugat n uqcic-a
ulac-iten
nessaram mačči d taneggarut acku ad neɛreḍ amek ara nemcarak ad nemɛawan di kra n leqdic i ubaɣur n timmuzɣa
akken i tt-nettmenni
tameṭṭut ulac d acu tessutur ala tayri
iwakken ad nger aẓeṭṭa
ad izlu aɛejmi-nni zdat n umeɣlal
Ɣunfan-t
mazal ur wulfeɣ ara beṭṭu
deg tceqquft n umezgun yella unalas
ilugan n tseddast yerzan tutlayt yufa-ten-id umdan tamara ad imeslay akken i wakken ad t-fehmen medden
lemmer ur telliḍ
tewwi-t-id yid-s
d taḥeǧǧaǧt n tmes ur nettnus
acimi ur ggaren ara afus yergazen di ccɣel n wexxam
Ɛas kra
yiwen deg-wen ur d-itteffeɣ seg uxxam alamma d ṣṣbeḥ
suter
nnan diri wi iqeṭṭεen layas ccedda d talwit i tt-itebεen
s rqem ara d yeflali
si mḥemmed ikemmel ikes ayen i d-iqqimen si lmal-nni n laban
ibna dinna aɛaltaṛ i umeɣlal dɣa yendeh s yisem n umeɣlal
rebbaɣ fell-as tasa
efk-iyi-tt a baba ad tt-ččeγ
abrid yessekser
yugar-itt s wazal n tlata n yimuren di lqed
win ara yeṭṭṣen d lmal d lmut ara yemmet
ad k-rreɣ d illu ɣef ferɛun ma d gma-k haṛun ad k-yili d nnbi
yewwet azrem s aqerru
Ɣer yiwen n uɣerbaz i kecment
imeqqi-d d arẓagan
xellṣen-asen asafag ɣer maṣer ttun amussu-nsen
ur ttawit ara ayen ẓẓayen yid-wen
mačči deg-neɣ i tettlummum lameɛna deg umeɣlal
i wass mi ffɣen s adrar amek ara ten-iɣḍer lemnam
imiren inna i urgaz-nni Ẓẓel afus-ik
inuba isummet aqrab-is
iḥulfa i lejruḥ-nni imedlen bɣan ad d-ldin
d abrid i kem-id-iwwin ara kem-irren
theggamt
dɣa netta d anect-a i as-iɛeǧǧben aṭas i as-yernan di lebɣi
ad ilint d limaṛat n lewqat n wussan akked iseggasen
am wakken daɣen i tettunefk tegnit i tmenna n yisefra sɣur yimedyazen n taddart-agi
facebook ad d-yeffeɣ s teqbaylit ticki yewweḍ ɣer meyya seg meyya
ayen ara d-iqqimen ass wis tlata ad yerɣ di tmes
tezmer ad tesseɣli ula d atmaten-is di leɣrur n cciṭan
mi ara ad ikṛeh yiwen ad iḥemmel wayeḍ
ad tebdu tmeɣra-agi ɣef lɛecra d uzgen n yiḍ
Ṛṛuḥ-iw ad ken-iɣunfu
acḥal ara wen-d-isqam uxxam-a
netta d tmeɛzuzt-ines
yeṭṭef-iyi waṭṭan d azemni ur nḥellu
ur d-usiɣ ara iwakken ad d-awiɣ lehna lameɛna ajenwi
yyamt ad twalimt amkan ideg iẓẓel
ad ɛezleɣ agdud-iw ɣef ugdud-ik
kanɛan ad sen-yili d aqeddac
xḍumt-yi
dɣa lmuluk qerrben ɣur-s iwakken ad qedcen fell-as
yuba ixeddem ɣur-k
d akraren i yennuɣen ihi erret uzal s axxam
tameddit-a ad am-n-ceggεeɣ tansa n usmel-nni
Ɣer deffir i yettmili ɣas aswir ad yeḥeduder
win ur nenni amin
ur tettakreḍ ara
deg uxxam gezmen asirem unfen-iyi ad iliɣ akken bɣiɣ
d acu i issefraḥen deg-sen d wacu-ten wuguren i d-tettmagareḍ
tuɣ d iḍ
amzun d ajenniw i tt-izedɣen
mmet
ixdem-as ṛebɛa n txelxalin n ddheb issuli-tent i ṛebɛa n tɣemmar anda llan iḍarren-is
ma tesɛiḍ s wacu ara txelṣeḍ itiki
mačči d timuhbelt i hebleɣ neɣ d rray i ulac
winna kan imi tweɛɛa
Ɛyan deg tiẓtin n tneqlin
mi ara tettmuquleḍ ad tinigeḍ
ffɣemt sya
lecɣal n usebddad n ugellid cacnaq teddun akken iwata lḥal
mačči abrid mačči sin i aɣ-ɣeḍlen maca win yefkan aẓar ur yettagad ifer ma yeɣli
ddu kan
iswi agejdan n tuddsa d aseɛlem akked useḥbiber n umsider
yeldi lqahwa n baba-s yexdem
yessefk kan uheggi
ad yeggan ur yettǧefǧif
mɛanda n tnuḍin ɣer tceggaḍin
ala win yessnen i izemren
teḥlulim
cwiṭ seg tmucuha n leqbayel
nnwal n yemma daɛda d aziḍan
ad teččeḍ timerkucin
musa iɣumm udem-is axaṭer yugad ad imuqel ɣer yillu
bezzaf i yečča
Ḥemmleɣ tikli anda ulac imdanen
rnu ɣer waya sḥassfen nezzeh imi mazal-it meẓẓi yeǧǧan-asen-d lweḥc d ameqqṛan
mačči akken i t-ɣileɣ ziɣ d nekk kan i d niyya
tnehreḍ
s sɛaya n twacult acemma ur ixuṣ
akamyun awwah yettwaggad
yiwen n wass ad d-tuɣal
ulac-itt
Ččan akk armi i ṛwan
am wakken daɣen i yetturaǧu sya d afella ad tessufeɣ tasfift i yiman-is
yuba yenxez
bɣiɣ tom
akken uɣen tannumi yisdawanen n tubiret uragen-d s abrid ssuturen ad yeqleɛ udabu akked unagraw seg yiẓuran
aẓemt-d
nefka-d awal-nneɣ
yiwen n wass ad d-uɣaleɣ alamma d da
anda i d-tezga tesdawit
Ɛzizen deg tudert
ur yettɛeṭṭil ara ad yamed usideg n facebook ɣer teqbaylit
lleh-ɣaleb
almi d wis sbeɛyam
yemmeslay-d diɣ ɣef ufran n yiɛeggalen n tejmeɛt d wid n teseqqamut n taddart ass-a
xtaṛent-t
sembiwel taɣmiwin-im a Ṛebbi ḥrez atmaten-im
win yufan ayen ẓiden ur t-id-yessusuf ara
afran n wammud
lheffa n yiḍarren-im ur tt-nḥemmel ara
ass-a graɣ-d deg temrart
Ẓriɣ a taɛeggunt ẓriɣ d tullas i tḥemmleḍ d ayen ibanen
mi yendeh lbuq ad d-qerrben s adrar
snen-kan asekles d usentem
inṭeq yasuɛ inna-as anef tura
alamma d sebɛa n tikkal
tessers lqec-is
sɛeddi-yi-d tisent neɣ ih
maziɣ yerfed sima ɣer texxamt
yella sliman u muḥ
qrib ad d-ikcem yennayer
amek akka amdan ad yeggan akked ukanic deg usu
yemmeslay kra n wawalen d yid-s
kečč d ayaziḍ ma d nekk qefleɣ
maziɣ yefhem iman-is
Ǧeɛfer yeḥrec ula d nekk ur xuṣṣeɣ ara
isetḥa yidir ad as-yini i newwara
ad tafem d acu ara tɣeẓẓem
drus kan i as-izemren
mazla kan ad temmeslay ayen terfed deg wallaɣ-is
muqlet mliḥ
ur ččin acemma ass-a

ur ttmuqul ara ɣer deffir
twalaḍ yidir di tizi wezzu
Ḥbes ameslay
ad tent-tafeḍ kecmen deg wayen d-teqqar
bɣiɣ ad sutreɣ asandwich
yennum itett tɣawla
seqdec tagezzamt ma ulac ad tent-yaɣ udekkan
tebɣiḍ ad d-tiniḍ iruḥ ar marikan
yura-asen tabrat
yesɛedda akayad yuwi-t-id

tabrat i as-d-tuzen yeṭṭef-tt
iteddu-yak di nneqma

uriɣ-ak-n tabrat
yeḍfer amrar almi d tagust
yekrez tamurt-is s tyuga n yizgaren
neẓẓṭel ussan d wuḍan acḥal nsegerger n teqreɛtin
amarir n ddabax n uḍar yettcuddu isebbaḍen-is
awal zzayer yekka-d seg wawal-nniḍen tiziri
irḍel-iyi-d adlis ad t-ɣreɣ
yerfed ayen ur yettayal
ala taqerɛet i yessen
yessuter-iyi-d tom ansa i d-kkiɣ
yiwen n unelmad yettwaḥbes
Ṭbib n yeɣsan yerra-as-d tajbirt i jeddi ass mi yerreẓ
yal ass yettnekkar zik ad iruḥ ad yexdem
aselway n unejmuɛ i yidles akked tugdut yessawel-d i tikli di lezzayer tamanaɣt
tafat iɣef yettnadi urǧin i tt-yufi ar ass-a
ddunit-a mačči d axxam-iw
mazal ur tefhimemt ara taluft-nni
yettaqraḥ-iyi wul-iw ɣef imeɣban
yendi tifexxet yeṭṭef-d tayaẓiḍt
tabrat umeɣnas n teqvaylit
iḍ ameggaz dayen ɛyiɣ ass-a
massinissa d agellid n numidiya
ass mi nettruḥ ɣer lakul nleḥḥu azal n tmanya n ikilumitren ɣef uḍar
ugadeɣ ad iyi-tḥaz tmurt uraju
deg yiseggasen n sebɛin ggten yicennayen imḥaddiyen

deffir weɛrur-is neɣ ɛinani

amek i tettiliḍ
tesselqaf am umejruḥ

teṭṭef azgen seg-sent

aten-a ttmerkayen yiḍan deg tegnit-nni

ad k-idel Ṛebbi s ubeṛnus n sser
