ad txedmeḍ snat n txelxalin n ddheb ɣef yiran n ufella n tbanta
di leɛnaya-m seɣti-t
ul-is d ablaḍ
teffrem
yegra-tt deg lbal-is
ad am-iẓẓu Ṛebbi tigusa deg uxxam-im
neɣ yella deg wacu irewsent d wayen i mgaradent
nuli asawen
yesɛa iles
nefcel
ur d-ttaẓ ara
acimi ur tettɣimad ara ad tensed
ad teddum nekk ɣeṣbeɣ
ad yuɣal udeffel di tazwara d ddurt id iteddun
a wi hedṛen alama d ṣbeḥ ɣef igrawliwen iqbayliyen
aḥṛiq i d-yeǧǧa baba yuɣal d tiẓgi
ad nemzer deg tneɣrit
addag-nni yugi ad yernu ad yimɣur
ad teǧǧuǧgeḍ ad trennuḍ akken i nebɣa ad kem-nwali
afus-is d isixi
akken ad yeffer lbaḍna ur tt-ẓerren deg udrar ideg d-tṣubbeḍ aqjun yif-ik ɣur-sen
aɣyul d aɣyul ur yettuɣal d izem
yefka-yas tom abeqqa i mary
ulac xali-k di tessirt
iẓẓeg-itt-id ur turiw
zgan ttemyarun tibratin
yesbedd tom yiwet ara s-d-ixeddmen ad yečč
ur yeṣliḥ ara akk usegzawal-aki
wwten waman yeffeɣ-d unsis
am win yettseqqin i wasif
anwa ara nesteqsi
kker ma ulac aɣilif
yella ḥedd i yemmuten
ldiɣ yiwet n tiṭ
tella tin i d-ittnezzihen deg-k
asaru titanic d win yewwin arraz oscar n usaru ifazen
temlal tasa d way turew
ad s-d-alseɣ ad am-iniɣ
iwenneɛ kullec di tama-nwen
ass kul wa d acu i s-yefka
bɣan ad nnaɣen
ttarun-as tibratin yal aseggas
yella kra i wen-d-yuzen tom
tebren-as aqeṛṛuy
tfukk lgira
am uberriḍ ɣef ugertil
tugimt ad tserrḥemt
acuɣer mačči d iɣerbazen ara nbennu deg tudrin-nneɣ
sskecmen-tt s lpisṭu kan uma ur tessin kra
zzhir deg tikli ɣur-sen ur yelli
d kemm i d tameqqrant
bɣiɣ ad issinen amek i yettxemmim
adrar izdeɣ-it wurrif
yelha-yakent i kunemti
iceyyeɛ-awen-d tom kra n tɣawsa
azul isem-iw tom amek i ak-qqaṛen
yemmut ur d-yeǧǧi
ktil tardest teqqimeḍ
baba yewwi-yi-d cakula taberkant
lweḥc-ines iqerreḥ
ttaṛ uɛudiw ɣef uleggam
afus yenɣan ur yettrid seg idammen
akken ad nethenni
njemmeɛ-d tifyar ssya u ssya
anda ara tt-tawiḍ
allen yettneḥcamen zik
ad ifru lḥebb ɣef alim
yuɣ-iyi-d baba avilu
bɣiɣ ad issineɣ amek i tettxemmim
yekkat lɣiḍa n teylut d mmi-s i yesbendiren
yella walebɛaḍ i ak-d-isawlen
bɣiɣ ccṛab azeggaɣ di leɛnaya-k
tineɣrit tella teččur d inelmaden
yeḍfer-it akken tallit
Ԑyiɣ maḍi
iteddu s weɣṣab
ass-a kullec ifat-iyi
iṛṛeẓ wi gxicen
ata lxaṭer-iw d asellaw
aṭas n yitran i imeqqren ugar ɣef yiṭij-nneɣ
Ččant taxbizt iman-nsent
sarameɣ ad sɛuɣ aṭas n yedrimen
yiwen ur yesεa azref ad k-d-yini amek ara tṛebbiḍ mmi-k
a dda Ɛacur ɣur-k amur
s kra kkiɣ sseblaɛeɣ ssbagiti-inek tafurciṭ-iw tezga yid-i
qqim akken ur ttḥerrik ara akk
Ɣas d tilawt ahat ad yelhu d izen
yerẓa tacmuxt
tesɛam lḥeqq
wessiɛ yerna yettbin
d tiẓgi yemseččen
ur d-tefruriḍ deg ucekkiṛ
amek i tt-tenwiḍ taggara
d bu warwayen
yewwet-iyi tiyita n leɣder
axxam deg i yezdeɣ Ṛebbi
yella walebɛaḍ i yettfeṛṛiǧen
yemmut iḍelli
ilaq ad nesxen wawalen-a deg tektawt-ik
ad nettsennid ɣef tmara
d agris d usemmiḍ
kečč d bu sin wudmanwen
ur ǧǧin amkan
d ayen teḥliḍ maḍi
am win yettraǧun Ṛebbi
ufan akk iman-nsen
d lehlak ur nḥellu ur s-tenfiɛ ddwa
ur ḥezzen ara
d ccna sefhem-as lemtul
msenfalen s yidim
ay uzyin ḥader iman-ik
yerẓa abuqal
tessneḍ ad tsekreḍ seksu
anwa urar i s-iɛeǧben
ilaq ad teǧǧeḍ yir skra tesεiḍ d yir tannumi
ur iyi-tuqiɛ ara lmeɛna
tom yejreḥ deg ufud-is azelmaḍ mi yella deg uluɣmu
yerra lferḥ deg uceqquf
nerra-tt kan i ucali
ur teɛyiḍ ara seg uḥṛiṛet
ilaq-iyi ad uɣaleɣ
teqqaṛem di tesdawit n bgayet
simmal nettali ar igenni
hess-iyi-d qbel ad truḥeḍ
zzman ad s-d-iḥudd tilas
ffeɣ-d seg tneɣrit
limam ittẓalla weḥd-s
myagren iḍelli d lwiza
d tasa n umṛabeḍ
ahat teǧǧa-t tmacint
tom yenna-d ala
iffeẓ iles-is
tom d asusam
ukren-as tiɣawsiwin-is i tom
d nekk ara tt-ifersen
mlaleɣ-d imawlan-ik iḍelli
tom yebɣa ad t-yerr akken kan mi ara tfakkeḍ yess
win ur nesɛi lmal imal
ass mi njebbu di tɣaltin
timmetrit tarda n tqessult
mi ara d-iḍelq usigna
mi meyyzeɣ ad rreɣ akka afeɣ-d iman-iw akkin
acuɣer i s-teɛǧeb
amek armi i d-tettmennimt akanic
yella ḥedd i yeṭṭalayen tom
ur ttmeslay ara
ass-n anwi i d as-yennan
teggan ɣef udekkan
ttemyebbin am iɛdawen
kkremt ma ulac aɣilif
yal awal yesεa lmeεna-s
dɣa seg wass-n yuɣal d anelmad-is
akka kan nekni tura
tura qqimen igennuren
tuɣ imir-n yesmmed tlatin n yiseggasen deg tudert-is
anwa i d bab-is
ayen i yi-teǧǧiḍ
yefla lǧib-is
ad akent-id-aruɣ tibratin
tettbineḍ-d thelkeḍ
anwa ara tissinem
ziɣ deg-k ur d-igri wara
menni-d kra n tɣawsa
anta ara nesteqsi
asɣan n tneslemt leqder ur t-yefki i tmeṭṭut
lmal mucafaɛ
yella walebɛaḍ i wen-d-isawlen
armi nnuɣeɣ d usirem
kemm d mm tirga
am win isennden s uffal
tella kra n yiwet i yegnen ɣef wussu-yaki
d acu tettnadid swaswa
tom d bu tṣelbuɛt
yemma tseww-iyi-d timellalin timcewcin
yebɣa ad s-yezweǧ i mmi-s
d aɣeṛbi neɣ d aceṛqi abrid yiwen
iḍelli ṭṭfeɣ-d inisi
yussem tom s tidet anaɣ
mačči d ṛṛay i xuṣṣeɣ
uɣeɣ-d tayuga isebbaḍen
ajdaɛ d mmi-s n tegmert
yettheyyi tom imensi
atan la yettali lefjer kul wa axxam-is ijmeɛ-it
yella wi d-yessefran adrug-nni
ass mi n-ufiɣ agraw yeččur
ad wen-nernu imesnsi
swant lqahwa s uyefki
afrux yezha ibennu lɛecc-is
ahat ara naf ddwa n temsal
iḥemmel yelli-s n xali-s
arrac n at yeḥya musa seklasen deg common voice
yella kra n yiwen i yeṭṭalayen
d amḥaddi i tent-ittaɣen
at wasif d wat Ɛisi ad adren ɣer tizi
mi waleɣ seg-m
yella win i d-yeskadben
yebda-d uzɣal
di leɛnaya-nwen xedmem-t
dagi i ɣ-teɣli timiḍt
yebda tom ameslay
fiḥel ad tt-id-tessawweḍ
bɣant ad hewwsent ar marikan
ad k-iǧǧ Ṛebbi d timint
yella walebɛaḍ i s-isawlen i tom
yesɛibin meskin yitbir-ihin
aqeccaḍ di tiṭ n cciṭan
ur bɣiɣ ara kan ad dduɣ yid-m d aya
axi buh
yella win i wumi tebɣiḍ ad teɣṛeḍ
ur tettmettareḍ ara
Ɣas ad d-yeɣli yiḍ ad qqimeɣ ar d-tawḍeḍ
ad netbeɛ lateṛ i ɣ-d-ğğan
sgunfumt kra
illa deg wawal
yella walebɛaḍ i yeldin tawwurt
ad ttwannḍeɣ deg usu
ddwa n lqerḥ-a d tuqqda
ass kamel nutenti ssexdament deg-nteɣ
tella kra n tɣawsa i tebɣamt
ydduqes wul n buǧemεa mi tt-ẓrant wallen-is
yejbed iman-is
aqcic-nni d imciṭṭen
lsas-is ur iṣeḥḥa ara
yečča aqerruy-nsen
lliɣ ugdeɣ εṭen
ass mi d-luleɣ d ass amcum
yugem tagdurt n tsusmi
ad temsenḍaḥ tkerrust akked ukamyun
yella win i yukren iṣuṛdiyen-iw
iεǧeb-iyi ad yeḥmu lḥal mliḥ
ruḥ kan ɣer zzat
ansa i d-kkant tullas-nni
tid ara d-ilalen
tekkat lǧayḥa
kkateɣ iteddem wasif
ma teεyiḍ steεfu
akken ur s-ttḥessiseɣ ara
itettel deg awal irennu
kul wa amek i t-tgezmeḍ
dayen tfukkemt
ad m-d-zziɣ s tid qerriḥen
ur ttembiwil ara
berrun i yimeẓẓuɣen-nsen
ur tessineḍ ara tasdawit n bgayet
zemreɣ ad k-awiɣ ɣer unafag iḍ-a
nesḥassef
Ẓriɣ amek ara fruɣ aɣbel-nni maca nnan-iyi-d ur s-qqar ara
wwet uzzal ad k-ɛeqlen
ass yefkan mazal wayeḍ
amdan-agi d bu lekluf
sseɛdel asɣar mi zegzaw
aql-iken iman-nwen
rju ad nẓer acu i ɣ-d-yeǧǧa tom
iban ur d-tecliεeḍ
yiwen ur d- yessugen ad yemlil uselway n marikan d win n kurya ugafa
rremt tibagusin-nkent
d tidet dɣa tettuḍ amulli-k
teffɣem-d akk s iberdan
s ccfaya-s sɛeddayeɣ ussan
iger tizit ɣer tmeẓẓuɣt
anwa i d-yennan akka
tiṭ-ik di tmiḍt-ik
swiɣ aman n wedrar
yella walebɛaḍ i yessnen mmi-s
anwa ara ken-yawin
acimi ur d-truḥeḍ ara ad tḥedreḍ i tmeɣra-w
nnan-iyi-d ur xeddmeɣ ara annect-a
yella win i d-yusan
Ẓer iman-im di lemri
rbeɛṭac deg yunyu d ass n weɣlan aqbayli
aweḍ ɣur-s d lmeṛsul
ad yeɣli ad m-yeǧǧ amkan
urant-as tabrat iḍelli
atan snulfant-d ikanicen di temdint n bgayet
yenwa d akanic ara t-yerren d aṛumi
srid seg bumerdas
yelha-yawen i kunwi
wali rrif-ik
ttbineɣ-ak-d d tin ihennan
yella kra n yiwen i s-iluɛan i tom
deg uzal i kem-id-mlaleɣ
acḥal n tefyar i teskelsemt
ass-a yessawel-d lajel-iw
dda sliman d amedyaz ifazen akk
am win yeẓgen yir lmal
amek ara smeḥseɣ
zzman bu tlufa
tura lmeḥna barka-am ad am-ğuğgen wussan
aḥbib d lxezna n lbaṛud
leɣṛama ad nernu tiɣrit
ayaziḍ idden i yixf-is
yeqqar d amasiḥi i yella maca izellu deg lɛid
Ԑerḍeɣ ad qennεeɣ yiwen n wemdakel akken ur izewweǧ ara
ttaruɣ-as tibratin yal ass
aki-d ma telliḍ d uḥdiq
tella kra n yiwet i yemmuten
ixneq-it wuccen
tom yerra iman-is yecɣel
yella kra i tettum
d ayagi i yi-fnan
tettfuḥu-d yir rriḥa
win ibɣan cuccu izlu beɛɛu
yella kra n yiwen i d-iṛuḥen
tinna akken i ğğiɣ tettru mi ɛeddan laɛwam
sizdeg taxxamt-ik
yella walebɛaḍ i d-iluɛan tura
ur yi-gezzmemt ara awal
ahat yella kra i iwala tom
ur cukkeɣ ara yella win i s-yeslan
akken wwin wwin-iyi
ur yi-tettalaseḍ acemma
ajenwi iεelleq nnig-iw
d axxam i ixedmen lexla
iwwi d iman-is
yella walebɛaḍ i yettnezzihen
ttif awal ɣef nnwal
tom d win ireffun
a tafsut d kemm i d tudert
ur yuẓam ur yečči
isberquqay-d umqerqur-nni seg tbettit
ass mi lliɣ d askuti
ittzad yirij i tmes-iw
d acu tenwiḍ ad xedment
ur tezmireḍ ara ad s-trewleḍ
tesɛiḍ allen d tizegzawin
s isudal la teṭṭḍen
Ɣef acḥal ssaɛa i d-tewwḍem ar da
ugadeɣ ad afgeɣ
a tiziri deg-m i ɛecqeɣ
ur ḥemmu ara akken
ad dduɣ yid-k ad teẓreḍ tamdint
yeɣli lǧameɛ deg merruk mmuten rebɛin n medden sdaxel
tella kra n yiwet i yettfeṛṛiǧen
Ḥemmleɣ akken i tḥemmleḍ
ur t-ttlaɛajet ara
ar wanda i yeffeɣ
uḥwaǧeɣ-ken ad txedmem yiwet n tɣawsa
tettbineḍ-d n japu kečči
temxellemt meṛṛa
ziɣ iban d acu-t
fell-am ay εetbeɣ
uyseɣ ar d-tawḍeḍ deg-m ttrajiɣ
uɣeɣ-d tarkasin iḍelli
a-tt-aya ad kem-in-taweḍ
ad irwi iẓẓan s ufus
tella tin i yukren ṭṭezḍam-iw
sεiɣ tadiwennit assa ɣef ssaεtin d uzgen
yella kra i tesfuḥayeḍ
beṛka aḥṛiṛet
ala mi εetben wiyaḍ
d iḥlalaḍan d iblalaḍen skedd tamurt ur ttawḍen
ad ak-id-ḥku kulci mxalfa
kfan-t wallen-iw dayen-nni
ur ssinent ara tasdawit n bgayet
ass-a ḥedṛeɣ i yiḍan
tom d marie llan xeddmen deg lmina ucerbun asmi ten-tuɣ d igerdan
ur ssinent ara ad xedment tasertit
bɣant ad d-awint akanic ar wexxam
Ɣelqent-d akk tewwura
wid ara iqqerṣen
meḥsub ur yezmir ara ad yerwel tom
anda ara rrent tmelḥanin-nni
ansa i ffɣent
yella win i yettmuqqulen
Ɛni yusa-d tom
d aruy i d-yeffɣen syin
sliɣ i walebɛaḍ yettberriḥ
izmer ad d-tṛuḥ
mennan-d ad ḥewwsen ar legniz
ikfa ṭṭbel ifra wurar
ay aḥbib n tegrawla ddu-d yid-i
Ɛawnem-iyi ad ffɣeɣ
yeḥma useqqi
tezgam tettḥewwisem ar tmurt-nni
melken-k lehyuf
tteɣraṣemt seg teḍsa
ad truḥem wakali
tḥemmel tiɣawsiwin tiqdimin
akli iɛelleq seg imiḍ
ur tesseɣ ara akk
yella kra n yiwen i d-ijerḥen
ur yessin ara tasdawit n bgayet
ammus ɣef leεḍam yettban
ur teǧǧiḍ amkan
ad tkerseḍ absis
tebɣamt ad tissinemt tanhaṛt
ttasen-d si yal amkan
tecfa-d i ṭṭrad iɛeddan
yeẓẓa tagrurt
ur bɣiɣ ara ad tuɣalem ar boston
yiwen yemmut wayeḍ d lḥenni ara s-qqnen
Ḥebsem imenɣi di leɛnaya-nwen
kra ur t-sεiɣ d ajdid
aman-is la ḥemmun
anta i yecfan fell-as
Ḥader-itt tinna d rruḥ-iw
ur yenfiɛ i wacemma usegzawal-aki
tessardeḍ iceṭṭiḍen
sɛiɣ tameddakelt deg taddart n Ɛin zawiya
tella kra n yiwet i ikecmen ar texxamt
tebɣiḍ ad neskasi fell-as
ixṛeb wayen yuran
tella kra n yiwet i yeldin tawwurt
mačči d taɣallit i telliḍ
yečča tom s usixef
ittuger ccedda talwit
ffɣen-d akk s iberdan
wwin-d akanic ar wexxam-nsen
akken d aciban yettruḥ ad idṛagi deg tesdawit
yella kra i akent-id-iceyyeɛ tom
tetteccef akken iwata
yella win i yettfeṛṛiǧen deg tom
anda i yi-izgel unezgum
tessneḍ iman-ik
yettlussu aserwal d azeggaɣ
ad m-d-awiɣ kra ad t-teččeḍ
zgan ttɣaman ar tewwurt
anef-iyi ad xelṣeɣ
amek i ttilin meṛṛa
atan tom yenna-d yufa iman-is
yečča lḥir ɣef yimmal n tmaziɣt
s lekdeb i ttseqqin
am yizi af tfidi
xuṣṣent tezrawin n tedimugrafit deg tmurt-nneɣ
d lqedd ucacfel
win yeččan deg ass ur iḍurr yiwen
d kemm ara d-yekkren zik azekka
senqeṣ ṣṣut-ik
am win yectaqen aserwal
isem-iw Ḥmed
beddlemt iceṭṭiḍen-nkent
zewǧeɣ ur ɛezriɣ ara
tuli-ten tɣebbart seg wissen anwa zzman
nekk ɣur-i taqbaylit tif-itent di kulci
iwweḍ anda ara naweḍ
sefḍem imeṭṭawen-nwen
am wi iseṭṭlen i ugujil
yella kra i twalam
ad d-ffɣen akk s iberdan
wa d lṭufan
ilaq ad twaliḍ amejjay
tessexdam ayefki i tẓidanin-nni
ttettbinemt-d mecɣulit
aṭas ara d-yeddun deffir
tamegra s isennanen
yella kra i tettuḍ
kkiɣ-d seg imi n tlafsa
d taksumt d nnefs d umenzay iɣef iteddu
zgan ttḥewwisen ar tmurt-nni
taqcict-a ẓriɣ-tt yakan
Ɛiwed ini-t-id
ultma cabḥa ur tḥemmel ara udi n tfunast
zzin-d fell-as imceddalen
ssnen-aɣ
asɣar s wurɣu iḥulfa
ur ẓriɣ ara ma cfiɣ ɣef yisem-ik
ad ɛeddiɣ ar wexxam
tettṛuḥuḍ ar ssinima yal ssmana
tom yexdeɛ mary
ass-a ad d-mlileɣ d mmi-s n leḥṛam d unekkaṛ lxir
tḥemmel aẓawan
ttasen-d si yal tamdint
ma ulac-ikem ad yi-txaṣṣeḍ
amer ad ṣfun wussan
yenwa yelha tsertit
tezza-d iɛeqqayen n lḥemmeẓ deg uḍajin
d netta i t-id-yessufɣen akka d acennaf
d lbaṭaṭa yeqlan i tessewwayeḍ
amisil swayes i d-ẓedmen yewwi aṭas n terwiḥin
fell-asent i la tetzuxxumt akka
jeddi-twen mazal-it yehlek
uɣalen watmaten-ik s axxam
wicqa ma txedmeḍ-as ifelfel aberkan
d acu i tebɣiḍ ay aderɣal
am wakken yefka-as rray
imɣaren-a ala ɣef ddabex ay ttmeslayen
ayɣer i t-tenɣiḍ
yella wacu ara nečč neɣ ur d-teǧǧim wara
zgan εyan yiɣyal n taddart-a
Ṭṭfeɣ-d tlata n yimerga
d tiqulhatin kan i d ccɣel-is
uɣalen watmaten-im s axxam
tzemreḍ ad trefdeḍ akk annect-a
yezga iḥebbes wegdil segmi i sbeddeɣ asnas-a
attan tesseqcaṛ tiskert
zemrent ad xedment weḥd-nsent
acu ara teččem
anamek n tefgurt-a ur iban d acu-t
akken i sent-txedmemt kifkif
ilaq ad asen-tinim tidet
tzemremt ad tkemmlemt axeddim-nni armi deg iḍ
tefriḍ-tt d yiman-im neɣ mazal
d nutenti i yesxeṛben kullec
acḥal ziḍ seksu s yibawen
Ɛni tettḥessisemt-asen i widak
ad aɣ-d-tawiḍ lhemm
susem deg leɛnaya-k la teqqaṛ
ziɣen iɣelli swab deg tmara
kemmlemt axeddim-nkent skud teḥmamt
ruḥ ad d-terreḍ lmal
d acu akka i la txeddmem din
kcem-d a yidir
asma ur qqaren ara
yuɣ-itt-id akken tefla
akken i sent-txedmeḍ kifkif
amnir i d isem-is
Ččiɣ tikeṛmusin armi taqfeɣ
taqcict mi tres
ilaq-ak ad tgezmeḍ aksum-nni d timettufin uqbel ad t-teččeḍ
ur ččiɣ ara imensi
ur sbehbay ara
fru-aɣ-d aɣilif-a n tusnakt yerẓan aqerruy-nneɣ
kemmlem
i nekk i wumi txedmeḍ akk annect-a
bezzaf i ttetteḍ a wletma
Ččuṛeɣ d lecɣal ass n letnayen
ur stewtiwet ara
ferḥeɣ imi sεiɣ axxam ara y-ijemεen
d Ṛebbi i yeẓṛan "amek i teẓṛamt"
anwi i m-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi
yuggad ad d-ikcem axaṭer teggull deg-s yemma-s
deg tlata n yiseggasen i tesɣaray
d lbaṭaṭa yeqlan i tessewwayem
ad ak-d-rnuɣ ayefki
iger-iw yuɣal d asuki
rfed-itt sers-itt d ifelfel d ṭumaṭic
tessnem ad tṛebbim llufanat
ayɣer i teggummaḍ ad d-tiniḍ tidet
tesɛiḍ cwiṭ n waman deg tkeṛṛust-im
ibeddel-as tabessast i mmi-s wehment deg-s
fell-as i turamt asefru-nni
iqbayliyen ḥemmlen tajapunit
lemḥibba-nwen d aɣilif
aṭas aya segmi i ḥebseɣ akeyyef
tezga d agellus n tudert-is
d acu-nniḍen i tebɣiḍ
lemmer ad s-ssutreɣ kra ad yagi
ur d-rrin ara agelzim s axxam
Ɛni d kečč ara ydebbṛen fell-as
Ɛni ulac d acu ara ad txedmem tura
rnu-as aman neɣ ad ireɣ
lemmer ad sen-ssutreɣ kra ad agin
ur tessinem ara ad tesxedmem aselkim
ad awen-t-id-aɣeɣ
ssefruri-aɣ-d taremmant ad nedhu deg-s
ayɣer i tḥemmlemt ad teqqimemt weḥd-nkent
ayen i as-d-yenna ur iɛedda ara kan akka
texdem-d timadlanin am tid n tḥanut
efk-aɣ ad nsew tiqit n waman
ulac win yellan deg texxamt-a
anef-asen kan d iferṭeṭṭa n yiḍ
d asterwes kan
mɣin-d ibawen deg tebḥirt-ik
anda ara kem-id-afeɣ umbeɛd
ur tezmirem ara ad trefdem wa
mi tewweḍ s axxam
ay amddakel ma ur telliḍ d ameɛdazu ma ur tettɣanfiḍ lxedma d nekk ara ak-yawin  ad txedmeḍ yerna s tidet
amek i s-qqaṛen i umcic s tɛebrit
ilaq ad texḍuḍ i ccemma
i nutni i wumi txedmemt akk annect-a
theyya yemma acedluḥ i tɛacuṛt
itteẓẓeg ɣer beṛṛa
ayen tennum tettḥusu yes-s
tefriḍ-tt d yiman-ik neɣ mazal
cwiyya-t kan uksum-a yeččur d tasemt
Ɛuddeɣ ad d-yas
isuḍaf d snasel i yimeɣban
deg tira tif tamacint
Ɛeddi-d ɣer tesdawit
iban d netta i tt-ixedmen
cfiɣ asmi i yi-tesɣaṛay yemma agemmay
Ččiɣ-as seksu s ubisaṛ wellah ma teṛwiḍ-t
ad tedduḍ yid-neɣ ɣer lexla
d lawan n yimensi a tarwa
fella-s talwit d argaz lɛali
azemmur leqḍen-t zzit ur t-ṛwin
ansuf yes-kent ar uxxam
ffɣen akk wat taddart i wakken ad nadin ɣef uqcic-nni ur d-nban ara
gma-k d win akken yezgan s tqemjet tadalt neɣ ala
neḥsa d ta i tudert
mačči dayen ara tesber
awi-d aman merriɣ mliḥ wučči-a
diri win yesnagaren
Ɣer ccɣel rẓen yifassen-im
ur ttcekkiret ara iman-nwen
kra ur iyi-ixus
maca maziɣ mačči am wiyaḍ
d taqbaylit i ken-yerran d imdanen
rekben deg tkerrust
ur yefhim ara d acu i d-tenniḍ
wexxeṛ akin ma ulac ad terɣeḍ
kečč tessneḍ amek ad as-tṛuḥeḍ i ddunit
tufamt iman-nkent deg uxeddim amaynut
inurar-nneɣ uɣalen d rreḥba n umennuɣ
d taqbaylit i ken-id-yessekren
yeččur uxxam d abbu
am seksu mebla lmerqa
d acu i d ssebba n waṭṭan-ik
xdemt-asent akken i wen-xedment
d tudert am ta iɣef d-ttmeslayeḍ
kra n iseqsiyen qqimen war tiririt
d acu i yeḍṛan
Ɛni d tugna-w
ur kem-id-ufiɣ ara din iḍelli
Ḥemmleɣ ileɣman
ihi wwtemt iqeṛṛa-nkent ɣer lḥiḍ
ixdem deg-s ayen yessen
aru akken iwata
ula d nettat tedda-yas deg ṭṭuɛ
kker ad nefteṛ
dɣa ibder-d kra n yismal web n usideg s teqbaylit
Ɛni ur ḥudren ara aqjun-nni
teɛrek-d snat teḥbal n weɣrum
ur ssemɣar ara iman-im
cukkeɣ yella kra i d-ittheyyi tom
d luluf i yettmettaten s tkeryas deg yiberdan yal aseggas
ur kent-id-ufiɣ ara din iḍelli
imawlan-is εawnen kra wi i asen-yessutren timεiwna
tidak msakit ddrent kan
sarameɣ fukken fell-am iɣeblan
yettqadar yidir yessetma-s
d netta i yettsewwiqen
anef-as ur as-rennu ara
ayen i d-yenna yidir yewqem
mačči d yiwet i yuɣen sliman
ur d-tkeffu ara awal zdat baba-s
tennam-as i baba-s
Γef yiman-ik kan i tettxemmimeḍ
d acu ara m-d-yawi uḥebber
tgerrez teswiɛt
ttaɣent-d aɣrum yal ass
tilufa n zzman
Ɛacen s wayen i d-ttakken lexlawi-nsen
imir-nni dɣa gma-s n mḥend yeffeɣ-d seg uxxam-is
ay asmi i ččiɣ yemma
kemmel axeddim-im skud teḥmiḍ
iferru tilufa n medden
ur tessen ara lqahwa
ur aɣ-d-wwin ara ad nečč
ur iṣeḥḥa ara yiẓri-w i tenhert
d acu ara tarumt
d acu-t yennayer ɣur-wen
melmi i tebdiḍ tanhert
d yiwen i la yettnadin axeddim
d acu i tura
uɣeɣ-as-d taqendurt i yelli
wissen ma ad as-neḥder i wass-nni
ad d-tsiwlem
nekk yid-m dayen
ssuffeɣ-d ayen i tettḥulfuḍ
Ččiɣ ayaziḍ di lkuca
sliman ur yesteɛfay ara
d kennemti i yesxeṛben kullec
win ara ihudden yella
Γriɣ di tmenqas
nɣan-iyi yixemmimen
d acu i ken-yewwin ɣur-sent
ur asent-qqar acemma
teεreq-ak tenhert
nniɣ-as i baba
armi d tura i d-ikcem
yewɛer aṭas ad tessirdeḍ tikerciwin
taqcict-a tettarra taqemmuct
mɣin-d ibawen deg tebḥirt-nkent
ad d-awin iseɣ
ur ssineɣ ara ad nehreɣ
ur sεuẓẓugemt ara
ma yugar-d kra ad rnuɣ
ur tessineḍ ara ad tesxedmeḍ aselkim
tesεiḍ aɣbel waqila
tameddit ad nehder
d acu i kent-yewwin ɣur-sent
ar tameddit
i nekk i wumi txedmemt akk annect-a
iyyaɣ anebdu
s wallen n tayri
tessew-d lqahwa
d aselmad
hder neɣ qqim
d acu i txedmeḍ akka daɣen a bu txeṣṣarin
fakeɣ
d yemma-s ihedder yal iḍ s wallen amzun yeqqar-as acimi a yemma i iyi-d-tesɛiḍ
amzun deg tillas i nteddu ur neẓri anda i neggar aḍar
uɣalen yemyurar ttnuzun amzun d sselɛa
awi-d kra n lqahwa ma teqqim-d
ur tesɛi ara tilelli
kra i ḥawten deg-s ur d-yenni awal
anwa i d-yannan awal-agi
illa d aselmad-iw n tusnakt
xdemt-as akken i wen-texdem
armi ɣ-yeεreq wawal
ur yezmir i tuɣalin ɣer deffir
teɣli-yas tḍebsit deg ufus
d tidett ur tessineḍ ara ad tɛumeḍ
teǧǧamt weltma-tkent weḥd-s
lezzayer tamanaɣt tḥella-d amkan wis tlata gar tmanaɣin yumsen akk deg umaḍal
d Ṛebbi i yeẓṛan "amek i teẓṛam"
ad tsellkemt iqeṛṛa-nkent dinna
tḥemmleḍ aqellal n tmurt n yeqbayliyen
teṛṛẓam-d aqeṛṛu-yiw s lḥess-nwen
tettxemmim am nettat am urgaz
sima ur as-d-yuli awawl
ibeddel adrum s uɣrum
ur asent-d-yefki ara udem
tebɣa-d yemma-s izegzawen i d-yusan seg ssuq n sidi Ɛic
ma teεyiḍ lqeḍ idɣaɣen
ibelleɛ iman-is
fell-asent i turamt asefru-nni
lemmer ad wen-ssutreɣ kra ad tagim
tecfam melmi i t-txedmem
ttxemmim cwiṭ
ladɣa mi ara yiliɣ deg yir lḥala
i ḥemmleɣ deg yennayer d seksu s ubisaṛ d uyaziḍ
ihegga kullec i zzwaǧ-is
d acu i kem-id-yewwin ɣur-i
fkan-as azal i ddunit
ur ttneẓma ara i uzekka
tzemrem ad txedmem weḥd-nwen
tesɛiḍ cclaɣem
seg ansi i s-d-kan idrimen-nni
Ṭebbeg sya
iwala-ten-id rebbi
ur yessin ara ad inher
iɣeblan lxiq urfan
anwa i k-yewwten a mmi
yefka-d afus
berka astehzi
yuker-awent
tḥemmlem aqellal n tmurt n yeqbayliyen
yerna taεẓegt
yewwet deg yifassen-is
tṛuḥem ɣer din ur iyi-d-tennim ara
ur ttrut ara fell-i
ur d-yeddi ara deg wawal
anti i m-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi
ttaɣ awal ad trebḥeḍ
ur iεeṭṭel ara yufa yidir axeddim
d acu akka i la txeddmeḍ din
yelha usmel-nni neɣ cwiya-t kan
rnu xemmem
yelha usmel-nni neɣ ulac akk
s teqbaylit ara d-banen gar tmura
issexdam umenṭag-ihin tiḥraymit
imawlan-is lhan ma d netta d lxiṛ kan
yerfa yidir
d azgar i yezger
ayɣer i teffrem fell-asen akk annect-a
ulac win i d-ikkren yessen
amek i tesɛeddayem yennayer
yuḍen uzger qqden aɣyul
acḥal i nurar tuqqna tuffra
d taqbaylit i kem-id-yefkan
tḥemmlemt aqellal n tmurt n yeqbayliyen
acimi i yebɣa yidir ad iruḥ
seksu aleǧǧam
d tamzelt ẓẓayen maḍi
ttxil-k ḍebbeṛ-iyi-d kra n lxedma
tuɣem-d aɣrum
err akkin iḍarren-ik
ad d-siwlen
sɣur wumi i sent-d-kan idrimen-nni
ur iferres ur yettleqqim ur ineqqec
ihi wwtet iqeṛṛa-nwen ɣer lḥiḍ
acimi ur d-tettakeḍ ara afus
ad tuɣaleḍ ad tfehmeḍ
ad tessewweḍ neɣ ad tessirdeḍ leḥwal
d taqbaylit i theddṛem akka
iclex-iyi tuyat-iw
ad ak-gezmeɣ awal s tament
ma teɛǧeb-ikem awi-tt
ur ttxemmiment ara akk
ur stehzay ara di ttrebga n yemma-k
ur ḥeqqer ara iman-ik
uɣal urbiḥ
s anda ara terreḍ aqerru-k
acimi lehdur-agi imerka
ur heddreɣ ara tafransist am yidir
tuɣaleḍ d argaz
ddan iḍarren-is
d acu i d ssebba n waṭṭan-nwen
d tigi i d tisutriwin-ik s umata
seqcer-iyi-d kra n tkeṛmusin ma ulac fell-as
ur tnehher ara tmeṭṭut-iw
d taqbaylit i theddṛemt akka
iɛǧeb-am lḥal
tuɣal-asen d tannumi yal mi ara mlilen ad d-zlun ayaziḍ
ugint ad imɣurent
wis ma tesneḍ tamacahut n sin yiferḍasen
Ṣṣbuḥ ɣef rebbi mačči fell-ak
ad sellkent iqeṛṛa-nsent dinna
saεid bu tlufa
yeččur wul-is meskint win tufa ad as-teḥku
yeqqes-itt uzrem yeǧǧa-yas ssem-is
i nekk i wumi txedmem akk annect-a
dayen refdeɣ ifassen-iw
ayɣer i teffremt fell-as akk annect-a
seyyeq
yuɣal ṭṭelm ɣef umeksa
sakken yeldi-d allen-is
sliman yettaɣ yeznuzu
ur tt-kkateɣ ara
melmi kan i bdiɣ tanhert
tban tuzert ɣef udmawen-nwen
d imerga neɣ d iǧeḥmam tura wi
ur k-yekkat ara ur ttaggad
ur yefhim ara taluft-nni d acu-tt
sliman yeččur d timɛayin
tesεuẓẓeg terra iman-is ur d-tesli ara
wwin-t ɣer sbiṭar
ad yeḥbes deg tasaft neɣ deg iɣil n wammas
tuker-iyi
ur iṛuḥ ur yeqqim yettezzi kan
iwala-yaɣ-d rebbi
aṭas i truḍ fell-asent
tceggeb-itt taluft-nni
zwi ijulal-ik truḥeḍ
a tin yeḍran yid-sen
anwa i m-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi
ur teẓri ma d imeslayen i as-yeqqar i tt-isuzunen
teǧǧa-d lɣiba-s lweḥc
uriɣ ungal
taselmadt asmi i ibda iɛennu-tt-id
lḥir yella lebɣi ulac
tbubb gma-s amecṭuḥ
nuɣal d taḍṣa n leǧnas
susmemt deg leɛnaya-nkent la teqqaṛ
ur ttru ara fell-as
ad d-yawi iseɣ
d kennemti i yeẓṛan d acu i kent-ilaqen
ad as-gerrzen wussan
wwten-as ɣer lǧib di ssuq
irfed ifassen-is s igenni ad iεenni
yal mi ara d-taweḍ akken ad d-temmeslay as-truḥ tebɣest
a wer d-yekk lɛib sɣur-k
tameṭṭut-a d timnecreḥt
leqbayel ttemḥaddin lawan-nni mi ara mmlaqan deg leswaq n waεraben leǧwayeh n sṭif
firefox d iminig igerrzen
lmaεun yesqerbuben
di ṭṭiq i d-ittban wergaz
ttɛasant win iten-id-ixelqen
ikcem-d neɣ mazal
melmi ara timɣureḍ a winnat
tefreɣ-iyi targit
tuɣ tmes
acḥal aya ur tenhireḍ waqila
yidir akked newwara d ijenyuren
Ɣas ulamma wiyaḍ cceɣlen s uṭili ɣer ɣur-s
annar akka i yettwarwat ma d yelli-k wi yebɣun yaɣ-itt
ad as-t-tiniḍ dɣa
ad d-sawalen
yebra-d lmal
ad tuɣalem ad tfehmem
ilguritment-a ttwaru akken selḍen tifyar n teqbaylit
yezzem iman-is
ur tessinemt ara ad tesxedmemt aselkim
tizzit di ccetwa
qqimeɣ qqureɣ
urgaɣ targit tessewḥac
kraḍ n tunṭiqin i yesɛa wawal "tawacult"
lḥu syagi
Ɛeslama-nwen
eẓd ticcert n yifelfel syen rnu-t i tgulla-nni
ad asen-d-yerr asirem
tbubbeḍ taɛkemt ẓẓayet
Ɛni d kečč ara ydebbṛen fell-i
yennecraḥ wudem-ik
ur tkeččmeḍ ara s axxam
ur asent-d-tuqiɛ ara
d acu i tugadem ma tennam-d tidet
iger-as amcic deg uqelmun
aẓet akkin
ur yi-d-qqar acemma
iwala-tt-id rebbi
iḥemmel llebsa n yeqbayliyen

d kennemti i d ssebba n waya
ad tefreḥ yemma
ad isellek aqeṛṛu-yis dinna
lehdur-is d ddwa
mi ara yetqelleq yidir isusum kan
aṭas i d-iɛreḍ ɣer tmeɣra n zzwaǧ-is
kemmel axeddim-ik
yuɣal-d sser tamurt
bɣiɣ ad tḥebseḍ ur yi-d-teṭṭfaṛeḍ ara
Ẓriɣ belli tcedhaḍ yidir
ttarran taqemmuct
mačči tura ara nehder ɣef ccɣel-a
ad as-tiniḍ gar sin myussanen seg zik yerna yella wayen iten-ijemɛen
xdemt-asen akken i wen-xedmen
yebra i yimeẓẓuɣen-is
ur iban ara ssuq-is
lemmer ad sent-ssutreɣ kra ad agint
ur ttɛeṭṭileɣ ara ad d-uɣaleɣ
ur ḥsin ara ula d taqcict tesɛa ul
Ɛmiṛuc u muḥ ibeddel
d baba-s i t-iɛeggcen
d taqcict neɣ d ayen-nniḍen i ak-yehwan
tɣab leḥmala seg wulawen
yufa-d sin iniɣman yeddem yiwen
aẓet-d ar da
ur kkat ara deg wiyaḍ
ihi taddart tesla teṛwa taḍsa
isxeḍ-iten-id rebbi yerran-ten d ibkan
tefkiḍ-iyi axessaṛ
Ɣur-s lexbar ɣef wayen akk i ixeddem
kecmen ɣer tjebbant qqimen ɣef yiẓekwan
ur ak-ilaq ara ddwa-nni
yeskaw iceṭṭiḍen-is ɣef yiri n tmes
amek akka daɣen ttnuzun wurḍan di fransa
d afellaḥ seg wasmi i d-yekker
yemlal-itent-id deg ubrid yedda yid-sent
yenɣa umcic-iw anziḍ
taqbaylit i tt-irefden d arraw-is
uraren mgal ifulka n atlanta sendiḍelli
d wa i d asteqsi-inem aneggaru
ameddakel-inek i tḥemmleḍ akk mliḥ d argaz neɣ d tameṭṭut
terra-kem deg uɛewwiq
yuli wass
tufam iman-nwen deg uxeddim amaynut
tenquqla-s nniya
wa yedder wa yemmut
uɣalen watmaten-nwen s axxam
iḥemmel faḍma am leɛmer-is
attan tfettel seksu i tmeɣra
yestewtiw-as iḍ d wass
ačewčew azewwaɣ ur t-ḥmmilen ara wayetma-s
d nekk i iḍelmen
teṛṛẓiḍ-d aqeṛṛu-yiw s lḥess-ik
teččur d leɛqel
meẓyan u muḥ tettaɛǧab-it tiziri tagawawt
nerra-tent deg uɛewwiq
seg ubawal i d-nezdem isɣaren
mmi amecṭuḥ yesɛa tusut iḍ kamel yettusu
yunef-aɣ ad nɛeddi
tifɣ-iyi weltma tiḥerci
deg tazwara n tegrest i nleqqeḍ azemmur
anida i tetteddu akka
yenneḍ ɣef yiman-is amzun d inisi-nni yegnen di temduct-is
yesseknaf-as-d tasa ad d-terfed iman-is
ijbed iman-is
ay udem uqejjun
terra-ten deg uɛewwiq
tettinnit tmeṭṭut-iw acku terfed tadist
tugem-d s uyeddid deg tala n taddart
tedda-yasen di nneqma
terra-yaɣ deg uɛewwiq
yugad mačči d kra
iruja sami sḍis n yimalasen
teggull ur teḥnit
ayen i iruḥen ur d-yettuɣal
iban ɣef wudem-is yugad
kerzeɣ aɛerqub iwakken ad ẓẓuɣ irden
d lawan n yeḥlulen
susem deg leɛnaya-m la yeqqaṛ
am win yettrebbin ibki la taduṭ la ayefki
tedduɣ-asent di nneqma
azal n sin yiseggasen ur tt-ẓriɣ
ruḥ ad tezzenzeḍ aɛeqquc
deg unebdu isaffen ttɣaren
yeggra-iyi-d kan ad jebdeɣ iman-iw
melmi ara n-yaweḍ
yedda-yawent di nneqma
llan miyya u xemsin d aqeṛṛu i yulin ar tmacint
ataya yidir
wa yekkat wa yettru
tamazirt mm yebriden
yal nnehta d asefru
amek akka ihi i tturaren warrac dderya iqersen
tettaxxṛemt i ccṛab d dexxan
yenna-iyi-d ur yettɣimi ara yid-m
ugiɣ ad amneɣ
a yemma uḍneɣ taɛebbuḍt-iw
fukken akk dɣa ffɣen
ur ḥmmileɣ ara asemmiḍ n tegrest
tmeččḥeḍ iḍebsiyen
susmet
llan yimdanen ur ntett ara ad rwun
taṣebḥit inelmaden am tweḍfin i d-ttefɣen seg texxamin-nsen
asefru ɣur-s talɣa iman-is
serwet a Ɛli serwet
yurga yedda ɣef tirgin
mazal-iyi d nneyya
myeǧǧen
ur ẓriɣ ara anta i d kemm
bickak d tamanaxt n kigizistan
ad ak-yanef ad tɛeddiḍ
muqran akked dehbiya ddren tayri-nsen di lbaḍna
iḥemmel ad yečč seksu
yidir yekcem di targit lqayen
tabrat i asent-d-tuzen ṭṭfent-tt
ad ddmeɣ anebdu wala tagrest
d yiwen n uqcic yettaɣen awal
mi d-yeswa iteddu yettemderkal d abrid ur t-yeɛqil
cfiɣ amzun d iḍelli
ayɣer ad nraju
d acu i ken-yuɣen
ur teẓri ara imiren d akken tuḍen
ur yeḥsi ara tom s wayen i ttḥulfuɣ
ugint ad d-neṭqent
yettkeyyif sin n yipukay n ddexxan yal ass
tfukk tiɣin n wawal n warrac n tura
yiwet n twacult tettidir di lḥif d wurrif

yuzen-am-n tabrat
yal aɣref ɣur-s aseggas-ines
yettbeccic-d idammen
yuwi taqfact n leɣbar ɣer wurti-s
yufa-d i yiman-is amahil
lɛerc n at wagennun

gar-aneɣ siwa lxir
tzuxx aṭas s mmi-s

a wid itessen idamen n wuxxam

akka i d-yenna
tayaziḍt tesqaqay
yenna-iyi-d « ur ḥemmeq ara ɣer temda n lehmum tamara ur k-terri"

akka i tesla
nečča lekwaɣeḍ-nneɣ

lexbar ttawin-t-id iεeṭṭaren
tettezzi am yizi
akka i teslam
a win yuggaden tidet

texṛamt tala

ay aman senset times times tugi ad tečč aɛekkaz aɛekkaz yugi ad iwwet tehriruc

tecɛel tmes deg wul-is seg wass mi iṛuḥ

a gma ur k-ttayseɣ

a kenza a yelli sbeṛ-as i lmeḥna
baba d argaz bu-lhiba akked laɛqel

Ẓriɣ-k yid-s
ihi ayen akk i wen-d-qqaren xedmet-tt tḥerzem-t
fakkent-aɣ-ten
Ṛuḥ kan ɣer din
Ɣer tesdawit i d-yusa mačči d rreḥba n yeɣyal
yečča yemma-s
ssuɣlet aḍṛis-a
tesɛiḍ tawlaft
tfakkeḍ-aɣ-tt
Ṛuḥemt s leɛqel
Ẓriɣ-kem din
gran-aɣ-d kra
rniɣ asmiri n lwiski
taqbaylit i nebɣa ad neddari d tin n tayri d tqemmucin εinani
tfakk-iyi-t
d tameṭṭut tamzwarut i d-yegren afus deg unnar-a n usideg n yifecka
kemmlem fellu
meqqreḍ yakan
kemmlem aɣenni
ur tseɛɛuḍ ara iṛebbiten-nniḍen siwa nekkini
d win akken i d-ilulen deg uxxam-iw ara yi-iweṛten
yenna-d ih
ad tent-tseɛfemt
tḥemmlem iḍan
ur nettɛemmid ara ad tennemḍar ula d nettat yid-s deg tezgi
s tallelt n waggur azeggaɣ azzayri n tama-agi
fakkent-am-ten
azen asebtar
Ḥemmleɣ-k a tom
ad tuɣaleḍ ansa i d-tekkiḍ
win d aparizyan
lmetred yers-d taẓerbit teḍleq
tfukk-iten
nɣiɣ-am-ten
nniɣ-as ad tɛeqleḍ tom
tenɣa-yawen-tt
ssewzel-it
ad ɣ-tent-tefk
d leḥsab i d-yefka uɣlif n tezmert deg yiwen n wulɣu
nekk ad d-beddeɣ zdat-k ɣef weẓru di sidi udris
txedmemt-asent kra
amzun imira d iɣlel
zedɣeɣ deg oslo
tesdukuled yerna tettbaraked
yerna-as ula d lɣerba
qqurent tjeǧǧigin-a
ad t-tamen
siwel i gma-m
aẓekkun d imɣi i ḥemmlen wakraren
ay tecbeḥ uletma-k
tom yettarra-yi ttḥussuɣ s laman
tfukkem-tent
ad agaden
lsiɣ s lemɣawla
d ssiwan-ik
mačči d nekk winna
seg tsuta ɣer tayeḍ armi tuɣal tikli-a tettlal-d yid-sent
inna-asen yyaw tebɛet-iyi-d
wehment tefremliyin mi i yi-d-wallent s tadist yerna cebbḥeɣ-d
ddumt yan yid-i
ala leεtab
Ẓidit waman-a
lḥiɣ
aṭas i yettmettaten s uḥbas n wul
xtaṛen-ten
tecbeḥ tudert
ma nniɣ i uqeddac-iw xdem aya ad t-ixdem
tura fehmeɣ-t-id
ad m-t-tefk
baba yebɣa izerfan akken ad kecmeɣ ɣer teɣdemt
bḍan-ak-tt-id
azekka-nni ṣṣbeḥ d nnda i d-izzin i umkan-nni anda i llan
ur iḥemmel ara ad iruḥ s ixxamen n medden
Ṛeqqɛem waki
Ɛeyyḍen meṛṛa
ddu akken i ddan waman
yusa-d yeblel
ad ɣ-tseɛfem
yerra-yi-t-id
tebɣamt timellalin
efk-iyi-d agerruj i am-d-fkan
sfaqent-kem-id
yettiki s timmad n ucennay crif xeddam
ad d-ɛerḍen akk imeddukal-nsen
Ɣas akken d tilelliyin seg zik n zik
rnu taneggarut
mazal ur telsiḍ
textaṛeḍ-iyi
Ṭeyyeb tiziri tewwi arraz wis sin n belɛid at Ɛli n tullist
sfaqent-iyi-id
nɣan-asent-tent
ur tewεir ara teqbaylit i ulmad
ihi ini-yi-d tura tidet
ruḥet di laman
eg-it tura
ayagi ad wen-d-iqqim d lqanun i lebda
xtareɣ-kem
uɣal s axxam
wukud qimeɣ
tfakkeḍ-asent-t
ad turar yid-neɣ
ur yessin ara nnfeɛ-is
bɣiɣ ad rebḥeɣ aṭas
aql-i di lebḥer leɣmiq di ssfina ur nesɛi abeḥri
mačči d kečč i d tamtilt-iw
iɣaḍ-iken winna
hḍer
tiselbi n lɣerba
ur ttayes ara
nɣan-as-tent
ahat yella ttawil
udem-iw ṛqiq
lfahem s timmi fiḥel ma yehdeṛ yimi
iḍall ɣef leɛra n weltma-s ddnub i yiri-s
aql-iyi d tawaziwt
tkellxeḍ
tesseɣli-d igenni
aɣmis n yimaziɣen deg tazwara mmeslaɣ-d ciṭ ɣef tlalit n tuddsa-nwen
sṛuḥent-tent
segzu-yi-d aya
nekk d tameṭṭut nnan-iyi-d qqim deg uxxam
tfakem-asen-t
iwiziwen si tama-nsen ad as-d-rren
nɣan-akent-ten
a rebbi ini-yi-d acu ilaqen ad t-xedmeɣ
tewqeɛ-iyi seg-s
a-ten-an iṛebbiten-nwen i ken-id-issufɣen si tmurt n maṣer
d taɣuri yuεren
teskerksemt fell-i
d win d win kan
ugareɣ-k deg leɛmeṛ
cewwlen-k widak
d yiwen seg-sen
yessexlaɛ
segnet-tent
ulac ceεban deg remḍan
tiderray n lmeḥna ttuɣalent d lmeɛna
ad ɣ-t-id-tawi
ilaq iɛeggalen ad issinen amek ara qablen annar
indeh ɣef lɣaci ad qqimen ɣef leḥcic
tɣilleḍ ur neẓri ara acu akk i txeddmeḍ acḥal aya
yuba ixeṛṛef
nɣant-awen-tt
Ṣṣut-im ḥnin yezzuzun-iyi
yiwen ur iɛlim s wass n tisin n yasuɛ
terriḍ-asent-tt-id
rnu snat n tefyar
dduqseɣ-d mi yessusem baba-s ɣef tikkelt
anda-t mmi-m
yessehbal-iyi
d uccen
akka is-yura
kemmel aɣenni
Ḥader aḥaki
yedda yedda yemlal-d yiwet n temɣart
ddem taḥeṛṛast-nni
nekk umneɣ-kem
ur ttkeyyif ara da
swan merra
ddem kullec
deg-m ɣliɣ deg-m kkreɣ
ad ɣ-t-yeɛṛeḍ
ur seɛɛun ara dderya
walit d akessar
win n usnerni n tmedyezt
rnumt
tegrurzeḍ
imaṣriyen tebɛen ihi at isṛayil
sseṛɣen-asen-t
tameɣra-a mačči nwen
tebɣam kra
bḍan-as-t-id
amek i txedmeḍ akken ad am-yekkes lxiq-nni
tin akken s wacu i nettwali
skud tqublem yal taswiɛt
qqim ṭṛankil
ad taweḍ deg talwit ɣer tahran
fkan-iyi-d ddwawi
ass-a lliɣ azekka wissen
rnant
ur umineɣ ayen ẓerreɣ
furren-d akk lexlawi
daɣen
acuɣer i tessutureḍ lmut di rebbi
aɣbalu n leḥnana-nsen
ttif ad testaɛfuḍ ciṭ
yebγa ccix nuṛdin a-t-yessekles di ṛṛadyu
walit kenwi
tegliḍ yes-sent
sell i wacu ara m-iniɣ
Ɣaḍent-iyi snat yessi-s d trumit mu d-giḍ leɣrur
ad ldiɣ ciṭuḥ ṭṭiqan
Ḥebsemt-tent
teẓṛamt-t
ad akent-t-yefk
ad d-yawi ul-is d amejruḥ rnan si Ṣaleḥ umedbuḥ
afet-d tom
tikwal tessalay di taɣect alamma tuɣal tkeṛṛeḍ deg ugerjum
Ɣas ur gtent ara
ur ɣileɣ ara ad d-teffeɣ akka
iẓẓan n ugertil sired neɣ qqim
sseṛɣent-asen-ten
d acu i d-tewwim yid-wen
ulac tarewla tura
imɣureɣ
yebḍa-yas-ten-id
Ɛassemt iman-nkent
ifakk-as-tent
yecbeḥ uɣelluy-a n yiṭij neɣ
ulac wi irekben ur iris
d taqerruyt n tɛekkwazt i yeɛewjen
ur tettbeddil ara temsalt n udabu di zzayer
ulama tɛedda tillas
welleh ass-nni ar nsiɣ deg berra
ttxil-m
imenfi d win sufɣen si tmurt-is
yuqa lḥut di lebḥeṛ
waqil atan tura i yeεya ẓẓher-nneɣ
speedy gonzales d aɣerda n miksik ur tleḥḥqeḍ deg tazzla
ur iḥṛic ur iḍric
iḥma useqqi
acḥal i tewwiḍ
bdan xellun iberdan wid i d-yegran ɣer wexxam ɣeṣben tikli
bdiɣ ttɣenniɣ mi lliɣ d abestuḥ
seɣtit ma ɣelḍeɣ
seg ul-im fɣeɣ xas ru ay iẓri-w
ur ishil ara i wakken ad d-taruḍ ɣef temsalt-a
tṛuḥ ad tẓer urǧin teẓri
ittcehhid s uzelmaḍ
imi yessebleɛ ṣṣuṛa tessexlaɛ
ittṛaǧu ufellaḥ ad d-hubben leryaḥ
ay amcum deg-neɣ yeffɣen
acḥal teqqimeḍ din
ddunit am lmesbeḥ tettaɣ txessi
am win issenduyen qeḍran
d bu tmegṛaḍ
Ɛemmi d yir ɛemmi irna učči n yilni
aḥbib n ulqim ar din iqqim
kemmini meẓẓiyeḍ ma d nekk ixef-iw icab
zzux d lhedra baṭel menwala ad izuxx ayla-s
tagnawt fell-i ad temmar
ad iṛwu ubazin tasilt
nesεa ugur d amecṭuḥ
tiyersi icudden ar tefsi
Ṭṭseɣ Ṛebbi ur iṭṭis ara
texleḍ tɣanimt d ujenjal
awi-yi-d aman ɣef ideg mnaqaṛen idurar
anda yedden i yeẓẓul
ttaṛ uɛudiw ɣef ulgam
ulac aɣrum ur nesɛi imassen
awal n tsummta d win i ifeṛṛqen
awal isefsay uzzal
tajmilt uzarez tazdemt tgerrez
Ẓriɣ yejreḥ wul-ik
yugi ad t-iffeɣ ubeḥri
ttif tuzzma wala tuffra
ad iṛḥem Ṛebbi kra i d-iǧǧan beṭṭu
kker a dadda ad iqqim netta
Ḍmeɛ di Ṛebbi mačči di lɛebd
adebbuz n telkin ameccaḥ n teṛbutin
yerna lewkil n tegduda yessuter tafgurt ẓẓayen
ur d-rennu bu sebɛa tfednin
Ɛni neẓra ad ɣ-id-yini awit-d gma-twen
iwwet aɣyul inuqeṛ aserdun
xas ma teǧǧhed tannumi
mi teṭṭes tessirt tṛuḥeḍ ad teẓdeḍ
udem d aqelwac iẓṛi d adaɛmamac
iddez-it ɛezṛayen ɣef ddunit
kkseɣ-ak awal rriɣ-ak tamment
Ǧeṛǧeṛ yessawel i ccenwa
ruḥ a wer d-tuɣaleḍ
win yeǧǧan imawlan-is i yeǧǧa d iman-is
awi-d učči
taqbaylit teḥwaǧ aṭas imusnawen ara yedduklen ad gen imawalen n tussna
arraz-a yerra-yi-d asirem deg tiddin n tmetti taqbaylit ɣer tlelli n tikti d wawal
xas tenɣam seg-neɣ drus i nexseṛ
ilaq ad tmeεnemt d yimawlan-nkent
waqil d lawan ad d-iniɣ ayen ttxemmimeɣ s tidet
ad nemyezwer am yiẓid ar isni
ay ameɣcuc i k-isbezgen ad ɣ-iṛuc
ittgalla wurif isseḥnat nnif
temzel tixsi terna yelli-s
Ṣṣaba d leɛwam tayerza d ddwam
am win i yeceṭṭḥen i uderɣal
iwwet ddunit s rrkel
Ṭṭɛam yezwar taẓẓalit
tura i d-ẓriɣ yiwet n tesgilt srid deg youtube
tura s tidet ma nessusem ad aɣ-mḥun
ul-iw am t-id-smireɣ
d lemɛanda n tnuḍin i yexlan tudrin
bges ɣur-s inumak-nniḍen
win yebɣam luqam ad yezwir deg wat uxxam
ansi i d-zedmeɣ i d-tesquccḍeḍ
yezmer ad d-yeɣli kra fell-akent ḥadremt ihi
d ufrik i t-id-tesɛa yemma s
qqareɣ-as ma hedreɣ yid-s ad yeffeɣ rruḥ-iw
tekcem-d yiwet n tfirellest ad tebnu lɛecc deg uxxam-nneɣ
a nekk iweddfen mmi di tizi
walaɣ-kem
nebges-d s tebɣest ɣas yekker uɣebbaṛ
win yebɣan taqbaylit ad iger afus-is ɣer lǧib
ccna-ya d amehbul
a nwali Ṛebbi ad aɣ-d-iwali
yurga tafsut
ul d ineslem ssuq d aṛumi
yuɣal-d ugeffur
ifka-k-id Ṛebbi d asulef
abṛaham irra-yas a sidi
i tsuta uzekka ad terr izuɣaṛ
am tecḍaḍt n bururu
amek tga teɣmi n tqendurt-im
armi d aseggas-a i tt-fehmeɣ
nekk d lbumba keččini d zzalimiḍ
d kunwi i y-isseɣren
tesbeɛbeɛ tixsi uzzlen-d izamaren
ugadeɣ ilaq d kečč ara iruḥen s yiman-ik
xedmeɣ kra ur neqwim
ssneɣ udem-im
lɛebd issaram Ṛebbi isseḥzam
iserdyan leḥḥun iberdan ḥekkun
aslaɣ ibeddu daxel
akken myezdaɣen ay myaɛṛafen
awexxer ɣelben-t leɣruṛ
ayefki n tsedda di tyeṭṭit n mmi-s
yiwen n ccɣxel ay txeddem am inifif
telliḍ tεelmeḍ belli zewǧeɣ
inwa d anciwen ziɣen d acciwen
dqiqa kan ad t-id-naf
cedhaɣ seksu n temẓin d yiɣimi ɣer lkanun
skud ur nemmut rrbeḥ ur ifut
ifka azuɣer
ttif sser wala tiserfin
gma-sn ujṛad d abẓiẓ
teɣriḍ kra n yidlisen igerrzen tineggura-ya
d ayen i ilaq ad qableɣ weḥd-i
tedɛa-yas yemma-s s lxir
d ayen ur nettili d lḥeqq
times d unebdu d uzeɣal ur yi-ǧǧin ara ad steɛfuɣ
kra win ixedmen lewqam yiwen ur t-ittara di rrif
ttemyeskaden am arraw n takniwin
ad ak-ikkes Ṛebbi ugur d uɛekkur
ittḥemmiẓ iman-is iqqim ɣef ijufaṛ-is
nutni ad ddmen amur-nsen
ziɣ ula d nekni tura s trisiti i nteddu
meyyez nnican uqbel ad tqerseḍ
nekk d anelmad
win isɛan irden reṭṭlen-as awren
win ikkaten lexyal ad izgel leḥlal
tura ihi ur ttagadet ara
neṣber am iqnac di tessirt
deg uxxam d izem di beṛṛa d awtul
awer nettwaɣull sɣuṛ Ṛebbi
amcic ur ittaǧǧa ara laɛwayed-is
ɛni d nekk i d aɛessas n gma
kemm d lbumba nekkini d zzalimiḍ
neɛlem mačči alamma tennam-aɣ-d
sgunfu deg talwit
tessaɣeḍ-iyi tannumi
yerbeḥ ad tt-nernu ɣer wumuɣ
illu yexleq amdan ɣef ṣṣifa-s
ad k-iǧǧ Ṛebbi d abeṭṭan di lqaɛ
iɣumm tafugt s uɣerbal
am yal aseggas i lmend n teẓrigt n useggas n zuǧ alaf u tmenṭac zuǧ alaf u tteɛṭac
tura ilaq ad tkemmleḍ i ubrid weḥd-k
yuli wass medden akk kkren teddun ad xedmen
tafya d awadem asugnan yettilin deg tmucuha n tuṛuft
txelleṣ-iten ad nɣen argaz-is
a tawaɣit ittwaxleq lɛebd i tnimirt
neqqar taǧǧalt neɣ tadyalt
lehna teḍmen leɣna
kra ara d-issis ad ittumessek
iburek-iten mkul yiwen s lbaṛaka-s
ul-iw yedduqus aṭas i uzzleɣ
i kečč d acu i zemreɣ ad k-t-xedmeɣ a mmi
itteḥdiqiṛ am tyaziḍt tasaɛṛaqt
mačči ad sferɣeɣ
nwiɣ theddreḍ tafransist
ccix lḥesnawi yemmut deg tegzirt n réunion
ttu lhemm ad k-ittu
d acu ara xedmeɣ tura
ajgagal lmizirya yuɣ amḍiq di ddunit-iw
isḥaq isɛa settin n iseggasen di lɛemṛ-is mi d-lulen
ittzaɛwil gar iderɣalen
ittwalxez am ubexsis n ṛṛḍuba
tufa lbaz ara tt-yaɣen
syenna iṛuḥ yuɣal s axxam-is
ur ḥtammeɣ ara
irgazen lxalat wwin-d abrid la cennun
kečč d amẓad neɣ d aṛeḥwi
ay arrac n tmurt ayɣer
azɣal n wass-nni yettlaɛi-d ɣef yismawen
anez-iyi ad k-anzeɣ
d axxam bu yicbula d lqeffa
tella tin i yenɣa tom
tcukkem yeεni deg-i
dɣa ameɣlal ikkes-it si ddunit
yeṭṭef-itt s tazzla deg tedxent
aɣ-iyi kan awal awi-yi-ten-id
argaz yuɣal d aceṭṭiḍ
acu i d iwwin ih ɣer ala
ikkat uḥeddad afḍis iḥfeḍ-it mmi-s
amusnaw d win yegzan timsal yerna yessen ad atent-yefru
axxam n leḥwaṣ d axxam n lexṣas
tella-d tmeddit illa-d ṣṣbeḥ d ass wis setta
wwḍeɣ-d εeṭṭleɣ acemma
tura ixeṛṛef
awer naḍen annect nṣeḥḥa
dɣa Ṣara tmeḥḥen hagaṛ armi i terwel fell-as
teccetka-d yiwet si tǧiratin-nwen
xdem lxiṛ i teẓrut ula i tweṭṭuft
laban inna-yas Ḥadeṛ
fersen akk aɛerqub-nni uɣalen rran-tt i uqeṣṣer
llan wid yeqqaṛen ulac Ṛebbi
ad ak-seččeɣ lemṛaṛ s tɣenjawt
werǧin nwiɣ ad teffeɣ tayri ul-iw
ad ṛuḥeɣ ad t-id-ẓreɣ uqbel ad mmteɣ
si leǧmaɛ ar leǧmaɛ ad d-yas bujmaɛ
kkreɣ deg twacult d tigellilt
dderya iwumi ur ččiɣ nnfeɛ dfeɛ
teɣli am ubeḥnuq
heḍren yid-neɣ
win ur neqḍi ṣṣbeḥ lerbaḥ futen
awi-tt tṛuḥeḍ
ahat llan xemsin n iḥeqqiyen di temdint
d tin ara ixedmen axxam-is
aman ttṛuḥun neqqsen armi d aggur wis ɛecṛa
ur yewwiḍ ur yeǧǧi amekkan
tḍeɛfeḍam win ittɛicin taddart
uḥeqq win igan isem i yiman-is
la nleḥḥu deg uzal newḥec
d tafat n wallen-iw yess ay ttɛiciɣ
kkreɣ bdiɣ tira ɣef temsalt
tom ur yelli ara d imsetḥi maḍi
la tfeṛṛceḍ iḍaṛṛen-ik am umextan
kul aḍebbal akken ittḍebbil
ma d wid i d-terniḍ fell-asen d ayla-k
seksu yeɛrek d aɣrum
yusef yuɣ i ferɛun tiferkiwin meṛṛa n maṣer
amek yeɛni ara teɛceq deg uḍebbal
lketṛa n leḥbab ittawi d laɛtab
ttif urawen wala imawen
tessen ad tεumm
d ayen i bɣiɣ ad geɣ
adlis-a yettnuz mliḥ deg japun
seg wasmi i d-nekker nettṛebbi lmal
ayen tugadeḍ ad yes-s temmteḍ
ad tkecmem neɣ xaṭi
nruḥ-d asif asif lḥal d tameddit
nesεedda kra n teswiεin n lεali
Ẓriɣ mačči d abidun i tebɣa
yenna-yi-d tom lliɣ isewweq leεqel-iw
nurez iman-nneɣ
win itellɣen hdeṛ neɣ ssusem
ur bɣiɣ ara ad mlileɣ imawlan-ik
ur tt-izerreε ara
nutni wehmen ttmesmuqalen gar-asen
Ṭṭeẓ deg-k a ɛemmi yennayer
am lexyal di tebḥirt
ad d-iniɣ seg wass ɣer wayeḍ yettili-d umaynut
yekkat taqabact deg uqerru-s
d acu i k-yeǧǧan ay iles ur tesεiḍ ara iɣes
bɣant ad nnaɣent
Ɛni mačči ɣef ddemma n meɛǧuṭa i xedmeɣ fell-ak
d leḥqer ɛinani
dɣa ɣlin ɣer lqaɛa seǧǧden zdat-s
ur ittɣimi ukured anda teḥma
yedla ɣef wufur-nni
d awennit n yiwen uneḍfar usebter-nneɣ
tom d bu tṣegnint
yečča lbaṭaṭa d tmellalin
yir awal iqebbeṛ am uḍiḥan
Ɣas ma ddac ddac
Ḥwaǧeɣ-t assa
anda-tt tkarnit-nni
yelha-yak i kečči
neḥwaǧ ugar n waya iwakken ad d-yili useḥbiber d umhaz n tutlayt-nneɣ
d nnuba n ḥedd nniḍen
ifka-yas arrac irna-yas tirac
mi meqqeṛ uqcic tekkes-as yemma-s tuṭṭḍa
arfaxcad iǧǧa-d cilaḥ
xir iẓiwec deg ufus wala amergu ur nettrus
ur nnument ara tteffɣent deg iḍ
tesmesxireḍ fell-i
iwweḍ s aḥdid inneqwṛa
tom yewwi yelli-s ɣer uɣerbaz
yir ceqquf werǧin iṛṛiẓ
ahat mačči s tewrek ara nali
Ṣṣufṛen iḍaṛṛen-is
laẓ ur isɛi aḥbib
lxiṛ d imezgi mačči d inebgi
teswamt taqeṛɛunt n waman
ur ndimeɣ ara
aqeddac-nni yerra-yas d sidi
yuli wass mazal-iyi
Ṭṭes tenneqlabeḍ
kra ikka yiḍ am win ittɛuddun itran
win isxeṛxuṛen yessawal i imakaren
ad d-yarew umadaɣ tibexsisin
ula d cit isɛa-d mmi-s isemma-yas anuc
amek yettεeddi wass-ik
i tafat-im ttwaliɣ
ceggɛet yiwen deg-wen ad d-yawi gma-twen
yella kra i wumi d-sliɣ
acuɣer yesra umdan ad yamen
meɛqulit at iɣezfanen n ufus
teččuṛ tcekkaṛt-is
uɣeɣ-d akebbuḍ-a s rrixsan
a baba wwten-aɣ a mmi ɛeqlen-aɣ
atan yekfa remḍan-nni
imiren irra-ten akken ma llan ɣer lḥebs tlata n wussan
umneɣ-k ay uccen teččiḍ-iyi iɣiden
arraw n takniwin ur ttemsendahen
lbaz infa-t bururu
ruḥeɣ ɣer ssuq ad d-aɣeɣ kra n tednect ma tella
iqqim seksu d wudi irra tiqit
lyes belɛidi yewwi arraz wis kraḍ belɛid at Ɛli n tullist Ṣayddu mayga
kra nniḍen ur zmiren ad t-xedmen
ustayen ad ɣlin irden ad d-grin
ur sskan wiyaḍ s uḍaḍ
cudd icifaḍ-ik
ikker waḥuh ur nečči
aql-aɣ nleεεeb lkarṭa
ur tḥemmel ara aɣerbaz s waṭas
seg imiren bdan ttaddren-d isem n umeɣlal
baqi yerreẓ-d uɛellam-is
tettenfufud tmes
inna-yas d tidet i d-nenna
amek armi ttɛeyyiḍen imesbaniyen s taɛrabt deg bgayet d tizi wezzu
qqaren-as aqejmur neɣ ageyyir
asif-is la d-yettawi iɣiden
lǧennet ma tugi-k anef-as
Ṛuḥ ad tesweḍ mernuyet
tiqqit tiqqit ad teččaṛ tbaqit
d ilaw wannect-a merra
tleɛɛeb-itt d timsetḥit nettat ziɣen d times ddaw walim
ur d-ittak uɣerbal alamma iṛwa-tent
di tilawt bɣiɣ ad k-d-ssutreɣ kra n tɣawsa
kra win iɣaben fell-am ad yeqqel ar win i t-icedhan
tesɛam gma-twen-nniḍen
ad yenneḍ yiles-iw
taweṭṭuft tezzuɣer alɣem
iɛedda lferk uẓerzur nnig uxxam-nneɣ
mi d-ffɣen burken agdud
Ɣef ssuq yella anda iqqaren d tagmert
iṭṭamaɛ lxiṛ deg win ur d-tgi yemma-s
aṭas iyi-d-yettaḍsan deg ubrid
serrḥen-as i tmedda-nni mi teḥla akken ad tefferfer
yemma-s tewhem deg-s
ur ilaq ara ad temmeslayeḍ
ad tdehneḍ haṛun akked warraw-is ad ten-tɛezleḍ akken ad ilin fell-i d iqeddacen
haṛun irra-as di leɛnaya-k ur reffu ara a sidi
ad k-ččeɣ a yabelluḍ iḥettem-ik lḥal
ismexlil akken ad s-inin medden  aḥlil
ur kkiɣ ara deg umussu-nsen ur ttekkiɣ ur lliɣ gar-asen
Ɛussen-iyi si yal tama
ad yettaḍsa ad yecmumeḥ ad yurar ad yemmured ad yedidac
zaɛma xedmen tagrawla
isudd ubrid ɣur-k
yettban-d wannect-agi deg usebɣes n tddukkliwin d ssrabes n tfellaḥt i iqeddcen deg lɣellat-agi
anwa ara nesseḍlem
ddwawi iyi-sganen
tɣunfa-k lmut
lliɣ εelmeɣ qbel-im
taqcict deg laẓ d lḥif d ddaɛwessu
lulen-d akken ad myeḥmalen
win ara yewten baba-s neɣ yemma-s d lmut ara yemmet
zilfa taqeddact n nna feḍmuca tesɛa-as-d aqcic i si mḥemmed
dda Ɛli isɛa-d karim akked Ḥamid akken i llan iderman-nsen
mazal ad ternu terwiḥt-is ineẓmi d unegzuzem
ayen i tzerεem ad t-tmegrem
cwiṭ kan acemma tefrawes am win itt-yewten s yiṣerfiq
ayen akk yellan d tassemt d ayla n umeɣlal
yella deg yimeḍqan d igrawiyen wagi qqaren-as azemmur azebli
Ǧǧan-iyi ad uɣaleɣ s axxam
tẓerreḍ-d argaz-im di lḥebs neɣ ala
ad teḍru am wakken i teḍra akked temcumt-nni
seg wakken meẓẓiyet yemma-s taneggarut-agi tɛawed zzwaǧ
ur yezmir ad d-yessuref
i wihida amek tura sser-nsen
yeččaɛčaɛ-d fell-i s lǧehd n taɣect-is
ula d azlaz ad yenfu
ad ak-mleɣ amek itegg amek ifettel
serḥeɣ i kra din daxel n uxendus
iḥbiben n zik-nni
yebda yekkat wejgu n uɛrur-iw
tesred telɣet di tesga am uydi yettrajun bab-is
ulac win ara s-tt-yekksen
fiḥel ma nnan-as yeḥṣa
iɣumm-itt meṛṛa s ddheb yeṣfan yerna yezzi-as-d s izirig n ddheb
seg wayen i ssutren yiselmaden-a ad sεun izerfan mtawan akked wid n uɣerbaz alemmas d wid n tesnawit
tefreq-iten lmut
teɛṣa tɣeddiwt-a tgumma ad teww
mi ɛeddan ɛecra n wayyuren uɣaleɣ ɣer uxeddim
ikna lqedd-im
ur yezmir ara ad d-yaf afaylu n udras n tirawt
amek armi s tefransist i tessefruyeḍ mačči s tutlayt-nniḍen
iban kan d kra n tlufa meqqren i d-yiwi
lebɣi-w yekka deg wayen iyi-d-iṣaḥen
wwin-t ɣer musa
la iceṭṭeḥ la yettɣenni i yiman-is ddaw tili
nḥar ad d-tuɣaleḍ gar-aneɣ akken ad nurar am zik ddabex
a wer kkren
ur d-tufi ara awalen ara d-igelmen anect-nni
ur lḥiɣ ara yid-sen ur leḥḥuɣ
tekkateḍ abunyiw ah setɛerfeɣ yis-m
ur ttamdal ara allen-im mi ara m-ttarraɣ ddwa
taṣebḥit isčenčen rrabay
ad uɣalent ansa i d-kkant
iruḥ ad yečč imensi netta d teɛzizt-is
rnu i taɣect-ik mi ara d-teqqareḍ
azekka ad truḥ ad taf tilelli-s d talwit-is dinna
neɣ tḥesdeḍ-iyi imi i lhiɣ
imir sɛiɣ yiwet temlilit d yineɣmasen deg uxxam n tɣamsa
ur ttsetḥi ara s teqbaylit-ik
ad d-tawiḍ tifeqlujin
amaynut-a dɣa d adlis n wawalen yemcubbken neɣ n uẓeṭṭa n wawalen
d isefra-s i icennu di tezlatin-is gar yisental iɣef icennu ad nebder tayri timetti lḥif tizlit tamḥaddit
dɣa yessuden-it
talaba teɛǧeb win i tt-yersan mačči d win i tt-yeẓḍan
teqsaḥ n wul n tid i yettɛassan i yettrebbin s yedrimen
ay at sin wudmawen
mačči ḥaca kemm i yellan
ul-is yesderduf si sdaxel i d-yesṭebṭub
deg wacu teckenṭḍeḍ ugar
s udem n ṣṣbaḥ xerqeɣ deg targit ṛuḥeɣ
a Ṛebbi ḥareb ɣef mmi
ma yella seg tama-nneɣ ula d nekni nuklal asteεfu seld aseggas n uxeddim iweεṛen
yessen ad yemmeslay
ma d asaru aneggaru yetturaǧu ad d-yettwasenɛet ass n lǧemɛa taneggarut n remḍan
xedmen s ddheb snat n txelxalin akked sin n yiran n ufella n tbanta
ur d-tuɣaleḍ ur d-tsawleḍ
meεna akken iqqar yinzi limmer i tt-iẓra ufellaḥ tili ur tt-izerreɛ ara
tessebɣas iman-is i ukayad n lbak i tt-yettraǧun qabel
d ṣṣebyan mazal-it mecṭuḥ
nnejmaɛen-d ifarisiyen
d amennuɣ ur yettwafham ara
a win iferzen iḍ ɣef wass
yerra-d tawwurt ɣef wudem-is
anida ara d-taf tin ara tt-iḥemmlen am kemm
ala Ṛebbi i d-yeqqimen
lliɣ d nneyya
lḥif n tegmat yewɛer win ur nesɛi tagmat meḥqur

mmi-s-nni yenṭeq inna ad ṛuḥeɣ a sidi

teqleɛ

acimi ur as-d-tettarraḍ ara awal
Ɛerran-t di ssuq

anda-ken a leqbayel
iḥulfa yella ufus iǧehden i yas-d-ijguglen si deffir
imsidag iqbayliyen ttwalin mebɛid
ladɣa mi ara d-mlileɣ lweḥc iyi-xedmen akka
tḥemmleḍ llebsa n yeqbayliyen

ttɛawazen
iwakken ad cfun fell-as
ur teffer ara fell-i a yidir

Ǧeɛfer yettraḥ d zbel
tuḍnem aɣbel
ur fhimeɣ ara taluft-a d acu-tt
armi ččiɣ aqenṭar n lmelḥ i d-tluleḍ keččini
iɛǧeb-asen lḥal
ad ruḥeɣ kan aṭas n tqenṭyar i yi-d-mazal ad tent-bnuɣ
yuker-iyi
aselmad n tẓuri yella ikreh-iyi

ula d nettat dima tettara-yas-d
cwiṭ cwiṭ ad tekfu teqbaylit ad nekfu s leqbayel
tḥemmlemt ad telsemt llebsa n yeqbayliyen
tceggeb-ikem taluft-nni

ur ihegga acemma i zzwaǧ-is
ad n-siwlent
ad ak-d-igerrez tazziba

d nekk an id yas ɣur-wen

uɣeɣ-d takerrust

melmi ara tgeḍ axxam
a tin yeḍran yid-neɣ

awi amur-iw ma tebɣiḍ
Ẓriɣ ur tgerrzeḍ ara
d acu ara ad d-naɣ

yedda-yas di lebɣi

azul amek telliḍ
ur tt-ttaddam ara d akken furseɣ tagnit akken ad xedmeɣ i bɣiɣ deg-m
iwumi-tt tsarutt-a
ttazgen yiḍarren-is

axeddim yif tiɣimit
llant kra n tuttriwin ulac ɣur-sent tiririt
tezxuxem am teslit mi d-kecmen

aql-i da
saɛid u muḥ yesṭeɛref yenɣa tiziri tagawawt
meẓyan u muḥ ur iwala ara tiziri tagawawt
deffir udrar zdat udrar abrid arama d anar

lalla mergaza
d tamerbuḥt yelli-k
iɛǧeb-as lḥal

neɛya di tazzla n yidammen
Ɛni d kenwi ara ydebbṛen fell-asen
ad tt-tafeḍ gar imezwura
rnu yiwet neɣ terwiḍ
taqbaylit mačči d iḥulfan kan
Ɣas ulamma ur yesɛwi ara d acu ara d-yefk neɣ akken ad iyi-ixelles
ayen telsa neɣ ayen texdem yecmet fell-as
wicqa ma txedmem-as ifelfel aberkan
i tikkelt tamenzut i heddren ɣef yisental n tudert
ddiɣ d yemma ɣer tmeɣra n twacult-nneɣ
ad ak-d-teṭṭef seg tayeḍ
ayɣer i teggummam ad d-tinim tidet
susmet deg leɛnaya-nwen la qqaṛent
tacebḥant
ad tedduḍ ɣer tizi n at Ɛica neɣ s at Ɛemṛan
Ḥrec tura
a yaqahwaǧi
ayen akk tejmaɛ daxel
axaṭer mačči dayen i t-yerḥan
Ḥesbemt ad tafemt ma ixuṣ neɣ ma izad kra
meyyzemt uqbel aneggez ddunit tettɣuṛṛu
Ḥemddulah
ad ẓren qbel d acu i d-yeqqar usaḍuf ɣef waya
wellah alukan deg umaḍal i lliɣ
ula mi ara tfak temsirt
yerwi-iyi tudert-iw yeǧǧa-iyi akken
ur yugar ara yidir newwara di leɛmer
d acu i k-ixuṣṣen ay aɛeryan
tuɣ-itt di tgecrirt
zik ara kkrent azekka
d bu tuyat
yeṭṭef-iyi ccɣel deg wexxam
ur d-yeṭṭif acemma
leqqḍen azemmur s ccna
Ɣef tfednin i tleḥḥu
a bu ifexruren
ur yerǧi ara yidir ayagi si newwara
yugi ad idawi
anef-iyi nekk d rray-iw
yetqelleq yidir ɣef newwara
ur yessexlaḍ ara
ur yettagad yiwen
yella ḥedd da
tḥekku aṭas newwara i yemma-s
yuɣ-d yidir aqrab i newwara
ur itess ara aman n tbernint
yenɣa-yi ɛawaz
tura kan i ččiɣ seksu s tɣeddiwt
yeččur wul-iw
iteddu-yas di lebɣi i yemma-s
yal ass d aberri
tura kan i d-ččiɣ seksu s tɣeddiwt
d acu i d-iṣaḥen ameddaḥ
iḍ-agi ad tili tziri
yesteqsa-d yiwen ɣef yidir ṣṣbeḥ-agi
ur t-id-iṣaḥ ara ad d-inṭeq
ur tufi ara iman-is di tmetti-a
cfiɣ tenna-yi yemma
ttɛawazent
yedda-yi-d di lebɣi
amek i d-yesseḍṣay yidir newwara
tessaǧawem zzit n uzemmur
yerra-yas s leɛweǧ
akken i d-ruḥent seg wallaɣ ɣer uqemmuc
tban tuzert ɣef udmawen-nkent
asmi i sɛiɣ tnac n yiseggasen
ma yella truḥeḍ s axxam-nwen
ala ɣef wannect-a iyi-d-iḥekku
ladɣa ɣer wayen tessarameḍ
lliɣ ula d nekk am ufrux-nni deg lqefs
ma mačči s fasebbuk s tilifun
i nekni i wumi txedmemt akk annect-a
am win teṭṭfeḍ ɣer lḥebs
akken ittemsaɛafen
a t-id-yaf sdat-s
iman-iw
ass d lferḥ
a-tt-an yiwet n tlemẓit tekcem-d ɣur-s
asmi i d-tufa win i izemren ad tt-ifhem
d llebsa yelhan
ad yennaɣ d yid-sent
ad as-d-isefhem d acu yeḍran d yid-s
ma yella iqneɛ-itt s rray
ad tṛuḥem ɣer sedduq neɣ ɣer sidi Ɛic
la lbenna
ad nẓer ma ulac kra ara nexdem deg tesdawit
ma yella kunemti teɣramt yerna teḍra-yawent akka
acḥal ur iyi-d-turiḍ ɣef tezrawt-ik
ccerṭ-is fessus
ina-s ad k-terfed axir
ad tt-yesqerdec yid-s
kečč ttabaɛ-itt
d acu kan ilaq ad ilint waṭas n tedyanin am ti
taɣect d tagamant
Ɣas akken semmḥen-asen i yimdanen yenɣan arraw-iw
idel-aɣ-d yiwen uɣemɣum armi ur nẓerr kra
ihi ur telli ssebba ɣef i d-ssawleɣ  bɣiɣ kan ad d-sleɣ i taɣect-im tura ma tceɣleḍ ad kem-ǧǧeɣ ad truḥeḍ
attan s uƐebbuḍ
idrimen-nni merra ttexfan
beṛka lehḍuṛ
anagar annect-a i ḍemɛeɣ seg-wen ass-a
iban ttuɣ ur ɣ-d-sawlen ara
ihi tamagit d asddukel n waṭas n yiferdisen tarakalt tameslayt amezruy d yedles
iḥemmel mliḥ arrac i yesɣaṛay
kemmel di leɛnaya-m
d ta i d ssṛaya ideg izdeɣ ugellid d tgellidt
d acu-t wihin i yellan dihin
kra din d imcac i t-yeččan
iɛedda kullec akken ilaq
iḍal akkin i tizi
imi ɣas amennuɣ n katiya d win i d-yekkan mgal kennu zdat n yirebraben inselmen
izellem-iyi-d amzun d nekk i ixedmen taxeṣṣaṛt
Ḍṣiɣ
d nettat i yuran taceqquft n umezgun i d-neẓra iḍelli
lehlak imṭenneb
cukkeɣ telluẓemt
d ayen igerrzen tanemmirt-ik
ihuh ah ilfan-a ad uɣalen alma keččmen-aɣ-d ɣer ufrag deg uzal
eǧǧ aqjun deg beṛṛa
Ḍfeṛ assemter-iw
fakk-d awal ur ttagad
ur ifehhem ara tirqaqin
islem-nni telleɣ-it tmedda
iwala-tt kan teɣli-d tiṭ-is
fren yiwen
amεellem-iw ur t-iqenneε ara uneqqis-iw
igerrez mliḥ yinig-nni
itthuzzu aqerru-s
izmer ad kem-ineɣ ssem
ass n letnayen d ass yeččuṛen d lecɣal ɣur-i
anwa i yessnen amejjay iẓewṛen deg taddart
imdanen ɣuṛ-sen allaɣen annect-ilaten
ansuf yes-wen ar uxxam
d tamekdit tmeṭṭut-ik
anda i tent-teǧǧam
Ɣur-k ad teɣliḍ deg urmuj-nni a tom
feṛḥeɣ-as aṭas i mi terbeḥ
iṛuḥ deg ucekkaṛ
iwala belli ur iɛedda ara ṛṛay-is dɣa yerra-tt i leɛyaḍ
Ɛṛeḍ ur d-ttaḍṣa ara
err akka
d ameɣbun n ṛṛay
iǧǧa ccemma yuɣal ɣer ddexxan
ma drus i yuzzlen d aman seddaw teqneṭyar
lliɣ ttawiɣ yid-i n makken kesseɣ deg iɣzeṛ tɛerqubt
azzlet
kker seg usu
ggullen ɣef lmut-nsen
cukkeɣ tettnuddumeḍ
d acu i s-terriḍ
ittcabi tatoeba ɣer facebook
jebdem iman-nwen
ileḥḥu yettemlelli
aqbayli meqqeṛ-it wanzaren-is
d ageffur n tegrest i d-ixedmen akk iremjen-nni deg ubrid
ur tezmir ara i usemmiḍ
Ɛreḍ aya
ilad ad wen-nḥettem
Ɣuṛwet ad tfeḍḥem lbaḍna ha
ay abeḥri i d-isuḍen
bdan yemdanen keččmen wa deffir wa
amek i ak-qqaṛen
ih awi-d ad eččeɣ
di leɛnaya-m cnu-d
ass-agi d asemmiḍ yewwet udfel almi i tt-isemlal
gulleɣ ar nenfu wala laɛquba ɣer yilfan
Ḥebsem
d tawaɣit
ilaq ad qqiment g uxxam ass-a
yella kra i awen-d-yeǧǧa baba-twen
mi ara d-yini awal ad ḥebsen waman
deg useggas n zuǧ alaf u rbeɛṭac menad iffeɣ seg tmurt izger ar fransa and yella d-analmad
Ɣiflet neɣ ad ɣ-d-yelḥeq
iban ur d-tettas ara di lweqt
Ḥbes ur ttmeslay ara
Ɣur-k ad tettuḍ d acu i ak-nniɣ
iḥekker deg-sen tom
ma nebɣa nezmer ma ur nebɣi nenger
Ḥbes ur ttḥerrik ara
kker fell-as tessisneḍ-d iman-ik di leɛnaya-k
iceyyeε-iyi-d drus aya asefru yessejraḥen i yura af tmettant n yemma-s
ili-kem d tuṛẓint
bɣiɣ ad sweɣ yiwen n kuka
d acu i d awanek n tefyir-agi
anwa abrid i ilaq ad awiɣ
ilaq ad yi-tɛawnem bac ad ten-id-sukkseɣ
ayen i yi-tunfeḍ
ismendag times s yiles-is
bɣiɣ ad tteɣ
di berlin llan ddeqs n yemḍiqen icebḥen
amkan anda tuɣ nettɣima yuli-t leḥcic
aqcic-nni ddan-d yid-s yimawlan-is
d isem n tantala taqbaylit
tzemreḍ ad yi-d-tesɛeddiḍ afrar n ufermaj ma ulac aɣilif
maɛlic a yelli
wid iceɣben allaɣ-ik
d asirem i tzemreḍ ad tefkeḍ i win yebɣan tallelt
truḥ ad texdem
takerrust-iw tettawi-iyi anda bɣiɣ
sɛan leqraya-nsen
izeddeɣ-itt lḥir
neddlent fell-aɣ tewwura am lecfar ɣef wallen
lmex-is isewweq
ur ttqabaḥemt ara
s kra kra alamma nefra-tt
ddeqs n yisenfaṛen i yettwaxdamen
yettawi-asen-d ala lemḥani d usemmiḍ
sima tennum
ad ten-ḍefren ahat ad tseggem
tilemẓit yenquqel lebɣi-s
cukkeɣ ttwakellexen
ad ṭṭfen rebɛa n yikersiyen
Ɣas akken yufa-d tawacult-is d yimddukal-is ɣer tama-s
akken yeqqar umedyaz deg wawal-is
awer iḥeddaṛ Ṛebbi i qiriqac
ad ččeɣ abbaɣ-nsent
a-t-an iḍegger-iyi
Ḥekkun tizidanin d tquranin
taqcict-a teččur d sser
maziɣ tewwi-t tnafa akken sima gar yifasen-is
amek ara xedmeɣ lutu i yiman-iw akken ad izmireɣ ad ɛiwneɣ wid yellan nḥafen d wid yeḥwaǧen afus n tallelt
lukan ad ffɣeɣ d teqcict
saɛid u muḥ yerfa
aṭas n yimdanen i yerḥa umezgun
maca akken kan ttɛeddin wussan d lechur
sɛeddan-d taswiɛt gar yigenni d lqaɛa
d acu ara k-d-iniɣ
ad d-nawi lhemm
mačči d ayen i d-sutreɣ
yettceqqiq wul-iw
kra ur tettagadeɣ
tezga gar uxxam d uɣerbaz
ijeggeḥ ddunit-is
tin yerḥan ula d imɣaren
Ɣas akken ur tesɛi ara ttiɛad d maziɣ
sliman u muḥ yedder
ula d maziɣ s lǧiha-s izmeḍ-itt ɣur-s
ur izegged deg lehdur
mmi yessen ilugan n wurar n ddabex n uḍar
anwa ara tamneḍ
ula d nekk bɣiɣ ad awḍeɣ iḥulfan-iw
Ḥsen u muḥ yezmer ad yettkel ɣef tiziri tagawawt
tthumuɣ kan ɣer sdat
ur ttarra ara iman-ik deg uɛewwiq
ayen akk i d-teqqar yella-as-d deg lbal
mi ara mlilen ttawin-d aṭas n yisental
s ssifa-s ifazen
sliman u muḥ ur yezmir ara ad yeǧǧ tiziri tagawawt
tebɣa d nettat ara t-yextiren seg wid yestahlen akken ad as-d-tsiḥ
teqqim deg ufrag i yiṭij
cceyɛeɣ-ak-d akk ayen yeqqnen ɣur-s
mi ara awin deg-s ayen uḥwaǧen deg-sen
sliman u muḥ yezmer ad iɛum
ur yeẓri d acu ara as-yini
ziɣen tegziḍ timsal akken-nniḍen
sliman u muḥ ur yenni ara i tiziri tagawawt
d amsaḥ i ten-temsaḥ deg wallaɣ-is
Ḥsen u muḥ yusa-d d tiziri tagawawt
iɛeṭṭel yidir di tejmaɛt
ayen teffer seg zik s daxel n wul-is
ad ččeɣ akka cwiya
lxedma yelhan
d acu yellan ass-a d uzzig
Ɣur-k ass deg ara tqeṛḥeḍ iḥulfan n wayeḍ
yella d aɣbalu n laman i d-yettak i yal yiwen deg uxxam
tennum tamuɣli-nsen d lehdur-nsen
Ččiɣ imekli s uɛijel
saɛid u muḥ yessuter smeḥ stidet i tiziri tagawawt
inuda uselmad deg uqrab-iw
yak d nekk i k-id-ɛerḍen
yeḥka-yas taluft akken tella
sɛan tamuɣli-nsen ɣas akken meẓẓiyit
ayen akk iyi-iceɣben allaɣ-iw
ayen ahat yeẓra dda brahem deg lpari dayen ur tezmireḍ ad teḥsuḍ
am wakken teẓẓareḍ da i zedɣeɣ
ma yehwa-yak ad tawiḍ ula d chakira
ula d imdanen akken
deg-s uḥwaǧen
acimi ur as-tettarraḍ ara awal
yal yiwen deg-sen yuɣal ɣer ṭṭbiɛa-s

mazal-it da
ur tettruḥuḍ ara s axxam
yal yiwen s wacu ara yesḥus
tasnawit anda qqaren
maɛna d acu d-yewwin lmeɣreb ɣer lɛica 
sliman u muḥ yettban meẓẓi
anecraḥ d temddukal
d nekkni kan i yeǧǧuman ad nefhem aya
deg leɛmer i ak-d-sliɣ temmmeslayeḍ-d ɣef wannect-a
asulay yemmal-d taɣawsa s wudem asuf
ayen bɣiɣ ad hedreɣ i d-yeqqar mi ara d-yettmeslay
a-tt-an tewweḍ-d ṛṛuplan anwi i d-tewwi

anẓad n uqerru

ibecc aserwal-is

Ɛni teččiḍ

beṛkat
Ččiɣ imekli s uɣiwel
bɣiɣ ad ẓṛeɣ anwa i d-yeɣṛan
ilaq ad t-waliɣ ma meqqer
amek ara qableɣ timsal
Ɛni d baba-k i tt-yeẓẓan
acimi i nettjeddir di tmurt-a ṣbeḥ meddi
ass n arim ad dduɣ ar tmurt n walman
d acu-t uɣaɛas i d-nessewjed
yiwen yenɣa sliman u muḥ
deg teẓṛi d tusnakt i xeddmeɣ
tsawel-iyi yemma tamacahut
iḥemmel ad isuden afus-ines
yuɣal-d zik s axxam
awi-d ukkan win yufan iman-is
tiziri tagawawt ur tettamen ara s Ṛebbi
anda ara qqimen di tlata
d acu ara yexdem umeɣbun-a meskin
Ɛyiɣ nezzeh ass-agi
anwa i d abrid ittawin ɣer temdint n bgayet
maziɣ mi yewweḍ s axxam
deg useggas ɣer wayeḍ
anwa asif i d aɣezzfan akk di lezzayer
ulac ccekk d akken yezgel tamacint
aniti sebbaḍ i tḥemmleḍ
aqjun-a yeshewhiw aṭas
d acu-tent ihi tissas ara yesdukklen iqbayliyen
imceḥ taqessult-is armi tfukk
tettḥerrik ssker-is
yeggumma wul ad tt-yettu
kerzen yes-sen tamurt
yerza ɣef yemma-s ɣer sbiṭar
sliman u muḥ yeɣleḍ
ur sbehdilet ara
siwel-as-d kan i baba-k
amek tufamt ungal-is amaynut
ugin ad rren aḍar
ur iyi-ttara ara aɣbel
berkat tifukal
akken tebɣuḍ tεerḍeḍ d yiwen ugmuḍ kan ara d-yeffɣen
yettwakkes-as uxemmem
mačči d ayen isehlen
tenwa ad ternu ɣer wiyaḍ ziɣen teɣleḍ deg leḥsab
a yemma yemma
win yesɛan idrimen ɣas yeskadeb yenna-d tidet
nwan ddunit d awal kan waqila
kra ur d-yettas akka kan
acuɣer i tettjeṛṛibem ameɣlal
ad issired uffad-is akked iḍarren-is s waman
anwa seg-sen
Ẓer kan
fakken-awen-ten
tɣunfaḍ-ten
abbuh dayen tewweḍ tyerza s aḥdid
pua yecna
cfiɣ walaɣ lfilm-a
tsawḍeḍ ad twaliḍ
a yemma sber ur ttru ad waliɣ udem n nnbi
ali d asawen
heddreɣ-as yugi ad ifhem
allen qqnent aqerru iḍegger ɣer deffir
Ɣur-wet takeṛṛust
s wakka ineggura ad uɣalen d imezwura
imiren ad yerr i mkul yiwen akken i llan lefɛayel-is
ahat yes-k

ur ken-ḥemmleɣ ara
ur ttnekkaremt ara

acuɣer
mazal-iken din
saḥit tikkelt-nnayeḍ

ur lhin ara lumuṛ

yerra-yas-t-id
yecceḍ

ad awen-tent-yeɛṛeḍ

ttbecciceɣ cwiṭ kan
ddin-im d aɣbel i tlelli
iɛeyyen-ak
gar yemcac i ubeḥri d ṭlam

d mmi-s

la iyi-yettnadi

fernem s ttawil

fakkent-akent-tt

Ḥennec tom
iɛessasen ttergigin si lxuf uɣalen amzun mmuten
qaren argaz bu nnif ɣlay ɣer medden yeswa

iεceq-itt

ilaq ad nečč tura
axaṭeṛ atan da
ih dihin ɣef ẓelmeḍ n tzeqqa-nni akkin
cukkeɣ nemlal yakan
wwiɣ-d claḍa
arumt-as i tom
ad nezweǧ di sin ad nkemmel i ubrid i d-nenjer
neḍben

tenɣa-yi-t
nekk d amsaltu
tuzzuft gar uberkan d teqbaylit
rnu ɣer waya ahil n useɣri-nsen i yeččuren nezzeh rnu-t ɣer wakud i iḥeṛṣen akken ilaq fell-asen
Ɛni kemm mačči n da
ma yugi baba-s ad s-tt-ifk ad ixelleṣ s yidrimen azal n teɛmamt i ttaken ɣef tɛezriyin
a yiwet n tmagadt
ur nezṛi acu i d ayennat
tenɣiḍ-asent-tent
tettṛebbi ibekki
wekked
yusa-d weqẓiẓ-a ad yessemderkel tikli-w
yečča aksum-is d azegzaw
ur as-terri ara twehha kan ɣer uɛebbuḍ-is
mendas yuɣ-as awal i ṭṭbib-nn
ur tesɛiḍ ara yemma-m
iselman deg ukwaṛyum
aqli gezmeɣ-d igenwan
ad as-yini beggen-d lameṛ
Ḥadret iman-nwen si lenbiya n lekdeb
asemt-d
ad s-t-εasseɣ
ay ḥkan d way nnan imɣaṛen n zzman
tikwal s nnefḥa
ur s-yezmir ara
winna bezzaf ɣezzif ufus-is
yif-it ma tṛuḥeḍ

deg wayen akk rǧiɣ uyseɣ
ur cukkeɣ ara tella tin i s-yeslan
ur iḥemmel ara aɣerbaz s waṭas
di leɛnaya-nwen kkrem
ay tenniḍ d way m-nniɣ

tazwara teεreq-iyi
briɣ i wayen i ṭṭfeɣ
di leɛnaya-m xdem kra n tɣawsa
ikɛeb yesɛa yiwen ujeḥniḍ meqqer d aneẓẓaw

ttrajun-kun
neḥbes cituḥ deg atina mi nessakel ɣer paris
lḥeṛma tettban s anyir
yella kra i kem-icewwlen
d amaynut kečči
ala ma tefna ddunit
zoro yeǧǧa-d rrjuj deg garcia

ara d-ğğeɣ d aẓar-iw
ahil umaṭṭaf-nni yeɛya maḍi
ad nεiwez i yitran
at wallaɣ yellan deg ul-awen

yeffeɣ-d uqcic ḥezluṭi
d lfetna mebla asekkin
Ẓṛiɣ kullec
zemreɣ ad ḍelbeɣ deg-m lemzeyya
tecbeḥ tira-s
kul wa d lmizan yessen
yezmer tom ad iɛumm
Ɣaḍen-iyi igḍaḍ-nni i d-ṭṭfeɣ zik s txeftin
aṭas ara d-yasen
izmer lḥal ad d-tas
ulin ar wayyur
ayen i yi-ḥejben fell-am
tḥemmel ad tnadi deg aman
ur ǧǧiɣ amkan
nekk bɣiɣ ad sweɣ ccrab dagi mačči deg laxeṛt
yettbin-d iwenneɛ
s tidet tenwiḍ ad k-ssudneɣ
kker ad truḥeḍ
tom yefka-yas aseṛfiq i mary
drus maḍi ara yeẓṛen
Ɣiwel aseḍru qebl ad teḍru
axxam bla tameṭṭut tessa-d fell-as tagut
ay aεziz melmi ara k-ẓreɣ
gezmeɣ iman-iw
ur ak-irra ara tagest
teɣli meskint deg ujeqjaq n waman
tekkat apyanu
annaɣ a yemma ad mmteɣ
yella kra i yeḍṛan d tom
yečča lexber
Ɛeddan wussan yuɣal yuyes yefcel dayen
ad d-ffɣent akk s iberdan
ibedd af tfednin
yuɣal tom ur ittkeyyif ara
nezga nettemyaru tibratin
ula deg lǧameɛ ttagaden ɣef yisebbaḍen-nsen
nessa agertil ɣer lqaɛa
qqerṣeɣ seg uḥuccu
yuɣal tom d amexlul
ad tt-huddeɣ
aql-aɣ tura nebbeḥbeḥ neɛya seg umeddeḥ
ur ssinent ara leṣlaḥ-nsent
tidet kan teɛǧeb-iyi teqcict-nni
Ɣucceɣ tasertit
tezga tettḥewwis ar tmurt-nni
ad ɣṛeɣ di tesdawit n bgayet
bɣan ad t-ččen d amuddir
anda yedda ad yettwalas
ufiɣ iman-iw yerna mliḥ
ad teǧğuğegḍ ad trennuḍ akken i nebɣa ad kem-nwali"
yelli-s-nni teččur d ineḥwan
uḥwaǧeɣ kan ad yi-iɛawen walebɛaḍ
dacu ara teččem
ur cukkeɣ ara yebɣa ad yeddu
ay iṭṭij ḥader ad teɣliḍ
yezmer tom ad icucef
qqim ur d-ittawi alqim
ur t-ttamen ara winna d abnadi
melmi ara d-rreɣ takeṛṛust-nni
d ajdid kečči
ay ugiɣ-ten bɣan-iyi
bɣiɣ ad ččeɣ lbaṭaṭa
ad d-yefk Ṛebbi tabburt
qrib ad sɛeddin yinelmaden ikayaden
aql-ik-id deg uxxam
amek ara yeffeɣ leḥkem-is
tidet kan ur ẓriɣ ma ilaq ad rnuɣ ad ɛaceɣ
senndeɣ ar lḥiḍ urǧiɣ ad d-tbineḍ
Ɛni d imaynuten
Ḥemmleɣ anebdu
bɣan ad teddum yid-sen am yeɣyal kan deffir izgaren
s wannuz d yiseɣ
ur yi-tewqiε ara deg ayen qqaren medden
taqbaylit tesεa sser
ad yemsenḍaḥ d gma-s
ibra i ṭṭbel deg waman
tlaq telqey deg tira
tettmeslay tapuṛtugit
armi d-cehwaɣ seksu n temẓin
yecceg ɣef iḥider ukermus
tebɣiḍ ad teffɣeḍ azekka
bɣant ad issinent asewwi
binyamin d uccen i yezzren
ssemlil-iyi-d ass-agi d lmerɣub-iw
atmaten imeṛṛa wawras d uheggaṛ
adam iṭṭeṣ daɣen akked tmeṭṭut-is
tenta tistent gar yiccer d uksum
yir ṛṛay itezzi am timni
ad d-asen ad yi-awin ad beddleɣ axxam
qbel ad yekfu uεwin-ik
sani tmal ttejṛa i tɣelli
timmuɣnest d tigawin mačči d awal
Ṣṣeḥa deg uḍeggal aḥlal
Ẓmeḍ-iyi d kemm i lsiɣ
lḥif d kra yuɛren
sennig n kra yellan
a wi yeddren ad d-yawi ttbut
deg tegrest nettawi-ten rkin seg uxxam deg ṣṣabun yeḥman
i aɣ-xedmen
yiwen n wass ikcem yusef s axxam ad ixdem ccɣwel-is
ih tesliḍ-d
gar yisaragen d tmeɣriwin akked waddal
a tafat n ṣbeḥ mi d-teḍher
teṭṭef lemri-nni s yiwen n ufus
amek meḥsub
yufa-tt-in teẓẓel di lqaɛa am uceṭṭiḍ
ad ibeddel tikli-ines ad ibeddel tannumi-ines
argaz-nni yekker itebɛ-it
Ẓẓeṭla d zzit uzemmur iṭij abeḥri tili
lemḥibba-w temmut nɣan-tt yedrimen
argaz-im mačči d menwala
ay ul-iw yettxemmimen
neqḍeɛ-it deg ubrid nefka-as lamana
yiwen n wass ad d-tuɣalemt
tuzzuft ad tbeddel tansa
amzun nenɣa-asen imawlan-nsen
anda-tt tmeṭṭut-agi i iḥewwṣen irgazen
musa yeqsed ad izdeɣ s argaz-nni
tettkerric icenfiren-is akken ad tesseblaɛ isuɣan-is
di tecmatin kan i tẓewrem
Ṛbeɛ ajdid ay drus
ala a xalti tɣelṭeḍ di tansa
d leḥram deg ddin
d menhu i telliḍ
nniɣ-ak kečč a mmi
ulmud n uẓawan deg uxxam n yidles mulud mɛemmri n temdint n tizi uzzu
ass-a d aqcic i isselmaden taqbaylit i yemma-s
dɣa yeǧǧa-ten dinna iṛuḥ
d acu i ken-iwwin ɣur-sent
win ibennun yettṣewwib lxiḍ
yessemqarab gar-asen
tissirt ma tuɣ-itent deg rryac ula i as-d-xedmen iɣuraf
ur yelli ɣef wacu ara yettru
ur d-necqi deg bu-temɣilin
d awezɣi ur cukkeɣ ara a tt-yexdem
iger-d nnehta s wurfan ččuṛen ikufan
acuɣer ur yi-d-tenniḍ ara belli d tameṭṭut-ik
ay imɣi n ṣṣaba
a yemma a wi iruḥen
qeɛdeɣ iman-iw
leḥmala i yefkan iẓuran
rnu-d ay isli lfeṭṭa n umeqyas
meẓyan yeffeɣ-d d argaz iẓewren di ṣṣyada iḥemmel lexlawi
aṭas aya ur ḥulfaɣ ara akka
telzem-ikent tkeffart
telzem-ak tkeffaṛt deg unebdu n leḥṛuṛ
nettat tesmenyaf taddart ɣef temdint
d acu n ddwa i k-d-ifka umejjay
yugi-yas i weltma-s ad teffeɣ
ur umineɣ ayen iwumi sliɣ
tsawleḍ
aheggi n umawal ameqqran i d-yesuffeɣ
yerkeḍ akk seksu-nni i nefser s txabbazin-is
tfukk-itt
akeččum baṭel i igerdan ur neqqar deg uɣerbaz
anida i llan yiberdan i yessefraḥen imsebriden
a tawaɣit n lɛulama n ccariɛa akked ifarisiyen
ad yili uqerru awudam agejdan
lferḥ deg wul i yella mačči alamma s llira
mazal ur iyi-tessineḍ ara
giɣ isenfaren
tḥulfa s tefses
acḥal d abrid i ččant tagella d lemleḥ n uxxam-iw
Ẓṛiɣ tesɛiḍ lḥeq
yiwen ur iɛellem s wayagi
akka kan
ttif lḥecma n ddunit wala tin n laxert
ceḥḥa tugi yusef asbizzer yugi Ɛmaṛa
irra ɣer lǧiha n Ṣur akked Ṣidun
wali akk taggayin
anemhal iḥemmel ayen xeddmeɣ yezga yennecraḥ
akka i teḍra
nekkat ɣef talwit
tayri d tlelli n tekti
lḥenni yeḥmeq deg ufus ireqqem
uɣalen ttmenṭaren deg unafag n lqahira
tečča aɣrum-nni s wudi
nniɣ-as i sidi i ma tugi tmeṭṭut-nni ad d-teddu yid-i
tademcact n ṭlam
a lxir-iw a mmi a lxir-iw zewǧeɣ-as i waras
ur d- ttaǧǧat ara seg-s i uzekka-nni ṣṣbeḥ
tebha
yeẓra yiṭij tameṭṭut n waggur
maca werǧin i xdimeɣ kra bla ccur n baba
nniɣ-am kemm a yelli a taxeddact n uzanzu
imiren ad d-teḥḍer taggara
yewweḍ lexbar xwal-is luɛan-d i lejmaɛ s axxam n uciban
ma d tikelt-a terra tajmilt i tmeṭṭut tamaziɣt s umata
ifuk lḥerǧ a lxawa
sellek-itt
wali amek
d acu ara nečč
ur umineɣ ara ad awḍeɣ
uzzleɣ
ur ḥsin ara d nutni i yettuɣaḍen
terna tseṭṭa s isegman
nekk ttusemreɣ deg umkan-iw
ixleq-d daɣen leḍyur meṛṛa mkul yiwen s ṣṣenf-is
acḥal i ncerreg lebḥer
ad iceggeɛ lmuluk-is s undah n lbuq
ar melmi akka ara yiliɣ yid-wen
aṭṭan n tisselbi icuba ɣer lfinga
tidet yiwet d tagi i d tidet ilaq ad tt-tqebleḍ
ur kkat ajerbub
texdem akken acku meqqret deg leɛmer
si meẓyan yedder meyya u sebɛa u tlatin n iseggasen
sefḍen akk azmumeg seg wudem-iw
yemmut deg lɣerba
neɣra
agdud mebla idles am umdan mebla iles
fukken wussan n yimuras
yal asenfar yebḍa d tigezmin
nezha
mačči d ayen ara ɣren
ur d-nnin acemma
yiwen n wass yekker-d bu nniyat yenna-as nebγa tafat
nessen leṣlaḥ-nneɣ
lehduṛ ma xlan d aṣeggad mebla nnican
mi d-ffɣeɣ syen ḥulfaɣ i tefses

d lwaldin-nsen i yettṣerrifen fell-asen

tebbehbaḍ
yasuɛ inṭeq inna tɣelḍem

adfel deg udrar ssemm-is deg uẓaɣar

anwa ara kent-yamnen

anda yal wa ijebbed ɣer tama-s yal wa yefka i yiman-is lḥeqq

aṭas i ččiɣ
ad siwḍeɣ ɣer lebɣi-w mebla ma yeqqen-iyi yiwen

ur asen-d-tuqiɛ ara
amek i tebɣiḍ timellalin-ik d tuftiyin d timerwiyin neɣ d tikiṛucin
ma iqeεεed lḥal azekka ad nruḥ ad nεumm deg asif
qrib d yennayer
aṭas i yestehzayen di tira s teqbaylit
sɛeddi-iyi-d ifelfel ttxil-k
yeṭṭes armi d azal yeqqar mazal lḥal

ladɣa tin yeɣran
msawalen
asmi i t-leḥqent ufant yeffreɣ
ayɣer i teffreḍ fell-i annect-a
anwa ur newwit ara nneḥ ɣef ṣṣerf amecṭuḥ n lqeḍyan
awal-ik d ameqqran
ad kem-id-iɣit rebbi
tessneḍ amek ad sen-telḥuḍ i yigurdan

aṭas i truḍ fell-asen

aḥeqq wahi d wahi

mi ara tettnezziheḍ ddabex n uḍar n turuft ad tasmeḍ

yeɣra di tmenqas

ahat ur cukteɣ d wid yeddren
tajmilt i wid yettarun s teqbaylit
i wagi acu i ak-yexdem tura
Ɛni d kennemti ara ydebbṛen fell-asen
iwala-tent-id rebbi

ad teddum ɣer tizi n at Ɛica neɣ s at Ɛemṛan
d acu i teffreḍ deffir-k a yidir
tura ungal
ad d-awint iseɣ
bɣiɣ ad ẓṛeɣ d acu i yexdem tom iḍelli
kecmen-d ɣer wadeg leɛmer ssnen
yugi-yas baba-s ad inher takerrust n gma-s
d awezɣi ad d-yuɣal uqiṛquc deg yimi n taɣaḍt
uffgen iḍarren-is
teṭṭef abrid ɣer tneɣrit anda qqaren ugraw n maziɣ
ini-d kan yiwen n wawal
yugi ad yimɣur
ma d tura urar kan
ccfaɛ uqerru-k
anwa ara yebnun
ur k-iɣaḍ ara
ečč ad k-iḥaseb
as-tiniḍ tettwasraɛ
ur d-tsawala ara
anti i k-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi
tekfa taggazt n new york s usubbu ass-a
ad tṛuḥ ɣer sedduq neɣ ɣer sidi Ɛic
ufiɣ bezzaf
ula d imddukal s lǧiha-nsen llan ffɣen-d acḥal-aya
ladɣa mi ara yewwet s waṭas
ula d nekki wellah ma ṭṭalayeɣ-tt akk
ladɣa massi
ula d tiqcicin ṭṭalayent-tt
ula d massi ur yeṭṭif ara iman-is
la yerfed lqec-is
leɛmer ẓrin
ulac aṭas n medden
ma tesken-d iḥulfan-is
uma deg wallaɣ-iw yella wayen yezwaren annect-a
ma tkesbeḍ ul-is
ur k-ttarzeɣ
maca a-tt-an tekcem deg yixemmimen-is
ur ḥsiɣ d tafat
mi ara d-qqimen ɣer ṭṭabla akken ad uraren dduminu
ur yebni ara ɣef waya
imdel-as allen-is
tesɛam tabyirt tafessast
aql-i di lhemm-iw ur yi-d-rennu ara lhemm-ik
d acu i tebɣam ɣur-neɣ
awer i d-tuɣaleḍ
d tayi i tudert n maziɣ
tṣubb s anda ur d-tettali
ur d-ttuɣaleɣ ara
a nnger uqriḍ
d taɣerma i d llsas n tiktiwin akk tsertanin n tallit-nni
ma yella teffeɣ-d i lmul-nni n lxedma d leqraya
d tatmatin
layla tella tettbin-d timelsit maca a nnger n win i tt-iḥemmlen
ad d-tsawaleḍ
llant waṭas n tewreḍtin tizeggaɣin deg wurti
waqila d iɣerdayen ara d-iɣlin mačči d adfel
ad d-mmektiɣ awal n teqcict-nni
terniḍ taεẓegt
d amerbuḥ d asaɛdi
d yessi-k tigi a yidir
idrimen-is akk yefka-ten deg ayen ur nemɛin
kkes-as akk ayen yerkan i texsayt-nni
amek armi ɣas akken urǧin ṭṭifen adabu ulac adabu ajenṭaḍ i ten-yesnegren
tebra ma yeẓra Ḥemza anda yenza
iqubel ayen i as-d-teḥka s rẓana
bɣiɣ afenǧal n lqehwa
yeṭṭalay kan deg-s
anda-nniḍen ttruḥun medden ɣer yinurar i wakken ad stummnen
sserwayen yemyurar-nneɣ lḥif i yisleɣmayen-nsen
ad k-iḥrez rebbi
anda ttidiren yimawlan-is
d acu ara k-d-yawi uneẓmi
d lḥif i t-id-irebban
ilaq-iyi ad xedmeɣ kra
ilaq ad t-id-tafeḍ
yiwen ur as-yettruẓ aqerruy-is
aqel-in da
aṭas i ruɣ fell-ak
ulac win i t-ifehmen
d tadɣaɣat iyi-xenqen tiyuẓaḍ-iw
irucc axxam yerna addaynin
tuker-asent
yesserwa-yas baba-s tiqaqqacin
Ɣur-i taɣaḍt tecfa-d i tṛad mgal fransa
azger yesserwet-itent aɣyul yečča-tent
bru i wawal tura
s ḥellu-k
asmi ara yeǧǧuǧǧeg lmelḥ
acḥal tefṛeḥ yelli-s mi twala inisi
yal ass isawal yidir i newwara
fren-tt anda ur tt-ittaf yiwen
aksum-a i d-tuɣeḍ ala iɣsan
anda i d-tendeh ad ilin din
bɣan ad ṛuḥen azekka ar ṣṣyada
maca yezga unecreḥ gar-asen
tugi-t lmut
iɣsan-is ttnejqiqen seg usemmiḍ
teqqar deg wul-is
ifukk walim deg udaynin
tṛuḥeḍ ɣer din ur iyi-d-tenniḍ ara
ur ittruḥu ara ɣer tesdawit
Ḍsant meṛṛa teqcicin-nni
am tin yeffuden aman
fell-asent i turam asefru-nni
anwa ara as-yinin i yizem "ittfuḥu nnefs-ik"
nettnadi ur nettaf
yesseɣli-t wass
bɣiɣ ad iyi-tebnuḍ yiwen n lḥiḍ n snat lmitrat di leɛli
isleɣmayen tḥeyyren
tugem-d si tala
tessen-it deg useggas amenzu i d-yekcem ɣer tesdawit
yella yeskeṛ d acu tura tezri-as
Ḥeḍreɣ mi tedda d tislit
asmi i teɛllem s wayen yeḍran
anda-tt lehwa
ddiɣ d yir arfiq yeǧǧa-yi deg yir amḍiq
tekra-d newwara taqendurt i tmeɣra
jmaɛliman aman yeḥman
ldint wallen-nneɣ
ass-n n tirga n uḥemmel
azul a yelli
ad neqqim ad nehder
tessers aqerruy-is
ilaq ad d-taɣeḍ taɣerdayt ta tceṭṭeḥ akk
tleḥḥu bellegdis
cudden-as aɣesmar
teɛlem d akken yeqqen ɣer leqraya
iḥar mmi melmi ara yenher takerrust
d acu ara k-d-yawi uxemmem
tḥemmel temɣart tislit-is
ad d-nezhen deg-neɣ medden
tin yuḍnen ad tejji
yiwen ur t-iwala
acimi i tt-tkerheḍ
d aluḍ anda i terriḍ
ttuɣ adlis deg uxxam
wissen ma tufa-t
myerjament
Ɣur-k tissegnit n txeyyaṭ
yečča tanalt-is
zdi lqedd-ik
ur yeɣli ur yekkir
ad kent-teǧǧ tmacint
ddayxa tekreh iman-is
yunef-asent ad ɛeddint
iḥar
tedduɣ-as di nneqma
wa yelsa wa yeεra
bɣiɣ ad idireɣ
tuker-aɣ
yerra-yi deg uɛewwiq
tumert d teɣzi n tudert
ad ṛuḥent ɣer sedduq neɣ ɣer sidi Ɛic
ur gziɣ tigert
tuli tara-k
yessen-it akken i ilaq
ur ẓriɣ ara amek ara ak-d-sfehmeɣ tamsalt-a
ad as-tiniḍ d asekles i tessekles
wa yettcerrig wa yettxiḍi
yufa-aɣ-d amahil
yal taggara n ddurt tkeččem-d newwara si tesdawit
bgayet tif akk timdinin
uzneɣ-ak-in tabrat
tedduɣ-am di nneqma
tettḥawaleḍ-tent a winnat
acimi i tzeɛfeḍ
iban ɣef wudem-is yexleɛ
d acu i la txeddmeḍ seg zgelli
iɣaḍ-it lḥal nezzeh
acim i ur truḥeḍ ara ad d-tagmeḍ
yura asefru
yif-it ma qqimeɣ
tedda-yawen di nneqma
iban belli tessnemt-t mliḥ
afus-is deg ufus-inu
acimi ur truḥeḍ ara s aɣerbaz iḍelli
yuzen-asent-in tabrat
Ɣur-i izen iεeǧlen sɣur tom
awi-d
anwa i ak-d-yessawlen
taccuyt tasilt tuggi yal wa amek i as-yeqqar
txerreq targit yis-i
win ur d-nenṭiq yeqbel
ad asen-t-id-yawi azekka
tuḍnemt aɣbel
uzneɣ-asent tabrat
ad teddum yid-neɣ ɣer lexla
win ara t-id-yawin ɣer uxxam
rriɣ-kem deg uɛewwiq
eǧǧ-iyi ad sirdeɣ iqejḍuṛen
mazal ur tefhimem ara amek i teddunt temsal
qerḥent-iyi tuɣmas-iw
yečča imekli-is
ad aɣ-gerrzen wussan
yuɣ-asen-t-id
dagi ur mwataɣ ara yid-k
d nekk i k-yessnen
iteddu yettwehhi
taqbaylit mačči d urar
ul yejreḥ tasa tuḍen
yedduqqes
wa yettak wa yessutur
ifrax sεan afriwen
ttnnameɣ-tt
a baba ḥnini
anda i teqqareḍ
iteddu yettqudur
ar wanda i ten-tefkiḍ
anwa i yuran ungal askuti
lliɣ bɣiɣ ad ad d-ṭṭfeɣ agḍiḍ maca ufiɣ ziɣ mačči d ayen isehlen
sima tella tecbeḥ nezzeh
ruḥ-as yiwet yiwet kan
sliman u muḥ yewweḍ-d
tuker-ikem
a mmi ɛezzu
ur iṣeḥḥa ara yiẓri-is i tenhert
ur iyi-trujaḍ ara
yuwi-asent-ten-id
tarewla tenfeɛ bab-is
nedda-yawen di nneqma
ili-kent d tid yelhan ar medden
yuzen-asen-in tabrat
s wul-is i yettwali
ttun-iyi akk
ttafent-d iman-nsent deg rrif
at taddart merra ffɣen-d ad t-mmagren
wissen d acu i aɣ-d-yettheggi uzekka
yif-iyi gma tiḥerci
nettarra-kem deg uɛewwiq
ur asen-yuzin ara tabrat
yak teẓriḍ muḥend d abaḍni ixeddem lecɣal-is di tsusmi
ad aɣ-t-id-ifek
yal imalas ass n ssuq yettuɣal-d
yenna-d yesmenyif ccrab azewwaɣ
yenna anda i iyi-tella ad tt-awḍeɣ
yemla-awen-d abrid yelhan
fukkeɣ ihi tura ad ffɣeɣ
aha tura berka-aɣ tuzya tunḍa
inuda fell-awen yufa-ken
iqedder isɣaren i tegrest
win yebɣan ad isew ad isew win yebɣan ad iẓal ad iẓal
tiɣerɣert n uxxam tesleɣ s wakal
inaddalen tettiɣzif tudert-nsen
yura yiwen n uḍris d aɣezzfan
menyif targit yelhan wala yir targit
yufeg uqermud yeɛra uxxam
umnen s rebbi maɛna nɣan ayen id-yexleq
yeččur umedyaz d iḥulfan
meqqert tfawet aṭas i aɣ-cergen
yal taɣawsa ɣur-s taggara
ur tettu ara ssaki-iyi-d azekka ssbeḥ
amek i tt-steqsan
ad nɣellet tidi-nneɣ yerɣan
tettaddam-it
yesluɣ tala
acḥal aya ur ččiɣ buzelluf
Ṭṭuqqtent fell-awen tlufa
ad s-nini d yir leḥmala
ad awen-ikellex umennuɣ
nettat tugi-iyi nek bɣiɣ-tt
akka i d-tenna
aṭas i tezḍa yemma n yitrikuyen
ur ḥemmleɣ ara ccerba
tebɣiḍ ad teččeḍ
heggi usu uqbel naddam
a win yettaggaden uzzal
dagi di tmanaɣt ula d tiḥuna n tkiluḍin ldint
yeddem-it-id
ad as-yini ɣef ttaṛ ma ɣliɣ
ad d-iban yiḍelli
d tarewla kan i ttargun yilemẓiyen-nneɣ
ad iyi-yuɣal
amek i t-tturaren
ad s-nessers udem-nniḍen
yelha umeẓẓuɣ n yilef i lǧerḥ
ur d-yeqqim uṭenṭun
yella win i walaɣ
iḥewwes ar bgayet
ma d yelli-s tettawi-as-d ulman
acuɣer nugi ad neḥlu
akka i d-nnan
tesluɣem tala
ad iḥrez rebbi tawwurt yellin
ad asen-yessexreb lecɣal
ur tgir ara yemma azeṭṭa aseggas-a
aṭas i awen-yessan taẓerbit seddaw-as d isennanen
amek ara t-nadin
d idammen-ik i d lhemm-ik
ad asen-yeεreq wawal
ad s-d-afeɣ ssebba
ula d ilmeẓyen n tura ttarun
isɣi d amellal meεna itett imurḍas
yerra iman-is ur d-yesli ara akk
yedda-yasen di nneqma
ssneɣ-k akken i iwata akken ad k-amneɣ
sliman u muḥ yettɛawan tiziri tagawawt yal tikkelt
Ḥemmelɣ-kem a marie
yiwwas deg wussan iεedda-d yiwen weqjun
nwiɣ ufiɣ iman-iw
ma ad ak-ǧǧeɣ ad tesserseḍ afus-ik fell-i
idha deg wurar armi yettu iman-is
s teqbaylit kan i ttzuxxuɣ
efk-iyi cwiṭ n wakud ad t-id-mmektiɣ
Ɣef akken i terfiḍ
Ḥemdullah
ilaq ad ḥerrkeɣ
i sin ttbinen-d xedmen-tt
ttcemmiṛen iɣallen-nsen
mazal ur as-d-ssukkseɣ ara
yelha ma yella uran-tt ad tt-id-afen wiyaḍ
ad fkeɣ idlisen-iw iqdimen
aṭas i yeɛyan si tmurt-nsen
melmi k-d-nniɣ akka
gen di talwit a gma seddi lamara d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ad aɣ-ten-id-yawi azekka
tagmert taqburt n tsekla timawit
ad tḥebseḍ deg tasaft neɣ deg iɣil n wammas
ulac idrimen deg leǧyub-iw iqersen
yeqqerṣ ṭṭbel-iw
tettara-d ɣef wid teẓra meɛnen
taɣuri d tira s teqbaylit uɣalen d aɣan fell-aneɣ
a taḥeccaḍt n ubrid
i nutenti d acu i tent-id-igren di tessirt
amek tettili
yurew-d asefru
ihi ad ak-d-iniɣ ula d nekk ad ak-d-iniɣ tanmirt imi iyi-d-tḥesseḍ zgelli
yiwen n usɣar yerwi tirect
yuɣ tasegbart
d lxir a yemma bɣiɣ kan ad waliɣ akli
ibda uwelleh n ussefrey ɣef ubeddel anezway
xas teḥṛes teswaɛt ttmagaren-d ifeṭṭiwjen n tumert cennun tuɣac n tudert
yettaru s tutlayt taqbaylit
yal wa tudert-is
yeqqim-d ɣef umeṭreḥ
si melmi akkaay ifker
Ččar-d abidun n waman
nwan-iyi ffɣeɣ i ubrid
lmut d abrid ur nexli
tamacahut tettrebbi tella d nettat i d aɣerbaz-nneɣ
susmet kan
Ẓer kan lawan i akem-isuɛden ad d-ɛeddiɣ
tom ur yemmug ara i uselmed
d taqbaylit i nelmed ar yemma-tneɣ
d acu i as-yenna
ad iyi-yanef ad ɛeddiɣ
wwin-as-d ṭṭbib s axxam
yelha ssuq ass-a
ddiɣ akked yemma ad d-nawi azemmur
inuda fell-i yufa-iyi
yak ulac draɛ deg wannect-a
llan yagi mmuten d tirni
lehna n tudert-ik icudd ɣer tɣara n tedmiwin-ik
tefkiḍ-iyi axessaṛ s tqendurt-nni telsiḍ
d taqbaylit kan i d tutlayt-nneɣ fiḥel ad d-nexleq tutlayt

tettarram-t deg uɛewwiq

yeččur wul n lwiza aṭas i d-tura ɣef lkaɣeḍ

sawlent
ihayen
akken d-yeɣli yiḍ teqqim temɣert zzin-as-d warraw n warraw-is
xtaṛent-iyi
limer ufiɣ luleɣ-d xersum am tlawin akk niḍen deg tmurt-a
ayagi d ayen iwumi teḥwaǧ teqbaylit nezzeh
ssexbabḍeɣ argaz-nni ur faqeɣ ara amek i t-ufiɣ yefser di lqaɛa
ad d-rreɣ lesdud ad sirdeɣ iseqfan

Ṭṭef aqemmuc-ik
ulamma amezruy yefra-tt-id isebggen-d d acu-t uzzayri d acu-tent tmeslayin-is
nekk d ameɣlal
amcic yif aɣerda
iffeɣ-d musa sɣur ferɛun dɣa iɛenna ɣer umeɣlal
i d-tettheyyi tdukkla tadelsant adrar n fad
ad issired llebsa-s dɣa ad iṣfu
tullist-ik d tasekla n tidet tesdukel ccbaḥa n usekkil
ttxil-m eǧǧ-iyi ad ffɣeɣ
nheṛ cemma-cemma
yeqqur uqerruy-nneɣ
uṛǧant
nekk d iḥiqel
ladɣa deg yidgan i d-yezzin i wammasen n usɛeddi n yikayaden
teṭṭfeḍ-tent-id
amek armi zegzaw yigenni
inna i yessi-s anda yella urgaz-agi
ataya urgaz la d-yessawal
akken i as-yenna bṛiṛuc ayen iyi-sbezgen ad k-iṛuc
mbeɛd iceggeɛ-asen mmi-s
ad tt-yesseɣli
ur as-ttḥulfun ara ula i tyita
yelha-d ala d unadi
yebda ccna i yiman-is syin akkin iɛedda-d deg tedwilt-nni ifennanen n uzekka n mǧahed Ḥamid

tḥemmlem taẓuri

d kečč akked tarwa-k iwumi ara fkeɣ timura-agi meṛṛa

annaɣ txedɛem taqbaylit ay iḍemmaɛen
