Ḍfer-it
tuggad daɣen argaz-nni ur tessin ara
tameddit-nni ččiɣ akk tiremt-iw n lmakla
azekka n ttlata ad tili tmeɣra meqqren ara d-yilin i lfayda n yimeḍharen
ad tɣibeḍ tlata n wussan
Ḥwaǧeɣ tibratin-a
aɛraben d wudayen d tarwa n leɛmum
sgugel
aman n tala ur ɛdilen ara akked waman n usariǧ
mi tt-yeẓra s wallen-is neɣ yesla i ṣṣut-is yettruḥu-yas ɛeggu n lxedma
Ṛuḥemt siwlemt-as ad d-yas ad yečč
uɣal s usu
ad as-yernu teɣzi n leɛmer
tṛuḥem deg-sent
yelha aṭas d argaz n tissas
axxam d leɛyub yeččur iɛeẓẓugen iderɣalen
melmi ad kem-ẓṛeɣ
selken
yekker yiwen n umdakel-iw
qelɛeɣ
yuɣal yezmumeg am wuccen
Ḥader iman-ik
iqjan ttkerriεen iɣsan
Ɣur-neɣ εecra tsita
ad urarent yid-neɣ
ttawḍen-tt-id yiriran
tɣileḍ d tabuheyyuft
yugad
yumen kullec
swan-tt
uɣalemt ar deffir
ala
akka ara tɛezleḍ haṛun akked llebsa-s arraw-is akked llebsa-nsen
Ɣur-i anect-a akk d ẓẓerb d warruz i ttarran yimdanen i wulawen-nsen
Ḥebseɣ lḥenni qbel ad yuɣal d arekti
rewlet
wamma imawlan ttfaten
ma tzemreḍ xas ma ulac fḥel
tamedyazt sneɣ-tt lwaḥi d ccna n teqbaylit
ma d tameṭṭut tlatin n iṣurdiyen
azul fell-as
yuba yessaged-iyi
d acu ara txedmemt
aferdis n usedwel ixelleq-d isteqsiyen i yimeɣri
ilguritmen-a bnan ɣef ulmad awurman almad lqayen akked ulmad s useǧhed
ma nniɣ i yiwen Ṛuḥ ad iṛuḥ
a xuya ay aẓerẓur a lbaz izedɣen lewɛur
d kemm i d affud d kemm i d asirem
tebda tettmeslay d yiman-is
meskint teqcict-a
yeɛfes tirgit ḥafi
ttkemmilent sexlaḍent rnu εerkent i urekti-nni zzit akked waman s umehraz
yal mi ara sugneɣ iman-iw tturareɣ s ucebbub-is aɣezfan berriken
tebɣam ad tuɣalem ansa i d-tekkam
acku aṭas n tewsatin i iruḥen
iraɛ-aneɣ ubrid
ad as-d-rnuɣ taklit
iqas agḍiḍ-nni
tanemmirt dayen ččiɣ
cwi kan fehmen-iyi
ddnubat-ik ttwaɛfan-ak
yella kra i teẓṛam
sya ɣer da ttilint-d tnagiyin n yiselmaden d yinemhalen i ixedmen yakan deg uɣerbaz-a
ad ɣ-ten-yefk
ttḥulfuɣ amzun akken d nekk kan i teɛna temsalt n tadist-a
yella-d diɣen ussan-a usmekti n yiwen wazemz nniḍen icudden dima ɣer tefsut d umennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt
maca deg yimal iqerben yezmer ad d-yuɣal d anammas asegman i warrac merra n temnaḍt
nnan-d tettusṭaxreḍ
sɛut ṛṛeḥma
sirdem udmawen-nwen
refdent taduṭ-nni uzlent s axxam
ur ufiɣ ara ɣer ddwa-nni
izga-asen d ugur
ad tent-tesseɣlim
tqellqemt
i teɛmer temdint
ad uraren yid-s
axxam-a d ayla-w
deg unebdu nettenkar zik ɣef rrebɛa neɣ lxemsa ilaq ad nṛuḥ s asif
ur yezmir ara ad isesteb deg windows
Ɣef yizerfan n umdan deg umaḍal
ufgen lekwaɣeḍ-nni
amek armi i ten-mazal da
deg lɣeṛḍ-nwen
sseqdaceɣ firefox
gan aya
wali kan mačči d yemma-k
tewwi-ken yid-s
win yeččan yečča ma d wayeḍ teṛbut tekkes
Ḥesset mliḥ
d nutni ara d-isbeggnen temɣer-iw zdat n ugdud meṛṛa
nebɣa ad kem-nissin
tameṭṭut-nni fessusen iḥedqen
xeẓẓreɣ kan tanemmirt
Ɣef yisennanen i yeqqim
ad teddukleḍ yid-i
mi d-tewweḍ tmeddit yufa-t-id lḥal weḥd-s dinna
yemmeslay-d ɣef wannar n terbeɛt n yilmeẓyen n leqbayel
ad teslem i ṭṭrad akked dderz n ṭṭrad
kemmlem axeddim
ad as-tt-yeɛṛeḍ
terram-asen-t-id
ad nuɣal
rran-tt kan i trewla
wwin-d iman-nsen

yuba d aɣezfan
zedmen-d
yegla yes-sent
ayen yelhan ikfa
ur zmireɣ ara daɣen ad as-d-jebdeɣ awal
ur yewjid ara
yufa yuba astilu
d yelli

tfehmem

kkseɣ awennit-iw
wukud telliḍ
tezger abrid

beṛka aɣunzu
iserreḥ-iyi ad ruḥeɣ
d urar kan
ddunit i yelhan ad am-tt-id muddeɣ
yuba iṛuḥ ad immet
asexdem n yiberkanen barra n lqanun d ufares deg-sen
dayen fukken-iyi
ur ttsetḥi ara s wayen i telliḍ
d netta i yuran asefru “mass aselway” i yecna meɛtub lwennas deg yiwet gar tezlatin-is icebḥen
ulac-it da
ilemẓi ur niwiḍ ara ɛecrin n yiseggasen i tt-id-yettwalin di lemri n sdat
testeqsa d acu i yebɣa
ad setḥiɣ s wayen akken d-yesnlfuy wallaɣ-iw
tesɛiḍ aydi
muḥend d bab n wawal
yebḍa-yas-tent-id
ddem aya
i yi-d-yefnan kan d imeṭṭawen
daɣen d tagnit akken ad qerben acemma ɣer tudert icudden ɣer tmetti daɣen ad ttun lemḥan d tmental iɣef ttwarzen
tesɛam cwiṭ n wakud
ad yefferfer bururu ad t-yeḍfer uwaɣzniw
yiwen wass ad n-rzuɣ ɣur-wen
azzel deg tsawent ma tebɣiḍ ad tefsi tassemt-nni
alɣem yettwali kan taɛrurt n gma-s taɛrurt-is ur tt-yettwali ara
Ḥemmleɣ ačini
ad iyi-tt-tefkemt
ur ttwaliɣ ara mliḥ
tewwim-d iman-nwen
simmal txelleḍ simmal anagraw-is d yilugan-is ttehtutan tteftutusen yezmer ad teffeɣ ɣer wayen-nniḍen

ad yerreẓ

yuba yekṛeh mary

ttheggayeɣ imensi

nɣel

anta i la tettṛaǧuḍ

tessefqed-iten

sgunfu

Ɛelleq-it ɣer ṭejra-ya sdat n uxxam-is
tamtilt-is werǧin telli
Ɛni temxellem
ur yezmir ara ad d-isali azegrir n ukter n imedlis n tensa
i tudert-nsen sɛan aɛwin
d acu-t winna i teṭṭfeḍ deg ufus-ik
d wigi i d lehduṛ i sen-inna baba-tsen mi ten-iburek
wid yerẓan asalu

deg-wen i tella

ikeyyef

tusa-tt-id tarda
yuba yuɣ-d atiki
qqaṛen-ak bu tlufa
mačči d rrekba n lemwaji d ufarreǧ deg yiselman i t-id-yefnan
kemzeɣ
isem-is inuda-d leɛrac yerna-d ula d fransa
yers-d gma yers-d s uxayel
myeffin-d aman si tala n tzerzert
yuba yeṭṭeɛwec
tawacult-iw n iwaḍiyen
newwi-d awal di tdiwennit-a akked umsenselkam muḥend belqasem
anta i d taqehwit
sqewqew
zwiret
ur ttqerrib ara
agraw n ssinima asaru d yiwen gar leqdicat ifazen i d-thegga tdukkla di tmurt n fransa
twalaḍ yuba tineggura-ya
mi t-walan seǧǧden lameɛna kra seg-sen cukken
ttrebbin medden mummu nekk ttrebbiɣ atemmu
ur ffiɣeɣ ara ass-a
bḍan-aɣ-t-id
tebḍa-yaɣ-tt-id
tefka-as cbaḥa s ssut-is ḥlawen ḥninen i yeččuren d asirem
ad tḥewwes yid-s
kemmel-d i teqsiṭ-ik
sin n iseggasen aya segmi i d-iɣli laẓ ɣef tmurt
ur ttfunzureɣ ara nekkini
tceɣleḍ a tom

menhu

kemmlemt taɣuzi

ttḥussuɣ am wakken selleɣ i leṣwat n tilifunat i yeččenčunen

nṭeg
d tidyanin akk i d-yettuɣalen

acḥal aya netta d adawi

uysent

ad seqsayen ɣef tefyirin
yerra-yawen-ten-id

yiwen n wass ad d-tuɣalem alamma d da

Ɣaḍeɣ-tent
di tazwara nnuɣeɣ akk s wayen i yellan deg tezmert-iw
nseffeq
mačči kifkif ifrax
kečč d agrud
aṭas i yezha lexrif yedda εeryan di ccetwa
yuba yuɣal yekkat
terra-yam-ten-id
teεǧeb-ak teskert
Ḥusseɣ-as i lehwa tekkat
yerna ula d amaẓrag yenna-d axir akken
Ẓriɣ menhu-t
ayagi i wakken ad asen-fken afus n tallelt i yinelmaden n uswir wis semmus
musa yenna-asen ɣur-wat win ara d-iǧǧen seg-s i ṣṣbeḥ
ayen akk iɣef ara teqqim ad inǧes
allaɣ-is yeddubbez
ayen akk ara tt-innalen ad yuɣal d imqeddes
ssnen kamel ircen
ibedd da acḥal
neṭqen nnan yuklal lmut
mi yesla selṭan
tlul-d tsuta n uyennat allen-is medlent i snat
nebda s tisedduyin d tdeblin iwulmen nesnerna aḥric n temguri d wayen-nniḍen
qadret ass n westeɛfu axaṭer ad wen-yili d ass imqeddes
siwa nuḥ d wid akk yellan yid-s di lbabuṛ i d-iqqimen
ma tesliḍ i taɣratin d yimeǧǧiden ɣef tikelt ḥṣu rran-d i lbak
nezmer ad neselmed s tmaziɣt tangiwin akk yellan
Ɛumaṛ yeskurruy kan
Ḥerkel iman-ik
mmektan-d
tebḍa-yas-tent-id
tefka-as taqeddact-is bilha ad tili d tameṭṭut-is
mačči d kra i ẓẓay udrar-a iyi-sbibben
deg tmurt i tzewǧem
tugareḍ-iyi afud
ur ttmeslayeɣ ara tarusit
yeqbel
axxam yuɣal-as d izem
lḥenni i d-yewwi uɛeṭṭar si temdint sdat n leqṣer
iban sani leḥḥuɣ
rrant-aɣ-tent-id
mačči akken
axaṭer deg unagraw n tutlayin tufa-d iman-is teṭṭef tama n wadda
d aɛdil ara tẓeḍ
tsellek-aɣ merra
ilaq ad d-ẓṛeɣ tom
ad d-aɣeɣ aqezwaḥ
tesṛuḥ-it
lliɣ akken bɣiɣ
ula d nekk bɣiɣ-tt
meẓyan u muḥ ur yeǧǧi ara tiziri tagawawt
tekkat deg-s zznezla
ala aqabel ara tt-tqableḍ
ur smuhbul ara
ass n larebɛa
yezga yettxemmim ɣef tudert i t-id-ittrajun
iḥemmel-itt am leɛmer-is
yuba u muḥ ur yezmir ara ad isell i tiziri tagawawt
teẓriḍ mmektaɣ-d tadyant yeḍran zgelli
maca ayen refden deg sin
tebɣa ad mmeslay ula d nettat
ula d addal d leqraya
Ẓriɣ d akken ur yessefk ara ad iliɣ da
afenǧal n lqehwa ma ulac aɣilif
mebla awexxer
d lalla-s n tullas
neɣ ahat ur ẓriɣ ara d acu i ttafen mi ara ttmeslayen fell-asent neɣ mi ara ttxemmimen fell-asent
anda yerra ad yerr
tebɣa ad ten-id-tessuffeɣ ɣer tilawt
acmumeḥ yezga ɣef wudem-is
tenwim ahat d sseḥ
maziɣ yekcem ɣer fasebbuk-is
nekk ttmeslayeɣ-ak-d ɣef wayen bɣiɣ
tuɣal-as tmuɣli n maziɣ d tirẓi n uqerruy
simmal ittɛeddi lweqt
ilaq ad ten-nxebbeṛ
ma d leḥzen ur tettaraḍ
sliman u muḥ ur yesli ara i tiziri tagawawt
yenbec azrem s axjiḍ
txeddem ccɣel tettezmumug
yerra-tt kan i tɣimit iman-is
tebɣa ur tḥebbes ara ameslay yid-s
tecmumeḥ-d
terra-d ɣer tkuzint s leɣseb akken ad tessu lqahwa
ur ttakremt ara
kkes aɣilif i wul-ik
win testeqsaḍ
ayen i am-d-nniɣ drus
tura a-t-an yerkeb d yid-s deg tkerrust
tuɣ-d newwara lḥaǧa i yidir ilmend n umulli-s
yelha ma akka i teẓẓareḍ
mazal-itt da
ldi-yas-d kan tawwurt
sima tebɣa ad as-tini i maziɣ ad yeqqim ur yettruḥ ara
saɛid u muḥ yesteqsa ɣef tiziri tagawawt
ma d sima
yerḥa-tt
yexdem akk ayen yebɣa
tella tenwa yettas-d ɣur-s akken ad ifares ula d netta deg tmuɣli ɣer ɣur-s
d ayen yecɣel uqerruy-iw s wayen-nniḍen
deg tallit-agi tayri ɣlayet ssuma-s
tettxemmim d acu i ibeddlen deg-s alammi tuɣal ur tettaf ara laman i tennum tettaf-it deg ungalen
ahat d nekk kan i yesɛan tamuɣli am ta
tezdeɣ-it tawla
ur ẓriɣ ara amek i sebreɣ alammi d ass-a
d acu ara tafeḍ ɣer lṭufan
ala ur d-qsideɣ ara aya
ttnecnicen akka d wakka akken ad ḥellin amesruf s wacu ara ddun deg ddurt
yuba u muḥ ur yessin ara tiziri tagawawt
maca ahat tefra
ruḥ kan a yamusnaw ruḥ
iruḥ-as nnudam
tebɣiḍ ad neqqim yid-k ɣer ṭabla
anɛam a tamsiwt
Ẓriɣ ur telliḍ ara bxiṛ
d acu kan
azmumeg ur itteffeɣ ara aqemmuc-is
tebɣiḍ kra n uṛuti n uzger
tekcem deg-s d akcam
ruḥen ɣer lebḥer
sɛeddi-yi-d udi ma ulac aɣilif
ulac fell-as a maziɣ
maziɣ d massi wwḍen-d akken ad sɛeddin akayad aneggaru deg tesnawit
ur ttsetḥi ara
ad ffɣen kan seg tesdawit ɣer tmetti ad uɣalen ɣer leɛwayed-nsen
ad tizmireḍ ad iyi-d-tesɛeddiḍ tisent ma ulac aɣilif
ur ẓriɣ ara izen iyi-d-turiḍ
yettbekkir akken ad iddu deg lkar n sbeḥ
iɣil d netta i d aɛessas
aniwa-k kečč
awal-nni yuzzlen ziɣ d tidet
am nutni am yilmeẓyen
iɛǧeb-iyi mliḥ
yettban usigna swayes tekkat
sliman u muḥ yewweḍ-d zdat n tiziri tagawawt
yeggumma ad yeṣber yidir ɣef newwara
betty tekkat apyanu
Ḥemmleɣ ad waliɣ tiliẓṛi
Ɣlayet ccerba
nnefs s ddraɛ i d-itteffaɣ seg turin
Ɛewwlen ad d-kfun zik azemmur aseggas-a
iwumi tafawett ma yugar-itt icerrig
acimi ur asent-d-terriḍ ara awal
ur tebɣi ara newwara ad tt-id-yaf yidir tettru
ur yeẓri ɣef wacu i yettxemmim
d acu kan ɣas teɛya
texdem d yinelmaden-is
tura kan i d-uɣaleɣ si ssuq
ikfa ṭtbel ifra wurar
aru taqbaylit ay aqbayli
ur stewtiwemt ara
ur iḥemmel ara imcac
ad ruḥeɣ ad εummeɣ azekka deg wasif
yuggad tameddit
aṭas n medden i yeqqimen zzat unazal
Ḥsen u muḥ yuɣ-itt-id ɣer tiziri tagawawt
ur yessin ara ad ileqqem
ur as-tufiḍ ara aqerru i taluft-nni
d ameṛkanti i yettagaden ɣef texṛiḍt-is
yettarra-yi-d awal s leɛweǧ
dayem d aberri di muḥend
yesseww-d yidir timellalin
anda tḥebbes tmusni n umdan
yiwen ur t-iḥsib
d acu i d-yeqqaṛ
kra n usgunfu d ayen yelhan
d lmeḥna
d win akken i yeɣɣaren deg tesnawit ara yimɣuren
yugurten u muḥ ixeṛṛef
imger deg ufus tagelzimt deg wayeḍ
yerra-tt i ucali
sima twala-t-id seg ṭṭaq
Ḥemmleɣ isura n ssinima
yečča-yi uxemmem
akka seg wasmi i d-nekker
isell kan i wyen yebɣa
tewwim ddnub-is
llan yimdanen i yettaṭṭafen tanefsit-nsen
ala din kan i zemren ad afen lehna
ur yesɛi ara akklmeɛna wayen akka i d-tenniḍ
ma yekker-d sbeḥ
d netta i d ikerri aberkan n twacult
nietzsche yenna-d amdan d yiwet n temsalt i ilaqen ad teffeɣ i tlisa
Ɛni ur tesɛiḍ ara ccɣel
ilaq ad ṛuḥeɣ ad d-suffɣeɣ idrimen di lbanka
iεedda-d yidir si tesdawit
ttidireɣ deg ustralia
Γilen ad asen-d-yegri liser
tafat i yettakken tabɣest i yimdanen akken ad nnaɣen d tudert
err-itt-id ɛad i yilmeẓyen
berka ur d-ttaf ara tisebbiwin
isemma-yas tiziri yiss ittwali tafat ur ittemderkal ur iɣelli
ur yurar ara axaṭer yella yejreḥ
ur tesɛi ara tasa ɣef mmi-s
txeddem ccɣel s leɛqel
ad iqabel akk ayen yuɛren
kkreɣ-d deg lḥif ṛwiɣ tilufa
ad tafeḍ imi bɣiɣ kan ad ɛelmeɣ d acu i t-ittaǧǧan ur d-ikeččem ara ɣer temsirin
aṭas i yeεteb yidir di leqraya-s iwakken ad d-iffeɣ d ajenyur
acimi i tugiḍ
ur yeẓri ma yella ad iqeddem neɣ ad iqqim kan din
urzen-as allaɣ-is
imyurar imḥaddiyen ẓewren daymi i ulac iswiyen
ur ten-id-iṣaḥ ara wawal
senqed qbel iman-ik
ur yeẓri ara yidir d acu i tebɣa newwara ad as-t-id-yawi
ilaq-iyi ad uɣaleɣ ɣer ṭṭbib
att-an tewweḍ-d tmeɣṛa-inek ad ɛeddiɣ ad wwteɣ tabacmaqt
sif ay aɣerbal sif muḥend yerwa lḥif
ula d maziɣ d umddakel-is ur ten-tezgil ara tedyant-a
am ilmeẓyen akk ḥemmleɣ tameṭṭut i yi-ɣelben s setta iseggasen
ilha uqader n yilugan n wurar
ffɣet sya
yezga d tiyita di medden
sliman yerwa lḥif
tuker-itent
Ɛni d kečč ara ydebbṛen fell-asen
d lewhayem annect-nni akk i k-ḍelmeɣ tekkreḍ tebniḍ tiqenṭert
mɣin-d ibawen deg tebḥirt-nwen
iberdan n laman
zwi ijulal-im sya
tuɣeḍ-d tabagust deg tḥanut-nni
sliman d ajenyur
tɣileḍ d seqcer n tmellalin
iɣaḍ-iyi ugeswaḥ
tesfugulem yennayer
Ḥemmlen aqellal n tmurt n yeqbayliyen
tugi ad tefru taluft-a
d acu i kent-yewwin ɣur-sen
Ǧǧan-aɣ gar yiberdan
tettarum s teqbaylit
acḥal aya ur nhireɣ
yesεa tuyat
ad d-tsawalem
s teqbaylit ara d-banemt gar tmura
melmi kan i yezweǧ yidir
s anda ara terreḍ
tefram taluft-nni
ayɣer i teffremt fell-asent akk annect-a
simmal tettnerni tsekla taqnaylit
teḥwaǧ teqbaylit arraw-is
s ccwal i bḍan taferka
ad ruḥeɣ ad d-beddleɣ asebbaḍ-agi yeḥreṣ fell-i
lukan ad tt-tezzuzneḍ kan akka kra ad tgen
amer ad as-isel gma-s ad t-yenɣ
ur yefki ara afus
tettaɣem-d aɣrum yal ass
ala tiziḍanin i itett weqcic-a
imsidag iqbayliyen ur gganen ara
ttxil-k ur ttɛeṭṭil ara
iḥucc-d aslen akked wulmu i wakraren-is
yezga-yi-d userwal-agi swaswa
ass kamel netta yettnuddum
zemreɣ ad awiɣ tummeẓt
yeǧǧa-d lweḥc meqqren wadeg-nni yeṭṭef baba-s
ugin ad imɣuren
ass ara iɛeddin ur yettcabi gma-s
acimi ara tefkeḍ aɛrur-ik i uɛekkaz
tettuḍ d acu i sent-txedmeḍ
aqel-iyi da
yufa-d axeddam-nni yekfa ccɣel-is yakan
sima ur as-yekkis ara ucmumeḥ ɣef uqemmuc-is
anwa i ak-t-id-yennan
tameṭṭut-is mačči d timexlit
ur smuɣbunemt ara
ar azekka ma yebɣa rebbi
iḍ iɛeddan yeǧǧa-as-d iḍes ɣef wallen
amek ara am-d-wesfeɣ ayen ttḥussuɣ
akka akk i tt-id-tewwi mi i txeddem ccɣel-is
azul a tamsiwt
i tikkelt tamenzut i d-tebder lebɣi-s
yečča-t uydi iɣelten
myelḥaqen
acimi ur truḥeḍ ara ɣer sbiṭar
yuɣ-iyi-t-id
qqimen akken mɣunzan aṭas n wussan
ilaq ad tennameḍ akked d tmacinin iqqneṭsen d lɣaci di tokyo
ad kem-teǧǧ tmacint
ameskar yenti asarig-ines seg iẓuran n umezruy n tmazɣa
mačči d asemmiḍ ass-a
d waniwa i tennuɣeḍ
mcawaren
ad d-terreḍ ɣef kullec
ffeɣ ur bɣiɣ ara akk ad heḍṛeɣ yid-k
tessnem ad tarum s teqbaylit
ttqacer i lsiɣ n leqṭen
xḍu i yir iberdan
rriɣ-tt deg uɛewwiq
yuɣ-aɣ-t-id
anda i yezdeɣ tura
yuzen-as-n tabrat
yelha ssmaḥ
iqemmer yexser
icbuyla ččuren d zzit
aṭas i iḥemmel tudert
yuɣ-itent di ṛṛay
yufa-asent-d amahil
jbed amrar
iḥemmel ad yargu
ur yi-d-tuqiɛ ara
yeqres deg lektubat
ur bɛiden ara a nniya
anwa ara t-iṣebbren
aɣerbaz-nneɣ yuḍen
iban tom yusem
d acu i d ssebba n umennuɣ-nsen
yuba u muḥ ur yezmir ara ad iger taflest deg tiziri tagawawt
tkemmel i yimeṭṭi-s
yefka-yawent abadaṛ
a yemma xas anef-iyi ur tettaɣ ara imensi
yeṭṭerḍeq waεbar
akka ara yili
ad d-tas ad tekrez anyir-is
ad ṛwun taḍṣa
akka i d-tennam
ttqelliben-iyi
s teqbaylit i d-tekkremt
yurew uzemmur
tlaq tikli ar zdat
tekkat ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
anwa ara ibedden i leqdic-nni
ad nadiɣ fell-awen ad ken-afeɣ
nekcem s axxam naf-iten gnen
d lawan ad tcemmṛeḍ iɣallen-ik
udip yenɣa baba-s yezwej d yemma-s
Ɛni tessneḍ ad taruḍ taqbaylit
ad nadiɣ fell-asent ad tent-afeɣ
Ẓṛan dacu i xeddmen
ur awent-yebni ara axxam
idles-nsent d aqbayli
ur yi-d-reggem ara gar medden
tessnemt amek ara s-teddumt
yehbel ɣef teqbaylit
cennunt s tutlayt taqbaylit
aniwi ara ibedden i leqdic-nni
tebɣiḍ tutlayt taqbaylit
ttwalin-ken-id s yir tiṭ
xedmen tiwizi di taddart
ur ibɣi ara ad d-isemḥes
iɛreq-iyi leḥsab
ur yettaf ara ayen ara yexdem
Ḍurren-kem
eǧǧ-iyi ad εawdeɣ ad εerḍeɣ ttxil
tutlayt-nneɣ d taqbaylit kan
bɣiɣ ad d-fɣeɣ d taṭbibt iwakken ad dawiɣ arrac ihelken
amek i k-d-iban yinezwi-nni n japun
ssiɣet tafat
anda ara kem-id-afeɣ
laεmeṛ yečča seksu mbla ifelfel aqerḥan
neqqar leqran deg lǧamaɛ mebla ma nefhem-it
ayen i txedmeḍ ad t-tafeḍ
anaddal yetturebba
yettraju tom ameddakel-is
ddiɣ-am di nneqma
ur akent-tent-id-yuwi ara
ala aya kan i d-ssutreɣ
yekkat uzzal anẓad n ukukru ur t-yesɛi
uɣeɣ-d tayuga n ssebbaḍ
aql-iken tettwaɛerḍem ɣer tmeɣra n tissulya n mmi amenzu
wid ur nettkeyyif ara ass-nni keyyfen mebla cceḥḥa
wissen d acu i yebɣa ad d-yini
ttaruɣ taqbaylit yal ass
yettɛedday wakud ur s-nettaki
terra-ten tmara ad mmeslayen i boule de suif
ur d-tessawel ur as-ssawleɣ
tom ala netta i yeẓran
yewwi-yas-d tafelquqt i yemma-s
Ǧǧiɣ imawlan-iw fell-am
bɣiɣ ad cnuɣ
qqaren-d deg lǧennet s taɛrabt i ttmeslayen
ad ten-awiɣ yid-i
yemmut ass n umulli-ines
tira tezga d aramsu
tettumt d acu i sen-txedmemt
gren afrux daxel tfergact
ma ur d-iwwit ara udfel tekkat-d lgerra
ur d-yesmuzgut ara ixeddem ayen i as-d-yenna uqerruy-is
ayen yellan fell-as ixdem-it
d acu yeḍran i wayen i nessuter
uzneɣ-asen tabrat
imrifẓen mara ttarran ifeẓ ad ttɣilleḍ swingimen
ttenaɣen d yiman-nsen alamma ɣelben-tt
yewwi-as-d lferḥ
zwiret ay at wawal
icab uqeṛṛuy-is deg uxemmem
d akli i tt-yessawaḍen s aɣerbaz-is deg tkarust-is
anida akka i tetteddu talsa-agi
yeffeɣ-it laɛqel ɣef idrimen
ay ack-itt
yettarra-kent deg uɛewwiq
ur sɛiɣ ara allaɣ
akal-nneɣ mačči d aɛrab akken i t-uran deg tmendawt
d sseḥ neɣ ala
d tiṭ iken-yewten neɣ d lmektub i aken-izeglen
iḍelli nekkes ɣef wul-nneɣ
sliman d muḥend ad asen-tecfu teqbaylit
yenna-d yumer ad iɛiwen
iceyyeɛ mmi-s ar zawiya yuɣal-as-d d aḍebbal
wissen anwa yenɣan maɛtub lwennas
sami d layla sekren almi kan dayen
mačči mi yennuɣ sdat n umddakel-is
d ayen i sεiɣ d ṣṣerf
asentel iɣef tettezzi tmedyezt-iw d tilelli n umeslay
incew akk ucebbub-is
zher-iw irewwel fell-i ur ẓriɣ acimi i iyi-yugi
tilemẓit iban-as-d iḍul ubrid s axxam
lwali n tizi wezzu yerza ɣer at yanni
ula d inelmaden-is faqen s waya
ur bɣiɣ ara ma yella nniɣ-ak-t-id ad tbeddel tmuɣli-k ɣur-i
yufa d waniwa ara yehder
uɣeɣ-tent deg uḍar
ldiɣ tabburt ḍalleɣ ɣef umcum
mmugreɣ-d kra n wuguren akken ad d-afeɣ aṭaksi
massi yuɣal-it-id rruḥ
yehder meqqran i mmi-s almi tfukk tedyant-is
maziɣ tikkelt-a ula d netta iger afus-is
ifeddix n umdan d akud i t-sseḥlawen
Ḥemmleɣ ayaziḍ yewwan
nteddu-yawen di nneqma
ssentaɣ tisegnit deg ssqef win i d-ineṭqen ad isselqef
yufa-t-id wul-iw
fɣeɣ seg uxxam rfiɣ
seg wasmi i d-yekcem ɣer tesdawit
acḥal aya ur d-isawel yidir
tessnemt ad theḍṛemt d igurdan
ittɛedday wakud
nenna-tent-id akk
yeffeɣ-ik laɛqel ɣef idrimen
lliɣ ssenṭaḍeɣ tiwlafin-iw ɣer lḥiḍ
aselway n tigduda yessawel-d s wudem unṣib ɣer tefranin
nessen-it d argaz yelhan
Ɣef tfelwit tamellalt yura uselmad ddeqs n tefyar
lgerra terra abrid itecceḍ
tamendawt tamenzut n lezzayer tettwaxdem di tzeqqa n sinima di tmanaɣt
lulen-d mbeɛd tagrawla n ṛebɛa uxemsin maɛna ass-a uɣalen akk imjuhad
uḍnen aɣbel
iruḥ ɣer lbuṣta akken ad iceyyeε tabrat
yexdem axxam
tiglubulin tizeggaɣin akked tcebḥanin sɛant azal d ameqqran deg tfekka
yestufa ad d-yecɣel kan yid-k
Ɛeṛḍet ur d-ttaḍsat ara
ur yemmut ur yeddir
ifukk-aɣ uɣrum
yekkes-as-d ṭṭbib lqelyan
yuḍen
yettazzal deg yiberdan am uderwic
iban am yiṭij
am nutni am tuget n yinelmaden ukkud ɣaren
ziɣ iqqur uqeṛṛuy-ik
cukkeɣ igerrez
ayen i t-yeğğan ad yezdi yid-sen tamurt
izimer aksum taḥedduft akal amdan i nutni
meskint terwa lḥif d terẓaganin
asmi sɛiɣ setta n yiseggasen di leɛmer-iw swiɣ crab acku ɣileɣ d iẓmi
ad qqimen ɣef yiman-nsen ɣef tmurt ad d-zzin d aqusis
yeṛwa amlelli
kečč akka am uttma-k
ečč iniɣman ad k-yekkes laẓ
kulec iɛreq-as
s talwit kan
awi-yi-d lqehwa ma ulac aɣilif
d times n waḍu
iḥmel-d wasif yuwi-d izeɣran
fkiɣ-awent umlan yelhan
yerfed imru yebda yettaru tabrat i tmeddakelt-is
Ḥemmlen warrac ad uraren
kksen tamart-nsen
yessaram ad yidir akken yebɣa
anwa i d-yeǧǧan taḍsa fiḥel ma tnudam d aɣyul
Ḥellun yimɣan
ayen i kem-yesseḥzanen yesseḥzan-iyi ula d nekk
rajumt ihi ad awent-d-teɣli tbexsist s imi
Ḥeḍr iyid
Ɣriɣ adlis-nni n kateb yasin
ttuɣ ur awen-tt-in-fkiɣ ara
mi yuweḍ ɣer lɣerba yettxemmim kan fell-as
anda i d-tuɣeḍ takerrust-a
yuɣ lḥal akka i d kečč tugiḍ ad tbeddleḍ
yenna meɛtub lwennas "sarameɣ ad yili uwanek aqbayli"
nerra-ten deg uɛewwiq
afus-is deg ufus-inu ṣṣut-is yewweḍ agemmaḍ
yebɛed anda yezdeɣ
sliman u muḥ ur yerri ara tiririt i tiziri tagawawt
anfet-as i tom ad ixdem axeddim-is
seksu mi t-ččiɣ d amerɣan ɣef waya i swiɣ aṭas n waman
tečča-t lqaɛa tesbleɛ-it
teqqen axelxal deg uḍar
netta yesraɣay ulman
mgal wid yeqqaren
yerza uneɣlaf ad iwali anda i ssawḍen
ur ceffuɣ ara i tirga-w
yettnaɣyesseḥbibir fell-asen
yuzen-aɣ-n tabrat
ansuf yis-k tikkelt-nniḍen ɣer tmurt-ik tamaziɣt a yennayer
aha kan ad yeffeɣ winna ad awen-d-necnu tayeḍ
amyaru-a d amaynut ur t-ssineɣ ara
adfel yessud tiwwura ass-a
ay aqbayli ur ttakk ara lwi ur ɣeffel ara aki
imal-nneɣ ha-t-a ger ifassen-nneɣ
cewḍeɣ bɣiɣ ad gneɣ yid-m
d ɛebbasi madani d ɛli benḥaǧ i yebɣan ad aɣ-erren ar tijehlit
yugi-iyi baba ad cummeɣ
a yemma dehbeya tewwet-iyi
tama wadda din i yettili uddaynin anda ttidiren yiɣersiwen
ufiɣ tamɣart tettru iman-is
yemsegza ula d ubeḥri
mi d-yekker ad yuɣal
nniɣ-asen
iḍall akkin i tiɣilt
azekka ad dduɣ ɣer lbilaǧ akked baba
iruḥ ad yefres ayla-s
nefka-yas ddḥis
nwiɣ tettuḍ-iyi ziɣ ala
yebɣa uqcic ad yinig ɣer kanada
dehbiya tugi ad as-tebru i wezmumeg-nni ucbiḥ
tasertit tabaḍnit n mozilla
ixeddamen wwin imuras-nsen n unebdu deg waggur n yulyu
yugi ad yekkes uɣemɣum-a
tuker-iyi tnafa
sdukklent-aɣ aṭas n tlufa
Ǧǧiɣ tamurt acḥal aya
ur asent-ismeḥsis ara
yeεceq deg-s
d aḍebsi kan iwumi tessal
widak-nni yellan d imḍebren d imaziɣen
yal yiwen ad d-yas wass-is
Ɣas ad ixas uzemmur yettili ddeqs n zzit
cfiɣ zik mačči akka i t-xeddmen
d acu i t-yewwin ad d-yenṭeq
wa samir awi-d tiwekkiwin-nni ad nandi yis-sent i yefrax
ur rbiḥen ur qqimen
wa d asaru mačči d targit
awtul n beṛṛa d izem n uxxam
a wi yufan kra i m-nniɣ
yeqqerṣ ṭṭbel-is
d lawan ad tkecmeḍ
d akeswaḥ
tḥemmlemt tutlayt taqbaylit
ttwalin-iyi-d s yir tiṭ
yuker-asen tikti-nsen
tettmeslayemt s teqbaylit
yebna-asent axxam
Ǧǧan-aɣ-d tarda leḥwal
zgiɣ d neyya warǧin qurɛeɣ ijufar-iw
ad ak-ḥkuɣ tadyant si rrif
ur tnuda fell-awen ur ken-tufi
d ifassen n wemcic i yesɛa
a widak yeṛẓan tibbura yellin
mliɣ-asent d acu ara xedment
yya-w ad neẓret amek i yuɣal
anda ara tent-id-afeɣ
lemmer medden akk am kečč
bɣiɣ ad ɛeddiɣ di tudert-agi di tsusmi akked liser
maca ur d-yesnulfa ara deg talɣa
sellen timucuha akken ad ttun laẓ
akka i d-nniɣ
ad ak-bruɣ
fiḥel ad teskiddbeḍ
ilaq-aɣ lḥir ɣef teqbaylit
tlulem-d s teqbaylit
ad d-taɣ ayefki
thebleḍ ɣef teqbaylit
d taqbaylit i d tudert-nkent
ttwaliɣ kra n yiwen
ultma teckel tafunast send ad tt-id-teẓẓeg
yegzem ubrid
tagi d yemma
bɣant tutlayt taqbaylit
teṛwa iḍes taṣebḥit-a
ad d-teffeɣ targit
awal ur t-id-terni teffeɣ s zɛaf
ay udem n baɛbaɛ
Ḥaca tuddma ara neddem
tebɣamt ad d-taɣemt takeṛṛust
ttaddamen-t
argaz yuyes tameṭṭut-is yeẓra tuɣalin ulac
anda i yeǧǧa iserwula-nni
tettargum s tutlayt taqbaylit
ad neɛqlet wid i ɣ-yecqan
ur kem-yettawi ara yid-s
kečč d asaḍ-iw
Ḥemmleɣ seku
d tanekkit meḥsub tebɣa kullec i iman-is kan
ur nettɛeṭṭil ara ad d-nuɣal ar leqdic i tatoeba
ur ttqelliq ara iman-ik fell-i
lluẓen
tfeqɛem
Ɣas ma mmuten ad yidir kan wayyur
qḍan-d ccɣel-nsen taṣebḥit
Ɛni thelkem
fernen yifellaḥen gar lbaṭaṭa yelhan d tin n diri
ad yesni idurar
Ɛni teččamt
tutlayt d ayen i fehhmen medden mačči d ayen ur fehhmen ara
tal yiwet tessaram ɣur-s i d-usant
tettru tezzuzzun mmi-s
tezhamt akk
azemmur n usammar yif win n umalu
ad ẓṛen akk ansa i d-yekka
daɣ netta akka i d-kkren wid terza taluft n tissulya
d ssqef mellulen
yemmeɣ fell-asen yeddem-iten-id ad ten-yawi
meḥsub teqqareḍ-d dayen ur tebɣiḍ ara tiliḍ d taselmadt
Ḥwaǧent imseftiyen
ad yezweǧ wuzyin
lliɣ tesseɣ ayefki
cukkeɣ bezzaf tuḍneḍ ulamek ara truḥeḍ s aɣerbaz
yenta-iyi yisef gar yiccer d uksum
yedder d argaz yemmut d argaz
sɛiɣ ccɣel
ur d-uɣalen ara
yurew-d leɛǧeb
nnan takadidralt d axxam n rebbi
ulac win i as-izemren deg tira
uɣal ar deffir
tesɛiḍ avilu
tessṛeɣ-awen-t
aql-i rfiɣ
semmeḍ lḥal
nwiɣ akken-nniḍen
ur sen-ttesɣaleɣ ara
ad as-ten-yefk
aha af-d d acu
ad turareḍ yid-sent
lliɣ zhiɣ yid-k
awi iṭerbuqen-ik sya
ur cfiɣ ara fell-as
yuba isbadu akalas-a

meḥsub kifkif
ahat yella ur yelli
d lweqt imensi
rran-awen-t-id
yextaṛ-ikem
Ɛni zwarent-k
ad ɣ-tent-yefk
s leɛqel-im
bḍu-yaɣ-ten-id
iwacu tugdem
tessṛeɣ-aɣ-ten
beddel iselsa
nɣan-am-tt
yessexseṛ tom
ddem lqec-ik
Ṛuḥ di talwit
ad kent-ten-id-yawi
srin-t
tuyseḍ
tɛerḍem
yerra
win-iw yugar win-im
ceḍḥent
bnin seksu-ya-inem
Ɣef wacu ara tegneḍ
azul isem-iw nancy
Ḥemmlemt akk medden
d ayen kan i nuḥwaǧ
nettɣunzu takerriḍt
d winna kan a Ɛacur
amezruy n tsekla taqbaylit seg timawit ɣer tira
ma d aɛraben i nella ur nesteḥq ad aɣ-tɛerbem
ijdi n tneẓruft iteddu-d ur iḥebbes
melmi i kem-id-yebda uqraḥ n tɛebbuḍt-im
nebɣa ad neqdec di talwit
annect-a yelha i tmeẓriwt yelha i tmesliwt daɣ acku meqqer yeɛmer
s teqbaylit kan i yettzuxxu
snegren tamurt sguǧlen arrac
iḥemmel tutlayt taqbaylit
akka tura aṭas n tefyar i uriɣ
akka ara tillimt
tezdel tyaziḍt ɣef tmellalin-is
bɣan ad d-aɣen takeṛṛust
Ččan ifelfel aqeṛḥan
yuba ḥemmlen-t akk yiselmaden-is
d acu i kent-id-yewwin ɣer da
msefhamen
ad tekkiḍ yid-sen
ad ak-ikkes rabbi aɣilif tanemmirt a mmi
yiwen ur yefrin la imawlan-is la adeg n tlalit-is
ad ruḥen ad ṭṭsen
sew drus teṭṭseḍ aṭas
tugniwin am tigi zedɣent allaɣ-is
mlaleɣ yid-sent
d acu ara tent-id-yesneṭqen
Ččiɣ taxsayt
teswam aman isemmaḍen
wa yennejla wa yeqqim
yeɣza-as
swiɣ sekṛeɣ ɣliɣ imir kreɣ
isem-is yuɣ-d akk ddunit
muḥemmed buḍyaf d aselway n lezzayer yettwanɣan srid ɣef tilivizyu tazzayrit
tettḥebbiṛemt ɣef teqbaylit
wagi d baba-k
ad ndewwer ɣer at yanni
d lawan ad uɣaleɣ
teččam lekwaɣeḍ-nwen
Ɣer-itent terreḍ-iyi-d s wawal fell-asent
nekk ur zmireɣ ara ad qableɣ la laḥbab la imawlan
yuɣ-ak-d baba-k aserwal
ixeddem ɣef teqbaylit
cbebec dinna neɣ qim a tamɣaṛt n daɛwessu
yarbaḥ a sima
ur d-isawal ara
ad nwali
fiḥel ma tegulleḍ-d nekk ur k-umineɣ ara
amek i tt-nudan
s tayri i nettmeslay taqbaylit
ayen tettḥussu
tuget n tmucuha-nneɣ ttfakkant s lferḥ
tezwar kullec tutlayt taqbaylit
a tin εzizen fell-i
tcennum s teqbaylit
s uskasi i ferrun lumuṛ
simmal tettbeɛziq tutlayt-nneɣ taqbaylit
ma txedmem-iyi akken ur tettuɣ ara akk lxir-nwen
thelkem akk
cedhaɣ-t
bɣiɣ ad tḥebseḍ aya tura yakan
gen di talwit a gma akram sliman d awezɣi ad k-nettu
nqesser yerna qrib ad nfakk taduṭ-nni s uqerdec
gen di talwit a gma menad benabderreḥman d awezɣi ad k-nettu
yeḍra-d uεeǧǧib ur whimen
mseḍfaren wuccanen deg uḥriq
la ttafgen yiferṭeṭṭa
yella walebɛaḍ i d-iẓeḍmen ɣef tom
gen di talwit a gma feddi lamara d awezɣi ad k-nettu
iteddu tekkat fell-as yerna turew-as taɣaṭ
s tidet yeḥma lḥal dinna
"anzaren" d tullist n gogol i d-yerra samir tiɣzert ɣer teqbaylit
d ṭṭbib baba-s
d ayla-w wiyi
qebleɣ tiwitilin-nwen
wissen ma yewjed imensi
yella ḥedd-iḍen deg lemsaq-nni
kečč mačči n da neɣ
acu i s-yeḍran i yelli-m
ggten tura yisalifiyen
yettuɣaḍ win ur nessin iɣill kullec yeshel
terfiḍ
abrid-a yettawi ɣer wurti
mačči d tin ara iɣurren argaz-is
nekni mazal ad neṭṭef deg awal-nneɣ
tilas gar waεrab d uqbayli
afus-iw d aεekkaz
d abninan
swem lqahwa
ahat tecfiḍ
d aya kan nwiɣ ad iyi-d-tessutreḍ kra iwimi ur zmireɣ ara
fell-as i yeqqel d asekṛan
aṭas i yebɣan ad ǧǧen tamurt-nsen
Ɣur-k ad tmeslayeḍ d usekṛan
tagrawla ur telli ɣur wid yugaden tugdut
d tom i tettrajuḍ
ad lemdeɣ tutlayt taqbaylit s wul-iw
simmal tettali teqbaylit ar igenni
eǧǧ-iyi ad kecmeɣ
rabeḥ Ԑesma yettwassen s tezlit-nni “aya aḍu”
gen di talwit a gma Ḥassan nureddin d awezɣi ad k-nettu
attan ɣef ukanapi
tenger lemḥenna deg tallit-a-nneɣ
gen di talwit a gma ifis remḍan d awezɣi ad k-nettu
Ɛni teččam
wa d aqjun
melliḥet
iḥemmel mmi ad yurar ddabex n uḍar
nqeddec ɣef teqbaylit mačči ɣef tutlayt ur nelli ara
cukkeɣ nezmer ad nemεawan
agdud simmal a yettbehbi
tuli ssuma
leɛbeɣ yakan yid-s ileqqafen
nettṛaju melmi ara d-awḍen
Ɣef tusnakt i yebna umeɣrad
Ɛni tuḍneḍ
tewwi-d ɣef tom ad yexdem akken
heddṛeɣ-as yugi ad yefhem yettṛaǧu ad as-fehmeɣ
ur tteg aɣilif yeshel
aɛekkaz yugi ad yewwet tehriruc
taswiεt-a mazal-it meẓẓi
ad teslemdeḍ tutlayt taqbaylit i warraw-im
d taqbaylit i d-lemdeɣ ar imawlan-iw
meqqṛent-d s teqbaylit
ttzinziren kan ur sεin ara xedmen
ur ilaq ara ad teǧǧeḍ ddwa-inem
win yeṭṭsen di tṛakna yeqqar tagrest teḥma
Ɛni d ṣṣeḥ
ur teẓwiremt ara akken ilaq
amek i t-nudan
gen di talwit a gma maxmuxen kamal d awezɣi ad k-nettu
nettemyasam gar-aneɣ
d argaz-nni i d-temlaleḍ ass-nni
akken kan i teffeɣ tegrest tegla s usemmiḍ-is d yideflawen-is
Ɛmiṛuc u muḥ iḥemmel tiziri tagawawt
s utraktur i kerrzen nutni
ad d-aɣen ayefki
akken i txedmeḍ ad ak-ittwaxdem
imdanen ɣillen kesben amtiweg n lqaεa
anemhal n tkebbanit akka tura yettwali ayen iḍerrun di lluzin-is si sbeḥ ar tmeddit
zdit lqedd-nwen ay iqbayliyen
tamurt n waεraben attan deg tegzirt taεrabt kan
nhut-aɣ-d ɣer tdukli
xedmen taṭeyyaft i sidi Ḥmed ccrif
yessen amek ara s-yeddu
gen di talwit a gma bugerra racid d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ama d yemma-s ama d yessetma-s dehcent akk deg-s
wissen ma yella akka ara teqqim teswiɛt
yesseqdec amawal
imuqel deg umawal
d isteqsiyen i ɣef ur zmireɣ ara ad d-fkeɣ tiririt
wisen anda yewweḍ akka
amek teẓriḍ anta d ayla-k
twejdem akk
ayen-d-tenniḍ yelha
ffɣen akk yergazen ad berzen igran-nsen uqbel ad d-yaweḍ unebdu
yeẓẓa amagraman deg tebḥirt
yerra-iyi d tameṭṭut-is
dayen teεyiḍ deg akken
allaɣ ur neqqar am uεebbuḍ ur ntett
yečča weɣyul ijeǧǧigen-nni
d acu i ttetteḍ aṭas deg unebdu
ma ulac ečč tazuḍla
ccɣel ur t-tesεiḍ
drus n medden i ifehmen awennit-is
tuɣ tmes akken i iwata mi yerna isɣaren i lkanun
tluɛa-yas
tettbecciceḍ aserwal-im
akli d tmeṭṭut-is cabḥa ttnekkaren-d tal tikkelt deffir n nna mennun
yettwali-tent-id s yir tiṭ
waqila aṭas i yusmen mi tettali tutlayt taqbaylit
hatan d ayen i tebɣiḍ neɣ ala
tafyirt tuddist
sel-d i wayen ara k-niɣ
gen di talwit a gma Ḥamideci moḥemmed d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ad d-yessuter tazmert-iw
ruḥen ɣer mekka ad rejmen cciṭan
mačči akken i bniɣ i teffeɣ
kullec yesɛa azal
ala steqsaɣ-d kan
wissen d tasekkurt neɣ d tabuzegrayezt
tṣub lḥamu ɣer xemsa n tseddarin
Ḥaren deg-s watmaten-is
izger i wasif
bɣan leqbayel ad ɣṛen s tutlayt-nsen
mazal ur truḥemt ara
a bu tɛellumin
aseklu n leqbayel d tazemmurt
tecfa-d fell-as lmeḥna
ur yeggan ara ma texsi teftilt
ad dduɣ di lğerra-nsen
tiriza d isem apurtugi
ur ilaq ara ad nεeṭṭel
iqbayliyen bɣan ad refden tutlayt-nsen
sameḥ-iyi ad k-samḥeɣ
thelkeḍ
aqel-ik am yiṭij
d ass-is amenzu deg uɣerbaz
lesquf-nni mellulen akk tettawi-ten tnafa
Ɣur-i ɛziz yisem-is
d acu ar ad teččem berkukes neɣ tacewwaḍṭ
ad as-t-id-yawi azekka
Ččan seksu
tḥemmel ad turar
ttnadint fell-i
ad d-tegreḍ idrimen s ucekkaṛ
fell-as talwit
d tidet yella wayagi imi ttɣimin deg udrar kra ara yekk wass
yeḥsab-iyi rebbi ad as-tiniḍ i tom amek i tettiliḍ
bɣiɣ ad awen-d-fkeɣ yiwen n usteqsi
ibat ur yefhim acu yeḍran
gen di talwit a gma mukrab ulban d awezɣi ad k-nettu
hḍeṛ-iyi-d
a tiziri terwid-iyi
d asirem i ddwa n facal
tettḥibbi-t
mfaraqent snat-nni n trebbaɛ mebla iswiyen
nniɣ-d ayen i bɣiɣ ad d-iniɣ
akka i sliɣ
kker syin a yijiṛmeḍ iwumi aqmimmeḍ imi k-ifut uckenṭeḍ
tettarra-tt deg uɛewwiq
ur tebɛid ara tala seg uxxam
d neyya meskin
yečča abbaɣ-iw
iqeṛṛeb ujadermi s ttawil ar tkeṛṛust
d ayla-w
ass mi lliɣ d agrud helkeɣ aṭan n "cuff-mejjir" cuffen akk leḥnak-iw
mlaleɣ yid-sen
gen di talwit a gma Ḥaddad nadir d awezɣi ad k-nettu
tewɛer temẓi
yessawal-d isefra-s deg tfaskiwin n tmedyezt
asefrek awurman n telɣut
yettrejdil zher-iw ttrajuɣ-t yegguma ad d-yaweḍ
belleɛ
temxellem i sin
nessaram d yiwen n useggas ara d-yeglun s wayen nebɣa
awi-d tabaḥant i dada-m
menyif tidet isseqraḥen wala lekteb issefraḥen
awit-d yid-wen imru i ukayad-nwen ttxil-wen
tekreh-it
di tazwara ad nečč dewwaṛa sakin ad nernu buzelluf
texṛa tala
azen tuṭṭfiwin-ik n ugdil
ur zmireɣ ad waliɣ asaru-nni
yegrareb s tumubil wint ɣer sbiṭar ad as-sɛeddin askaniṛ
ma ulac akk yettliwi ibennayen
amek i tt-walan
yella wayen ibeddlen
ad d-tawimt iseɣ
yessuter sami deg layla ad as-d-teg yiwet n lemzeyya
bnaqes i usikel am wa
awi ayen ara teččeḍ
dacu i nebɣa d taɣdemt
ad beddlent tirga
tsumeḥ-as
ixdem deg-s gerninuc
arrac ur rewwun turart
yesmencir deg wid i t-yifen
tutlayt-iw ɣur-i tif akk tutlayin n ddunit
ula d argaz ilaq-as ad yedhu akked warraw-is
anda yewwet ubeḥri ad t-yawi
ad tt-id-afen wiyaḍ
ad aɣ-d-immager usawen
Ɣṛemt-aɣ-d
s tidet sεeddaɣ taswiεt n lεali
ad tsellkeḍ aqeṛṛu-yim dinna
ayen
tewwet-it yemma-s seg wakken yugi ad yaɣ awal
timucuha tura ttwattunt
wa d amddakel-is wayeḍ tekka-d seg twacult-is
teɛdel teslit d temɣart-is
ur tettafem ara ayen ara txedmem
ayla-nsen ur ḥudren fell-as
d lawan kan
deg wakken ɣezzif yerna rqiqet tfekka-s ssawalen-as acacfal
tettmeslay d maziɣ deg fasebbuk
d aḥric agejdan deg temḍiqt-agi n leqbayel
ass-a jeddi iḥucc-d asaɣur
gen di talwit a gma melbusi lewnis d awezɣi ad k-nettu
gen di talwit a gma belkalem mulud d awezɣi ad k-nettu
tettargumt s tutlayt taqbaylit
ha-tt-an dihin tkeṛṛust-nneɣ
eǧǧ-as abrid ad iɛeddi ar texxamt
Ḥemmleɣ-k
tettargu s tutlayt taqbaylit
llan iṛuḥaniyen
cukkeɣ twejdeḍ
ittqerrib-d ɣer srir anda ḍelqeɣ
yiwet kan ara kem-id-iṣaḥen
yeḥreṣ fell-i usebbaḍ-agi
ilaq ad tuɣaleḍ ar uxxam
ciṭuḥ kan ata yebda yesseglaf uqjun
neɣ wina mačči d sseḥ
mi ara d-tessers twacult učči tetten deg yiwen n uḍebsi
d anserni n teqbaylit i nebɣa
iyya ɣuṛ-i
s tidet tebɣiḍ ad tebruḍ
kečč mačči d udem n rrbeḥ
tella kra n yiwet i yukren idrimen-iw
yennefsusi wul-iw tura mi d-nniɣ ayen sεiɣ ad t-id-iniɣ
am semḥeɣ kemm semḥ-iyi
yiwen ur d-imeyyez annect-nni
ttrajun leqbayel tamaziɣt seg udabu am wid yessuturen tin n rebbi
anda ara rrent tullas-nni
tḥemmlemt-iyi
ger tiṭ ɣer wayen d-ǧǧan
yečča ayetma-s
ur tceffum ara
bɣiɣ ad ččeɣ tameqfunt
ma teɣriḍ leqran ad tafeḍ belli aklan ḥellelen
tom yella yeṭṭef yiwet n ttberna ɣer tama n bosten kra n lweqt akken
ddunit d mm isennanen
yella kra n yiwen i d-iɣaṛen
ad qqimen deg uxxam azekka
ttɣiḍen iseggasen iruḥen
akken ad d-mmektiɣ
tom yekreh mary
sliɣ i walebɛaḍ yettɛeyyiḍ
tgen yid-i ass-nni d wussan akk n useggas i d-iḍefren
isem-im ɣef yixef n yilsawen-nsen
rsen deg yal tiɣmert deg texxamt-nni
d awezɣi ad aɣ-d-tḥerr yiwet tewwurt ɣer daxel
ad ruḥeγ ad awen-ğğeγ tamurt ideg leḥmala d leḥram
agellid n maṣer inna-asen-d igerrez
tameṭṭut-nni terfed s tadist tesɛa-d aqcic
Ḥemmleɣ tameṭṭut yerna mačči d aṭṭan
yerreẓ ansi ur yettunejbar
yessenzef-itt s yimeslayen-is
ass-nni ameɣlal isellek-d isṛayil seg ufus n imaṣriyen
ur iyi-teǧǧi ara maca ḥulfaɣ i yiɣisi gar-anteɣ
isemma i umḍiq-nni maḥanayim yeɛni snat n lemḥallat
yessuffuɣ-it-id seg ccbaḥa n tsekla
imiren ad yuɣal d ayla-s
bɣiɣ ad gneɣ ma gneɣ ugadeɣ ad arguɣ
d awezɣi ad tzewǧeḍ kečč akked ferruǧa
Ḥmimuc i tcenfirin
muḥemmed uharun ikemmel deg ubrid n tira dɣa yura ammud n tmedyazt “abrid n tlelli”
ad yeccetki fell-i yilemẓi-nni
d nettat i d tamεellemt
jbed iman-ik ar deffir
aṭas n yedrimen i iṣerref kra yessikil
yufeg yitbir deg tqejjirt-is qqnen-as yiwen n izen
ddu rrif rrif ad tafeḍ ddeqs n iṣeyyaden n calba akka lawan-agi seččayen s yiwen n yimɣi n yilel i wumi qqaṛen tubrest
yaxi llant temɣarin
deg ssuq i d-ttemlilin kra n yimdanen i d-yefka rebbi
leɛca-ayi ad tawi tafat s wudem
yeẓẓar tilufa s wallen n tudert
tutlayt timawit d tamsertit tagamant
awalen i as-d-yefka zedɣen deg-s
lekdeb ur ittdummu ara
Ɣef acḥal i tesɛiḍ tamsirt-ik n tbaskit
tezmer tkadimit ad tefru aṭas n temsal yeqqimen ɛelqent
nniɣ-as akka kra n wussan ad uɣaleɣ ɣur-s
imeṭṭawen serrin am terga seg wallen-is
anda tebɣiḍ ad nruḥ
nettat ur tessin yiwen
ikeri-w
tekkes ayen yellan ɣef ṭṭabla
nezga deg waluḍ
kahina d tameṭṭut n uxxam
ad xedmeɣ lutu i yiman-iw d win iyi-id-iqesden mi ara fakeɣ leqraya
ddwa n wussan-is d asirem
fren taqbaylit i warraw-ik
ldi aqṛab-ik teddmeḍ-d taktubt-ik
ttu belli teḥkiḍ-as-tt
yiwen ur yelḥiq
lbaḍna-nni yenna-iyi-tt-id
nassaram aseggas i d-iteddun ad yili yif win yezrin
nekk ur d-qqsideɣ ara ad ak-qqneɣ
akken ad geɣ iluɣma ccucufeɣ yal imalas deg tnerdabt
iṣeffer unefray beddu n uḥric wis sin
lmaεun yeqqaz-d aḍref-iḍen
ass-a n usfelqem d usgerjem s usqemqem
neɣ ahat tewwi-tt-id akk d imeṭṭi
ad as-tent-in-awiɣ azekka
d nekk i d-ijerḥen g uḍaṛ
mačči d kečč i d-iṣaḥ wawal
Ɣas akken mačči ɣef yimelyan i d-nettmeslay
tgerrez tsuqilt-a
atan dɣa tufiḍ-d acu-t wa
ur yufi ḥedd d amwanes
amejjay yefka-yid ddwa n tɛebbuḍt
yuba yeẓwwer deg tusnak
iḍall-d rrbeḥ fell-ak
ad d-ilal ad iɣer ad yexdem ad yemmet
acḥal aya ur yuri tabrat
yuba iḥemmel ad yurar
iteddu taddart taddart armi yewweḍ tin n umɣar azemni
ma yella yal yiwen ur asen-iseɛɛu ara lweqt
ayen tebɣuḍ tekkeḍ ay iḍ d ulaqrar ad yali wass
yelha ufrux deg yigenni mačči daxel n tfergact
reḍleɣ-awent adlis ad t-teɣremt
aṭas n tafat tesseqṛaḥ allen
wid iɛelmen steqsayen amek akka zedɣeɣ iman-iw
ad ǧǧeɣ akk ayen ssarameɣ
anwa yessnen Ḥmed lemseyyeḥ
isfeḍ-it maziɣ deg yiwet n teswiɛt
cḥal deg laεmer-ik
tḍurr-it tuɣmest-is yeqleɛ-as-tt-id umejjay n wuglan
Ɛeddan ɣef tmura meṛṛa ur d-ufan ara am netta
tedda-yam di nneqma
kemmel aɛeṛṛuḍ
s teqbaylit i tettwaṛebbamt
ur tnuda fell-aneɣ ur aɣ-tufi
susem
sliɣ i teɣri n jidda ferḥeɣ
anda ara ken-id-afeɣ
ma yella nfuk zik imiren
ddan-asen di nneqma
ayaw ad nmuqel
ad taf ṭṭlam yettraǧu
yezdeɣ iman-is deg uxxam
deg tegrest uḍan ɣezzifit ma d ussan wezzilit
ameqqan d umeẓẓyan
Ḥsiɣ lufan teɣriḍ asefru akken ma yella ad tbeddleḍ rray
Ṭṭuqqtent-d fell-aɣ tlufa
d iḥlulen kan i d ddwa n usemmiḍ
iqjan-agu seglafen
heddreɣ-as ɣellin-as
yal ass ttargun s teqbaylit
d taqbaylit i d yemma-twen
anafag agraɣlan n new york yeččur d lɣaci
a yemma ḥuzaɣ afus-iw s lmus
ddant-awen di nneqma
anta ara ibedden i leqdic-nni
d acu i d-igran di tcacit d aqerru yeǧǧa wallaɣ
ur bɣiɣ ara ad skerfen deg yimawen tikerkas
ttwalin-kent-id s yir tiṭ
rran-aɣ deg uɛewwiq
ansi-ken
sima teffeɣ-d
tebɣam tutlayt taqbaylit
acimi i ttilin warrac dima d inemsazwaren
inelmaden akk ttrusun-d mi ara d-awwḍen yikayaden n umesḍis amezwaru d wis sin
ad nɛeddi ɣer ibetṛunen
tebda-t ddeg-s aya
yiwen yessuter tagazuzt tugi-t
myenɣen
lemmer kan lliɣ d aɣezfan ugar s cwiṭ
ass-a yelha lḥal
ttqadareɣ yemma akked baba
tikwal tirga ttuɣalent d tilawt
medden imir ttaǧǧan tiḥuna ttruḥun d tirbuyaε
akken yebɣu yenna umedyaz yiwen ur s-iḥess
waqila aṭas ara yenɣen iman-nsen mi ara walin tuli teqbaylit
skasit kan s talwit ay atmaten
iwacu ur yi-d-teqqareḍ kra n tɣawsa ur ssineɣ
kemm mačči n da neɣ
ad tali d asawen tutlayt taqbaylit
kra ur yeεǧil
ma qebḥen akk warrac iqbiḥ ula d kečč
tekbel tamacwart-is akken ilaq
yiwen ur t-ẓriɣ am kečč
ihi yesla-am-d rebbi a yemma i as-yerna caɛban
ur zmireɣ ad d-fakkeɣ aceqquf-a n upazel
simmal nekni nesnernay tutlayt taqbaylit
Ɣur-m kullec
tamurt idurar
Ḥerzet tawennaṭ-nwen ay imdanen
taqbaylit d tutlayt mačči d tantala
weṣṣan-tt imawlan-is
teskaddbeḍ-aɣ-d yak
ad slemdeɣ tutlayt taqbaylit i warraw-iw
ad yewɛu taggara n yixf-is
ur yi-tewqiε ara anda tettetteḍ imensi
akka axiṛ
mačči d ayen ara iḍulen
itbir tura ur d azamul n talwit
tamurt n legrig terka s uzemmur
ilaq ad inadi aṭṭanen nniḍen
Ɛni d tidet
llan ssexlaḍen gar tullist d tmacahut
yewwi-d yid-s aqerwac-nni
llan wid yettɛassan ɣef teqbaylit
tebɣiḍ ad tedduḍ yid-s ɣer boston
s tidet tettxemmimeḍ ad tebrud
d tuzyint n tidet
nekk ttcehhideɣ s teqbaylit ma d kečč cehhed s wayen i tebɣiḍ
neǧǧren tiwwura
d acu bɣant ad neg
lliɣ tesseɣ akeffi
taneqqiṭ-a d taxatart mliḥ
nan-d yendem i izewǧen
err-d iṭij ma yeɣli
d nekk i meqqer akk
neǧṛen iberdan i tutlayt taqbaylit
ihellek yal tikelt ara iwali annay n tutlayt taqbaylit
gen di talwit a gma Ḥemza racid d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ur teẓwireḍ ara deg-s
acḥal ara teqqimeḍ deg boston
taqbaylit ad tesɛu amkan-is gar tutlayin n ddunit
ad yettɛelli deg igenni
dima ttfadeɣ
d waki
layas d win ur nettfukku
tura iban-d belli taqbaylit d tutlayt mačči d tantala
yella wayen tebɣiḍ ad yi-d-tiniḍ
gen di talwit a gma tunsi Ǧamal d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ulamek ara tferẓeḍ timsal meẓẓiyeḍ
wwḍeɣ uqbel wiyaḍ
tura kan i meslayeɣ d uselmad-im
yusa-d tom
tom i meqqer ɣef baba-k deg leεmer
d kečč i y-isseknen
ah susem kan
rnu muqel
tɣab am yetri
akken ttxemmimeɣ fell-as i ur t-fehhmeɣ
nekk d alak kemm d talakt
acuɣeṛ i tegneḍ deg uzal
d adfel i t-yenɣan
mlaleɣ-t ɣur usensu n madala deg bgayet
d menhu ara d-tedduḍ
tom ṭṭfen-t yeznuzay lehyuf i igerdan
Ɛni tsekṛeḍ
nniɣ-as ahat tuɣalemt s axxam
aṭas imeɣnasen i teṭṭef temsulta tazzayrit deg iɣil Ɛli
bɣan leqbayel ad ɣṛen kullec s tutlayt-nsen
avrius-nni yedda-d mi tesbeddeḍ asnas-nni iḍelli
lhiɣ-d d wakken ɣef lǧal-ik
ahat mazal-d rruḥ-is
tteddmen kan ayen i sen-iεeǧben
mazal-ik tuḍneḍ
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat-nsen
gen di talwit a gma buclaɣem Ḥakim d awezɣi ad k-nettu
aql-iyi akken meslayeɣ d uselmad-ik
ad as-teslem i ugrud ad yetɣenni ɣef timmuzɣa
Ɛni teɛyiḍ
gen di talwit a gma amini karim d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ruḥ war leεḍil ttxil
sebblen tirwiḥin-nsen ɣef ulac ttuɣaḍen
ad t-zzuɣren seg umeẓẓuɣ
ur rriɣ ara ddhen
aya neẓra-t si zik
ur bɣiɣ ad ččeɣ acemma tura akka
ad wen-d-iniɣ ssebba-s
yeqfez
ad nruḥ ad d-neqḍu
ulac isem n cciṭan s tmaziɣt imi ur t-ssinen imaziɣen
ur ufiɣ ara iman-iw ayakka ur k-xellṣeɣ
sɛurbuben ɣillen d tacbaḥt
bɣan ad d-aɣent takeṛṛust
iruḥ ad d-yekkes idammen
teṭṭef-it tawla seg asmi i iwala tutlayt taqbaylit
ad tt-ǧǧeɣ ɣur-i taswiεt-a
ur nettɛeṭṭil ara ad naweḍ ar igenni
gen di talwit a gma adara fuad d awezɣi ad k-nettu
Ẓẓher-is yečča-t umcic yewwi-t deg tfesqa
taqcict-agi tuɣal d acu-tt a cabḥa
sexdameɣ-t
tettnuddumeḍ ilaq-ak ad teṭṭseḍ ciṭuḥ
s tidet dayen ttuɣ-kem
nettat tettneɛtab ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
awi-iyi-d amḍelliw-iw
neɣra ɣef tsertit tadamsant unabaḍ
seg yimir-nni i d-tettban amzun d tislit
tom i meqqer ɣef baba-k
nḥeyyaṛen ɣef uqcic-nni
amdan yella yettemcabi ɣer yibki
gen di talwit a gma lamini samir d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ah lemmer i nettemcawaṛ
sarameɣ ad d-yini tom ala
ad theḍṛemt s teqbaylit
tom-nni iruḥ deg-sent
atan din uɣerda
nettwali tutlayt-nneɣ taqbaylit tettali
ad sen-neḥder ad ten-nenṭel
awi-d apurṭabl-iw
ad yemmečč warẓeg deg lḥeqq-is
tibeḥyar ttwaqelɛent
teḍra-d zik yakan
tusa-d mary
aru-t
rẓag qqaren-as abelluḍ n yilef
aql-iyi zhiɣ
ttḥadar ivirusen
kra ur ten-yuɣ
alak d amagday
ala lwiza i yeẓran tamentilt n tirza n tlawin-a
tettrajuḍ tom
ahat ass-n ad tuɣaleḍ
yezger i wasif
akka tura ad neqdec ɣef teqbaylit mebla ccwal
ssakleɣ weḥd-i kan
yella ugiṭar d uvyulu d ujawaq d dderbuka
ur ttqelliq ara d ayen isehlen
jerḥen yemjuhad
yettak cclaḍa i uɣyul
kunemti tettneɛtabemt ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
deg uɣerbaz alemmas i yessen tayri
werǧin i ẓriɣ ḥedd am kemm
ad teqqimeḍ ad teččeḍ imensi yid-neɣ
ayen yufa ad t-yexdem mačči d win iɛeddzen
ur stehzay ara s medden
ttawin yid-sen aɣrum…
akka i tt-icar fell-asen umenzu
gen di talwit a gma Ḥamza d awezɣi ad k-nettu
nekk ttamneɣ s teqbaylit ma d kečč amen s wayen i tebɣiḍ
d yiwen seg iwudam n tmucuha-nneɣ
texṣi tcemmaεt-is deg teswiεt
anwa yelhan akk gar imdukal-ik
bɣan ad kesben imelyaṛen
ad kent-awiɣ yid-i
kfu-d tura taqsiṭ-ik
baba yebɣa ad d-fɣeɣ d abugatu
Ɛni thelkemt
d taqbaylit i lemden ar yemma-tsen
ur tebɣiḍ ara ad teẓreḍ ddunit
iruḥ ɣer din s uḍar-is
burebbu la yettmerriiḥ ɣef useklu issawal i tefsut
ar igenni kan i tettali tutlayt taqbaylit
ahat yella wacu teẓriḍ ɣef tebratin n wassa
ad ɣ-d-qqimen din am uccanen
gen di talwit a gma yusfi Ɛezdin d awezɣi ad k-nettu
nettat tettxemmim kan ɣef teqbaylit
tanemmirt a cabḥa walaɣ-kem-id tefkiḍ-d tameẓẓuɣt akken i ilaq
yeṭṭes ur yeẓri i yeḍran
xas ini sliman u muḥ wurǧin yessawel i tiziri tagawawt
d lbira i yeswa
messus axxam segmi truḥ
tettmenniḍ-d ad d-teẓreḍ axxam-amellal kra n wass
agdud ad yeddu lwaḥid
atan ifessi ugris-nni
deg wass-nni ur yufi iman-is
win yebɣan tasertit yella wemkan-is
gen di talwit a gma Ǧebbar murad d awezɣi ad k-nettu
tom atan deg lḥebs
ur tufiḍ d acu ara d-rnuɣ
tenna-d tḥemmel tawuri-a
yettak lgaṭu i tɣeṭṭen
aql-i ttaruɣ tabrat
aqcic-a ur tban ara yakk fell-as tugdi
aru isem-im
vuṭṭan medden fell-as xas akken yettmettat
tettawiḍ-d isefra s teqbaylit
laman wwin-t waman
ur cukkeɣ ad yili yuḍen
Ččaṛ ay aqeṛṛuy-iw
ur ẓriɣ ara d acu-t maca d ayen meqqren nezzeh
aqbayli n tidet d win iḥemmlen tutlayt-is
tettḥebbiṛ ɣef teqbaylit
leḥlu i win t-yuklalen
ur bɣiɣ ad mxalafeɣ ɣef wiyaḍ
yeqqers acemma userwal-is
kkes ugur
yufa massi deg ṭabla iman-is
tnuda fell-akent tufa-kent
ur y-iεǧib ara ad d-ibedd ḥedd sdeffir-i
ittas-d ɣer da snat n tikal deg yimalas
ddu neɣ efk-d nnekwa-k
ahat tebɣiḍ ad teẓreḍ
d timlilit iḥerṣen
mačči deg tbanant i teqqim
yella baba yeqqar-iyi-d iḍrisen lawan-nni mara gneɣ
ul-iw iruḥ d isyaxen
d taqbaylit i tlemdem ar yemma-twen
ar dinna i nteddu
lliɣ bɣiɣ ayen ara ččeɣ
anda sraḥen buzelluf ad azzlen
aha ṭṭef imi-k
tuɣ ulac ula d amcic
tsebɣeḍ-asen-tt
zhan meṛṛa
yebẓeḍ iman-is
nɣan-ak-t
nmerreḥ
ifakk-ak-tt
sami ixdem tafelquqt
ala netta i yesɛan lqahwa deg taddart tezga-d deg tqernit
acu k-ixuṣṣen ay axxam d tigejdit
ad yerfed yiwen n umɣar afus-is ad d-teɣli tsusmi
Ḥeṛṛet tura
tfakk-am-t
la yi-teskiddibeḍ
Ḥku-iyi-d taqsiṭ-nni
zdat wanzaren-is
amen-iyi ad kem-ɛahdeɣ ur dliɣ i dduḥ alma yettru-d uqcic
wellah arma ḥudreɣ-k
yeɛreq yuba anaɣ
ad nger taseqqart
amek i d-yeḍra usehwu-nni
ittḥawal yuba učči
limer i twalaḍ tavidyut i d-yexdem muḥend belqasem ur iyi-tettcewwileḍ ara akka
mačči s wannayen ara d-tawim timunnent
teffud
tḥareḍ
seggment-t
truḥ-as yelli-s argaz-is di lḥebs i yella i as-yerra umsaltu-nni yesteqsayen guli
zik εacen ussan-nsen
fakkent-awen-t
yezga yesḥerḥur deg usawen cukkeɣ yesɛa buneggaf
wissen amek ara yili uzekka
ad asent-tent-in-awiɣ azekka
ass n tmeɣra yewweḍ-d d ass n ssebt
icerrew-d azemmur ɣer ucellaf
yuɣ-as-d baba-s aserwal
deg tegrest tekkat lgerra aṭas yal ass
sḥassfeɣ imi mary mačči d uletma
iban ɣef wudem-is yeḥzen
azal n umdan yegrareb kennu yuɣal d lεada
akka tura aṭas n yimyura i d-yekkren
ur nezmir ad nemtawi ɣef kra
ur yeẓri ara sami d acu i iḍerrun dihin
Ɣur-i yiwet n tikti wissen ma ad telhu
yuzen-awen-in tabrat
ddiɣ-awen di nneqma
nekk mačči d abugaṭu
yeqqim nnig ubrid yettraju melmi ara d-yaweḍ
yettarra-yaɣ deg uɛewwiq
yuɣal uqelmun ɣer yiḍarren
asensu yelhan d win yebnan ɣef yiri n yilel
eǧǧ-iyi ad ssiwleɣ i ubugaṭu-inu
ur zmireɣ ad ḍurreɣ yiwen
ddu ɣer sdat ur ttaggad
Ṭbib n ucelleḥ yekcem ɣer umuḍin-is mbaɛd mi d-yuki
ulac am kečč
ur d-urwen ara
reḍleɣ-asen adlis ad t-ɣren
ma ur yukir ur yettili ara bxir
meqqer gar yimeqqranen
yettwaṭṭef yiwen n umergu deg texfet i undiɣ
yettnadi dima ad yefhem
nerfed rray d amehbul nuɣal d lḥerraga
urgaɣ zegzaw yigenni ussan amzun d tafsut
ttuɣaḍen msakit yiɣriben
tasɣimt-a terna akken i iwata ɣef uselkim
azekka ad hedreɣ i tom
wissen kan melmi ara t-fakkeɣ
sin yiḥricen ɣef kraḍ n tfekka talsit d aman
yenwa akka i teddunt temsal
rebbi ad ak-t-id-yerr
nudant fell-asent ur tent-ufint ara
yuzen yiwet n tebrat n tayri i tmeddakelt-is
hder cwiṭ fhem aṭas
Ṭawes yuɣ-itt yidir ilindi
ad awent-tent-in-awiɣ azekka
thedder i wul-is mi tettezzem iman-is
yuli wass lgerra teḥbes ur tekkat ara
nerra-kent deg uɛewwiq
wa yettawi wa yettarra
yuɣal-d seg ssyada akken
yufa-k tettheggiḍ iman-ik ad truḥeḍ s amahil
ccan-is d win meqqren
ad t-yaker kan yiḍes ad d-bdun fell-as
ur yeqqar ara aṭas
aru kan
ay aɣyul
yuɣ-asent-d baba-tsent iserwula
rujaɣ aṭas
ur ilaq ara ad yini tom i mary
iɛreḍ-iyi yuba ad ččeɣ
yufa-asen-d amahil
laqent-am nnwaḍer i tenhert
i nettat i wumi txedmem akk annect-a
idrimen sderwicen
yedderɣel seg wass mi d-ilul
tenna-d yelli  "ḥemleɣ-k"
amek ara teḍru yid-k
ur beqquɣ ara ad rren takmamt i yimi-w
acḥal yettlusu deg uḍaṛ
nekkenti nxeddem ma d nutenti ttɣimint
Ḥemmleɣ ad aruɣ iḍrisen s tutlayt-inu
yegull ad yeddu alma yuweḍ
tugadeḍ a yiwen ubandi
amek akka i d-ittili wurar-a
Ɣur-i yiwet n tifrat-nniḍen
tugna-ines ur yezmir ad tt-yettu
amer ittaf yiwen ur t-id-yettwali
zewwaɣ wudem-is mi yenneḥcam
tislit n unẓar tcebbeḥ igenni
tesseɣ kan yiwen n lkas n waman
taɣzut d akal n luḍa ɣef yiri n waman
ulac win i t-id-iwalan
tesεuẓẓgeḍ terriḍ iman-im ur d-tesliḍ ara
tikkelt-nni d tayaẓiḍt i d-yuker
win ifukken yezmer ad yeffeɣ
ad cucfeɣ seldazekka
yuzzel yengef yesgunfa
wa yeffeɣ wa yekcem
iḥṣel-iyi uẓru deg usebbaḍ
nettuɣaḍ nezzeh
amedyaz yettarra-tt kan i tirga
ala ay akli d nekk i d ddayxa ur telli tayeḍ
yessames mmi tabasast-is
allaɣ-is iluɣ
yerra-ten deg uɛewwiq
zuxxeɣ aṭas s tom
nreṭṭel idrimen i yimesbaɣuren kan
ur yeṭallay ara akk ɣer wayen yettserrif
fran-tt d yiman-nsen ur ttilin ara
kullec ɣlay
mi n-yusa ɣur-wen d acu i awen-yenna
deg umwan ikerrez tamurt-is
yeɣfel umdan
yegguma ad yesteɛref
nniɣ-as i tom d acu i ttxemmimeɣ fell-as
yenwa umeɣbun medden akk am netta
tuɛer ddunit
yeldi adlis-is ad iɣer
yiwen ur t-yessin
aql-ak ula d kečč tɛebbaḍ am uɣyul-nwen
ur tessin ara ad teftel seksu
ar tura ur ččiɣ tamsalt
urgaɣ ttafgeɣ deg yigenni
d acu ara d-nini ɣef umdan yuḍnen
ruḥ
kra yellan ɣur-neɣ yelha nefka-as-t i urumi
kra yekka wass netta yennudem
wa ɣezzif wa wezzil
yuzen-iyi-d tabrat
ilul ass n mraw d sin yennayer
tom ur kem-yettaǧǧa ara ad tnehreḍ
tuzen-iyi-d tabrat
tella ɣur-s aṭas n tissas
yettxemmim kan fell-as
swiɣ tabeyyirt tasemmaḍt
ur ɣelleq ara afus-ik
amcic d aɣersiw amsuṭṭaḍ yettidir d umdan
teddun-am di nneqma
nekk leɛmer jerbeɣ tigi
d ḥedd yettmeslayen taneglizit ara yeṭṭef d axeddam
cabḥa d yiwet n tlemẓit yettḥulfun aṭas
tettili tzemmurt deg tmura izeɣlen
ilaq ad tɛejleḍ
tettaɣemt-d aɣrum yal ass

anamek n wawal amaziɣ d argaz ilelli 
icedha aṭas arraw-is
terriḍ-tt deg uɛewwiq
ttemyakken anzi aṭas wakniwen
iruḥ leɛmer-ik waqila
yečča imensi-is
amarezg n yimeẓẓyanen ur nfaq s kra
tugna-ines tedwi-t
sami yufa adlis d asneknay nezzeh
terram-t deg uɛewwiq
ilaq ad awḍeɣ alma d sbiṭar
wagi d assimeɣ kan
ttḥadar ɣef yiman-ik
wissen melmi ara d-yali wass
ilaq tal taɣawsa ad tili deg wadeg-ines
Ɣur-s tikerkas d turart
ayen akken yeswa n ccrab yerra-t-id
aṭas i ruɣ fell-awen
rran-k deg uɛewwiq
lɛella d aṭan yettaɣen aɛelliḍ n umdan neɣ n uɣarsiw yettabzag yettaweḍ anec-ilat
acḥal n teqcicin yuzzlen deffir-s
tzemremt ad trefdemt akk annect-a
nebda alqaḍ n uzemmur
iɣsan-is deg talwit i umeɣnas n tmaziɣt
amedyaz d inigi n tallit-is
tettarra-ken deg uɛewwiq
tura d nnuba-k ad d-teɣreḍ
aṭas aya ur d-yewwit udfel
Ǧǧet-iyi ad ɛerḍeɣ
tenna i maziɣ
mlaleɣ-d tabaḥant-iw iḍelli
yuwi tastaɣt-is
ur tent-yettawi ara yid-s
Ɣeẓẓan-t-id yifassen-is yebɣa ad yaru
ttnadiɣ acu n tefyirt ara aruɣ
teṭṭefi-t tawla 
tizmilin n yuba gerrzent
anaddal yelhan d win ur nettkeyyif ara
aksum s sshala i t-id-tekksen ɣef yiɣes
berka tikerkas
d acu i d-tennamt
i wakken azekka ur ittuɣal ara d aẓekka kkret ad nxedmet
s anda iruḥ
allen-im yettirriqen gant amzun d iṭij
d tallit yebḍan ɣef sin yiḥricen
terra-k deg uɛewwiq
nettat tettwaxḍeb ma d nek nejlaɣ
amgerḍ n umdeɣ d aɣezzfan
deg umwan i kerzen leqbayel tamurt-nsen
awal ma wezzil tefra ma ɣezzif ad d-yarew kra
tiɛleǧtin i teqcicin ma d ddabax i warrac
zik deg ssuq i ttemyakken yimdanen ttiɛad
am win iɛuẓẓgen yuɣal isell
meyyzet uqbel aneggez ddunit tettɣuṛṛu
kkiɣ deg rreḥba n udlis i d-yellan deg cmini
ad d-rnuɣ yiwet n tefyirt-nniḍen
wa iruḥ wa yuɣal-d
iqbayliyen ḥemmlen che guevara
tiziri tuɣ-d akk tamurt
ass-agi kkreɣ-d zik
taḍsa ḍsan-tt s yimeṭṭi n widak yettrun
ifuk wayen riɣ ad awen-t-id-iniɣ
asma ara ak-d-taweḍ temsalt
iwet aserdas s tneccabt
tesmar-as-d lqahwa
yudan kan uyaziḍ kkreɣ-d
thegga-d yiwen n seksu amacki-t
iḥemmel ad iqesser war aḥebbus
acḥal i nurar ilqafen
am wassa ad d-inṭeq uselkim s teqbaylit
teṭṭalay kan deg-s
azalen fessin am udfel deg yiṭij
tuker-as
ar timlilit a taεzizt-inu
ibec deffir uxxam
Ḥemmlen warrac ad slen i tmucuha
tarewla ur telli
isura am wa ad ak-d-ččareɣ akamyun
anamek n wawal amaziɣ d argaz ilelli
ass-agi i sfugleɣ amulli-inu
aṭas i yemmuten
yugi-tt muḥend
ay udem n uzger
itett tijɛal
yidir d aḥeddad n wawal
inuda akken i ilaq maca kra ur t-yufi
ur ten-kkateɣ ara
ečč ayen akk i yellan deg uḍebsi-k
tessenṭaḍ tmeqlit-nni ɣas ḥiwel zzit
ddiɣ-d yid-sen
kkret a leqbayel ɣer tira s teqbaylit akken iwata
tewwet tɛedda amzun ur iyi-d-twala ara akk
ansi i d-tettaɣ idlisen
aṭas i tecmet
zik lkanun d aɣerbaz ma d timucuha d timsirin
uɣal-d nḥemmel-ik
ufiɣ-ken-in tetturarem ddabax
yeqḍa-d seg ssuq
ilaq ad d-tekkreḍ ɣef setta
cniɣ-as-d tizlit n yidir i yelli
rruḥ amaynut ara k-yeǧǧen ad tesɛuḍ asirem deg tudert
tewwet-iyi tmagart-nsen
icedha ad tt-iwali
zik d tura mačči kif kif
tuget deg-sent ṭṭalayent ɣer ssɛaya
itess aṭas
ini-d tura kečč ma yelha wakka
llan yid-k yimawlan-ik
mi d-yewweḍ yiḍ
sexsi tafat n teftilt mi ara tɛeddiḍ ad teṭṭseḍ
aman n udfel zeddigit
d winna i d-iwwin aman
iɣleq afus-is
asendu n uyefki s tidet win n waman d tikellax
yuɣ-as-t-id
ipulisen ttqelliben amakar-nni
iḍelli heggeɣ iman-is ad uɣaleɣ ar uxeddim
menyif tameṭṭut iḥerzen wala tayuga ikerzen
icerrew-d azemmur ɣer ucerraɛ
ad dduɣ alma d anda yessaweḍ uḍar
azerzay d aṭṭan n warrac
anida-t yimru
ayefki n tyemmat ilha i llufan
teẓẓgeɣ issedaw rabaḥ
la dderya ternuḍ fell-as
imir-nni neččur d nneyya
ay azger
ittengelyat kan deg iberdan
nutni deg leɛmer mlalen-d ula ɣef yiwet n tikti
d ayen i sriɣ beddat
mačči akka i ẓẓareɣ
yusa-d iman-is
tceggeb-iten taluft-nni
ziɣ ur d-yegra deg-k wara
neḍmeɛ ṣṣwab ad d-yeɣli yal yiwen ad yawi ayla-s
terra-t tmara ad yinig
fran-tt fell-aɣ zik-nni
iqfez mliḥ deg urar
kullec iɛedda akken iwata
ur d-yuri ur d-isawel
d acu ar ad neg tura
ad tawim ddnub-is ugeswaḥ
ayaw ad nwali
nwiɣ ad k-fehmeɣ
yuɣ-d lḥut
a nnger-iw
Ɣas fareṣ
la ileḥḥu
ur tt-ttxalaḍ ara
akka axir
iεǧeb-as
Ɣas ma ugten yisergal deg tmetti
twalamt itri-nni
Ṛuḥet ɛasset-tt akken i twalam
deg yiseggasen n tmanyin tettekki deg umennuɣ ɣef tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ
yuba yeqbel
ass-nni d yir ass
Ɛelmen akk
ihi d acu
ad nẓeṛ
yextaṛ-ik
xtiṛ yiwen
itri-nni i walan di ccerq izwar zdat-nsen
yecṭeṛ
yefhem tom
aṭas n tlawin i yellan dinna ttmuqulent si lebɛid
win umi ara temleḍ aya ad yeqbel ɛecra n yimelyan mačči d cwiṭ
limin s usfel yellan fell-as ilzem
keyyfent
Ẓedmen-d fell-aɣ
i kem a kafar naḥum tewwḍeḍ igenni
Ɣaḍent-aɣ
iban sani ileḥḥu
kcem ɣer texxamt
d kunemti i iḥerzen iles d yidles aqbayli
ceḍḥemt
yuba yessefsex-it
yerna bu lerjul yeɣman
yeddem abernus-is yekka tawwurt yeffeɣ
yiwen ur t-ǧǧin ara
ad ken-rreɣ d iṣeggaden n yemdanen
mazal yefka-yi-d ɛecra n wussan ad xemmeɣ
ulamma qqaren-d tizemmar-is n usnulfu ar tura sɛant tilas acku tenǧem kan ad tsuneɣ neɣ ad tesbeɣ
yebɛed
yura deg unyir-is
mazal-itt tedder
ihi dɣa
ulac ajdid
uɣalet ɣer deffir
nnant-d
s nnif d lḥerma am Ḥnifa zuhra yasmina na crifa
jemɛen-d wid akk ufan s yemcumen s wid yelhan
atan yal yiwen seg-wen anwa ajeǧǧig i d-yewwi deg ufus-is yettriḥ d awal lɛali
ldi imi-k

Ṛuḥ sya
ma yexḍa sswab i wawal ma ad yili sswab di tsusmi
Ḥeṛṛ tura

xdem lxir ad t-tafeḍ
nteg
tenheṛ
wicqa
yečča mi qrib ad ifak yenṭeq ɣer baba-s
ayɣer tura
d ambaddal n ṣṣifa n yasuɛ ɣef udrar
Ẓriɣ belli tettnadimt ɣef yasuɛ ittwaṣellben
deg ukemmel n tfaskiwin n tmedyazt d tejmilin i yettuɣalen i yinaẓuren deg tmurt n leqbayel

zureɣ
fkan-d lɣella wa meyya wa settin wa tlatin
lḥut
ad refdeɣ akebbuṭ-iw ad tt-ikcem Ḥemmu Ɣzali
yerzan tasnilest timerwest
yuba icennu
meqqeṛ
lameɛna mi iwala yekker-d waḍu yugad
fell-as i tbed tmetti
d abrid
iɛsekṛiwen ṭṭfen idrimen-nni xedmen akken i sen-nnan

ini-asen
rawubin inna-asen daɣen ur ssazzalet ara idammen
tqeṛṛeḥ
awah ayɣer d nekk i yefren
tnehṛem
yuɛeṛ mliḥ
ini-d kan yiwen n wawal aqeddac-iw ad ikker
ayen walan yimdanen deg temsikent i yekfan ass n sḍis deg yulyu-a di oxford tamurt n tgelda yedduklen
yendeh i yemma-s yenna-as awi-as-d imensi
rnu yiwen
teḥlulimt
zhumt
layla tɣucc sami
teqqarem daɣen limin s uɛalṭar ulac fell-as
ass mi d-nekcem lezzayer nufa-tt-id tebna d abeɣli
i d as-nnan yiḍulan-is
ttɛummuɣ
Ɣaḍent-tt
mmi-s n umdan ad ittusellem iwakken ad ittwaṣelleb
i yessetma-s mačči yid-neɣ i llant
jemɛen-t
akka ihi s lfakya-nsen ara ten-tɛeqlem
yella win i k-id-iluɛan neɣ win i d-iruḥen ɣer ɣur-k
yella menhu i k-id-iluɛan neɣ win i d-yejban ɣur-k
Ɣaḍen-t
uccen ifuṛes asteqsi-nni awah
ad teẓrem
s temlilit i aɣ-d-ijemɛen
Ḥebset-ten
aɣrim-agi menhut wissen d acu yexdem
akken ad tefkem tazmert i tikli
yemma-s tefrawes tasa-s annaɣ d acu i ak-yexdem uqcic
tzemrem ad tasem
iha iha a mm imezran ɣer waggus
yerna tumen s wazal n tzemmar i tesɛa tmeṭṭut taqbaylit

rju ciṭuḥ
ad as-tent-tefkem
ad tettcebbiḥ ad tettarra izebgan
tɣunfa-k
d taddart gar tudrin i d-yefkan aṭas n wudmawen n tsekla taqbaylit
tuget deg-sent ɛerḍent ad rẓent kra n leqyud
argut din
cennuɣ
kniɣ s aḍajin umseɣ
yewwi-ten

nesla i isuɣan ɣer berra
di lweqt-nni lḥakem hiṛudus isla s cciɛa n yasuɛ

teɛjeb-asen ayendin tmezgunt-a
theggam
i tiwin
Ṛuḥen akk
tura kan i yeffeɣ si lbiru
tura a mmi ḥess-iyi-d txedmeḍ ayen akka ara k-d-iniɣ
neṭṭes
nniɣ-am kemm a yelli a taḥbult n yirden mi tnuṛ
d asaru amenzu n rida amrani akked ara d-iɛeddin ad d-yeglu s uskasi ɣer tagara n usaru
ma tenɣiḍ-asen argaz azekka ad d-asen ad k-nɣen
yuba yefreḥ nezzeh
Ččemt
yekna tom
sɛan ugur
d acu-tt twaɣit-agi
ad refdeɣ akebbuḍ-iw ad tt-yekcem lyuṭna Ɛmiruc
yenna umedyaz dɣa ɣef tegnatin yecban ta
tikkelt-a dɣa s tallelt n tɣiwant n at smaɛel wwin-ten ɣer teẓgi n takkuct
isirkli-d lɛesker a ssifil refdet arrac
sekṛeɣ
lal-is tegrurez tferreḥ
lameɛna netta ur s-yerri ula d yiwen n wawal
nutni zhan
zhut
baba-s ilumm-it inna-as d acu-tt targit-agi i turgaḍ
d amcum

deg tesɣunt-a ad d-tafem agzul n tfaska
yebra-yaɣ

argu din
tettfuḥum
tfak
segmi tella d tilemẓit i tekcem ɣer umaṭtaf wis sin
qeblen akk
tuklal tajmilt i mi teddem amennuɣ ɣef tmagit
merrgeɣ-tt
siwa yiwen i yelhan
rnu semmus
yella ḥlaw
yenna-d
ad ḥewwsent yid-i
d lakul
lemmer kan ǧǧan-tt ad texdem nettat tezmer i umdegger
yella d aɣawas-iw
ad d-nekkes udi s wurawen
yuba d abubul mliḥ
yedda yid-neɣ
tebεen addal ǧǧan leqraya
daɣen i wanwa uɣur ara d-teggri tedrimt n yiqeddicen-is yenzan
