s ujenwi deg ufus iɛdawen zzin-as-d
yumen yuba ayenni
ad s-nbedd
irucc akal
iseqsa ayɣer aqcic-a weḥd-s nnan-as d agujil ur yesɛi ḥedd
neɛlem
tamacahut n belɛejjuṭ
tesseṛɣemt-asen-t
ixulef aṭas ayen nnumen ttafen
i umbeɛd
kra din d asureg
nga aserwes gar umatar udmawan d uskim n tmeẓri
mmi-s n umdan ad iṛuḥ akken yura fell-as
urar dihin
sya d afella ad d-nheggi yiwen
Ṛwiɣ
tekkreḍ i wedrar s tqabact
mazal nettwali taqbaylit s wudem n wansayen
aεeṭṭar ameẓyan ma ulac uγilif bγiγ ad dduγ yid-k xersum ad nemwanas
i d-iḥmel wassif yewwi-d ariḥan
tsebɣemt-asen-ten
imawlan nettseddiq fell-asen
awalen-a ssufuɣen-d anallas azeɣray akken ad yekki ad yefk rray-is
ad cekkreɣ baba-s ṣfawa n waman
d ḥellu n yiwen n ukrif
tigawt-nsen tamezwarut i yetturaǧun ad tili d asarag ɣef unegmu idumen s umata d win n tɣiwant s wuzzig
acimi ur tettruḥuḍ ara ad d-tṣeṭṭleḍ
iwacu
ad yefk tunṭict i Ṛebbi
d ayen yessefraḥen nezzeh imi d ayen ara d-yernun tabɣest i warrac-nneɣ
lameɛna ajgu yellan di tiṭ-ik ur t-tettwaliḍ ara
ttagadeɣ ur bɣiɣ ara ad dduɣ deg targit
sečč-it ssels-it ketteṛ-as iɛekkzan
armi i ssiwḍeɣ xmesṭac n yiseggasen i bdiɣ ttfaqeɣ i tuzzuft
lluẓeɣ ur ččiɣ
yuɣal akk d aqemmuc yebda yettṣeṛṣiṛ
acu n zher-a i tesɛiḍ
xtaṛen-tt
mi d-tufiḍ amecṭuḥ aderɣal tamɣart amɣar ɛiwen-it ad yezger
lameɛna yerra afus-is ɣer daxel dɣa yeffeɣ-d gma-s
mbeɛd talalit n dda crif ramḍan iɛac mitin n iseggasen
tazwara yewhem sin akin yewwi-d zuǧ kilu n lebṣel yuɣ-itt yewwi-tt
liḥala-s tegzem tasa-w
ur d-sbeggnen ula d tiqqit n tegmat neɣ d tamuɣli n lemɣiḍat
d awezɣi ad crurdeɣ daxel n uzabuq-a ineqqen i tis kraḍ
ttmejluluxen ifassen-iw s zzit
zdi ad nezdi meɛna aḍebbeṛ d nekkini
qeṛṛiḥ
bdan la ttuɣalen waman ɣer tregwa
amdan yeṣfan izmer ad yečč seg weksum-nni
d awal-is aneggaru
a mmi iweṣṣa-k ur tettetteḍ alemma telluẓeḍ
fudeɣ
d ddeqqa-nni n tidet
yumayen telteyyam ad tt-id-neddem ad tt-nezwi ɣer uɣerbal s yiwen n uqeccaḍ neqqar-as tamezwayt
tewweḍ ayen tebɣa
yetteqraḥ mačči d kra igezzem yettajraḥ iteqqes
ih tufiḍ-tt-id
Ɣriɣ deg anternet aṭas n teḥkayin ɣef waṭṭan-a
neɛreḍ ad d-nefk kra n tulmisin ɣef usmeskel n tesnilest timserwest
aql-aɣ neɣli-d s lḥecmat
uggadeɣ ad iyi-d-yuɣal lehlak-nni
yettgergiz ad yernu tiɣrit
bran-ak
dɣa netta yessefraḥ iman-is s wawlen-nni imelḥanen
mi nettazzal medden ẓran-aɣ mi d-neqqel kra ur t-id-newwi
ax a yelli els imeqyasen-a
amgired akk ad yexmumi
ma yella nuɣal-d ɣef wamek tettwasen tuddsa ad naf d akken d iẓeḍwa inmettiyen
ahat lḥif d timuɣbent axir wala ad teddreḍ s yir udem
inna-a a sidi
ttxayaleɣ-d tixxamin iqeflen
ur seqsay ara menhu-yi nekk sɛiɣ-ak ccɣel ad t-id-txedmeḍ
Ḥettmen-t ad ibibb ṣṣalib n yasuɛ
ad yeṭṭes ad yettfukti
Ṭṭir ma yecbeḥ yijjiq
mi ara tettẓallam ur xeddmet ara am wat sin wudmawen
iɣunfa-k
s agellid sidna sliman
tenwam ddunit d awal kan
ad nsellem fell-as ad nẓer acu yuḥwaǧ
ur teččiḍ ur terbiḥeḍ ay ul ur temniɛeḍ seg ccḥani
ul yeččur tagnit teḍyeq
tamacahut n yizem d teɣzalt
meqqer yugar akk medden uderwic-nni
yesmenyif ad yecnu s ṣṣenf n cceɛbi am wakken daɣen icennu ccna n tmeɣriwin
Ɣriɣ azal n usrag
win ara ten-iččen ad ittwakkes
kečč d ugur deg ubrid-iw
Ɣef uɛssas n taddart
d tuccḍa-w
awit-d baba-twen akked twaculin-nwen tuɣalem-d ɣur-i
Ɣur-neγ s leqbayel nessexdam uccen i tḥerci izem i tebγest d tezmert
ssid-is inna-as ilha ay aqeddac lɛali unṣiḥ
tamuɣli-m d asafu
bɣiɣ ad awḍeɣ ɣer baba uqbel ad d-yeɣli yiḍ
ur ttiliɣ ara yid-sent
ttimɣuren deg usmud
acu kan leqdic ur yeqqim ara kan deg usideg
lliɣ selleɣ i kullec
acimi ur ssiriden ara leḥwal yergazen deg wexxam
furṣeɣ tagnit mi akka d-ukiɣ zik
qim-d ad nemmeslay
sεerqeɣ-asen abrid
tafat tiziri ahya-k a gma-inu tigi d yessi am warrezg-inu
zwir deg tacacit ternuḍ aqelmun
sselmadeɣ
yebda yettuɣal-itt-id ciṭ ciṭ uḥulfu s tfekka-s d uglim-is
ttmeslayen dinna sdat-i amzun ulac-iyi
tura aql-aɣ di tallit tatrat
si mḥemmed iɛac sbeɛṭac n iseggasen di tmurt n maṣer
d nutni daɣen i iteffɣen imuṛaṣ uqbel
jmeɛ waki
neɣ d tiẓurin n lɛedni
agad Ṛebbi akked win ur nettagad ara
maca yessuter deg-i yiwen n ccɣel
argaz-im la ixeṭṭeb
d tukerḍa i yi-d-ukren si tmurt n iɛebṛaniyen
deg tesraft ar neγbu rric-is
ma ɣef wayen i d-tessegra twaɣit-a ad naf ukuẓ n yixeddamen i ijerḥen
leɣbaṛ iteddu s agudu iḍuman s aqabuc
acḥal aya i yettmermid di sbiṭar
ad twenseɣ s yifyar-is
amawal yeɛǧeb-iyi maca beɛɛed ɣef usmuzzeɣ
ad tt-yerr d tameḥbust seg umnar ɣer daxel
kra yekka wass nutni ttnemḍaren ttektilin iberdan
ay ayetma a wi ur neḥdir i wass n ṭṭrad n yiḥerqan
inelmaden xedmen akken i sen-d-inna yasuɛ
a yemma sber ur ttru d lǧennet axir n zhu
d widak i d isefra imezwura n ben muḥemmed
llan sin n yiεeṭṭaren akken kan i ddukkulen
aṭṭan-is d ɛeggu di tuzuft
ad d-yessis lerbayeḥ aṭas
di yal tamurt gezmen-asen awal mi d-nnan tiquranin
atan yeẓra-yi-d wihin
ad yečč mmi ad yegmu
drus wanect-a
a yemma urgaɣ targit
telsa
truḥeḍ teǧǧiḍ-d iṭerbuqen-ik da
icennayen n unebdu rẓan taqbaylit
acḥal ɣlay
iεeggalen n tdukkla-a am yal tikkelt ttawin agraw n warrac d yilemẓiyen s umata
anda i d-yekker baba
d lqanun ara d-iqqimen i lebda
d acu i k-iwwin ɣur-sent
Ṛebɛin n wussan i yekka uḥemmal n waman di ddunit
yerra-asen slam
tindaw d aṭṭan i yettḥazen allen
annu ma iqwa ičča-k ma iḍɛef ičča-k
i win yesṭebṭuben tleddi-as-d
nnif d lḥerma ɣlayen ur ttnuzzun ara s ddheb
ddret
ala a sam
lemmer ay axerraz ad teqleḍ d lbaz ma d laṣel-ik d axerraz
ziɣ mačči d layas i gezmen mačči d aqbal iyi-qeblen ḥesben-iyi d tameslubt
tesseṛɣem-asen-tt
nnan axxam ur nesεi llsas ur ittdumu i yimawlan
abrid welleh ar tessen-it Ɛmiruc ɣer udran n luris
anect-agi irkelli sebba-s d nnif d lḥerma
err-asen
ur t-tmelleḥ ara yemma-s asmi d-ilul
mazal taftilt-nni n tayri tettreqriq deg wul-ines
anida i tella tejmaɛt ideg atmaten d atmaten
rsemt-d a lmuluka
ttwaqenɛen belli Ṛebbi yefka-asen azref akken ad nɣen sekra n umdan iten-ixulfen
Ṭṭfeɣ-k ṭṭfeɣ-k
tewwet-d tenga thudd-it
imi d yiwen seg yimeɣnasen imenza i irefden tikti n tmaziɣt d unaḍaḥ fell-as
bɣiɣ ad ẓreɣ d acu i kem-isefraḥen
illu-nsen ur yebɣi
amek armi yeqqel wul-ik akken qbala
anwa ara ilumm
yusef iḥdeṛ i warraw n ifṛayim armi d lǧil wis tlata
teṭṭerḍeq d taḍsa
teṭṭef ijifer nnig n tinezrt-is tessebgan-d kan yiwet n tiṭ
iḥitiyen rran-as i dda bṛahim nnan-as Ḥess-aɣ-d a sidi
bu timmi n udrar
acḥal meqqret lɛaḍima-k ay ameɣlal yes-s i tɣeṭṭleḍ iɛdawen-ik
win i aɣ-d-ifkan tudert ur yecciḍ ara
iẓdi deg waneɣ tisri deg yileɣ tifidi tuɣ iseɣ tisfi d tezweɣ
lameɛna yuli-d yiwen n wagu si lqaɛa issew akal meṛṛa
ala ur ttagad tudert deffir-k ẓidet
ur d-tettasem ara ɣur-i ifassen-nwen d ilmawen
ad tecnumt
yenna-as ur gziɣ ara a baba kra da
lexbar mi yewweḍ mendas tuɣ ifut lḥal
lameɛna imeɛraḍen-nni ur d-cliɛen ara
ttagaden imennan
imidawen-iw akk ttqadaren-iyi
haṛun ad isserɣ daɣen si lerwayeḥ-agi gar lmeɣreb akked lɛica mi ara yettṣeggim tiftilin n lmeṣbaḥ
lliɣ ẓriɣ uqbel-ik
ass-nni n arim telṭac deg maggu iɛeddan i yemmut abdelḥafiḍ idres bab n umawal ameqqran tamaziɣt d tefrensist
Ɛerket ayen ara tɛerkem sewwet ayen ara tsewwem
ali-d
seɣti-tt
zeɛma d netta i yettxemmimen akken
nnan ur yettdum lḥif mkul aṭṭan yesεa ddwa
seg wasmi i yurweɣ ur ččiɣ ayen zeddigen
abrid aɣelnaw
zdi teɣzi-k a mmi-s n umaziɣ
awit-tt-id ɣer da
Ẓrant di snat liḥala mačči akken ara tkemmel
tbezgemt
ffunzreɣ
ur nezmir ad k-d-nini yelha ur nezmir ad k-d-nini diri-t
dduqseɣ-d s umɛuqqu iyi-d-yulin
newwi-awen-d icewwiqen n leḥzen ur tmeǧǧdem ara
azniq yettak-it i wayeḍ
bran-aɣ
tessawal ɣer lbiru anda ixeddem akken ad tẓer ma dinna i yella
syin akkin yebda ufraq n warrazen ɣef yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg yal tasmilt
ad asent-t-tefkem
ayhuh a yyi teẓrid ass-a d aneggaru
aṭas iyi-d-icekkren
tesmejger
wa ur ineṭṭeq ɣer wa
d acuddu i ttcuddun yifassen-iw
ruḥ s axxam-ik ad testeɛfuḍ
awer yaf i yettmenni
d yiwen n urgaz i ibedden mliḥ ɣef leqdicat
yenṭeq ar uqcic ameɣbun yenna-as
s kra nmenna nunef-as
urǧin d-udiren ayen iḍerrun gar-asen
seg wasmi i d-ilul d amermed
yeswa
Ɣriɣ
axaṭer axeddam yuklal lqut-is
wwtet
ad d-slen asenda ur d-sellen
ad d-ceggɛeɣ arẓaẓen ad zwiren zdat-k ad srewlen si zdat-k iɛraben ikanɛaniyen akked ifilistanen
luṭ iḥawet-iten aṭas dɣa rran ɣur-s kecmen s axxam-is
Ččurent d tirga
ur qebbleɣ ara annect-a
iwakken ad tuɣaleḍ ɣer deffir sit ɣef yitri
tesnegreḍ acḥal d agdud
nniɣ-ak ad yelḥu
cṛecṛen seg ugrez-iw
tṛuḥ-ak
ad ččen si lqut-is
Ḥemmleɣ argaz izemren i yiman-is
neɣ ad t-teqqneḍ s tmeḥremt ad am-d-teɣli
sriɣ imru
aredmani d inelmaden n tesnawit
d acu i ten-id-iwwin ɣur-i
xas ulamma s tigawin n yimdanen i tgemmu i tettbeddil tmeslayt
sellket-tt
tefka ifukal yesseqnaɛen
ur ttaǧǧa deg wayla-m tardest
yeqqur uqerruy-is hder neɣ qqim
ay bɣiɣ deg wurar-a
d acu-tt ssiεqa-agi
yiwen ur t-yebɣi
d wagi i d isem-iw swayes ara d-tneddhem ɣur-i si lǧil ɣer lǧil
snat n teqcicin-agi deg yiwen n uzniq i zedɣent
Ɣef wayen icudden ɣer tsuqilt tawurmant nsenker yiwen n usenfar yakan i itezzin ɣef teqbaylit
beɣɣuɣ kan ad ṭṭseɣ maca zzhir deg uqerru-w ur yi-iǧǧa ara
zik awal-ines ḥala ɣef nnwal
tuɣal ula d nettat teṭṭef deg-s
qɛed waki
nekk asirem-iw ad iyi-ihenni rebbi seg-k
layas yesderɣil
yyaɣ yid-i
lameɛna hudd tiɛencuṛin-nsen rreẓ-itent
tazmert-im tettrejdil
anda i tella tebɣest ara d-yessalin awalen yecban wigi
azekka ad tuɣaleḍ d tameṭṭut n umarkanti
Ḥemmleɣ ad sleɣ i ṣṣut n teqcict-nni
tenɣamt-asent-ten
ulac ɣur-s irden
ad yagi tawant n uɛebbuḍ ad yidir s tin n yiman
tirga-s d tid yukin yugin ad ɛekfent i tilawt yettrejdilen
ilindi neẓra amtiweg n meɣres i d-ibanen s tifawt
bran-as
Ɣer ɣur-i mmi
terɣa ddunit kenfen lɣaci
din i d-jemεent zzit n uberray
ad twehmeḍ amek deɛɛun limamat deg udayen
qqiment akk tɛelǧtin-iw d tijdidin
ur tesfiḍ ara
a dda Ɛli faḍma tebɣa ad tebru
d ayen i d-yeglan s tyitiwin d uḥbas n waṭas n yimeɣnasen
nekk ur zmireɣ ara ad mmeslayeɣ
uyseɣ win ɛzizen fell-i ɛerqen yiberdan ɣur-s
amrar d awezɣi ad yebded
d wigi i d iderman n sidi Ɛic akked tarwa-nsen
aseɛdi am netta yewweḍ lebɣi n wul-is
txesreḍ deg ssuq-a
ad ruḥeγ ad awen-ğğeγ tamurt i yeṭṭerrifen imusnawen
lḥenni i d-yewwi umekyus ad t-teqqen yelli deg uyeffus
Ḥemmleɣ-kem ɣas yefqeɛ yigenni
fkant-tt i jjiḥ
abernus ɣef tuyat deg berra ala abeḥri d uskiɛu n wuccanen
s axxam-ik iqedsen a sidi win akken i bnan ifassen-ik
leɛmer i wwḍeɣ taqcict neɣ muqleɣ-tt s yir tiṭ
tabagust-nni ad txiḍ ɣef lifud
acuɣer i yi-tceggɛeḍ
snat n tfekkiwin yettidiren s yiwen n rruḥ
anwa ara kem-yamnen
ulac aɣbel
Ṛuḥen-am
melmi ara yerr aḍar
tetteɣ
fakkent-awen-tent
ulac am wakka lḥasul
anda i teɣriḍ
i wakken anelmad ur ihellek ara iman-is s ttexmam d tɣuri ur d-nettawi agemmuḍ
wid i d-yefkan afus n tallelt
d akka i t-id-nnan sin n yimɛawnen n leqdic-a
ala saḥit
mi d-yuki yaf-d iman-is deg yiwet n tegzirt yestexlan
Ḥliɣ tura
amzun akken ur d-tlul ur telli
sameḥ-aɣ
tayri d azref tettalasem deg-s merra
aha acu i tettraǧuḍ
telluẓemt
neggzent
ladɣa mi d-tbedreḍ tayri dɣa yekfa yiɣisi
nekk ad wen-iniɣ ur ttqamaret ara amcum
yemneɛ seg uhuddu
illu yenna-as-d ur d-ttqerrib ara ɣer dagi
yuba wezzil
mlet-iyi-d abrid ɣer lḥaṛa-s
ad d-telli tewwurt
ittunefk-awen-d baṭel fket baṭel
aḥeq ccerfa
Ɣer taggara tella-d tegnit n ccḍeḥ
agni aqbur n lqesba d win n useggas
ad azzleɣ
tekcem s axxam-nni tufa-n snat tlawin
ula d abruy-nni amecṭuḥ n usirem tura ikemmel
fren
tafaska n tmedyezt tuɣal d ccama i tarwan n tesmaɛlit
Ḥrec
tebɣiḍ kra
tugiḍ ad tsetḥiḍ ɣef yiman-ik
ad iruḥ waɣzen s reffu
teffeɣ-ak-d teεrurt
d awal-iw ara iɛeddin
tamcict-iw semmaɣ-as farruǧa
aṭas n temliliyin i d-yellan yakan uqbel
tebda tikli d yiwen n yilemẓi tuɣal teǧǧa-t ɣef yidra-w
a lḥif-im ma d kem ara igen axxam
tamettant tezga d tili n umdan seg tlalit-is armi d tamettant-is
anect-a ttwalin-t d aseɣli i wazal n tirrugza n yigazen
ad iyi-t-id-awint
tameγra n lebḥeṛ urğin telli
ttḥulfuɣ iman-iw d taɛeryant yis-sent
d abrid i k-id-iwwin ara k-irren
d nekk ur nezmir ara ad t-awiɣ
Ṛuḥ tura
ddnub-nsen i yirawen-nsen ad mmten d imengar
tebɣiḍ a d-tiniḍ si yeḥya
sseḥman-d akk ṭbulat ԑemren ssuq γef uyennat
win ara as-ifiqen i waṭṭan-a ɣef zik yezmer ad yeḥlu s lemɣawla
acu d-yiwin anect-a ɣer yelli
ma yella nuɣal-d ɣef leswam-agi n yisufar i yulin
asirem-is d afessas am yifer n useklu
nekkni s yiɛeggalen n useqqamu aɣerfan n ugezdu n tizi uzzu nemsefham ɣef waya
iha iha aḥebbuy n ziniɣuc a malika n at Ɛemric
qqim deg talwit a baba
ad ken-keṛhen meṛṛa ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw
Ḥeqqa d lawan n tarda-w
d acu kan greɣ tamawt tesxedmeḍ awalnuten
Ɣunfaɣ-t
bu rebɛa n tɣemmar terna-d nneɛma
s wacu ara iyi-txelṣeḍ awi-d iɣden n tneqlin
kul wa acu i t-yewwin wa d aɛebbuḍ wa d ixef-is yebɣa ad t-ihenni
afus-ik ayeffus imḥeq aɛdaw
deffir-s kan ulin-d kra n yinelmaden yeqqaren deg uɣerbaz-a cnan-d imsiɣret “aɣerbaz-iw”
ur ilaq ara ad qqimeɣ din
ixuṣ leɛqel i as-qqaren ur yessin leṣlaḥ-is meskin
teḍra yid-s am tmeḥbust ikerfen s lweɛd i tefka
ffkan-d yiwen n wumuɣ n kra n yisufar akked leswam-nsen
yendeh-as amek tfukeḍ axeddim
am tjeɛbubt n lfeṭṭa
nesεa-t
iḍ ameggaz a tom
ad t-id-ɛellen d ustu ad t-gren i tḥayekt
seqsi alex
tin yufraren ɣef tizya-s
ferru n temsal gar watmaten
tenneclax am uqeclal cceḍḥ-is d aḍebbal
uggadeɣ ad ḥerkeɣ ad terwel fell-i
imi i mumaneḍ di cwiṭ ad k-wekkleɣ ɣef waṭas
wwteɣ di tewwurt s tuggdi d uneɣni
anwa ur nbeqqu ara ticenfirin am tid tesɛa sudaba
lliɣ ẓriɣ uqbel-im
d awessar
izla ikerri-nni yettunefken d asfel yerɣan
ferḥat yenna i ugdud ur ttagadet ara
ulac win i wumi ldiɣ ul-iw neɣ i wumi ḥekkuɣ lesrar-iw
yettɛassa-t kan ddaw n tiṭ yettagi ad t-ilaɛi
ad turar yid-nteɣ
nekkni ur neddir deg sidi rebbi almi i aɣ-d-yefka cwiṭeḥ-agi
teɛweq amek ara texdem
a yelli asmi tluleḍ yers lxiq deg wulawen
nutni cuban-kem s iḍan
smaɛil mmi-s amenzu n yahuda yella d amcum zdat n umeɣlal
ad immečč ass-nni
tezga teḥma
ad iru fell-asent mi tekfa tefsut
tṛuḥ-asen
amṛabeḍ ur neɣri tif-it teqbuct n yiɣi
nna feḍmuca txuṣṣ deg yiẓri ma d lalla xelluǧa tegrurez yerna tecbeḥ
mmuteɣ si laẓ
d ccetla n uẓaɣaṛ rnant-d tmellalin
ad d-ddmen tawriqt ad tt-llmen s yiẓdi d abesṭuḥ
nettat tettraju netta ur yebɣi ara ad d-yas truḥ tekcem s axxam
win ideɛɛun i urbib tettas-as-d deg uḥbib
iεreq-am ubrid
kemm merra i d kulci di ddunit-iw
taɣawsa akk tamezwarut i ibeddlen deg tudert-iw d iḍes
win i d-yusan yegla-d s kra
lǧiran-iw akk usmen ladɣa leḥbab d yimawlan
tferḥeḍ
ur d-qqar ara d si rezqi i d argaz-im
rran lwelha s unamek ɣer wayen akka nettidir tura ur nelli deg ubrid-is di tmetti n wass-a
a lxir-iw a mmi a lxir-iw
daymi i iqeddec ula deg yiṣenfaṛen n usideg n kra n yidigan d yifecka n tsenselkimt
tama n wadda
acuɣer imsbaṭliyen ceεlen times deg yidurar-nneɣ
uhulibama yelli-s n Ɛana yelli-s n Ṣibɛun aḥibi
yerwi-k uyennat
ur ibub ḥedd taɛkemt-is
amqeṛṣu
wissen anda llan amek i ttɛicin ukud i ttɣimin
twalamt-t
d aqbayli ihi imi d-yenna tanfalit-a
cewwlent-k tidak
aqcic-a yeɣra aṭas
ad iruḥ neɣ ala
triɣ idrugen
yessefqed-iten
tuɣ tettafeḍ yir tirga
tḥemmel-it s tuffra
ad sekreɣ aɣṛum
zeddigit waman-agi
ur d-yeḍṛi walu
ad teddu yid-i
Ḥader iman-im
ad tent-yesseɣli
nekk d tameṭṭut
yekfa-yi ṣṣber
sqenɛen meṛṛa
wukud i tṛuḥem
ttarran-tt dima i wanuɣ
ad kent-seɛfeɣ
d tuttra yelhan
ad ten-twanseḍ
feṛqent-ten
nekk ad ɛiwneɣ
tufiḍ iman-ik yid-sen
d arid-nniḍen
ttif xir akka
tasa n tefruxt
yerbeḥ yufa
xeẓẓeṛ-d ar da
beɛɛdemt-iyi
aqla-kem terwiḍ
yezwi tazemmurt
Ɣer wacu ttemcabiɣ
kullec ɣlay da
yebra-d i turiḍt
Ṛuḥem s leɛqel
inεel-d tom
ad as-tt-tefkem
ad tent-seɛfen
yeḍɛef yuba aṭas
rrant-asent-tent-id
leɛmer uẓament
tcewwel-itent tinna
halloween igerrzen
iceqqeṛ tom
anda-tt yelli-m
bḍan-iyi-tt-id
la ttqejjimen fell-awen
qelleb ad tafeḍ
yuba yettwali
ifakk-iyi-ten
xedment-as kra
tettwaliḍ-iyi-d
ulac tameṭṭut
ad tt-yeddem
anwa i yernan
tsebɣemt-asen-tent
tenɣamt-aɣ-t
yewjed tom
anwa i ibedden
tfakk-iyi-tent
ičča-tt uqjun
amendeṛ anda yella
ulac tarewla
nettmerrig-itt
ad tsewwqeḍ yid-neɣ
nɣiɣ-asent-ten
ziɣ d tidet
d ččaqlala
yeεya si tɣuri
ula d kunemti
iɣeẓẓa iles-is
tfehmeḍ-tt
fakeɣ-asen-tent
ad k-t-id-awint
tḥemmleḍ lalman
ixdem-asen kra
s lemεun i theddreḍ
zrin iseggasen
sired udem-ik
drewceɣ fell-am
d acu i turgam
Ɣelḍeɣ deg waya
tḥemmlemt-ten
yefka-as-d ayen yebɣa
ttakkent-d tameẓẓuɣt
kemmel asmuzget
Ԑreḍ ad teṭṭseḍ
Ḥemmleɣ tasekla
ur d-nnin kra
talwit a gma
yesɛa ccɣel tom
assenger ad ikfu
yuba yesmeṛmec-d
tesɛamt zzheṛ
fakkent-asent-t
ad t-tamneḍ
tekksem-ten-id
ustralya weḥd-s
tcewwel-it tinna
ur ddiɣ ara deg twizi
henni-yaɣ a winnat
iles ittḥawal-itent aqerru yettaɣ-itent
lliɣ yid-m qqareɣ nemseɣ di sin tannumi
icab uqerruy-is amzu d tawḍuft
d aḥdaq awsaq
Ɣas nezmer ad nidir deg umtiweg n meɣres ilaq qbel ad naweḍ ɣer din
ttarra tawwurt mi ara d-tkecmeḍ
Ɣur-k yiwen n udlis d adal
d lεali mliḥ wi ismuzegten i uẓawan
iserdasen bedden deg udem n unṭag n yeεdawen
dirit uḥiwet s waṭas
kra n ddqayeq d tikli wwint-iyi ɣer ugemmaḍ
ad sisneɣ s uɣṛum
yiwen ur t-yeqḍiɛ
meẓyan u muḥ ur iɣucc ara tiziri tagawawt
yenṭeq massi
ulac d acu ara xedmeɣ
tehmel seg mkul tama
ddren tudert i bɣan
yarbaḥ a Ɛemti
anda-k a maziɣ
suref-iyi
ala tin yesɛan tabɣest n ddkir i izmren ad tesber neɣ ad taweḍ s anda tewwḍeḍ
yebɣa ad yemmeslay yid-s
yewwet deg-s
as-t-d cwiya uqbel zzuǧ d uzgen
annaɣ a tarwa d abbuh kan tura
tiyi mačči d ineẓman n wallaɣ
Ɣas tif meṛṛa sɛaya nekk tussna tɛedda-yi
ur zmireɣ ara ad d-kecmeɣ acku a-t-an wwiɣ-d lqahwa deg ufus-iw
yidir aṭas
tugim ad tembiwlem
ferḥemt yid-i a tullas
kunwi d arrac ilemẓiyen
derreɛ-itt
acimi ur asen-terriḍ ara awal
ger aksum deg tuggi
ssem-is ddaw walim ḥedd ur yeɛlim
yezga yeqqar xḍu lhem ad k-yexḍu
asired n lqec
tiswiɛin i d-nettawi deg yimenɣi ɣelbent tid i d-nesɛedday deg lehna d unecraḥ
ar daxel i tent-yuɣ
tellem taḍuṭ
anda i tezdeɣ setti-twen
cukkeɣ txedmeḍ-t mebla lebɣi-k
ur d-tekki ara seg-k
kkateɣ llir iceṭṭaḥ yesɣi
d acu yella d uzzig ass-a
yuker-it
sliman ad d-ikkes timellalin ur tekkir tsekkurt
Ɛni tettḥessisem-asen i widak
iṭij ittcerriq-d ɣef medden merra
tufiḍ iman-im deg uxeddim amaynut
ittḥawal awal
anfet-iyi ad k-id-smektiɣ ɣef yiwet n tɣawsa
ur ugaɣ ara dakken bɣiɣ ad iliɣ da
lḥila n ṣṣber tenɣel
ad issemɣer tameɣra n zzwaǧ-is
s draɛ i qebleɣ ad ffɣeɣ d yid-s
Ččuren yiḍarren-is d tifexsa
azzel-d
Ɣas akken meẓẓi maca lebɣi-s meqqar
yettak-as azal-is
yuzen-as takarḍa n userbeḥ n useggas amaynut
ur bɣiɣ ara wa neɣ wihin ad d-yerr fell-i tili
ibeddel yidir amkan
deggren asirem-iw ifelleq ɣef yidɣaɣen
acimi ur d-yusi ara
yettas-d deg wass wis mraw d sin n wayyur n yennayer
ma yella yeṭṭef-d ulli d awkraren xelḍen yexser
d tuṭṭḍa i nteṭṭeḍ ilili neqqar-as telha lbenna-s
iḥemmel ad yečč cclaḍa s uksum
Ǧǧiɣ samir deg uxxam yettfeṛṛiǧ lfilm
deg llḥif n ccfayat
ini-yi-d anda swaswa i yezdeɣ
ass agreɣlan n tlawin igerrzen
idurar cebḥen s yideflawen
yenna-iyi-d tom ur yebɣi ara ad yidir deg boston
axxam-a yettruḥ deg-sent kra kra
ar ass-a ur d-tban tidett ɣef lmut n dda lwennas
nwiɣ ayen i iferqen gar win itteklen deg yiman-is d win ur yesɛin ara taflest
maca teṭṭef-d yal awellih deg-sent
ayakka tzeyneḍ a ddayxa tgiḍ amzun d taɛelǧet
iɛeggalen n ubarlaman votan lqanun n tedrimt
akken i asen-yehwa mebla akukru neɣ imeṭi
ur llint deg yilel tifrat
mmugreɣ-tent s tumert
yal tama deg wagrakal tesɛa tafaska
Ɣur-s allaɣ yukin yessemlalay awalen tteffɣen-d d isefra
ad d-ddmeɣ amawal neɣ ala
sendiḍelli gneɣ ɣef ṛṛabɛa n tṣebḥit
win iẓewren yewwi amur
taqbaylit d tutlayt n imawlan-iw
Ḥesben wwin-d tamendawt sɣur rebbi
cerreg aceṭṭiḍ
tamacahut-iw lwad lwad mliɣ-tt-id i warraw n lejwad
ad nennecraḥ akka kra
yemmut madani ur run walaken
ur sɛiɣ ara ugur d waya
truḥemt gefgafi
tezreɛ ula d ameɛṭic din deg agnes
ruḥ a lemḥiba-w
tettbineḍ-d tcebḥeḍ
Ẓran tteklen
atan akken ṭṭfeɣ imayl-ik
iqeṛṛeb yeɛqub ɣer baba-s isḥaq
sḥassfeɣ ɣef ayen akka selleɣ
amkan deg i d-nekker fell-aɣ yettnadi
allen yezhan d imnernan
yeɛqub izzwer kra seg iqeddacen-is iceggeɛ-iten ɣer gma-s meẓyan i yellan di tmurt n siɛir di adum
Ɣumm tiqqad-ik neǧǧa tiqqaṛ-ik
aru akken kan tessneḍ
uraret dihin
aman d ixutar
ad yeɣli ugeffur
ur ggan ara
yewwa uftat-nni
wissen ma ad d-yuɣal
zrin wussan awal yezzi-d i taddar merra yezger akin i wasif
seɣtimt-tt
imal-d ɣur-i
laban inuda meṛṛa aqiḍun lameɛna ur yufi acemma
tesɛiḍ tamert
ad sewwqen yid-nteɣ
kra n tmeṭṭut
ihud i tusna lsas
tuɣ twennaε
tenɣiḍ-as-ten
selkeɣ
terra-yasent-tt-id
kemm d tageldunt-iw
ad akent-ten-yeɛṛeḍ
tjmeɛ-itent
tenna-as tteryel "kullec rniɣ-t ar ttṛebga terna-yi"
mačči d tidi i itekksen tiṭuksinin seg tfekka
yuba yettwaker
ad-tẓer anda akka yexdem lɛecc-is
yura-d adlis igerrez
ayen i tenwiḍ ad t-tafeḍ
i sebɛa yid-sen d dderya i s-d-tesɛa bilha i si mḥemmed
ismawen imaliyen tesxedmeḍ gerrzen
ih macca nekk xuṣeɣ deg kra yellan
"tuɣac n ddkir" d yiwen n walbum n ferḥat
bɣiɣ ad fkeɣ i wagi i uneggaru-agi annect i k-fkiɣ
i ma ur sεiɣ ẓẓher
yerna ɣer ɣur-s uqcic
aql-i nniɣ-awen-t-id si tura
gar-asen gma
uhu
yuba yetteffay
ikad-iyi-d ad yelhu
at leǧnas ur xeddmen ara akken
yexdem umɣar ayen yexdem uqrur armi d tameddit yemmut
teṭṭerḍeq guli d imeṭṭi
Ɣur-m ad tismiḍ lqahwa-m
kain yenɣa abel
tudert tettbeddil am lberq
Ɣef wacḥal ssaɛa i d-tekkrem
anda akken teqdec telxex teẓṛam dacu i d-imensi
teṣfa taɣect-im
cukkeɣ tgerrez
aqader n leqwanen n wurar yessifsis urar
bɣiɣ ad ṛebbiɣ awtul
bɣan ad sirden allaɣ-nneɣ
aṭas i ileḥḥun ɣef uεebbuḍ-nsen
msefhamen ad t-id-iraju deg lqahwa
ihuh amek armi imedyazen agi ttnawalen awal
mačči akka i tt-id-tufiḍ
d acu i tettnadi-ḍ ay aderɣal d tafat
tetteɣ aksum n yilef
yettaggad ad yellaẓ
ur tessineḍ ara nnfeɛ-ik
icɣel yidir
izga d aneggaru
efk-as taḥeṛṛast-nni i Ṭom
anwa wigi d imaziɣen
ayen akk tebɣa tessaweḍ-as-t i maziɣ
bab n wawal yezwar waqila bab n wakal
ɛawen iman-im
Ɣef wacḥal ssaɛa i yennum yidir itett imensi
ulamek ad nehder ɣef waya ma ulac later
sliman u muḥ weḥd-s
amek i t-tebɣiḍ aksum-nni d aseknef neɣ d lqelyan
tekcem gar ifasen n maziɣ
iɣḍel-d fell-i adrar
acimi yiwen ur iyi-d-isawel
Ɣur-i yiwen umdakel baba-s d aneggal mucaεen
ur ttaǧǧan yiwen bxir
idhen akk iman-is s zzit
kker ad truḥeḍ ɣer ṭṭbib
yeṭṭef-d uqcic tiɣirdemt
di tmura irebḥen ur tettṛuḥu ara akk trisiti
tekker-as yemma-s almi yeggumma ad ikker
Ḥekkun ɣef teqdimin d tejdidin
ittaṭṭaf ibeccan
kemmel di leɛnaya-k
leɛmer yerbeḥ
yefka-yas tiyita ɣer lqaɛ n umeẓẓuɣ
netta mi ara isel i lehdur am wi
d tom axir-iw deg tefransist
wama ayen-nniḍen ad d-yas iman-is
ur ttɛeggiḍet ara
acebbub n newwara d aberkan
zik i d-uɣalent
tjerreb akk ayen tennum
isura izzayriyen n zik gerrzen
yuɣ-d yidir adlis
Ɣleq-as jeddi-s
sliman u muḥ yebra-d i wawal
ur iyi-ihenna ara wul-w
lliɣ tqelqeɣ mliḥ
Ɛerqent-iyi
Ɣer-iyi deg tilifun ma yella teɣli lehwa
anida ara neddu tura
tḥar melmi ara d-taweḍ tmeɣra-s
aẓ-d
ayɣer amenḍar-a
zik i d-uɣalen
azul a yelli yuli wass
lliɣ d wis tlata din taṣebḥit-a
yugurten u muḥ iteddu-d
win yettaran akk imdanen tteklen ɣef yiman-nsen
d acu i yezwaren d axeddim-nwen neɣ d tawacult-nwen
amek i ten-tebɣiḍ tmellalin-ik

isell ur yesmeḥsis

amek i as-d-tufam tifrat
lhant teɣrifin s lebṣel
kerheɣ ageffur
melmi ara yuɣal s axeddim
aya kker
zwir deg qellu n tebṣelt
tessnem ad tesselḥum tamacint-a
amek tettiliḍ
ulac win ara iyi-tt-yekksen
sɣur wumi i m-d-kan idrimen-nni
d kemm i d taqcict i icebḥen akk g temdint
ur tḥemmlem ara ad theḍṛem d wid ur tessinem ara
azger yeεqel gma-s
neɣ uma d wayi
Ḍebbeṛ
terfdeḍ ayen ur tezmir ad terfed twacult s lekmal-is
tesseww-d tiɣrifin
ilaq ad ṛuḥeɣ ar uxxam
ilaq ad yi-d-tiniḍ d acu i tebɣiḍ ad teččeḍ
ilaq ad tt-tissineḍ
anwa i k-id-iceggɛen ɣur-i
anda i tensa mary
ugin ad kkren
zeɛma d kennemti i ixedmen aya
ur as-qqar acemma
ifka-t inijjel i lexla
waqila d adfel ara d-yewwten
ssarden akk iberdan glan ula s tzenqatin
ur ttraǧut ara
syin akkin ad laɛin i yilemẓi
iččur-d lbabur d sselɛa
di berlin llan ddeqs n yimeḍqan icebḥen
Ɛerqent-as
ur wicqa ara ma llant tuccḍiwin di tira
Ɛuẓgen
ayɣer ur tḥemmlemt ara ad teṛṛẓemt iqeṛṛa-nkent
Ḥaca-k
iɛǧeb-aɣ lḥal
ad ddun ɣer tizi n at Ɛica neɣ s at Ɛemṛan
meqqeṛ aṭas ccan n teqbaylit
ttxil-kent ḍebbṛemt-iyi-d kra n lxedma
teqqim armi terɣa teccuyt
melmi i tebdamt tanhert
isuɣ ɣer rebbi i t-id-ixelqen
ula d awexxer ɣef teqcicin yusa-d iman-is
zik i bdiɣ tanhert
ddwa-agi yesseggray-d aqraḥ n uqerru
awah dayen ṛwiɣ
teččamt lekwaɣeḍ-nwent
a ddunit tebɣiḍ akka
ad d-iteddu umenzu
cadli benǧdid yeǧǧa leḥkum ass n ḥdac yennayer alef utseɛ meyya utnayen utesɛin
ad ɣ-d-iṣaḥ umur di zzman
taɣiwant n saḥariǧ n tuviret
ad d-aɣent ayefki
tḥemmlem ad tecnum
zedɣeɣ yakan ɣur εemmi
tutlayt-im d taqbaylit
d taqbaylit i d idles-ik
afgem ay afriwen-iw
yettḥewwis ar bgayet
afud-im d tutlayt taqbaylit
tefkiḍ-as ddḥis
tajmilt i keč a win yemmuten ɣef tidet
ad as-yanef ad iɛeddi
i wumi-ten imeslayen-agi
tagi d win akken yiwen ur d-yettmeslay fell-as deg taddart
acḥal tura segmi tlemmdeḍ tafransist
dayen ur tuɣal ad tzuxx s zzin-is
d aɣedluj i yečča
iḥemmel lqahwa taberkant wama ayefki ikreh-it
ttruḥen kan si lqahwa ɣer lqahwa
d ẓẓher i sεan
teɛbed-it
ad yi-ğğen abrid tura
allaɣ yettarew-d ccḥani
ad yifsus fell-aneɣ ccɣel
deg ssuq i ttemlilin medden
d ifassen n wefṛux i tesɛa
awi-d yiwen
tira tusa-yi-d seg tɣuri
akka i d netta yugi ad ibeddel
ečč kan tessusmeḍ
cennun s tutlayt taqbaylit
tenneḍ agus
acḥal d axxam i bnan ɣef uɣyul i ttεebbin
nɣiman mačči d ayen yelhan
werǧin ad ttuɣ tom
swiɣ lqahwa n tɣellayt
bɣiɣ ad nernu ad nmeslay
acuɣer tugi ad texsi
d acu i tebɣam ad t-txedmem skud tellam da
tettidir s teqbaylit
tikta-agi n ṣwab akked lmeɛqul uɣent amḍiq deg wallaɣ-iw
yerra-t deg uɛewwiq
kečč tettxemmimeḍ kan ɣef teqbaylit
a lḥijab-a i cewwel-iyi
a Ṛebbi ili-k yid-i
a-t-an alammi d tura i d-tekkreḍ
tutlayt-nneɣ d ayen i nettmeslay yal ass
isufar n wučči akked latay
jeqqmem
fakk-d awal-ik neɣ susem maḍi
amezruy d anagi n tidet
iɛǧeb-as
ur tezzi ara kan deg wawal awi-d amaynut
Γef yiman-nwen kan i tettxemmimem
ay at nnif
ur d-isawel ara
iserreḥ uḍar-is
itbir yeshuruy
d taqbaylit i k-yerran d amdan
anta i wen-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi
Ɛerḍeɣ ad d-afeɣ kra iḍebsiyen iqdimen n linda ronstadt ɣur bu-iḍebsiyen maca d iḍebsiyen ikussimen kan i yesεa
mmektaɣ-d ussan-nni
ula d tirga qeḍεen-tent fell-aɣ
lemmer ar tiddi i tt-tella tili ad yettarra tili
ad d-sawaleɣ
tuɣal-d trisiti
d acu i urant
tettaǧwem-d zzit n uzemmur
d taqbaylit i k-id-yessekren
tajmilt i yimsidag iqbayliyen
s anda akka i tsewwqeḍ
susmemt deg leɛnaya-nkent la qqaṛen
ad n-tsawaleḍ
d acu ara txedmeḍ s lmus
ur ttezzem ara deg yiman-ik
tuker-awen
ad tṛuḥemt ɣer sedduq neɣ ɣer sidi Ɛic
a tin yeḍran yid-wen
ufiɣ-ten qquren deg usemmiḍ
amcum ad t-id-yas wass-is
ur ttagad ad ak-ngerrez tameɣra
lmakla n yirden tezzuzur udem
Ɛeslama-k
aw akk-a ɛni ay ak-d-nniɣ xdem
smecḥemt-as zzit i wezger
yidir d amecḥaḥ
tsellem tikwal i uẓawan aklasiki
bɣiɣ ad iyi-txedmeḍ yiwen akken n ccɣel
tesfeḍ ṭabla mi fukken učči
yugurten u muḥ iqureɛ tiziri tagawawt
ini-d akk ayen yellan deg tcekkaṛt-im
ini-as ayen ik-yerḥan
amek ara qableɣ ussan
ijexxeṛ tom
ur sεuẓẓuget ara
beṛka-k ssbeṛ
qabel ur ittruḥu ara ɣer tesdawit
tessneḍ ad taruḍ taqbaylit
arut taqbaylit
a tin yeḍran yid-sent
sima teffeɣ-d seg tneɣrit
gguman ad ẓẓren deg-i tameṭṭut
ur yeẓri ma d iḍes i as-iɛerqen neɣ d ayen yeḍran i t-yerwin
Ɛni d kečč i t-iɛeggcen
yella lgaz deg taddart-nkent
iseɣ s leḥfaḍa lɛaṛ d lɛadda
argaz mačči ala cclaɣem
icceɛṛef am burebbu
irra-yas takmamt
segmi tezweǧ teḥbes ccna yerna yelha ṣṣut-is
i wacu iṣleḥ buzid i waman d yiẓid
ad kem-itaweb Ṛebbi ur am-yeddi ccqa
ad ḥadreɣ
iḥseb-iyi d axeclaw
tekka-d nnig n tayri-w
buddeɣ-as ajṛad d unaɣur
Ԑerḍeɣ ad qazmeɣ
aql-i yid-k
Ḥseb kan itran ma tzemreḍ ad ten-tḥesbeḍ
ur t-qeṛṛen ara ar warraw n wudayen
nsellem-as tazzla i fuffu
semman-as Ɛisu
aḥeddur d uggan abeṛnus d ulman
uqbel ad yaweḍ lemijal
axxam-ik d axṛib aẓekka-k d aɣrib
nteddu ntekkes-d zzeɛter
iɛfes tirget ur irɣi
ulac d acu ara ten-id-iḥebsen
teqqeṛs tculliḍt-is
mi ara nwali asegzawal aynutlay i d-iga mass kamel buεmara
ayen d-ittasen s tmara ur ittdum ara
i yettqelliben d win iḍṛuṛan
tekka-yi-d seg-sent
Ɣef wayagi i s-tsemma lewwi yeɛni tuṭṭfa
ad ten-id-tebɛen sebɛa n iseggwasen n laẓ
iruḥ d timẓin yečča uɣyul
bruzzɛen am ibawen ɣef lluḥ
Ḥemmleɣ ad xedmeɣ yid-k
ad k-beddeɣ
zedɣen lhiḍ ɣer lhiḍ
Ṭṭraḍ d ayen izemren ad d-yili
lefḥul ṛwan tawaɣit
a sidi di leɛnaya-k ma ur tezwareḍ zdat n uqeddac-ik
Ḥrec ger aẓeṭṭa err lxiḍ i am-d-iqqersen
selleɣ i kra n leṣwat ixelḍen tteffɣen-d seg wallaɣ-iw
susem nnan-iyi-d qqim deg uxxam
argaz tameṭṭut i lebda
tebɣa ad s-tefkeḍ kra n wazal
akerra-agi n lqaɛa i yettiflawen deg umaḍal am netta am yitran akk niḍen
lemdeɣ-d sɣur wid ifazen
ur d-tefkiḍ ara udem
smentagen times yexsin deg allaɣ-iw s uwejrireḥ-nsen d yisuɣan-nsent
yiwet d talemmast n tlawin tayeḍt d tilmẓit mliḥ
am at tizi hibel i yettnezzihen i waḍu
wali akk tidyanin
a wer ikker
nella di tzeqqa imeddukkal-iw lhan-d d temsirin nekk rriɣ-tt i tira
ur as-yeɛǧib ara usentel n tullist-iw
di tecmatin kan i teẓwer
Ɣer taggara yetturaǧu ad yili leqdic anaddal sɣur ugraw n waddal n taddart
takwat tettazu tira
a naɣ a yelli i txedmeḍ i leɛmer-im
ad ruḥeγ ad awen-ğğeγ tamurt i yettrebbin tifireԑqas
azawad d tamennaṭ ideg zedɣen yimaziɣen n mali
anfet-as ad d-tessemɣi afriwen
d acu i d uguren i d-tufiḍ deg unnar n usizreg
kkes akin ajerbub-nni ɣef uqerru-m
Ṭṭef tama tayfust tḥadreḍ iman-ik
ssɛaya d anyir ṣṣaba d awzir
wagi d agzul d askuṭṭef limer ahat ad ken-id-yessemgagi
azekka ara d-ruḥeɣ ɣer temqeddemt n tmurt n kanada
ferɛun inna i musa ffeɣ-iyi syagi
mi iɛedda useggas yeffeɣ-d urgaz n zahra seg lḥebs
ad issired llebsa-s imiren ad iṣfu
am win i yesbeddayen amrar
creḍ i am-yehwan a tasekkurt
argaz-agi ad ittwakkes seg ugdud-is
dayen ur zmireɣ ad knuɣ
amzun ur nettemyili
wali akk tisefsiyin ittusqedcen deg usebter-agi
kemmlen di leqdic-nsen ɣas s tuffra
ad n-yers mmi d llufan
tameddit ula i nawi
ad mwalin wudmawen
ad kkseɣ leḥzen i yella si zzman
argaz-nni ibekkem-itt
Ḍelbeɣ di Ṛebbi
i d-yegran yeshel
kkret ad nṛuḥet
sendu akka i neqqar
kenwi d tafat n ddunit
asif iɛuned iman-is
ala nekk d yifeggagen
deg yiwen n wass deg uxxam i ten-id-iqublen tlul zahra
ad cekkreɣ yemma-s lfeṭṭa tucbiḥt yeṣfan
nekkni ad neḥḍer
ma yella ula yečča
imekkasen ur xeddmen ara akken
nnan-as i uqjun ad ak-nefk ccɣel n tmeṭṭut yenna-as axir ad gganiɣ amnaṛ
maɛlum ad cekkreɣ i d-nniɣ drus
ayagi meṛṛa d beddu n leɛtab
wissen ma tezha neɣ tennuɣna
tasumta mebla aɣanim
kull aεrab s uqessul-is
Ṭṭef lḥiḍ
awimt-as-d ddwa sɣur-kemt
kenwi d imcumen
saɛd-iw a saɛd-iw
tura ad am-d-ssfehmeɣ tamsalt s ttbut
akk initen ssawalen i tudert
zzewreɣ tacḍaṭ ad d-nawi mira i yizem aweḥci
rsen-d leḍyur di tlata
a tameqqunt n nneɛneɛ ccḍeḥ-im ass-a iwenneɛ
uɣalent ttakent-d lɣella yal anebdu
ur tt-nekkat ur tt-nreggem
axaṭer zewǧen akk yid-s
yasuɛ ibedd zdat n lḥakem
sin n iberdan kan i yellan
lxir s lxir win yezwaren axir
amek ihi ara tdum tgelda-s
ay afus yecban tiwzet
ula i d-senzem kečč a bab n tmeɣra
ad ten-tciriɣ s yigenni
fell-ak tacḍat n ṣṣellaḥ
isseḥla meṛṛa imuḍan-nsen
d netta i yebnan lecqaf ayen ixzen deg-sen yessen
yuli s adrar iqqim dinna
akken xeddmen yetbiren
taqaɛet n wurar tefra
iḥebraruc ad yali
win yellan d ccaṭer yaẓ-d aql-i da
ttehhu ad am-telhu tawaract n unebdu
a leḥrir afilali
amek ur d-terrim ara s lexbaṛ
a yiḍes yya-d ɣar da ɣar yidis n teqcict-a
nnḍeɣ-am lemlaḥ s uyeffus tiṭ deg-m ur tettnus deg laɛnaya n nnbi amekyus
iqqim deg yiɣil n uzemmur
iɛreq-iyi ubrid
tḥareḍ melmi ara tawḍeḍ tejjmeḍ-tt degmi akka tzerbeḍ tikli
zlu-aɣ aqelwac
kemm i leḥcic
knan dɣa seǧǧden zdat-s
semmi-as masinisa
cwiṭ kan attah teldi-d tewwurt tameqqrant n tkebbanit
yal lxir yid-k yella
rnu-yas cwiṭ n lmelḥ i useqqi
yestaqsa amṛabeḍ ɣef tuẓamin
ad yesserkeb tislatin
i d-iddan s leswam ɣali
ndu ay iɣi ndu
s wudi yeṣfa
tacemlit n yiwiziwen
remḍan Ɛacur d aselmad n tesnilest di tesdawit n tizi uzzu
ixef n cbabat tuɣeḍ-t
rrif rrif n ukeṛmus
ad as-d-zgent d lmuḥsinat
yemma-s truḥ ɣer tala
nettat ad tt-yeḥjeb
ad d-tecbuḍ win yellan d aḥrur
tin umi uqmeɣ ddwa ad teḥlu
d ayen i yeswehmen aṭas lḥakem
sseɛd-inu mmi meqqer
aɣyul-iw iṛuḥ tabarda fell-i tettfuḥ
siwseɛ i zzedwa amḍiq
azwel n usarag-agi-nsen
aṭṭan d awal ur nemɛin mačči d ayen i ibelɛen
ccnawi n yefrax taḍsa n yigerdan akk d tumert n umeɣbun
yenɣa wer yejriḥ slilew a yemma-s
urar-agi d aseɛdi
ad taɣeḍ afud tuẓureḍ
ma d lalla-m tewqem tecbeḥ s yebzimen
a ṣṣifa n wayyur mi zzin yetran
yemma ḥenna
mennaɣ di sidi Ṛebbi a wi yeččan timellalin
yers-d gma yers-d s ukukru
imi izemmem allen ldint
qqaren ibawen n wuccen lakin uccen ur ten-itett
wali-k lḥemd a Ṛebbi leǧnan yewwet s iẓuran
slil tiqseltin-nni qbel ad teffɣeḍ
axxam n tmussni ideg lemmden warrac ayendin d tilufa ala s tutlayt taqbaylit
d timdehhebt n lekmam
ur tettak i ḥed ala
azemmur d aseṛṛaǧi
temmut s taḍsa
tamezwarut taseddast d tagruma n tnummiwin yellan deg tmetti
amek i tettruḥuḍ ɣer lxedma
atmaten ttemyeffaẓen ur ttemseblaɛen
ccetwa-agi iɛeddan tegla-d s waṭas n txessaṛin ladɣa deg tegzirt d tamiwin i tt-iqerben
simmal yettwaway uqbayli s tesnakta i as-d-yennan ilaq ad tesɛuḍ taflest s teɛrabt simmal tɛerreq teqbaylit iderrem yidles
d iεeẓriyen i sin
ad yeqqen lḥenni lbaz imṛebbi
yasuɛ inna-as d acu i tebɣiḍ
idegger-itt ɣer deffir
baba-s yugi ad tuɣal ɣur-s
Ɣas ma yella s yidrimen-nneɣ meɛna nettaf-d ẓẓrubat d imeqqranen
kul yum fell-i yettedden
tuget n tegnatin d timetti i asen-iregglen abrid ɣer wučči d ugerrez n waddad
d asawen ad yeẓḍem wasif
d affug i yuffeg mi yesla s lexbaṛ
ad tɣenni teḥjurt n llim
imiren ad iɛerri axxam-is
tebɣa ad as-teffeɣ seg uxxam akken meqqar ad as-teǧǧ listeɛ netta d tmeɛzuzt-is
a tissirt yettgemimen
argaz ameṛkanti d win ikesben meṭṭu ibennun
Ɣef ssetta n tmeddit tebda tmeɣra i d-yellan ilmend n yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg yikayaden
Ḥemmleɣ-kem ul yeẓṭel
Ɣur-s nettat teddez tebrez azekka ad t-texdem d ccɣel
di lbabur uɛriḍ umli
allen-im uɣalent d timerjatin
a-tt-an tarwa n farḥat farḥat isɛa-d dda bṛahim naḥuṛ akked aṛan
mačči ddeqs n yiselwayen n tɣiwanin am netta i nesɛa deg tmurt n yiqbayliyen
ad yennerni leqdic d tektiwin ɣef tẓuriwin i d-ikeccmen deg usnulfu n ssinima
ad zedɣeɣ gar wat isṛayil ad iliɣ d illunsen
mazal tettkemmil tigawt n usiḍen n yigḍaḍ n waman
ma tuɛer ayen ihi i tecbeḥ
i d-iḥmel wasif ur d-yewwi ara
a nnger-im a cabḥa
ad neḥder ad nili
ur tettagadem ara rebbi
ar d as-ibedd ɣef tewwurt
netta teǧǧa-t-id ɣer jida-s
wagi d lewkil unṣiḥ
yasuɛ inna-as tenniḍ-t-id
cedhaɣ tadaḥduḥt-iw
ilul deg tmurt n lpiṭrul netta ur t-id-iṣaḥ ci
wali akk iceggiren n useqdac
isbumbex turin-is s ddexxan
legliz aṭas i testeɛmer n tmura deg yal amenẓaw
tewwi-t llefɛa m sebɛa yimawen
seg yinig tekker tmeṭṭut-is teddem arekti tessebzeg-it terekn-it tettel-it deg tceṭṭiḍin n leḥrir
ad t-teqqen yelli ṣaḥa-s
iccer ur iban d aksum ur iqqim d iɣes
d acu ara yefk umdan iwakken ad d-ifdu tarwiḥt-is
mi ara d-tlal d teqcict berrun i wallen-nsen
ddeqs aya ur ɣriɣ ungal
cfiɣ asefru amezwaru uriɣ-t ɣef meɛtub lwennas mi lliɣ d anelmad deg uɣerbaz alemmas
Ḥejbeɣ-d lḥenni ad as-muggen waman
ma d win ɛzizen i tectaqeḍ yebɛed wansa i d-yettḍilli
ad yimɣur ad yennerni
yal wa abrid ad t-yeḍfer
taswiɛt-a ters-d cwiṭ n lehna ttkemmilen yisdawanen ikayaden-nsen yetturaǧun ad fakken ass n lexmis-a sdat-nneɣ
yelli d win ay tecba
a tinn-a n ugemmaḍ ay udem n uḍiḥan
a lferḥ i ferḥeɣ
tikwal llan yimestjaren i yessexsayen imsismeḍ syin ɣer-s ad yexser usafar-nni
yegdel ad d-tawiḍ tissit daxel n tkerrust
d nutni ara ken-iḥasben
d kečč i yebɣan
xas ma lebda ttuxeṭṭaɣ
bezzaf i meqqer
seg wasmi i d-tekker nettat d amdegger d ddunit
ad yuf akk talida
nnan-as ih a sidi
ddreɣ-tt kan s tuffra
d kečč i d tamda n lesrar
Ɛyiɣ di tlufa-nwen
ssarameɣ mačči d ayen akken i nuggad i d-yeḍran
fell-i tura yuli wass
amazan ad yini belli amdan-nni yeṣfa
am wakken daɣen yesnemmer iɛeggalen n tdukkliwin-a imnar n tdukli d wid n tdukkla tanaddalt n wat Ɛisa mimun
ulac win ara as-yinin ayɣer i tettruḍ
Ɣur-m ad tettuḍ ɣef wayen nemɛahad
yuzzel mmi yekkes-as-tt
ferɛun idduqes-d
Ɛennit fell-i
ay uḥric fhem ḥesses
a yemma a wi ṛuḥen s axxam n yizem ad t-yissin
ur ssineɣ ad skaddbeɣ
mi ara nebdu ccɣel ḥman idammen ur nettḥulfu ara s ɛeggu
sellmeɣ amdan ur neḍlim ara
tzedɣeḍ yal amdan
ad timɣur ad tegduda ad iyi-tecbu tasedda
ahat si tid i d as-yettilin
aṭas n uwennet i ufiɣ
ma yella ɣef uṣaḍuf n wurar-a ama s wudem aglawan neɣ aratak
zhat ad aɣ-gerzen ṣṣbuḥ
tadukli d yimeksawen
iεreq-ak ubrid
mi yetti idis yuɣal ɣer tnafa-s ad d-griɣ din waḥdi am bururu baba-s yeffeɣ yakkan seg texxamt
ur ittili ara deg-s lɛib
tebɣiḍ ad kem-nawwi s ibibbi ɣef yeɛrar-nteɣ
smektan-tt-id s wussan n zzhu
awimt-iyi-d aẓarif
axaṭer d aseggas n ṣṣab ad wen-yili d imqeddes
tefser seksu anda i t-iweɛɛa yiṭij d ubeḥri akken ur yettismum ur yettjinjiṛ
kra n win yettnadin yettaf
nemsefham ad nerr azal i tmaziɣt-nneɣ d umezruy-nneɣ
ay imeksawen
tameṭṭut ur d-tenni awal tefhem d acu i d-yewwi lḥal maca mačči d lγerḍ-is tettru tessusem
dagi di labaṭima-agi ulac anezdaɣ isem-is yeḥya
argaz ečč kan s tezmert-inek nekk ṛwiγ
tisekwa timezwura a-tent-an ttwaldint deg tmurt n leqbayel kanada fransa d sṭukhulm
wa ṛejmen-t wa zlan-t wa kksen-as afus
ssimnent ttnefxa n yiman-nsent akken ay ḥemmlent
ad ssawleɣ i temdakelt-iw deg ubrid s yisem-is
a tiberrint n lebḥer cceḍḥ-im d llumayer
lḥenni ad t-yeqqen yisli ageṭṭum n dheb
ad yefres yal d iman
iɛawen-it Ǧeɛfeṛ mmi-s n smaɛil si lɛeṛc n sidi Ɛli musa
refden akk iɛekzan d leslaḥ ttmeslayen zdat n uxxam
ssuh ssuh ssehyani
win yennan i gma-s a lǧayeḥ
wali akk wid yettwarnan melmi kan
ad neǧǧ akud ad yexdem ccɣel-is
dayen ur uɣaleɣ ad k-agdeɣ
wali ɣer deffir ɣer umezruy n tunigin yezrin akked ticraḍ i terniḍ melmi kan
dunnit tuɛer abrid-is iḍul d tasraft
ur ssinent ara tasertit ttawin-t kan lewhi am wulli
ur tessewwayeḍ ara iɣid deg uyefki n yemma-s
issečč akk taddart
axaṭer tudert n mkul lxelq deg idammen i tella
turǧa azal n tsaɛet tɛawed tessawel
tacerbiṭ ay nesɛa gar yiḍarren terram-t d nnif-nwen
txil-k ay agellid n waman
fudeɣ ur yi-tefkim ara ad sweɣ
lḥaǧ lwennas yexdem ayen i s-d-yumeṛ uqeṛṛu n taddart
ayen yerzan awrat d wangal n twacult
tuli-yi-d tegrint acḥal aya ur as-ḥulfaɣ
melmi i d-wwin tislit
mačči akken i texdem yal ass ass-nni teskeṛ kan
wali asiɣzef n umawal n teqbaylit
yuli wass teḍher tafat
ziɣ yuɛer-as i tgelda tabriṭanit ad teffeɣ seg tdukli n tuṛuft
tenna-as i urgaz-is awi-yi ɣer yimawlan-iw ad ten-id-ẓureɣ yeqbel
iha am uqecwal cceḍḥ-im d aḍebbal
axaṭer tettwadehnem s zzit timqeddest n umeɣlal
deg teswiɛt ɛeddan-d akk wussan gar wallen-is
fell-am i terhen yemma-m
lqerḥ yettnerni tiyitiwin am yisegnan
aḥric iqublen allel ɣer yidis anẓul
acu ara asen-tinniḍ
ziɣ tezdeg-iw d ammus
imeḥbas-nni yakk d imelsiyen
d netta i d aqerru n uxxam
teggarem tiɣri i yinelmaden n tesdawiyin akken ad d-kecmen deg terbaɛt n usideg
musa iɛawed i umeɣlal ayen akken i s-d-inna ugdud
leḥsab-ik yexṣer
d acu d isenfaren i tesɛiḍ sya ɣer sdat
awal-ik d ccfa yettḍur
ttuɣ ur nniɣ ara kra i wabɛaḍ
ur d-tewwiḍ ara tmeddit armi i tt-cerweɣ merriɣet
ur xeddmet ara ccɣel i txeddmem mkul ass
amezgun yettrebbi yesnernay tizemmar n uqcic
a tamuqint n leḥbeq cceḍḥ-im ass-a yeḥdeq
teẓẓiḍ timmad i ugrud akken d aleqqaq
yeqqim s ddaw n tzemmurt
yekcem bla asṭebṭeb
ttqadar iman-im
ur yezmir ara ad d-yaff aqeddac
anwa i yefazen yerna yeṣfa am kečč
ha-ten-an sin n yiɛessasen zaɛma ɛussen-iyi-d
yeɣli-d ṭlam
akken diɣen ara rafqen aqeddic yerzan tiwwin d usuzer n yisental n yikayaden
tteɛraḍeɣ ad ttuɣ ayen i yeḍran yid-i deg yiḍ
Ɣer ccib-is yettɣenni ɣef tayri
ur d-terrim ara agelzim s axxam
susem qqim deg uxxam
semnennit di tmusniwin
ma yehwa-as ad taweḍ aggur akked tziri
bdu-tt-id seg uswir n uheyyi ɣer wis ukuẓ
iwacu ara tessetḥiḍ s baba-m
ad tẓer anida i tella
mačči ad tezwarem kenwi
i ma yeẓra-t d uletma-s dayen tenger
am umseklaw iẓerren tiɣmiwin n wass
amek ara tiliḍ d uḍrif ma yella uεebbuḍ yexwa
agezdu n tesdawit d tasudut yebna ɣef yisdawen d yiselmaden akked temsirin daya
teɣṛa-yas
d ṣṣeḥ
truḥ
d tajmilt i umussnaw ameqqran mulud mɛemmri
ma ɣef wayen yerzan aẓawan-is zyada ɣef wayen i d-yegmer ɣer yicennayen imeqqranen yecban
Ḍsant di snat s ugarger
tili gziɣ
teẓdem ɣef tewwurt-nni tekkat deg-s s ifassen d iḍarren tettsuɣu
tamedyezt d awalen neɣ d inzan i d-yeffɣen seg yimi n umdan aqbayli
amakar iddem tanuga lḥaǧ isbeɣ talaba
weḥda weḥda alma teffeɣ-d d ulman
qbel ad myezwaǧen llan myussanen
ad izlu aɛejmi-nni ines d asfel n usuref n ddnub
aṭas n yiqeddacen imuḍan i yettruḥun d iseflan n waya acku uggaden ad ččen ɛinani deg yisragen n uxeddim
yewwi-d ɣef win yetturaren ad d-yaf anamek yettqaṛaben i yal awal deg texxamin n uẓeṭṭa
aṭas ur yessinen ara neɣ ur yebɣin ara ad arun taqbaylit akken i iwata
ad k-zuzneɣ nekk ḥulfaɣ
refdeɣ aqrab-iw
imiren ad sen-iniɣ ɛinani leɛmeṛ i ken-ssneɣ
dɣa mhenni d amaru d aneɣmas d ameɣnas daɣen n teqbaylit yezga d aseḥbibber fell-as
imiren wwin-t ad t-ṣellben
faket timezwarit deg yiberdan d tirwiḥin i yettfakan
lset ayen yeḥman
wwin-t
ssuden-itt
mmi ass-a yettnerni
ad t-tafem
tjerḥem-d
d acu i k-yuɣen a mmi
teṭṭef-itt tergigit tidiwin tugdi
kečč ur tsɛeddaḍ ara tabuzeggaɣt
yelli-s d taɛebbajt n yifassen
nezmumeg-d
yelli ɣer medden akk tekyes nniɣ-asen ta d yemma-s ma ur tt-tessinem
yewwi-d lexbar s wacu i itezzin deg uqerru n tmeṭṭut-agi
iḥulfan-ines tefka-ten i mendas
ahat deg rray i ten-uɣen
ma yella ugar n kraḍ n yigiman n tuddar i yellan deg-s ihi ad ilin ugar n leǧwamaɛ
tselḥayeḍ
ad t-yels mmi ad yettnerni
ddan akken d acu i ddan
mi temmut tegmert iɛalleq-as asegres
twala taqecwalt-nni gar iɣunam tceggeɛ taqeddact-is ad s-tt-id-tawi
nuḥ ikkes ssqef i lbabuṛ dɣa iwala ddunit meṛṛa tekkaw
d wigi i d arraw n meẓyan i s-d-ilulen di tmurt n kanɛan
ad kiwent akken ad ɛiwdent ad mesxent tameddit kan
mačči d kečč i d-qesdeɣ
tameddit mi d-yekcem testeqsa-t ɣef wahil n lxedma-ines n uzekka-nni
lliɣ ɛeryan ur yi-tesselsem ara
taduḍt turad teqqerdec tellem mazal kan ad tt-teẓḍ ad tuɣal d tacettiḍt
maca ad d-tefɣen ilmend n tmurt i tetten arraw-is umi semman war isem-is
fiḥel awal fiḥel nhati
melmi d-tella tukerḍa
daɣen d tagnit i usekfel n yimedyazen imaynuten yuɣen abrid n usefru
brant-iyi
armi iyi-d-tessemɣer yemma tura temmektaḍ-d tesɛiḍ yelli-k
mačči akka i tɣil ad teffeɣ tudert-is
ad tettkemmil leqraya-s tameddit
Ṣṣbeḥ irkeb ɣef userdun tameddit ur yufi aɣyul
twalam
neǧǧa-t-id di berra
xdem am uletma-m
d ayen i d-yeglan s usṭerḍeq meqqren slan-as-d yakk wid i izedɣen tamdint-a n arezyu
ugar n wayen akk yezrin
mi tt-sɣefleɣ ad d-akreɣ iselsa i gma
ad t-tɣummeḍ meṛṛa s ddheb yeṣfan s ufella idisan-is tacciwin-is
ar kra n teswiɛt
ih sin
wali akk ileqman beta
necmumeḥ-d
tebda tḥesseb-itent-id s yismawen-nsent akken ma llant
Ččant
yemma tdeɛɛu-asen s lxir
anfet ad gmun akken di sin alamma d tamegra
ad iyi-d-yuɣal
iwumi-t
nekni nxeddem i talsa ur numin s lḥasanat
Ɣer daxel iluɛa-t
thegga iman-is teslit
axaṭer lliɣ lluẓeɣ tefkam-iyi ččiɣ
beddeɣ ɣef ṭṭaq
yerra-d akk iẓerman-is
ad ḥerzen lumuṛ-iw akken ur ttawin ara ddnub
mlalen yiqerra d yiḍarren yiwet teẓẓel aka yiwet akken nniḍen
mačči ad d-yettaɣ syin ad yettḍeggir akken daɣen ad yissin d acu i itett akken ur yettaḍen ara
telliḍ da weḥd-k
ilul deg taddart tiɣilt lḥaǧ ali deg tama n wat yiraten
yasuɛ inna-as ihi arraw-nsen ur ttxelliṣen ara
iberdan akk kkren zun drus aya mi tɛedda tegrewla
iɣaḍ yelli-s n ferɛun tenna d yiwen seg warrac n iɛebṛaniyen
zewǧent deg tmurt
yezmer ad yili d amecṭuḥ d alemmas neɣ d ameqqran ɣef usentel i yehwan i umeskar-is
isirkli-d lɛesker a ssifil bedlet tamurt
Ɛeddan kra n wussan
ad εerḍeɣ ad d-snulfuɣ tayri
mi yebda llaẓ la t-yettḍurru yemmekta-d taxeddamt-nni n unebdu
iεreq-ak-d ubrid ɣur-i
ad am-bruɣ di tmura
yal mi ččan kra ad t-id-ṣewwren deg facebook
walit wagi
ixuṣṣ deg ucala usaru-nni
ayen yuran deg twenza ur yezmir yiwen ad t-yekkes
ad tseggem tirigliwin ad yennejbad yiddid
yezweǧ yesɛa tameṭṭut meẓẓiyet
axaṭer ɣef ddemma n yemdanen ddunit teččuṛ d lbaṭel
ur ttwalliɣ ara tifednin-iw
d kunwi i yessenṭaqen awal
indeh lbuq ṣṣut-is simmal ittnerni
kullec ad kem-yerr d taqaḥbit deg tmurt-a
qeḍran ma yezwer s imi tament ma teggra-d i wumi
nɣiɣ-ak-t
sdereɣlen lebɣi-nni d leḥmala-nni i yettnernin
ur tuḍineḍ ara
ul-nni iweznen nenγa-t yeԑreq ẓelmeḍ d uyeffus
isess-itt neɣ yeznuzu-tt
yeḍsa ɣef yemma i yewwten agejdur asmi d-ṣeṭleɣ acebbub-iw i tikkelt tamezwarut
ur d-iris ccfer ɣef gma-s
ta i kemm
musa tekcem-it tugdi inna slan akk medden s temsalt-agi
d acu i d ddwa n wazi
-ayɣer aqcic-a ur yettru ara
i yimaḥbas-aki ḥuq ur ten-ttɛassan ara
tallit n ẓẓmik d leḥris
siwel-asen kan ad d-kecmen
igerrez imi ur tɛiwdeḍ ara i tucḍiwin n tikelt iɛeddan
lufan-a ara d-ilalen d mmi-s
yewwi-d lmeṣbeḥ deg ufus ayeffus ṣubeɣ timizar ǧuǧgen leɣrus
selleɣ-asen mi ttmeslayen fell-i
iruḥ yiwen n wudem i tmaziɣt deg wussan-a imenza n remḍan d tablaḍt nniḍen i as-inesren i tmaziɣt
tagara n uḍris tesɛa tamsirt
tudert
ala aḍebsi aɛisiw i yetteffɣen tamurt-is
acimi ulac amɛiwen gar yigezda n tmaziɣt yellan di tmurt yal wa iḍerref iman-is di teɣmart
yesleɣ wul s rekku
d acu-yi ɣur-wen
werǧin d-msukkasen
ffiɣ-d aman s ugdur
d acu i imeqqren
ur yettbeddil ara mejjir aẓar
d mmi-s n yemma
tamagit-nneɣ d talsa
ur nɣiḍ deɛwessu negumma ad neḥlu
d izimer n usuref asuref n umeɣlal
massa err-d ɣef yisteqsiyen-iw
dγa argaz-nni ameqran yemmekta-d tayri i iruḥen yefhem belli ur d-tettwaγram yeḥbes lmakla
aneɣlaf n usegmi yerra-d i usiwel-nsen s uɣiwel
illu yenna-d i musa nekk d win yellan
iṛuḥ-asen
dagi sɛiɣ kan yiwet n tamawt
azwel yedda d usentel d tidet d azabuq
ad am-buddeɣ ddunit-iw
zik tella yiwet n tmeṭṭut tesɛa yelli-s tezwej
wali akk iceggiren
d acu ara txedmeḍ yes-sen
tuɣal tweṭṭuft ɣer wayen temlek
telt
ttlebbinen deg wacciwen
abrid-a yegdel i tkeryas
syin yedhem-d ccwal yerẓa-d tiwwura yenneqlab uxxam-a ɣef uqerru-is yiwen ur yefhim d acu i iḍerrun
yerra-as mmi-s ih fukeɣ
teffeɣ nuna deg wackanen
yella walebɛaḍ yella ulac-it
d yelli-k ɣriba
Ɛeddan leɛwam temmut yelli-s n cuwaɛ tameṭṭut n yahuda
ma refdeɣ afenǧal n lqahwa deg ubrid ad iyi-d-ččen s tmuɣliwin
deg tazwara n leɛwacar ad t-tafeḍ yettaɣ-d kan itteffeɣ-it leɛqel akken ad d-yeqḍu
ad nger taqbaylit gar uẓeṭṭa n tutlayin n umaḍal
Ḥemmlen tezfer ttanin
isteqsa-ten anda ara d-ilal lmasiḥ
mi ara nexdem akk anect-a ad nekcem imir ad nẓeḍ
segnet-t
niqal tumen d azɣal kan i as-ixedmen akken
akken i ɛerḍeɣ ad asen-d-nesreɣ ur ufiɣ ara
win ittaǧǧan di leḥqq-is werǧin indem
ihi zuxx s tutlayt-ik taruḍ-tt
refdeɣ ifassen kecmeɣ seddaw n tarkiḍṭ n tarawt s teɣzi d tehri n tin yurjan tafsut
tenwiḍ ddunit d awal kan
gar-asen asenfar n unnar n semmus tmerwin n yimukan n buxalfa swayes i d-yesfaydi ugezdu-nneɣ
afraq n wuraren i yigerdan-agi
d tamɛayt n ufellaḥ d yinisi
taqbaylit ass-a mačči d tin n zik
ur d-fkin ara udem
beqquɣ ad seḥnunḍeɣ ula dayen ur nettmačča
amek ara uɣaleɣ ɣer baba ma ur iddi ara yid-i uqcic-agi
yusef ijemɛ-d irden s waṭas amzun d ṛṛmel n lebḥeṛ
zgiɣ sberrayeɣ deg-s ur tkeččem ara ɣer tzeɣwa-nni
muqleɣ-d
ad ruḥeγ ad awen-ğğeγ tawwurt i yettblaԑen deg udemawen
zzi-d i wedrar s talast akken ur d-ittqerrib ara ugdud
ad yili leqdic-a d abrid i usbeddi n tfaska n usaru aqbayli
d anwa ara ad yegren tamawt i tɣawsa am taki
tɣunfa-yi
yettagad ad iwali ayen n dir
ifka-tt i jjiḥ
ur d-fkiɣ ara udem
i wayen yuran fell-as
anda tt-yemlal
bɣan ad kem-ččen d taseglut
d izumal s leqyud d tekmamin
mi sliɣ i lxiḍ yeṣṣerser
aqbayli efk-as isem aqbayli
ala a baba ur d-igir ḥed ɣer ɣur-i
d acu-t tura wagi
iwumi theddṛeḍ
ad ten-tseggmeḍ
mačči d tidet

ifakk-asen-tt

yessuffeɣ-d uɛarus timejjatin-is mi d-tecxaclew lgerra
yeqqar-as Ḥemmleɣ-kem
nuɣeɣ akked gma fell-am
wa yettru wa yettaḍṣa

d acu i yeḍran

lvot ɣef tselwayt n tegduda ad d-yili deg waggur n yebrir id-teddun

iteddu yettemderkal

nedda-yawent di nneqma

učči semmeḍ

da ara sɛeddiɣ iḍ

rran-as ih
lǧetta ur tif ara llebsa

ar tura ur fhimeɣ ara anisi d-tiwi anect-nni n tebɣest

Ḥadret tazemmurt
ur skiddib ara felli s wallen-iw i t-walaɣ mi yekcem ɣer uxxam

Ɣef yiri n tala
isem-ik ay aqcic
ad ɣenniɣ weḥdi a xir
yis-s yezhu wul-inu
aha cwiṭ n tebɣest tura ur d-yegri wara
a taḥawact n wul-iw a tayri n dunnit-iw
ma iḥess-ak-d trebḥeḍ-d gma-k
ihi nekni nesseɛlam-it ɣef wamek ara ifaq belli asafar-nni yexṣer neɣ yella deg-s kra ur nettmačča ara

ay aɛessas n uxxam

akken ma llan zedɣen di temdint
mi sɛiɣ tnac n yiseggasen
lfeṭṭa ittzemzimen
ansi i s-d-ikka ihi wayagi akk
bɣiɣ-kem mačči d abbu
i usmekti yiwet n tmes yecban ta tekker deg temdint n skikda sin n yiseggasen aya
ulac d acu i ibeddlen
taɣṛast yellan d lxali
mi yezgen wass d nnuba n yirgazen ad qegglen
isḥaq isɛa-d yeɛqub
ad iqqes aɛawdiw seg uḍar ad iɣli umnay ɣer deffir
ameqqran akk di tgelda d netta
ziɣ tirga d aɣuṛṛu mi tḥeṣleḍ ad ak-ḍelqent

Ḥrez-it a bab-inu ad yeɛmeṛ uxxam-inu
tɣunfa-t lmut
smektayen-iyi-d acḥal yelha mi ara tegreḍ irebbi i mmi-m
Ṣṣeḥa di teɛḍamin
deg wallen-nsen ajajiḥ n tmes n tayri i ireqqen
mennaɣ-n deg-k ay aḥnin a wi yeččan kilu n tasa
ihdeṛ-asen s leqsaḥa inna-asen ansi i d-tusam
yeqqim yettmuqul-d kan allen-is d tibaɛrurin yelsa iselsa iberkanen akk
Ḥanux iɛac telt meyya u xemsa u settin n iseggasen

lḥenni ad t-yeqqen wuzyin a lbaz bu leknuz

ad ten-id-yawi i lmuqeddem

Ḥemmleɣ-tt
a win illuẓen ur ɛennu lqut d-ijeɣlen
i lamara-ni i ɣef nemsefham
s tɣerma yessawel yimi
iwacu ur aɣ-d-nnan ara tidet
ad nessektem deg yigran
ur ẓriɣ ara ma tella tudert yid-k
taseddast teḥkem axaṭer ma ur tettmeslayeḍ ara akken ur tt-fehmen ara medden
musa yeddem tameṭṭut-is d warraw-is isserkeb-iten ɣef yiɣyal dɣa ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n at jennad
yeɛǧb-am wayen i xedmeɣ ah
mi tekker ad truḥ ad taker aḍar
awid kan ad yidir uqcic
fkiɣ-tt i jjiḥ
Ɣas ḥseb-aɣ seg warraw-im zlu yiwen seg wakniwen
ssekna n wulani
a yelli tura meqqreḍ ad necreḍ adrim d urawen
wa iɛuss wa
ayen i ɣef temsefham tejmaɛt nekk qebleɣ-t
afus yella maca nesra ugar n waya
waqila yessawal uɛeẓẓi deg uqerru-inem ad am-teḍru am akka i iyi-teḍra
ali-d ɣef ṭṭabla
lwennas ad iḥkem agdud-is am leɛṛac-nniḍen n isṛayil
bɣiɣ ad iliɣ d anza ara ken-id-yesmektayen
amaru ur d-yenni ara d anta-tt temɣart-nni mm twemmust
bɣiɣ ad aɣeɣ yell-ik maca nekk d aẓawali ur sɛiɣ kra
tlatin-sna kan i yesεa tom
melmi ara truḥem ad d-tawim tislit
tiniḍ mreḥba a lal n tiddi iqewsen
s kra yekka yiḍ ur d-iris ccfer ɣef gma-s
musa yerra-as mi ara ffɣeɣ seg uxxam-ik ad ɛenniɣ ɣer umeɣlal
yemmeɣ yerfed-itt ula d nettat yewwi-tt deg yiḍ-nni ɣer sbiṭar
Ṭebbget sya
tura ad tceyyɛem ɣur-s ad d-yas s lɛejlan
ayen texdem deg yal amkan
ad temmag akkayi d tacebḥant ad tixfif
yenṭeq yiwen uḥewtiw γer wuccen ay uccen ayγer akka tessusmeḍ εni ur yezhi ara wul-ik
argaz sennig-i si tmeẓẓuɣt ad yi-yawi
yerkeb-iten lɣiḍ meqqren yimawlan n tnezduɣin
dexxan yesru-d allen-iw
yella wasmi i tkecmeḍ sbiṭar
akal i d-yefkan irgazen
mmi d ayazi n tili
akli fell-as ad yexdem
mi ara ɣreɣ aḍris aseklan ad afeɣ awennet di tazwara yettban-iyi-d icemmet aḍris-nni
d netta i d illu-iw ad t-ḥemdeɣ
awi-d akka mmi-s n laḥlal-nni
nekk isem-iw tameṭṭut
deg tallitin yezrin
ur ttsethin ur ttlazamen
yefreḥ win i k-id-yefkan
zilfa taqeddact n nna feḍmuca tesɛa-as-d massi akked yuba
ad terɣemt di tudert ad ternumt di laxart
ayen akk ara teqqim texla ad teṛtiḥ
limer am tura seg wass amenzu ad ak-d-ǧǧeɣ aɣebbar
d acu i tḥesbemt iman-nkent
ad aɣ-d-tefk ibawen n waklu
imɣi n ṣṣaba maɛqul mbaɛid i d-yettmuqul
tesmenyaf lmut wala tudert yid-s
tettidir kan tamara tettidir bla iswi
maca tid ixeddmen yid-s di lbiru ssneɣ-tent merra
atan amek ara tettwaεeqlem d inelmaden-iw
lebni-ines yella-d deg tallit tummast
deg usebter-nsen n facebook neɣ deg usebter n tesɣunt neɣ deg yigrawen i d-yessemliliyen iselmaden n tmaziɣt
eǧǧ-iyi-t a baba-inu
tensa tafat-iw tedda yid-m truḥ
ul mačči ad yettisḍif
ussan n yimuras d wussan n ustaɛfu n ddurt
axxam wwten-t yiγisan
akken i ttawin abrid n uɣerbaz
ilindi yiwet n tikelt mačči ẓriɣ-k
Ɣas ma twalam d lbaṭel teǧǧam-aɣ necceḍ neɣli
azgen ɣer tqecwalt azgen ɣer tɛebbuṭ-is
s yiwen wawal kan terra-ten merra d ilfan
ur ssinen ara
Ɣer yiswi ad naweḍ
arraw n tsekkurt
mmi-s n sbeɛ ay aḥmam
baba lwali
qqaren-d kan d taḥbibt uḍebbal
nettarra tisfifin d zagzag yal wa s yini-s yal ini d azamul
ur nettɛemmid ara i win ara ad d-yawḍen ɣer nnif-nneɣ
yis-m yesmermug meɣrud
ass wis sebɛa imceyyeɛ ad imuqel tareɣla-nni
tantala taɛrabt n ccam tebna ɣef tutlayt taseryanit
a Ṛebbi kemmel-aɣ i lferḥ
ur as-ttḥulfuɣ ara
susmeɣ s wallen yeẓẓan di lqaɛa
xemten acḥal aya deg texzant n wul-is
neɣli deg yirrebi-k a yiḍ
liḥala-agi n war laman di tesdawit taggara-agi tzad
mačči d abrid ihi d tiẓgi i ilaq ad as-semmin
Ḥettmen-iyi ad asen-sekcameɣ lahyuf ɣer tnezduɣt tasdawant
yewwi-d ass-a amaynut-nniḍen
azekka ad iliɣ di lbiru alarma d setta
teqqim-d tmeṭṭut-is d yemma-s
ur ibni ara fell-as ad tt-iwali
Ṣṣeḥa lehna ṛemḍan
iruḥ ikemmel taɣuri-s di tesnawit n delles din i d-yewwi akayad n lbak
ar dagi i ssawḍeɣ seg wayen ɣriɣ
wali daɣen aya
terra-as rewleɣ-d akken ad beɛdeɣ ɣef feṛṛuǧa lalla-w
acekkuḥ-ines am yilis n taduḍt
illul-d deg-i lebɣi i lmakla
lferḥ-iw yugar lefraḥ
yessaweḍ ad d-yessufeɣ tasfift-is tamezwarut iwumi isemma lehna yerna-d tis snat yefka-as azwel fiḥel
wid yebɣan ad t-ččen
amek ur tetten ur tessen
temḥeṣ mliḥ tira yellan ɣef tewwurt
ha-tt-an tkuzint tetti akk maca zwireɣ deg usekles
ulac taluft i t-izegglen
yiwen n urgaz ittnaɣ yid-s armi qrib ad yali wass
arraw n naftali yaḥṣayil guni yiṣir akked cilim
yenṭeq mmi-s ɣer baba-s
tinerniyin d tinerni
ikker-d ugdud ad innaɣ musa nnan-as fket-aɣ-d aman ara nsew
tameṭṭut iḥerzen axxam-is fiḥel lḥerz fiḥel aɛessas
ad twalim nnbi
leḥmala-w tekka-d nnig leḥmala n wiyaḍ
nnecraḥeɣ s teḍṣa
tis tlata a mmi ur tteẓẓu ṭejra ma ur teččiḍ nfeɛ lbaraka ur t-tesɛi
taqburt tella ɣer yidis azelmaḍ
idlisen ur nettaǧa ara ifassen-is d wallaɣ-is d ilmawen
qqim tmuqleḍ sani ulac tilisa
ad ṭṭfeɣ di lɛehd-nni swayes i ɛuhdeɣ baba-k dda bṛahim
eǧǧ-iyi ad rewleɣ ɣur-s akken ad smenɛeɣ iman-iw
d kemm i d tigejdit n uxxam-iw
taqbaylit d tameslayt-iw
bḍan-akent-tt-id
Ṛuḥet ad tmellḥem
beṛka-kem targit
yuba yesṭuqut awal
ad asen-ten-yefk
ahat txedmeḍ aya yid-nteɣ
ssmesxirent yes-m
terra-yas-tent-id
ttxil-m af-it-id
sew kra n tɣawsa
yerbeḥ ur ttɛawadeɣ ara
ttneqlaben medden
tfukkeḍ ccɣel-im
ur yesɛi ara azal
tesseṛɣemt-iyi-t
aql-iyi d awaziw
yuɣ-d uqcic iselsa
Ɣaḍent-kem tidak
tuɣ-iyi deg idurar
iwwi-tent uberriḍ
allah yettergigi
teslemdeḍ-iyi-tt
kemm d tamehtuft
Ṛuḥet ar uɣerbaz
ad asent-tent-id-tawimt
yuba qrib yuɣ mary
qqim anda i telliḍ akken
yemger-d timẓin d yirden
tzemreḍ ad tɛumeḍ
tessneḍ ad tecfeḍ
yezmer ad ɣ-iẓer
yettraju ad truḥ tmacint
tayri d taderɣalt
qqimet cwiṭ yid-i
ad tent-teddmemt

ad t-id-yemmager

amzeɣyul d amusam

ifakk-asent-tent
ad yeddukel yid-i

berlin d afelleq

tesseṛɣem-asen-t
ini-d wi kem-ilan
yerra-yak-tent-id
iεǧeb-wen waddal

yerra-yas-ten-id
tezgam tessenqadem deg-i
tessṛeɣ-akent-ten
zedɣeɣ deg tokyo
isem-is i yemma-k
tjerḥeḍ-as ul-is
ad asen-t-tefkem
yuba d yir aterras
menhu ara iruḥen
tebḍa-yas-ten-id
tesbixxiw-d lehwa
Ɣas in-as umneɣ-k
yak ur k-yuɣ wara
txuṣṣem-iyi aṭas
fakk-iken acetki
ur yessewham ara
ha-ten-ad akk da
tura kullec yelha

tettuḍ idrimen-im
yessers aburziz
ad as-ten-tefkem
awit-t-id ɣer da
tettagadem isura n tugdi
ad urarent yid-s
llan waman deg yal amḍiq
efk-as aman i tom
melmi ad iyi-iẓeṛ
cukkeɣ tusam-d ɣer twizi
ssneɣ iman-iw mliḥ
tettḥewwiseḍ ḥedd

ur yesnuffus ara
tura ɛeqleɣ-kent
qqimemt deg beṛṛa
swiɣ afenǧal-iw n lqahwa
tzemrem ad tṛuḥem
Ḥemmleɣ-kem mliḥ
yewwet-it s ubeqqa
yuba yuɣal yettasem
teqwem tura akka
tettkel ɣef lǧehd-is kan
teqqareḍ tmellḥeḍ
yuba ixeddem kullec weḥd-s
iban sani tleḥḥu
ad sen-t-tɛeṛḍem
azekka ad iliɣ din
ad sent-tt-yeɛṛeḍ
itri-nni twalam-t
d acu n wejdid
bḍant-as-tent-id
tesdub-itent tayri
argaz-is d aḍebbax ifazen
tanemmirt fehmeɣ-d tura
anda i d-tezga lezzayer
uriɣ-ak-d tamawt
yiwen ur yembawel
iḥemmel aɛebbuḍ-is
kkes taberriḍt-ik
tecfa fell-asen ar ass-a
anwa-t uselmad-ik
tzemrem ad tɛumem
ur ssineɣ kra ɣef lbaṭaṭa
iɣaḍ-ikent winna
melmi ad t-ẓṛent
Ḥbes tawaturt-nni
yiwen ur t-tewqiɛ
ilaq ad tent-id-tesmekti
ur ttmeslay ara akked tom
yella win i ak-d-isawlen
la skiddibent wallen-ik
ilaq-ak usteɛfu seg tura
bɣiɣ ad m-εeǧbeɣ
lkem
mmektimt-d ilindi
ayɣer ur d-temmektaḍ ara
tura i d-mmektant
icewwel-itt winna
truḥ d taneggart
yiwen ur yesmuqul
tixeṛ-ik i targit
uɣeɣ-d ddeqs n yidlisen
aṭas i k-tḥemmel
yella win i yellan
ad iyi-ten-yeɛṛeḍ

yiwen ur isseqneɛ

ih d ayen ibanen
yuba d bu tṣegnint

amek temyussanem
qqim yella umkan
yenɣa-yasen-tent
yuba yebra i mary
lliɣ annect-nwen
mazal yettru tom
tewwiḍ-d iman-im
nniɣ-as iḍ yelhan
iwet aqjun s uẓru
yuba yettwasmemmi
d kemm tinna neɣ
suter i walebɛaḍ

d iẓrilwen i nella

kemmlemt amuqqel
da i lliɣ si zik

yiwen ur yessikid

d yiwen ubuhal kan
fkemt-as idrimen-is tura

bdu tazzla

armi yettaggad tilelli
ur d tanarit-ik

arumt awennit
yeqquṛ uqeṛṛu-yim
yemmut baba-s ilindi
taxazabit yugaren tawaɣit
times tessaɣ deg tlemmast n tzeqqa
amaleh ur t-sεiɣ
lewhi n tmeddit
hedden iman-ik
ad d-ibeggen belli tamaziɣt tezmer i tussna am nettat am tutlayin-nniḍen
awal-agi yesgan
tesɛiḍ weltma-m tamecṭuḥt
yewwet-iyi waḍu deg unebdu n leḥrur
sebɣent-tent-id
amdan-agi yeḍlem axaṭer iɛuṣa ameɣlal
tineggura-agi ha-t-an deg ustudyu yettheggi tasfift-is tis rebɛa ideg ara ilit ɛecra n tezlatin
err ddhen-ik ɣer ttfaṣil
Ḥemmleɣ tiqcicin
deg wayen i d-yeddan deg-s ad naf amek ittwasenqes wazal n tmeṭṭut di tudert
yunag ammer ahat ad yettu
yuba yesxeṛxuṛ
theggam kullec i tmeɣra
cabḥa d tazehwanit

ata ddaw ukursi

tiwwura ldint

d asgunfu n lebda
Ḍṣan meṛṛa
aseggas-a ad tt-nawi
tasusmi n yiḍ teslufu-aɣ
neḥwaǧ tikti tamaynut
ur yelli ara akk d anamar

iɣaḍ-iyi

akken tenɣiḍ ara temmteḍ

yella yesmikriḍ

i d-yefkan aṭas i ssinima d tezlit taqbaylit

Ḥemmleɣ iferṭeṭṭa

txusseḍ deg ddin
yewweḍ-d wass-im
tettemyakemt akk anzi deg ugezdu-agi-nwen
kkreɣ-d zik mliḥ
di tazwara baba ur yecliɛ ara
ahat tura ilaq ad ṛuḥeɣ
lfeṭṭa ur tt-ittara ḥedd d taɛrit
ur tettili ara d asfel n umexluq-a ur nelli siwa di lekwaɣeḍ d radyuwat
tullist-a d tasekla tagreɣlant yettnaɣen ɣef yizerfan n umdan
taqbaylit ass-a tekcem gar tutlayin n umaḍal
anida telliḍ deg tubeṛ
ameɣlal inna i haṛun Ṛuḥ s aneẓruf ad temmagreḍ musa
ad yemmekti
ungal tirga n wul d win i d-yeffɣen deg tiẓrigin tafat
wukud teqqimem

rran-akent-tt-id
sami ur yeḥṛic ara
ad d-nelhu yid-s
yecbeḥ dayen kan
nekk akked baba-m ḥala ayen yelhan ara m-nextir
timenna ɣas ini
netta d anamur
ma d taneggarut tella-d ilindi deg taddart n tiferdud deg at yusef

azzelemt
mdel idlisen-im

tura yegra-yi-d kan ad ssilɣeɣ arraw-nneɣ
yewweḍ-d lawan-ik
i ma ɣelḍen
ibedden yetwehhem
nettemyasam nettemɛawan nettnaɣ
tagellidt-nni twalaḍ-tt
yak ur t-yuɣ wara
lqahwa-nni tezga-d sdat n tɣiwant
ad d-serseɣ lehna di tmurt
qqim ɣer ṭṭabla
ccbaḥa tettfat
sberber i lwens-inu

Ḥmed rebbi
Ɣur-m ad tebruḍ i usirem
nusa-d merra
ifakk-aɣ-tt
feṛqent-tent
anwa ur d-nusi ara
yiwet n teqcict kan i yellan deg tceqquft-nni
tirga n ferɛun sin n iseggasen mbeɛd
ur walaɣ yiwen
lǧameɛ iqedsen yuɣal d ssuq
tessebṛuqlemt-iyi
kečč s timmad-ik tessneḍ agdud-agi iḥemmel ad ixdem ayen n diri
terra fell-i
ttwajerḥeɣ s lmus
nnan-iyi-d amkan-im mačči gar-aneɣ
meḥsub tteɛǧaben-asent
yak meqqar d fransa i ten-isetɛemren
ttesseḍ ayen-nni
anda yella lebṣel yeţraḥ
iselman deg waman
irreẓ-as usagem
tigawin ur ttmettatent ara
ifukk-iyi ukebri
Ḥbes ur ttargu ara
warǧin ad tt-yeskeṛkeṛ akken yebɣu iḥeml-d d uguren
cewwlen-ten widak
muqqel iman-im
yewεer ad textireḍ
yeɣli ifeddex uqerru-s
d aẓidan yiles-is
senqed iɣewwaren-ik
amihi yezga d agmawan
sfaqeɣ-ken-id
amenzu deg warraw-ik ad t-id-tefduḍ
i wuddem n yillu
yeldi sami aselkim-ines
wagi d awezɣi
Ḥwaǧeɣ aselkim
tugad dɣa terwel
ad kem-ssawḍeɣ ɣer machad ad tkemmleḍ syen deg lkaṛ
ameɣlal inna-as-d Ṛuḥ ad tṣubbeḍ
yerra-d s lefqeε
ad teẓreḍ anda tettedduḍ
anfemt-iyi
ad ɣ-seɛfen
iseṭṭel ibeddel llebsa dɣa wwin-t ɣer ferɛun
yiwen ur yebɣi ad yeqdec
ssudneɣ tom
amennuɣ i usizdeg n tesdawit seg tuddsiwin yeskuffren tilelli d tugdut
d wigi i d iderman n wat quṛaḥ
win yessetḥan yeffeɣ berra
teḥbes-it
tenna i uqeddac-nni anwa-t urgaz inna di lexla
gnemt akken iqwem
ad ilint tnagiyin sɣur yimeddukkal-is n uxeddim d wayen-nniḍen
yeɣmeq mliḥ wasif
ad ilin diɣen i lmendad n tkeryas i iḥebbsen ɣer tama n yiɣerbazen
amendeṛ anda llan
ul-nsen yezga yelli wa ur yesɛi tabaḍnit ɣef wayeḍ
tasdawit n bgayet
ldi afaylu amaynut mačči d amezwaru-nni iwumi ara tesxelfeḍ
taḥkayt n yelli-s n selṭan d waɣzen
yewweḍ-d wass-ik
rrant-akent-tt-id
tessṛeɣ-iyi-t
ugin wudayen ad ḍefren nnbi muḥemmed daymi ttwaregmen deg leqran
tesɛam akud mliḥ
mi ara leqḍen azemmur zik yettεedday-d γef sin n yiberdan mgaraden γer wanda leḥḥun
ad ɣ-t-tefkeḍ

ur nezmir ad tt-negzem i rray gar yiḍ akked wass

yella kra ibeddlen
wwet a qasi wwet ssuma yiwet
jeddi-s yella d aḥeffaf ɣer iṛumiyen
d lweḥc n lɣaba i t-iččan
asirem swayes i d-yegla deg ul-is
nneɛlat d awal tisusaf d aman
amakar n useggwass-a d win n qabel
illu isemma i lberr lqaɛa
bru-d i yilli
yenkuffera
yettriḥ-d bnin
azrem inna i tmeṭṭut xaṭi
yusa d llusi deg-neɣ ittqissi
yeqqim ɣef yisennanen
cwi kan ulac din taqjunt-is
iqqeṛṣ umrar gar-asen
anda yessarem wul ad yaweḍ ufud
d acu i ten-ixuṣṣen
attan zerriɛa
seg-s beṛka-yi
tayerza s ṛṛwa tissulya s ṛṛḍa
zzwaǧ n walag d amedlalag
Ẓriɣ amek tceɣleḍ
ikkat izan s rrṣas
ur zmireɣ i leqriḥ-a
tissulya d leɛmum tarwa di lehmum
imseḥ wawal
ulin-d waman s ṭṭaqa teččuṛ ddunit
arraw n Ḥam kuc miṣrayim fut akked kanɛan
nemseṛwa am seksu ubelluḍ
iḍ-nni dɣa sswent-as ccṛab i baba-tsent
suref-iyi kan ur d-qsideɣ ara m-gezmeɣ awal
qqimen di lḥebs acḥal n wussan
ma d kečč ad sbeddeɣ yid-k leɛqed-iw
d asurif meẓẓiyen di tira
ur ssinen ara ad uraren
ass wass
tameṭṭut d tamda argaz d targa
Ṛaḥil tuzzel ad txebbeṛ baba-s
tasa tɣucc ay turew
atan rray d rray-ik
abṛaham iṛuḥ am wakken i s-t-id-inna umeɣlal
dayen εyiɣ seg lekdub-nwen
acḥal aya ur d-tbaneḍ
ribika tesɛa yiwen n gma-s isem-is laban
teɣli-d seg igenni teqqen-d lḥenni
axxam-a inu
xdem Ṛebbi eǧǧ tifucal
tom yeqqim ɣef ukanapi
ugden ad d-yeɣli yigenni fell-asen
lḥebs n kayan yezga-deg guyane
i tura d acu tenniḍ
ata wul temri-t taluft
aman ttzidin rennun ɣef lqaɛa
a win ibeṭṭun ssaɛdel ay amcum
yebɣa ad yaɣ yelli-s n xalti-s
nniɣ-as iwulem ad t-id-ssiẓergeɣ acku d tamsalt i nettidir yal ass
wid itteɣraṣen
ad tɛeddi ar wexxam
tettbinem-d mecɣulit
ur necfi ara ɣef temẓi-nneɣ
wakka yeffren deffir usaber
a ddunit a mm tedyanin
tella kra n lḥaǧa i yufa tom
ad teɣṛem di tesdawit n bgayet
yiwen ur yeḥkim fell-ak
ar kem-ɛeṛḍen ɣer tmeɣṛa tebduḍ ccḍeḥ
ur bɣiɣ ara ad k-cewwleɣ
tezgiḍ ɣef ussan-ik
flan yuɣal d si flan
a lxayen aker a bab n uxxam aki
ad iḥlu qasi ad yečč imensi
ccrab amellal i y-iεeǧben ɣef uzeggaɣ
kul yiwen ikmes nnṣib-is ɣeṛ Ṛebbi
ixeddem aṭas n leɛtab
tella kra n tɣawsa i s-d-isken tom i mary
iḥemmel ad yeqqim ɣer uksum mi ara zellun izgaren
kalitus xas ɣezzif messus
yečča nneεi-nsent
lxawa tettegg leǧhada
win iṭṭalaben zzayed ittaf nnaqes
laɛej it ad iṭṭerḍeq
asmi i t-id-necden i wakken ad yuɣal d aselway n lezzayer
yal mi ɣriɣ adlis-a ad d-afeɣ kra d ajdid
qqimeɣ ɣef yisennanen
ccɣel-nkent d asekles a tid yettṣewwiben iles
teqqeṛṣ teylewt-is
am win iɛellqen ddekkaṛ i teslent
iwacu ur zmireɣ ad ḥerrkeɣ
ur tessinemt ara leṣlaḥ-nkent
ttif nnif wala iḥerrif
ffeɣ a laẓ kcemm a tawant
di sin uqbel ad ɣ-teččar
win i d-yewwin awal ɣef umennuɣ n umedyaz d ucennay meɛtub lwennas
zgiɣ ttarguɣ rrbeḥ
ur ilhi ara wayen akka i txedmem
uleqṛaṛ ad d-innulfu
ilaq-am ad ternuḍ ad tṣebreḍ
lehlak d laɛcuṛ n ṣṣeḥḥa
rran-as xdem akken i d-tenniḍ
yiwen was ad akem-id-mlileɣ
timmuɣnest ɣef yizerfan n tmeṭṭut d asaki n tlawin i mazal ur nfaq ara
yennum dayen ulac-ikem
yeɛqub iddem-d aẓru isbedd-it d ccahed
taɛekkazt n Ṛebbi leɛmeṛ teɣli
iwwi yid-s atmaten-is itebɛ-it
tilufa ggtit ussan wezzilit
cukkeɣ yettaker taxlalt tom
iḍ-nni daɣen sswent-as ccṛab i baba-tsent
mačči ɣer ssḥur i d-yettekkar
azger-is ikkat wi iḥuza iṛẓa-t
ffeɣ-d ar lebraz ad nemberraz
taflest ad d-terfed idurar
win ixaḍen s umrar yini-as ṛqiq
ay gar-ak d lḥuṛat-is
maca i ẓẓher amcum yuɣal d aɣyul
iga illa ula deg ulac
semmḥeɣ-am ṛuḥ eǧǧ-iyi
mačči di ssuq ay t-ufiɣ laṣel-iw d amaziɣ
acu bɣiɣ kan sɣur-k ad thedreḍ yid-neɣ
rran-as leɛmeṛ telli tqeḥbit dagi
tezḍa tisist azeṭṭa-s deffir umeẓẓuɣ-is
d win ara s-d-yerren awal i uɣref
Ṣara tenna illu yerra-yi d taḍṣa
bezzaf tettkukruḍ
mseblan ur ttuhennan
yuger ucerrig tafawet
ttif nnmara wala taryalt
d ayen ik-yenna baba-k i yinna baba
nella nettraju-k
neẓra abeddel d awezɣi maca d adday kan fiɣef ad yesseḥibiber umdan
srewteɣ ɛabban wiyaḍ
kkrem ma ulac aɣilif
iɛedda lawan n bibras
yella win i d-iṭṭalayen deg-k
tesɛa allen d tizegzawin
d acu txeddmeḍ deg uberṭiṭ-nni
ur nwiɣ ara bɣant ad ččent
tikli-s d asqeṛdec
a Ṛebbi cafeɛ di ṛṛuḥ neɣ qeṭṭi
ur tḥemmlemt ara aɣerbaz s waṭas
aberkan-nni inu
yella ilaq-iyi ad geɣ kra
tura err tameṭṭut i wergaz axaṭer d nnbi
tettbinem-d n luṛup kunwi
tom d amyaru yettwassnen deg umaḍal akk
d isebbaḍen-iw i telsiḍ
zzuɣer acifuḍ ar d-yas-warkas
ad d-ifk Ṛebbi imnayen n telwit
ssufɣen-t-id s lemɣawla si lḥebs
axxam bu iselqam izga innelqam
diri win yeččan tidi n wayeḍ
rnu ageyyir ɣer lkanun
yugar cceh tawaɣit
d nutni i d imeqranen n leɛṛac-nsen
ur yessin ara ad yecḍeḥ
xas ur terbiḥeḍ ara sfugger kan
tugi-t
neɣ yuli-d lefjer kemm teɣliḍ
izzenz taɣzut yuɣ aḥṛiq
iḥfa yimi si tmenna
ur ttmeslayem ara
xellun-tt ɛecṛa yeɛmeṛ-itt yiwen
Ṭṭef-iyi-n neɣ ad n-ɣliɣ
ax iqqaṛ-it meɛna ittɛuccuṛ
mi ččan am yizgaren ṭṭsen
ad rjuɣ nadam ma yusa-d ma ulac ad ṭṭseɣ
ulac tuggi ur ncaḍ
dɣa yettru fell-as
laban inna-yas yerbeḥ
zdat ittecmummuḥ sdeffir iḥeṛṛeq
ttuseṭṭlen-as cclaɣem
win iɣlin ad ittwarkeḍ
a-tt-an tarwa n yeɛqub
yal yiwen ikmez ajeǧǧiḍ-is
nesnulfa-d tarbaεt n imsidag iqbayliyen
ur ẓriɣ melmi zemreɣ ad rewleɣ
yeṛwa lḥif
tidet ma ad as-beddleɣ lmul
yella walebɛaḍ i d-ittnezzihen deg-k
uḍan ugin ad kfun
tetti tberki ɣef tmelli
d ccrab-iw
cfiɣ-as-d am tura
d arraw-is Ɛisu akked yeɛqub i t-imeḍlen
awi ayla-w
ilaq ad d-nini d akken seg waṭas-aya nutni deg umihi yibkan-a
akken ara iruḥ d amecṭuḥ
xdem jajja ad tteččeḍ bwabbwa
ur yelli deg-m ay ɣelṭeɣ
d wagi i d lexlaṣ-iw
ttif aḥezzeb wala aqezzeb
anda ur kem-id-ttemlileɣ ad sbeɛdeɣ ṣṣut
di leɛnaya-m xdem-it
anida yella uxxam n Ṛebbi di mekka neɣ tizi
ad d-afeɣ argaz-im dderya-m ad d-tezzi
Ḥawteɣ deg-m ḥala mi uyseɣ
imlal qeḍṛan d ilili
tutlayt-a d luluf iseggasen i d-tezger tewweḍ-aɣ-d nettaru-tt assa
asmi arkas izmeḍ aḍar
tirẓi ubuqal ala iceqfan i d-yegran
tura dayen ccna yenɣa-t internet
ttif cwiṭ ẓiden wala aṭas ṛẓagen
nuḥ ibda ixeddem akal iẓẓa yiwet n tfeṛṛant
qqaren-as abɛuc neɣ abexxuy
asmi nella di lakul deg sin akken i neddukul
ur ččint acemma
nemzazzal iǧǧa-yi mmi-s n wuday
ula d tifaskiwin n tsekla ula d nutenti ttakken afud i usnerni n tira s teqbaylit
bezzaf swiɣ iḍ-a iεeddan
tom mačči am kečč
irgazen-agi d imeksawen ttṛebbin lmal
d inijjel i d-ittaken tizwal
neṣbeṛ am iqnac di tessirt
a zzin ara yečč wakal
telluẓem neɣ teffudem
la irewwel fell-am yiẓri-w
tzemreḍ kemm ad tsefḍeḍ ayen iɛeddan
tettkel ɣef rebbi
ad asen-awiɣ akaram
di rebɛa d iqmumsanen
taɣuri n tefyar meẓẓiyen i d-nesskanay yal ass
aɣyul n baba d jeddi rniɣ rrekba ɣer deffir
ad tafeḍ iniɣman anda ttqeggilent wulli
Ɣriɣ kra din turiḍ
ur yettwaggad ara fell-i zemreɣ i yiman-iw
yebra i kra ma yessen-it
ur tebni ara fell-as ad tt-twali
leḥwat aniγer ay uccen
nettargu ad nesɛu axxam ad nidir akken
xdem-as iri ara yesɛun tardest tezziḍ- as-d s izirig n ddheb
mačči d ayen i wumi zemreɣ
yenna-as uḍeggal-is anef-as ad ternu kra n wussan
tban yunnag wallaɣ-is
win ijeṛben tasa ad yens anida nensa
yal yiwet tekcem s usu-s
s wannuz kan mačči s wannen
yuzzel wawal argaz yurwen tamellalt
ibudd-as adlis-a i yiziɣer-is
Ɣef yisennanen i qqiment
imessel deg yiman-is
ad sentmeɣ cwiṭ
yal mi ara tessiwel a t-taf dinna
zewǧeɣ-as i bu timmi
yers-d si tkerrust-ines yekcem si tewwurt yuli
yuli wass ṣṣbaḥ lxir
i tneṭweḍ anda
akken mazal sminiwen
a rrbeḥ tennuleḍ a yemma-s
aḥeq sidi Ɛic
ferḥ-iw a ferḥ-iw
Ṭṭef-as afus d asawen
ass-a s udem-ik mi sekdeɣ
ttehu ttehu
anwa i k-d-ifkan lḥekma-agi
yezwar yeqqel iqleb-d ɣer deffir yenna-yas
tiwizi-inu ma tuli
Ḍebbret iqeṛṛa-nwen
d acu i tent-iwwin ɣur-sent
almi i kem-nufa a taftilt n ṣṣbeḥ n leḥris
tuzureḍ s wudem yettnur
azekka ad rewleɣ
twalaḍ iḍ mi ara d-ires ih walaɣ-t
newwi-d zzeriɛa tektel
icerriqen n yiṭij ɛeddan-d si ṭṭaq
tiɣri nesla mi nteṭṭeḍ tugar kul tayeḍ
d acu i tḥesbem iman-nwen
amzun ukiɣ-d si tnafa
d tameɣra n nnbi ṣṣaleḥ
aḍu yetthuzu afriwen
ur d-yettban ara
Ḥebseɣ lḥenni leḥbas n ṭṭelba
ad as-d-yerr arju ad semdeɣ aḍref-a ad n-ruḥeɣ
d ayen i tzerεeḍ ara tmegreḍ
azekka-nni krent ad ruḥent ɣer wasif
Ṛǧu ar k-id-iṣaḥ ujdaṛ tḍemɛeḍ axxam
ur yezmir ara ad isali tugna
s yicewwiqen-nni ifazen
tasɣunt aselmad
nettnadi ur nuyis
anaddal-a iḥella-d kraḍ n cciεat n teẓruft deg taggayin
amuḍin-nni tettaṭṭaf-it tawla tameqqrant yettazzal aṭas uɛebbuḍ-is akked daɣen tefɣent-d tḥebbiwin timellalin deg yiles-is
ad teččeḍ aɣrum ger wuccanen-a
ad d-ilint snat n tejmilin
awimt-iyi-d abandu
kra n yicennayen n tudrin
ur yezmir ara ad d-isali tugna
mi d-nusa nufa-d agezdu n tizi uzzu yesɛa agellel d ameqqran deg unegmu
nɣil d aman tewwim aman
Ɣer tagara ur t-id-ɣḍileɣ ara
yettcali yettemhewwal
inelmaden d yiselmaden-nsen akked yinemhalen i ixeddmen da
tafettust teqqur taqemmuct la tesfituṛ
ass n tmaɣra-s zahra temmut seg tugdi
ad terreḍ i uɛdaw tisfi

sfaqeɣ-ten-id
ad d-iɛegeḍ yiwen seg-sen ilaq ad t-nenfu
melmi i kerrzen leqbayel
twalamt weltma
tḥemmlem fṛansa
kullec yettaru-t tom
zbubeɛ
tizlit i d-ccnan yigerdan n tdukkla tadelsant imnar n tdukli yeqqaren dɣa deg uɣerbaz-a
anda-tt twacult-ik a tom
ayen ara tuɣaleḍ
yezṛa ur d-ttmeslayen ara γef wayen iḍeṛṛun di tmurt deg tallit nni
ur tzuxxu ara akken
ay meqqer uxxam-ik
tenɣa-yi-tent
yebded
deg-wen i yella
ula d lmut tugi-ten
Ḥerkel iman-im
ur teẓriḍ ara amek
yella waya maca yella deg wacu neckenṭeḍ ugar
i nudaɣ deg temdinin
siweḍ sslam-iw i baba-k
anda-tt tsarut-ik
acu tebɣiḍ ad tiniḍ
fkiɣ-ak iman-iw imi d kečč i d nekk
ur kkat tameṭṭut-ik alemma teqneḍ-tt
tsebɣeḍ-asen-tent
tekka-nnig ufus-is
yeggul ar d-yerr tamurt-is
ur ttɣilit ara d lehna i d-wwiɣ ɣer ddunit
yuba yettaru s leɛqel
imiren kan ǧǧan icebbaken-nsen dɣa tebɛen-t
ad dduklent yid-i
ad t-id-tuqmeḍ
neɣ d acu ara nels
anda yella
neckeḍ
ttexfan
yecḍeḥ
tarewla seg ccer ɣer tmura n liser
amek i gan wussan-is ass mi akken tella yid-k
Ɣiwlet ugar
fell-ak iɣeza
tetti-d tafekka-nni tufa mači d yelli-s dɣa terwel s lemɣawla
zgan ḥemmlen-t
amek armi tmeyyzeḍ akken
ad d-asen daɣen
yeṛwa lemrar
nekk d ameɣlal illu-nwen
ad ten-ddment
temmektam-d
netta yalla ixeddem d anemhal deg yiwet n tkebbanit tameqqrant
yuba d baba-m
ili-k d uḥdiq
ahat ad iyi-d-iẓer d taderwict
ad k-ceyyɛeɣ ruḥ qbala
terra-yasen-tent-id
anwa i iṛuḥen yid-m
terra-yas-t-id
tesɛamt tuttriwin-nniḍen
xdem lxir tettuḍ-t
leqdic-is yif leqdic-iw
ur s-treṭṭleḍ ara idrimen-ik s lfayda
Ḥmed d amenḥus
meqqreɣ aṭas ɣef tom
Ẓriɣ anwa iɣelḍen
sebɣent-as-ten
axaṭer akken i tettḥasabem ara tettuḥasbem
zemreɣ ad kecmeɣ
teḥciḍ-iyi-tt
timeḥbas ad rewwlent
axaṭer d ayen iqedsen nezzeh
kullec yefra
iheddeṛ tom
werǧin ad wen-samḥeɣ
inna-asen yiwen n ufellaḥ iffeɣ ad izreɛ
yekker fell-as wawal
d taqbaylit nettat
ur d-ttaseɣ ara assa
Ččiɣ isufar-nni
werǧin i ḥemmleɣ aya
semmḍit wussan iɛeddan
yir zzin terna leɣla
adlis-a d aqdim mliḥ
xaṭi ad xedmeɣ aɛummu
mi ara alin s akantu
s tidet tettamneḍ leḥwayeǧ-nni
d acu i ad teqqaṛemt
ula d nekk
yacuɛa yeɣleb Ɛamaliq akked ugdud-is s ujenwi
kfiɣ yakan učči
aman kan ma ulac aɣilif
ur stehzay ara akken
aqjun-nteɣ d aberkan
saɛid waɛmeṛ yesɛa-d qasi akked massi
weddṛen-tt
anda i tellamt
imensi-nni bnin mliḥ
d kemm i d yemma-s
hebleɣ fell-ak
iberdan regglen
amek i tḥulfam i waya
winna d lweεd
tewwet-iten tkeṛṛust
yexṣeṛ
nniɣ-as acḥal aya belli taqbaylit mazal ɣur-s irgazen
tufam iman-nwen yid-i
wissen ma ad icfu fell-am
ad ak-tt-id-aɣeɣ
amek ihi a tarwa
ikad
yiwen n ttay ttxil-m
tesdub-it tayri
lxilaf ur yelli
allen-iw ttaččarent-d d immeṭṭi
ldimt idlisen-nkent
twalam acmumeḥ-nni
tenɣamt tom
yesbeɣ-asen-ten
aṭas-aya mi m-sumḥeɣ
ma d nekk qenεeɣ
bubbeɣ taẓayt n wussan d teɣzi n wuḍan
ur ten-xeddmen ara deg yimukan i ilaqen akken ur xettren ara
nutni d iqeddacen-iw i d-ssufɣeɣ si tmurt n maṣer
aɣrum ur t-tenǧim temcumt la tettɛettib deg lemsemmen
dɣa sbedden fell-as imeqqranen ara t-iɛetben s lecɣal iweɛṛen
nekk ur ttɣimiɣ ara yid-s
ttsebbireɣ kan iman-iw
awaɣzniw yettekka ɣef useklu
tesbumbxeḍ turin-ik s ddexxan
di teswiɛt-nni kan aqeddac-is iḥla
meqqer maḍi kan
kulec ibeddel di tesweԑt ufrin yuγal d amurḍus
akked wudmawen iqdimen yettwassnen deg tẓuri d yidles n teqbaylit
am wakken diɣ i d-neslul arraz n tɣiwant ara yesqedcen tamaziɣt ugar deg wakal-is
teḥka-ak jida
ad tafeḍ albaɛḍ
ulac win i d-yetḥeqqen seg wayen i d-yeqqar
ay urar n wass-a
ilindi i d-teḍra
yessṛeɣ-iyi-ten
ad sen-tt-fkent
nnan-d tuɣaleḍ d aqbayli n sserbis ɣer tneggura-yi
aḍar-ik d uḍar-iw afus-iw deg ufus-ik
faḍma n at mensur d tiyaḍ
ur s-yerri ula d yiwen n wawal
yuba d aqcic ukyis
teɣriḍ-t armi ifukk
yeddem-itt zgelli
ad teddukleḍ yid-s
taqcict tettwaɛlleq ur teddi ur tebri
uriɣ-as tabrat n sslam
sami dinna i yella
ad t-qeccɛen s aneẓruf
yif-iten mmi ɛzizen
teslemdem-iyi-tt
yuba yettraǧu
qqerṣen akk di tmurt iqerṣen
lḥakem isteqsa-t kečč d agellid n iyahudiyen
d kunwi
fakken-ak-tent
ad t-twansemt
rran-as-ten-id
yuɣ-d yuba aṭas n tbeṣlin
di tesga yebbezwez
ad yurar yid-i
teɛǧeb-as aṭas cbaḥa-s xas akken ciṭ ciṭ kan i tẓerr iman-is deg uceqquf-nni n lemri
ddan armi i kecmen tilisa n tmurt n leqbayel
argaz-nni ifka-as yelli-s sifura i musa
ad tewwet lehwa
wabel
Ḥemmlen-tt merra
Ɣzemt amdun alqayan
msefhament ad iyi-ceggɛent ɣer texxamt n kahina
ifejjij
tesseɣr-it ddunit
d acu i telsiḍ
ad tḥewwseḍ yid-i
nenheṛ armi d boston
ad cekreɣ sut twenza yerran abzim yeflali
tugadeḍ-iyi yak
musa iheddeṛ illu yettarra-as-d si tlemmast n ṛṛɛud
tebḍa-yak-tent-id
nettat ur d-teclig deg wacemma
abeṛṛani ur itett ara seg-s
yeqqar aṭas
ad k-tt-id-awin
mi d-ikcem uday n mmi-m terriḍ iman-im d lmumen
sami daɣen yella d ilemẓi
nekret
meḥsub argaz ad d-yuɣal d tameṭṭut tameṭṭut d argaz
musa yerra afus-is deg iciwi-s mi t-id-ikkes yuɣal ufus-is d amellal am udfel si lberṣ
aqeddac tuɣ-it insa
seṛɣen
ma d lḥila n usɣar i yennul ad tirid s waman
sell
rriḥa-s ad teɛǧeb i umeɣlal
nnan bu lxir yugar fell-as muḥal ad t-iɣurr zzman
ur terni ara aṭas teṭṭarḍaq taluft ɣer uqerrun n zahra
ad awent-tt-id-aɣeɣ
kuferran
acmummeḥ n wudem-is yemlek akk wid mi fuǧent wallen-nsen fell-as
ad kem-yeffeɣ uḥulfu
d lmeɣreb sin d lɛica
igezzem s lmus ur nemsid
ad yili umejjay Ɛmar benassil d imsireg n temlilit-a
rnu snat
war lkaɣeḍ ad ninig
aɛebbuḍ-iw qrib ad yeṭṭerḍeq
acḥal i nudan ad t-nɣen ur t-ufin ara
ula d tamurt tenǧes
yeffeɣ-ikent leɛqel
sellmen
deg-m tezzuzen-yi lmeḥna
snejmaɛen-d fell-as tarbaɛt meṛṛa
iwumi-ak takeṛṛust ma ur tnehher-ḍ ara
armi ibedd ccεer uqerru-iw
awi-d ṣṣeḥḥa kan
brizil d tamurt tameqqṛant akk deg marikan n unẓul
am win i iheddren i uɛeẓẓug
ziɣ tedrewceḍ
yesɛa tawla yuḍen
Ḥemleɣ ad ɣreɣ idlisen
ukren-as idrimen
ziɣ ixuṣ-ik ubulun
efk-iyi cwiṭ n talwit
wali-t kan ad as-tiniḍ d charlie chaplin
tuzen-as-d tabrat
yessawel-asent nutenti ur as-d-rrint ara awal
ddiɣ yid-sen
arut taqbaylit a leqbayel
yettarra iman-is yiwen ur t-yif
d ayen ibanen am yiṭij
ur ẓriɣ ara acḥal ara teswu tkerrust-ihin
ad nemsaɛaf
deg temẓi-w ksiɣ ulli d wakraren
teccelqef-it lmut
timetti tebra i wazalen-is
sliɣ i tezlit teḥzen dɣa ruɣ-d
tettraǧu tameɣra-s s ccuq
wa yeggul wa yeḥnet
nniɣ-as ad iheggi iman-is
teṭṭef addud
ad tt-teǧǧ tmacint
tuzen-awen-d tabrat
ur yeqqers uyeddid ur nɣilen waman
maɛna yettaggad ad d-yeɣli yiḍ
ruḥ ad txiḍeḍ ttqacir i tizit
anda-kem a talwit
yerna ɣur-s uqcic ddurt yezrin
apapas yeččur d lecɣal
dayen yuwi-aɣ wasif d asawen
ttasen-d akk ɣur-s ad t-ciwren
yiwen ur as-iga ccan
tizlatin-is srunt-iyi acḥal n tikal
tuker-it lqaɛa meskin
ddexxan diri-t ineqq
serwet a yamina serwet
yewwet-it s lmus ɣer uqeṛṛuy
yuzen tabrat yettraju tiririt
ddiɣ-as di nneqma
wissen amek gganen yiqettalen
yefka-asent kra n yiwellihen yelhan
mačči d yiwen wugur i d-yebder
warǧin refdeɣ afus-iw ɣer tmeṭṭut-iw
ur zmireɣ ara ad am-d-iniɣ acḥal i kem-ḥemmleɣ
mmekti-d amek i telliḍ zik
d acu dagejdur-a
ur tufiḍ anda ara nerr teḍyeq ddunit
ziɣ teqqerseḍ
yecweḍ wul fell-am
telha tmacahut ma tettfakka s lferḥ
yexḍa-k ccɣel
a taɣyult
ulac i iɣlayen am tudert
ad asen-t-id-ifek
yal anebdu nettruḥu ɣer teftisin n yilel n bgayet
aɣerbaz-nneɣ yezleg
d lweqt i aɣ-ineqqen mačči d nekkni i t-ineqqen
Ẓriɣ aql-ik da a yidir
ugiɣ ad amneɣ s wayen yeḍran yid-i
tura mi yenqes yiẓri-s yuɣal yettlusu tisekkadin
d acu kan ur ẓriɣ ara tadyant ɣef wacu i d-tusiḍ ɣur-nneɣ
rran-t d aɣerbal s rrsas
aɣersiw aɛlayen akk deg ddunit d amdeɣ
tewwet-it nneqra userdun ameɣbun
s waman d ssabun i yessared udem-is
ad yali wexxam
nedda-yasen di nneqma
ur sliɣ ara d acu i d-nnan
tazeqqa-agi ur tesɛa ṭṭaq wala lecqayeq
ziɣ tetnakeḍ
yeswa afenǧal n uyefki
igerrez a tom amek i tettiliḍ
lɛerc n at ɛisi
d acu i izemren ad d-yeḍru yid-sen
akli d agujil s baba-s d yemma-s i ibedden ɣur-s
swiɣ afenǧal n wiski din din ṭfeɣ-d lxiḍ
iḥmel-d wasif
wa yendi wa iqureɛ
irḍel-am-d adlis ad t-teɣreḍ
muqel iman-ik
Ḥader-t win ara awen-yinin lḥeb yif-it ukerfa
a lḥif-ik
ass-agi qqimeɣ deg uxxam
Ḥulfaɣ i yiman-iw am waman deg waman
teltef-iyi yemma iɣil-iw yenneftalen
ttuɣ ur as-tt-in-fkiɣ ara
ula d aferṭeṭṭu icebḥen yella d tawekkiwt
a tiddewt
sawleɣ ulac win iyi-d-yerran awal
Ṭṭezdam-nni i tufiḍ wissen ma n tom
ahil aɣurbiz yečča-t usɣan
anda i tettedduḍ
tefkam aṭas n wazal i yiman-nwen
lmut yiwet ma d ssebbat aṭas
mi d-tusa ɣur-neɣ d acu i aɣ-tenna
ben bella yenna-d "nekni d aɛraben d aɛraben d aɛraben"
amer ittaf ala talwit ara yilin deg ddunit
ass-a uran deg walug n tneɣrit
ur ẓriɣ ara d acu i t-yuɣen
ur iyi-yuɣ ara tanemmirt
yeḍfer sami layla almi d azaduɣ-is
tuker-ikent
tura ad kemmleɣ tamɛayt-nni i d-tebdiḍ ɣef yizem d teɣyult
yettarra-t deg uɛewwiq
yewwet udeffel aṭaṣ aseggas-a
mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ ksiɣ taqeḍɛit n wulli d yizamaren
yiwen ur yettxemmim ɣef lmut
yanna-d tom ur yebɣi ara ad t-ɛiwneɣ
izerfan n umdan ttwarkaḍen yal ass deg tmurt-nneɣ
d kečč i d-yennan awal-agi
nettarra-tt deg uɛewwiq
ansuf yis-k a yennayer
igellil d amdan yettḥulfun diɣen
a mm tqamumt n tyaziḍt
tella tettaɣ teznuzu
iḍelli kkreɣ-d zik
cwiṭ n sser tesɛa-t
ddan-aɣ di nneqma
send kullec ugadaɣ ad ttuɣ awalen
d yiwet n tegzemt m snat n tigawin
muḥemmed buḍyaf nɣant di Ɛennaba
llant dinna yid-s
tezza tasa n tyemmat taqbaylit
yefka-yas abadaṛ
ad neffqent seg-s lemḥayen
a dda Ɛli
tizi Ɣennif nnuɣnan yilmeẓyen deg-s armi i as-semman tizi uɣilif
tameṭṭut cergen akk igerzan-is d tifexsa ad ten-tmerri di tfezza
ddmen-t-id
a dda meqqran
ad ḥarbeɣ ɣef uqerru-iw
ad m-tt-iqeccem ubruri
a mm timmi ad twaliḍ
nekk mmaleɣ-as iberdan netta yettabaε ifran
ad nṛebbi afud i lɛeqqal
tessen arebbi d uniwel
tḥemmel ad tecḍeḥ
a widak yeɣran beddet-asen i yimeɣban zizdeget taswiɛt
a gma ur yetteɣras
tefkam-as ddḥis
di ccetwa ḥemmlen-d yisaffen
yufeg-am uqermud
ad d-yini ayen yellan
akka ara tillim
tekker-iyi tawla almi ttfuḥuɣ
a tafat ur d i-d-tṣaḥeḍ
ad iẓer am akken i tt-nẓer
ttqellibent-iyi
lemmer ḥṣiɣ akka
ur tefhimemt tigert
abrid newwi imi nedderɣel
ur tefhim tigert
yesna tisegnit
yeṭṭukkek uzger s ccna i weɣyul ayɣer yerna
ers ay agellid ad rsent
yal irem tettqabal-it-id yiwet n tmiḍrant
abrid-iw iban-iyi
lemmer kan tettḥezzibeḍ
amek i t-ẓṛan
ad ncerreg tagut
ur yeggan ur yettnudum uqcic-a
a yisem-im mmel-iyi axxam-nwen
ncennu s teqbaylit
tusa-d sɣur kra n yillu
Ḥerrek-itt ad tezḍ
tettaru s tutlayt taqbaylit
yettawi-d isefra s teqbaylit
ad nadiɣ fell-as ad tt-afeɣ
teɛqel-itt temɣart-is tetqelleq
d taqbaylit i d tafat-nsent
Ḥaca tuffɣa ara neffeɣ
ad iwet ɣef teqbaylit
iweṭṭen i tziri
kkaten ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
ssnen amek ara s-lḥun
adfel d amellal
Ḥaca alluy ara nali
tutlayt-is d taqbaylit
nudaɣ fell-asen ufiɣ-ten
teznuzayemt ayefki
Ṭṭef-as afus atan yettemdudduɛ akk
ttwaliɣ deg-k amzun teɛyiḍ cwiṭ d lxir kan
yiwen ur yecliɛ deg wayen i tebɣiḍ ad d-tiniḍ

qqim din ad ak-tent-in-awiɣ
