sɛiɣ amrig
wukud teqqimeḍ
lḥu akken iwata
ur walan acemma
ad iyi-ten-tefk

si zik mi lliɣ da
akka tura ur nestufa ara
deg tlemmast ɣer uzelmaḍ
Ɣez amdun alqayan
ad ččen ad swen
la ttlusuɣ iceṭṭiḍen-iw
bḍan-asent-ten-id
isbehba-ten leεceq
ad tent-tleqqmem
tamεayt teḍra deg boston

ad yeddu yid-kent

aql-i heddreɣ deg tilifu
tuεer-iyi tusnakt

tfuk ɣur-s tsertit
usuɣ akk taṣebḥit

anwa imeddukal-a
d acennay i yella
beddel iceṭṭiḍen
Ɛni ulac deɛwessu
tekcem deg twaturt truḥ
ilaq ad ten-id-tesmektiḍ
mmi d aqcic lɛali
anwa iwimi teččur
Ḥemmleɣ ad ssweɣ tibḥirt
amek i tettwaliḍ amedyaz
ad akent-t-yeɛṛeḍ
ruḥen ad ḥewwsen
nekk xḍiɣ i leɛyudat-agi
ass-nni d awezzeɛ
terriḍ-iyi-ten-id
yella win i yegnen daki
d taserdunt kan i yesεa
terra-yak-tent-id
kemmlet weḥd-wen
yif ciṭuḥ amattar
teṭṭef tarzeft-is
nneɣ
tfakkeḍ-asent-tt
bḍant-asent-tt-id
ur d-yusi ara acku yehlek
cukkeɣ ẓran-aɣ-d
anwa i d-iheddṛen
la ken-sseqdacen
fakeɣ-akent-tent
newjed i rrwaḥ
ugadeɣ fell-ak
teẓuɣer iḍaren-is s sber-nni n yub alammi i tewweḍ ɣer texxamt
deg ukala s wayes yettaɣ amkan di tmetti am wakken daɣen tettekki deg-s tmeslayt
teslam s yisallen
akken ad hemleɣ di ddunit ideg ur telliḍ
rju kan tura ad s-gerrzen taziba

d ta i wumi tsemmaḍ tilelli

a lxir yella wayen tebɣiḍ

Ẓẓaren-d deg-i ala tafekka d wamek ara ɛicen deg-i
iṭij yettali-d ɣef useɛdi d usexḍi
dɛut-as ad d-yuɣal bxir
yal ass ttberrin-d ɣef mmi-s
izger akkin i lebḥer
wissen ma yesla-d i wayen i as-nniɣ
wali kan d acu isen-yegga ddin amcum
taɣbalut yellan teqqur
bɣiɣ d kemm ara t-ixedmen
ilaq ad d-yezg d yiman-is
ur tedduɣ ara yid-k
tikta deg uqerruy am uglaf
yuɣ-am-t-id
abbuh ay at leεṛaḍ tiɣirin i t-id-bbwin
nekk lhiɣ kan i uɛebbi nekk d amerkub n udrum
lɛerc n at yiraten
ala idurar ur nettemlili ara
yecweḍ wul fell-ak
qader iman-ik ad ak-qadren medden
ddiɣ-ak di nneqma
tal tanezzayt ibalmuden ttruḥun s aɣerbaz
tenna-d yelli  "ḥemleɣ-kem"
yenna-d mmi  "ḥemleɣ-k"
tiqcicin ḥemmlent ad urarent ilqafen
allaɣ-is ur as-sseččayen ara ssekker
am unhil yeffren aqerruy-is deg yijdi
awal yuwi-t-id ɣef udlis yura
yugi ad yamen ayen ttwalint wallen-is
tullist taneggarut i uriɣ aṭas i tt-yeɣran

iban ɣef wudem-is yeɛya
tterka tenɣa acḥal n imelyan d amdan
yenna-as nekk ad zbuɣ ma d kečč ad taruḍ 
Ɣuccent anemhal-nsent
win yebɣan yidir yemmet win yebɣan yemmet yidir
ad ak-d-yefk rebbi lxir d rrbeḥ
ssiɣzef asurif ad tawḍeḍ zik
mejjir d imɣi yesseḥlayen aṭan "ccuf-mejjir" 
yettsellim dima tom ɣef yinaragen-is
iminigen ttuɣalen-d yal aseggas ɣer tmurt
yella win ara d-yerren ɣef usteqsi
yugi ad yemlil yid-s
tuker-iken
d kem kan ma mači d kem a wer zwaǧ
dayen akeɛrer fell-i ad k-yehdu ṛebbi
aydi iḥemmel win i t-ixenqen
yugi ad yettu ayen yesɛedda
yeffeɣ ad d-yaɣ taxbizt
qqsent-t tzizwa mi tent-yewweḍ ɣer teɣrast-nsent
yuli ɣef usayes yebda yettakk-d asarag-ines
wa yerbeḥ wa iqucc
anida i tetteddud akka
nniɣ-ak abrid i d-tuwiḍ akka ur yelhi
ayis ur yelli d amellal
mennaɣ i teslit lehna
tacawit d tutlayt mačči d tantala
ur ilaq ara ad kunt-iɣiḍ akken lḥal
gen di talwit a gma xorsi Ḥemza d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ur tessineḍ ara ad turareḍ ddabex
deg-k kan i ttakeɣ laman
tḥettmeḍ fell-aɣ ayen ur nebɣi
caḍeɣ ur swiɣ

ur yezmir ara ad yernu akala afessas
ad iyi-ḥesben dayen selbeɣ akk
lukan ad tt-tennaleḍ d amcum-ik
Ḥkan i d-ǧǧan warrac si meqran bu teɛyunin

ur ttsetḥint ur ttlazament
wa d adlis-nkent
s axxam n baba-s yili
iccuɛben ttexmam yeqruref seg wayen isummet d tissi
anida i llan laɛwanṣer tibḥirin timẓin irden
sirdemt
tettezmumug aṭas tettaḍsa aṭas
dayen i d-yeglan s uḥbas ɣef yikayaden i wazal n tlata n wussan
sbabben-aɣ tacmat tawaɣit
tessikid akin d wakka s tugdi d ufriwes
tesduqqus uḍan-is
ayen i d-tenniḍ akk meqbul
ur nehher ara mi ara teɛyuḍ mliḥ anda tewḍeḍ sgunfu axir
ttxil-m ur zerreb ara deg umeslay ur gziɣ tigert
tsell-as kan mi d as-d-yeqqar alu
awal ur t-id-yuli yebra i wallen-is yerra d akessar
i bniɣ d wi ɛellaɣ yal ṭṭaq deg-s lemri
ad neg amedduḥ
meẓyan yenna-as kker ad nṛuḥ ad zwireɣ zdat-k

asugen-iw yefcel

aqeccaḍ deg tiṭ-ik

teffer ɣef medden ayen ara texdem

anwa ara iyi-isaɛfen s axxam
netta yekkat abendayer ma d ameddakel-is d lɣiṭa

ur ken-yettawi ara yid-s

icennu ɣef tmurt-is
ameddakel-is mi d-yettwali yettu acu ɛebbant tuyat

ur steḥqeɣ ara aɛiwen-ik
d asaḍuf n yidrimen i yesseddawen ddunit

ur yeffiɣ ur yekcim meskin
ad naru tifyar s teqbaylit

a ccmata
ziɣ ahbub
am win yettakken tifaf i ulɣem
aberhuc n tsedda qqaren-as aqlalas

d asfuǧǧeɣ i yesfuǧǧuɣ

icenga ad ffɣen ih neẓra nezmer

d tiyita ur d-nettak idim

ur deɛɛuɣ ur qqaṛeɣ amin

snat n tikkal ayagi i yi-ikellex

tifawtin deg ujerbub ay ṭṭfent
tasedda tetturebba-d deg twacult i as-d-iheggan immal-is d ubrid ara taɣ send ad d-tlal

iggujel baba-s illa
win ur iwwiḍ wawal ayɣeṛ issawal

argaz ur nesɛi tissas mačči d argaz
zeyyed-as
lliɣ ur bɣiɣ ara ad xedmeɣ akken tazwara
sbeggen-d lehhu-k i sidi abṛaham
illu yeṭṭef-aɣ neḍlem
tacennayt-nni tcebbeḥ-d dayen kan mi d-tuli ɣer usayes
xas ad tneṭḍeḍ deg ubeṛnus-iw
tenqeb-it tmedda deg allen
ur tecfi ara ɣef temẓi-s

aql-i yid-k yerna ad k-barkeɣ
ad mḥuɣ si ddunit ayen akk i d-xelqeɣ
ur ssineɣ ara ad xedmeɣ tasertit
syenna yexfa axaṭer iṛfedɛ-it neɣ irfed-it yillu

ur ttlaɛaj ara gma-k
tella tin i yettnezzihen

di leɛnaya-k steqsi walebɛaḍ-nniḍen
err kan tawlaft-im n tidet deg facebook yiwen ur kem-ittcewwil s yiznan
di leɛnaya-k steqsi ḥedd-nniḍen
lemrafi wejden iɣuṛaf ur nǧiṛen
atan gar icangalen
win d-ineṭqen ad iqqen aɣyul
d netta i d-iǧǧan imuwabiyen i mazal ar ass-a
ayɣer i telliḍ weḥd-m
wi tent-illan teqcicin-a
isel i nnda mi ara tekkat
yella win i ixebcen takeṛṛust-iw
nella nleɛɛeb lbalu lehwa tekkat fell-aɣ
nerra-as i sidi ur izmir ara uqcic ad ifareq baba-s
lebḥeṛ ittbibbi lembabeṛ ur iɛeggu
awer ikkes Ṛebbi izem i teqḍiɛt
isfel icbula akked iqweffa
ilaq ad teččeḍ kra n lḥaǧa
di tirga ad yi-d-temlaleḍ
Ṭṭes s ukalṣun ad tennefsusiḍ
werǧin ad ǧǧeɣ aya ad d-yeḍru
tom yeẓra dayen ur t-tḥemmel ara marie

wwet ṭṭbel i win ar a iceḍḥen

akal ɣef i telḥam
awal ittawi-d wayeḍ
afus ayeffus ur igezzem azelmaḍ
yesɣa-yaɣ baba axxam-a mi nezweǧ akken
ur ttɛawaden ara iɣsan tubbwi
zdat-k ad tt-tegzem
tameddit-agi d amrar
fkiɣ-asen kra n yisteqsiyen yerzan idles amatu
samḥemt-iyi ɣef yiḍelli
ktalent tɛaqqayin-is
win yessarmen gemmu i teqbaylit ilaq ad as-yefk ad tečč
am wass-a di lehna ad d-uɣalent
inneḍ yis-neɣ lḥesk
nnan-d nettkukru-ten seg zik
iḥḥesref am asmi i t-tesɛa imma-s
ittak azuɣer am izimer
awi-d kan ad yi-tefkem taqcict ad zewǧeɣ yid-s
ihi ma yeẓra kan lwali ilaq-as ad yehder s taɛrabt
yebda yettmeslay tom
tettzad skud nettemlil
ameɣlal inna-yas d acu akka i txedmeḍ
fhem-iyi ur uksaneɣ ara
ur tebliɛeḍ ur d-tekkiseḍ
ad izwer lɛid s yibbwas
semmḥeɣ deg waḍu n leḥbab
bɣiɣ ad steɛfuɣ azekka
a rrbeḥ a tafat

amek i tt-yessen segmi tella d taselmadt-is
izmawen d imexluqen ihuskayen
ur iyi-tteg ara d aɣilif
Ḥemmlen akk aẓawan
tasdawit akli muḥend ulḥaǧ
qqaren-iyi-d ilaq ad farseɣ imawlan-iw akked d tlelli-inu uqbel ad inigeɣ ɣer win ara iyi-yaɣen
d tidet ayen akka i d-tenniḍ a dda kamal
feṛḥet
deg leɛmer yemmeslay-as-d neɣ yura-as-d taɣawsa yeffɣen ɣef leqraya
deg lawan-nni sima tfuk lmakla
tebɣa ad teṭṭerḍeq ɣer ɣur-s
aya-w ad t-neƐreḍ
d lεib fell-ak a meẓyan
neɣ ṭṭewwileɣ amrar i yiman-iw
bɣiɣ ad ḥerreɣ ṭabla i sin
teɛreḍ ad t-id-tɛezzi maca ifut lḥal
arraw-is akk ṭṭḍen seg idmaren-is
maziɣ d amedya gar-asen
tettɣawaleḍ deg wučči
ar wanwa i s-tesliḍ
azen-iyi ar dina
kra yekka yiḍ ur qqineɣ tiṭ-iw
acku nɛeṭṭel
sliman u muḥ yebra i tiziri tagawawt
sin akkin kemmlen hedren ɣef yisental-nniḍen am leqraya
iqsed ad yaweḍ lebɣi-s ama ass-a ama azekka
a-t-an ḥewsen
aqemmuc aɣezfan ddarɛ aquran
bɣiɣ tateffaḥt
fkan-tt tezwzǧ ar lɛerc n at menṣuṛ
saɛid u muḥ yennermes tiziri tagawawt
yekkat s leɛjlan
mmeslay-as-d kan amek ara yexdem ttawil i yiman-is ɣas alukan ula deg leqraya
asafag atan yettrusu-d
mačči d amkan anda ara tkecmeḍ s lqahwa
ad ččeɣ abbaɣ-nwen
anwa ara yessiwḍen taninna ɣer uɣerbaz
anwa asif i yeɣezzifen yakk di japun
champagne ma ulac aɣilif
igḍaḍ ttafgen s yiferrawen-nsen
anwa wigi d iqbayliyen
maziɣ d massi ɣas mačči d yiwet n taɣult i ḍeffren
uɣaleɣ ḥemmleɣ-t
asaḍuf ur tesεi lehna tettlal-d s lxeff tettmettat s lxeff
bɣiɣ akteṛ n yedrimen
gzem tgeggar n uẓalim rnu-as kra n wafriwen n felyu
aqqel-ik deg tesdawit
cukkeɣ llan tɣawsiwin i yeẓṛa tom nekk ur tent-ẓṛiɣ ara
amkan-a d uɣris
d nekk ay diri
ansi k-d-yekka umḍelliw-a
bɣiɣ ad ẓṛeɣ melmi ara d-yuɣal tom
hrawit tuyat-ik
teqqen ɣer tlelli-ines
iserwula udren ad ẓuɣuren ikanicen
asmi nella meẓẓiyit netturar di tlemmast n ubrid ur necliε
itett yidir aṭas timellalin
ula d netta ad as-tiniḍ da i yezdeɣ
akken tebɣa ad d-tenṭeq belɛen-as wawalen
d acu i tteɛṛaḍen ad xedmen tom akked mary
Ɛeqel-it tunefeḍ-as
Ɛeddi ad teččeḍ imi yeḥma wučči
Ḥbes ur ttxeẓẓiṛ ara
kra d azway kra d acraw kra d alqaḍ
aqjun-nneɣ d aferḍas am widak-nni n ṣyada
tattales-as-d amek tella txeddem
yeččur uqcic-a d leɛqel
s draɛ i d-yejmeɛ iman-is akken ad d-iffeɣ seg wussu
ula d imddukal-is mi ara as-d-ttalaɛin ur asen-itterfad ara
suref-iyi maca ur sutreɣ ara aya
amek i s-qqaṛen i baba-k
wwten-asent afus yemferrǧen
yettban d akken sliman u muḥ ad yettru
at-an yuli atan yuṭer yerra-tt i lweεd uḥewwes
d acu i yeḥwaǧ yidir ɣur-i
zeddlent tyuẓaḍ
leḥmala d anadi n sseɛd n wayeḍ
d acu i tennam
imdel allen-is acemma am win yebɣan ad yerwel i ɛeggu i t-yurzen
rret tawwurt
teččam imensi neɣ mazal
yewwet-itt-id ɣef uḍar almi d axxam
d aya i yi-selken
iswahem-iyi awal i d-yefka tom

Ɛewnemt-iyi
iḍelli ssneɣ-d yiwen seg isegbaren mucaεen akk di ddunit
amek ara seɣtiɣ tuccḍiwin n tira s teqbaylit di libreoffice
cukkeɣ tettwakellexeḍ
limer ad aɣ-iserreḥ zzman ad d-naru alef isefra
ugment-d si tala

anwa aqcic ur nezṛi ara belli tutlayt taqbaylit tekcem deg tussna
iserkeb-itt baba-s f userdun
lliɣ ttedduɣ d yiwen
txedmem ccɣel-nwen

melmi ara tekfuḍ ccɣel-ik
tareqqaqt

tewḍeḍ anda ur wwiḍent tid nniḍen

amek i tesɣar
awi-tt txedmeḍ yes-s i tebɣiḍ

wid akk iyi-d-ittqerriben

tsemma i uqcic-nni cimɛun yeɛni win i d-isellen

ur tḥeqqeɣ ara maḍi maḍi
werǧin sliɣ-as yeskerkes
mazal theddreḍ d yiman-ik
agellid-nni tecɛel deg-s tmes
ur iyi-ttaǧǧa d agujil
yuba d baba-tkent
terriḍ-asen-t-id
yeṭṭarḍaq useklu
iban ad yexser kan
uggadeɣ ad as-d-nɛiwed seg lqaɛ ma tkemmel akka
teknuneḍ deg uǧilbab-is aberkan am twemmust n yiceṭṭiḍen kan i d-tettban mebɛid
lemmer ad d-iɛeggeḍ ɣur-i ad s-d-sleɣ axaṭer nekk d bab n ṛṛeḥma
iḥder sɣuṛ bu qeḍran werǧin d aẓidan
taẓayt n uɣyul tixidas n wuccen
sers-d kullec ɣef ṭṭabla
ur d-ufin ara tom
ad iyi-tseɛef
ddan-d yid-k
ula d nettat teldi-yi-d ul-is myelsen yimanen-nteɣ
yuba yenɣa mary
tzemreḍ ad truḥeḍ
urgaɣ lliɣ d ayis
yella diɣen umusebbel
ur yeqriḥ ḥedd usennan ala aḍar yeddan ḥafi
rdan-t di lbaṭel
isers ifassen-is fell-asen mbeɛd iṛuḥ syenna
ad tent-id-yekkes
dγa feqqeεen leḥwat imi ayen akken ḥwağen ur d-yeddi ara
win yebɣan ad iṛuḥ iṛuḥ
Ɛni ilaq ad ṛuḥeɣ
tɛerḍeḍ
ur yesɛi ara imdukal iman-is kan i yettili
taqcict-nni ixedmen am urgaz i asen-selleɣ qqaren deffir-i
yiwen ur yelli da
bḍan-akent-ten-id
a tent-wehhin akka d wakka zdat n umeɣlal
qqaṛen-am tiziri
ad tt-tesseɣliḍ
nɣan-ten ayɣer
mbeɛd imudd asfel-nni n ugdud
bɣiɣ mary
yiwen n wass ad d-yuɣal alamma d da
tḥeqqeɣ dayen kan
i tura mi d-tiwim taqbuct-a acu ara txedmem yis-s
lwaldin am lexrif ass-a llan azekka ulac
anwa i d-ihedṛen
mmi ɛzizen yuẓam
yeɛṛeḍ yuba ad iyi-ssuden
ur iyi-cellef maḍi wayen yakk i d-cennun
teqqim ɣer tama-s
wissen ma d nettat i t-yerran s axxam

yuba d anelmad n tesnawit
ur ilaq ara ad yili wayagi gar-awen
abrid ameẓyan

tanemmirt

idinuzuren negren wigi i aɣ-iḥekmen ala
yeggul jmaɛ liman
tesɛam aqjun
teṭṭef-itt tawla n tlata n wussan
iwwi xemsa seg watmaten-is iqeddem-iten i ferɛun
tlata wussan-ayagi nekni d anadi fell-ak
sebɣent-iyi-t
ssewweɣ-d imensi i yiḍ-a

susem ur d-ttader izerfan-im

ad tt-seggment
nehṛent

Ẓriɣ tura anwi i d lejdud-iw
tura i d-mmektan
tettawi tettara deg ugnir am tin yettawin lxiḍ deg uẓeṭṭa
anida i llant tudrin i ṣeffḍen yimeṭṭawen

dɣa uɣalen ɣer tmurt-nsen seg ubrid-nniḍen
ad tettettem ayen ara d-yefk wakal-nwen
rran-iyi-tt-id
weḥd-i i lliɣ da

ur qqaṛemt i yiwen

anṣuf ɣer ustṛalya

d acu i kem yuɣen
anda i tettarum
cukkeɣ yella kra i yeẓṛa tom nekk ur t-ẓṛiɣ ara
err-iyi-d awal
kcem ihi
fket-as ad yečč d amenzu
feṛḥeɣ i mi ifukk wurar-nni
aya urǧin yeḍra
aqjun-a am llufan
heḍṛeɣ-as i yelli

anwa abrid i yessuffuɣen
cukkeɣ d tikerkas
lliɣa ttɛummuɣ deg ugelmim-a
d akeddab

ur myagaren ara di leɛmer
iruḥ
mawa aḥebber ur yenfiɛ

ur skiddibemt ara
aserwal bu tfawtin
d tucbiḥt armi d ulamek
teddun-iyi di nneqma
yugi ad yidir deg tmurt-is
ilaq i as-txemmemeḍ uqbel ad d-teḍru
texdeɛḍ-iyi ad k-yexdeɛ rebbi
yeḥfa yimru n uldun deg tira
yufa-tent-id ssirident udmawen-nsent s ssabun
teddam-aɣ di nneqma
yettaker i yimeɣban
ini-as ma ur yuḍin ara
azekka ulac amahil
d amɣid seg wasmi i d-ikker leɛmer i inuda ad yerbeḥ
yegzem afus-is s lmus
teddunt-aɣ di nneqma
ma nniɣ-ak yessen ad yehder d ayen yellan
teddun-awent di nneqma
ttuɣ ur awent-tt-in-fkiɣ ara
d yiwen n uqcic yettsetḥin
ay udem n uḥuli
s tayri i tettmeslay taqbaylit
ruḥen-t ɣer tusda uẓekka
ur teḥwaǧeḍ ara ad teskiddbeḍ
anda akka i terriḍ
yečča ifelfel aqeṛḥan
anda i teǧǧa taqenduṛt-nni
ttnadiɣ fell-akent ufiɣ-kent
s teqbaylit i tettxemmimem
ad ffɣen seg uxxam
ur awen-yebni ara axxam
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat-iw
tasentanalt
bɣiɣ ad rebḥeɣ seg tudert-iw
txeddmem ɣef teqbaylit
ad yelmed tutlayt taqbaylit
Ḥemmleɣ tutlayt-iw taqbaylit
s teqbaylit i ttwaṛebbaɣ
yettaru akken iwata taqbaylit
tura qqareɣ-aswin iḥemmlen tamaziɣt yeldi ablug
anda i yeǧǧa tafṛuxt-nni
tusa-d sɣur rebbi
s teqbaylit i ttwaṛebban
s teqbaylit kan i tettzuxxuḍ
tutlayt-nteɣ d taqbaylit
nsureg-asen i waman
yefka-yawen abadaṛ
deg usegzawal nessissin-d awalen
anwa ara iseɣtin tuccḍiwin-nni
nettcemmiṛ iɣallen-nteɣ
iḥuss-as tom yefṛeḥ
meqqṛen-d s teqbaylit
yemla-asent d acu ara xedment
ur yi-teǧǧam ara ad t-waliɣ
nekkat ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
yeddem-it tom
ttargun s tutlayt taqbaylit
bɣiɣ ad meslayeɣ kra yid-k mi ara tesεuḍ kra n lweqt
anda i teffeɣ teqcict-nni
neẓṛa dacu i nxeddem
mliɣ-awen d acu ara txedmem
icuba ar tata yettbeddil ini akken tella tegnit
yemla-iyi-d d acu ara xedmeɣ
ttcemmiṛent iɣallen-nsent
theblemt ɣef teqbaylit
ilaq ad nettqadar dima asaḍuf

asuddes
bɣiɣ ad tbeddel tudert-iw
d lawan ad tkecmemt
ur ak-yebni ara axxam
tebɣiḍ ad tkesbeḍ imelyaṛen
tazdayt tugar tadmayt
lxetyar-iḍen ur t-tesεiḍ
tutlayt-nsen d taqbaylit kan
tbeccem aserwal-nwen
anta ara iseɣtin tuccḍiwin-nni

ugin azaglu
tberrumt i yimeẓẓuɣen-nkent
deg wass mi i m-ldiɣ ul-iw

yezzi wallaɣ-iw

teksa tyaziḍt d yicillawen-is
zgiɣ tedduɣ f uḍaṛ
d agris d ɛawaz n ctawi
yella kra i wumi selleɣ
cennuɣ-kem deg tizlatin

ddunit d lmaɛira
anta i yellan dihin
zik yeshel ad d-tessufɣeḍ tasfift
anda tettiliḍ
tečča lbaṭaṭa d tmellalin

am akken ad s-tdum temẓi-w
s lqis tezgiḍ-d i lxaṭer-iw
iddukel umnay d uterras
yuɣ-itt mkwemmda
am wass-a di lehna ad d-nuɣal
kra i yellan yexmet yuki-d s ufus-im

d kečč i t-iluɛjen
awal yuɣal d asefru
nettwanneḍ nettwattel
yella daki win i izemren ad yi-iɛawen
yella walebɛaḍ i yellan di beṛṛa
tom yesṭuqut awal
d wayen i iɛeddan
ttqellibeɣ kra n weqrab i tmeṭṭut-iw
ad t-neǧǧ i uzekka
akka ara ɣ-deqqimen
anga teddiḍ lḥu
aɣerabu-nni ideg d-yedda yemderkal yufa-d teftist
anta i yecfan fell-asent
d acu i yi-d-yeǧǧa iḍelli

tom iɣucc mary
ass-n ara tiniḍ
amek i ak-gan wussan
ad tafeḍ d kra n yiwet i t-yeǧǧan daki
tettɛawad-d teqsiṭ-nni
tom isebbel mary
tettaru akken iqwem
akken ad aɣ-d-lhun wusan
yenna-d tom telluẓem
d tiyita n uwanek i iga gayed Ṣaleḥ
yussem mliḥ tom anaɣ
am terṣaṣt seg lfuci
ay nudaɣ deg imeslayen acḥal ɛawdeɣ d asefru
sɣiɣ-d abellarej ɣas akken ɣlayit
ur tecfimt ara ɣef temẓi-nkent

inehheṛ tom s ttawil
iεgeb-iyi uqjun-ik

iqḍeɛ-as layas

aqessis d amrabeḍ n yimasiḥiyen
tegguǧ taffa s aqettun
iwala itran deg uzal qayli

nnan-d yemmut s fad yiwen umsebrid deg twilayt n wadɣaɣ
qqimem akken ur ttḥerrikem ara akk
zgant ttargunt rrbeḥ
sεiɣ yiwet
myagreɣ iḍelli d lwiza
bab n ṣṣenɛa d sselṭan
a wid ur nqebbel ara lɛib
ih d leεǧeb d ayen ur tettamneḍ
ttɣaman yal ass deg uxxam
thenna deg uxxam-is
ur nwiɣ ara bɣant ad ddunt
tmeεneḍ mačči d kra
anda akka i s-tebram i mmi
anda yella uḥbib n lebda
twejdeḍ i tmukrist i d-iteddun
ferrej lfilm tekkseḍ ɣef ul-ik
ur tecfiḍ ara ɣef temẓi-k
serreḥ-iyi ad am-serrḥeɣ
zgan ttargun rrbeḥ
ass-n deg yideflawen

lsan-d iserwula d izeggaɣen
ansa i d-kkant tlawin-nni
tella kra n yiwet i tebɣiḍ ad twaliḍ
swem kra n ttay
yewwi-ken-d cennegnagi
ikker i teslent s umger
mi ara d-teḍilleḍ a tiziri
yeshel ad teẓreḍ iwacu

a muḥ a muḥ kker ma ad tedduḍ ad nruḥ

yiwen ur am-d-isell

yessebṛaḍ ibẓaẓ

igen ɣef udekkan
rwin-as akk tudert-is

ur nezwiǧ ara
ruḥ s urti
ur ḥemmleɣ ara ad iliɣ weḥd-i
iban mačči d ayen i kem-yecqan
efk aɣrum i iẓawaliyen

yigellil gar watma-s

ur yelli ideg ara tessetḥiḍ
yella win i iwalan kra n tɣawsa
meqqṛit wanzaren-is
tḥemmleḍ-iyi
ziɣ mazal nenger
lukan xir i rniɣ ṣebreɣ ciṭuḥ
lmut tettawi d tirni
ur tḥemmlemt ara tusnakt
iɣṛa di demyaṭi
isura western ttawin-d ɣef umezruy n marikan
ileḥḥu d uɣiwel
ass-agi ula d menwala yettmeslay
ukren-iyi ssaɛa-w
yezga yettargu rrbeḥ
ajernan gar ifassen yettaṭṭaf-it meqlubi
yella kra n yiwen i yemmuten
nniɣ-as yella kra i ẓriɣ
aɣedluj d iqcer ibawen neɣ ujilban
ma d arraw-im yis-sen i tbedd lezzayer
muḥal ad iɛṛeq wudem-im
qqlen ar deffir i meṛṛa
deg tmucuha inisi i iḥeṛcen ɣef uccen
akka i d-iffeɣ lexbar
heddṛen akk medden ɣef tsertit
ur netḥeqq ara s tidet
llan wid yeqqaṛen tinijwal i tujjal
tezgiḍ tettḥewwiseḍ ar tmurt-nni
sarameɣ ad sɛun ixxamen yelhan
Ṛṛay-iw d ahwawi
mi tbaɛdeḍ beɛdeɣ fell-am
ur yeǧǧi amkan
yettban-d tom d ameẓẓyan
ay ul-iw yebɣan tigi
yeffeɣ-d seg wissen ansi
inna-as a tabrat n wul-iw
Ččiɣ kra n tfirest
icennu "a tamurt-iw" syin yeqqar "awi-d lviza ad nruḥ"
ajeğğiḍ win i t-yeṭṭfen
tuli tekriṭ s tseddart
s lbeɛd am n-hduɣ slam
anef-iyi i ɛawaz nnumeɣ
ugadeɣ ad yi-tettu ah ya ddin qessam
yeswa idammen n tyaẓiḍt-nni
inwa di lexla ay nsiɣ
zreɛ Ṛebbi ad d-issemɣi
ukren-iyi apaspuṛ-iw
ad k-d-awiɣ ayen ara teččeḍ
sɛiɣ allen d tizegzawin
anda terziḍ ad talseḍ
ittagad tili-s
ad cfuɣ ɣef lecɣal-nsent
ad nemẓeṛ kra n wass

iḥemmel ad inadi deg aman
yella kra i m-d-yuzen tom
wehmeɣ melmi ara yebdu usaru-nni
ay abrid i d aɣ-icfan
tḥeqqeɣ belli ɣelṭen-t
tamacint tεeṭṭel assa s εecra n ddqayeq
ur zmiren ad xedmen ula d kra nniḍen
Ḥemmleɣ tudert
ma yella smaḥ i taggara
urant-asen tabrat iḍelli
takarikaturt d unuɣ i d-yettawin s uɛekki ɣef kra n taluft neɣ uneḍru
ilaq-aɣ wurar n scrabble s teqbaylit
anta ara yeddun
ur nesεi ara ẓẓher
siwa tissirt n nndama i d-yegran tezzaḍ deg-i
bɣiɣ ad k-id-sleɣ tettsuɣuḍ
tella tin i yessnen mmi-s
yettban-d meẓẓi tom
yefka-yas tom aṣelliɛ i mary
nnan-d d acu yeḍran
ad tɛeddi ad tesker dacu ara ččen warrac
tella kra n tɣawsa i tebɣam
amek tebɣiḍ timellalin-nni-inem
amkan anda i rriɣ
bɣiɣ ad ḥewwseɣ ar marikan
atan yessirid takeṛṛust
yezmer ad d-ibin lḥal yessewham
ar ass-a ur tufan

ad iṣṣer Ṛebbi tameddit
d uḍuḍ af leḥyuḍ
immečč d amuddir
ur tt-ttlaɛaj ara
ur nwiɣ ara tebɣa ad tečč
ad imyeḥmaẓ ad yeǧǧ abrid
ay aɣṛib-iw uɣal-d
Ẓẓher i sɛiɣ
aruy d aɣersiw-nni bu isennanen imeqqranen
azrem muhabet lḥaṛa-s
ur tt-ttlaɛajet ara
Ḥemmleɣ amek akken tettedduḍ
ssencew allen-im fell-as
yettemyeḥmaẓ amzun d tawekka
ttemyeḥmaẓeɣ i yiman-iw
sselsen-as lqecc i uḥallum-nni
yečča ula d aɛwin-is
ssnen-tt akk medden
truḥem gefgafi
izmer ad yexdem annect-a tom neɣ xaṭi

d itran i t-ittwanasen
aql-ikent ḥaca iman-nkent
ruḥ a gma ldi-d allen-ik
yella ḥedd ara ɣ-d-imagren
ad k-nraju i tikkelt-nniḍen
menyif xir ma tessusmeḍ
zik qqaren win iḥemmlen tamaziɣt yissin tira-s
ssneɣ-tt ẓriɣ d acu i tebɣa
ur d-mezgeɣ ara nekk d yinaragen-iw
iban ɣef wudem-is yeskiddib
yuɣ-asen-d baba-tsen iserwula
mazal lxir ɣer sdat
anwa seg-wen ara d-yalin ɣer tfelwit

iteddu yettaḍsa
tamacahut tettrebbi imdanen
tehriruc d yiwen weqcic amectuḥ ḥemlen warrac iqbayliyen
yettarra-tt kan i tɣuri n yidlisen

ur walaɣ ara anda yeffeɣ tanezzayt-a

wwten-t almi i d-yenna
mi yeɛya yeqqim fell-as ad yesgunfu
msefhament
berka
ulac aṭas n yimeɣriyen yeqqaren taqbaylit
xeddmen ttaznen-d idrimen ɣer tmurt
nek ɣur-i yif ad xedmeɣ lxiṛ wala ad ẓalleɣ
ddunit mecṭuḥet tudert wezzilet
bɣiɣ ad ɣreɣ s tmeslayt-iw
yunef-as ad tɛeddi
tzemreḍ ad iyi-tkelḥeḍ tikkelt mačči sin n yiberdan
Ɣef wudem-is iban yeskiddib
ay ibekki
yessuter tom deg mary ad tneɣ john
tewwet-iyi tefremlit tissegnit
Ḥemmleɣ ad lemdeɣ tutlayin tiqbuṛin
ad iyi-t-id-ifek
yuḍen sawraɣ ass mi d-ilul
ffeɣ ur k-ẓerreɣ ara
yemceḥ aɣebbar
akken i tturaren ddiminu tal tameddit
seg wass-nni ibxes-it rebbi yerra-t d ifker
Ɛeddan semmus n yiseggasen seg wasmi i nezwej
Ɣas akken tecmet yella win i tt-iḥemmlen d akli
uwḍen-d yimuras n tegrest
Ḥemmleɣ taɣlalt deg umrij
urgaɣ sɛiɣ dderya yid-m
wissen ma tḍeɛfeḍ cwiṭ
yezgel lɣerḍ
wa izerreε wa imegger
fkiɣ-asent umlan yelhan
mi d-teffeɣ seg tesdawit abrid i as-yehwan taɣ-it
ass n ssuq d ass n temlilit d tukksa n lxiq
yusa-d ɣur-i ufremli yesteqsa-yid ɣef tezmert-iw
aki ur ggan ara
ur sliɣ ara
igmaḍ n umahil aɣurbiz n yuba gerrzen
Ɣer taggara n temsirt nettaru alugen
tom yessuter deg marie d acu i tebɣa
mi n-usan ɣur-wen d acu i awen-nnan
katya bengana tettwanɣa zdat n weltma-s
azegḍuf d yiwen n yimɣi iteqsen
Ɛmer umuḥ yessexdam arrac n taddart-is di tessirt
kra yekka wass netta d ixeddim
tzemreḍ ad trajuḍ
ay udem n taɣaṭ
aman-agi d agris
ul-is yeldi-t akk i medden
ddayxa tɛawed i wudem-is
yejɣem kan tijeqqimt n lqahwa ldint-d wallen-is

ad ittu uṛumi tabzert
iberru i yimeẓẓuɣen-is
yeldi yiwet n tpizzirya deg iɣil-uɛeẓẓug
ttḥussuɣ iman-iw ɛyiɣ
arma tnuda tufa
tella kra n yiwet i s-iluɛan i tom
nebɣa kra n tɣawsa tamaynutt
ad kem-tt-walliɣ
lliɣ ur nwiɣ ara ad yesεu kra n txutert
yenna-yas ziɣ Ɛmer zzahi d aqbayli
aṭas n iberdan i iwessiɛen
i d-yegra ɣur-k ass-a
bɣan ad ṛebbin iwtal
ahat tesliḍ kan yes-neɣ
ad m-d-ḥkuɣ ayen i yi-yuɣen
ad ruḥen wakali
ad teqqerṣ teɛrurt-ik
ilaq-iyi ad kent-agadeɣ
leǧruḥ ad-ten-id-sakiɣ
Ẓewret awit-d iman-nwen
syin yessawel-d i yiwen n lǧar-is yeččuren d nneyya daɣ am netta
sawel-as di leɛnaya-k
d ayen ur nettneḥsab
tella kra n tɣawsa i tufam
yesla i leɛyaḍ deg uxxam-nni
ulayɣer nettru tura mi teḍra
ahat ur tezmireḍ ad thedreḍ d tom
yeẓṛa belli ur tenfiɛ ara tsertit
aṭas i yi-tgiḍ leɣruṛ
s jmaɛliman i ttgallan zik
isfel-it cciṭan
Ẓẓher-iw isem-is fiḥel
iffeẓ cclaɣem-is
dayen si tuzzya-m ɛyiɣ
adrar n yisek yezga-d deg usammar n bgayet
yella ḥedd i yeṭṭfen amkan-iw
d aẓar-nni i tt-iḥemmlen
tewweḍ tyerza s aḥdid
ad neqqel ad nɣenni fell-am s lehduṛ wid-ak yelhan
yessen ad isker seksu
Ẓriɣ dadda-k ussan-a iεeddan
Ԑreḍ kan ayen nniḍen axir-ik
tzemreḍ ad d-teẓṛeḍ
drus n tefyar i yellan
- nnan-d tettusṭaxreḍ
drus i d-yeggran
yefka-yas tom rrkel i mary
a ṣṣut-iw rzu fell-as
ur yi-ttargu ma teṭṭseḍ
mazal ɣur-k i yella ssiwan n tom
assa ur semmeḍ ara lḥal am yiḍelli
dɣa d jean i yuraren deg umkan-is
yekkat ubeḥri
ad tiliḍ tesliḍ kan yes-sneɣ
iɣli yizi s iɣi
bɣant ad ččent seksu
melken-ten lehyuf
aha kker zwi iman-ik
aṭas ara yecnun
akken ibɣu yilli
tezla xemsa n tyuẓaḍ
seṛqem-as iḍudan
ttwaɛerḍeɣ ɣer tmeɣra
akken ad d-beggsen ɣer lfetna
cfant-d i ṭṭrad iɛeddan
izmer ad d-tas
laɛi-yas s tilifun di leɛnaya-k
Ɣer temɣer-is Ɛeṣṣad yuɣal d islamẓri s ucamar
ar melmi akka ara kkatent nneḥ
deg iqiḍunen kan i ttɛicin
s lemɣiḍa ṭṭalaben lqut
sskeṛ diri-t i tuɣmas
din i k-yetraju wexxam
ttbut ur t-sεiɣ
ttṛuḥun ar ssinima yal ssmana
ceɣleɣ
yella kra n yiwen i tettṛajuḍ
Ẓerfed taderkunt
ur zmireɣ ad rnuɣ ad s-ṣebreɣ
zzem kan iman-ik
ad nfaṛes ad nemlil
sizdeg taxxamt-im
beṛka-kent imenɣi di leɛnaya-nkent
aql-iyi mebla axeddim
mebla ma tkerseḍ anyir
yella kra i tesraḥayemt
ad kem-rreɣ tettzuxxuḍ yess-i
derreɛ allen-im
txaq fell-as
qqaren-as aɛrur neɣ azagur neɣ tiwwa
tefka-yas kra n tuttriwin maca yegguma ad d-yerr
tezga tettɣama ar ṭṭaq
Ṭṭef-iyi-d amkan akka
sqenɛent meṛṛa
ur bɣiɣ ara ad tuɣaleḍ ar boston
Ɣas ru ay iẓri-w
acḥal n medden i yi-iččan
d arṭayan tom
lsant-d iserwula d izeggaɣen
ur ssinen ara leṣlaḥ-nsen
zgiɣ ḥemmleɣ tuccfa
ajlal yif lɛelf
ileḥḥu bellegdis
nekk ḥemmleɣ aselmad-iw n tmaziɣt akked win n teglizit
yella kra i ken-icewwlen
nnan ḥṛam ɣef tmeṭṭut ad teddem agiṭar
a win iddren ad am-yales
d wayen ɣef̣ i ɛetbeɣ
ur yennum ara yetteffeɣ deg iḍ
ur keččmeɣ ara ɣer lḥebs d amelsi i lliɣ
tella kra n yiwet i d-yusan
aṭas n usisnu i d-yemɣin
yiwen n uẓar nekk yid-s
uran-as tabrat iḍelli
beddlent teswiɛin
am win ur nesɛi ara bab
tuget n yizerfan n wemdan ur ddin ara d usɣan n tneslemt
dayen ɣas ini fukken imɣaren n taddart
talwaḥt teḥwaǧ aṣenṣal
d imeɛfan i ifuken aman
yeɣli-d ṭṭlam
akken telliḍ i teswiḍ
yella walebɛaḍ i d-yeɣṛan tura
fsi-yi lqid ad sent-fsiɣ
ur d-yegri ara k-d-yessukkes yiwen
werǧin gganeɣ ugar n snat n sswayeε
yemmut weɣyul deg uqeṛṛuy-is
iɛedda am nnda
ad d-ggalleɣ ar aql-ik teqqareḍ-as wissen amek ileḥḥu
berrunt i yimeẓẓuɣen-nsent
yesɛa ccṛab
ad cfuɣ fell-awen
ad suɣeɣ ddaw tmedlin ah ya ddin qessam
Ɣlayit tkeṛyas
leswaq ččuren d nneɛma
ur ssineɣ ara akya tasertit
aql-aɣ deg uxxam
Ɛni tsawlem
Ẓečč tadxent
tella tin i yettmuqqulen tom
dɣa yerfed kratis taɛekkazt-is s igenni iṣemmek-as i ubuqal-nni yerreẓ
uriɣ-as tibratin
teffeɣ-d d tidet
teḍra yid-sen am tom d jerry
qrib d lawan n usaɣur
ddeqs i nurar ileqqafen
kul wa ayen iẓda ad t-yawi
awal d aḥerfi
ayen yebɣu yenna-t-id ur t-ttamen ara
am kečč daɣen akked ufennan ifazen
tɛeddaḍ tilas
Ɛuhdeɣ-kem am uzal am yiḍ
ad teqqimeḍ ɣer imensi
tella kra n yiwet i yukren apaspuṛ-iw
idda yas di lebɣi
Ɣelqem allen-nwen
afem-d amcic-nni
nniɣ-as ahat akken i yella lḥal
Ɣer deffir yegra lefḥel
ad teɣṛeḍ di tesdawit n bgayet
yeɛreq yixf-is
yers lbuṛ ɣef cceɣl is
zznad n tmekḥelt ifcel
axṣim ad s-d-tizdig teswiεt
srid seg toronto
ad ak-yini kker ad tt-id nesker
d tagi i tarewla ɣef gma-k
iɛac lesnin ussan ttin lebɣi-s yeɛreq
ass-a dayen ndeklaweɣ
ur ttarra ara iman-ik tessneḍ-iyi
ay iṭij rujaɣ ad d-teffleḍ tuyseḍ
yewwi-ten-id cennegnagi
amek i teẓriḍ acḥal zur
teqqes-it tɣirdemt yeswa paracetamol
anda akken ufiɣ leḥbab-iw
qwem taxxamt-nni
ay aḥlili argaz ur yelli
Ẓriɣ ad tt-ifhem
nwant telha tsertit
amek zemreɣ ad d-ssadreɣ tawlaft deg usmel-ik
anda ara tṛuḥeḍ tameddit-aki
aql-aɣ nhedder ɣef nndama
ur nnumeɣ ara tteffɣeɣ deg iḍ
aḥeffaf ur yelli deg temdint-nni
Ǧǧiɣ amawal-is deg wadda
zwin-tt kksen-as ammus
ur ihenna ara deg uxxam
ur texdimeḍ kra n diri
ini at yeḥya musa mačči wad qsaṛi
bɣiɣ ad waliɣ udmawen-nsen
gguniɣ abrid ansi ara d-tekkeḍ
i wass-a mi yi-d-thesseḍ
tzemreḍ ad tṛuḥeḍ
beẓẓed-iyi abrid
anwa meṛṛa ara yeddun
Ḥeṛcen yibekkan
tom d afenyan
aẓar ittabaɛ tara
d Ṭawes Ɛemruc i tameṭṭut tamezwarut yuran ungal deg lezzayer
tḥeqqeɣ belli ɣelṭen
yiwen ur s-yesli
ziɣen meskin yeɣli
thedder qejmuri
teqqerṣeḍ seg userwet
ur tteḥṛiṛit ara
tella kra n yiwet i itetten
d kečč i yi-d-iluɛjen
tom yettḥeqqiṛ mary
yella kra i yesfeqɛen tom
tteffɣen imnayen akken ad d-fdun wid akk yettwaḥeqren ɣas ma ur ten-ssinen
yefka-tt i jjiḥ weqcic-nni
Ḥukk-as taẓunẓut
rwi timellalin-nni
at rrebrab d at tkerkas ad ɛebbṛen
yella win i tebɣiḍ ad twaliḍ
ilaq ad txemmemeḍ kan am nutni ma ulac ad k-nɣen
at tmurt-is gezren-t am yiḍan
yekkes fell-as sser
a dda yidir anda ara nidir
akken ur d iyi-ttixiṛen ara
beddlent tegnatin
takadimit mačči d almus unadi deg tutlayt
armi i yi-ifuten i d-ukiɣ
ay ul yebḍan ɣef sin
mary akked tom fehhmen tafṛansist
yella ḥedd i wumi tebɣiḍ ad teɣṛeḍ
di ccfayat-iw tzedɣeḍ
yella ḥedd i yukren ṭṭezḍam-iw
ma ttuɣ tuqqda n leɛmer-iw
tenwa d akanic ara tt-yerren d taṛumit
Ɣef ayen aken cuddeɣ awal-iw
leɛtab i ttneḥsab
ur tḥemmel ara tusnakt
xdem ayen akk tzemreḍ akken ad s-tanfeḍ
ulac aḥric n tmerrit deg lezzayer
yemmela-yas lkil umehraz
iɛemmed ad teḥazen ilefḍan
Ḥemmleɣ timacinin
Ǧǧan-awent-d tarda leḥwal
d nekk ara m-yarun imeslayen cnu kan
d acu yellan ma yečča remṭan
i wul-iw deg-m ufiɣ
ur nwiɣ ara tebɣa ad teddu
ma tḥesseḍ-aɣ ɣas as-d zik iḍ-a
yezga yettḥewwis ar tmurt-nni
ay asmi nbedd am yiwen
ad k-sallin ad k-cekṛen
win yeqqerṣen
d acu bɣiɣ kan ad medleɣ allen-iw u ad ṭṭseɣ ciṭuḥ
ur tessinem ara leṣlaḥ-nwen
lmal d amalal
serkem-d aman-nni
ziɣen udem i s-nefka tugi-t
ur illi d aɛezzam
qqaren-d yettwazdeɣ uxxam-nni
yefra ssuq tenza sselɛa
ad cfuɣ ɣef lecɣal-is
ur iḥemmel ara tusnakt
tekcem-d mary
kecment akk
fell-as ḥemlen-d isafen
acu ara d-teg lwesma
iga deg-s annar
slan akk di tudrin
tella kra n yiwet i yeṭṭfen amkan-iw
ruḥ kan axir s taḍsa
saramen ad sɛun aṭas n yedrimen
teqqed teḥla
Ɛni tezweǧ tɣawsa-nni
ruḥet qbala
yebra-yas tom i mary
ata akk uglim-iw inteḍ-d d iɣes
ttif asnunnet wala asqummet
d acu ara ad yeḥbes yimi
ansa i tɛedda teqcicit-nni
axaṭer iɣli-d laẓ di tmurt n kanɛan
ad nečč qbel ad nruḥ
teṭṭef taɣellayt deg ufus tettraju ad terkem
ini-t-id akken iwata
twalaḍ amɣar-nni yettlen deg ubernus
tettɣezzil leɛbad s tsusmi
amawal atiknikand win ilaqen i teqbaylit
ur ẓriɣ ma d ṭṭbib i yella
itran ɣlin iɣerdayen ulin
texḍa akk tmeṭṭut-nni i tsertit
ireqq yettaẓ am usafu
yusef inna i ugdud ass-agi uɣeɣ-ken i ferɛun s kenwi s tferkiwin-nwen
amek i sen-txedmeḍ i yidlisen-nni
myenjaṛen am iɣuṛaf n tessirt
ad aɣ-iǧɛel Ṛebbi si ttelt lbaqi
abṛaham irra-yas anɛam a mmi
ayagi xedmeɣ-t s wul yeṣfan ur ḍlimeɣ ara
aqendur-nni urqim i yelsa
caḍeɣ si fad
isḥaq ixdem akal di tmurt-nni
d acu i t-ixuṣṣen
ur neεriq ara
tameṭṭut-agi d asif ur nettwazgar
iddem-d yiwen n uẓru issummet-it dɣa yeṭṭeṣ
Ԑelmeɣ iɣaḍ-ikem lḥal
asɣaṛ uɛwij iweɛɛed i tmes
amsafer ur iɛeggu ur iṛebbu
lemḥibba-nsen d asawen
burǧ mira d almus n tɣiwant n tsekriwt deg ugezdu n bgayet
ičča ayla-s d azegza
llan tura yilemẓiyen ur nessin d acu d tidnect
ur mazal ass-a ad nadiɣ
mačči d ayen ara ffreɣ fell-am
ladɣa mi ara twaliḍ acḥal d ilemẓi i itett wakal akken d ileqqaqen
ur ineqq ur iɛetteq
tefka irden ar tessirt ur ten-tefri
igerrez kullec di tama-nwen
terra-d lḥenni deg wacaren-is
ur ttruẓ ara aqerru-m ɣef aya
d tiqeccaḍin i yesserɣayen izeɣwṛan
thuddeḍ-t
axaṭer tikli n yemdanen meṛṛa tefsed di ddunit
win irban irab ccɣel-is
deg igenni i la tettqissiḍ
swiɣ yerna tefka i ileɣwman-iw swan
ad arwen ad ffuktin ad ɛemṛen ddunit meṛṛa
eǧǧ-iyi ad tt-ẓreɣ
ittuger imendayen ifrax
Ṣara tella d tiɛiqert ur tesɛi ara dderya
ay at tmurt-iw erret-iyi-d azref-iw
bɣiɣ ad ṛuḥeɣ azekka
nesluɣmuy kan iman-nneɣ
fniɣ iɣes idammen
mi kecmeɣ ufiɣ afrag yeččur d tidencin iɣef tefser tazart
zwaǧ n temẓi am wudem n ṣṣbeḥ
tasuret n tfunast tusa-d d tis snat deg leqran
yezmer lḥal ur yi-tzerreḍ ara alamma d wissen melmi
umneɣ awal-ik
ečč deg yiwen n lweqt teččeḍ akken ilaq
izzweɣ-d udem-is fell-i
d tagrawla i yesseɣlin adabu amnekdan
amellal d uberkan leɛmeṛ mɛacaṛen
ad nruḥ tin s ara iwalmen asirem akk n wegdud s yeḥricen-is yemgaraden
iɣli-yas userwal di tejmaɛit
ttekksent-d ula d lmeyytin seg iẓekwan
ur nečči acemma
wi iwwten di lɛib ad t-inṭeḍ
iḥemmel ddabex uḍar
illu yenna-yas nekk d illu anezmar
ama sseɛd-nneɣ deg wayen i nettwali
luṭan yesɛa weltma-s isem-is timnaɛ
akken llan medden ad nili
ad d-iban lberr
mi tnudaḍ meṛṛa lqecc-iw illa wacu i tufiḍ inek
am win iffullḥen ar xalt-is
di leɛnaya-nwen qewmem waki
bu lehmum ur iggan ur ittnuddum
Ɛeṛqent-as
anfemt i wannu a sut uɣbalu
amaflas ur fell-as nudant tullas
isla i wat laxert la ttemsewwaqen
ur tekk ara deg ubrid yettwagedlen
d abelεeṭ kan i tettbelεiṭed
yasuɛ isawel i lɣaci inna-asen Ḥesset-d tfehmem
wali akk asmel
ma d win ur nesɛi ara ad s-ittwakkes ula d ayen yesɛa
ffɣeɣ ḍalleɣ ɣer texxamin nniḍen
ad iyi-d-serḥen ad urareɣ
jlant tektiwin rewlent uɣalent d tirga iɣaben
wagi d asentel amaynut anagar kečč i d-yemmeslayen fell-as
yettidir am netta am wiyiḍ
inṭeq isḥaq ɣer baba-s dda bṛahim inna-as a baba
ad teẓremt
wwḍent-d
a win ibeṭṭun aksum leɛqel ay amcum laxeṛt ad teg lqanun
yeqqim-d baba-s yeqqim
tella-d tuffɣa n ugdud aqbayli ɣer yiberdan deg temnaḍt n ssumam
mi ara d-yaweḍ useggas n tyerza win yuɣen ad iffeɣ
iḍulan ar terbut imawlan ar tewwurt
nitni rebḥen idrimen kenwi trebḥem cciɛa
tella tɣucc-it
azmez-a ad yeqqim deg umezruy n umennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt
dagi ad iḥfiḍen amek ara lḥun akken ad ffrun aɣbel-nni n umsider mebla ma ssawlen i yiɛeggalen nniḍen
neɣ imi yessen baba medden akk snen baba
lsemt ayen yeḥman
ad yezzem imi n teslit ur isel i lehḍur-is
d tidet ur iyi-tesxaṣṣeḍ deg wacemma
icaḍ-as akka azekka ad d-rnuɣ tifyirin niḍen
zwayel ɛebbant rryal wwint adrim d uxelxal
ma d lamuṭu i tnehreḍ ur zeggir ara tikeryas
akken kan ur sneɣnayeɣ ara yemma mi ara ttqejjiment fell-as tlewsatin-is d tnuḍin-is
dda bṛahim yumen ameɣlal dɣa ameɣlal iḥesb-it d aḥeqqi
leḥmala am ubeḥri mi d-iwwet ldi turin-im akken tayri heyyi-as ul-im
yeffeɣ ad ikeyyef
d tagnit ur nlaq ara ad tt-sruḥeɣ
timeslayin yewwin ccan d yiseɣ d tiyaḍ nettat ur tt-id-iṣṣaḥ ara umkan ameqqran gar-asent
gar uɣersiw meṛṛa yesmulḥucen wigi ḥesbet-ten neǧsen
Ɛeṛḍeɣ
ad wen-ilin d ayen iqedsen nezzeh
aha afet-d d acu
wissen i wacu i yezga yesteqsay-s fell-am
yezzi-as usigna mellulen
kkin deg warmud-a n usiḍen i d-yellan lqaɛ n wasif ageryun
nerra-as ṣrima d umrar nnehher-itt kan ɣer yiberdan i aɣ-yetteɛjaben
wiyaḍ mi rebḥen ruḥen
ddeqs aya segmi ur ttemlaɛint ara
adrum ɣer tama-s yeddu
sya d asawen ur ttɣamaɣ ara din
yir ttejṛa tettak-d yir lfakya
yemmut saɛid Ḥimi
melmi i k-nwala thelkeḍ neɣ di lḥebs nerza fell-ak
bɣiɣ-kem mačči d aḍu
yella yal mi ara d-yekcem yettales-as- d amek yesɛedda ass-ines di lxedma
ad awen-d-iniɣ tidet kan
ur aɣ-d-tenniḍ ara ma ad d-truḥeḍ azekka neɣ ala
lḥu ɣef yixef n tfednin-im
ur d-rriɣ ara agelzim s axxam
d tudert i ččureɣ
aṭas ara yi-d-yinin ass-nni a sidi

tzemreḍ ad telḥuḍ
tesṛuḥ-itt
d nekk i iḥekmen deg uxxam-agi
ad ssenseɣ tafat ad ssaɣeɣ zimu ad rnuɣ igarru
tsebɣemt-asent-tt
ibɣa ad iweṣṣi mmi-s
d amdan kan ad s-nsemmi
iqṛeḥ-ikem lḥal
iḍ igerrzen a lalla
rajumt da
wa mačči d ugur-nwen
ad nebdu tuta
ar tura suffeɣeɣ-d sin n wammuden ɣer tezrigin tafat
tɛecqeḍ
qqimet yid-i
telha tira i usnerni
teqqim weḥd-s ala nettat d rray-is
Ɣilleɣ d awezɣi ad fehmen liḥala-w
Ɛiwnemt tatoeba
nettakk-as udem n tilawt
s lfeḍl-ik a mulani
kullec ad yuɣal d asuki
kra tt-ixuṣṣen ad as-t-id-heggin
d aceṭṭaḥ i lliɣ
d tissit i ten-tesseɣ
segmi ara d-tekker ulac iɣimi ccɣel-is ur d-iban
rɣiɣ-d
sεiɣ yiwen ula d nekk
d aɣanim yetthuzzu waḍu
kullec irab ɣar lsas
yečča yuba s uɣiwel
taṭuya dayen tfukk
d tikerkas
ur d-yerri ara agelzim s axxam
s tidet
ufiɣ-d tafransist d tifrat i wakken ad d-iniɣ ayen ttwaliɣ d wayen txemmimeɣ
greɣ-d kra leqdic i icudden ɣer tesleḍt tasnalɣant taseddasant akked tesleḍt n tjerrumt
ullah ullah
temmut tura
yezmer ala
Ɣenni-iyi-d ssefhem-iyi-d
iberdan merra sufuɣen
init-aɣ-d ma ad d-truḥem azekka neɣ ala
truḥ yid-s
beṛka-k targit
ass-a mi neɛzel deg yidurar mačči d tufra i neffer
ttamnent-ten
xtiṛ aẓekka i k-ihwan gar iẓekwan-nneɣ tmeḍleḍ lmegget-ik
d acu i m-iruḥen
ad d-rnun afus i trebbaɛ i iqeddcen imir-a deg ddeqs n yisenfaren srid deg internet
tudert am lmesbeḥ
tewwi-kem yid-s
lǧuda baɛed fell-i
cfiɣ kan am wakken ṣewren-iyi s lqecc-nni n daxel
salilt-t
imi tanmehla n tizi uzzu ḥebsen ɣef lxedma ihi ulac wid ara yessiwḍen isali yeɛnan leswam-agi
aɣmis n yimaziɣen efk-aneɣ-d tamuɣli tamatut ɣef yisenfaren n usideg d wanda wwḍen
rnu azeggaɣ
Ṛṛeḥma n Ṛebbi s liser mačči s laɛṣeṛ
err iman-im ur kem-nettwali ara
ad iyi-tt-tɛeṛḍemt
mechuṛeɣ
wali kan
sali ṣṣut-ik
ljameɛ uɣur d-rezzun si mkul tama n temdint
yal yiwen s teqbaylit-is
ur ttamen ula d iqcer n uɣrum iweḥḥel ger tuɣmas
xtiṛem s ttawil
i telha
ur yeffiɣ ara fell-i
gnen
yenɣa argaz-nni
gemt taɣtest-nkent
Ḍfeṛ tirga-m
iwεer-asen lḥal
uliɣ ass-a s adrar
umnen-iyi dɣa
ur kem-ttεerriɣ ara
awimt-t-id ɣer da
muqel san
slemdet-asen ad ḥerzen ayen akk i wen-d-umṛeɣ
mi ara d-tuɣaleḍ εeddi-d si tḥanut
fakken-ak-t
bḍan-as-ten-id
ddem-d zzit n wedhan smir-itt ɣef uqerru-is dhen-it
maɛlic ahawt
ulac xir n wakken
yewjed
yessen-as
teččiḍ imekli
lemmer uccen d aweqqam a-t-aya iga axxam
win i ak-ibeddlen s yibiw kečč beddel-it s yiclem-is
ad d-yeddu yid-s
lwaldin-nsen mazal-iten d imudduren
ad sent-t-tɛeṛḍem
ayɣer i tettazzaleḍ
tttuɣ d tawacult-iw
ad tent-amnen
kra yekka unebdu taweṭṭuft la tetteddu
wehmeɣ mi d-ufiɣ ɣer yiwet n texxamt i aɣ-ceggɛen
rewlemt
yuzzel lḥal
a sidi
serrḥem-iyi
ur sawḍeɣ ara ad feṛzeɣ ansa d-itteffeɣ ṣṣut-nni
ssken-d
neyya n tzimert d tixsi lxuf n uwtul
Ɣef memmi ay d-seqqsan
medden ferrun-tent netta iḍellu-tent
d aḥullu i tettḥullum deg wawal
yeggar iman-is
ad tqucceḍ
d tagi i d ṣṣyada n wukyis
yasuɛ isseḥla aqeddac n yiwen n lqebṭan aṛumani
tḥemmel-itt
ma kerseɣ anyir-iw ɣer-sent ad iyi-kerhent ma sqizzbeɣ-asent ad ɣillent yella wacu i bɣiɣ
yebra i yiman-is deg lqaɛa
leɛmer yuẓam
ad yessuden timẓin yettɣaran uqbel ad tent-megren
wagi d asgen n yizem ulama mṛeḥba yes-kunt
acḥal iberdan i am-d-ɛiwdeɣ d lqanun
winnat yezzi ɣer tinnat tayennat teddukel d winnat ma d amenzu wisen anda-t
ddwa d asentel neɣ d tuddsa i yesɛan tazmert n tujya neɣ n useḥbes n waṭṭanen
liḥala n urgaz-nni ad tenṭer akteṛ n zik
cchada n yasuɛ ɣef yuḥenna aɣeṭṭaṣ
tegneḍ yid-s
wagi anagar deg tullist-ik i t-ufiɣ
nnḍeɣ-am lemlaḥ yeffusi tiṭ deg-m ur tensi wwin-tt leǧnun d imensi
teṭṭef kan di tidak n zik-nni
Ṛuḥet ɣer tmurt yettfeggiḍen d udi d tament
d temẓi-w i d-mmektiɣ
yeḍra usihar-nniḍen deg uggug iɣil amda i d-yezgan di tama n xerraṭa
ama d wigad n waman n tissit tafat trisiti d wayen akk ilaqen i tmeddurt yelhan
Ṭfen Ṛebbi deg yiwellaqen
ur yezmir ad iɣeṛ
beṛka imeṭṭawen
la tessafay awren akken ad fetlent seksu
ama s tarrayt tamensayt neɣ s yiselkimen d tuqqna internet
zik yella yiwen n umɣar iḥulfa i lajel-is
awal n lεali baṭel
kraḍ n yiswiren i yetturaǧun ad d-ilin deg wussan-a
deg wasif kan ara d-qqimen
ad asent-ten-yefk
bɣiɣ win-nniḍen
ddeqs n iqbayliyen i ten-yesseqdacen
telzem-iten tkeffart
ur tett ara tinna
ayagi d asebɣes i yi-d-yerna
uɣeɣ-d adlis n teqbaylit
ad ruḥeγ ad rewleγ i lmut
tikwal ur yesɛi ara ula d ussan i usteɛfu
tkellxeḍ fell-i
ad izelli akud
rnu ɣer wazal i yesεa wungal ammud n tmedyezt neɣ n tullisin deg usegmu n tsekla
ad nerr alim gar yiqbucen
sexsi-t
ssifses ɣef yiman-ik taɛekkemt ad k-ɛiwnen deg-s
zerriɛa yelhan d arraw n tgelda
nhegga-d kra n tufɣiwin di remḍa-agi nhegga-d ass n useɛlem i yimdanen mgal asexser d uḍegger
ttwaliɣ adlis
Ṭṭef-d tom
muqqlet
ad yemmet ɣef ukursi
d acu i tḥesbeḍ iman-im
Ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna mass metref Ḥsen aselway n tesmilt n usuddes
muḥend belqasem d amsenselkam
yuba yesseww i mary
kullec yesɛa tazwara
tebda tmeɣra s tezlit “taɣribt-iw” n ucennay idir
ad kent-tent-tefk
bexlaf ṭṭir lḥur d Ɛebderreḥman umira
yuba mačči d aɛeggun
acu tesxerbubuceḍ akka
yettagad fell-i
kemm d tameṭṭut amkan-im deg tkuzint
sutrent izerfan-nsent
yesεa kra n lmeεna ɣer ɣur-k
a Ṛebbi ttxil-k kullec fell-ak yeshel
tekker texdem-as ssem s daxel n rfis
Ččet s leεqel-nwen
ur aɣ-d-tennim ara ma ad d-truḥem azekka neɣ ala
ur ččiɣ ara ur swiɣ ara
teẓṛamt
tuɣalin n leqdicat deg unnar
ur ssineɣ ara si yidir-agi tɣelṭeḍ di tansa
iḥemmel-iyi
ttuɣ uṭṭun-nwen
d tid yezrin neɣ tid i d-iteddun
d asirem tettceyyiɛem a wid ireclen akked tmedyezt
sebɣen-asent-t
waɣzen yeffer gar yemɣan yesṭuṭṭuc-d kan
ddin iḥeṛṛem-aɣ ula d tudert
tid neɣra deg uɣerbaz neɣ tid i nferreǧ deg tiliẓri
anda tḥuzaḍ afeṛḍas ad d-alin idammen
annect-a yakk akken ur d-ttuɣalen ara yineḍruyen yellan deg yiseggasen-a yezrin d wayen yeɛnan asuffeɣ n yisental
menyif tidet iqerḥen wala lfuruḥ n lekdeb
gan-t-id sin yisdawanen-agi mass caɛban mahdi akked mass zayef mahdi
nɣant-akent-tent
Ɣaḍen-tt
ass nni yuγ-as-d baba-s yiwen n wammud amecṭuḥ deg-s isefra n sliman azem
nezmer ad d-nini belli llant i snat tigi
cebḥent tlawin
Ṛuḥem-d ar da
seɣti tucḍiwin
taɛeǧǧaǧt i d-iṣuḍen thudd s kra i ssaramen
jjmeɣ-t mliḥ
ayagi d asfel n uḥussu n ddnub
Ɣef tedyanin yeqqnen ɣer tmetti
yarra-as-d tili
sliɣ i saɛid yettru mi t-yekkat baba-s
swiɣ afenǧal n lgazuz asemmaḍ
ruḥet syin i asen-d-yenna
tigejdit ɣef tebna tarrayt
ur ẓriɣ ara d acu i kem-yuɣen
ayen akk yerzan tudert n tmetti ad t-tafeḍ deg wass n ssuq
nekni d ayyur d tziri
ndudrent wallen-is fell-i
itett ur d-iban fell-as
ala ɣur-i i neṭṭgent tɣunam
yemma jida teṭṭef aẓaṛ tɣil d aḍaṛ
d acu-t
win iɣlin ad tt-ddun fell-as
mi iɣli uzger ṭṭuqqtent tferyin
weḥd-i kan deg-s ay rɣiɣ
win irefden awer ittwarfed
deg anwa asensu ara tittiliḍ
drus akya ara d-iwalin
mi temmut yemma-s iffer aqabac
kra xedmeɣ n lxiṛ yuɣal-d d ixmiṛ
deg uxxam i telliḍ
apidyatr d amejjay n igʷerdan
dayen tura ula d axxam n jeddi-tneɣ yeɣli
ahat telluẓem mliḥ tura
iles aɣezfan gezzmen-t wuglan
ata llqeḍ ata uqamum
bran i wayen i ṭṭfen
d wigi i d arraw n Ɛisu
leḥder yugar leqḍaɛ
taqcict-nni ẓriɣ-tt yakan
seg wayen i yi-d teseqqaḍ ṛwiɣ
yuɣal ar din
njeɛ aɣyul ifhem uzger
imi-s d ameqqran afus-is d aquran
ur lliɣ d abhim
lxiṛ n tiɣilt ittawi-t waḍu
beṭṭu yeṣɛeb am leqḍaɛ
ur ẓriɣ ara akk d acu iḍerrun
rju ad m-d-smektiɣ
ihedder s lxir ɣef mmi-s
zemreɣ ad kem-awiɣ ɣer unafag iḍ-a
fket-as i lmal ad isew tuɣalem ad t-teksem
Ǧǧet-iyi ad s-xemmemeɣ
ar wanda i ffɣent
awal n Ṛebbi ur ittuneqḍaɛ
ilaq-iyi ad tt-fruɣ amek ara xedmeɣ
leǧnas akk sɛan llebsa tamensayt mačči ala nekni
d wayen deg-s yellan
tura mi twala iman-is s tadist teḥqer-iyi
tixsi yimmezlen tekkat di tin uzan
isneqlab timdinin-nni akked izuɣar meṛṛa
nɣeb ɣembu ulac bubbu
asmi bdiɣ asuqel i ẓriɣ taqbaylit d tutlayt iǧehden yesɛan allalen-is
ur yettneḥsab ara
ixser-iyi llɛeb ur s-ukiɣ mi trab
uqbel ad medlent walen
ttif lehna wala tawant
yettwaker-as umuṭu d awraɣ zdat n ssuq-lfellaḥ
ma d wiyaḍ ad uɣalen d aklan-ik
yusef yuli akken ad imḍel baba-s
tesseɣres tixsi rrebg-is
d wigi i d arraw n Ɛada tameṭṭut n Ɛisu
ur tennumem ara tetteffɣem deg iḍ
tessen lexmeṛ ttuẓumen
tesεa ẓẓher kan mi d-yewweḍ urgaz-is imir-en
acu bɣiɣ kan sɣur-m ad thedreḍ yid-neɣ
uccen abrid kan i yettukellex
serrḥen-d i waman
illu iwala belli d ayen yelhan
qeḥḍen warrac n wass-a
awi-d kan ad tidireḍ
yeǧǧa-yi seg-m wayen ṛǧiɣ
xas mazal yid-m ur tt-friɣ
d acu tennumeḍ txeddmeḍ ass n letnayen
sres-it daki
iheddeṛ ḥafi baṭel
amek ara d-tɛerḍeḍ amyaru ɣer lqahwa taseklant kečč ur teɣriḍ ara ayen yura
werǧin walaɣ annect-a n waddagen deg tudert-iw
ulayɣer nedɛa ma ulac illu ara ɣ-d-yeslen
Ṛuḥet ad tzerɛem igran-nwen
tasekla ur tesɛi tilisa
ayen d-ikkan seg usaɣuṛ d abaɣuṛ
xaṭi mazal ibda
ameɣlal isserbeḥ-it deg wayen akk ixeddem
Ɛiwen win ibɣan ad ikker
yugi ad yi-iffeɣ ubeḥri
i win yebɣan ad yafeg
ur tesɛiḍ ara lḥeq deg warraw n urgaz-im
inna-asen taṛwiḥt-iw isberber-as leḥzen n lmut
d lebda deg-i txenneq terna tekkes-iyi aɛziz n tasa
bḍumt-aɣ-tent-id
nɣan-ak-tent
xaqeɣ fell-ak a baba
kkreɣ-d tanzayt zik
yettzid ufus-is
sikser
syin ɣer-s ɣer yimerẓi i d-yellan gar yiwen n usdawan d yiwen n uselmad deg ugezdu-a
si rezqi tura yuɣ-itent yeɣli di tezmert-is
tessnem tameṭṭut-iw
susem axir
tettamnem-tt
agelmim-a d alqayan
ad iyi-iseɛfent
ur ineqq ara usaru n leḥrir
Ḍefṛem ṛṛay-iw
di tallit taneggarut
nnefsusiɣ
ad tent-id-temmager
ayagi ad yessifsus taɛkkemt n uɣbel n waman n tissit
nnan win yeεran di ccetwa yeḥṣa ccetwa semmḍet
kemmel ddu ɣef uḍaṛ
nɣan-asen-ten
ziɣ d nekk i diri
Ẓṛiɣ tesɛam lḥeq
d tiyitwin n lmut
ula d netta daɣen mi yekker ad iruḥ yettaǧǧa-yas-d tabrat s tuffra di kra n teɣmert n uxxam
asarag i d-ihegga useqqamu n yinelmaden n tesdawit mulud mɛemmri deg tzeqqa n yisaragen di hesnawa
Ḥemmleɣ iḍan
Ṛuḥen send iḍelli
wali asmel amaynut
sbehdlen tom
ulac imejjayen n tnefsit d aselmad i d kullec
rwimt-t mliḥ
ssulin-t d asarjan
lameɛna ccṛab ajdid ittuɣal deg iyeddiden ijdiden
mmeslayen-d deg-s ɣef usuter agejdan n tikli-a
Ɛni yezwar-ikent
ur εyin ara seg yiɣimi
issufeɣ-d idammen gar yiccer d uksum
mazal-ik meẓẓiyeḍ
ur d-rennu awal
idir tlemdeḍ
Ɛasem iman-nwen
i wacu iyi-tugadeḍ
tεelmeḍ menhu-tent
yeslemed-iyi-t
nɣant-asen-ten
cedhaɣ-kem aṭas
kenwi d imehtufen
anta ta
tixelxalin ad ilint ɣef yiri ad kecmen deg-sent iɛekkzan swayes ara treffdem ṭṭabla
da i yeqqim tom
Ṣaḥit i Ṛebbi
adfel iɣumm aṭubus
ad d-tettekkes d tiwriqin
tsebɣemt-iyi-tent
yiwen n wass ad d-uɣalent alamma d da
tesɛiḍ ssaɛa
yeṭṭef tarkent
yettxemmimen deg sin lumuṛ
yeffeɣ-d si tmacint
fell-as awal suguten
yegla yes-wen
sɛiɣ amcic
yella ur ixeddem kra tom
ayen ara yeqqim ɣer ddel imi d dunnit meqqret
allen-iw ttrunt qerḥent-iyi
lebla-k buddeɣ-t i wiyyaḍ
anwa ara yecnun tameddit-a

isuɣ tom
tfehmeḍ amek
squdder
yesluɣ-as tala
Ḥemmlent-tt
ttwaliɣ lbabuṛ d amecṭuḥ
tegnemt
berkat asṭerṭer
mazal ur yebdi usaru-nni
si zik nettgalla nḥennet
twalaḍ aqjun-iw
ad ɣ-tt-tefkemt
simmal yettnernay
ddu ɣer sdat
qerrec
rran-iyi-t-id
bɣiɣ ad fɣeɣ sya tzemreḍ ad iyi-tɛiwneḍ deg wanect-a
teqqim tsenned ɣer useklu truḥ am tin ara tawi tnafa
uran-t
zemrent ad ddun yid-s
ttrajun-aɣ
yeddan d teɣremt
lluẓeɣ bɣiɣ ad ččeɣ
tessefcaleḍ deg tom
aha barka ur ssexlaɛ ara di teqcict
Ɣur-m ad ten-tekseḍ
terra-yi-tent-id
ctaqeɣ ad gneɣ deg yiḍ
imiren isawel-as ssid-is inna-as ay aqeddac amcum
Ṣṣubem
limmer kan ǧǧan-tt ad texdem nettat tezmer i umdegger
ad yeqqim tom
nekk mačči d rosa parks neɣ simone de beauvoir akken ad beddleɣ timetti-ya
ur ẓriɣ ɣef acu
ur teεyiḍ ara seg yiɣimi
Ɣas akken ul n ferɛun iqqur iggumma ad iserreḥ i ugdud ad iṛuḥ
ayɣer i ttkellixen medden
yezlez seg -s uɣunfu
tameṭṭut tamezwarut n adem
theggaḍ
terfed daɣen s tadist tesɛa-d aqcic tsemma-as unan
mi ara d-tban gar watma-s
ass-agi d aqebli
fell-as ad xeddmen waklan
tessneḍ sin-ihin
qqaṛeɣ
iwumi
txedmemt-as kra
yebḍa-yasen-ten-id
yella diɣ usenfar n ubaraǧ n ssuq n ttlata anda lḥan aṭas lecɣal n lebni-ines
amdakel ur lliɣ sεiɣ-t ala tom
a nekk yuɣen ameɣbun
d wanwa tfeḍreḍ
teṣfa qrib yal ass
gedha fell-ak
ad sent-t-id-awint

smaḥ

ad ẓreɣ
yerna ur iḥebber
nekk d taqbaylit
sṛuḥen-t

Ḥbes tom
inimt-asent
deg usentel am wagi yellan deg tullist-ik d izen i d sseḥ
a tinn-a n ugemmaḍ lalla-m d mm uxelxal n ddeḥ
qqimemt yid-i
kemmel kan akken
tidukkla terra-as tajmilt yerna tuklal-itt
terra-yaɣ-tt-id
qeyyleɣ
tameɣra-a mačči inek
dɣa imceyyeɛ ad s-issuref zdat n umeɣlal
tetteddu teslufuy i umzur awraɣ n tɛelǧet-is
qqimemt zdaxel
tweddeṛ-iten
ur ttwaliɣ ula d aceṭṭiḍ ɣef lqaɛa
Ɣur-i aselkim
tekksem-t-id
telha tezmilt-ik
ad iyi-d-yuɣal d ameẓyan
tenɣa-yawen-t
yebɣa ad d-iɛiwed sebbaḍ
d tafyirt isehlen
txellṣem yakan
d aqessis i telliḍ
qqneɣ-ak lḥenni n ufus
ad sent-tt-id-yawi
rwit-tt mliḥ
yeɛya
d acu n ddnub i xedmeɣ armi i tt-teddiḍ akka fell-i
ad snemreɣ aṭas tiddukkla imi i d-terra lewhi ɣer leqdic ussnan acku d leqdic n yimal
aṭas i tettṛaǧumt seg-s
yaxi umneɣ-k
tebɣiḍ lukan ad tecnuḍ
wten-t
ula d iselmaden ixeddmen deg ugezdu-a yis-s i d-ttawin aɣrum
bḍu-yas-ten-id
efk-iyi dqiqa
waqil kullec ileḥḥu
ur ttḥasabet ara wiyaḍ
teẓriḍ ẓṛiɣ
lexbar i d-yettasen nɣan-t ɣef uḍebsi n seksu
wwin-d akk timkeḥlin
axxam akk gnen
Ṛujaɣ
ttḥadar a tom
argaz yesɛan tissas

deg-m i ufiɣ lehna

ad iɣli win innumen ajdab

tura ad tesseqdcem facebook s teqbaylit
ittak uzrem taqemmuct
nettaru-d kan tifyar ur nɛeyyu

iḥemmel ad iddu di tmacint
ass-a neɣra tamsirt n umyag deg uɣerbaz
irra-yi azrem s aqelmun
di laxert n ddunit-iw
django yesseɣli-d deg-sen rrehba
anwa i ileḥqen abrid s wallen
ttif tuṭṭist tuffiẓt
xḍan akk warrac-nni i tsertit
ssiɣ-d taferracit akken ad ẓleɣ
ur d-tecliε ara deg ayen tettlus
nniɣ-as ass-a ad iyi-yawi ah ya ddin qessam
tewɛer tayri n tesnawit
yenna-as s uɛekki wagi uriɣ-t asmi qqimeɣ ɣef tseṭṭa n weqjun
yella kra i twalamt
selleɣ i kra n tɣawsa
di leɛnaya-k seɣti-t
ittnadi azrem di tɣalaṭ
iɛawed tom axeddim
welleh ar am win yettruẓen adrar
yettheffif kan deg medden ur yesɛi kra
ur cukkeɣ ara yella win ara k-yezzenzen ikɛeb
d acu yeǧǧan iles ur yesɛi ara iɣes
