Ḥṣu s yir tamuɣli
ttif nnif lexṛif
win d-iḥellan tasawent ad ɣ-d-ireǧǧem d akessar
tettbineḍ-d melliḥeḍ
am nekk am tizyiwin-iw
iruḥ gefgafi
aql-i εewwleɣ ad d-aɣeɣ takeṛṛust akken kan ara sεuɣ ttawil
ur tennumem ara tuffɣa deg iḍ
ur ttlaɛajet ara gma-twen
ajḥiḥ d yizimer d yiɣid
sizedgemt taxxamt-nkent
ur ssinen ara ad xedmen tasertit
ala taṛbut iwumi itwel
nlul-d akken ad nesdukkel tikli
ad k-izzenz ad k-id-yerr
yella kra n yiwen i wumi tebɣiḍ ad teɣṛeḍ
akken nettɛelli deg lehwa i ineqqes wuksijin
issew-iyi lemṛaṛ
neḥwaǧ da leṣwat untiyen a tullas
yettawi yid-s tiqwijt d ṭṭbel
lebɣi-w yettmeḥnen
xedmeɣ amek ur d-ttaǧǧiɣ ula d lateṛ
dacu ara tesweḍ tameddit-aki
udem-is yettfeǧǧiǧ am lefnar
Ɣef lemḥibba neɣ amek tella
yesseqecaṛ di nnif-iw
ata ccna i la d-ttawin
ssnent ad sekrent seksu
yettbin-ak-d uqjun-iw d amufay
yella win i d-ittfeṛṛiǧen deg-k
yella win i yettmuqqulen tom
ad truḥ wakali
ad ak-issu Ṛebbi idel-ak
anta i d-yettmeslayen
tiṭ d wul mxaṣamen
tsum-it lqaɛa
ala ma tezla lferḥ-iw
ma d nutni i yeṭṭfen igenni ɣas ad s-d-brun
ur tettemmatemt ara daki
ad cnun di temdint n bgayet
init a wid yeqqaṛen
ansa ara tɛeddiḍ
di ddiq i d-yettban urfiq
tewweḍ-iyi-d yiwet n tsurett d izen waqil d aspam
aṭas ara yebɣun
mačči d leḥkem n lɛesker i ḥemmlen d ddel i nnumen
tettbinemt-d tcebḥemt
yettban-d yeččeḥ tom
tettarew tezdayt ttmeṛ
ccṛab azeggaɣ ma ulac aɣilif
anwa akka ṭṭir-agi ssawḍen
isɛukkuz deg awal
di leɛnaya-nkent kkremt
d ta i d leɣna tḥemmleḍ
Ḥbes ur yi-d-ttnal ara
Ḥemmlen akk tiɛleǧtin
ahat d kra n yir targit kan
bbi neɣ ɣebbi
ifka-yas ddeq n umeslay
Ɣef ayen iɛeddan dayenni
ur nwiɣ ara yebɣa ad yeddu
tselmed-aɣ tselmadt-nneɣ tizlit eǧǧet-aɣ abrid ad nɛeddin n Ɛli ideflawen
ur iḥebbes ara akk
Ẓriɣ ur d-ttiḥnineḍ
tcetka fell-as ar wexxam n ccṛeɛ
nebzeg ur neksi
imi lɣella-s d cḥani
Ɣur Ṛebbi ulac tiḥila
aṭas i neḍsa
ayen ur nfukk armi t-terra tillut izis ɣer ṣṣifa-s tanaṣlit n wemdan
tamusni d aɣilif
ad k-nernu imesnsi
srid seg tunes
ur ittuɣal ara tom ad yi-yamen
anta tuɣmest i k-iqeṛḥen
jeddi yeggan ɣef tgertilt
iselwayen n tɣiwanin n tmurt n leqbayel ugin ad heggin tifranin n tselweyt
tḥemmel ad tečč tiɛesbanin
ad teqqerṣem si tazla
ur tebɣi ara ad tezweǧ
Ɣef teqbaylit d tacebḥant iḍ d wass ur gganeɣ
ttḥussuɣ-as cwiya kan
dacu i ak-yettakken afud
kksen-as tasummta
ggullen alamma d lmut
zaknun urǧin kennun
tejreḥ tasa-w
ffɣent-d akk s iberdan
d aḥulfu kan i tt-bɣiɣ
wakka yeffren deffir n rridu
la taceṭṭiḍt la tafenṭiḍt
tuɣ din snat tgaṭiwin
sɛiɣ azref ad amneɣ neɣ ad qqimeɣ
d ccṛab wina
glu-d s kra i tɣuri
yella ḥedd i yettnezzihen
zemreɣ ad ssqedceɣ akeryun-im
tettwaker-iyi texfet ass-nni n lǧemεa
ittban usigna syawes tekkat
ad kunt-nernu imesnsi
iḥemmel seksu
taddist-nni d ayen ur nettwaman
tqefzem deg usewwi
ad teṭṭfeḍ amkan-nni uxeddim
ass mi nɣil rrbeḥ nufa-t
ctaqen rriḥa n tmurt
balak ad s-tinim yehbel
amzun iεedda deg umehraz
igmer ddaɛwessu
turar deg umezgun mi tt-tuɣ d taqcict
d nutni ara d-yekkren zik azekka
ur k-ttsemmiiḥen iɣerban
s anda ur ad yezzi yiwen
akken ad yidir gar-aneɣ
ad selqaḍeɣ di tikti-w
ur teǧǧim amkan
nekk s lxiq i d-ttmektiɣ iseggasen n tmanyin
Ḥemmlen-kem meṛṛa
yečča-yas ula d aɛwin-is
Ɣiwel els iceṭṭiḍen-im
tessirideḍ tuɣmas-ik yal ass
ur ssineɣ ad tt-leεbeɣ
iḥemmel tom aḥewwes
deg ul tin ad yettṣuḍun
gnent ɣef udekkan
yettekki deg yisenfaren i yekkren ɣef teqbaylit
tom yenɛel mary
ixebbel-d ayen ur itett
d tewnef kan i y-iwwin
mennaɣ-d ad ḥewwseɣ ar legniz
ayɣer i kem-ḥeǧben
bɣiɣ ad ẓṛeɣ dacu i yettlusu
tella kra n yiwet i yellan yakan da
d anelmad i lliɣ
d lawan ad d-truḥem akk
amek ara texdem tmetti ma ur tečči ara
ad iɛeddi ar wexxam
tura ihi yya ad nemɛahad ad nexdem leɛqed ayen ara yilin d ccahed gar-i yid-k
ameɣlal illu isawel i adam inna-as anda akka i telliḍ
ad d-uɣalen ɣer dagi di lǧil wis ṛebɛa
teffeɣ-d ɣer tesga wehment amek tga
abṛaham inna-yas aql-i ggulleɣ
azwel n udlis-is sani i tetteddu zzayer
Ṣṣifa s ufella ay d-terna
ur tteẓẓlet ara afus-nwen ɣur-s
ma ɣef tira zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ d akken tira n teqbaylit a-tt-an deg ubrid usnerni
ittɛawad-as i baba-s aqejjem-nni i ttqejjimen watmaten-is
ad terẓ yir tiktiwin d yiḥebbasen i as-tesbib tmetti yugar ayen i d-ḥellant
akka i d-nettmenni lukan nufa
snat tullas meḥḥnent-iyi ur ẓriɣ anta ay axir
isḥaq iɛac meyya utmanyin n iseggwasen
win ihedṛen ittwexxiṛ bɛed-as axiṛ
s wakka iḥitiyen ḍemnen i abṛaham taferka-nni akked lɣar yellan deg-s ad t-ikseb d amkan n temḍelt
ul-is ur tt-ibɣi ara
ur teččiḍ acemma
mmektaɣ-d mmi-s n taddart-iw
ass wis sebɛa illu yekfa ccɣwel-nni yexdem
terwi-aɣ tineslemt deg tudrin-nneɣ
tamɛict n liser talaba n sser
ccwi kan ur teqqim ara d tuzyint-nni n zik
agercal ur ittuɣal s iɣuṛaf
s lferḥ meqqren i sliɣ i lexbar acku arraz racid Ɛellic yesɛa azal meqqren i umyaru
Ǧeṛǧeṛ yessawel i wawras
isḥaq isemma i lbir-nni cibɛa yeɛni sebɛa
ttemyexzaren ar igerzan
wehmen
deg leǧwayeh-a i tzedɣeḍ
la nheddeṛ ɣef Ɛli ineggez ar waɛli
ittru wul ḥedd ur t-iwwit
brahma d ameqqran n yilluten ihendusiyen
ad mmeslayeɣ cit ɣef wayen i d-nniɣ deg-s
illu iwala belli ddunit tefsed
mačči anagar tin i yellan
imiren atmaten-is bdan ameslay yid-s
yexleḍ layas d usirem
tenna-yas kker syin ay aneggar n medden
inza ugercal s urḍel
mbeɛd aḥemmal-nni ameqran sɛan-d arrac
tameṭṭut mm tbejbujin
yusef isɛa-d sin n warrac di tmurt n maṣer
di tefsut tezliḍ-iyi yuɣ nnɛi-w ɣef ijeǧǧigen
llan kra n warrac ur nhedder tafransist deg terbaεt-nneɣ
walaɣ iɣyal ttruḥen ttuɣalen
yal tamsalt deg-i lḥeqq-is
tayi d taḥawact tis xmesṭac
anwa ara as-yinin ad d-yili waya
tiwlafin-a d tid ara ikecmen deg umezruy
mačči tura mi ssenseɣ aselkim ara yi-d-tiniḍ
Ɛeddaɣ ad s-rreɣ ufiɣ dayen yekkes awennit-is
ziɣ tesεiḍ lḥeqq a tom
ayen i d-ixeddmen kra n temsirin ɣef tfizikt taɣisant
lameɛna ad ḥasbeɣ lǧens-nni i ten-irran d aklan
aya issebgan-d d akken tettaẓ tira
telliḍ yid-i dhiɣ yes-m
ameɣlal illu yenna i tmeṭṭut-nni d acu akka i txedmeḍ
ruḥen ad d-aɣen taflukt n ssyaḍa
tewweḍ armi d ajmam tenɣel
irgazen-nni ugaden iffeɣ- iten leɛqel
ttif lmut wala azaglu
abṛaham iqqar ɣef tmeṭṭut-is Ṣara d weltma
acuɣer ur tessawḍeḍ ara ad d-taseḍ d ssebt
Ɣef wayagi ur zzenzen ara tiferkiwin-nsen
meɛna ilaq ad yezger tamurt n lezzayer
tseḥḥer-iyi s tebbuct-is teɣli-d s iciwi-s ay atma qrib mmuteɣ
am urgaz am tmeṭṭut sskelset twennɛem ṣṣut
urwen uɣalen deg waṭas yid-sen
yettwaṭṭef ɣer lḥebs i tikkelt-nniden ass n tlata u ɛecrin yunyu alef u ttɛemya u tlata u settin
ad indem win iwumi ur idbiɣ
deg lweqt swaswa
ma di tmurt n maṣer illa lqut
yuɣal d taɛeqquct
arraw n lewwi gircun qahat marari
d tidet i d-nenna
d acu i ɣ-ixuṣṣen
nexdem akk ayen ideg ara nessetḥi
ttif laẓ n tuṣṣra wala win n tummla
isḥaq inna-yas a-tt-an tmes a-ten-an yesɣaren
niḥeqqa ddunit tetteddu ɣer zzat
inalmaden ṭṭreḍqen d taḍsa
acuɣer i trewleḍ s tuffra ur yi-d-tɛeggneḍ ara
isɛa aṭas n lmal n ddheb akked lfeṭṭa
uɣal ɣer tmurt anida i tluleḍ
tenna-yasen deg uxxam d netta kan ay bɣiɣ
yusef inna-asen d acu-t ṛṛay-agi i txedmem
limer ad iwali ass-a
dda Ḥemmu inna-yas d acu i ɣ-txedmeḍ akka
ma ifurq-it baba-s ad immet
yeɛqub irra-yas ur iyi-ttak acemma
ggtent tsufaɣ deg ugraw-nni-nneɣ cukkeɣ ad yuɣal mucaɛ
a-tt-an temdint-inna teqreb yerna meẓẓiyet
seg iman-iw lemmer i ufiɣ ad d-rewleɣ tili
ur qqar ara lehdur am widak
ad fkeɣ i tarwa-k timura-agi meṛṛa
yessexsi times
lmal-agi d lmal-iw i s-yenna luṭ
xdem i yiman-ik lbabuṛ s wesɣar n iseṛwel
inna-yi-d rfed allen-ik tmuqleḍ
atent-a wwḍent-d
cerreg ayen i tzemreḍ ad t-txiḍeḍ
ar melmi akka ara tekkat nneḥ
swakka yusef iqqim dinna di lḥebs
ismaɛil iɛac meyya usebɛa utlatin n iseggasen
yella kra i ččan
izewweq-ik s rregmat
win yeɛran wayeḍ ad t-idel
tarwa-k ad ṭṭfen timdinin n yeɛdawen-nsen
imiren ṭṭebbat-nni ɛeṭṭren isṛayil
yeswa tidi n imeɣban
d asumer ara k-d-imenɛen si lmut
inna-yas d kečč i d mmi Ɛisu
si lhebs i yesselḥay timsal n tfidiralit n fransa n tirni n uselelli aɣelnaw
ur d-ssakay tussna n waṛẓen
iqeddacen-ik mačči d ixbaṛǧiyen
imi ur yi-tekkiseḍ ara mmi-k awḥid-ik
s wakka i yeṣber isḥaq ɣef yemma-s
yerna icudd waya ɣer waṭas n temsal
mi teswa ad d-ḍehṛen waman
a wer ḥedṛeɣ i leḥzen ara d-iɣlin ɣef baba
teswaɣeḍ-t akk
neǧǧa-yak-d amkan
isṭeẓṭuẓ am uɣyul deg usawen
d ussan nettat tekkat
kker rfed aqcic teṭṭfeḍ-t seg ufus
ad izdeɣ deg iqiḍunen n cim
a tuzyint mm lqedd ubambu
iṛuḥ iḥka i sin n watmaten-is yellan di beṛṛa
tom yezger tilist n tmurt berra i usaḍuf
uqbel ad ṭṭreḍqent tersasin n dɣel d tisselbi
iggul ɣef uksum imceḥ lmeṛqa
illu yefṛeq gar tafat akked ṭṭlam
win izerɛen aḍu ad imger tabuciḍant
ikker uɣebbaṛ deffir-sen
llan ḥekkun-d kan tudert-nsen u ad d-inin ata nura ungal
tura ur heddren ara am zik ɣef teqbuct n tefriqt n waɣlanen
axaṭer ameɣlal ikkes dderya i tlawin meṛṛa n twacult n dda Ḥemmu ɣef ddemma n Ṣara tameṭṭut n abṛaham
abrid n timunent ass-agi yenǧeṛ
abṛaham iru ɣef Ṣara iḥzen fell-as
mačči d ayen ara k-ffreɣ
asmi akken qqaren medden nekk zgiɣ d isem-im ay kettbeɣ
nuḥ ixdem ayen akk i s-d-yumeṛ yillu
syenna ara s-d-tawiḍ tameṭṭut i mmi
iṣufeṛ ṣṣfeṛ n bda
msenṣalen tiɣeṛdin
arraw n bariɛa Ḥibir akked malkiyil
ad nebnu tamurt s ucawrar d umɣaṛ
laẓ ittzid irennu di tmurt n maṣer
ad k-ifk Ṛebbi i ddfeɛ war amcafaɛ
ayen nettqellib tečča-t tmeqbeṛt
sseksu d wudi s uḥellel
ma d Ṛaḥil d tiɛiqert
iruḥ ɣer din
sselṭan ussan-nni yectaq duṛu
ad iɛzel iman-is ɣef watmaten-is
tekkat daɣen
swakka tamurt ur tnegger ara si laẓ
mi yekfa lhedṛa d abṛaham ameɣlal iṛuḥ
i tḥeṛceḍ ay iblis tečča-k tmes
temẓi inu truḥ d akeṛfi
abṛaham di tmurt n maṣer iwala iɣli-d laẓ ɣef tmurt
werǧin ẓriɣ afrigu d azeggaɣ
ur yeqqirṣ uyeddid ur nɣilen waman
am uɣerda n lǧameɛ laẓ asemmiḍ
ameɣlal isxeḍ-d ferɛun akked wat wexxam-is s lmuṣibat timeqranin ɣef ddemma n Ṣara tameṭṭut n abṛaham
ttasen-d si mkul tamurt ɣer maṣer iwakken ad aǧwen irden ɣef yusef axaṭer laẓ izad di tmura meṛṛa
imeslay-as iquṛanen
mi yeɣli yiṭij iɣli-d ṭṭlam uṭellis
ur k-ttaǧǧaɣ ara lameɛna ad xedmeɣ ayen akk i k-d-nniɣ
dayen terẓa-yi aqerru-iw
yella wuccen deg tɣilet la d-yesṭiccin
seg ass mi i tt-bubbeɣ ur s-briɣ
ad m-beddeɣ
teqqimeḍ ɣef yisennanen
kul ḥedd ɣer win-is maɛduṛ
ur iṭṭif la agelzim la tagelzimt
ǧǧet-iyi ad uɣaleɣ ɣer sidi
wissen ma s tidet d agacur
ur teǧǧiḍ aẓar
axaṭer ad k-rreɣ d ababat n waṭas n yigduden
fkiɣ-ak taferka rniɣ-ak lɣar yellan deg-s
maca nettat simmal tettimɣur simmal yettban-d deg-s umgarad i tt-iεezlen ɣef tmetti tawacult d tizya-s
ur tt-nettcuddu ur tt-nettfessi
ičča tajeḥniḍt n lɛid
yusef inna i watmaten-is aql-i ad mmteɣ
tubal-kayin isɛa weltma-s isem-is naɛama
iεǧeb-as umerreḥ
ferɛun isemma-yas i yusef Ṣufnat faɛniyaḥ
ufiɣ-d aɛrab di tferka-w ur s-nniɣ ula d awal
dɣa d aḥewwas- nni tesseḥqer i tt-id-isellken
amɣar yemmuten d agerruj i yeṛuḥen
werǧin yendem deg wayen yexdem
ad iṛeɣ uzegzaw s uquṛan
ad k-iweddef Ṛebbi ar bu ikurdan
kra n wayen xeddmen ittɛeddi ɣef ufus-is
amek ara xedmeɣ lɛaṛ yecban wa ad ɛaṣiɣ illu
ayen irsen ɣef tzeqqa tettawi-t tgerfa
ad d-yas tameddit-a
mi t-id-ixleq isemma-yas adam
Ɣef kul taɣaṭ mmi-s d izeṛzeṛ
tneǧǧreḍ-d iswi i ccetla
nnan-as anda-tt tmeṭṭut-ik Ṣara
wissen anwa i tent-yewwten
rran-as xaṭi a sidi
anwa ara iruḥen
xedmeɣ ayen akken i yi-d-tenniḍ
ur berru ara i usirem
tasusmi tif tamusni
nqebbel tilawt akken tella
tazwert n ttejṛa d iɣes
ayen ara d-tessutrem deg-i ad wen-t-fkeɣ
am lmal am imawlan
uɣur icudd ṣṣber-iw
d tagi i d lkalafa-nneɣ neɣ i d tamasit-nneɣ
Ẓẓaden ggaren awren
lhi-d kan d ujeǧǧiḍ-ik
si mḥemmed ixdem akken ikemmel dduṛt-nni akk d nna feḍmuca
mi meqqer uqcic tekkes-as yemma-s tuṭṭḍa
ur d iyi-ssayasen udem-im
mḥemmalen am sin iḍudan n ufus
tistan-nni icemten iwumi i d-iqqim kan ugwlim ɣef yiɣes ččant sebɛa n testan-nni icebḥen iqewwan
aṭas n wid ara d as-yinin
d ayen issefraḥen
lli tiṭ-ik ma tɣefleḍ yedda uḍaṛ-ik
yerra-aɣ-d
tenna ameɣlal ad yi-d-irnu aqcic-nniḍen
d wigi i d arraw n busmat tameṭṭut n meẓyan
d aklucaṛ meɛna ur t-tettkellixeḍ ara
ameɣlal indem imi i d-ixleq amdan ɣer ddunit
tefciḍ i ḥlawit lxeẓrat-nni zik
nniɣ-ak-d acḥal d tikelt ur xeddem ara akken
yewwi tudayt
isbedd dinna iqiḍunen-is akken armi d sudum
uqbel ad akem-tenṭeḍ
asmekti n tmenɣiwt n uselway budyaf
dɣa yenna-yas ini-yi-d anwa i d baba-m
ad ten-ffren d leqrar
isɛa taxabit
taqbaylit teḥwaǧ imɛelmen-nneɣ
irṣel-it-id Ṛebbi fell-i
anef-as kan yessewway lexrif s yimi
axtan-nni i ɣ-xetnen akken d ajerrem i ttjerrimen deg-neɣ
yettwaṭṭef ass n tniyen uɛecrin deg tubeṛ alef u ṭṭɛemya u setta u xemsin
mi wwḍen ɣer Ḥaṛan zedɣen dinna
ccṛaɛ igenni leɛmeṛ yelli
mazal ur kfiɣ lehduṛ deg wul-iw mi d-teffeɣ ribika tacmuxt ɣef tayet tṣubb ɣer lɛinseṛ ad d-tagwem
ameɣlal illu yenna ur ilhi ara i adam ad yili weḥd-s
xesrent daɣen
am lleft ur nettnusu deg wakal
axaṭer walaɣ ayen akk i k-ixdem laban
ikker yeɛqub iṛuḥ si bir cibaɛ
a yir ẓẓher-iw
yettnuṛ wudem-is am lefnaṛ
i netta i neǧǧa rray aneggaru
leḥkem n tfidiralit d leqbayel kan i t-yebɣan
lli awwur ma isekkeṛ
temẓi txeddem ɣef temɣeṛ
nekni nettaεraḍ ad naru
sal ul-ik ad ak-imel
Ččiɣ aɣwelmi ssegraɣ-d tinsa
teḥzen twellit ur ṛebban watma-s
tewweḍ tfidi ar iɣes
aɣ i yiman-ik taɣeḍ i ssuq
ziyus d ameqqran n yilluyen iqburen n legrig
akken nexdem neḥṣel
zdeɣ di tmurt-agi
wid akk yeǧǧa yiseɣ ffren tura udmawen-nsen
lameɛna illu n baba yella yid-i
feṛṛeḥ taxxamt-nni
d ccahed i mazal ar ass-agi ɣef uẓekka n meɛǧuṭa
azekka-nni kkren-d ṣṣbeḥ zik mɛahaden
aqeddac-nni yeḥka-yas i isḥaq ayen akk ixdem
Ḥrec ger aẓeṭṭa terreḍ lxiḍ i d-yeqqarsen
yerna a-t-an ad d-itteddu deffir-nneɣ
ur ruḥeɣ ara ɣer temḍelt
ur kem-ɣucceɣ ara
leḥmuṛegga n tmeddit iṭij taṣebḥit
ad tɣum leεyub-iw meṛṛa
berz-iyi awal
qqaren zik win ur nesɛi aɣyul d netta ay d aɣyul
Ṣayddu mayga d ilemzi seg tmurt n mali
ittewwa lexṛif di ccetwa
awer iẓẓel afud i lḥenni
aya d ttbut ɣef tmelsa-s
arrac tiqcicin myuṭṭafen afus deg ufus
imi tura ddeqs n wid yettarun ɣran taqbaylit neɣ d wid iqeddcen deg unnar n teqbaylit
yeffeɣ-d seld imsisiyen n ivyan din i d-banen wid yebɣan ad nebḍen d wid yebɣan tugdut deg lezzayer
Ṛebbi mačči d lɛebd ad t-tɣellṭeḍ
nessaram d abrid ufrin ara ineǧren imal ifazen i tutlayt taqbaylit
leqdic n tqeddacin cciεa n tceṭṭaḥin
izzenz-aɣ yerna itett irennu deg wedrim-nneɣ
ur twalaḍ ara tamurt-agi meṛṛa
raɛuwil mmi-s n busmat tameṭṭut n Ɛisu
ahat ad yili d leɣlaḍ kan i ɣelṭen
xaṭi ulac isebbaḍen dihin
sεiɣ akka tura adlis ɣef yimsuṭṭaḍ n lqaεa
inna-yasen di leɛnaya-nwen ay atmaten
ur telliḍ d tuɣrist
imeslayen-is d izegzawen
yerna tbeddleḍ lexlaṣ-iw ɛecṛa n tikkal
mačči d tamanegt kan i yellan deg tudert
ma swiɣ ugadeɣ seg ayen ur sɛiɣ d ayla-w
lḥiɣ i ḥafi d ugris
gganent wulli akken myaɛdalent
awer iṭṭef taqbuc n yiɣi
d arraw n busmat tameṭṭut n Ɛisu
ad tḥebseḍ neɣ xaṭi
izreɛ-iten Ṛebbi am ibawen ɣef lluḥ
wi awen-illa
tuqmem fell-i agdud n tzizwa
lɛebd ittgalla Ṛebbi isseḥnat
Ẓewqem-as lemleḥ i lǧifa-k
d lǧiran
ittcuddu tagut s aḍu
abṛaham iɛenna ɣer yillu dɣa illu yesseḥla dda Ḥemmu tameṭṭut-is akked tqeddacin-is uɣalent ttarwent
ayen d-ifka waxux ičča-t ujaxux
d ayen i yesḥeznen ul-is
issufeɣ ṛṛuḥ immut yerna ɣer lejdud-is
atan unebdu yewweḍ-d
ilaq-yi ad k-id-henniɣ
ssebba n tirwas d aɛaddi n tilas
aqcic yella yeṛwa
ad neqqim bati
ma swiɣ ugadeɣ imawlan ma qqimeɣ fad yenɣa-yi
wwiɣ-d lviza ar fransa
mi d-teḍra tedyant-a
gma-s immut d netta kan i yi-d-iqqimen
teṭṭef-iyi temrart
ttzefritent tkeṛyas deg ubrid ameqqran
sḍehret i yiman-nwen
nerra-yas ur nezmir ara ad nuɣal
bdiɣ s tira
win ibezgen ad yuɣal ad yens
mebla ccekk d agzar i yettwagzer
ur yuki mi teṭṭeṣ yid-s ur yuki mi tekker
da lḥif din d aɣilif
ur yi-d-ttarra ara akken asirem
d ameɣlal ara iḥekmen gar-i yid-k
isem "yimma" yessidir mebla lmakla
dɣa ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n gucin
a-ten-an warraw n luṭan Ḥuri akked umam
xelɛeɣ ɣilleɣ d azrem
ittcerrig ur ittxiḍi
cukkeɣ ilaq ad tḥebbreḍ ɣef yimal
mmi yusef mazal-it idder
semḥeɣ xas ma d lemuḥal
simmal tkemmseḍ simmal tkemmceḍ
uɣur tcuddeḍ ay ul-iw
asirem ur yelli deg ḥellu-s
ma d abṛaham yuɣal s amkan anda yezdeɣ
laɛqel d aneggaru i d-ittas
issuli-as aman d asawen
kra s tidi kra s nnhati
laẓ ur isɛi tinzert
xas ma kullec d aceɛtan
tettlusu am nutni
acḥal ɣur-k n yisetma-k
dɣa tella-d tafat
syin yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt deg walef u ttɛemya u ṛebɛa u xemsin
iccelqaf imeslayen
atan tura fell-aɣ i d-teɣli twaɣit
mṛucen s waman n bir zemzem
dda bṛahim irra-as i feṛṛuǧa inna a-tt-an tqeddact-im ɣur-m
s tkerkas i s-gan llsas
ad tiliḍ teṭṭseḍ mara d-yaweḍ baba-m s axxam
yenna-yas winna deg facebook ala nekk mačči d izi
Ɛada tesɛa-yas-d i Ɛisu ilifaz
Ɣef wayagi i s-tsemma naftali yeɛni amennuɣ
ur tesɛi lqaɛa ideg ar ad teqqim
d netta iwumi i yefka ayen akk yesɛa
teccetka yiwet seg tǧiratin-ik
iḥekku lbaḍna i win ukud ur iṭṭiḍ
tasga n umuḍin a tamettant
mkul yiwen d acu yurga mkul targit s lmeɛna-s
ay amsebrid s at yanni
yesṭenṭen-itent ubeḥri
ameɣnas-nni d aneɣmas
Ɛisu yezdeɣ deg udrar n siɛir
d aseɛreḍ kan i sseɛraḍen uma ur t-ḥemmlen ara
cqan-i medden ma nnan ul-iw yettḥibbi lbanan
ladɣa wid yeffren neɣ wid ur nesɛi ara allalen akken ad d-banen
mbeɛd yuɣal-d ikemmel lhedṛa yid-sen
d tanzarin n aɛli abennay
deg temkerḍit teɣli-d tsusmi muhabet
ttfuh iɣleb aḥlalas
ittak afus
lemmer ad ḥkuɣ i wasif ad yeǧǧ tazzla
iẓra uḥeṛṛat anida yiǧǧa awzir
ad am iḍlu Ṛebbi udi d tamment
ttfuh a taga wwan ibawen
tesɛa-d aqcic tsemma-yas cit tenna illu yefka-yi-d dderya-nniḍen iɣrem-iyi-d habil i yenɣa kayin
win yessummlen lbaṭel d azref-is
i tɛencuṛin-iw acuɣer i tent-id-tukwreḍ
anda teqqlem ad ɣ-tafem din
nuḥ ibna aɛalṭar i umeɣlal
tewɛer mi ara d-testeqsi
igenni iṛeɛɛed lqaɛa tremmed
ismendag times tayeḍ deffir-s
sliɣ belli llan yirden di maṣer
atnan deg yiwet n teṛbut
yiwen ufus ad k-islef wayeḍ ad k-izlef
yeḍra-d wayen iɣef i d-caren
steqsaɣ-tt nniɣ-as anwa i d baba-m
Ẓeṛ ssabqa taɣeḍ illi-s
ddima deg uxxam n yidles idir Ɛacur yebda leqdic-a ɣef lɛecṛa d tasawent
ad s-d-xedmeɣ tamɛiwent ara yilin d tamtilt-is
tḥesleḍ-iyi di tgersi
aɛebbuḍ-is d bu tɣemmaṛ
ayen i d-ittaken tabɣest
a yahdum-ik
mačči d ayen yuɛren lukan bɣiɣ
d afṛux i yeleqḍen iwzan
ur iɛawed ara ad iṭṭeṣ yid-s
d wigi meṛṛa i d arraw n yuqtan
ad yi-qilen i wudem-im
tuɣal d tameṭṭut-is iḥemmel-itt
gar wid i d-yeslulen tuddsa timeẓlit n umussu i trennawt n tlelliyin timagdayin
firiṣ isɛad Ḥiṣrun akked Ḥamul
tura kker ad tṛuḥeḍ si tmurt-agi
tezga tejmaɛt tettargu tafsut
ifka-as-ten iṭṭeṣ yid-s dɣa terfed s tadist
ur as-tezmir tamart wala temrart
acḥal neṭwi lwaḥi tiɣeṭṭen
ur yelli seg-m ara awiɣ
azaɣar n sidim iččuṛ d lebyur n uselɣaɣ
beddeɣ di tcihant
ma tugiḍ ad iddu ur nettṣubbu ara
ini  qwej neɣ bej
isem-is inuda leɛṛac
mmesfalten taxessaṛt
kul lɛib ad as-d-afen asemsel
abṛaham iɛac aṭas di tmurt n ifilistiyen
yella kra i ččant
i ubrid usennan arkas azuran
telha ṭṭaɛa ula ddaw lqaɛa
yeɛqub irra-yas i wacu
aɣmis n yimaziɣen ahat ad tessisneḍ i yimeɣriyen-nneɣ d anwa-t muṛad meẓri
zzhu n ddunit d aman n udfel
yir lɛella tuɣ lalla
sxesṛen-aɣ zzhu yiḍan
amayeg ufella iteffeẓ ur yesseblaɛ
wa yundi-tt wa iquṛeɛ-tt
ad imḥeq Ṛebbi taɣedduct-im
d lekdeb ziɣ mi yi-d-tenniḍ akken ḥemmleɣ-kem
awer nɣellet awer nettwaɣellet
acuɣer i d-tenniḍ d weltma
lewkil-nni ixdem akken i s-d-inna yusef
ur xeddmet ara lbaṭel
ahat d nekk ara k-imeḍlen
anwa ay d ameẓẓuɣ-ik a yaɣerbi
aya ad aɣ-yessiweḍ ad d-nini Ɣas aṭas i ibeddlen deg tmetti-nneɣ maca mazal abrid ɣezzif aṭas
aɛdaw-ik qsed-as asulef
ur tleḥḥuḍ alamma s ccuka am uɣyul
illu yenna i dda bṛahim ma d kečč ḥrez leɛqed-iw
ilaq-iyi ad tt-fruɣ acu ara xedmeɣ
yuɣ lḥut di lebḥeṛ
xedmeɣ-d tavidyut ɣef tatoeba
yewweḍ-ak-d ufaylu-nni i d-uzneɣ
tamnaṭ i zedɣen wat ismaɛil teṭṭef si Ḥawila armi d cur i yequblen maṣer deg ubrid ittawin ɣer acur
yella ḥedd yuhmen
yeḍra-d leεǧeb
irra-yas nekk d Ɛisu mmi-k amenzu
aql-i deg uɣbel ar yiri
yusef inna-yasen fket tiqeḍɛiyin-nwen
d aɛembub i yeɛna mačči d zzyen
nǧeɛ aɣyul ifhem uzger
am tadimt am lḥila
win ittu umezruy ttif xiṛ
tḥucc teḍfi
ad ibbeḥbeḥ ṭikkuk di tefsut
ttif tiderray ufus wala tigad n wul
tekcem-it tkerkra n at laxeṛt
mi meqqret yewwi-tt lɣir teǧǧa-d ccama deg ul
idrimen-nwen ṭṭfeɣ-ten-id
d ayen aṭas i ṣebreɣ
taggara deg imeslayen-iw nniɣ-d uhu
sebɛa n testad-nni yelhan d sebɛa n iseggasen
awal ssu-yas di tidet rrnu-yas
zemreɣ i iman-iw
isdari aqeṛṛu-s iǧǧa iḍaṛṛen-is
yewɛer uɛebbuḍ
tayri-w ad tt-teddem
i tuffɣa yelhan seg tezɣent ideg nella
teddem-it tsiwant
Ṣṣbeṛ i lmeḥna am sskeṛ i lqahwa
d iflu ur nettseqqi
ttaǧǧan imeɣnasen ttmettaten deg leḥbus u ad d-qqaren nettnadi tugdut
atan deg tḥeṣṣilt
da i yella tom neɣ xaṭi
ad ikker butlil di lemleḥ
a yaḍu ihuzzen izemran
ma ur tesmeḥsiseḍ ara i rradyu-nni ɣas ssens-itt
llant tid yugaren tiggi
aberrez d tixsi d uqelwac
testeqsaḍ-tent ma bɣant yiwet
ur tečči acemma
ttif xiṛ win ur nettamen wala imuḍinen n uqeṛṛu
d argaz i d-yebnan iman-is s yiman-is
imma jidda teṭṭef aẓaṛ tɣil d aḍaṛ
ladɣa di tussna
iwwi-tt-id ddaw ifer-is
tasebbalt ma tneggi asagem iwumi
wina iwumi zzin itran
d lawan n yibawen
qqaren-as tawekka neɣ akečča
ddunit ɣwezzifet ur teẓrim tehri-s
Ṛṛay d ṛṛay-is awal d awal-is
lliɣ qqareɣ-as wissen amek tga tin i y-iketben
anwa iḥettmen fell-ak ad txedmeḍ akken
ttxilem ur ttnadi fell-i
mačči cwiṭ i yessukk fell-i
teswiḍ di lḥila ur teslaleḍ
lxiṛ islulluc lhemm iskeɛɛuc
d tibkit n zzan i yeɣeẓẓen izan
a taɣaṭ am ucamar
ula d iẓerman n uɛebbuḍ ttnaɣen
aql-iyi di lemṛemma
yiwen n waɛrab yeɛmeṛ ssuq
naǧib meḥfuḍ wten-t s lmus ɣef lǧal n yiwen n wungal i yura
ad tesɣeṛṣeḍ ad ternuḍ
ur tettlaɛaj ttxil-m
yeεni ad d-tawiḍ tamsalt akken tella
tasedda d yiwet n tlemẓit taqbaylit i d-yekkren am tullas akk n tudrin
tettidir am nutni
ar melmi akka ara tekkatemt nneḥ
kečč d amezzgar n lxiṛ
iṛuḥ am tebṣelt si tebḥirt
ur gziɣ ara tamuɣli-ya-inem
ikad-iyi-d ilaq ad tmeyyzeḍ i wayen i d-iteddun
yufa ciṭ n lehna
isemma i umkad-nni bitil yeɛni axxam n yillu
cceṛ iɣleb-it lxiṛ
ameɣlal inna i kayin anda-t gma-k habil
iɛdawen imeqqranen d at igennuren
illu yexdem litteɛ
akken txedmeḍ iyuzaḍ ɣlayit
la ḥekkuɣ i gma taluft yeqqar acḥal tesɛiḍ
ala Ṛebbi urǧin neɛtiṛ
s wakka i yeẓra nuḥ belli neɣsen waman di ddunit
yeqḥeḍ wul-is
Ɣas akken di taddart-iw mačči d tikkelt tamezwarut i d-yella waya
a tid iwumi ɣezzif yiles
win ur nesɛi asuṛdi ad tyečč ukwerdi
a-ten-an warraw n dican Ɛuṣ akked aran
ameqran-nni yestkellfen s tissit inṭeq ɣer ferɛun inna-as ass-agi ad d-mmektiɣ ddnub-nni i xedmeɣ
d yir bnadem i iṛekzen
ur tufiḍ yeqqers ṭṭfer-is
zzit tettara lqut
aql-aɣ la nzehhu s wurfan
yemma-s n umaxuf leεmer teslalew
zgan ttawin-t d tiqiǧet
yerra-as aman d asawen
zik ɣas ini ulac wid izewwǧen s tayri
tamɣaṛt n lǧahennama tettɛeṛṛiḍ zzwaǧ
xdem lxiṛ i udɣaɣ ad k-t-id-yerr
zemreɣ ad t-sεuɣ
ma ulac-ikem amzun xlan
wehmeɣ d acu xeddmen iḍ-a iẓawaliyen
ad ig Ṛebbi d ayen i ken-ifdan
arrac-nni ttimɣuren
ur tezmireḍ ad teṭṭixreḍ tura
ur wwiɣ si tirect wala seg ukerfa
tesɛa-as-d i meẓyan yaɛuc yaɛlam akked quraḥ
lliɣ deg idurar
yeɛfu-yak s teɣwzi n leɛmeṛ
dɣa ferɛun yuki-d
ula deg lḥiǧ ttagaden ɣef tlawin-nsen
ixdem ɣef laban sebɛa n iseggasen-nniḍen
Ṛebbi illa asif illa
iwweḍ lḥal anida beddleɣ ula d ismawen n yilmeẓyen-nni
imir-nni i d-yeslul-d akked kra n yimeddukkal aseqqamu agrawlan i tiddukla n tigawt u yuɣal d aselway
iεreḍ-iyi s axxam
ifka yasen-d Ṛebbi tajeggaḥt
anwa nnutil ideg ara tettiliḍ
maca yiwet yiwet ad d-ɣellin yiwen yiwen
amek ara terreḍ uccen d amdakel
testeqsa-ten yamani suhila
tlata n watmaten-agi xedmen leɛqed nutni d dda bṛahim
ad yelhu ma meslayeɣ ɣef akka deg uxxam
Ɛni ad ɣ-teǧǧeḍ an-nemmet imi ulac idrimen
acu-tt twaturt-nni i llant nehhrent
tettubeddal tsedrit mačči d ṭṭbiɛa
ma regmeɣ-k ḥseb-iyi am kečč
d taḍsa n buzelluf ɣef lkanun
tewɛer tudert-a
ad kem-id-afeɣ deg berra
teẓriḍ nekk yid-m aḥlil
azal n tlaba ittban di ccetwa
terra-yas sew a sidi
awal ajdid iteqqes
mmugen am yiberriqen
ad k-ččeɣ ččeɣ tamurt ɣef tettedduḍ
iruḥ ɣer tefriqt akken ad d-iẓer iɣersiwen iweḥciyen
yahuda yenna-yas anef-as ad ten-tejmeɛ
ttif mṛeḥba wala tixsi
adarwic d win yeffeɣ swab
segmi tella tasedda d tagrudt ur tenḥarwi ara deg wayen akk i ḥemmlent tullas
neqqar yeshuttur neɣ yeshetrif
truḥ trisiti nettraju ad d-teqqel
err abbur
smesxiren yes-neɣ
teččuṛeḍ d tazmert akked ddreɛ
win ur nunez ur ikeččem
mi meẓẓiyet qqaren-as kan ad timɣur ad tbeddel
yezmer ad twet azekka
lmut d tamassaṛt
rwel s adrar iwakken ur tettmettateḍ ara
ur ɣ-iḥsib ara d tibeṛṛaniyin
iteddu deg iḍ kan ur ihedder d yiwen
akka i t-id-ufiɣ
qbel ihi di leɛnaya-k lxiṛ-nni i k-n-ceggɛeɣ
a xir lemmer ad i-tenɣeḍ
alɣem ittwali kan taɛrurt n gma-s
dda sliman iceyyeɛ afrux ifirelles ad s-d-yawi lexbar n tmurt
iwweḍ s anda ara naweḍ
ur tbennuḍ aɣerrabu s usɣar aqdim
ittru d umeksa itett d wuccanen
lmut deg yiberdan teqwa
ccah di ṛṛay-nsen
tayemmat d tameṭṭut yesɛan dderya
Ɣiwel ssemneɛ iman-ik ɣer dihin
msentan iḍudan deg allen
sselɛa ṛxisen d afrasen
iṭṭes di tṛakna yenna-as ccetwa teḥma
aɛdaw iqṛeḥ aḥbib ifṛeḥ
ttemsafarren tagut
wid ijebbden lqus ffɣen-as-d d iɛdawen
ansi s-ihwa ad yekk am uɣaṛaf
Ḍran-d wagulen
apsikyatr d amejjay n idarwicen
tom assa armi d-idemmer avilu-ines acku texsi-yas rruḍa
teqqimem ɣef yisennanen
mačči d yiwen n wemdan ara ixedmen amawal n tussna weḥd-s
d lqella n tecriḥt i yeččan bibras
leqhawi tiseklanin ggtent ɣur-neɣ maca ur tufiḍ wi yeqqaren
idrimen kfan lmal-nneɣ yuɣal d ayla-k
axaṭer ameɣlal iḥunn fell-as
yerkeb di lbabur iruḥ iɣab am yetri
iqeddacen-ik usan-d ad aǧwen lqut
yiwen ur ihedder
ur tezmireḍ ad tt-tetebεeḍ akka a tom
ma d ribka d yeɛqub i tḥemmel
ad tt-issewseɛ yillu ɣef yifit
meqqer ccmini-ya
menaɣ-ak tamettant ara k-iqeffɛen
anwa i d bab n lmal-agi i d-tezzewreḍ zdat-k
iruḥ ad d-yawi tunt-is yufa tekfa tmecreṭ
lefḥul ur ddarayen
mi k-d-inna bat ini-yas ḥatt
selleɣ i ifrax ttruḍen
ulac laman deg umḍiq-a
tamaziɣt d tawacult i yegebren snat n tmerwin d semmus n tutlayin
yerna ula d sidi d amɣar
d askiddeb i tella tiskiddib
mačči ɛecra ifassen ay sɛiɣ
s imeṭṭi-ik yenna abbuh
la ittneqlab am tata
ad nili din
am dderya n taɣaṭ mi d-ilul ibedd
mlaleɣ-t deg yennayer
lqut-agi isseḥnat
xas tekkat nda ur ḥulfeɣ
anda teqqen ay tebra
tura ẓriɣ belli tettagadeḍ illu
wiyaḍ anef ad aɣ-cemten
zzit-agi am umeṭṭi uṛumi
iwweḍ uqeṛṛu-s ar tcacit
mačči d ayla-w tkeṛṛust-a
bu yiwet n tiṭ ur iggan deg walim
nruḥ deg usikel iḍulen
ma rriɣ-d imirẓig cenna
isellem ɣef gma-s binyamin dɣa ittru
rran-as-d xaṭi di beṛṛa ara nens
win i t-yerran deg walef u ttɛemya u tmenya u xemsin d aneɣlaf n uwanek n unabaḍ uɛḍil
mazal-it idder
hedṛeɣ-as i mmi ifhem mmi-s n ɛemmi
ay asenduq n teslit awi-d tiwiztin
tikci s teɣṛaṛt areṭṭal s tmeḥḥaṛt
ur nettuɣal ara d taḍṣa i medden
ad d-itteddu ɣur-nneɣ
yesṭenṭen-it ubeḥri
yiwen ur d-ikki nnig-i deg wexxam-agi
yesṭenṭen-iten ubeḥri
xdem akken i d-tenniḍ
ad d-ifk ugudu lexṛif
ur ttruẓ ara aqerru-k ɣef akka
imir-nni mɛahaden
i yettimɣuṛen ala agudu
mcettamen s yiɣsan n at laxert
d kečč i y-isseɣren
tameṭṭut-is d tafransist
yugi ad tt-iffeɣ ubeḥri
ur telliḍ d akufi ad deg-k xezzneɣ
iɣma-yaɣ s nneɛlat d tesleqbin
ur yeɛdil umanun d uḥeṛṛat
ittsawam ur ittaɣ
d alim gar iqellalen
ccṛeɛ igenni leɛmeṛ iɣli
iṣbeḥ-d am lebzeṛ ɣef teṛbut
llant beddent snat n teqcicin deg ugnir nezga la tent-nettxatal
wwin-d ttesriḥ n tenhert s tijɛεal
irra-yas anɛam
ala Ṛebbi i yekfan iman-is
tnac n iseggasen i llan ddaw n uzaglu n kadurlaɛumir lameɛna aseggas wis tleṭṭac kkren-d ɣur-s
tekres twenza-m a tinna
tameddit akk nettat tessewway
yemmečč ujeǧǧig di tseḍwa-w
ičča aglim-is di lbaṭel
yenna-yasen qesdeɣ ad bnuɣ taglisya deg taddart-a-nneɣ
ma iruḥ yiḍes dayen iruḥ
at weswir iṣubben armi d lqaɛa
aṛan isɛa-d luṭ
iɣmi tezzi-yas ṭṭiṛa
yebda yekkat lǧuq
d bu uɛaṛqub i yessummṛen
ufiɣ lbaz ara aɣeɣ netta yebɣa-yi nekk bɣiɣ-t
wi iddan d lleh d win axiṛ
akka i d-teḍra
udi yuɣal d asafar
anda-t izimer i wesfel yerɣan
yenna-ten-id ass deg walef uttɛemya u tniyen u ttɛin
dɣa wwin tameṭṭut-nni s axxam n ferɛun
axxam bla tamɣart am yiger bla tadekkart
usu d aqeccuc aɛdil d ameccuc
ur tett ara akken tibexsisin ččurent d aḥekka
awit-iyi-d gma-twen amecṭuḥ ad tḥeqqeɣ belli d tidet i d-teqqarem mačči d ixbaṛǧiyen i tellam
irra-ten s asenduq n tedrimt n uxxam n ferɛun
Ɣas tḥemmel ḥedd ur teqqar ara i imawlan-is
d tiẓgi tamaẓunit i imeqqren akk deg umaḍal
yezmer ad d-yas
ttakeɣ-as kan tarbibt umeẓẓuɣ
iḥar dɣa yeffeɣ seg lḥaṛa
tettḍilli-d ur d-tkeččem
ayen isseblaɛ lebḥeṛ ay sbelɛeɣ
d arẓaz inebbcen deg leḥcic
kra yekka wass netta iteddu kan
iwṛet-iyi ur mmuteɣ
qeccen-t mi iεeṭṭel ur d-yuɣal deg yiḍ
ssardeɣ-d agnes
tidet am tyita n tmekḥelt
ay atmaten zedɣeɣ axxam ur ksibeɣ
yettwazref budyaf d iɛeggalen n tuddsa-a
yuɣal ittqeddim-as taqbuct i ferɛun s afus-is
amawal-a mačči inu
a Ṛebbi huzz ammud-is ma iččuṛ
yir zzit yerna leɣla
zemreɣ ad d-afeɣ amek ara nekcem
tedɛa-yam yemma-m s lxir
Ḥyu-yi-d ass-a nneɣ-iyi azekka
Ẓefk-iyi ul-ik kkes-iyi iles-ik
s leɛnaya n wat yigrawen d wat wurawen
axaṭer seg urrif-nni i rfan nɣan irgazen
rewleɣ i tmeqqwa ɣliɣ di temda
acu i k-iεeǧben tteffaḥ neɣ lbanan
Ṣṣbeṛ d unqis ẓẓheṛ d ukḥis
ad t-barkeɣ yerna ad k-d-fkeɣ seg-s aqcic
rran-as d abeḥḥet i ɣ-ibeḥḥet urgaz-nni
ittṣeḥḥir ur ittuẓum
yeččeḥ yisli yegguma ad yečč imensi
yedder ayen yedder dinna meɛna ula din llan wuguren i yesserwalen ilmezyen
ayen i k-iggunin zwir deg-s
akken i t-id-uɣeɣ ad t-zzenzeɣ
melmi temẓi ifilku mi d-ikker irekku
win isɛan tasa ur ičči tansa
Ḍḥiɣ d aɣrib di tmurt-iw
ala yir lɛebd i yeneṣḥen taṛbut
amek armi yumen yizimer s tegmat n wuccen
d iseggasen-aya ur iwit tom agiṭar
azekka-nni ṣṣbeḥ ferɛun ikker-d itqelleq
mi iṛwa lkerc aqeṛṛu ifeḥcec
nneyya tekka di tḥila
ffṛefṛen inelmaden
iles d leḥrir ul d ddkir
ttif nnger wala amdegger
imiren itbeɛ igelliden-nni armi d dan
ar tdemmreḍ taɣaṭ ar ad d-tefk ayefki
tedɛa-yakent yemma-tkent s lxir
ay tṛemleḍ a lqaɛa
ur ẓriɣ ansi i yi-d-yekka ɛeyyu-ya
Ǧǧiɣ-tt-in d mm tmenṭac mazal qqaren-as "tislit"
iɣil uqbel ssqef ad s-txedmeḍ i lbabur-agi ṭṭaq
ablaḍ iɣummen lbir-nni d ameqran
d yiwen uklucaṛ kan itessen lbira
nekk ur d-cfiɣ ara ɣef yiseggasen n sebɛin
beṛṛa nnwen zdaxel nneɣ
myecbaken tiqellaɛin
tella-d tmeddit illa-d ṣṣbeḥ d ass amezwaru
wwiɣ-t ad iẓẓiẓen iẓẓel iḍaṛṛen
menwala yundi taqlaḍt
iceɣɣeb-aɣ yimal-ik
ad t-ig Ṛebbi n at ṭṭaɛa d ṛṛeḥma
i d-ittaǧǧan taɣawsa d tukksa
iban d axxam n yillu d tabburt n igenwan
Ɣelben aɛraben s umceččew
iwala asteɛfu d ayen yelhan tamurt tgerrez
mi ara nwali acḥal i yettmettaten deg yiberdan
ad k-issufeɣ Ṛebbi leḥkem n usɣaṛ
udem ubaqac
ccrif xeddam yecna aṭas ɣef temẓi d wakud izerrin
nesteqsa murad mezri ɣef kra n tlufa
aqejmuṛ leɛmeṛ yundi taqellaɛt
mɛahaden ihi di bir cibaɛ
Ɣileɣ d sslaṭen ziɣemma d ccwaṭen
lɣeṛba n wur neɛmiṛ d aqwiṛ
ma d win iɣer ara tafeḍ tiɛencuṛin-ik ad immet
tajmilt-iw i kamal fexxaṛ
inwa d anciwen ziɣenni d acciwen
ayen akken yexdem d ayen ur iqebbel leɛqel
awḥid inɣa-t ccṛaɛ
tewser d mm laɛyub
ad k-rnuɣ amur ɣef watmaten-ik
si mḥemmed iṭṭeṣ akked meɛǧuṭa i yeḥemmel akteṛ n nna feḍmuca
afremli d win yettaken tallelt i umejjay
ameɣlal illu yenna i uzrem imi i txedmeḍ ayagi tettwaneɛleḍ gar lmal meṛṛa gar lḥiwan meṛṛa n lexla
jemɛen-d iẓra xedmen-ten d aɛemmuṛ
am rrezg-nneɣ di lqid nerna nessikid
d aɛeggal n ukabar n uɣref azzayri
si lǧennet ffɣeɣ a wi k-yeẓran dayem akka
Ḥedd ur yeẓri acuɣer
Ṛebbi ittseqqi di lḥila iṣeḥḥan
dɣa dduklen di sin ṛuḥen
tameṭṭut twala belli ṭṭejṛa-nni telha i wučči teɛǧeb i tmuɣli yerna d tin izemren ad d-tefk tamusni
tselleḍ-aɣ-d
Ɣef waya tira tgerrez ama deg usenfali neɣ deg umawal
nwiɣ tkerheḍ-iyi
i yessnen lmesk d aɛeṭṭaṛ
lameɛna illu ur s-iɛemmed ara ad yi-ixdem cceṛ
ad s-txedmeḍ tabburt ɣef yidis-is
sefreḥ-it seḥzen-it seḍs-it
tikti-ya n tikli deg ass n lǧemɛa ɣer maṣer i tt-id-wwin
teǧhed taɣect-ik
yusef inna-yasen fket tiqeḍɛiyinnwen
iṭṭef-d izan s ufus
ikker-d ubasin-is
Ẓeṭṭes ɣef ikaɛruren
nnan ddunit tbedd ɣef yicc uɛerrum
beddel avaṭar-ik ma dayen teɛyiḍ deg-s
tusam-d ad teẓrem lesrar n tmurt
ma d cwiṭ-agi melleḥ-it
yahuda yenna-yas d acu ara nini i sidi
nuḥ iɛac tseɛ meyya uxemsin n iseggasen
argaz ad iwwet ad ittuwwet
Ԑeṭṭleɣ acemma mi d-wwḍeɣ
dayen ndemmeɣ deg usefru i uriɣ
deg tegnatin-agi i d-yeslal budyaf akabar n tegrawla tanemlayt
tibbura n Ṛebbi ur ttwamdalent
yeɛceq tacennayt ur yettemlil deg ddunit-is
yeṭṭef-iyi makay iḍ-a iɛeddan ur ṭṭiseɣ ara yakk
ad kem-issentu Ṛebbi am tagust
anta tuggi ur nerri taseksut
ddiɣ yid-s deg usikel
anda teɣli zzerriɛa ad d-imɣi ṛṛbiɛ
ur ttaǧǧat lefḍayel n useggas
aneggaru-nni iwumi mliɣ tikti-iw iɣill-iyi mxelleɣ
mačči d ayen fessusen acku asenfar-agi yeḥwaǧ aṭas n tedrimt
kra ur ɣ-icewwel
yeɛqub ifka i meẓyan aɣrum d leǧwaz n leɛdes
lmektub yugi ad tt-sɛuɣ
yusef di lḥebs mbeɛd ayagi meṛṛa tameṭṭut n ssid-is terfed allen-is ɣer yusef tenna-yas Ṭṭeṣ yid-i
aɛziz am lkil n wudi
inebgi mi ara iqdem teffeɣ-it lbenna
bges s ubetṛun
abṛaham yya ɣer da
illu yenna i nuḥ Ɣur-i taggara n mkul lxelq tewweḍ-d
lḥila n ṣṣbeṛ teččuṛ
tefrest-it tarwa-s lebɣi ad isaṛ
yenna meɛtub deg tezlit i as-iga d tajmilt tneǧreḍ-d iswi i ccetla tura steɛfu mass budyaf
yemma s umagad urǧin tessiɣret
d tixsi ay n udem-ik
lliɣ bɣiɣ ad s-iniɣ i tom iwacu
ufrik ur iqqin iḍsa
ad tiliḍ teṭṭseḍ mara d-yaweḍ baba-k s axxam
ameɣlal ireẓq-itt-id akken i s-t-iwɛed
ikellex-as zzman ur yeẓri ansi s-tufeg
Ẓefk-iyi tili ǧǧiɣ-ak učči
axaṭer aql-ak am ferɛun
axeṛṛaz yenɣan mmi-s
wah ma truḥeḍ anda i k-nniɣ
ur qebbleɣ ḥedd deg umkan-im
yuɣal-as lhemm d arfiq
mmugent kra n lɣelṭat
iban ad tt-yexdem kan tom
Ɛeddan-d sin iɣerdayen ibezgen s ugeffur
amɣaṛ-agi issenfufud-itent
tafsut tettṛebbi anebdu ittɛebbi
kerheɣ taḍeggalt-iw
Ṭṭejṛa ur nesɛi tili awer tili
suqleɣ-d kra n yidlisen si tsekla tamasiḥit
irẓa abeṛdi i ucmux
Ɣas tuli ssuma n lpitrul mačči i nekni
ma mačči akka i yella lḥal ad t-ẓreɣ
am wi ittǧewwizen s qeḍran
tewwet s lqewwa adfel d tiṛika
ulac aɣilif ma uɣaleɣ-d zik ɣer uxxam
ur nhenna ara
ulac cciṭan sennig win iskiddiben
Ɣas akken lqus-is ur illeɣwi ara
ur tefhim ara amaḍal-nsent
tom werǧin i yessuden mary
ssedɛɛayen tazemmermuct
aqbayli ma ixuṣṣ-it udrar azzayri kan ara s-semmin
d aslaɣ i yesleɣ mačči tuslin
ih leddin ass n ssebt
awi-d ad sweɣ
yusef ikna ɣer baba-s issuden-it ittru
taluft-nni ar ass-a mazal tettḥaz imdanen
drus i ikeččmen ad lemden
uccen ur tt-isɛedday ɣef uccen
uccen iṭṭammaɛ deg ulɣem
irgazen-nni ṛuḥen syenna rran ɣer sudum
ar d-iger wajdim timceḍt
aqcic ittimɣur ddaw n leɛnaya n yillu
sgumiɣ ad t-rreɣ
yettruẓ-iyi aqerru tom mara ihedder
syin ssawlen i budyaf ɣer merruk i waken ad yuɣal d aselwaya n lezzayer imi ttwaḥebsent tefranin
ur ittwaṭṭaf ujenwi si leqḍaɛ
mačči d ayen ara yelhun
a-t-an ihi ittubarek
werǧin i teεciq
lleh yeɛṭi-k aɛebbuḍ deffir tezmert
ur txeddem ara ccɣel am win
isemma-yas faraṣ yeɛni icerrig
teččuṛ-as
ajinikulog d amejjay n tlawin
deg ugraw n ssumam i yeḍran deg ɣuct walef u ttɛemya u setta u xemsin
ar d iččaṛ uyeddid ar d iṛecceḥ
llant lxalat llant lxelyat
acuɣer i yi-tkellxeḍ
yeɛqub ittḥawat di Ɛisu armi i yeqbel
ahat ad xaṣṣen xemsa si xemsin-nni n iḥeqqiyen
aru kra
ccah di ṛṛay-iw
illu yenna ad ttluɣun waman s lexliqat yeddren
mmi-k ḥseb-it ḥaseb-it
Ṭṭɛam n Ṛebbi awer tenneḥwaǧem
wid yecban uleḥlu ali ideflawen malika dumran zeddek lmulud akked waṭas-nniḍen
yeɛqub ikemmel abrid-is
mi ẓdiɣ ad ig Ṛebbi tsaq
ad aɣ-iǧɛel Ṛebbi di telt lbaqi
iwwi-tt-id di tenyirt-is
ayɣer i tṣebreḍ i wakka
di lweqt-nni d ikanɛaniyen i yezedɣen tamurt
batwil iǧǧa-d ribka
imlal uqḍib ar gma-s
isṛayil irra-yas anɛam
nekni s wid ur nettamen ur nesɛi iwumi ara nedɛu
tirmegt deg igenni lmaɛun ar yini
tebɣa ad iyi-tessebleɛ lqaɛa si leḥya
leqḥeḍ iḥuza tudrin-nneɣ
yekna umɣar si leɛtab
agujil d agujil a lukan s učamar
terra-yi-d d yelli-s n batwil i d-tesɛa milka i naḥuṛ
tekcem-it lmudawala
ad d-ners ar wannar tuddar idurar
i wudem n feṛṛuǧa ferɛun ixdem-as leḥsan i dda bṛahim
fkan tiffaf i uɣyul
tedder akken acḥal d aseggas armi d ass i deg-i d-temlal tin yellan am nettat
yesteqsa-t mhenni xalifi
reggmen ben Ɣebriṭ mi sen-tekkes "besmelleh" deg idlisen uselmed
anda nensa ad yali wass
daymi i tuɣal d tameṭṭut-iw
tebɣa ad d-taɣ akanic
iṛẓa uɛeẓẓi tazemmurt
isḥaq iɛreḍ-iten ɣer lmakla
ccṛeɛ s iɣimi mačči s ibeddi
ahat ilaq-aɣ ad nehder qbel ɣef aya
day teṛṣiḍ fell-as tigusa
ferɛun inna i yeɛqub acḥal di lɛemṛ-ik
imaṣriyen ḥeznen fell-as sebɛin n wussan
lexliqa uxellaq tiyta ur tlaq
i usmekti d usiweḍ tameddit-agi deg lwilaya n bgayet
telḥa ugar ɣef yiseggasen iεeddan
mi tefra ad neẓdem
tixsi immezlen tekkat di tin uzan
aṛeṭṭal itbeɛ-it lexlaṣ
llan tetten ala bibṛas d tzuḍla neɣ tasemmumt ma ufan-tt
teznuzu imeslayen-is
iṛẓa tiseɣlit n Ṛebbi
ttabaɛeɣ iṭij s tmuɣli
ilaq-ak ad twejdeḍ i kullec
ur qeṛṛen ara azger ar uɣyul
ad fṛuṛxen ad ftin di ddunit
attan tura truḥ-d tebḥritt d tasemmaḍt
aha-w ad nḍeqqer ayen akk yellan da
ikker-d ufrux yesselqaḍen baba-s
awal d aciri mačči d asmiri
serreḥ-as
kifkif am mmi-s am baba-s
yuɣ itent mkemmda
nusa-d yakan akken ad naǧew lqut
ansi i d ikka waḍu ad t-yerr ɣer din
tebra i yimeẓẓuɣen-is
ittwamseḥ yism-iw
Ɣas imawlan-is ttaεraḍen ad tt-id-rebbin d taqcict meɛna nettat tettidir am yiqcicen tetturar yid-sen
d kra yellan d ajdid
ičča ul-is deg urkul
anwa iɣef txaqeḍ daɣen
yella ḥedd i d-yeɣɣaren ɣef yisem-iw
adfel lḥu-as lehwa ddari-as
ur ttaǧǧa ara uzzal ad yismiḍ
ddmeɣ-d lewṭer ad cnuɣ taɣect uriɣ zik-nni
deg wayen iɛeddan send ad yettwamdel ubrid ɣef sebba n lecɣal i yettmaggan dinna
tufiḍ-d at rbaḥ ɣeḍlen igelman
ttnaɣen am yiḍan di tesraft
ad irḥem Ṛebbi taɛebbuḍt yettarwen
idurar meṛṛa ɛlayen yellan di ddunit ɣummen
ad t-tebɛeɣ alamma imɣi-d gerninuc
ad yerẓ fell-i kawkaw
ur yi-gezzmem ara awal
Ɣilleɣ d ttiɛad i yesɛa d yiwet dinna ziɣ iruḥ ad d-ibecc
ay ammer ad ḥluɣ
kra ur t-uriɣ maḍi
iwḥel uxlul di lɣiḍa
izgaren akken mseḥṛaten i kerrzen
ad d-yekk usalas seg umagraman
irgazen n tura d ttimina
lbaḍna ma tettwamla tettwanna
tuɣ inewweṛ uzzu tafsut d ussan-aya mi tekcem
yebεed ɣef temdint wanda akken yezdeɣ
ur lliɣ d iriẓri
tedɛa-yasent yemma-tsent s lxir
ttemxebbacen am iqerdacen
ma ur tenɣiḍ ard ad temmteḍ
lemmεen yiwet n ssṛaya ɣer lebεid
iger fell-as tacḍaḍt
ifsa rrebg i tlufa
tesεiḍ ẓẓher i yufan axeddim
ifhem s lɣemza mačči s ddebza
iṛuḥ syenna iɣza lbi- nniḍen
ula d netta d mmi-tneɣ
ur tettmettatem ara
ur t-ẓriɣ ara
Ǧeṛǧeṛ yessawel i wat mẓab
imir-nni sersen-as-d ad yečč
ccib n tmes
ass mi ara rnuɣ ɣer lejdud-iw awi-yi si maṣer
Ɛli d weɛli d irfiqen assa mfaraqen
aneɣmas d win id-yettḥawacen isallen sya d sya
ur ken-ittɣiḍi ara wayen ara n-teǧǧem dinna axaṭer ayen akk i tesɛa tmurt d lemxeyyeṛ ad yuɣal nwen
lḥewj n lwali i yeqqaṛen i uqjun xali
ma d win ur neɣri meskin gar-asen ur yesɛi amkan
kem a yell-i a taxeddact umenzu
tettruḍ
a yeɛqub anida telliḍ
yebεed lḥal
werǧin ɣilleɣ d ayen yesseḥmawen akk annect-a
heggi usu uqbel ad tennudmeḍ
teḍṛa yid-i am teɣṛast ugayemru
yya ad k-ceggɛeɣ ɣur-sen
arraw n zabulun sirid ilun akked yaḥliyil
gma-k ad k-iffeẓ ur k-isseblaɛ
ur d-faqeɣ ara yakk ma din i telliḍ
d Ṛebbi i iraden d tabarda i yemmalen
ičča di tbarda-s am uɣyul
a-tt-an dɣa yelli-s meɛǧuṭa anda i d-tewweḍ s lmal
tiɛuṛba akked tineslemt nɣant tudert n yimaziɣen
sseɛd d anyir cedda d awzir
acku ad d-temmeslayeḍ seg yal tama
ttqerriḥen-tt ijeɣdanen-is
ferɛun iceggeɛ ad as-d-awin yusef
lukan d nekk ad aɣeɣ wa
rriɣ-as anɛam
sekra ara texdem
ur ɛecceq deg uzeqquṛ ad t-tbibbeḍ
ttif laẓ wala yir imensi
a wi iddan deg imi-k
mǧuǧǧin-d ifellaḥen ɣer usqif
wa s wudem wa s uzagur
yesṭenṭen-ik ubeḥri
ur ssinen ara tasertit
ttarran akk tijmilin i imyura maca drus i yeqqaren idlisen-nsen
acḥal-aya mi d-kkreɣ yegguma ad ifakk wassa
ur sserwatet ara ay arrac
leḥnana n tyaziḍt ur nessuṭṭuḍ
ma ṭṭfeɣ lḥaǧa ad teɣli
yyaw ad t-nezzenz i wat ismaɛil
ay urweɣ qqimeɣ-d weḥd-i
tameṭṭut mm ubuḥcic
win yeffuden yeddu ar tala
ul-iw yegguma ad yemɣur mazal-it yeččur yesɛa d acu ara d-yini
kayin ihdeṛ i gma-s habil
d lekdeb ur ttawin idurar
inɣel-as-d akerciw deg iciwi
ddac ddac
ad teṛwum tiḥlawatin
init-d anda yezdeɣ swaswa
ad iqḍeɛ lbabuṛ s uɣyul
ameɣlal inna i kayin acuɣer akka i terfiḍ
ttif ddel n wumcic wala win uɣerda
kkes "lukan" acu ara d-iqqimen
kra n win ittɣawalen yekkat-it wugur
ibedd ɣef tneṭlin isberwi lmeggtin
ičča tiṭ n bururu
akken yella baba-s ad yili mmi-s
yusef inna-yasen d lekdeb
d wid yessusemen ɣef lmerta-s i s-yettarran tajmilt assa
Ɛkel-it kan fell-i ad k-t-id-rreɣ
a rewlet a wi ara irewlen
illu iqbel-d liya
aqjun ad iṛwu taḥbult ur tbeddu
tasa ur tettṛebbi cceḥna
illi axenfuc-is am ujaɣiɣ
lehlak-is yezga d aqdim
mi ɣaben yizmawen ad sreɛrɛen yiḍan
iteẓẓaɛ izan s ṛṛṣaṣ
neḥwaǧ ugar n wanzaten
imi i d-nettmeslay ɣef tussna
ur ɣelṭeɣ ara
tsemma-yas zabulun yeɛni ccan
akli ifuḥ lqesma-s ẓidet
d ayen akken iẓẓa i d-imɣin
win itewlen yif win iǧehden
Ḥesset-d i baba-twen isṛayil
ad yili d avirus kan
amejjay d win yesseḥluyen imdanen seg waṭṭan-nsen
amek ur tettḥussuḍ s kra
ticraḍ s tmenɣac mačči s tɣiɣac
akken alamma leḥqeɣ- n sidi ɣer siɛir
yiwet ur tebɣi ṭṭraḍ
yugem-d tagdurt n tsusmi
ad ḥasbeɣ kra n lḥiwan ara ten-issizzlen
acuɣer ugadeɣ tili
armi d ayen i sliɣ ass-a
ddiɣ-am di lebɣi
yal tirect s ukwerfa
lḥila ma teččuṛ ad d-tfel
ruḥeɣ ɣer tessirt ufiɣ-tt tbelleɛ
bɣan kan ad d-iniɣ belli sḥassfeɣ
a weḥci a weḥci qqimeɣ weḥdi
robinson crusoe yufa-d iman-is weḥd-s deg yiwet n tegzirt
yeẓẓad awren
netta d iɛeggalen n ti rni n uselelli aɣelnaws ubeddel n ubrid i temsrifegt
ttbelɛuεucen deg-s ikeččawen
mbeɛd talalit n nuḥ limix iɛac xems meyya u xemsa u ttsɛin n iseggasen yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas
arraw n isṛayil xedmen akken
ad d-yefk yiddew tassemt
ttejṛa tettabeɛ aẓar-is
la iberren am uẓṛem di lkanun
gma-s isem-is yubal
day kul taxellalt s tmellat
axaṭer illu yexdem amdan ɣef ṣṣifa-s
tṛuḥ tettmenṭar deg uneẓruf n bir cibaɛ
xḍiɣ i tikli izerman
nnṣib n lɛebd am tili-s
lamin n taddart ur ittwaxellaṣ ara
bḍu tawlaft-nni akken ad tt-ẓren akk yemdukal-ik
ad d-negri di silbubli
irɣa uzegzaw d uquran
anda ufan lǧetta-nni
dɣa teḥbes ur d-tettarew ara
gar cwiṭ d waṭas
ttnadin tamanegt ttun nnif
tarikt ur tesɛa ara ṭṭfuṛ am tbarda
xḍant akk tlawin-nni i tsertit
sser-is d yemma-s kkes-itt ffer-itt
Ɣas ul-iw ur kem-yeɛqil
settu-as lhem ma iḥuza-t uɣuṛṛu
aɛdaw ur itettu ara tigad-is
tamuɣli d leɛḍil rnu ɛad ibeddi
almend n wakka atan yettwareṣṣa yiwen n yibeddi aɣerman iǧehden
wwin-d tiyuẓaḍ ara zlun
yegra-yi-d ad ṣebṛeɣ
maca tettwaceqqeq tuddsa-agi deg useggas n alef u ttɛemya u xemsin
zik d rrus d marikan tura yerna-d ccinwa
yugar ferɛun di lweqt-is
apulaṛ yezmer ad yili d asaru neɣ d ungal
Ṛǧu ar d tarew tyaziḍt-iw
ifhem s tiṭ
win ur nesɛi lwali ittgalla s xwali
asammer d aɣuṛaṛ amalu d agris
Ɣran d cciṭan sawḍen kellxen-as
iwwet-it baɣa
aɣyul ittḥazam aɣyul
d aqedduḥ n leḥbeq
yella ḥedd sdaxel
rnu weεεed-iyi-d kra nniḍen
llant yid-i deg texxamt-nni kra yekka yiḍ
tom yerra metwal isekfal
gmas uzaglu d kennu
ayen yuɣ n tiytiwin yal ass d taḥkayt
ula d ixennaben ma yewwi-ten-id webrid ur ttafen ara akren
ittqellib iẓuṛan n tagut
iwacu ur tettileḍ ara aṭufan-nni
aṭas i yeɛebba yeččur ẓẓay ur yezmir ara
d agdud ur nesɛi tilelli deg idles-is
ittlaqac ifrax deg genni
wi kumt-illa
yettbin-d yeqwem
lexbaṛ n teẓgi a-t-an ar uɛeẓẓi
ani yekka buseḥṣel ad d-yekk busellek
ayt tizi d taɣiwant taqbaylit deg ugezdu n sṭif
taguni uyaziḍ af useɣwen
xas akken tbeɛdeḍ fell-i
siwa teṛẓeg ay ufiɣ
ad fell-as sewwqen idder
ilaq ad isbedd ferɛun imḍebbren di maṣer
swemt lqahwa
Ččar ilmawen-nni
yeɛqub iḥka-yas kullec i laban
anda i tt-greɣ teqquṛ
zik tuget iɣennayen s umundol d dderbuka kan i cennun
ur iẓri anda zzant wala ṛɣant
aḥeqqaṛ kkes-as neɣ rnu-yas
jjenjaṛ i tiṭ lemleḥ i tqeṭṭiṭ
lemmer ar lǧennet yili tezwareḍ-iyi
ayen yiflen i tizi ur d-itezzi
am win itekksen isellufen i uqjun
d kra n taɣawsa tamynut
ar ass-a tugi ad aɣ-tettu
yeḥḍer i tmenɣiwt
ad ikkes afus i tsebbalt
yuget leqdic adelsan deg tmurt n leqbayel merra akked tmura tiberraniyin
teffud ur teswi
rju a d-yuɣal baba-k s axxam
i icelɛan ala win terza tyita
ttel llufan-nni wissen ad yeṭṭes
d tuffra n uɣyul deg utemmu
armi i tt-smesxeɣ
amyaru yessefk ad yili d inigi n tallit-is d amazan n tidet
d tasa uṛumi
Ṣeggnen-k-id s leḥmegga
d ibawen-iw i ittewwan
tusa-t-id tikti tgerrez
rregmat d awal tisusaf d aman
la ismenɣuɣud deg awal irennu
muḥal fell-am ad beddleɣ
ur t-ufiɣ di tizi wala di twizi
Ṛqiq am iẓḍi
imir dɣa i yura adlis-nni iwmi isemma tagduda
ttxil-wat ur ttbeddilet ara imukan i iruka-nni
bḍiɣ tasufeɣt-is rniɣ wennteɣ-tt
lǧahel uqbiḥ yif lxayen n ttuba
d tiyita n qli u qleb
msenṭaḍen ljayḥa n wa i wa
ma ibɣa Ṛebbi ad d-ifk yessen axxam
leɛtab ur ittwaḥsab
ibennu mebla aqbuc mebla aqnuc
imir-nni i yettwaḥkem s lmut
Ḥemmleɣ-kem seg ass amezwaru
d asfuǧǧeɣ i tesfuǧǧuɣem
mi tettuḍ lḥaǧa ad tettwaɣbu
iččernennay ur izmir
ahat tikwal ifeccel ula d netta di lweqt-is
lɣeṛba d ultma-s n lmut
nnan-iyi-d ad k-d-fkeɣ aya
anwa yeddan d twizi
ar nsel i uɣyul yuɣwas di lebḥeṛ
iɣyal ttemkerrɛan gar-asen
ibellireǧ ixla lɛeṛc
d asteqsi i nezmer ad neg ass-a n wussan
sliɣ sqaqayen yewzaḍ deg ufrag
syin yettwanɣa srid deg wass n tesɛa uɛecrin yunyu alef u ttɛemya u tniyen u ttsɛin deg temdint n Ɛennaba
yessaweε-itt udfel
s yimeslayen-agi i d-yekcem budyaf akal n tmurt-is d waṭas n usirem
yettriḥ-d d asdegdeg
ičča lḥelba
llan wid yegganen deg ass xeddmen deg iḍ
ass deg iyi-tejjmeḍ
ayen ur tessineḍ yezmer ad k-iḍurr
awi-d ad eččeɣ
imawlan ṣebṛen imɛazzan kefṛen
fkan-tt ɣer fransa i yiwen ur teẓri ula d tteṣwira-s
anwa-ten wigi
ur ittqessir ḥedd d uɣyul-is
kunwi d imukar
Ẓẓay-it ṛwan
winna mi ara ihedder ṭṭef kan astilu taruḍ
yusef yufa lemzeyya ɣer ssid-is
tin i d-iheggan sin wussan n usmekti s waṭas n yiremad idelsanen
am uccen i yefeṛqen tajlibt
adlis-ayi ad yemmag deg leqjer-nni anǧi
ad s-meyyzeɣ
mdexwacen am yilfan
kkes iqaciren-ik ttxil-k
teɛreḍ-iyi ɣer uneḍru-nni
tiṭ uyaziḍ s irden
amellaẓu urǧin ittɣunfu
ikkat-as abendayer ad icḍeḥ
iɛudiwen tetten ṛṛbiɛ
akken wid i ɣ-yessweεden
temxellemt akk
yeqqim-iyi-d kan ad rewleɣ ad beddleɣ tamurt
nwiɣ tebɣam ad terjum
in-as ad terju ad teṣber d rebbi i iraden fell-aɣ
wissen anwa i ten-yewwten
yusef d axalaf n ṭṭejṛa yettarwen
neǧǧa-yam-d amkan
asif wis ṛebɛa d faṛat
ayen iflen i tizi ur d-itezzi
nettat daɣen ur yi-d-tenni ara d gma
ur whimeɣ ara mliḥ
yir lqut ur issawan
asideg n yifecka ɣer teqbaylit
taɛrabt akked tineslemt qqeṛsen-d i Ṛebbu deg uzal qayli ɣer tudrin-nneɣ
ikker umulab i llafaɛ
illa wanda ara nens deg wexxam n baba-m
ad iṭṭef Ṛebbi i yugaren aya
tislit tedda iḥzen umeksa
ruḥet ad tleɛbem saɣel
afexxaṛ mi yiqdem erẓ-it
yuker ḥedṛeɣ yeggul umneɣ
win yurgan ulaxeṛt iniwel lweɛda
tufrar tagut iffeɣ leɛtab ɣeṛ tafat
ikkes-d afus-is si Ṛebbi
mi teqquṛ teẓgi cɛel-as
nedmeɣ imi ur ṣfiɣ yid-k
aqcic-nni yella yeččur uεebbuḍ-is
awer d am teǧǧuǧeg
Ṛebbi ɛziz lebṣel meqqer
assa d lḥedd
dinna i yesɛedda yeɛqub iḍ-nni
ayen-nni akk i yi-iǧǧan
nɣan daɣen s ujenwi Ḥamur akked mmi-s caxim
ad s-tiniḍ irwel-d i rebbi deg iḍ
yewwi-k nadam yakan deg kra n temlilit
kenwi arwet ffuktit ččaṛet ddunit tɛemṛem-tt
ma d wid i d-iqqimen rewlen s adrar
akka imir-a
bɣiɣ ad sɛuɣ aṭas n yedrimen
biɛemṛan iɣzeṛ n ṭṭlam tuggict n yiẓerman
ccetwa tḍul učči yenqedwa arrac lluẓen
bɣan warrac ad zhun
winna yettas-d alamma d taddart akken ad yaɣ zzeɛter
axir llesqa tazeqqa
ssmaḥ n tudert
sawalen-iyi-d imawlan-iw yal ass
ad ṛwuɣ tiḥlawatin
barek-iyi ula d nekk a baba
tura-t nisma tigrin deg uɣmis n yimaziɣen
atan sɛiɣ-as-d aqcic ɣer ccyub-is
letthi d ccɣel-ik
myendahen s tyitiwin
nuɣal-d ɣer llekka qbel ad d-yeɣli yiḍ
izwer lɛid s yiwen wass
zzheṛ-ik isefsay idɣaɣen
mačči ɣulleɣ-ten wah nekk d acu rebḥeɣ
iwakken kan ur ttxemmimeɣ ara ɣef texḍibt-iw
ittzuxxu umeksa ma ulac bab n yiger
icfa-d i lebḥeṛ mi yeṛɣa
tella-d tmeddit illa-d ṣṣbeḥ d ass wis xemsa
inza fell-am wawal
walaɣ at laxert la tetten ibawen
tura ǧǧan medden tira s ustilu
iga d nnfeɛ ula deg akal
ur kkat a gma ineṭṭeḍ
ma ṭṭfent-aɣ nemmut nemmut
yeɣra tabrat-nni akken ttazzalen imeṭṭawen ɣef leḥnak-is
igzem afurk ɣef iqqim
seg asmi nnuɣen msendudren allen
kunwi d at sin wudmawen
bɣiɣ ad rnuɣ ad sleɣ
ttqadareɣ-k s kečč s tmuɣliwin-ik
janeb tilufa eǧǧ abelluḍ i tsufa
xas ad yesmuhbel yiles
s uqeṛṛu-k
ur k-d-ikad ara nuklal timqidra n tom
acu yuɣen akk imdanen-a
axaṭer ameɣlal iwala-d i lḥif-im
iaɛdel ma thudd neɣ teɛmeṛ
ad yi-tεawneḍ ad ssirdeɣ iqeslan-a
amek d sselṭan meɛna ur tesɛiḍ ara idrimen
tuɣal d abaxix ameqqran
Ṣṣuṛa d ayeddid ul d agellid
tqeyyen deg-s dɣa d ayen i t-yessfeqεen
aṭas n medden i yettrajun deg berra
axxam ajdid issewḥac
ccerka yid-s d taxennaqt
qwant tjeɛɛal deg unabaḍ
yiwen seg wass mi yeffeɣ seg uxxam ur t-walant wallen-iw
ittnernay am tfunast izeglen
Ṛebbi di leɛmeṛ-is yeṭṭis
terriḍ-tt kan i ucali
nasbet-aɣ imi nekni d imceyyɛen n yillu
swan yid-s armi i ṛwan
yuker d imukar ittru d wat uxxam
laẓ angaẓ tiyita n tummaẓ
zgant tturarent deg unnar
ad-tt-id-yettwali seg wass mi tella
yella kra i ak-d-yuzen tom
yettban-d besṭuḥ tom
tuɣal-iyi d abeɛɛuq
ur d-ttbinet ara tfejεem
ičča tagella d lmelḥ
tameṭṭut-iw tella temxell
zizweḥ eṛẓ acbayli
d acu i tent-yewwin ad d-neṭqent
leḥḥuɣ ɣas ma ur d iy-ihwi
Ṭṭef di tamart-ik
ffudeɣ ṣṣifa-m
isṛayil inna-asen acuɣer akka i yi-tesɛewqem
yir rgaz yif-it ucabcaq n lgaz
ad fell-ak isal xiṛ
yelha ma tkecmeḍ axxam tura
tom yeẓra d acu yebɣa
nezmer ad nruḥ ad nmeslay anda kra
issemɣi-tt bu nnbuc irwel
ma d abṛaham mazal-it akked umeɣlal
illu isemma i litteɛ-nni igenni
Ṣṣeb
ma nexẓer si tama n ddula iberdan ur ttwaxedmen ara akken iwata
ay terriḍ ar daxel a yul
di tnifift-is ideg ḥesleɣ
d tikti timegzit
wwiɣ-d lviza ar Ṭelyan
akken i tent-id-issefra i teḍra yid-nneɣ
sarameɣ ad sɛuɣ axxam yelhan
werǧin tendem deg wayen texdem
kkes-ak awal rriɣ-ak tamment
rran-aɣ armi d amennuɣ-nni aqdim
meεna tga asurif
teqqimemt ɣef yisennanen
ceɛlen irkulli
Ɣezzif ccmini-ya
d azaɛlelli i yettzaɛlellay
yella win i yeṭṭfen tamkant-iw
ur ittɛawad ara akk tom ad yi-yamen
ma tɛuzzeḍ iman-ik ad k-iɛuzz Ṛebbi
tewwet-itt s lmaɛun
igufaf yeččan seksu ur yufaf
yeɛqub isers-as-d lmakla isḥaq ičča
mkul yiwen s targit-is mkul targit s lmeɛna-s
iṛuḥ iwwi-d iɣiden-nni ifka-ten i yemma-s
d yemma-s ur teǧǧi aman ad nneɣlen
aṭer-d syin
nesɛa yiwet n tmezgunt maca xuṣṣent-aɣ tsegbarin
mačči d ayen i yettfakkan
ittwala iman-is zeɛma yettwassen
tidnect tettmaga s yiẓdi fessren fell-as tazart neɣ ayen nniḍen
mlalen sin igehguhen
bu ukumbaṣ ur ittnuddum
ibeggen-it-id iḍelli deg yiḍ
tella-d tmeddit illa-d ṣṣbeḥ d ass wis tlata
dayen ur bɣiɣ ad εiceɣ yid-wen
aqemmuc isseɛdal-iten
nniɣ-as di leɛnaya-m efk-iyi-d ad sweɣ
am win ittfeẓen uzzal
ur nwiɣ ara ad t-id-geɣ d adlis
anida-kent a tilawin
ad imsenḍaḥ s uniyir-s akked upulis
tteɣraṣent yal ma ldint
tuɣal d tameṭṭut s warraw-is ma d nekk akken kan i qqimeɣ
teqqerṣ tberduɛt dɣa teɣli tteɛbeyya
a lɛecc n lqaɛa
ttwaɣuṛṛeɣ-d di ḥafi baṭel
arrac-agi d arraw-iw
leḥmeq si cciṭan
Ččan-t isawnen d ikwesran
lweṛd irgem-it leḥcic
awer newṛet awer nettewṛet
wissen anwa i tt-yewwten
itteṛɛiɛic ɣef warraw n tmes
ad iɛenni fell-ak ad tidireḍ
awi-d taserfiṭ
imṛabḍen smuhbulen ɣer leqbayel
wayeḍ yennulfa-d d ajdid
yečča-tent deg uqerru
at mengellat ihedder ala ɣef teqbaylit maca yeqqar nekk d azzayri
tura ula d tafizikt tettwaru s teqbaylit
ula d uzzal iḥeffu
ad s-tiniḍ telbiḍ deg uɣenǧa
yella wacu ruḥeɣ ad d-awiɣ seg texxamt-iw
tiyersi ad as-tt-fsiɣ
ur tneqq cedda ur tessidir telwit
ih ftin yemdanen maca ulac win yextaren ad d-ilal
ay ggummaɣ ad ten-mḥuɣ
idda yid-s luṭ
iṭṭef deg wuzzu d tiɛfeṛt
ttif win iṭṭfen wala win ibran
cukkeɣ yelha win tt-iqemmren
sekṛeɣ mebla tissit
srid seg Ṛebbat
a tin yesfeclen ul-iw
tameṭṭut-nni i d-yekkren seg uẓekka tbedd-d s ṣṣifa n tekɛebt
abẓiz d gma-s n wejraḍ
lḥiɣ ɣef tergin ḥafi
acḥal nuzzel ur nelḥiq
Ṣubb-d syin
sḥasfeɣ
tebɣamt ad teffɣemt azekka
yella udlis n ccḍeḥ ɣef tnarit
Ɣucceɣ ddabex n uḍaṛ
lewqam iṣweb am usaru
yusef inna-yasen ur ttagadet ara
isemma-yas ziraḥ yeɛni yettfeǧǧiǧ
awi-yi-d deg wallen-ik
axiṛ lexsaṛa wala lefḍiḥa
derreɛ allen-ik
ur tufiḍ d acu i d-cniɣ ala tazmert iɣallen
amek ad nget asebter i ben badis deg wikipedia n teqbaylit neɣ xaṭi
Ẓẓher iruḥen ur iban
d ugur ameqqran
tettbinemt-d thelkemt
lxiṛ ar zdat uḍaṛ
ngen deg yiwen n uqiḍun
d bu iṭerbiben-nni i yi-d-yennan akka
iḥṣel uxlul di lɣiḍa
tesεiḍ ccrab n fransa
itett-it uglim-is
yiwen usalas ur ittseqqif axxam
yesseḥzen-itt lexber-nni d-yewwḍen
ur ttqamar aqemmar
"aɣyul n wuṛeɣ" d adlis i yura umyaru amaziɣ afulay
win ifhmen ad yessuref
am aman akked yiɣi
ajeddit d argaz yesɛan arraw n tarwa-s
iktal ammud ur inqis
Ṭṭejṛa ansi ṛqiqet i tettwaṛṛaẓ
ur ndimeɣ ɣef kra
tberru i yimeẓẓuɣen-is
Ḥemmleɣ timucuha n taḍsa
lehduṛ baṭel
Ԑelmeɣ kan ur tebɣiḍ ara txedmeḍ akken
ziɣ rebḥen ur d-berrḥen
tgellel am tdikelt ufus
ad t-huddeɣ
wwiɣ-d medden ad yi-wansen acku ugadeɣ weḥd-i deg uxxam
inna-yas isem-ik
yak tenniḍ-d tamaziɣt yiwet amek armi ur tefhimeḍ tizlit-nni s temẓabit
s yisem i yi-d-ttmektiɣ
yecbeḥ akk wayen i ɣ-d-yezzin mi ara nili deg sin yid-neɣ
maṣer tella zik n yiferɛunen tura tuɣal i waɛraben
yečča-k nnḥas
Ḥkut-iyi-d ihi
yella kra n yiwen i iɣelḍen
ittgalla leǧhel tesseḥnat leḥya
yuggad ad tennejlu tutlayt-is
siwa ayen ṛẓagen ay swiɣ
ddwa n uɣyul d aɛekkaz
s ɣuṛ-i ilzem s ɣuṛ-k igzem
yefka-yas tom aṣebbiɛ i mary
anwa ay d baba-k a saɛid
yettejmaɛ-d tom tiɣawsiwin tiqdimin
waqil ilaq-iyi ad gneɣ ciṭuḥ
yella kra n yiwen i yettmuqqulen tom
ulac ticraḍ mebla idammen
isrezgay wid immuten
ur zmireɣ ad azzleɣ ttqerriḥent-iyi twerẓa-w
ur k-terra ara tmara ad s-tzeyydeḍ
yella kra n yiwen i yellan dinna
mɣin-ak-d ijeǧǧigen n laxeṛt
tzemreḍ ad yi-d-tḥukkeḍ tuyat-iw
taṛbut tettqiṛṛi wala lɛibad
lbaṭel azeggaɣ
anda ara naf tidak yettcabin ar tidak-nni
mačči akka ay ḥṣiɣ ad d-tas
iḍeṣ izga yerwel fell-i
temxellem meṛṛa
ibeẓẓed i medden s ameẓẓuɣ
ugadeɣ ad kem-ẓreɣ
icerrew-itt meṛṛiɣet
mi ṭṭuqtent gganent
deg tuget n tmura n temrikt n wenẓul s tespenyult i ttmeslayen
amzun tesliḍ-d i usiwel-iw
newwi-d yir tarmit syin
dderya d aɛwin uqelmun
aṭas n medden i yestḥussayen am kemm
yella kra n wayen i tebɣiḍ ad d-ternuḍ ɣef ayen i d-nniɣ
anwa axxam i yesbeɣ
cban di twenza-m
settuɣ-as lhem ma tḥuza-tt taluft
imussnawen nnan-d d amdan i d-ixelqen Ṛebbi
turzem iman-nwen
isṛayil inna dayen
ad myeḥmaẓen ad ḥmun
ssebleɛ a lqaɛa ečč a times
itett di cclaɣem-is
iwqem tamekrast
igenni n Ṛebbi tamurt d ayla-s
yerẓa awal n baba-s
aqeddac-nni yewwi ribka iṛuḥ
wehmeɣ mi ten-walaɣ wwin-d akanic
xdem lxiṛ i udɣaɣ ad ak-t-id yerr
beṭṭu d amger timlilit d leḥder
tidet ɣef i nreggel yal ass
meẓyan yeqqar deg wul-is qrib ad immet baba
tezgamt tettṛuḥumt ar wannar
iɣil ikkaw immi isfetray
amḍiq ideg yettwali ibkan tikwal rrif n ubrid gedged
yemmut-asen uɣyul deg addaynin
argaz lɛali awal-is dayem ittwamsal
ad tessirdem iḍarren-nwen ad tensem
amsafer tetbeɛ-it tikli
tom atan akken i s-yenna i tmeṭṭut-is belli yeǧǧa-tt
azger acerqi ittḥadar icc-is
kullec igerrez deg uxxam
d asfuǧǧeɣ i sfuǧǧuɣen
tesɛiḍ zzheṛ
ass-a kul wa anda yeqqim
tenqeccaɛ tagut
tḥemmel-ik mary
iqquṛ uqeṛṛuy-is
wid icceččen ifen lḥeǧǧaǧ icewwqen
iwala at laxeṛt la ceṭṭḥen
yelsa-d aserwal d azeggaɣ
dinna abṛaham indeh s yisem n umeɣlal
wali kan lmulud at mεemmer deg yiseggasen ideg ibda aselmed n teqbaylit
idda-d yid-s luṭ
muqel deg usinaryu-ya
ini-yas bab-iw d aqeddac-ik yeɛqub
a-ten-an warraw n Ṣibɛun aya akked Ɛana
iwwi zzit deg yisni
win inedhen d win yeḍṛuṛan
kečč ad tt-tfakkeḍ deg idlisen umezruy
isfenxiṛ am uqcic n ccuq
Ṛebbi iɛeffu lameɛna iceffu
xas ur i yi-ban imɣi
kanɛan iǧǧa-d Ṣidun amenzu-s akked Ḥit
tafunast iɣi imɣi
tugimt-is seg tala n lmeḥna
leḥḥunt ẓẓuɣuṛent ikanicen-nsent
ay anda tebɣuḍ tawḍeḍ
d acu ara ɣ-d-yeg wass-agi
kkreɣ-d ɣer yiri ugaraw
yella kra i ibeddlen
anwa ara kent-yawin
mi teɛya dayen deg ucali telsa lḥiǧab tuɣal tettẓalla
tihendusit d asɣan i ṭṭafaren deg udu-menẓaw ahendi
wissen iwacu ur ttɛeddin ara ifuyla s wifi
ad yili d aqeddac n iqeddacen n watmaten-is
ur smendag i times
isɣaṛen iṛqaqen sseṛɣayen izuranen
Ɛni ɣef yisennanen i teqqimem
serreḥ i waman ad lḥun
anida inger laman ur tettiwsiɛ ṭṭbiɛa
i icennun d urrif i iceṭṭḥen d lkif
am wi ittqezziben i umcic
iṣṣeḍ am win yeččan tacriḥt uqjun
ikmez-iyi anda i yi-ičča
lukan s tidet yella kra n yillu akken i nebɣa merra
xaṭi tura yencucer segmi yeḥla
d awezɣi ad ibeddel udabu azzayri
dayen ɛyiɣ seg-m
ama mazal-it am zik yeḥḍem
yessufeɣ-d ihi aεudiw-is ihezlen akk iwumi isemma rusinant
ur bnin tudrin armi ɛyan di tneswin
tettriḥ-d amack-itt
aqeccaḍ deg wallen-im
ttxil awi-yi-d kan lemleḥ si tkuzint
am izimer aksas ur ikkat ur ixebbec
sliɣ i uqjun yesseglaf deg teẓgi
tella tin i yebɣan ad teffeɣ azekka
uccen-nni yeqqummec kan iban-d am akken yettxemmim
iwweḍ laɛfu n Ṛebbi
heddṛen ur faɛlen
ad yessenger Ṛebbi tamtilt-is
ala taqemmuc iwumi yessen
ur ttwaεerḍeɣ ara ɣer tmeɣriwin
ifka mayna
ifen-aɣ at tmeqbeṛt amkan
ur ttekkiɣ di kra uqusis
amkan-ik ata ɣer tama-w
aṭas i nurar deg wannar n taddart
yir asɣar ur yettleqqim
daymi yessaweḍ ad d-yedlu ɣef ayen yeffren deg tmetti
ass-a zdat-k d asawen
yella leqder gar-asen
ad izwer Ṛebbi tanafa qbel tilufa
tuli tixsi ɣef uqermud
ad k-issukk Ṛebbi ansi ikka iḍelli
akken iqḍeɛ ujenwi ay teshel tmezla
atmaten d atmaten aɛebbuḍ ibḍa-ten
yelha lukan ad nεawed ad nemẓer
msekṛahen am warraw n takniwin
Ḥemmleɣ lqahwa
deg yiḍ ineqq-iyi usemmiḍ
a yizem i iṛebba lefḥel
atent-a ɣellint-d tefyar am ubruri skelset kan
ayen i k-ixḍan xḍu-as
zzewɣen adfel
sgumiɣ ad ṭṭseɣ deg iḍ
ilul deg kityum yiwet n teɣremt tagrikit zedɣen deg tuget yefniqiyen
yuẓam seddaw yiles
ad d-ffɣen seg-k igelliden
lɛaṣi ičča imensi lmumen insa beṛṛa
acu yuran deg unazal-nni a taqcict
inna-yas nekk d illu illu n baba-k
yuɣal wakli d amellal
ccwal i t-iferrun d awal
isemma-yas Ɛir
iwwet-iyi uṛumi cetkaɣ i gma-s
d acu ara ɣ-d-yeg ass-agi
d asfuǧǧeɣ i tesfuǧǧuɣ
kulci ad iεeddi
am nekkini am atmaten-iw
axxam iḍyeq ul iwseɛ
acuɣer akka yexseṛ wudem-ik
aql-i leεεbeɣ d temcict-iw
amak ara issineɣ
ad teknu temguṭ ar tizi hibel
swemt kra n ttay
inger qeccuc meccuc
qqimen ɣef yisennanen
zdeɣ ɣur-i
abṛaham itlef hagaṛ akked ismaɛil Ṣara twala aqcic-nni i d-tesɛa hagaṛ tamaṣrit i abṛaham ittaḍṣa
kemm mačči d tamedyazt i telliḍ tsenniḍ kan deg wawalen
tura kan i d-qqleɣ seg tzeqqa n waddal
tura iblugen ɣas ini qqimen d acu mazal lhan i teqbaylit
mi ara mɣareɣ ad d-ffɣeɣ am kemm swaswa
deg iḍudan-is i yettɛuddu
am uɣyul am uzger ad ɛelfen akken
ungal yesɛa ilugan-is mačči win yekkren ad yaru
sraḥeɣ lgaz
yiwet d yelli-s n temdint tayeḍ d yelli-s n wedrar
ifelfel d msenger n seksu
nerna s ineggwaf taḍsa
ttɣilliɣ ɣef lxir terɣiḍ ziɣ d asekkud uyaziḍ
yehtuta yakk lbenk-nni iɣef neqqim
lḥir deg ul ifadden qquṛen
nnfu d gma-s n lmut
iṭij-iw iɣumm-it usigna
sɛaya teǧǧaba d iḥbiben
ala tameqqunt i t-ixuṣṣen
aḥlil win icban aɣbub
Ḥam d baba-s n kanɛan
kra i nudaɣ fell-ak ur k-ufiɣ
issemɣi-d acciwen
mačči d aqeddac-ik i lliɣ
ur d iyi-teɛṛiq tansa-m
nuḥ itteddu akked yillu
Ḥemmleɣ ad ččeɣ aɣṛum aqquṛan
iɛedda-d s tqerṭilt iteddu ixeẓẓer deg ṭṭraḥi
iṛuḥ yeɛqub ɣer baba-s inna-yas a baba
lexla ur nefrig acemma ur as-idrig
ufiɣ yiwen n tamber yuqan deg tḥanut-a
acuɣer aɣlan azzayri yettawi-d lecyux aɛraben ɣer tudrin-nneɣ
Ɛzel fell-i
zzit tenɣel taḍwist tɛelleq
awi-d kan imi i ufiɣ lemzeyya ɣur-k a sidi
bɣiɣ ad m-d-sleɣ tettsuɣuḍ
qqimen deg-s ṛebɛin n wussan
yeɛqub isla belli caxim icemmet yelli-s dina
yunag ɣer nnig lkanun
ay at umalek welleh ar ulamek
ad d-issers Ṛebbi tagertilt n ṛṛeḥma
akken kan ara d-yaweḍ remḍan itteffeɣ-iten leɛqel ɣef učči
ur thenna ara deg uxxam
ad iruḥ wakali
lmal ittban di lexwa
d ayagi i t-yeɛman

cnu-d kra n tezlit yid-i
yenwa s ukanic ara yuɣal d aṛumi
tom iseṭṭel icelɣumen-is
deg ass n lǧemɛa i nella
xdem sin iɛellimen
ur ttruḥeɣ ara ɣer lxedma s lqecc am wa
awer nekcem imi n medden
anta ara d-yekkren zik azekka
anda tzemreḍ kečč i llafɛa am tin
lǧiran i ṛṛeḥma mačči i nneqma
sεiɣ sin yiḍan tlata n yimcac d setta tyuzaḍ
ma nenna-d ur nettwexxiṛ
yeshel uɛummu
iaɛdel n wass d yiḍelli
ttemnubun akken ttemyilin
d awezɣi ad tt-ibeddel ḥedd tura
sarameɣ thennam deg sin

ur tessengareḍ ara aḥeqqi netta d umesbaṭli
aɛeqqa n lǧawi a yul-iw awi
mi yi-d-tesɛeddaḍ sya
awal sin teḍṛa-d tɣawsa i ɣef ur bnin ara
ad m-nernu imesnsi
tekker gar ikubuyen d yihendiyen izeggaɣen
issehrew tuyat-is
tameṭṭut i iḥerrzen tif tayuga n yezgaren
ahat yelha ma tedda yid-nneɣ
suliɣ lebruj s umenni
Ṭṭef azal-is imir-nni ad meḍleɣ deg-s lmegget-iw
qqaren d Ḥewwa iwumi meqqer aɛebbuḍ-is tessuṭer-aɣ-d seg lǧenna
yekkat uzal
ur ṭṭiseɣ ara akken ilaq
ayen icerken am tlaba iterken
xas ugiɣ tidet ad m-tt-iniɣ
yelha umaḍal-a-nneɣ umḍin nekk lemmer ufiɣ ala win
ur qrib ur ɛla ḥal
init-d d acu tettwalim
tullas tturarent paypay nekkni netturar timestabeɛt neɣ maffur
meqqer anzaren-im
ad ṭṭseɣ da
ur yi-d-teɣli ara yakk tegnit ad tt-ssqedceɣ
tom werǧin i iḥac mary

semɣer agdil tebduḍ aferrej
amar ass-n ay atma ad d-nuɣal s abrid
ar tiqlibin timenza ɛeddant

sew ddwa ma tesɛiḍ
ur ttmeslayemt ara
d yusef i yeɛeggcen baba-s atmaten-is akked twacult meṛṛa n baba-s akken i llan iɛeggalen-nsen meṛṛa

tiṭ twala tayeḍ teggumma
qqaren-as timeqbert tajebbant neɣ taqerrabt
tebɣiḍ ad m-d-sseḥmuɣ winna
mi d-inna baba yečča yeṛwa
semmeḥ-iyi uqbel ad truḥeḍ
tugiḍ ad tserrḥeḍ
Ẓẓur i lǧid d asalas
acuɣer a lehwa mm yimeṭṭawen

ad k-ɣnuɣ ma iɣna-k Ṛebbi

win iwwi wasif ittaṭaf ula deg uzzu

a meɣres bu sebɛa tnila

adlis-ayi ad yemmag deg leqjer-nni n ufella

nekk ur ḥmileɣ ara ad beṭṭleɣ lakul

izmer yella kra i iwala tom
ad teẓreḍ ayen seg-m ẓriɣ

d taɣallit kemm neɣ

mceččen izerman
yeɛqub irra-yas ala a sidi
tetḥeqqeḍ belli yella win i teẓriḍ ɣef tqenṭert
ur tettemmateḍ ara daki
akken i tt-iwɛa wuccen iɣeẓẓ-itt
deg tullisin-is yeqqar kan “yewweḍ-d i zzwaj kkren ad s-d-xeḍben”
ur xdimeɣ acemma
banent-d thennant mliḥ
ad iyi-tesseḍlem
ayen i d ak-mennaɣ

tella kra n yiwet i yettnezzihen
rran timedlin fell-as
tessneḍ ḥedd n boston
isɛa yir tagmat irna ittaweḍ
wehmeɣ mi tt-walaɣ tewwi-d akanic
ismejger wakli deg sid-is
ilaq-ak ad ternuḍ inadiyen
tettusuḍ
teswiḍ taqeṛɛunt n waman
srid seg mixico
mazal ssewwayyen timellalin deg lkanun
d uḍan i kerheɣ ad d-mmektiɣ
taɣaṭ-ik ad d-tarew izimer
d acu d tidet kan deg lweqt-nni lliɣ d ungif
qqim kan d asmekti
llant kra n tuccḍiwin
taferka-agi ad k-tt-xelṣeɣ
yugi yiṭij ad tt-yeɛnu
zemreɣ ad azzleɣ
d nekk daɣen ara k-id-irren syenna
aql-i usiɣ-d d abeṛṛani
d acu i d sebba
teẓẓiḍ taxsayt aseggas-a
iḍelli d lḥedd
bab n lxiṛ ittenjaḥ wali ɛad aburaysu
iqqel lebḥeṛ d aqerqar
tezgamt tettɣamamt ar ṭṭaq
tlata iseggasen netta ixeẓẓer-itt deg uɣerbaz alemmas ur yehdir yid-s
iwwet di rrayeɛ
tom yerra metwal tidrujin
tom yettban-d d abesṭuḥ
terwi s usemmiḍ
ass-a d tameɣra
iaɛdel n wayrad d inisi
yella ḥedd i wumi tebɣiḍ ad tlaɛiḍ
tegnemt ɣef udekkan
Ɣucceɣ lqahwa
lɛezza uɛeggun d ameslay
axaṭer ad t-rreɣ d lǧens ameqran
d wigi i d idlisen akk yura zinun
Ẓẓur d lfuci imeεfan
yebɣa idrimen-nni
Ɣur-i yiwet akken
s leḥzen i d-terra tawwurt n yemma-s
anwa i d ucmit seg-nneɣ a bu tnexsas
amdan fiɣef ur tettkilleḍ ara
tamsulta ur tɛeṭṭel ara twet imesbaniyen s rrṣas
walaɣ sin n leqbayel deg lqahwa ssekren ddḥis
tgerrez tektawt-is
neḥfeḍ akk isefra-nni awal s wawal
anda-t baba-k tura
muḥemmed netta yenna d lǧenn i d-yerzan ɣur-s ɣer yifri-nni
tenna-yas xẓer-d ɣer wudem-iw mačči ɣer yedmaren-iw
tebram i yimeẓẓuɣen-nwen
Ɣef yiqerra-nneɣ i tt-fran
ur cukkeɣ ara llant tidak i s-yeslan
Ṛuḥ ɣer tqeḍɛit ddem-iyi-d sin n iɣiden yelhan
dɣa yessen-d yiwet n tmeṭṭut d taqeddact n umdakel-is milu uɣur yerza
xedmeɣ ayen i d-tenniḍ
tedɛa-yi yemma s lxir
yerna ɣer lejdud-is d amɣar yeṛwan ddunit
tecrek-aɣ tgella d lemleḥ
tessiridemt tuɣmas-nkent yal ass
yella win i yeṭṭfen amkan-iw
aɣyul iḥemmel win i t-ikkaten
ad iṛabeɛ deg uglagal n at qasi
Ṣṣwab ur yeqqim
qqiment ɣef yisennanen
tetrek tlaba ɣef yiri-s
deg uxxam i tellam
innum uɣyul deg yiger dayem isnagar
tɣileḍ d nnzeɛ n tiqecmaɛt
err tabagust-ik
tanemmirt ɣef twissi-k
iεedda lunis deg ubrid ttun medden
ad ak-iḍlu Ṛebbi bufsus
d acu yeɛni ixeddem yizi dayi
ass-a ad d-tettiqsiḥ
amek tεelmeḍ din i nella
ur tettu ara ad tessufɣeḍ leknis
ma truḥeḍ ilaq ad thedreḍ yid-s
deg ccna n usaran yella sliman cabbi Ḥmed Ḥemmu ccix nurdin d wiyaḍ
Ṛebbi mi ara d isteqsi yeɣleb llusi
iḍ n tziri ḥseb-it d ass
yella kra i tufiḍ
ddiɣ-ak di lebɣi
samḥet-iyi ɣef yiḍelli
mass seguin yuɣ-itt-id d tiɣideṭ
myelhin-d di tyita wa deg wa
ilaq win ara inebbhen fell-as
d acu ara yi-d-yexdem wass-a
walimt deffir-nkent
lefhama tugar ssɛaya
ur isɛa ara talexliɛt deg udem
d argaz u nnefṣ
si bgayet ɣer lberǧ ay ul-iw ferreǧ
meεna temɣi
d targit i yurga
iɛedda tilas
anda tent-iger qquṛent
d lehna i s-nebɣa merra i tom
aql-i nezfeɣ
ičča abelluḍ yeḥmed Ṛebbi
mačči d taxewnit i telliḍ
amek armi tceɣleḍ akka assa
yehwa-yaɣ kan
qwan iɣezzfanen ufus
zzux illa adrim ulac
tiṭ tazeṛqaqt tesɛa aẓar n tisselbi
Ṭṭfeɣ lmus deg ufus-iw azelmaḍ
teččam taxbizt iman-nwen
iṭij abeḥri tili  akken i s-yehwa i yettili
ttif afus yeṭṭfen wal win yebran
rebɛa n wuccanen i d-iruḥen s lferḥ
yella iteddu s zzerban
mkul tafsut s tefsut-is
nekk d illu n bitil anda akken i tesbeddeḍ aẓru d ccahed tdehneḍ-t s zzit yerna tɛuhdeḍ-iyi dinna
dayen nnegzan akk iɣawasen-iw
wissen ma ad ilint tefranin n tselweyt di yulyu-agi zdat-neɣ
lḥiɣ ɣef tirgin ḥafi
ttεeddin leεyub
inna ad ittwanɛel kanɛan
tameṭṭut n lexla texla
ziɣ yettaker-d sɣur wiyaḍ yeqqar-d ssefraweɣ
qqen taggest-ik
a xeddmeɣ s wul
ur keččem ara gar yiccer d uksum
yenna-yas ččiɣ ayen iwumi zemreɣ
err tabagust-im
tejreḥ tasa-s
i baba mazal-it idder
ikker usyax di luḍa
yella win ara d-yekkren azekka zik
anef i wul ad yawi iri
axxam bla tameṭṭut am lebḥer bla lḥut
tedduɣ akked jeddi ɣer taksawt
kul taswiɛt s teswiɛt-is
amɣaṛ mi yecab xas enɣ-it
tameṭṭut ur tzeddi ur tfeṛṛeq
yefsa lwerḍ
yella ḥedd i yettnezzihen deg tom
axeṛṛaz inɣan mmi-s
yusef irra-yas i ferɛun mačči d nekk
iwweḍ-d lweqt ad zewǧeɣ yid-s
i tin yuɣen sin acu ur tessin
d tibbulɛeḍt i tesbbulɛuḍeḍ
ma gguleɣ-am s iderwicen
armi d ass-a i s-giɣ isem
yal cedda tetbeɛ-itt talwit
d nekk ay terza tyita
irwet udɣen ifra lḥebb
akken lliɣ ttmerriḥeɣ deg teftist ṣṣbeḥ-a ufiɣ taqerεet-a
aṭṭan i t-yulin
a tasekkurt ifreq-aɣ rebbi ur nemmut
yuẓam tawaṣult
mačči akka
welleh a lukan ad ṭṭseɣ deg iciwi-s
tidet isgaǧ-itt ṭṭmaɛ
iwacu tebɣiḍ ad temmteḍ
ad k-itub Ṛebbi
sbeɣset arraw-nwen ad d-ɣren tifyar
wa meɛduṛ wa d lḥeqq-is
tsemma-yas yusef yeɛni ad d-irnu
meṛṛa-nwen kunwi d at miḥyaf
anda tufiḍ aya
d acu i tt-ixuṣṣen
yettṛuɣu wesɣaṛ s sshala
ma teεyiḍ sgunfu
acḥal d taddart ur sen-tewwiḍ trisiti armi d iseggasen n tesɛin d asawen
myeftaḥen tibbura iseqfan
semdeɣ tanafa
anda ma llant tlufa
leǧnas meṛṛa n ddunit ad ttubarken yis-k
Ḥemmlent ad nadint deg aman
segmi d-tban tiẓri n darwin adem d Ḥewwa uɣalen d tamayt kan
am win ineǧǧɛen lḥiḍ
ayen akk yellan di ddunit ad immet
segmi s-semman "lḥirak" i neẓra taluft texḍa-yaɣ
ad yecnu di tmdint n bgayet
Ԑreḍ ccrab-a teẓreḍ ma iεǧeb-ak
illu iwala belli tafat d ayen yelhan
zik nxeddem tibeḥyar nteẓẓu yakk icakan
innser di tezdeg
da d lḥif din d aɣilif
ad cfuɣ fell-am
zik-nni mi nesfillit ad xedmeɣ lewqam
bilha terfed s tadist tesɛa-d aqcic i yeɛqub
allen-iw ur m-zmirent ara
meɛna ad yeglu yes-i ah
yettu tom ur s-yefki ara i weqjun-is ad yečč
nettat teɛweǧ deg ammas am taɣaṭ deg llyali
nnecṛaḥa n uɣyul d aɣẓaẓ
cukkeɣ tom yesmikriḍ
yenɣa tom walebɛaḍ
at nnif yid-s ad ɣaben
taswiɛt kan ata yuɣal-d umcic-nneɣ yeṭṭef-d azrem d azeggaɣ
ayen iwumi cfiɣ nekk d wayen iɣef i d-ḥekkun yimenza-nneɣ
yella kra n yiwen i d-yusan
neẓra i neswa ar ass-a nedder
yella kra ur neɛdil ara
sεeddaɣ taswiεt d taxlaft
iḥemmel tom aɣenni
amek tenwiḍ tifeḍ-iyi
ass wis tlata d ass n umulli n ferɛun
s tmara-nni i d iyi-rran
ikad-d ur tetḥeqqeḍ ara mliḥ
uzzal d amalal
yella kra i tebɣam
cukkeɣ ur y-ittiεǧib ara ad xedmeɣ akken d tom
amek yekcem Ǧebrayel ɣer yifri n Ḥira s wafriwen-is
d icerrig
Ǧǧet-tt ad yeskeṛ
iskaw tagut deg waḍu
aql-iken ḥaca iman-nwen
allaɣen ḥseb-iten ḥfan
ma yella ur nudeɣ fell-am
ur qqaṛ zzant wala rɣant
uriɣ-asent tibratin
ayagi ala di tnafa
anwa-ten warrac-nni
yettban-d yeɛya tom
iweṣṣa tom yiwen ara s-d-isekren ad yečč
ur ttuhumeɣ ara ma ixdem akken tom
ikcem gar tasad way turew
yella mačči d ayen ara ǧǧeɣ ad yeḍru d aya kan
axaṭer ur tt-iɛqil ara belli d tislit-is
ayen d-ifka igenni tezmer-as lqaɛa
tamuɣli-w ɣur-m am tmuɣli n wuccen s wulli
tettbinem-d n japu kunwi
neqqaṛ imir-nni celqef berru
tella kra n yiwet i ak-d-isawlen
ha-t-an ɣer-k winna iɣef tettnadiḍ ḍfer-it
aɣyul welleh ar ukren-t akken s tbarda
terfed s tadist dɣa tesɛa-d Ḥanux
nnejmaɛen-d warrac deg ufrag
Ẓẓher bu iɣisi
anda tella tezmert yeqwan
winna ur nnuɣen ara fell-as
ini-d kan ih
takfarinas d buǧemɛa agraw sin n walbumen i d-ssufɣen lwaḥi
telliḍ d tamdakelt-iw
ansa i d-ffɣent tbekkatin-nni
ziɣ d mm ibejbujen-nni
anwa i t-id-iṛesmen
Ṭṭfen abrid ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n kanɛan
iwwet azrem s aqeṛṛu
zgan qqaṛen "lukan" wid istufan
bɣiɣ ad issineɣ amek i ttxemmiment
rṣan iẓuṛan-is
ur iweṛṛet ara mmi-s n tqeddact-inna netta d mmi isḥaq
ma ur tezmireḍ kan ad tkecmeḍ ɣer ugraw-nni d anedbal i k-yesweḥlen
ihi xemmem-as mliḥ
d ayen i yi-d-yewwin assa ɣer da
myejraḥent tasa d turet
nesεa tawaɣit-a i d-itezzin yal ɛecṛa neɣ ḥdac n yiseggasen
lweḥc terniḍ iɣeblan d lqella imawlan
tzemreḍ ad truḥeḍ ɣer din
qqaren-as tenɣiḍ tom terniḍ tewwiḍ idrimen-is
iwwet kan s lehwi
tabburt uẓekka telli
bɣan ad ṛebbin ibekki
win isḥellfen amzun iwwet
imekken iman-is i tmenjeṛt
ass-a deg-sen nettwali
abeɣḍi ur iḥemmel agḍi
saramen ad sɛun ixxamen yelhan
layat i d-yusan i muḥemmed di lmadina ččurent d takriṭ
victor hugo deg tallit-is iwet aṭas mgal tafgurt n tmenɣiwt
yusef inna-as ad xedmeɣ akken i t-id-tenniḍ
uysent ad awḍent
win iḍṣan ḥadeṛ ad ten-iru
ufiɣ-d iman-iw lwaḥi d yiwet n tpakistanit
deg acu temxalaf tmuɣli-k ɣef ayla-s
issers-iyi tucwiḍt
iqleɛ-itt Ṛebbi aqlaɛ n tebṣelt
taḍsa n wuglan aṭas ay teǧǧa ɛeryan
Ṭṭaqqa n dderya d asif n lmeḥna
tedɛa-yasen yemma-tsen s lxir
ad nezdeɣ yid-wen ad nuɣal d yiwen n ugdud
xas d kem i d lǧerḥ-iw
ayen tebɣiḍ tefkeḍ-as ad inazeɛ
ad nili din merra ɣer tama-m
tamɣart d tamɣart yewwi-tt wass-is
kul yiwen icɣel deg uxjiḍ-is
d azwel n leɛḍil kan
yeɛqub inna i baba-s d nekk
serrḥen-as i weqjun-nni
ticcert-nni ad telhu i ufeṣṣel kan ma yerna-d yiwen kra deg awal
ur yettwassen ara tom
aṭas i uraren deg wannar n taddart
a nefṛeq tamellalt i at bgayet
yugi ad ten-iffeɣ ubeḥri
islamẓriyen d aggaz kan i sɛan d tiririt
amdan yeḥseb ur yufa
yella yessnen-as i tessirt n waman dɣa ɣɣaren-as-d ssya u ssya
Ɛeddan tilas
la mzeyya-k
d iseggasen nekk qqareɣ tafransist
tesεiḍ ɣur-k idrimen
Ẓriɣ ad tt-tfehmeḍ
akken ibɣu nmerret
iɣli-d seg igenni am uḥbub
ittcelliḥ am udles
d netta i d-iǧǧan at Ɛamun i mazal ar ass-a
yemyager iḍelli d lwiza

yella walebɛaḍ i s-iluɛan i tom
a d-tarew temẓi i temɣer
tin i as-yeldin allen yis-s tefhem d acu ay tella
aṭas ara yecfun
anta tamelḥant i s-iɛeǧben
cehhed yes-s
di tnac yid-nneɣ d atmaten baba-tneɣ yiwen
tessawḍeḍ ad teqqimeḍ
ibeggen-as-d yillu i ferɛun ayen ara yexdem
amek tettwaliḍ amaḍal n tira s teqbaylit
"terẓeg n tament" d ammud n tullisin sɣur malek Ḥud
ur tteḥṛiṛitet ara
nefka lɛahed gar-aneɣ
ttif ad zwirent wala ad grint
ass-en d tikelt tamenzut ay ddiɣ ɣer ssuq ass n tsewwiqt
tom d argaz n mary
ulamek ara d-ifrireɣ
iluɛa-yas tom i mary
ittḥezzib qebl ad teḍru
tbeɛ akeddab ɣer tebburt
tḥemmel seksu
teswa aman n wasif
rniɣ-as kra

awi-d kan ad timɣur
yenna-d tom iḥfeḍ-d kra n wejdid
bu tmeɣṛa ur ittfeṛṛiǧ ara
susem kan anef kan
cukkeɣ yella ḥedd deg texxamt-nni n zdat
nwiɣ truḥeḍ
s leɛqel ittecceg lḥal
iwacu ur d-tettbaddideḍ ara deg useqqamu n yinelmaden
deg wayen akk i d-ttmektiɣ
lxiṛ s lxiṛ win izwaren axiṛ

ajiniral-nni awessar yal ttlata ad sen-d-yawi yiwen yinaw

niɣ ul ičča ani ɣef ayen i yeṭɛef
ad myeḥmaẓeɣ akken ad kecmeɣ
atan iban-d am yetri
s kra i d iyi-yuɣen

cceṛ d uffal lxiṛ d uzzal
ur ittḥibbi ur ittmilli
tegnem ɣef udekkan
tsuɣ fell-as tmiɛruft
war nnfeɛ ad immet axiṛ
s wannuz u ṭṭaɛa
imi-s d ameqran afus-is d aquran
leḍyur di berra tḥermeḍ-aɣ di ṣṣut-nsen
yers fell-as lbur
winna ul-is yeqqel qbala
sɣiɣ-d sin iqetnan n tuga
akka i d tamurt ččan imeɛfan
"aqjun amusnaw" d tamacahut n xalil Ǧebran
yewwi-k-id cennegnagi
am timmi sbin-d udem-im
s anda i tettedduḍ
swan aman n wasif
zzux lfux
ttarunt-asen tibratin yal aseggas
awal-is aneggaru deg ttɛa u ɛcrin yunyu alef u ttɛemya u tniyen u ttɛin
awtul yuɣal d ačeqlal mi t-yeẓra yizem yerwel
tḥemmel ad tḥewwes s ukanic-is
sliɣ i kra n yiwet tettṣeffiṛ
nella d imdukal
yuɣal d axabit
xḍu-kem seg aya
anwa i ilaqen ad yeḥkem
init-asen anwi d nekni
tessefṛuṛux am tewtult
aɣyul atan deg leḥder-is kan meskin
taqbaylit teḥwaǧ asefti n tedrimt
awer nečč amessas awer neddu ḥafi
isseɣṛes talaba fell-i
steɛfut ddaw n ttejṛa-agi
ssens tafat
itett di lkun n Ṛebbi
isseṛwa cclaḍa i uɣyul
am udfel yessa fell-as
yella leqder gar-asent
win ur nettaggad ittwaggad
acuɣer i tregglem fell-i
neḍmeɛ tafsut di ccetwa
ttemyegracen am iɣyal
inna di leɛnaya-k a sidi
ezḍ-aɣ-d kra n yirden ma yehda-kem rebbi a taqcict
ad m-iniɣ win fiɣef i selbeɣ
iḥuss-as tom d yir tagnit
shutturen kan
ad taɣeḍ abrid s amḍiq-ik
ilaq ad d-nelhu d uɣbel-nni
ur d-yecfi ara i jeddi-s

tuɣeḍ taqcict icebḥen akk deg temdint
ur tḥemmleḍ ara tusnakt
aṭas ara inadin
iwacu gren uyeḥya ɣer lḥebs
wwin-t s netta s wayen akk yesɛa
anda llan ay rennun

zdaxel i llan
limin n uḥdiq deg ul
mi wwten atemmu ad t-zeglen
aneɣmas-nni d ameɣnas
tella kra n yiwet i yettmuqqulen tom
amikṛub yezmer ad yili d tabaktirit neɣ d avirus
sliɣ i leɛyaḍ deg uxxam-nni
tɛeddam tilas

idrimen deg uṛaṭiw n yizem
anwa i ak-d-yennan belli ad yili da tom
ulac win ara inekṛen tilin n tmagit taqbaylit
xuṣṣeɣ maḍi deg ismawen maca werǧin ad ttuɣ udem n ḥedd
yella kra i teččiḍ
anwa ara k-yawin
tugi ad kem-tettu
iqerreḥ-iyi mliḥ uqerruy-iw
di leɛnaya-k xdem-it

Ṛuḥ ay aɛṛab ar tafsut
iɣumm udem-is iǧǧa iḍaṛṛen is
nella d timdukal
immut urɛad i s-teččuṛ

qleb tawṛiqt
sebeḥ ttazalen akk meddenlexbaṛ tameddit
tella tin i yeṭṭalayen
win ur nesɛi aɛdaw ad yeṛǧu aggaw
bɣiɣ lukan ad m-d-cnuɣ yiwet n tezlit akken kan i tt-uriɣ

ad nili din merra s idis-nkent
tejbed iman-is
fkiɣ-as lkaṛ-is
yella win i d-ittlaɛin
ayla n medden besmelleh
iḥseb-aɣ d ixbaṛǧiyen
yella walebɛaḍ i yebɣan ad iffeɣ azekka
atta twaɣit
err-d i yisteqsiyen-iw
ur d-ssilqiq di tayri
ad k-yexzu rebbi a cciṭan
nuḥ isɛa-d tlata n warrac cim Ḥam akked yifit
i yettɛawaden d ameyyal
yella kra n yiwen i wumi tebɣiḍ ad tlaɛiḍ
Ẓriɣ mačči d ayen i tettmenniḍ
laɛi-yas ma ulac aɣilif
yenɣa tom kra n yiwen
ur lliɣ ara d afenyan
ddez agerz-ik
tajlibt teswa azger iɣunfa
Ḥanun zanun ɣef yiri n lkanun
akka kan dayen
afus n Ṛebbi ɣezzif
aẓet akkin fell-i
lmesk i s-issnen d aɛeṭṭaṛ
uccen ur d ul-is i diri maca yettlaẓ ula d netta
yuɣ-d akanic
smeḥsiset kan i lecyax ad tawḍem s ayyur
ma d kemm i d-wwin wussan
ur d-iqqim deg-sen uṭenṭun
mliɣ-as nnfeɛ-is ixdem nneḍṛ-is
teqqaṛeḍ di tesdawit n bgayet
sers afus-ik ayeffus ɣef uqerru-s
ur am-d-qqareɣ ara isem-iw
anida bɣun alin
la itenneḍ di lxaṭeṛ-iw
yenneɛtab rruḥ ihan
ziɣ acampanzi itett izerman
iεedda django s lfuci
win iɣelben wayeḍ yečč-it

illexlex am tfunast n ṣpenyul
arrac ssefṛaḥen sseqṛaḥen
ul-iw yeččuren d reffu
ger-aneɣ i d-zgan leɛwam
iffeɣ seg iger s asuki
temmezg-d yid-s
awer neggani awer nesgani
fhem ayen i n-qesdeɣ
xedmeɣ kan ayen i yi-d-tenniḍ
a tin iwumi zzin waman
anda i trewleḍ
ar melmi akka ara yekkat nneḥ
ahat yella wayen iṣeḥḥan deg-s
isers deg-s anzel
aḥelbebbu yettemcabi ɣer tzermemmuyt
kečč d amakar
iqqim d adrim n demma
ay iṭij ṛğu ur ɣelli
ilaq ad εelmeɣ tura
aberkan-nni d ayla-w
wi iɛaddan yeǧǧa ccama
yella ḥedd i tebɣiḍ ad twaliḍ
yella kra n yiwen i d-iɣṛan tura
i uzekka anwa i yeẓran
tella tin i yukren iṣuṛdiyen-iw
mačči win yekkren yili d ameɣnas
tettqudur d sser
nnan-d amek
ma teɣliḍ tewseɛ lqaɛa
am win iḥettben itran
ajenwi aqdim yeḥfa
yewwi-d ɣef iɣeblan ilemẓiyen deg usarag-is
zemreɣ ad ssqedceɣ akeryun-ik
ad immet wala ad ixdeɛ
turzeḍ iman-im
yeswa taqeṛɛunt n waman
aẓru-nsen d llajuṛ tixmiṛt-nsen d aselɣaɣ
d leryuy i ilaq ad ṭṭfeɣ weḥd-i kan
ur ttemyasamet ara gar-awen
isuffeɣ-d deg-i igig
immut yiwen n umeɣnas n yizerfan n umdan ass-a
am ufrux deg yideflawen
tella tin i yellan dinna
amqerqur n waman i zeddig ɣef win usuki
ccetla n tmes d iɣiɣden
d aneɛṛuḍ uwasif
am akken yewwi-k naddam
ass- a d kečč ad ten-iḍfren
tella tin i d-ittmuqqulen deg-k
xdem am lǧaṛ-ik neɣ sekkeṛ axxam-ik
rju ad d-iwelli baba-m
dacu i iḍeṛṛun tura
tissirt n wawal
ad tezweğ d win xiṛ-iw
awal aneggaru iddem-it waḍu
nneɣlen waman
ay ass fell-i yefran
yemmeslay-d s yiwet n tnaɣa yesseḥzanen
ur kkat ara
Ǧǧan-am-d tarda leḥwal
d irgazen i nella yerna d atmaten
iɣṛem aɣyul s teḍṣa
ad kem-yewwet ɛezṛayen ur kem-yezgal ara
tella kra n yiwet i d-iɣaṛen
ad nḥelles ad nbeddel ssira
qqen taggest-im
yusef d argaz icebḥen
ay aqbayli yettaǧǧan gma-s yeɣli
d acu yellan deg ukaram-nni
ziɣ sin wulawen i tesɛiḍ
siwel i yiserba d isenda
yella kra i yečča
axxam yessefraḥ
mačči aṭas i d-iqqimen
aksar d aksar nutni fkan afus
insa waḍu-s
ur yenfiε wayen i k-yexḍan
awi kan nher s asif
ass-a nerna-ten
ttkemmileɣ ccna
akniwen d akniwen aɛebbuḍ ifreq-iten
taṛbut ittwanejṛen teḥwaǧ aneqqi
nnan-d d takumidit usaru-nni ziɣ d adṛam
d atmaten
d imɣaren i tent-issemɣaren
d winna iwmi qqaren ungif n taddart
acu tebɣiḍ ad t-texdem
ad ɛasseɣ din yuki naɣ yexxuc
ad d-ggurɛen iɣeẓṛan
ad d-ikkes akk tassemt-nni ad d-iseddu tigeẓẓal
ad yuɣal daɣen am netta
acuɣer i as-tugiḍ i weltma-k ad teffeɣ
a tilawin slilwemt-as i teslit
tazemmurt tcudd s akal-is d ungal i yura belqesem at maɣzuccen
ad txeddmeḍ akal lameɛna ur k-d-ittak ara lɣella-s
nerra-t-id kan ɣer tezwawt
ddukklen di sin armi d tameddit nsan di lğameε n taddart
ur tezmir ara temgerṭ-is ad terfeḍ aqerru-s icuffen
s ujenwi-k ara tɛiceḍ ad tuɣaleḍ d aqeddac ɣef gma-k
ilaq ad tidireḍ tudert i ak-id-yettakken tahregt
ad iyi-ṭfen ma fɣeɣ-d ɣef tmeṭṭut d lbaṭel yezgan fell-as
win teṭṭef tbucehhaqt ad yezg yettusu kan
amek ara ngerrez leqdic-nteɣ deg cwiṭ n wakud-a
win ittqelliben ɣef zzayed ittaf nnaqes
tuli-d ddaw leɛnaya n mustafa paca
yiwet n texxamt akk i nekseb imiren
aẓru-agi i sbeddeɣ d ccahed ad yili d axxam n yillu
akka ara yexdem
mbeɛd mi yekker uxxam ad yelḥu deg ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt n tesdawit n mulud mɛemmeri
ferruǧa d yiwet n teḥdayt i as-yettilin
yeshel umennuɣ ɣef falesṭin deg facebook
a wi yufan ur qqaren acemma fell-i
d lxiṛ kan

aha tura mi neweḍ ɣer-s ad iban d acu yellan
am wakken ma mačči s tefransist i yesselmad mačči d tamussni

ad ḥebseɣ yir iberdan

at lḥeqq ggugmen am yesɣan
imi telluẓeḍ ayen teččiḍ ẓid am tamment
axaṭer si salaḥ ittwaɛzel d imqeddes i yillu-is
ad ken-ḥesbeɣ d agdud-iw nekk ad iliɣ d illu-nwen
tekker tmeṭṭut-nni tenna-as i urgaz-is

waqila tikelt-a fahment iman-nsent txeddamin n tnezduɣt-a
teqbeḥ mačči d kra
twala deg-s d argaz-is s timmad-is
ur txeddmeḍ ara iṛebbiten s wuzzal yefsin
Ṣṣyada ṣbaḥ i tt-ferqen aḥlil i yimeɣban yeṭṭsen
ssired iḍarren-ik
timleḥfin ad ttwaxedment s lxiḍ n lfina yeẓdan tikerras-nsent ad ttwaxedment s nnḥas
akken i wen-yehwa get-iyi isem
win ara ineɛlen baba-s neɣ yemma-s d lmut ara yemmet
tuggad ansi d-yettuɣal zik si sbiṭar

dunnit d ticeqqufin akk n umezgun
ayen akk ara d-ifk ad wen-yili d lqut

tban-iyi tmuɣli akkin
tetteɣzaẓ tugar ajeǧǧiḍ
d acu i tɣilemt εni

ad d-awint ustu ad grent aẓeṭṭa
