yella d afesyan deg laṛmi
yelsa aqendur d amellal irebba ačamar d aberkan
hus ay aɛudiw kulci d tanaṣlit tissit n ccrab d tanamit
wali aneqqis-iw n tezmert
am wass-a ad ikker
acḥal n tsaɛtin nekk d araǧu
iɛedda lweqt agellid n maṣer immut
ass i deg bdiɣ ttuɣaleɣ-d ɣer tilawt
d kemm ara t-yesfaqen ma tkemmleḍ akka
a sidi bab uγanim
abeddel n ccɣel d asteɛfu
amdan ara yenɣen wayeḍ d lmut ara yemmet
teǧǧa-t ṣṣeḥḥa
segmi meẓẓiyeɣ ulac acu iyi-ttaɛǧaben deg wayen i ḥemmlent akk tizya-w
iruḥ almi i d as-ibed ɣef tewwurt
tẓer tafekka-s am lbumba izemren ad teṭṭerḍeq fell-as
d azal
tasuqqilt sɣur Ɛebdnnur Ḥamituc
lukan ad tt-tennaleḍ d amcum-im
tilawin meqqren akk deg twacult-iw lsant-tt
awal yeswan alef sexseṛeɣ-t deg umṣeṛṛef
tidmarin jxent lxent brant i yiman-nsent
mi d-tɛeddaḍ sdat n uɣerbaz d tesnawit nher s lemḥadra
yettraǧu-tt ɣer tewwurt ma tgumma ad as-teldi am uqjun yettɛassan ɣef bab-is
nekk sliɣ akk timucuha
tessers-itt i tili
Ṭfent deg tikli n yemma-tsent ifernen ad tessuden iḍarren n adem
lameɛna agad illu-ik
axaṭer tudert n mkul lxelq d idammen-nni yellan deg-s
Ɣef yisennanen i teqqimem
tettawi-yas-t deg iḍ ɣas akken yettwaggad
xedmen fell-as lḥeflat llin ibezyaben i lxuṭbat
issenḍuḍeɛ-it Ṛebbi armi iccedha lmut
iğernanen ṛṛadyuwat leqmen awal di teswaԑt
d nettat i d-yelhan s yikufan
ahat imir-nni i s-tekcem tmedyazt ɣer wul
wali akk amazray n lqem
Ṣebreɣ-am kan imi i am-truḥ yelli-m
ad d-yeẓẓel afus-is aɣezzfan ad t-yawi yid-s
Ɣas gullen ad nɣen
ladɣa tama-a d tin i yettwassnen s waṭas n tkebbunay n lpitrul
kahina fkan-as-d lviza ad tɣer deg tesdawit di fransa
limer ufiɣ ad d-slaleɣ asirem
yelli-s n ferɛun terra-as ruḥ awi-tt-id
mass neṣṣaḥ Ɛmer i d-yennan “s lferḥ meqqren i d-nezdi tawcult-nneɣ tis snat"
Ẓriɣ netta ad ihdeṛ ishel fell-as wawal
tlaq-iyi temzelt
deg tdiwennit-agi mass yusef awcic yemmeslay-d ɣef yisenfaren s umata
d abelεeṭ kan i tettbelεiṭem
snummen-as ad tettlusu lḥiǧab seg imi tessaweḍ ukuẓ n yiseggasen
aqli nniɣ-am-d
imɣi n ṣṣaba meɛqul mbaɛid i d-yettmuqul
ad iyi-ṭfen ma nnuɣeɣ ɣef tmaziɣt yecbeḥ
ilha umerreḥ timeddiyin
ur tettfaqeḍ ara ma qqnent neɣ ldint wallen-ik seg tillas qessiḥen
acekkuḥ d aclawad aselban
ttwaliɣ-t ḥnin yerna yefhem
tgiḍ-d tamrart i yiri-m
ur d-ttawin ara tameṭṭut iwumi i yebra urgaz-is
yeḥrec neɣ ur yeḥric azal-is ad t-yawi
tesmekta-d agujil ɣef yimeṭṭawen
a rebbi sebber arraw-is d uxxam-is i kamel ddin fexxar
ilit d imqeddsen axaṭer nekk d imqeddes
nekk ɣur-i tudert war tayri d layas
yal wa ad as-d-yefk Ṛebbi almend n wul-is
cuddeɣ-tent akk deg wallaɣ-iw
nesɛa uṭṭun uɣur yezmer umsiher ad d-yessiwel ma yebɣa ad d-yesteqsi neɣ ad icetki
anida bɣuɣ iliɣ ad sdariɣ iman-iw
deg uxxam n umezgun Ɛebdelkader allula i nwulef nettabaɛ ticeqqufin n umezgun
ilaq ad nesiweḍ dakken agezdu n tmaziɣt ad yesselmad s tmaziɣt
lqed d alemmas
wwin-as lehna i twellit-nsen
ayen i tgiḍ axxam
aḍegger n waman i iwesxen ɣer din
maca nessexdam allaɣ mi ara yezli wul
yestulles lḥal
ttagaden medden sbiṭar
teṣneṣlem-iyi-d seg umaḍal n yigerdan
dayen rẓag lqut
nella necɣel mliḥ ssmana-nni iεeddan
ideεεu armi t-yeḥwes yiḍes di targit iwala yerna γur-s uqcic yefreḥ isečč yakk taddart
urɣu n teẓgi ilindi tariḥt-is ass-agi
qqim deg talwit
rrnut tifyar
di leɛnaya-k serreḥ-iyi ad ṛuḥeɣ akken ad meḍleɣ baba
ahat ad ten-heyyin i warraw-nsen
dɣa laban ifka-as yelli-s lalla xelluǧa d tameṭṭut-is
acku d tamnaḍt n temguri
rnu-as asalay i yetturaǧun ad yettwabnu daɣen din i wayen akk yellan d tinḍi taqbaylit
ad m-ifiq ḥedd
lameɛna ula d iseḥḥaren n maṣer xedmen akken s ssḥur-nsen
acḥal ara sen-d-isqam uxxam-a
ass-nni dɣa meẓyan yeṭṭef abrid-is yuɣal ɣer siɛir
talɣa d usentel n uḍris mačči d ufrin
uccen awah
yessaweḍ ula ad yeg tisuqilin i temsirin n tfizikt
aya imi anda tnuḥ tḥanut neɣ d taneččit ad tent-yaf umuḍin medlent lawan n tzeggant n wass
ay ameɣlal
wali amaɣnu n useqdac
send iḍelli
a zzman ideg d-negra leḥlu yeqqel d lqareṣ
ulin-d waman dɣa wwin lbabuṛ refden-t nnig n lqaɛa
tɛelleq-as ageṭṭum n lfeṭṭa
agadet rebbi nelluẓ
ifreḥ aṭas baba-s n yisli
mi bdiɣ ḥelluɣ suffɣen-iyi-d seg sbiṭar n yimexlal
rfed neɣ sers
feṛḥeɣ nezzeh s warraz i d-yettunefken sɣur tddukkla adrar n fad
tixer-as i yelli
iḥulfa akken ilaq i wass deg yeğğa i lebda taddart
d taɣawsa i kem-rran
nnan iṭij ma icreq-d ur t-iteffer ara uɣerbal
win yeddan d win yumsen
neɣ ma ulac s yixf n ferɛun ar d ixbaṛǧiyen i tellam
yes-sen i tenǧes tmurt
musa iɛeggeḍ ɣer umeɣlal inna-as d acu ara xedmeɣ i ugdud-agi
kul ḥedd yelha d cceɣl-is
ur ttili ara d yir aqcic
yules-as d acu i as-d-yeǧǧa baba-s
dduzan-nni ixdem-iten meṛṛa s nnḥas
gar-asen tameɣra n ukermus
d iɛineḍ nnig n wuglan yeṭṭef kan amkan
temmeɣ ɣer dduḥ tekkes-as tutlin
mazal trennu-d isteqsiyen ay at laɛraḍ
nnan medden mačči kifkif kul wa amek yettak lfetwa
nekk ur t-ttraǧuɣ ara ad yesɛu
tamussni d tawwurt
mi kecmeɣ tasdawit ṛwiɣ anemḍer seg texxamt ɣer tayeḍ deg tnezduɣt tasdawant
d idlisen i d iselsa
wali atiṭuryel n usenfaṛ
ulama yewɛer akken ad tafeḍ leḥsab ssawaḍen yirgazen n uḥraz n tẓegwa ad sɛun tikti
yella-d usarag wis sin n tdukkla-a
akken i d-yekcem mfezwan yal wa anda yerra
rezfent-d yessetma s warraw-nsent axxam yeččur iqerra fuṛen
asmi i lliɣ d acawrar zzin-iw yufrar
ixdem akken i s-d-yumeṛ remḍan i lwennas
mazal tidukkla tadelsant imnar n tdukli n at Ɛisa mimun tettkemmil leqdic-is deg usuddes n yisaragen yemxalafen
teẓriḍ lehḍur-iw ffɣen-d seg wul
tutlayt-iw d taqbaylit
anwa yettsuɣun akka deg iḍ-a
tecrek-iten ula d tarwa
s tallelt n teseqqamut n taddar-agi xedmen-d yiwet n tmeɣra n ccna meqqren
tucmit-nni i icemmten imawlan-is
d acu kan mi ara yesexdam umdan tameslayt-nni igellu-d s ubeddel deg tseddast
tura deg upurṭabl kan ay qqareɣ idlisen
yal wa akken yura deg twenza-s
sselmadeɣ-as ɣef waddal d uẓawan d wigi i ssneɣ
aggus yeẓḍa d isura nbegges yes-s
dɣa yiwen n wass ad teglu s bab-is
ass-a ur neẓri ma ad neddu d umaynut neɣ ad neqqim d uqbur
usiɣ-d ad ẓreɣ baba
yeḥṣa mačči d tiderwect
ccna i yettḥessis γer bu iḍebsiyen yeldi-as allen γer yiwet n taluft
Ɣer tecḍaṭ n ǧeṛǧeṛ ur tettagad ara aẓaɣaṛ
yella wi ijerḥen nniḍen
aɣebbar meṛṛa n lqaɛa yuɣal d tilkin di tmurt n maṣer
tenwam ddunit d awal kan waqila
ur cfiɣ ara mliḥ
ur ttak cclaḍa i win innumen abuneqqaṛ
uccen dayen ttuγ-t-in
deg yinen n umalas i tettwaxḍeb i tedda d tislit
tḥeqqeɣ belli ad tεeddi akken ilaq
mi ruḥeɣ ad rewleɣ zedreɣ
leḥqen-d yiḍebbalen neɣ mazal
tturaren am warrac imecṭaḥ
senqed ma yella asnas neɣ amasal yettwafernen yebded akken iwata ɣef uselkim-agi
timsirin war lexlaṣ i yinelmaden
akken ad nerr lxir
wexxar-d akka si ṭṭaq ruḥ ad tɣummeḍ aqerru-m
lexyal n urfiq yezga di yal amḍiq
sarameɣ ad nexdem ayen yuklalen ad yemmag
ur d-ttmaggaren ara amaynut d ubeddel i ten-yessaggaden
ulac tameṭṭut i izewǧen d mmi-s n urgaz-is
ula d netta ittekka yid-sen
unfeɣ-as ad teglilez deg tikta-w deg tirga-w d yiman-iw
Ɣilleɣ dayen ur yi-d-yeqqim ara ad kkeɣ si ddunit
deg tmurt i deg ur ilaq ad tefɣeḍ zik uqbel tafat
awi-t akkin i tmedlin anfet-aɣ kan
zwi-d afus-ik a lbaz n leqwas
ad awiɣ wa
ur umineɣ ara ad d-awḍeɣ
zzher-is yettruẓu iẓra

qqimemt
acuɣer ur testeqsayem ara ma yesɛa tawacult neɣ xaṭi
ama deg yiɣeẓran isaffen neɣ uggugen
ad asen-tt-tefkeḍ
ass-a ruḥeɣ ɣer yemma guraya

temxell si leḥzen
d amellal wul-is
at isṛayil xedmen akken
waw
ulamma nekk diri-yi lehdur-iw d ineqqaden
a mmi ad k-weṣṣiɣ ɣef tlata
aydi-a itett qrib kullec
iḥerrek ẓẓher-is
acimi zgiɣ cennfeɣ
teswiḍ latay
ma ulac aɣilif εreḍ tikkelt-nniḍen
d akayad
tesseṛɣeḍ-asen-t
usiɣ-d ad ḍelbeɣ lemεawna-k
ur cfiɣ ara mliḥ mi d-uwḍen yimejjayen
tesla imir i dderz n tazla ɣer texxamt-is
zedɣen ɣur imuha
beṛka-kem aɣenni
d kečč winna neɣ
acu ara txedmeḍ s leqraya n tmurt-a
yennejla seg tmurt
Ḥezneɣ ɣef leḍyur-nni yerɣan s tmes deg teẓgi
Ẓẓel afus-ik tettebɛeḍ-t
inxeṛwaɛ uḍaṛ-is
anef-iyi tura
rnu deffir n yal isem tasnakta
yebda-d wedfel
iru ɣef lehmum-is
ur tesɛi tikti ɣer wanida ara terr
ddaw tgelda n Ɛebdelmumen ben Ɛli ɣer lqern wis tnac
a nnger-ik a yul tarigt tuɣal i uɣyul
d tazrazaɣt tasurit tewwi-d xmesṭac seg ɛecrin deg tmaziɣt
zuzer adrar n ssem
d acu d ddḥis-ayi
acimi i yugi ad d-yas 
yeččur tamcuceft d aman
snemmer-it
yenna-asent aql-i yid-kent alma d lmut 
anwa deg-wen ara yeffɣen iḍ-a 
efk-iyi-d tilelli neɣ enɣ-iyi
yenna-d mmi  "ḥemleɣ-kem"
wissen d acu i yebɣa ad d-yini 
win yeṭṭsen yeṭṭes
ad ak-lhun wussan
bɣiɣ ad seggmeɣ iman-iw
yečča weɣyul acikaw
tekkatemt ɣef teqbaylit
d nna faḍma i yeggaren ustu
ali ɣer tkeṛṛust tsekkreḍ-d tiwwura
akka i slant
ma tewteḍ tameṭṭut-ik amzun d yemma-k i tewteḍ ay aɣyul
anda akka i yerra
ini-d ih a lalla
anwa i k-yifen a bu yetran
yal ass tettarguḍ s teqbaylit
nefka tasertit i win i tt-yebɣan
yemla-am d acu ara txedmeḍ
anda akka i rrant
tedda ɣef teflukt-nni
ur tnuda fell-akent ur kent-tufi
a lxux i d-ṛebban waman
ad iffeɣ seg uxxam
ad tissin taqbaylit
teεǧeb-as nansi Ԑeǧrem
ad d-imɣi lweṛd ad yefsu
abeṛnus yettwakkes-iyi
yufeg-awent uqermud
a mmi leqraya tekfiḍ
yemlal yid-i
ad ndewweṛ ɣer win i d-ṛebbant
bniɣ-awent axxam
wissen anti taɣulin tinaddayin n tfellaḥt n teqbaylit ideg llan aṭas n yirman
yefka-yam abadaṛ
laẓ ur yesɛi nnif
smir ay ul-iw
ad am-d-tessiwel tmurt-im
igen yid-s uqbel ad myezwaǧen
nudaɣ fell-ak ufiɣ-k
neɛya si tsertit tameɛfunt
irem yezmer ad yeddes s yiwet neɣ s waṭas n tayunin
amek i ten-steqsan
tadamsa n lezzayer tebna ɣef ṣṣehd n piṭrul kan
xdem ayen akk tebɣiḍ
yella wayen i k-icewwlen neɣ
ruḥen warrac ad uraren deg berra
s teqbaylit i theddeṛ yemma
mačči ala nekk i yebɣan ad iruḥ
ddem lpala tebduḍ afras
yekseb tixsi d uqjun
ur bnant d tin ara yaɣ
d times n walim kan
nutni ttxemmimen kan ɣef teqbaylit
gen di talwit a gma haya nureddin d awezɣi ad k-nettu
mazal llan wid yettnaɣen ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
aɣyul-nni ǧǧan-t ifad
s teqbaylit i d-ttwaṛebbaɣ deg taddart-iw
deg lawan-nni nettagad tiqcicin
ttgebgubent tzizwa
yettḥellis irennu armi s-nnan ḥbes
ad neqbel tiwtilin-nwen
win umi yecbek wallaɣ ad yerr ar lǧameɛ
tfukkeḍ
lkanun tura yensa
gen di talwit a gma muxtari amar d awezɣi ad k-nettu
mbaṭel
yelsa aserwal d tkebbuḍt
ilaq-ak ad truḥeḍ tura
rju dayi alamma qqleɣ-d
ttmalen-d timucuha timseḍsa timseɛraq d akud iḥemmlen aṭas yigerdan
arrac lemmden ur ẓrin
ad yawi yid-s amur-is
d avilu-inu
gen di talwit a gma diduc ferḥat d awezɣi ad k-nettu
yeslexs-iyi ugeffur
yessuter-d idrimen
iεǧeb-iyi wamek i tṣebreḍ akken
mazal nettkemmil leqdic ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
iberdan-nneɣ ttgelgilen d aman mi ara twet lehwa
ad xedmen ayen xedmen i taddart n tiɣilt ilindi akka imira
lqahwa ur tjemmeε yiwen
ma tebɣiḍ ad d-wteɣ apyanu ad d-wteɣ
ad uɣaleɣ d yiwen-nnsen
yugad ɣas tuɣ-t d abɣas
yeqfez tom
ad tlemdemt tutlayt taqbaylit s wul-nkent
s tidet ikad-am-d tom axir-iw
ur sseḥqar ibki necrek aẓar
ad n-beddeɣ s teḍsa
yekcem ɣer yiwet n texxamt deg tesga ibedd uẓeṭṭa
d asugen kan i tessuguneḍ
aniwa ara d-iṛuḥen azekka
cḍeḥ a taseɛdit huz
yehlek
tnuda fell-as tufa-tt
tilaykit d afraq n ddin ɣef uwanek d lumuṛ izuyaz
iεǧeb-iyi wamek i tgiḍ akken i ucekkuḥ-ik
gen di talwit a gma caybet Ḥusin d awezɣi ad k-nettu
d acu i tent-yuɣen
tom d ambur
cukkeɣ d ta i d ssebba iɣef ur wen-εǧibeɣ ara
tefka-yas ddḥis
xemmem ttxil-k ɣef usteqsi-nni
s tayri i tettmeslayemt taqbaylit
nexdem-it
acḥal ayagi i rujaɣ
sellket-tt uqbel ad terwi
Ḥulfaɣ s tugdi
lliɣ d tajdidt
yebna-am axxam
ur zmireɣ ad kkseɣ lligat-iw
di tilawt imezdaɣ n lεiraq mačči d aεraben deg laṣel-nsen
fransa i tt-ceggḍen d tamurt n leqbayel i as-d-yettaran tiɣrit
atan ɣef ukanapi
yeɣra settin ḥizeb yeqqim d aɣyul
ad iyi-tt-id-fken at waɛli neɣ ad agin
ini-d d acu nxeddem da
Ččiɣ lekwaɣeḍ-iw
xdem ayen twalaḍ yelha
gen di talwit a gma malki kamal d awezɣi ad k-nettu
ur tessinemt ara ad turaremt ddabex
ifassen-is d izelmaḍen
ur ttarra ara ssuma deg unezgum
kečč tettneɛtabeḍ ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
d acu-t wagi diɣen i d-terniḍ ay akli
ruḥent zik
ur t-ẓrint ara
ah ya leḥbab-iw d acu d iyi-d-yeggran
ferḥeɣ mi ẓriɣ imdukal-iw n zik
d aksum i icebbḥen iɣes
bɣant ad ṛebbint iwtal
d imdukal i llan
amek iεedda umulli-m
ini-t-id abrid-nnayeḍ
aḥeddur iqsed i teslit
ttarun-asen tibratin yal aseggas
teddunt slulayent
ur yezmir ara tom ad yenheṛ takeṛṛust
iḥemmel ad iḥewwes s ukanic-is
tella kra n yiwet deg beṛṛa
kerheɣ tafsut imi tettaf-iyi-d dima d awḥid
yufa-d sser-nni d acu-t
Ɣeṣbent di tikli
mačči s ccḍeḥ i tettmaga tegrawla
mi ara imɣureɣ ad d-ffɣeɣ am kečč swaswa
ur yewwiḍ ara aswir ɛlayen deg leqraya
yekkat ubruri
d asirem i yi-d yeqqimen
yella ḥedd i yettmuqqulen
ikcem ɛamṛayen
bdiɣ ttfadeɣ
teččiḍ mseblu
iruḥ deg umkan n baba-s
ad nɛenni ad nraju yiwen
yeffeɣ-ik leεqel
zwaren-d deg-k at uxxam
yemma tsexdam amuṛej akken ad texdem ṣṣabun n yiceṭṭiḍen
turez iman-is
acu-tt tansa-k
icennu dima mara iteccef
ifuk wayen ara m-iniɣ
anta i d-yecfan
axir tineqlebt wala yir ṛṛay
d anehhar n lεali
tom tekcem-it tegdi
Ɛyiɣ seg-m dayen ɛyiɣ
yečča tom s uɣiwel
bɣiɣ ad uɣaleɣ d ameṛkanti
d aḍref n lbaṭaṭa kan
nwiɣ fsiɣ i tkersa
ikubar isertanen rran-tt ala i usḥissef
berka ur smuhbul ara
inuda dda rabeḥ ɣef ẓẓher-is ur t-yufi di tḥanut
ur ken-mazal ara d imecṭaḥ am zik
amek armi teččam isandwičen n belxadem ass-nni deg bgayet
terwi s ugeffur
ahat ad yi-tɣelbeḍ
am akken zgiɣ ggugmeɣ
tebɣiḍ ad tuẓumeḍ
ay agu i d-yewwi waḍu
d aɣebbaṛ s allen
iḥemmel ad yečč tiɛesbanin tiqeṛḥanin
dagi ara neqqim
yella kra i d-yettfuḥun
ad tɛeddi ad texdem imekli
mi n-wehheɣ udem-iw ɣur-m
"a lzzayer ncalleh ad teḥluḍ ad tuɣaleḍ am zik-nni
iwḥel-as uburur
yettban-d am aggur ɣef usigna
ur neǧǧi amkan
anida-ken a yirgazen
ma tḥuza-kem ur tesɛi ddwa
tella kra n yiwet i d-iluɛan tura
ass-n mi tt-ɣriɣ
igrurez am ilɣan
yella kra i tettumt
beddlem lqecc-nwen
ifukk unebdu
amek ara yefru ssuq-is
dacu ara ččent
anda-ten akk lehduṛ-nni
d lxir kan i neqsed
ahat azgen deg leqbayel d imedyazen
ggzen amnadi-nni s lmut ɣef lǧal n tikta-s
Ɣur-sen "aqbayli ilelli" d win kan isemmḥen deg laṣel-is
win wwteɣ tazgelt ulac
ass-a yakk imdanen ḥman
bɣiɣ uqbel ad ruḥeɣ
tɛedda tilas
yella wayen i ixuṣṣen
seg wakken yeneḥcam yerwel
ad k-rreɣ tettzuxxuḍ yess-i
iṭṭes di tmejja
tafgurt d ayen swayes tettḥasaf teɣdemt win ixedmen kra
yehwa-yasen kan
ad k-ineɣ ad iɛezzi deg-k
ma tettekleḍ ɣef waɛrab ad k-yesseddu taqbaylit ɣas rnu ṭṭes
aniwa igenni ideg i tettiliḍ
aqesbuḍ mačči d acelɛuḍ
di leɛnaya-m laɛi-yas s tilifun
tḥemmel lqahwa
iwwet agejdur
imečč d amuddir
Ẓriɣ acu i k-iḥerṣen
d aksil i yenɣan Ɛuqba deg umḍiq iwmi qqaren tura sidi-Ɛuqba
d nekk ara d-yekkren zik azekka
yessufeɣ lmal ad yeks
yekkes-d asekkin d waɣer i yellan din deg uxxam
ulamek ara hedreɣ seg akken lliɣ sebεeɣ
ur k-yuɣ wayra
Ẓeṭṭef-as lbuq
aman ma neɣlen ad slexsen yal tama
tella kra n yiwet i d-ijerḥen
ma d nnif-is yečča-t deg usandwič
mkul asemekti ad tt-id yesru
dacu ara teččemt
yettewhem d acu n tmussni-nni
ad teqqim deg uxxam azekka
tom d aẓawali
nezmer ad nehder deg berra
Ɣas tɛerḍeḍ-iyi ay aḥbib ur d-ttaseɣ ara
yella kra i tesraḥayem
qqlen akk ar deffir
am win ur ttafen ara
tella kra n tɣawsa i yufa tom
nella nezdeɣ deg sin n iɛecciwen
bɣiɣ kan ad nernu aya ɣer wayen iεeddan
anwa ara d-yekkren zik azekka
kullec iruḥ ur d-iban
tikwal yettbin-iyi-d lḥal qrib ad tenger
amk ara yibnin uxxam
ad teɛqel tyuga axemmas
aṭṭan n temẓi d ussan
ur ssinen ara tasdawit n bgayet
ansi nekka d asawen
ur ẓriɣ ara ma cfiɣ ɣef yisem-im
ur yezmir ara ad iyi-d-iḥaz kra n ḍḍer seg yemdanen
deg iseggasen-nni n sebɛin ccumren akk iḥeffafen imi medden ttaǧǧan acekkuḥ
attan tebbehba fell-am
teẓẓel ɣef tgertilt
aql-aɣ deg ass n lǧemɛa
am wass-a di lehna ad d-uɣalen
aṭas i teglalzem deg wannar n taddart
mazal kra ur t-teččiḍ neɣ
ur teɛyim ara seg uḥṛiṛet
zger anida ur k-yettawi
iwacu tweεreḍ akken ɣer yiman-ik
Ɛyan medden si tsertit
yella kra i yemxalafen
mkul tagwest s uzduz is
irra akesser d asawen
ur d-iqqim deg-s uṭenṭun
ur yi-d-ḥebbsemt ara mi ara d-heddṛeɣ
neqqerṣ meṛṛa
kul ass isɛa tameddit
luleɣ deg taddart iqemmuden
winna d ccix iɛefsen iẓẓan
lekdeb iḥemmeq
taɣaṭ-is ad d-tarew izimer
qqaren-iyi Ḥmed
yella kra n yiwen
ad wen-d-iniɣ ɣas yyaw
ad tenwuḍ ad as-d-sɣimeɣ
ur ttru ara
yecmumeḥ iruḥ
anda ara naf widak yettcabin ar widak-nni
tebren-as aqeṛṛuy i tyaẓiḍt-is
saḥit a tom ad t-ddmeɣ dayi
anef-iyi ad ruɣ
Ḥemmleɣ učči n leqbayel
tebɣa ad tennaɣ
tiɣwist n wevyulu tecbeḥ mliḥ
wi k-illa
ala ma kfan εamayan
ur sɛiɣ ara ugur d wannect-a
yewwi-yi-d cennegnagi
aṭṭan n lḥubb d timqestin
nnif iḥwaǧ lḥeṛma
ziɣ yesserka-tt win tt-iwwin
iḍ kamel ur ṭṭiseɣ ɣef lǧal n lḥess-nni
yewwi-kem-id cennegnagi
werǧin nwala dda sliman deg tiliẓri n lezzayer yerna qqaren-aɣ-d "xawa-xawa"
anwa i teẓṛam
tesɛedda-t ar ccṛeɛ
ur ittɛawed ara tom ad yi-yamen
din kan i mazal tayri-w
yendeh udrar yessawel a leqbayel ur qqaret taɛrabt yebnan aqunniz
inni-as i yiman-ik mi ara d-tekkreḍ tanezakt
amek armi i d-tmenna akanic
ičča-tt meṛṛiɣet
nruḥ neɣra-d i iɛeggalen n lkumiti ad ɛebbin aɣyul-nni yemmuten
dayen ur ḍmiεeɣ
anef-as d ayen i yefhem kan
Ḥemmlent ad ḥewsent s ukanic-nsent
dacu ara ččeɣ
di leɛnaya-m steqsi walebɛaḍ-nniḍen
mačči d win tebɣa i tezweǧ d win i s-textar yemma-s
Ččan taxbizt iman-nsen
yuɣal-d unaẓuṛ-nni
mazal ur ddimeɣ ula d rray
ma iɣaḍ-ik lḥal semmeḥ-iyi
tenta tgersa deg udɣaɣ
tura-yas tabrat iḍelli
teččiḍ iles-ik waqila
ssirident tuɣmas-nsent yal ass
igenni iḥwaǧ akk itran
ur t-id-jemmε ara
anwa i d-yettmeslayen

tmenεeḍ ur k-ikerrec ara
yuɣal yefqeɛ tom
iḍelli kan i ldiɣ yiwen usebter deg facebook
fkiɣ-am laman
ttasen-d si yal axxam
bezzaf i tger n sskeṛ deg lqahwa-nni

tleḥḥu tudert
yella kra i tesraḥayeḍ

tenɣiḍ-asent-tt
kaysa xalifi d tamyarut taqbaylit tamurt n iqbayliyen tira asuqqel tura deg yeɣmisen isem-im d amedya i lebda
iwakken azekka ur aɣ-yettuɣal ara d aẓekka
Ɛni tfukkeḍ
ad yekkes ayen nettu yiwen n wass
serreḥ i umrig-ik

ttrajuɣ ad iyi-d-terreḍ s wawal s lɛejlan
yella uyefki deg ufrigu

srid seg madrid
ad yefreq yid-i aṭṭan-iw

di leɛnaya-nwen susmem

cfiɣ yiwen n wass di ccetwa nella nezzi-d i lkanun

iɣli am uɣeddu

iqemmuden iqeṛmuden imectuqa n yiḥbuben abziz abziz i yiwen

ad sen-aruɣ tibratin

mkul awal s nnehta

ur tessineḍ ara ad turareḍ
ilaq-iyi ad aruɣ tabrat tesεiḍ lkaɣeḍ

dacu ara teččeḍ tameddit-aki
d aqcic neɣ d taqcict
tettaru s yiwet n tira amack-itt
ufiɣ yiwen n webɛuc ɣef ṭṭaq
učči-ya yeεfen
ur ttemsefhament ara
Ḥaca tamart ik
tecfam ɣef ssuq-lfellaḥ
vinus d tillut n tarrawt d tayri

ad d-iffeɣ seg-k lǧens akked waṭas n leǧnas
d lqella n uksum i yesseknafen turin
ilaq-iyi ad kem-agadeɣ
sfeḍ axenziz-nni deg anzaren-ik
ssummet akal ar din terkuḍ
a tiffaf muḥend yuɣal d aḥeffaf

Ḥemmleɣ tiqsiḍin yesḍusayen
common voice mi d-yessawel ilaq-aɣ yakk ad neɛǧel

aṭas n medden i yettḥulfun am kečč
d lɛali-t mliḥ mliḥ
iḍelli mlaqaɣ d yimawlan-im

yugi ad tt-yettu
swan lqahwa s uyefki
imi aya ur ilaq ara ad d-yili
d adrar n himalaya i yeɛlayen akk deg umaḍal
ur εad nessaweḍ
aɛeṛḍi idda d ubrid n Ṛebbi
adɣaɣ ɣef udɣaɣ ad yali uxxam
jeṛṛebeɣ ijajiḥen-ines
d bu tqulhatin
iɣli-d laẓ ɣef tmura meṛṛa
yell kra i rebḥeɣ
tikwal ɣas s lḥiǧab ad k-teɛǧeb teqcict
iruḥ ɣer tama nniḍen

d Ɛemru ben lɛaṣ i yestɛemren maṣer s yisem n tneslemt

zdaxel i llant
yerẓa remḍan
aql-iyi ur xeddmeɣ ara
ur telliḍ seg-neɣ
yuɣal isɣi d ccateṛ
am akken negrent tissas
Ḍfeṛ ṛṛay-iw
heggan waman-is
laɛyaḍ fell-aneɣ tazzla fell-awen
kul yiwen anda i tent-yuɣ
yettismiḍ lḥal da lawan-a
ur ḥemmleɣ ara lqahwa
nḥemmel ad nehḍer
tessuṭṭuḍ mmi-s di lḥaṛa
abṛaham irra-yas anɛam
mbeɛd tesɛa-d taqcict tsemma-yas dina
d fransa i yernan tɛerreb tamennaṭ icawiyen
ta di ṭṭbel ta di tẓayeṛt
awufan tislit am leḥrir i tsegnit
ldi apaki-nni
dacu i d-yettilin tura
kkes-as axemmem rnnu-as tayri

d nekk i d-teskaneḍ
isɛa amalu asammer
ur yecfi ara ɣef temẓi-s

yedda akken ddan waman

anwa ara s-yecfun

hattan tayi d tikti
ata uyefki-k
yura-asen tabrat iḍelli
Ǧǧan-ak-d tarda leḥwal

nneyya teɣleb tiḥeṛci

ta d aḍu ta d tajemmaɛt
kkret ad truḥem

akken i la tberren ddunit
itri di tiṭ d amerwal
di leɛnaya-k susem
tḥemmlemt ad teččemt tiɛesbanin
ayen yesserẓagen leɛmeṛ-iw
ssusen iḍaṛṛen-iw am uqejmuṛ n maras
ttwala tugar tazmert
mačči d ayen swayes ara zuxxeɣ
jules verne d amyaru afransis yemmuzgen deg tsekla n tussna tasugnant
awal-is ur yettεeddi
"aḍu n wenẓul" d ungal n ben hedduga
ssneɣ yiwen i izemren ad ɣ-iɛawen
Ḥemmlen-kem akk
tḥemmlem ad teččem tiɛesbanin
ahat ur seεεuɣ ara lweqt
ur bɣiɣ ara ad tuɣalemt ar boston
yya-w ɣer sbiṭar
timmad-is yeɛyan am temɣart yeṛwan tudert
hajeṛ si tmurt itegen lɛib i uɛeṛḍi
tinna d taculliḍt n teḍsa
ifṛayim d manaci ad ten-ḥesbeɣ am rawubin akked cimɛun
ulac win ara ixedmen deg tament ur tt-yemciḥ ara
yesnulfa-d snat n tesɣunin s tmaziɣt i yettwarun s tfinaɣ “iṭij taftilt”
tebɣa ad testaɛfu
amek yuru tamellalt amek akka wa lmeɛna-s yesɛa lberhan neɣ amek
mačči d nekk ara d-yeslalen tagrawla s tnefsit-a idermen
ansi tekka tsegnit ad ikk lxiḍ
ad iger afus-is deg yiwen seg yiflan yeččuren taxxamt-nni
nwan ddunit d awal kan
ddin yettarra aḍris aseklan yettabaɛ kra n tesnakta
yerkeb ruḥen
nekni nebɣa ad neqqim kan akken tella tmetti
tebɣa ad d-teɣḍel tadist-is
akken i ten-ttwalint deg tiliẓri d yisura
maca iban tecbeḥ ama d kra
eǧǧ-it ad iṣuni ggulleɣ ur s-rriɣ
anwa ara tlummemt
war ma ttuɣ aselway n useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n at smaɛel ɣef lḥir meqqren i t-izedɣen ɣef teqbaylit
leqbayel i izedɣen di tmurt n fransa neɣ imeddukkal-nsen ttwaɛerḍen ad ḥeḍren i tullya-a tamazrayt
ttif win i yi-iwalan wala win i yi-iwatan
tban d taqaḥbit niḍen i yettwanɣan
deg yimir i yebda amahil-is ameqqran
kulci yeggan siwa tabenɛammet d waman
nniɣ-d kan zewǧeɣ akken ad d-baneɣ meqqreɣ
ur d-yuɣal ur d-isawel

arraw-is werǧin semmḥen di yemma-tsen

zik azemmur nettawi-t-id deg yisni
d acu yirbeḥ a baba"
i tikkelt tamenzut deg tudert-iw i ḥulfaɣ i wabɛaḍ yeqbel-iyi akken lliɣ s tidet
cwiṭ-nni i tkesbeḍ uqbel ad d-aseɣ innerna yuɣal d aṭas
tessusem ciṭ imi ur d-thegga ara tamacahut s wacu ara teskiddeb
awah diri lexdeɛ
win ur nesɛi tagmat meḥqur
wali amek ad nessefrek isefka yinek di tsertit n tbaḍnit-nneɣ
d lqanun ara d-iqqimen i wat isṛayil i lebda si lǧil ɣer lǧil

d imsetḥi d amaggad ẓriɣ ulac acu ara yi-ixdem

takerza d tmegra

ur ssineɣ ara abrid ɣer tansa-a

acku uqbel kulci d imdanen i nella

win ara ixedmen ass-nni d lmut ara yemmet
d abrid i ten-id-iwwin ara ten-irren
lḥila n ssbaṛ teččur
ma tessiḍ lward ad yefsu tafsut ad teḥlu
yenna-as urgaz-is ad ɣabeɣ kra n wayyuren
ufhim s tiṭ ungif s lhezz am teɣliḍt
arrac-nni ččan kan rfis-nni qrumten din

tura tesɛa sin n warraw-is tafsut d yidir
azuḥ neɣ ciṭuḥ lbaraka deg drus
d lmut i deg-s yefrurxen
mmugren-iyi-d watmaten-iw di tlata ɣer tewwurt
Ḥaca lbacir buclaɣem i yi-tt-yetteqden

kečč anezzarfu n ddunit meṛṛa ur tḥekkmeḍ ara s lḥeqq

imi aman-agi akked yiẓmi-agi ad ruḥen seg umkan ɣer wayeḍ akken ddaw n yiṭij

d yiwet gar tddukkliwin timezwura di tmurt-nneɣ deg wayen yeɛnan leqdicat i t-xeddem
a tagiṭart-iw
diɣen deg ubaraz mi ara steɛfun yinelmaden
lsiɣ takessiwt-iw ṭfeɣ abrid ɣer wanda ur ẓriɣ ara
uran fell-as am akken d aḍbaɛ i t-ḍebɛen ittwaɛzel i umeɣlal

axnunnes yezmer ad yili deg uzwu deg waman deg lqaεa deg yimeẓẓuɣen deg wallen

ruḥ rrif rrif tili-m ur d-ttban ara
ur asen-tefki tezmert-nsen amek ad qqimen i laẓ imi ula d imsujjiyen-nsen ttwessin-ten dima i tgella

amcic-iw semmaɣ-as cnunnu
acuɣeṛ ara teqqimeḍ di beṛṛa

aγlif n ttṛebga taγelnawt
ayagi d leɛqed ara ḥerzen wat igawawen i lebda
tettagademt tili-nwent
tameṭṭut-nni terra-as d azrem i yi-iɣurren dɣa ččiɣ
Ẓriɣ ad d-yaweḍ wass i deg ara tebberbek fell-i tuḥsift i jemaɛen s tsusmi
tzemreḍ ad tegreḍ aya deg tesnakta n uwadem ma deg uwennet ur t-id-ggar ara
ad kem-teččar takawt
mi tt-tkemceḍ Ṛebbi ad tt-ikmec fell-ak
amakar ur nesɛi ara ayen ara yeɣrem i win yuker ad yenz d akli
yemma daɛda ad temmeɣ ad aɣ-d-tefk tayaziḍt ad d-neglu yis-s
iḍ-ayi ɣas eǧǧ-it akken yecɛel
yeddem-iten usyax n waktayen
ur ẓriɣ ara
segmi i d-nusa nessaweḍ ɣar ukkuẓ tmerwin d tẓa n yinurar n wurar iwumi nefka ussan iɛeddan tadrimt
acḥal tekkiḍ tuḍneḍ
urgaɣ-kent tusamt-d ɣur-i di snat
rẓiɣ cckal n uzaglu-nwen sbeddeɣ lqedd-nwen
ixdem s usɣar n uqeccuc tincirin i uqiḍun dɣa yesbedded-itent
mi ara slen yegduden ad rgagin ad d-teɣli rrehba ɣef ifilistiyen
Ɣriɣ tamaziɣt
bɣiɣ ad ẓreɣ amεellem-ik
d acu i tebɣiḍ
ax ad kem-qadden wiki yerna ad am-d-grin ad txelṣeḍ imekli
di tmurt n maṣer ikker-d yiwen n ugellid-nniḍen ur nessin ara yusef
yesɛa azref ad iɛeddi deg ccreɛ aḥeqqi
ixelleṣ tafunast d mmi-s
yerfed umɣar afus-is tuɣal-d tsusmi
mi tqerreb s aḍebsi n lḥenni am tin yettqerriben s izem
iseḥḥaren-nni nnan i ferɛun wagi d afus n yillu
abɛaḍ neɣ kra yuɣal deg umkan n tfekka-w d wallaɣ-iw
akka dayen theyya i uẓeṭṭa
zehwa ur tesɛi ara lweqt ad tessiweḍ lexbar i mendas
si mḥemmed inna-as zzenz-iyi ass-agi lḥeqq-ik n umenzu
iman-im i tettidireḍ
ddmen-d iɣiɣden-nni ṛuḥen ɣer ferɛun
asarag wis sin ɣef tuddsa n tmetti taqbaylit
Ɣar tama n yisenfaren-agi aɛiwed d uṣeggem n uḥric n tmerrit d yisensuyen tuget deg-sen ilaq ad ttuɛawden
anwa ara tlummeḍ
d lehlak i yemxallafen gar umdan ɣer wayeḍ
yeṛẓa lḥerma-ines deg lḥara-s yerna d netta i as-yettakken aɣṛum-is
ur tzunneḍ ara
yettwaṭṭef ɣef tnuzi n lhiruwin
ad yerku ula d netta am waken ara terku tfekka-w
mazal deg-neɣ tekkat
imaziɣen ttmuqulen aɛraben-nni yemmuten ɣef yiri n lebḥeṛ
yeǧǧa-tt usensi mačči d tameṭṭut
amsider ara yeswen isafaren-agi ur nettwaḥrez ara deg tasmuḍi
neggra-d kan nekk d umdakel-iw rafiq deg tezniqt yeddurin gar lbaṭimat
si lḥusin ad s-yeg ssuma ama yelha ama diri-t
ur yeclig ara deg wamek i tettwalin medden
mačči d ayen isehlen ad d-nefk taḥawact n useggas d uzgen
acuɣer ur yesɛi ara tabɣest a t-id-yini
d tameṭṭut-iw tfahmeḍ
ur d-tuɣalemt ur d-tsawlemt
ur tewwiḍemt ara ayen i tettmennimt
Ɛreḍ amek ara tbedduḍ s wullis
deg wulawen-nsen teɣli zzerriɛa n yimɣi n tayri
yid-i
daymi i ttwalin kra n waggagen yewwi-d aḥader seg tikti-a i izemren tegber tikti-nniḍen
yekkes-iyi akk wejɛuɛu-nni d yemɛuqan i d-yessalayen tamurejt
d tameṭṭut
zewǧen kemmlen di tayri-nni
yid-s ad twaliḍ tafat i d-yufraren seg sirem i tettrebbi s ɣur-s
xedmen s ddheb yeṣfan taɛeṣṣabt d asɣun imqeddes
wid d-iheddren yid-i
tasemrest-a mazal-itt ar ass-a teqqim deg waṭas n tudrin
tumert tennerna
timad-is d aẓṛu n lettkal
qqimeɣ weḥd-i yečča-yi usteqsi
d tarbaɛt n yinselmen imeṭṭurfa ineqqen s yisem n ddin
aql-aɣ nεeṭṭel ɣef ssebba-k
anda yella wawal-nni aẓidan
mi yeḥma yiṭij ayen i d-ittɣimin ifetti
ifka daɣen lehdeyyat mebla cceḥḥa i gma-s akked yemma-s
yettuɣal-itt-id yiẓri
tgiḍ taggara-a asarag deg ayt smaɛel ɣef umaḍal umḍin d usideg
xuṣṣeɣ deg yiḍes
anef tanafa tettɛeggiḍ
d yiwen i yumnen s umennuɣ ɣef tutlayt-is
amzun yečča tisegnit
meskint ulac win i tt-id-iwalan
ur neẓri ansi i ten-id-wwin
ur ibni ara fell-as ad t-iwali
ma akken qqaren ḥekkun deg ugemmaḍ-ihin akin

akka tura asekcem n teqbaylit deg google translate mačči d ayen yezwaren
tis snat ur tett tagella ala s tamment
taqendurt-nni n teslatin ɣur-s amzun d lekfen
ur ttebdad ara deg tlemmas n ubrid ad tettmmeslayeḍ ruḥ ɣer lqahwa
d acu i d rray-nwen
yeṭṭef aqeṛṛu-s isers-it ɣef tgecrar-is

mqidec bu lehmum

ad tt-sseɣlin
yezmer ad yeddu yid-nteɣ

d kemm i xtareɣ

ddarimt

Ɛyiɣ ur yekfi ubrid

iqqerṣ uyeddid
muḥal ad yeddu ɛeryan
anda akken i izad ukerfa
ur teɛyim ara di lhemm
ad ɣṛent di tesdawit n bgayet
yella kra i tettnadiḍ
Ḥemmlen-ken akk
win yebɣan taqbaylit yaɣ idlisen-is
feṛḥeɣ yerna s waṭas
Ɛni nutni mecɣulit
arrac n tmanyin feclen
yewwi-yi aṭas n sswayeɛ wanect-aki
ilaq ad teččeḍ kra
anda ddiɣ ad yi-yesweεden
ar melmi akka ara kkaten nneḥ
d ayen iqerben ɣer deffir ugar n wamek tenwiḍ
tom iga-d umuɣ n tɣawsiwin i yebɣa ad yexdem qbel ad yemmet
ad nezwir deg-s ad t-neɣḍel
sεiɣ sin wawalen ad m-ten-id-iniɣ
ixeddem aḍeggal itett
beεεed ɣef tmes-nni
wid i d-yemlal gar imakaren iqettalen imeksawen iεebbaden n yilluten atg
tapurtugit d tutlayt tunṣibt deg xemsa n tmura n tefriqt
teswam taqeṛɛunt n waman
ar teqḍeε layas
aṭas n ukermus i yeẓẓa
ibedd masil yeqqar anazal ɣef tewwurt
yeṛwa lmiziriya
mseččen izerman
iwwet lmeǧhud-is
mačči d izerfan i yeɣra winna
selleɣ i leṣwat
Ẓriɣ ad tt-tfehmem
tella tḥemmel-iyi ḥemmleɣ-tt
Ǧǧan-aɣ deg yir liḥala
yečča remḍan
ad nebrez tura
sɛan allen d tizegzawin
yekreh zzruḍya
d aɛenqiq n uzrem
"wid yettnadin iɣsan" d ungal n Ṭaher Ǧaɛut
yessewjad tom imensi
inimt-d tidet
yeḍṛa-yas kra i tom
bɣiɣ ad s-fkeɣ tabaḥant
annaɣ lemmer cbiɣ tizya-w
ileḥḥu d nnqali nnqali
amar ma beddleɣ tamurt
ahat teskerkiseḍ
arrac n at yeḥya musa ḥemmlen ad ɣren taqbaylit
yiwet n tmurt i nesɛa
ahat yiwen n wass ad tawḍeḍ lmerɣub-ik
xdem-it tura
yuli Ԑebdennur deg lkaṛ iwmi qqaren “lbaz”
yehwa-yawen kan
ccama-s d nekkinni
Ččuren-aɣ aqerru-nneɣ s tsurtin ur nfehhem
yella kra i teẓṛamt
yenɣa-t wul-is ula ɣef lǧin ma telsa-t
yella kra i twalaḍ
ur tufiḍ d acu i ttnadiɣ ala tafat i wallen
yeqqur uqerruy-iw
akken i ten-sεan yemnayen iqburen
uzmir d win yittawin ddeṛk
a tasekkurt n leqṣer afeg-d af kem-nẓer
ay izem anda teddiḍ
lqum yectaq rraḥa
teɣli tesɣaṛt-is
lmedheb yugar cci
awi-d taɣenǧawt-nni n ssima
ur hennaɣ ara deg uxxam
amdan mi ad s-tiniḍ yya ad d-yas
telliḍ tettmettateḍ maca imneε-ik-id ṭṭbib
Ɣeṛ-as s tilifun di leɛnaya-k
yella win yessnen mmi-s
zemreɣ ad ḍelbeɣ deg-k lemzeyya
yeḍfer lbaz s wallen
flan leǧyub-is
ur iḥemmel ara yidir ad iɛeṭṭel deg yiḍ di berra
ad xellṣeɣ
tesεa sser
ikcem-it-id nnefs mi d-yuli deg tedrujin-nni
a d kemm i d aṭṭan-iw
yenna-d tazemmurt
ddem amikru tecnuḍ
nekk d tacinwatt
aql-ak d bab n wawal
ul irḥa tazmert tekfa
s wacu i k-id-wtent
bɣiɣ ad waliɣ udem-is
ur y-ifka ara wul-iw ad k-t-id-iniɣ
ma teffɣeḍ akken ur telsiḍ ara mliḥ ad kem-iwet ubeḥri
zzin-d akk s aqaṛṛuy-iw
Ṛuḥ beddel lqecc-im
ad εeddiɣ qbel-ik
ceɣleɣ-d d wakka
akka ara k-yettraǧu lxaṭer-iw
ajdaɛ d aɛudiw amecṭuḥ
ur feṛṛceɣ ara ɣef sin
d lawan ad nruḥ akk
terra-yi tmara ad skiddbeɣ
issen ur issin
ur ssineɣ ara leṣlaḥ-iw
am akken sakdeɣ lemri
ur tessinem ara ad txedmem tasertit
iḥuss-as tom d yir taswiɛt
mačči d wid ur nuri ula d tafyirt s teqbaylit ara yesbedden takadimit
tecbeḥ ddunit
yella kra n yiwen i iheddṛen
ziɣen ɣur-wen thegga
ur irbiḥ ḥedd tamara
ixedm-it d aḥbac
iceyyeɛ-ak-n tom kra n tɣawsa
tugim ad tserrḥem
ad tiliḍ teffudeḍ kan
ur iqqerṣ ara ubeḥnuq
ufiɣ-d azrem deg ubrid yenɣa-t usemmiḍ
ur ttarra ara iman-im tessneḍ-iyi
iččuṛ-iyi tiṭ
ad tecnu di temdint n bgayet
nɛedda tilas
daffy duck d nneyya kan zgan ttkellixen-t
anwa ara tissinemt
tella tin i ixebcen takeṛṛust-iw
yella win i yukren ssaɛa-w
yettweṣṣi ɣef wuzzal ur t-yekkat
tagmat am ta yif-itt fiḥel
tesla i leɛyaḍ deg uxxam-nni
uzzleɣ ɣer berra
qudreɣ-kem rniɣ leryuy-im
qeḍɛen imrabḍen akmaz
ayagi yakk d asirem
Ԑreḍ amek ur tersruḥayeḍ ugar n lweqt deg ucetki
nettmalah kan qbel ad d-taweḍ ccetwa
"Ṭṭraḍ d talwit" d ungal ageɛmir i yura tolstoy
d kunwi ara d-yekkren zik azekka
d nekk ara yessekren ameslay-nni merra
cfan fell-as i meṛṛa
ad ssiwzilen di leɛmer-iw
qrib ssufɣen-t seg taddart
lebɣi-w icudden ɣur-m
ad teqqerṣemt seg usewwi
Ɛni ttwaṭṭfen
Ṛuḥemt beddlemt iceṭṭiḍent-nkent
srid seg sṭif
awal s wayes i ɣ-ssumnen
aql-ikent iman-nkent
iɣersiwen-nni yessexleε-iten rrεeḍ
ur nemmurḍes ur nemzil
ad cfuɣ fell-asen
ruḥeɣ gefgafi
ilaq ad taɣem tanumi
tessekneḍ i imawlan-ik
ameddaḥ yella itezzi ɣef leswaq
kkes-d abrid ur wwiɣ
yella win i yenɣa tom
d wanwa ara temlileḍ tameddit-a
ikcem uɛejmi deg uzeṭṭa
anda yedda d laɛnaya
ad mɣarent
sel-d i wayen ara k-iniɣ
ur cfin ara ɣef temẓi-nsen
beεεed ɣef annect-en
tekker takka gar-asen
zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ kra
ttaggadent tili-nsent
Ḥemmlen seksu
qqaren-d ur yettili ara ddin deg yimal
anwa ara ẓṛeɣ
qqerṣent si tguni
yella win ara ɣ-d-imagren
Ṭṭbiɛa teḍbeɛ
aqemmuc-is d tazuliɣt
iwenniten-is deg wemkan-nsen
yenɣa-yi wezzu n tayri
kifkif-iten meṛṛa medden
ilaq ad nernu ad nelḥu seṭṭac ikilumitren uqbel ad tɣerreb
d timdukal-ik merra-nsent
yeqqers-d yigenni
ad k-iqqen Ṛebbi d ayeffus
fkiɣ-awen-d ayen tebɣam
bezzaf i s-terra n sskeṛ i lqahwa-nni
ur yezmir ad t-iɣer
tufam kra n tɣawsa
bɣiɣ ad idireɣ deg uxxam akked twacult-iw
ufant akk iman-nsent
nessaram ur ittuɣal ara ad d-yeḍṛu wannect-a
Ẓran wi ten-ilan
uḥwaǧeɣ kra n yiwen i tura
tuget imezdaɣ n lhend d tihendusit i d ddin-nsen
ikcem izirdi di tqeḍɛit
usiɣ-d iḍelli
ma twalaḍ tom ttxil-k hder-as deg umkan-iw
d faruq kan i d ddwa-s
qqaṛent di tesdawit n bgayet
tom d igellil
ula d inisi ččan-t
ad sseɣtiɣ tuccḍa-ya
yiwen wass deg ussan n Ṛebbi
ruḥen gefgafi
yella kra n yiwen i ixebcen takeṛṛust-iw
aṭas i yettarun isefra ɣur-neɣ d acu imedyazen xuṣṣen
yella kra i teshiḍ
isum taktunya
akka d wid i t-id-iḥeṛṛen
tebɣam ad teffɣem azekka
tinna d tayri n temẓi kan
inwa d lemleḥ i yezreɛ
ttḥussuɣ-as ɛyiɣ
af-d amcic-nni
Ɣer ccib-is lunis yuɣal icennu ɣef tayri
ad ak-jebdeɣ leḥnak-ik
aɛrab anda yekka trab
aql-ak di lxelwa
tesεiḍ avyulu
ini-yi-d d acu ara xedmeɣ
tezgiḍ tettarguḍ rrbeḥ
ajenwi ad d-yas s aεenqiq
d kečč i ihuzzen aninay
ta d tameṭṭut
i icebḥen d isɣi
aql-iyi wejdeɣ
tefka-yas rrkel
yezga wudem-is yennuɣna
nreqq nettaẓ am usafu
d acampanzi i d aɣersiw iqerben maḍi ɣer umdan
msenɣalen iẓeṛman
ur tessin ara ad turar
rju ad k-d-smektiɣ
iswa seg imi n jeddi-s
menwala iɛelleq ssaɛa
i nekk i d-uɣeɣ adlis-a mačči i tmeṭṭut-iw
am nekk la itezzu
brant i yimeẓẓuɣen-nsent
teshel tuccfa
Ṛṛay-is d ahwawi
tamεellemt-iw teḥreṣ-itt mliḥ
isum-it am uzrem
llant tgaṭiwin deg lfur
ur ssinent ara ad ceḍḥent
mazal ur ufiɣ ara ayen i ttnadiɣ
tezla tlata n tyuẓaḍ
wehmeɣ mliḥ i k-yeẓran da
tabugaṭut-iw attan tetteddu-d
ur cukkeɣ ara llan wid i s-yeslan
ad yili akken i teḍra
tella tin i ikecmen ar texxamt
issames-iyi abux
Ḥeḍreɣ i lwerḍ mi yefsa rniɣ mi yeslaw
deg tizi wezzu arraw n bgayet ternuḍ tubiret
d aqcic n ccuq
bnan lǧameɛ s sin imelyaren
fell-am uyseɣ dayen-nni
tura ilaq ad d-nessuddes kra n yiskasiyen deg lqahwa taseklant
tessawḍemt ad teqqimemt
ay adɣaɣ ad ak-ḥkuɣ
ahat tceɣleḍ mliḥ ussan-a
sself i wudem-ik
ay imawlan εzizen
d tagi i d tagara-nni
aṭas n usisnu i nečča
anda ara rrent teqcicin-nni
Ɣiwel els lqecc-ik
awi-d kra n ccufa
yesbedd tom yiwen ara s-d-ixeddmen ad yečč
ccah i s-iga rray-is i fahem
tqefzeḍ deg usewwi
Ɣas in-as tekfa nnuba
Ḥemmleɣ adfel
a ddunit ur yi-tcuḥ teslit-iw
wwiɣ-d tafat s wudem
d tasɣunt yerzan tawennaṭ d useḥbiber ɣef lqaɛa
Ẓriɣ amnaṛ ad t-tekkeḍ
anwa ara yeddun
ilaq d nekk i tcawṛeḍ d amezwar
iḥuss-as tom i lfeṛḥ
Ɣeṣben di tikli
Ɣerreb neɣ cerreq tamurt-ik yiwet
meqqeṛ ucekkuḥ-nneɣ
tettḥibbi ččina
d tayuga n uwtul d uyaziḍ
ccrif xeddam tuɣ yeɣra akken ad d-yeffeɣ d ccix
anwa i yecfan fell-asent
ata yemxudneq yexef-iw
ass-n zdat-k ad tewwet deg-i
teɣriḍ ayen i d-uriɣ
awah ilaq-ak ad teldiḍ amiḍan-iḍen
am leḥbeq ṛebban waman
a tabrat assa i ldiɣ deg-s tedda-d tteṣwira
nezga nettru s tefransist ɣef teqbaylit
lemmer uksaneɣ ar n-steqsiɣ
anzet i yiselmaden-nwen
ay ẓriɣ weddreɣ temẓi-w
tefriḍ-tt dacu ara txedmeḍ daɣen
isres tom iḍaṛṛen-is ɣef lqaɛa
tella tin i yemmuten
ay awal iwzil tura
init-as yesleb neɣ yetlef
mazal ur fhimeɣ ayen i d-teqqareḍ
tezham meṛṛa
isexṛeb-as leryaḥ
tagrawla n surya ala idammen i d-tewwi
yella win i yukren idrimen-iw
yettwaker-as wawal-is uffir
teɛǧeb-iyi mliḥ
ulac tutlayt i d-ireḍlen awalen am teglizit yerna d tutlayt tagraɣlant
d timdukal-im merra
axxam-a d ayla-s
zgiɣ qqaṛeɣ
teɣleb tajṛadt
Ẓṛan ssusmen d wid yettṣeḍḥin
twejdemt akk
lliɣ ur εlimeɣ s uɣawas-is
tečča tisegra n wul-iw
ad d-neffeɣ akk s iberdan
ur ixeddeɛ ara akk tom
ttuɣ uṭṭun-inek
iɣza-yas lberka
ula i ak-d-iwṣel Ṛebbi
anwa i tessneḍ
tilifuni-yas di leɛnaya-k
nwan d agerruj i yellan ddaw wakal
d ilew i d aɣersiw meqqren akk deg ayen iteddun ɣef lqaɛa
bɣant ad ṛebbint ibekkan
iwacu tura sbedden ablaḍ am wa dayi
ur twulem ara ad tiliḍ din sdaxel
ad yekkes uɣunzu awal
ur yeqqerṣ ara ass-a
ruḥ sufeɣ-d tullɣa deg uɣmis
ur kkatet ara
i tiṭ tkeḥḥel-d qrib ur tt-neɛqil ara
lxiṛ d lɛali-t ma izad
ur zmireɣ ara ad wen-d-iniɣ acḥal d tikelt i d-usiɣ da
ad iqqerṣ wammas-ik
yettugar lḥebb afriwen
tebɣiḍ ad teɣreḍ tasɣunt-a
s nneyya i lliɣ ttarguɣ tayri
ddmeɣ-d tlata n yidlisen
ahat ur d-yewwi ara fell-i ad xedmeɣ akken
yelha yiṭij n mayu
ula d imeḍlaben tettren s yisem n muḥemmed
yella kra i ak-d-iceyyeɛ tom
ad ḥṣuɣ dayen assa ur kem-ẓerreɣ
qqim ad tesweḍ yid-i tafenǧalt n lqahwa
yettgalla ur iḥennet
Ẓriɣ mazal ad ɛettbeɣ
tid yetteɣraṣen
tom yella ur yeẓri amek ara isedmer
yugi ad iqmec ucifuḍ
acḥal d taglisya i isekkeṛ udabu azzayri
yiwen ur d-yerri ɣef usteqsi-w
ur tezmireḍ ad tεiceḍ akka
anwa ara tissin
yettgalla tom ɣef mary
yella kra i k-icewwlen
yella kra n ḥedd ara ɣ-d-imagren
yettban-d yeǧhed tom
itett uqjun-ik
qbel ad ten-tekcem taɛrabt deg maṣer tuɣ d taqebṭit i heddren
iḥemmel tom ad d-iṣeyyed lḥut
sliɣ i ḥedd yettɛeyyiḍ
zgiɣ ḥemmleɣ aɛummu
tiṭ tenqes ugel ikkes
uysen ad awḍen
tmenεeḍ ur k-yečči ara
ansa ara tɛeddimt
teɣriḍ isteqsiyen i d-yettuɣalen s waṭas
efk-as tizeɣwi timelli
tudert yeddan akken ddan waman
d asfuǧǧeɣ i tesfuǧǧuɣeḍ
ur y-ilaq ara ad rreɣ ayen i d-yeqqar tom d ccɣel
wehmeɣ mi tent-walaɣ wwint-d akanic
amek akken-nni
aneǧǧaṛ ur nesɛi taṛbut
akken i k-ḥemmleɣ
ičča tiṭ n lɛid
iḥemmel ad yerkeb timacinin
nezmer ad nehder ɣef ayen yeḍran ass-nni
bɣan ad ḥewwsen ar marikan
d tuqqda i d ddwa n uqraḥ n uzagur
yesseɣres yikerri rrebg-is
yugi ad iserreḥ
imi ddunit tettezzi
tzemremt ad teqqimemt da yid-i
aṭas n yisaragen i d-yettilin ussan-a
amɣar azemni yegguna taddart
yemmut tom iḍelli
d tamɣart a d-griɣ weḥd-i
ibeddel tom lqecc-is
tettbineḍ-d n luṛup kečči
d tameṭṭut-is
tuɣ llant snat n tgaṭiwin
abrid gar wallen berrik i t-ẓerreɣ
ad d-tezziḍ ɣur-i
iɣaḍ-it lḥal imi yiwet ur t-tḥemmel
dayen ur tettεawadeḍ ad teẓreḍ tom
ula deg isenfaren yezwaren yella wayen ara ibeddlen
ičča-t unazir
Ɣef uɣyul kan i d-yettagem
llan yisefra ttasen-d kan akka weḥd-sen
tessa-yi-d tqeddact
sired lemri-nni
ur nesɛi ara ijḥiḥen
tidet tessendaf
drus maḍi ara yeslen
aql-i am texnact ɣef waman
lluẓen warrac armi mmuten maca ula d tiḥdayin
tesεedda-d akk tudert-is tettwaεzel ur tefhim iman-is ur tufi win ara tt-ifehmen
tabewwaṭ-nni ɣas in-as d tilemt
Ḥwaǧeɣ lkaɣeḍ d ustilu
teẓriḍ yakan akuwala
zgan yiḍan-a snecnucen deg agnes
ur yelhi ara uɛiwed n tefyirt ɣef waṭas n wudmawen ttmullun medden
ulac lxedma n baṭel
wwet ṭṭbel i win ara iceḍḥen
Ṛemḍan zik telt yam kan i yella
wissen anwa i t-yewwten
akka ara d-nettɛawad alamma teẓram d acu-kum
imi tt-nuɣ di ẓẓher ulac  lweqt yelhan nezgel-it
anwa tesɛiḍ d aɛtiq ay ul
nnan-d sṭaxren-kem
i y-iɣaḍen d leɛmer-iw
kfan lehdur gar-aneɣ ul-iw si lǧiha-k nɣiɣ-t
ccfawa deg ulawen
aṭas n lexṣaṣ i yellan
aḥezzeb yugar leqḍeɛ
atmaten-is uɣen-as awal
si tama n yinehharen d wid isseqdacen
ameɣlal iḥseb habil iqbel-d lweɛda-s
ass wis tlata yusef inna-asen nekk ttagadeɣ illu
walaɣ belli ameɣlal iburek-iyi ɣef ddemma-k
iḥṣel lemdek di lfuci
yiwen iḥṛec wayeḍ yuki
yeqbel ad yexdem akk ayen tebɣa
am lexyal i tetteddu seg asmi s-tbeqqiḍ sslam
rran-as-d si Ḥaṛan
cfiɣ yiwwas di lexrif ṭṭfeɣ-d sin imerga
i snat di leɛqeli-iw reggint
aṭas n wid ur neddir
ur teεyiḍ ara deg annect-nni
ur tettqazameḍ ara izem s ufus
di leɛnaya-k mneɛ-iyi seg ufus n gma meẓyan
winna yemmut uɣyul deg uqerruy-is
argaz ma iffeɣ tilas ur ittwandaṛ
nɣill ad nens deg teɣsert n tmacint ɛeddan sekkṛen-tt
ixuṣṣ kan ubendayer
taqbaylit tettnadi wid yesɛan tadrimt
yelha-yam i kemmi
tella da tin i izemren ad yi-tɛawen
izem ur ileqqeḍ ara tiweḍfin
tixxeṛ i yenna-yi nniɣ-as
yufa yedder yerna asbender
ur yeɛdil ccac d uɣerrus
ur ilaq ara ad teḍru yid-s am widak yemmuten yakan di lḥebs
ula d cim gma-s ameqran n yifit isɛa dderya
aɣ awal i Ṣara xdem ayen akk ara k-d-tini
ihi win iḥemmlen tameslayt-is yaru-tt
nwan yeṭṭef-itt d tamerhunt ziɣ d nettat i yeqqimen ɣur-s
nudan zzayed ufan nnaqes
mi tewwiḍ medden ad k-awin
zdem kan ayen ara tawiḍ
ur izerreɛ ḥedd iṣuṛdiyen
agujil ur t-ttweṣṣi ɣef imeṭṭi
ih yenker laṣel-is ɣef lǧal uɛebbuḍ-is
ur εerreḍ ara ad s-tzeyydeḍ
lqedd-is am tbiqest
irra-yas-d anɛam
yerrubbi-d fell-as uqjun qrib icerreg-it
ma tecfiḍ felli ad d-teḍseḍ i lebɛid
aṭas n yimura i yettarun s teqbaylit
isemma-yas sitna yeɛni lkeṛh
ahat telluẓeḍ mliḥ tura
zzit uzemmur d iniɣman sseǧhaden
cukkeɣ ad d-yas azekka
ddiq jjiq lɛebd ur illi d uḥdiq
mi yerfed allen-is iwala ileɣman teddun-d
ur zmireɣ ad kemmleɣ tikli
yiwen umaṣri icerreg taktabt n leqran srid deg youtube
aql-i am seksu ddaw texsayt
Ɛictar d tillut n mizupuṭamya deg tmennaṭ n lɛiraq
ata ya iɛedda-d yiwen n umɣar sdat-s
meẓyan yenna-as rebḥeɣ a gma ur xuṣṣeɣ deg wacemma
awi-d kan ad jjiɣ
d amedyaz s tutlayt tafransist
ur kkiɣ ara deg umussu-nsen
win izerεen kra ad t-yemger d lxir neɣ d isennanan
akka ara t-xedmen
tom mazal-it deg uɣerbaz
tenwa ddunit d awal kan
ula deg uḥric n lebni aṭas i nuẓa ɣar sdat
yya-d ihi kcem-d ad am-d-sekneɣ anda ara tserseḍ iceṭṭiḍen-im
netta yettru nettat tettru
mmektiɣ-d ussan-nni
yesεa aṭas n yedlisen
llufan mi ara d-yini kra armi ittuweṣṣa
amek akka yenna-as ruḥ kan a mmi
d ayen akk tebɣiḍ kemm
tamurt i yerran luḍa d asawen
anda tella talwit ad tt-awḍeɣ
tḥar melmi ara tels taqendurt tamellalt
lqanun n wacu
mazal ur yefri uɣbel n tnezduɣin
tḥulfa i tseggnit tenta deg yiɣil-is
d tislatin iḥerzen
d wagi i d lqanun yeɛnan lberṣ
yefka-tt ɛemmi-s imi bab-as yemmut mi tella di dduḥ
yiwen n wass ad n-tuɣalem
amezwaru d axxam n si yidir ma yella d wayeḍ d axxam n dduktur meẓyan
ay ččiɣ deg yir amɛic
nekk ur d-cliɛeɣ deg wacemma yal yiwen i yiman-is bɣiɣ kan lehna
mmi ɣer yirgazen ifaz nniɣ-asen d ayen i as-yemla zik baba-s
tettekkes-itt-id si tebḥirt-ines
isaragen d tejmilin i yuɣalen ladɣa i wid yettwaṭṭfen ɣer leḥbus lawan-nni
lxiṛ d win n wass-a win iɛeddan iṛuḥ
teffeɣ-iyi-d teεrurt
tsenned ɣer lḥiḍ teqqim tettraǧu
yewqem
Ṭṭef amkan
Ɣaḍen-kem
yettwaḥettem fell-as ad yeqqim dinna ɣur-s
yal tama la d-tessawal
amzun akken yuggad ad nedmen neɣ ad uɣalen deg wawal
i yeɣriɣ d lefhama
seɣtit-tt
ttazzaleɣ
acu i d amihi n usexleḍ gar tutlayin ɣef tseddast d tutlayt s timmad-is ladɣa tamaziɣt
tenger ɣef tikelt
kullec ihegga aset-d ɣer tmeɣra
anida i ẓriɣ nekk
Ḥbes ɛiwed muqel
laḥuɣ
ad yaweḍ lexbar leḍyur lbaz yečča taǧaret-is
ur wwiḍeɣ ara ayen i ttmenniɣ
aṭas i neẓra deg-sen win ten-yifen rran-t yesleb
d acu i ken-iwwin ɣur-s
semmum uyefki-nni
yal yiwen amek i yettwali tilelli d leqder
d ablaḍ deg asif
wid yekkin s wudem unsib deg uqeddic
Ḥemmu iruḥ ɣer kanada
ayen i aɣ-d-ijemɛen ass-a d tasalalt n tezrawt n turagt
aql-aɣ neqqel-d ɣer umṛaḥ
ini-yi-d i wanta ara iliɣ
ma kkren-as i udrar ad t-hudden
melmi ara nuɣal ɣer bgayet
timɣureḍ txedmeḍ fell-i
aṭas n tɣawsiwin i bɣiɣ mazal ur tent-xdimeɣ ara
tura yella skype mačči am zik d tilifun kan
ama s leqraya neɣ d lxedma sfell ɣef yiɣallen-ik d yiɣallen-im
d abrid n baba-s i tuɣ
kemm yid-i nekk yid-m ad nessebɣes iman-nneɣ
zgan am yiḍudan n ufus
ttnadin ur ḥsin ɣef wacu
diri-kem
bɣiɣ-kem ugar n uḥulfu
d wayen akk yezgan yid-neɣ
ilaq ad tt-iwali lmuqeddem
tefḍeḥ-ik-id tmeslayt-ik
ur zmireɣ ara ad d-sfehmeɣ ambiddel i yeḍran yid-s

ihi yal tikelt ad teg leqdic d ameqqran

sɣed i tom

ad nruḥ ad d-nawi tislit
iεǧeb-am gma

anεam
ddreɣ-d d taqcict s tmara
tamurt i deg ara naf talwit
zzunfuḍen merra yiwen ur iḥemmel wayeḍ
aqjun d yir netta isquduṛ mebla ssebba
walimt d asawen
cabḥa tecbeḥ aṭas
d ayen n dir ixedmeɣ
sseṛɣeɣ-am-ten
xtaṛen-t
a yemma xliǧa n uẓru berka asenduder n wallen
aql-aɣ nettnaɣ
tameṭṭut di tmetti-nneɣ ḥala imeṭṭi i tettaf d arfiq-is
semmḥeɣ-ak meṛṛa ṭṭlaba-k axaṭer tettḥellileḍ deg-i
ad kent-tt-id-awint
mi tt-teččiḍ ad tt-iẓid a mmi
tenta deg-s tenfa-t
fell-am ttekleɣ ɣer ɣur-m ad sendeɣ
tegla yes-sen
awal-ik ad yili ih
ma yeḥdeṛ bab-is ulac fell-as leɣrama
yerra-yam-t-id

llan aṭas n wiyaḍ
ur twalaḍ ara belli tamurt n leqbayel tetteddu ɣer nnger
tuɣal-d tbuzeggaɣt
mačči d ayen i tettawi teslit di lqecc-is i d ṣṣeḥ
imiren ad testɛeṛfem belli d nekk i d ameɣlal

tḥemmlemt iqjan
ur nerbiḥ kra
tis snat ur ttrebbi mmi-s n medden ass-a azekka ad d-yezzi fell-ak
kra n yemdanen
neɣ ad am-gezmeɣ aman
imẓiyeɣ
amek akka ihi i tturaren warrac dderya iqersen 
tin i y-ibɣan ur tt-bɣiɣ tin bɣiɣ tugi-yi
xdem ayen i ak-d-nniɣ nekki
sliɣ-d i kra n lḥaǧa
Ɣulleɣ ula d nekkinni
Ԑerḍeɣ ad aruɣ s ufus azelmaḍ
isbedd tigejda n zzit
ulint ssumat
Ẓečč lmektub teqqimeḍ
ur neẓri ara d acu-yaɣ
ad tafeḍ d kra n yiwen i t-yeǧǧan daki
tetteɣraṣemt s shala
mary tɛawen tom
tεelmeḍ anta tizlit i bɣiɣ ad d-cnuɣ
ur iheddeṛ ara akk ɣef tsertit
Ẓriɣ leqṛaya teɣṛam
ad d-icehhed fell-aɣ
Ɣas yella usemmiḍ ɣas akken tɛeṭṭleḍ
louis de funès d asegbar n tkumidit
d argaz d uzgen
aseḍsu itekkes acuffu
ad nidir ussan-nneɣ
ulac wi d-ikkren issen
bran i yimeẓẓuɣen-nsen
tettaru-yi-d tibratin yal ass
d alɣem aɛeẓẓug
yeɛreḍ virgile ad yi-t-id-yini
d azger bu yiwen yicc
ul iḍɛef tasa tejreḥ
d ttebcira l-lxiṛ
yecfa-d i ṭṭrad iɛeddan
s tayri-s i mi dayen ḥfiɣ
Ḥemmlen ad ḥewsen s ukanic-nsen
berka asmuhbel
yessirid tuɣmas-is yal ass
iḍfi tawacult-is
wissen acimi icawiyen s taɛrabt kan i ttarun
iwwi-k wasif d asawen
rjut ad nẓer amek ara tbeddel teswiεt
yeswa aman n wasif
melmi tzewǧeḍ
si laman i d-ikka lxuf
tasa tettqiṛṛi
Ɣlayit tkeṛṛusin
ad n-smmeḥ i tin i d aɣ-yuɣen
ruḥeɣ xedmeɣ kra n waddal
ass-agi ad am-iniɣ
yella walebɛaḍ i yukren ssaɛa-w
ass-a ɣas tuḍen aqeṛṛu-s tezmer i tikli
yesεa sser
werǧin i thennaḍ deg tudert-im
timellalin-nni-inu ur bɣiɣ ara ad wwent mliḥ mliḥ
iṭḥa iwwi-d ayen i s-nniɣ
yeḥma lḥal ass-a
ad msenḍaḥent d yirgazen-nsent
hitler yenɣa ugar n setta imelyan n wudayen
anda ara naf tin yettcabin ar tinna
ansa i trewlem
uḥwaǧeɣ-kem ad txedmeḍ yiwet n tɣawsa
rwel ula d kemm fell-i
ur ttjellibeɣ am lleft
Ɛeggu yekcem tannumi-w
iḥuss-as tom i laẓ
deg leqran yenna-d itran mmugen ad trejmeḍ yes-sen ccwaṭen
tugdut-nsen d aɣilif
tella tin ara d-yekkren azekka zik
akken ul-iw ad yethenni
ur teẓriḍ ara maḍi anwa yuran adlis-a
aɣet awal i yiselmaden-nwen
tenna-yas belli yemmut baba-s
urant-iyi-d tabrat
ar wanda ara ffɣent
Ɣer ɣur-i d aneblal i telliḍ
ibeddel tom axeddim
ass mi la katen nenwa ɣef tdukli
uḥwaǧeɣ win ara yi-iɛawnen i wakken ad t-xedmeɣ
tmennam-d ad tḥewwsemt ar legniz
Ḥebsemt ur yi-d-ttnalemt ara
tteɣraṣ ma tebɣiḍ
ur zmireɣ ad k-zzmeɣ
Ɣṛant di tesdawit n bgayet
tiwwura n wexxam akk sekkṛent
Ɣṛiɣ di tmura n beṛṛa
anta i d-yennan aya
iṛǧen wul-is am ukurṣi
tettbineḍ-d tufiḍ iman-ik
ur yenfiɛ azuḥ usegzawal-ayi
am akken syinna
terɣa tkatidralt n notre-dame de paris
yella kra n yiwen i ikecmen ar texxamt
yella ḥedd i yellan yakan dayi
Ẓriɣ ad tt-fehmen
a bgayet a tamurt-iw a tin εzizen ɣef ul-iw
tom ur iḥemmel ara mary
wwiɣ-d ayen tebɣiḍ
yettwaqenneɛ tom s yiman-is
iceffu mliḥ
nesqerdec kra ɣef ugur-nni
tberrum i yimeẓẓuɣen-nwen
rrus legliz d marikan ɣelben lalman
uriɣ-asen tibratin
yufa tiɣirdemt ddaw ublaḍ
Ɛerran-t iqeṭṭaɛen deg tizi-waffas
Ẓer d acu i d nnefs d aḍu
ansa i d-kkan warrac-nni
acuɣer ur yi-d-tessawleḍ ara iḍelli deg yiḍ
mseṭṭalen timira
acḥal n tefyar i skelsen
yerẓa awal-nsen
muḥemmed yekka tleṭṭac iseggasen d tiɣri s wamek ddan mya n medden yid-s
bɣan d nekni ara iruḥen
snat n leqhawi di leɛnaya-k
ur nwiɣ ara yebɣa ad yečč
iṛkez akwerzi n leḥrir
yewwi-kent-id cennegnagi
herrsen-as-d tikedt ad tt-isew
drus akya i yeslan
telha ddunit
tɛawen-it-id
xaṭi winna d amelsi ur yenɣi yiwen
isgerwiḥ ur d-issalay
d leɛmum n tizi n waḍu
tuyes ad taweḍ
senned asellum-nni ɣer lḥiḍ
akken ad d-nerret i ccetla azal
amek armi i d-imenna akanic
tzemreḍ ad yi-tεwawneḍ ciṭuḥ
tebɣiḍ ad tissineḍ asewwi
ur tessinem ara tasertit
aya d ayen i d-isbeyyinen belli d amelsi i yella
tetteɣraṣem si ɛeggu
wissen ma mazal llan wid yettɛelliqen ssaɛa
lekdeb yuɣal d imsewweq
ansa i yeffeɣ
ad iɛeddi ad isker ayen ara ččen warrac
anda ara rren warrac-nni
jebbden iman-nsen
yugi ad t-yettu
iḥuss yufa iman-is tom
Ɣas akken εzizeḍ i tmuɣli-w
yessexṣar di ṣṣifa-w
Ẓẓiɣ leǧnan d imselles lxux d ifires
yerra-d idrimen yerna fkan-as-d tameṭṭut
neḥwaǧ-ik a nnbi s wass-a
yenɣa tom kra n yiwet
zemreɣ ad d-meslayeɣ ɣef kra n tɣawsa
ah ya limer iyi-theṛṛbem
bɣiɣ ccṛab azeggaɣ ma ulac aɣilif
iwacu ur nettruḥ ara lwaḥi
yella kra n yiwen i ak-d-isawlen
sliɣ i kra n yiwet tettɛeyyiḍ
ulac ula d aṭaksi dɣa wteɣ-tt ɣef uḍar armi d axxam
nedhet-as ad iɣiwel
yecceg deg teksart-nni
d anwa i yessnen axiṛ-as
yella win i yukren ṭṭezḍam-iw
i taggara ad kem-ẓreɣ
dacu i d-tenniḍ tikkelt-nni tamezwarut
sliɣ i kra n yiwen yettɛeyyiḍ
cfant fell-as i meṛṛa
d lawan ma ad d-friwseḍ
igzem afurk iɣef iqqim
yewwet-it s tiṭ
tetteddu ɣer uɣerbaz
mdel allen-ik
d kunwi merra i d ssebba
tberruḍ i yimeẓẓuɣen-ik
d ayen iṣeḥḥan swaswa
bɣiɣ ad tt-sudneɣ di tqemmuct-is
aql-ikem iman-im
yettṛebbi akanic
ma ḥezneɣ ad n-cetkiɣ i kemm
kra n wass ad d-aɣeɣ tamacint-nni i d-ixeddmen acamar n jeddi
ur ttḥibbiɣ ara lqahwa
yuɣal-ak d azrem s iri
ittnadi iẓuran n tagut
ur tessinemt ara ad txedmemt tasertit
iṭṭef-it di tegnit n ṛṛcem
iles d aɣezfan afus d awezlan
neggul s limin akken ad d-nerr ttaṛ
teqqim ɣef yisennanen
allen-iw di tzulixt
anwa ar ad tgezmeḍ deg iḍudan-ik
ttu-yi qebleɣ
yiwen n waɛṛab yeɛmeṛ ssuq
itellem di lehduṛ irennu
win ittnadin lhemm ad t-yaf
seg igenni ad tɣab tafat-im
izdeɣ deg uneẓruf n faran
iṛtaḥ wi ittṛebbin tullas
ur bɣiɣ ad sleɣ i tsebbiwin-ik
i ma llan dinna ɛecṛa
d ikeddaben ur d ineɣmasen
ula dayen i d-ttmektiɣ
dayen ur ttkemmileɣ ara yid-k tikli
isḥaq iǧǧa yeɛqub ad iṛuḥ
neqqim ɣef yisennanen
ur ssiɣrit ar d iban
iḥṛec tiḥeṛci yisseḥṛacen iɣwyal
seggem tiɛdilin-nni n walim a taɛzizt
akken kan i d-ṭṭaxreɣ tecɛel tmes deffir-i
ad iru win yellan d aṛumi
yesṭenṭen-itt ubeḥri
iga tagant
ilaq ad tessneḍ ad tessewweḍ
yella kra i d-yeḍran d amnufel
akka is-yenna baba-s i mmi-s
nnan-as i wuccen ax ad tekseḍ ulli yettru
Ṭṭef imi-k
ad ṛwun tiḥlawatin
teɣleq-d fell-akent
mjellaben ar wayen iɛeddan
ilul-d yuɣ abeqqa
ttkellixen-aɣ wid-ak nesɣeṛ
d ayen i y-isserhaben
ur illi di jillul wala di millul
wi k-iweṣren ad tgeḍ akken
acbali irreẓ zzit tɛelleq
ur tettaraḍ ara leqḍa
ass kamel ur d-ffiɣeɣ
ad iktil lebḥeṛ s uɣenja
yexdem laksida s uvilu
ur mmuten ara
Ɛada tesɛa-d yabal
iṭṭes di tṛakna yina-as ccetwa teḥlem
amdan ilhan ittarra awal aẓidan
amrar n ṛṛmel bdu-t-id ad t-nkemmel
ikad-d tuyseḍ acemma
ifka-yak Ṛebbi asagem xas agem
tibṣelt ma tẓiḍ ad tt-tɣeẓẓeḍ
dderrya tettcettit neɣ tettxewwil
nneqḍaɛent teɣratin deg taddart-nneɣ
mazal-tt ad timɣur ad tṛebbi amzur
imi tettwaggez tlelli amirew yettuɣal d lwaǧeb
ttnadin kan tibdar "iɛǧeb-iyi"
yiwen iwwi-tt-id wayeḍ ikemmel-as
wi isɛan izimer iga-s iziker
tafamilt lɛali ittwaɣumm nnif-is
ixelq-it ɣef ṣṣifa n yillu
awerǧeǧǧi icennu deg tegrurt nekni seddaw-as
tamdint-is isem-is faɛu
iḍyiq ijjiq a yaɛeggal ur neḥdiq
nnan-as i uclim yya ar tessirt
d acu teččamt daɣen
nḍuɛ Ṛebbi nesbeṛ
tettak tiɣilt i talat
iwḥel di tballaɣt
leḥḥun iɣiṛ ɣef yiɣiṛ
yurew-d tamellalt
akken i k-iwwet ara k-id-ifakk
ad nessiweḍ aneqqad ar ṣṣeḥ
rnu zmummeg
kifkif a win ixanen a win yukren
am win ittṛebbin iḍan
ur d-ttneqlab ɣer deffir ur ḥebbes deg uzaɣar
ih d nekk i sen-yuran asinaryu
tutlayt-nneɣ mazal tezmer ad d-teglem kra yellan deg tudert
rebḥeɣ-d kra
ccib nnaṛ ittewqim ssem di taddart
ad tili d lεali-tt ɣer urgaz-is
ur keččem ara gar uɣerbal d tbaqit
iwqem tameɣṛa s ufus
ahat telluẓemt mliḥ tura
afrux yisselqaḍ baba-s
mazal aẓar yuɣen di lǧedra yeqquṛen
di lweqt-nni llan leɣwal di ddunit
unuɣen urmiden mačči i imecṭaḥ kan ay mmugen
i tḥeṛceḍ ay iblis tečča k-tmes
dɣa isemma-yas isṛayil
qqim dayi ad k-d-awiɣ aman
ffeɣ beṛṛa timɣureḍ
akken i s-tṛuḥeḍ i Ṛebbi ad ak-iṛuḥ
awal am tamment lhedṛa am tummeṭ
imiren lbabuṛ ittifrir ɣef waman
ma yella d arraz raccid Ɛallic yuɣal aseggas-agi i umyaru sidali lahdir s wungal-is tirga n wul
iruḥ ad d-yawi tunt-is yufa tekfa lewziεa
yeɛqub iburek ferɛun
yenna-yaɣ-d tom ad k-id-naf da
issared udem-is s useɣwen
wagi d acqirrew ɣef wid yakk i as-iqqaren d akken taqbaylit ur tezmir ara i tussna
iheddeṛ s yiles ur as-nelli deg ul
nekk ɣur-i mačči d lḥeqq
iwacu ttferriqen nnesxat n leqran deg sbiṭarat
isemma i waman yennejmaɛen lebḥuṛ
iruḥ lḥal tura akka tili aql-iyi gneɣ
tembawel texbizt-is sya
nnan-as wexxeṛ syenna
laban inna-yas d acu ara k-fkeɣ
ttxil-k
tegzem-as as awal mi yella yettmeslay
yesεa tlata n yisetma-s sennig-s
ansi d tzedmeḍ ay d-squccḍeɣ
imir-nni ad-tṛuḥ
win i y-iḥemmlen iḥemmel daɣen aqjun-iw
irra-d cci-nni meṛṛa
i tt-id-yewwin d at nnif ɣer taddart-nneɣ
illa yiwen udlis i d-iffɣen yakan ɣef tnefsit i d-issuffeɣ muṛad tuwwak
lxiṛ seg urbib ulac
d yusef ara k-imedlen allen
d wigi meṛṛa i d arraw n qatura
ad textiṛ aqcic yeɣran
ikker umulab i tlafsa
avyulunsal meqqer zur ṣṣut-is
ad myeẓḍaḥen am yiqecḍan
iles-is d uḥdiq ul is d uḥriq
ala win immuten i yeṛtaḥen
uriɣ-as tabrat n sslam tɛedda tcerreg-itt
zik awal sin kan ad yebru yiwen i tmeṭṭut
issebdad ssellum i yeɛdawen
ilaq ad t-id-afeɣ
ad ččeɣ alamma ṛwiɣ
lehduṛ sɛan tilisa
acḥal i k-d-isuḥen
ikna ddaw n uzaglu iqbel ad yuɣal d akli
ur kent-terri ara tmara ad teqqimemt deg sbiṭar
fkan-aɣ-d awal-nsen
Ɣef wayagi i s-isemma galɛid
iɣyal temkerraɛen buygarasen
iggul s wayen ar ad t-yerren d aẓru
laẓ yuɣ-d tamurt meṛṛa
iḥuǧǧ di tbaḍnit
agiṭar tebɣiḍ cnu yess ccna n blues neɣ ceɛbi
mačči nneɣ kečč
yella win i ikecmen ar texxamt
ayen akka i txedmeḍ deg-i ur ilaq ara
iḍulan ar teṛbut imawlan ar tebburt
yuɣ-it fell-asen yiwen n umaṣri yettusemman futifaṛ yellan d aneɣlaf n ferɛun d ameqran n lɛeskeṛ-is
yuker aḍaṛ
yella ḥedd i d-ittlaɛin
Ẓgeɣ-d ass-a taɣaṭ-nneɣ
neḥwaǧ tiseddaryin s lεeǧlan
bɣan ad sɛun aṭas n yedrimen
ulayɣer ma tezzmeḍ iman-ik ɣef annect-en
isemma-asen s yismawen-nni i sen-ifka baba-s
xedmet ayen akka ara wen-d-iniɣ ad tidirem
Ḥulfaɣ wwiɣ ddnub d ameqqran
iḍerref iman-is fell-asen dɣa yettru
ur ḥemmlen ara aɣerbaz s waṭas
ccwal ifṛeq-it Ṛebbi s lkaṛ
ccib lmeḥṛuq
acḥal ɣur-m n yisetma-m
iles aɣezfan ɣeẓẓent-tt tuɣmas
beethoven yella d aɛeẓẓug maca yif akk imeẓẓawanen
leḥmala n tyaziḍt ur nesɛi tibbucin
ur iksan ḥedd lewqama
ass-a yessusem
abṛaham issufeɣ ṛṛuḥ
ad neldi asebter d ajdid
ansa i ffɣen
neεreḍ-itent merra-nsent
kkes lukan acu i d-iqqimen
zzux bab-is d lxali
mmuteɣ s ɛeyyu
ussan akk lhan yiwen n wass dir-it
sawel-as di leɛnaya-m
atan ɛeryan jeryan
ixef-ik deg uwlew
iddem iɣid irna gma-s
ay ass mi la ttnadiɣ i ṭṭlam
waqil azekka ara d-yas
aṭret-d syin
la leqqḍeɣ ussan-iw am itbir
a taḥzamt zmeḍ-iyi agus
llant akka llant ugar
ur yi-tuɣ ara d tayemmat yelhan
Ḥemmleɣ ad ččeɣ tiɛesbanin
ilaq ad tissineḍ ad tessewweḍ
yeẓaǧǧaw deg imeṭṭawen
Ẓẓay mačči d afessas
ul ad yergagi mačči seg semmiḍ
ur ittxalaf ara mejjir aẓaṛ
tnudaḍ-iyi-d ufiɣ-kem
ass-a kullec d idrimen
iles ur yesɛi ara iɣes akken i s-yehwa ad icali
yella walebɛaḍ i d-ittmuqqulen deg-k
iɣḍel-d caɛban ɣef Ṛemḍan
Ɛellqen isegras yeɣyal
ad t-terẓem ma ur tḥudrem ara
eḍs-as i ddunit ad ak-d-teḍs
kecmeɣ deg texxamt rriɣ-d tawwurt
kra illa kra irna
ad t-taɣeḍ d asḍaḍ ad t-tafeḍ d ablaḍ
ur teččim acemma
ay atma ṣubbeɣ d wasif ufiɣ lferk ijeḥmam
Ḥam baba-s n kanɛan iwala baba-s ɛeryan
abṛaham izdeɣ di bir cibaɛ
ur d-tettili ara tmenɣiwt di zzayer
lmuluk n yillu ṛuḥen-d ɣur-s
dder-d aqjun ddem-d aɛekkaz
ddu yid-i ili-k d win yeṣfan
a mkul mi ara d-yeɣli ṭṭlam
hder akken tebɣiḍ
zik qqaren taglimt n telɣaɣayt d tamerbuḥt
inɣed-as lemleḥ ɣef uqeṛṛu
wagi d afeqluj kan
ur yelli win iḍelmen
win ur nesɛi tagmat meḥquṛ
kečč d amdakel-iw
si lmut akin d asawen
ur tettuḍ kra
ikker d ubasin-is
tagi d tiselbi
rrxa d bu laɛyuba yimsewwqen
la tettneqlab am tata
ulac akk tameṭṭut yuklalen ad truḍ fell-as
rran-as ur nezmir ara
wiyaḍ ad kecmen ɣer lḥebs
amek armi uɣalen leqbayel ttarun s taɛrabt deg facebook
d isef gar yiccer d uksum
isɛa lqedd yerna ṣṣifa
meḥsub ilaq ad teqqimeḍ
iger aman n tasa aṛqaqen
helkeɣ lehlak d imexfi wehmen ṭṭebba ɛewqen
idda urgaz-nni s axxam
mi wwḍen meyya uxemsin n wussan aman neɣsen
aɣerbal ajdid iḥwaǧ aɛelleq
xedmen axeddim yelha
teqqareḍ-d tuɣ ur tefhimeḍ ara
tom yettu uṭṭun n tilifun n mary
ur txeddmeḍ ayagi
tura ɣas imeɣriyen xuṣṣen tella tsekla
ay asmi rran uccen d imḍebber
mitin n wulli d ɛecrin n wakraren i s-yefka d tuččit
mi d-iwweḍ yisɣi tban tefsut
qeṛṛiḥ diddi
mi ara ttnaɣen sin ttḥuddu-ten
ad tesεuḍ lweqt azekka
tamdint ideg izdeɣ isem-is dinaba
arraw n gumir ackanaz rifat akked tugarma
winna yettseyyiḍ deg aman illuɣen
Ɣzen lbir-nniḍen nnuɣen daɣen fell-as
isemma i lbir-nni Ɛisiq yƐni amennuɣ
mi sliɣ i uṭaksi yuɣwas ḥṣiɣ yewweḍ-d wass
ccah di ṛṛay-nneɣ
iɣimi d warrac lfayda ulac
la iḥebbek uglan tuɣmas
d acu tuɣ yellan deg teɣlaft-nni
ad ruḥeɣ anda i yi-d-nnan ruḥ
d Ɛisu mmi-k amenzu
d tukksa n unẓaḍ seg uqeṛṛu
itweḥḥec lfil rnut-as-d gma-s
ma teṣṣdeḍ ṣṣed kan ɣef imawlan-ik
nella nettraju-kem
macahu win d-innan ahu ad ilhu
yenfeε ugeffur-nni
ad ak-ifk Ṛebbi taferrast
iṭij-iw iṛmel-it usigna
nniɣ-as i tom ayen iss i εelmeɣ
d illu n baba-k ara k-yilin d amɛiwen
ger tidet d lekdeb rebɛa iḍudan
la ileḥḥu tikli n lmegtin
imiyeimma temmut awer teqqim tmeṭṭut
ur isɛi aqeṛṛu wala iḍaṛṛen
awer setḥint deg-k lmalaykat
seg zik leqbayel kerhen ad arun s taɛrabt
Ԑerḍeɣ ad geɣ akken yiwet n tikelt
acuɣeṛ i d-luleɣ acuɣeṛ i ddreɣ acuɣeṛ ara mteɣ
ay aḍaṛ jbu a tiṭ cfu
ulac asif ur nesɛi tiqenṭeṛt
ssufeɣ-d aslem seg waman
ur imlik ḥedd ṛṛay-is
win ifut wawal yini-as sliɣ
d acu-t umenni-k
yedem-d abanju iḍeqqer agaṛṛu-nni yestexber
lxir i d-tefka tmurt-ik
yejreḥ deg uqerru
ssufɣen-d dina seg uxxam n caxim dɣa ṛuḥen
laxert ur teḥwaǧ ara aqezzeb
iḥṣel di tin ur ixdim
yeɛqub iṭṭeṣ yid-s
lfahem ifhem aɣyul iwhem
ileǧǧem iman-is s lefɛayel-is
kuc iǧǧa-d daɣen nimrud
yelli-s n lqebṭan ravès yeṣɛeb ccɣel-is teggul fell-i ur zwiǧeɣ
imi i ak-yehwa tḍbbreḍ fell-i
ma d gma-s isem-is yuqtan
yal yiwen ixelleṣ i yiman-is
yusef irra-yas aql-i
di leɛnaya-m xdem kra
ayen i tesɛiḍ eǧǧ-it i yiman-ik
ttif ussan iɛeddan wala wid d-immalen
xas yeččuṛ wul ur ufiɣ
ur nnumeɣ ara tuffɣa deg iḍ
Ṭṭejṛa n lmesk mačči d lḥesk
ldi awemmus-nni
ur wwiḍeɣ la igenni la lqaɛa
tarwiḥt deg inijel i teṭṭef
ilaq afus n tallelt ilaq ad yili usiẓreg ugar n waya
xtiṛet a-t-a uqabub a-t-a llqeḍ
ssneɣ udem-ik
bɣiɣ ad yili win ara yi-iɛawnen i wakken ad xedmeɣ aya
acuɣer i yi-txedɛeḍ
tebɣamt ad tissinemt asewwi
seg usennan ar tmellalt
ur itettu ara taẓallit maca itettu ur yettarra ṭṭlaba
rran-as terriḍ-aɣ-d ṛṛuḥ
ala ɣef telt-yyam i yecfa lewnis deg leɛmer-is
sexsi tafat-nni
thegga-d tiddukla tadelsant tiregwa n tmurt n kanada timsizzelt n tullisin d wungal ifazen s tutlayt n teqbaylit
jeddi ilul-d setti mazal
la ismezgir deg wawal
taẓuri tḍul tudert wezzilet
fkiɣ iḍudan i tmes
bab n ddreɛ itett nnfeɛ
bɣiɣ ad s-fkeɣ tabizutt
kra mḥemmalen mserwin
yella walebɛaḍ i ak-d-iluɛan
tseččeḍ-iyi lemṛaṛ
tura d lawan n yiḍes
axxam n tɛerɛarit tikli taɛengarit
yettriḥ-d amack-it
akken bɣun sεan medden cci beɣɣun dima ad d-rnun
yekkaw yiẓri-s seg imeṭṭawen
iberriqen teffɣen-d deg lexrif mi teṣḥa lehwa
Ɛisu yerra-yas-d anɛam
Ḥemmleɣ tiḥdayin imi skiddibent
argaz tameṭṭut taqbaylit tufrar
tedda yid-sen ar yiger
win illan d uḥdiq inser
xuṣṣen akk iberdan luḍa
tugi ad t-tettu
aql-ik iman-ik
iɛebba i uselqeb d usmejger
yuɣ taḥellabt uqbel tafunast
inna-yasen amek yettili
seg-k berka-yi
bu cceṛ am uɣerbal imceṛceṛ
ad isebbel umcic tacriḥt
bḍu tasufeɣt-nni ma tebɣiḍ
ad ffɣeɣ akked yemma akken ad nelḥu ciṭ deg berra
mačči d nekk i iḍeggren akk taduli ɣef lqaɛa
nekni nxeddem ɣef wayen yakk icuɣben ɣer umsider
am wakken daɣen i d-nesuzur yis-s ayen nxeddem
yezdeɣ deg taddart n at zεim yetabaεen ɣer tɣiwant n mεatqa
Ḥrez deg wul-ik ayen akka i k-d-umṛeɣ ass-agi
aql-i am tɛelǧet gar yifassen n watmaten-iw
deg ubrid mi teddun mi d uwḍen ɣer wasif-nni
qqureɣ kan deg umkan-iw ula d nnefs-iw sneqḍaɛeɣ-t
Ččar ul-im d rebbi
ur ɣileɣ ara ɣezzifet akk akka
teffeɣ-asent-d teεrurt
ad iyi-tawi ɣer tlemmast n ubrid
nesɛa diɣ asenfar n usiweḍ s ttawil n tilifirik akka tura nessaweḍ ad nfak aḥric amenzu n usenfar-agi
yiwet n tnezzayt tekker zik
zik yebɣa yiwen ad yezweǧ ad yaɣ yell-is n ufellaḥ
lmektub ur iksan ḥedd ad t-id-ikkes
awi-d ihi isem-im
tikwal yessagad-iten
ma tekkseḍ-as-t deg wacu ara yeṭṭeṣ
syin ad nefru taluft akken i d-tewwi
amek yettaẓ usenfar n common voice
nudan-as-d anwa ara s-d-ifken tigẓelt
nniya ulac rrbaḥ ulac
ma d nekk ad sseɣreɣ ul n imaṣriyen ad d-rnun deffir-nwen
anwa i yuran asefru-nni n uyennat
d kemm i d sebba
ur ttnuzun ara akken i ttnuzun waklan
ɛinani
melmi ara ifakk fell-i lḥif n nasima
ur asent-tcuḥḥ ara ddunit
taweṭṭuft-nni dɣa tekna ɣer uxemmuj-is i teččur d tamečča
musa yeffeɣ-d sɣur ferɛun iɛenna ɣer umeɣlal
la ḥekkuɣ i gma taluft yeqqar acḥal i tesɛiḍ
mi d-tefrari tafat nettat ad tt-yaɣ lḥal deg tebḥirt
imeslayen-iw s yidammen-ik uriɣ-ten
ur telles kra alamma tenniḍ-d
Ḥemmleɣ ad sleɣ i taɣect n tmecṭuḥt-nni i yesseklasen
inwa ddunit d awal kan
yiwen n wass ad d-uɣaleɣ
lɛebd yewwet laẓ s aqeṛṛu ur t-itettu
tateffaḥt-a d tasemmamt
Ṛuḥen kṛaḍ n yimestulen d iseflan-is
Ḥdac qleb saku
imɣureɣ-d am tgujilt
swiɣ lqaɛa-m s yimeṭṭawen n leǧruḥ-iw
ilemsiren i yeḥfan
d acu n lmeḥna i d-yeɣlin fell-ak
d lebɣi
ahat itett-d imensi si berra
ad d-ṭṭfen abrid-nsen ɣer yirebbi n tmurt
aṭas i yesεedda di sbiṭar
ur nettxemmim ara ɣef wayen ara d-nini mi ara d-nenṭeq
yekker herwel di ṛṛeḥbat yewwet ṭṭbel yerna nnaqus
ma yella d imawlan-im ad ceyyɛeɣ ɣur-sen ad d-asen
tamurt attan tseggem agdud yefreḥ
iban-iyi-d tzemreḍ ad taruḍ ugar
rriɣ i teccuyt dhiɣ deg usekles armi terɣa
imir-nni ad d-uɣaleɣ
maca asuɣu yugten d wi tuddsiwin senzent inelmaden akked tuddsiwin senzent tasdawit
tafekka-s tettnaɛwaɣ am wakken ur tesɛi ara iɣsan
ad ikemmel abrid-is s tsusmi
wi inudan kra ad t-yaweḍ
tenṭeq-d seg teɛrict
mazal ur tt-yeṛwi ara s tmuɣli
zedɣeɣ deg twilayt n bgayet
tilmeẓyin d yilmeẓyen tqesiren tkeɛkiɛen taḍṣan
lmeɛna-s ad yuɣal d agensay
Ɛni tebɣiḍ ad yi-tenɣeḍ akken i tenɣiḍ amaṣri-nni
tameṭṭut taqbaylit tesɛa tabɣest s wayes ara tqabel akk tudert-is
aseggas-iw amezwaru deg tesdawit n bgayet iɛedda deg unemḍer d unadi d udegger
tettxemmim amek ara tandi tifxet ara ten-id-yeṭṭfen
uγalen-d s temγawla akken i d-wwḍen γer rrif n lebḥeṛ uccen ijelleb yerwel
ad ibarek di leεmeṛ-ik
akka tura ad teẓreḍ tid i kem-yifen tid yesɛan kra ara yebɣu wul deg dunnit
icebbuben-is d imezran iwraɣen
azen-d ṣwab i cnawi
zik tehlek turet tura d tasa
kunwi d iḍulan-nneɣ ay at tmaq ay at ukerzi
axxam ara tkecmeḍ am yiṭij n ṣṣbeḥ
ad ḥekkmen fell-as s lmut
a tteffaḥ aɛedni
ass-a d tameɣra n lbizan
tezger mi wḍen ɣer baba-s teḥka-as acu yeḍran
ma yufa-t yakan neɣ ma yestufa ad t-inadi
ayen i k-yexḍan yexḍa-k
acimi i truḥemt ɣur-s
tuɣal tettxemmim ɣef uzekka n warraw-is ara d-yekkren d igujilen
lferḥ-inu a medden
i teḍra yid-i a yemma
tufamt-t-id iṣeḥḥa
buṭrus inna-as d ibeṛṛaniyen
aha ssefhem-iyi-d kullci
ur truḥ ara armi i tt-tweṣṣa ɣef kullec
iɣi-inu ad yendu yefra
Ɛasset ihi
dɣa ttihin fell-as
a memmi ḥader iman-ik
d wigi meṛṛa i yuɣalen d tnac n leɛṛac n isṛayil
lǧarḥ-nneɣ yugi ad yaɣ iqcer
ad as-ternu deg leɛḍam d wafud akked ṣṣeḥḥa
s axxam n yizem ad t-yissin
a tabalizt n umɣar
d kečč i d lwel-iw
tesbeɛdeḍ lebla fell-as
a taleqqamt n uḥemmam
sudaba ɣas akken tḥemmel aṭas tameddakelt-is maca tusem cwiṭ
aṭas i teksa taɣaṭ tura teqqen takrabaṭ
ula d iẓerman ttnaɣen di tɛebbuḍt
aha d acu nenna aggur n lɛid ha-t-aya
fehm-itt s wi illan d aḥrur
fkan tasekkurt i lbaz n tliwa
leḥmala-nsen werǧin tenqis
taxsayt-iw gar yimsenda
awit-iyi-t-id ɣer dagi
fren abrid i tebɣiḍ
tura nekk yid-m meqqrit i sin
ad qqnen taywalt d snat n tuddsiwin
aql-aɣ nusa-d di ṣṣḍeḥ
d aɣbub ay uɣeɣ
qqaren lfatiḥa
d mmi-s n wanwa
anisi ara tt-id-nawi
tenna tyaẓiḍt i yefrax-is jebdet ɣenbu yemma-twen ur tesεi bubbu
ay mennaɣ ur d iyi-d-yettṣaḥ
siwa i kečč a mmi n tasa
xemsa n lxeznat n waman
sers-d lḥenni rnu-d lmetred
ittberriḥ deg uneẓruf n yahuda
huru huru
qqaren ṭsen waman d yisɣaṛen
ama d argaz ama d tameṭṭut ass-a tawwurt teldi
aɛdaw ur igi imendi
ur ttruḥuɣ ara ssya ɣas ulamma ad sɛeddiɣ iḍ dagi alamma d ṣṣbeḥ
yeldi leqjar yeddem-as-d acifun yerka
ay iwiziwen
efk afud i wid i t-yuklalen
a tasenduqt n lgaṭu argaz-im d abugaṭu
ay agellid ay aḥnin
a Ṛebbi wenneɛ-asen ussan
yelli d ccac yeclawan
dɣa mmuɣebnen mliḥ
a yemma ḥenna
aql-aɣ nusa-d di zzan
ur fkiɣ yelli
cteddu cteddu lemni
lameɛna ur iṛuḥ ara
s axxam n sɛid at Ɛemran
ansi ara t-id-nawi
i lehna n twacult-nwen
a tissas n yizem tiɣratin fell-am a lal n yebzimen
ad as-txedmeḍ akka s ufus-ik ad tt-tjebdeḍ ciṭuḥ
ay isli ay amekyus
kraḍ n cciεat n teẓruft i nadir naɛman
nḥemmel tudert s yijeǧǧigen d waman ḥlawen
ibn Ɛarabi ussnan n taderfgama n wandalus
yessken-aɣ-d kra n ttṣawer
tijebbadin ad jebdent aẓeṭṭa akken ad yeṭṭef iman-is
teǧǧa-tent ṣṣeḥḥa
ntteddu s axxam yiwet n tmeddit
tamegra d taggara n ddunit
aḥemmel war tilisa
Γer taggara n tefsut tekkaw tegnawt teḥma tmurt
imukan mačči aṭas i yellan akka i d-yenna ugraw adeblan
tebɣiḍ ad d-tmeslayeḍ ala fiḥel ulac d acu ara d-iniɣ
tizewɣin tinerniwin
teṭṭerḍeq temdakelt n huda d taḍsa
Ɣer yiwet n ṭṭabla i qqiment
yekkes-as aččadur-is s lemɣawla
ad issinen tiktiwin timaynutin ara d-yernun ɣer wayen i lemmden
nekk dayen qebleɣ ayen akka d-yeḍran yid-i
di tecmatin kan i ẓewrent
abrid akken yebɣu yiɣzif mkul wa ileḥḥu akken i s-yehwa
tamettant n Ɛebdelḥafiḍ idres
yenna-yasen ujiniral ulac tasurift uɛeddi
anwa argaz ara yebɣun tabergazt am nekkini
sersemt-d lbaraka
ad kecmeɣ ɣer texxamt deg tnezduɣt tasdawant
ahil n tddukkla tadelsant imnar n tdukli
mazal-it d aɛezri
a bab-is heggi duṛu
sers aḍar-im deg uḍebṣi d argaz-im i d llusi
teldi-as-d tesdawit n lezzayer tiwwura
anef ad inin anef awal yellan ɣef sin ad tarren ɣef xemsin
ssuturent tlawin izerfan-nsent
teldiḍ tawwurt ma tsekker
atan la ḥemmun waman-is
deg-s lluz deg-s lḥenni

ad am-sɣerseɣ rrebg
ayen tesliḍ ur yelli ara deg-s
ad nefru awal s wawal mačči s wuzzal
musa yexdem akken zdat n imeqranen n isṛayil
ayen ssaramaɣ d wayen i yi-iceɣben
ur ilaq ara ad nerr awadem n mali ad yessexdem tinfaliyin n leqbayel
susem kan ur d kem-yuɣ wara
d asgunfu i yal tafekka yeɛyan d wul yenuzegmen
ad as-fken i tayri azal-ines i tuklal

ad k-yuεer lḥal

ziɣemma yeskiddib fell-i
kra seg wid ara d-yufraren deg tsuddutin-a ssenqasen-asen-d seg wakud i asen-ḥekmen
sselsen-as abernus i yisli
yesselmed i uqjun-is ad yettajmaɛ iḍumman
ttarra azamul s deffir dakken tewwiḍ-d yid-k llufan
feṛqen-t
ad neqbel kan ccerṭ-nsen akken ad zedɣen yid-neɣ
d tayri-ines tamezwarut i iruḥen am waman n udfel
win ijehlen ad d-iɣli
zik d aɛemmec kan i yettɛemmic iman-is
sebɣasen imyura d temyura iqbayliyen
cennun akk
a mmi leɛca yella d acu twalaḍ deg tejmaɛt
ur tufiḍ d acu yellan a sidi selṭan
dinna ɣer-sen ur qqaren ara argaz qqaren afellaḥ
Ɣer tama n leqdicat-nniḍen i izemren ad ilin deg tmeɣra-agi n ccna
ur yezmir ara ad d-isali azegrir n ukter n tirawt
ttxil-k wenneɛ-as lemnam
yeṭṭeṣ
kkseɣ taẓayt ɣef uqerru-w
tessaweḍ tsertit n yimir ad teṭṭef ɣer leḥbus win ara d-ineṭṭqen yiwen n wawal s teqbaylit deg tmanaɣt
Ḥusfen tanaddalt i d-yewwin cciɛa imi kan d taqbaylit
ad sseɣtayen tucḍiwin
Ɣelqemt-t
yemma-s teflawes tewjef tɛebbuṭ-is
fɣen akk i d as-yenna
dayen fecleɣ dayen uyseɣ
d acu ara tinim di tezlit-a
yuba yeɣleḍ
ferɛun irra-asen ay imeɛgazen
anwa ara tt-yamnen
ansi yekkes aḍar a t-terr nettat
suref-iyi ur tkacafeɣ ara d acu ara yeḍṛun
yella win i ak-yekksen kra neɣ win i yeggulen deg-k s kra
d lmuluk ɣef yiwen n yimi
ssarameɣ ad ilin yimukan n lxedma aseggas-a
sya ɣer da tettali-d ɣef usayes deg tmeɣriwin i d-yettilin deg uxxam-a
ul d aleqqaqd aḥnin yettfeggiḍ d afrayen yeswayen tameddurt
tecfam
a ddin Ṛebbi ayen akka taɣect-a ur tettfakka ara
imiren ṛuḥen xebbṛen yasuɛ
Ɣef yixef n lmus i as-qemḍen tilisa
i yisteqsiyen-aki akk ihi mebla lmaɛna
seg imir akud yezri tura yiwen ur yeẓri
bɣiɣ ad d-iniɣ tullas akk ttḥemmilent irgazen
ad ɣuren yigenduzen
ssken-iyi-d abrid deg leεnaya-k
yella kra
bezzaf
s nnɛami ččuren ikufan
i tecbeḥ
tɣunfa-kem lmut
win yeṭṭfen kra n tegnewt kkseɣ-as tigejda
asif wis tlata isem-is Ḥidiqil ittazzal di ccerq n acur
yettfuḥu-d
ilguritmen-a i snefliɣ s tutlayt n usihel python ad ten-afen medden deg github
ma nniɣ i wayeḍ yya ad d-iṛuḥ
udem-is d ahrawan d amelḥan
ur aɣ-tcuḥḥ ara ddunit
brant-as
tiḥerci aked tudert ur xuṣṣent ara
win i s-innan lexla ixla i yexlan d netta
Ɛawneɣ tom
d lqanun ara d-iqqimen i lebda i tarwa-nwen
yewwi lḥebb yeǧǧa-yi-d akerfa
isteqsiyen-agi zgan deg wallaɣ-is
ilaq kan ad ẓren yimdanen d akken ala ifecka n uɣbalu yeldin ara nessidig
send ad kecmeɣ ɣer uɣerbaz lliɣ selleɣ i uẓawan n waṭas n yicennayen gar-asen
yal ṣṣbeḥ yettarra-tt i usebbeḥ
ur as-ssineɣ ara i tmacint-a
nniɣ-awen-d ad tweṛtem tamurt-nsen
ilaq ad d-ssuɣ
uf fukkeɣ daɣ ass-a
axaṭer s isḥaq ara tesɛuḍ tarwa ara irefden isem-ik
ad yeqqen lḥenni mmi-s n sbeɛ iṛemli
xas ma dayen yexneq
Ɣer dihin
tilelli ur tettwafras ara ad temmels akken tella
ers-d terǧuḍ di tzeqqa ar tama-ihin-nniḍen
teggez-it
tasa-w tɛebbed aḥliles
ur yi-d-qqar ara acu ara xedmeɣ s tudert-iw
menneɣ di sidi Ṛebbi a wi yesɛan kulci deg ufus-is
d kečči
ayɣer i tugademt
fkan-tt i jjiḥ
mkul ass d nutni i yeferrun timsal n ugdud
ccna di tallit nni d lεib
bdan waman ttwexxiṛen si lqaɛa ttṛuḥun neqqsen
teččiḍ seksu d asgal
werǧin tsemmeḥ deg-s ɣas akka yuɣal d takemmict deg wussu
ula d azayez yedda yid-sen s tyita n ufus
ay abuneqqar kečč ur d-qqar nekkni ur d-neqqar
uɣaleɣ ɣunzaɣ rrwaḥ ɣer ttbernat
tettkel fell-awen ad tkemlem deg ubrid-a
Ɣef uqerruy-nsen mass Ḥmed manis Ɛemriwi
ass n arim setta deg wayyur-a n maggu i yebda remḍan aggur n tuẓamin ɣur yinselmen
ttejṛa ur nerri tili ula wumi-tt
telluẓeḍ
tura yeggra-asen-d kan useɣti
ur yeẓri amek-it
imi tḥemmel-itt mliḥ
steqsi kan
ad tḥesbem lfakya-nni teḥṛem ur tettmačča ara
yal aɣersiw d azamul n kra
yecḍeḥ tom
nettmeslay ɣef kullec d wacemma
taɣulin yecban tasenselkimt d tetiknulujit i yebdan tettemhaz akken ilaq
Ṛuḥeɣ
xḍut-yi
ha-t-a nettraǧu inesramen n uẓru ad aɣ-d-awin tawleft taneggarut ara nesqerdec
yettru ɣef wayyur mi yuɣal d azgen
ciṭ kan n uɣrum idehnen s wudi i terra deg uqrab-is
am wakken daɣen ara tettunefk tegnit i tmenna n yisefra sɣur yimedyazen n taddart-agi dimma
a yemma ẓẓayet tikli
yura aṭas n yedlisen
yuba yuki
wid i icudden ɣer tussna d tɣerma taqbaylit
thedden
ukren-kent uqbel
ayagi yeffeɣ ɣef warrac imi εyan mliḥ seg wahil yeččuṛen
d abrid n baba-m i tuɣeḍ
ad ruḥeγ ad awen-ğğeγ taylut i yesmeγren deg-neγ lḥes
musa iḍegger asɣar-nni s aman imiren aman-nni uɣalen ḥlawit
akka i d-bdiɣ tamedyazt
tekker-d
akenyal-iw d idles d taɣerma
ad d-yeffeɣ urgaz-is si lḥebs
tessnem Ɛli mi ara tɣerqem
rnu ɣer wugar n miyya u xemsin n yimttekkiyen ara d-yasen seg tmura tiberraniyin
yeččur almi yettenɣal
a sidi Ɛebderreḥman
Ɣef waya itij d waggur ur ttemlalen ara
nezmer
sin tunag ɣer fransa kra kan n wussan send ara d-tili tukerḍa n ucennay maɛtub lwennes
wisen ahat d ṛṛuḥ ccaqi neɣ ḥurben fell-as yiɛessasen
kemm tessewwayeḍ s yisɣaren deg lkanun ma d nekni nessewway s lgaz
ttraǧun yiɣallen n laman deg unnar
tɣunfa-tt
llant tid iyi-ferḥen llant tid ur nebɣi ara
ma d netta yella yeṭṭeṣ
d acu i txeddmeḍ
nekkni nesɛa nnif nḥemmel kan ad tnẓer tilelli mebɛid
acuɣer i t-in-teǧǧamt
aksum ɣef yiɣes yefsi
s wawalen yettqiṭṭiren d iḥulfan
mi ara d-kkreɣ ur ttḥussuɣ ara s laẓ am zik
keččmeɣ tikwal deg lḥebs iyi-d-tefren yemma s lebɣi-w
wina akken i ijerḥen ul-iw
ihi nenna-d ad nexdem asentel-agi
ad d-am-kellxen yizerman
ungif ur d-gri ara deg tudert-is
yesɛa tigletyam
ur yezmir ara ad d-yeldi afaylu askudan n tsuqilt
ad snemreɣ aɣmis n yimaziɣen i aɣ-d-imudden tagnit akken ad d-nemmeslay ɣef yisenfaren-agi
acimi ur ittruḥu ara ad d-iṣeṭṭel
d acennay
suter-asen
tirza ɣer teẓgi n takkuct
ruḥent meɛna tasa-nsent ur tent-henna ara
asenfar i uheggi n yisura n teqbaylit
tebbeḥbeḥ taɣect-iw
tesɛa yiwet n tqeddact d tamaṣrit isem-is hagaṛ
mi tt-iwala yebda wul-is yedduqqus
wa nɣan-t wa nfant-t
wa d izli ayen d izli
yiwen n wass ad d-tuɣalemt alamma d da
kket-d tamurt meṛṛa sendeht lbuq
lmeɛna ɣer lefɛayel mačči ɣer ṣṣifa
ilguritmen-a ad d-ldin abrid ɣer sdat i tesleḍt n tesnamka
tekcem-itt tudgi d tawla
yekker umɣar amcum iger-d nnehta
i baba-m-aki anida yezdeɣ
mi yeɣli yiṭij iɣli-d ɣef dda bṛahim yiwen n naddam d ameqran
sawlen i ribika nnan-as tebɣiḍ ad tedduḍ d urgaz-agi
ad ttuɣaleḍ ad ttfehmeḍ
nsan deg udrar i yetran tettfuḥ amzun d lqahwa
dɣa ad as-terr yelli-s-nni ad as-tini
netta akken neεlem lgaz-a yella yakan deg ugama
tebda taẓẓalit uqbel ad tessaweḍ tesɛa n yiseggasen
mi twala aqcic-nni yecbeḥ teffer-it tlata n wagguren
siwel-as
tudert-nneɣ d agerrez ara tgerrez
anda i d-tezga tesnawit ideg teɣriḍ
ur nesεa ara annect-nni deg tuṛuft
a tadyant yid-i yeḍran
sya ɣer da yegguni-iyi leḥbis d ustaɛfu
nnan-iyi-d susem
inna-asen ur t-neqq ara
ad am-ibru ala tasa-w ara icaḍen fell-am
xellseɣ-ken yakan
asmi i d-tewweḍ ccetwa s usemmiḍ i yesserkaben tawla
deg uneẓruf agdud meṛṛa n isṛayil ttlummun di musa akked haṛun
ala imreffhen i itetten din
nnan-iyi-d taɣect-im tettuɣal-d deg meẓẓuɣen-nneɣ
aẓawan daɣen win ur nsell i uẓawan yemmut wul-is
suter kan
ttdeggireɣ kan isurifen
alama qebḍeɣ meyya
aneggaru-a s yis-s i d-yufrar deg warraz n asya Ǧebbar n wungal ifazzen
yewwi-d kulci s tcekkart yerna-d lgaz ad nwali
din i t-id-tekcem tikti n umennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt
ata ɣur-i
i nesedhaw dderya-nneɣ
d wa i d asaḍuf ar ɣur-neɣ
nheṛ s ttawil
i tura d acu
ad turarem yid-nteɣ

ameɣlal irra-as ur xeddmeɣ acemma ma ufiɣ dinna tlatin
ddant-d yid-wen
d aɣbel-nsent wagi
nɣant-asent-ten
ad kem-ṭfeɣ ɣer lḥebs imi tetɛeddaḍ ɣef lḥarma
ad d-ddun yid-m
yettṣerrif bla cceḥḥa ɣef tmeṭṭut-is
teɣli ɣef umeṭreḥ ur d-tuki ara armi d azekka-nni
d ayen ilaqen
d acu yeḍran deg tubeṛ
tessiwel nna faḍma i yelli-s n mmi-s i yedhan deg wurar
qeblen asumer
usiɣ-d ɣef ssebba-k
xeẓẓeṛ ar deffir
d kemm i yebɣan
ur tt-ttxalaḍet ara

ad asen-t-id-tawimt

ulac aman deg wanu

wwten-tt s yiẓṛa

anda zemren ad ilin
ruḥet ad teṭṭsem ad awen-tt-id-kemmleɣ azekka
Ɛni la tettruḍ
yebda-d si tqacuct
bḍan-awen-ten-id
heggaɣ i waffug
tekkat s tqejjirin-is deg waḍu
yella uyefki
iraggen-is ssefraḥen si lbaɛd win i ten-id-yesraḥen ad yesqeḍ
deg useggas n sin n wagimen d mraw n ṭam issenz uxxam n uznuzu christie’s yiwen n uqeddic n tẓuri
bḍan-am-tent-id
n wanta tamurt kečč
ilindi i bdiɣ asilel
am wakken daɣen ad ilint temliliyin-a d tagnit i wakken ad sen-kksen tuggdi seg ulawen-nsen
abrid ixṣer aṭas
nesumer-d yakan yiwen n umḍiq n unekcum ɣar temdint n tizi uzzu

bḍu-yasent-t-id
beṛka-k amennuɣ
ufiɣ ilaq ad d-ffɣeɣ
hedreɣ tasaεet yid-s

d takuct

ufant iman-nsent yid-sen

aya xedmeɣ-t ur bɣiɣ
ad d-iṣubb tura si ṣṣalib dɣa ad namen yes-s
xnunes

semmeḍ wass-a
neẓra d akken seg kra n tamiwin d tuɣalin s kra n yisurifen ɣer deffir i yeṭṭfen amnaṛ
ata yenṭeq-d uqcic-nni irebba
dayen teddez tebrez
ad d-kemmleɣ deg yisenfaren yebdan yakan i nekemmel nekkni
arma d tura ara d-tkecmeḍ ay abargaz

ma nedder

d acu i tɣilem εni
nexṣeṛ

ad as-siwlen s axxam
akken kan yeffeγ umγar-nni aεeṭṭar-nni ameẓyan yemmeγ γef yiniγem-nni yelhan

berber berber a naddam

neḥreṣ-itt
qqimeɣ deg sbiṭar azal n smana d uzgen
cerḍen idrimen d wurawen

dɣa deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen n cemmini tella-d tafilt tagnennayt

yal aseggas lawan-a yettili-d ukayad akka am wa
aɣerbaz ddaw tiɣilt
s ugacur i lliɣ din

ilindi

Ԑyiɣ seg usu i ṭṭfeɣ ɣef teɣzi n wass
netta iɣil d taqaḥbit i d-yesserkeb
tin i d-yesteqsan ɣur-sen d acelqef
Ɛni zwaren-k
ifakk-aɣ-t
belxir muḥemmed d acennay n tayri d tmetti
a-t-aya win ara y-isellmen
Ɛeddan rbeɛṭac n leǧyal si neffu ɣer babil armi d lmasiḥ
kra n tsaɛtin akin tiweḍ-d tkarrust n yiɛessassen n nnif
ad yenheṛ tom
ilaq ad s-rnun idammen i tom
ugadeɣ ad iyi-tuɣal d ṣṣeḥ
kul aɛerqub yettneqqil
yessewway daɣen
belleε i waman-nni
aql-i
aṭas n yiḍrisen i mazal ad d-kkseɣ seg-sen tifyirin
iwin-iyi ɣer yiwet n texxamt
ferɛun isawel i musa inna-as Ṛuḥet ad tɛebdem ameɣlal
ur nεellem ara yakk
as-d yid-i tura
sit mertayen ɣef tqeffalt-a
i urgaz terna tmeṭṭut
inelmaden-is nnuɣen-ten
ruḥ awi-t-id
nekk d iman n waṭṭan
qessiḥ wawal-nwen
ad as-ten-tefkeḍ
ad iyi-t-id-tawi
nettwali imdanen itteffeɣ-iten leɛqel ɣer lmakla
ta d tarzeft i kemm
anda-t ugiṭar-iw
ur turi ara daɣen
d usnerni n tutlayt tamaziɣt di tmetti
ad ɣ-seɛfent
tessṛeɣ-asen-t
iles-im d taqabact
tuli ɣer wunnig wis-setta tessikid-d ssyinna
yuba yers ɣef ssebba
i d-tewwi d lmuǧahdin ad nečč imensi ad nqesser
Ṛeqqeɛ waki
ad d-tṛuḥ
ad tent-tleqqem
Ḍebber aqeṛṛu-k
ur qqaṛ i ḥed
bḍumt-asent-t-id
yettnawal daɣen
awimt-tt-id i memmi
wagi d mmi d nekk i yeẓran d acu yellan
ini-as isem-iw miḥyaf win ixedmen kra ad t-yaf
d aɣbel-nsen wagi
sarameɣ tlemmdem
Ḥbes-d ṭṭumubil
anda i ten-ǧǧiɣ
anwa i yenneṛfaɛen
azekka d lficṭa
ala a baba ur walaɣ kra ur sliɣ i kra
Ɣur-k ad tuɣaleḍ ad d-taseḍ ɣur-i
Ččiɣ-tt
tedda yides
nmeslay ɣef ustṛalya
mfezwan am yibawen ɣef lluḥ
ilaq ad terseḍ da
tebɣam ad tlemdem taqbaylit
tura ɛeqleɣ-ken
ayen ḥkuɣ ayen sefruɣ drus
asemsawi i yellan gar urgaz n tmeṭṭut yefka-t-id ugama
amennuɣ deg tmurt-iw ɣef uɣref-iw yeffuden tilelli
ar ass n lexmis
netteɛṛaḍ
sseṛɣent-aɣ-ten
rran-aɣ-tent-id
semman-iyi s yar isem
Ɣas teččam ur tṛewwum ara
ixuṣṣ lemleḥ
Ḍfeṛ tom
deg tullist tilawt neɣ ungal ilaq ad iban wakud
iɣab ussan-a
ur ẓriɣ ara i wacu i ḥulfaɣ ilaq fell-i ad ɛerḍeɣ xas tikelt ad sɛuɣ yiwen n umeddakel
ur ẓriɣ ara anida ara d-negri
ma mmuteγ ǧiγ-d leɛmara baba-k irgel umkan-is
aya iban d taẓuṛi
tidet ur tt-ssineɣ
iεǧeb-itt lḥal
musa akked haṛun xedmen akken i d-yessendeh umeɣlal
terna leblida
fakeɣ-asent-t
nekk mačči d kamal sutra
ttmektayeɣ-d
llit tawwurt ay iḍan neɣ a wen-d-awi imsulta
tzemreḍ ad tɛummeḍ
lmut ad kem-tawi
a dda Ɛli ma tufiḍ aɣyul-nni
ad iyi-ten-id-tawiḍ
ur ttbeddilent ara iceṭṭiḍen sdat-i
ur nessin ara azal-im
d imawlan i d ugur tikwal
tfakk-am-tent
Ɣaḍeɣ-k
ad m-tent-fken
tenwiḍ ddunit d awal kan waqila
win yebɣan ad tṣeggem iṣeggem qbel iman-is
netta d acennay
Ɛni temxelleḍ
tsebɣem-asent-tent
deg uxxam s kra yekka yiḍ ur tent-yeqqin
ad tent-sseɣlin
haṛun ad iṛucc s idammen-is idisan meṛṛa n uɛalṭar
greɣ aẓeṭṭa weḥdi
truḥeḍ teǧǧiḍ-d iṭerbuqen-im da
ma mmuteɣ ini-as yenna-yi baba
txeddmeḍ d letnayen
win yebɣan tayri fessus
teččam seksu d asgal
ad t-texdem
zerbet ay urbaε
kemmel dduṛt-agi akked tagi sakin ad k-nefk tayeḍ
d acu i t-id-iwwin ɣur-i
fell-am ay nerbeḥ
timensiwin
yella-d s tẓuri d ccna
taqecwalt n tmellalin tiɣratin a tulawin
deg yal tagzemt ad naf aḍris tirawalt tajerrumt taseftit d ccna
qqim tessusmeḍ
lli-aɣ tawwurt
ad d-teddu yid-m
amek iga akka tom
lḥan deg-s yinelmaden s wannay n lezzayer annay n yimaziɣen
ad k-t-yefk
ur k-d-tewqiɛ deg yiwen ur tleḥḥuḍ ara s wudmawen
zellmen s yir tidmi qeddḥen ul yettcebṭiṭ
ffɣen ɣef ddin n muḥemmed ad d-awin i warrac aɣrum
ad kkseɣ fell-i asmugred-agi
susem kan anef kan i wayen akk iεeddan
inna-asen Ɣef ddemma n lqella n liman-nwen
a timeḥremt n leḥrir a m tesfifin

ad yeqqen lḥenni lbaz amekyus
tgerrez tura akka
lni-d
ad teɣṛeḍ ass-a
usiɣ-d weḥd-i
tlexsemt
tasdawit n uṭawa d yiwet seg tesdawiyin timeqqranin di ddunit
amek i tettḥulfuḍ iman-im ass-a a dihya
iziḍ neɣ rẓag

tɣaḍemt-ten
lḥumt
nekk d akerraz
nɣiɣ-as-tt
rnu-yi-d ur ṛwiɣ ara
llan imawlan ttaken-aɣ-d affud s wawal yelhan
nessedha iman-nteɣ s temqecrin
mebɛid ay d-nwala lḥara tbedd ɣef tizi
ala ur as-tekkes ara leḥjab i uqcic
ad iyi-tt-tefk

Ṛuḥ ttxil-m
yeskiddib tom
waɛli isɛa-d mḥend yidir akked zira
ad txedmeḍ aɛalṭar s usɣar n lkasis
tesɛa-as-d seɛdiya nadiya lǧuheṛ akked Ḥuriya
rebḥen akk

tɛeṛḍem

akken akk
yettbin-d yefṛeḥ tom
Ḥerzet lumuṛ-iw xeddmet ayen i d-qqaren
d nutenti i d-iɛellmen aɣanib-inek cebbḥent-tt almi kan
ur ttnalemt ara
ur d-terri ara agelzim s axxam
ijreḥ-it ugrizli deg asif n misuri
fakk almad
fkan-iyi-t-id ḍeggreɣ-t ɣer tmes dɣa yeffeɣ-d uɛejmi-agi
Ɛawen-aɣ-d
ckenter
ma dɣa teṭṭfeḍ igenwan

yečča tamrart
akka ihi
a win iweḥden Ṛebbi
sseṛɣeɣ-akent-t
kemm d tameṭṭut
i neqma sut lḥara
yeɛreq yixef-is
ur d-tefkim ara udem

mazal ur kmizeɣ ara
ttwakellxeɣ
a winnat d acu-k
yenɣa-yak-tent
i yettmeččan d ulawen mačči d udmawen
Ɛaq d acu d wa
qerrben mmɣen ɣef yasuɛ dɣa ṭṭfen-t
yal mi ara ɛerḍeɣ ad ṭseɣ kufreɣ iḍaq deg-i nnefs
d lɛib ma yella yuɣal deg wawalis
ilaq ad tḥerceḍ kra
maca ma yessufuɣ ubrid-ik wicqa
am triwa n yinijjel
tagi yiwen-is yella
ul-iw yettɣiḍ yeččewčew imennan
ad tebrez lḥala
wali aselkin n tɣellist
abrid n sbiṭer tesneḍ-t ma tebɣiḍ ad tḥadreḍ iman-im
ttawint ttarrant tektiwin deg tallaɣt-is netta-t tettnezzih deg-sent
tɛiwed-iyi-d tin nniḍen
