d aɣbel-is wagi
nwala ayen nečča ur nwala ara aɣ-yeččen
mmektant-d
bɣiɣ aselkim
tebḍa-yasent-ten-id
melmi ad iyi-ẓṛent
nɣucc-ik akk
tacriḥt icellḥen imellḥen werǧin tfuḥ
wehmeɣ imi kem-ẓṛiɣ
ad nger tasɣart
dɣa yewweḍ lexbar ɣer urgaz amcum
mi iṛuḥ syenna yasuɛ ikcem ɣer lǧameɛ-nsen
tetteffer lesrar-is
ihi a mmi d tagi i d tamsirt

tegzamt

Ɛni yezwar-iken
teččur d leεqel
sseṛɣen-as-tent

bɣiɣ ad tawḍeḍ kan ad yi-d-taruḍ
seffeɣ-iten-id
yiwen yugad ayen yellan
rrant-iyi-t-id
iɣaḍ-it
mmi deg yirebbi-inu
mačči d ayen ara d-qaḍɛen
ur numeɣ ara
mi d-uɣalen warraw n si mḥemmed si lexla slan s wayen yeḍran
Ḥebsem ur yi-d-ttnalem ara
sancu panza iḥemmel inzan aṭas
ad yeqqerṣ uzagur-ik
awal ur yeffiɣ imi-m
att stafiḍ azekka
aman zeddigen yes-sen ad tsirdeḍ
lǧar-iw d amasiḥi aḍeggal-iw d ineslem nekk d aqbayli i lliɣ
bdiɣ-as
yečča takermust armi s-tewḥel
leɣdeṛ yusa-d seg dammen
tayri-nni n tidett i s-fkiɣ
nelluẓ irgazen lɛali
tura nesεa leslaḥ gar yifassen-nteɣ nesεa tamussni d tɣuri yis-sen kan ara nizmir ad necbu timettiyin-nniḍen
turew-d tmurt ciḥbuḍ
yak lḥubb ur yettwali am nekkini nemlal-d neddukel akken
ahimatulog d amejjay n idammen
ur ẓriɣ ma hennaɣ neɣ tmeḥḥneɣ
tameṭṭut d tagersa n uxxam
waqil ufiɣ-d tiririt
yesṭenṭen-ikem ubeḥri
yekkaw uglim-iw
ur ttheggi iwzan qbel ifrax
refdeɣ anay-iw leɛqel yettḥeyyeṛ ɣer tizi wezzu tura ad nezger
ha ad sweɣ lwhisky ha d aman nekk ur ssexlaḍeɣ ara
inṭeq-d Ɛumeṛ at maɛtuq
ala aɣyul i yeleḥḥun s nnbec
ur zmireɣ ad rnuɣ ad dduɣ
ur ittebbi ur ittɣeẓẓ
ittjellib am ukured
Ɛuzzen-t am tmellalt deg ufus
yiwen ur y-iwefeq
Ḥeṛmeɣ-t ula deg waman n tala
iṭṭef di Ṛebbi irna di temrart
taswiεt tewεer
lbaz d lbaz lɛac-is d isɣaṛen
ddez aḍaṛ-ik
yugi ad k-iffeɣ ubeḥri
iẓẓad deg wawal am tessirt
ad nekkes Ɛli ad nerr qasi
iɣyal temkerracen buygarasen
ula d iṭij d tziri ttaḍnen
Ǧeṛǧeṛ yessawel i uheggaṛ
tettalem ulman deg tzeqqa
zzuɣer acifuḍ ar d-yas warkas
win ur neqbiḥ leɛmeṛ irbiḥ
win iččan ayla-s issidir i tillas
am win iteffẓen ɣef sin imuyag
iwwi-t ṛṛay-is s agrireb
ddheb n tmurt-nni yeṣfa
yiwen ur k-iḥettem ad txedmeḍ aya
ad d-yuɣal uqeṛquc seg imi n taɣaṭ
sɛaya tedda d tmusni
iseblew-it am ikerri n lɛid
irra iman-is d lfayeq ur iwwiḍ
ttṛaǧǧuɣ tisin-is
leqdic yella-d s ddeqs n temsikniyin yerzan tudert d umecwar n ucennay aqbayli
Ḥanux idda akked yillu
tesɛa-d daɣen gma-s habil
aqeṛṛu-w d aferḍas
kecmet tinedlisin ur ttkukrut
ters-d fell-as rrehba iɣli-d fell-as ṭṭlam
izzi amrar i udrar
d acu kan ur ttawi ara mmi ɣer dinna
ssu aceṭṭiḍ qbel ad tennudmeḍ
neffud ad nwali
illu yesla-d i ṣṣut n uqcic-nni
iseḥṣel-iyi deg imi n tlafsa
ferɛun inna-yasen d acu i d lxedma-nwen
ay amesbaṭli iṛuḥen
arraz racid Ɛellic yesɛa azal meqqren ama i umaru neɣ i yimeɣriyen akked tutlayt n teqbaylit
sliɣ seg-s uqbel ad d-tawdeḍ yerna burkeɣ-t
yeɛqub inna i watmaten-is jemɛet-d iẓra
lehduṛ-is snuddumen
inna-yas yya a win iburek umeɣlal
ur ttamneɣ ara kullec deg ujernan-nni
yerwel-d seg rrebrab d lḥif n tmurt-is yuɣ abrid ɣer lurup
mbeɛd iderman n kanɛan mfaṛaqen
get taqisust temyuṭṭafem afus deg ufus
wehmeɣ deg iqbayliyen yettḥessisen i uziṭuṭ
ur ẓriɣ anida ara yi-tessuffeɣ
tura nettraǧu iḥricen wiyaḍ
Ṣṣbuḥ ɣef Ṛebbi mačči fell-ak
yeɛqub inna-yas ggall-iyi-d qbel
nnumeɣ ḥedd ur y-iḥemmel
inna-yas daɣen akka ara tili tarwa-k
izla-k ccreɛ
tella-d tmeddit illa-d ṣṣbeḥ d ass wis sin
ur ttlaɛej ara tussna n waṛẓen
ur ttlaɛej tamda n bibel
neɣ-it zlu-t ayen ilmed ma ittu-t
futifaṛ tecɛel deg-s tmes irfa
sliɣ ur tettetteḍ ara aksum
akken ma nella d arraw n yiwen n wergaz
kra n win ara yeslen yis-i ad yeḍṣ fell-i
meẓyan yenna Ɣef wayagi i yettusemma yeɛqub
ssegrireb aɣerbal ad t-id-ittawi
lefqeε-nni-inek yettwfham mliḥ
ulaqṛaṛ ad yali wass
anda ara iruḥ yiwen deg ssexṭ-ayi
argaz-nni yenna-yas Ṛuḥen ssyagi
ur bniɣ ara
si tmurt nni iṛuḥ ɣer acur
ur cfiɣ ara anda tzedɣeḍ
ad trefdem adrum u ad tḥarbem fell-as
akken myeqṛaben i ttemwaṛaten
a lfeṭṭa ad kem-id-yali nnḥas
Ṛebbi ur ittɛanad ara lɛebd-is
ma izzi i udɣaɣ ad d-yawi ayla-s
sser ma drus ma igget messus
yuɣ lḥal lbir-nni d ilem ulac deg-s aman
yerna-yas-d ccṛab iswa
axaṭer annect-nni n wussan i yelaqen i uɛeṭṭer n lmegget
tiɣri i wid yettarun
Ԑewwleɣ-d ad εawdeɣ ad εerḍeɣ
ddem tidak-iw
"err" isdukkel iɣwyal
acu ara d-ikken seg uffal
nufa yiwet n teqcict tessirid iceṭṭiḍen deg wasif
iḥseb akk medden d leḥcic
d ul-iw i tmeḥneḍ
Ḥekkun merra ɣef yicaliyen-nwen
anda-tent tiyaḍ
ad d-tbineḍ am yetri weḥd-m gar teyyiḍ
argaz deg urgaz lḥenni di rrbeḥ
Ṭbib d win yettdawin aṭṭanen
d lezzayer i ɣ-d-yegren tiɣri i tdukli d uskasi ara ɣ-yeǧǧen ad negzu
ikkat argaz s wayeḍ
yeẓra ur t-id-ṣaḥeḍ ara
ass-a medden akk itteffeɣ-iten leεqel di tenhert
iqqel uderɣal d aṣeggad
ur ttuɣaleɣ ad ldiɣ imi-w
lbaḍna n at tessirt
dayen ur bɣiɣ ara ad urareɣ
yiwen uẓar i d-yeqqimen
kkan-d sɣur umeɣlal seg igenni
aɣyul menwala iɛebbi fell-as
tɛussem ḥaca nnan-ak qqaren-ak
ilaq ad tettḥadaremt ugar ssya d asawen
mazal ṭṭseɣ
werǧin ad ttwassneɣ akken
bab n wakal izwar bab n wawal
d ddiq dayi fell-aɣ
yeqqur uqerruy-is hdeṛ neɣ qqim
yuɣ lḥal laban isɛa snat n yessi-s
ilaq asnulfu ama deg talɣa n yiḍrisen ama deg yisental akked tewsatin n tsekla
irden s uṛeṭṭal tameɣṛa s ttebriḥ
ugadeɣ tayri-m
ssareẓgent ddunit i isḥaq akked ribika
ticcert mačči i ucebbeḥ kan i temmug deg tira
ad d-tesɛuḍ acqcic ad s-tsemmiḍ ismaɛil
ma ittfukku Ṛebbi seg-k ad yi-ifukk
zzeriεa ass-a temɣi
ikker umɣar ad iqdec iṛẓa abaqec
aqader n yilugan n tenhert ɣas ini-d ulac-it
a-t-an tura ad d-yuɣal ttaṛ n idammen-is
Ɛir akked unan mmuten di tmurt n kanɛan
ikka-d unessis s nnig lkanun
arraw n rawubin Ḥanux falu Ḥiṣrun karmi
deg waya tella tmasit deg wayen ara d-tiniḍ
balak ad d-yekcem warẓaz-nni
win ibɣan ucuf iṣubb s iɣzeṛ
ad tezwirem nnif
ur iteccef alamma yesseḥma-d aman ɣef lkanun
gma-s immut siwa netta i s-d-iqqimen s yemma-s
tukḥilt n lecfar ẓriɣ-tt iḍelli
inimt-d d acu tettwalimt
yeɛqub iggull s win yettagwd baba-s isḥaq
yuker lḥaǧ mi yeẓẓul
xedmeɣ kan ayen i yi-d-tennam
iteddu tikli n yizem
tusa-d tikti ad d-aruɣ ɣef temsalt-a
yusef inna-yasen d lmuḥal ad xedmeɣ ayagi
Ṛṛay d lɛic
ttaggaden tili-nsen
d asemmaḍ am tgersa
welleh ad iyi-ilzem
ixdem laɛǧeb yerna yeḥjeb
ar tesleḍ s yizgaren llsen
sεiɣ swaswa ayen i k-ilaqen
iceṛṛeɛ deg wur yelli
ad yili d limaṛa n leɛqed gar-i d ddunit
yuɣal ɣer yahuda inna-yas ur tt-ufiɣ ara
bɣiɣ kan ad ssfeqdeɣ i yiwet n tɣawsa
ur bɣiɣ ara ad ffɣeɣ ɣer berra
kra deg-sen jerḥen
ur teɛyiḍ ara di lhemm
mazal ur t-ssarden mi t-yeɛna ɛezṛayen
taqcict mm tebbura leɛṛeḍ-is inza
telliḍ ur tebɣiḍ ara ad mmteɣ si laẓ yak
iwḥel-as uqeṛquc
Ɛisu ittusemma adum
iffeɣ-itent am bu wuṛiḍ n tmeɣṛa
tesɛiḍ lḥeqq
ccah di ṛṛay-nsent
a-ten-an tura di tmurt n gucin
yella kra n yiwen i d-iluɛan tura
a wer iliɣ seg wid yesɛan ḥalama jehlen neɣ seg wid ixuṣṣen ḥalama xnunesen
beεεed ɣef uqjun-nni
teǧhed taɣect-im
aql-i am win i yeffulḥen ar xalt-is
Ḥṛes afus-iw
mačči d yiwen wass ad thelkeḍ iman-ik
ala ma tugiḍ kečč
ijiṛmeḍ ur ittak llqeḍ
ad d-iniɣ d aɣlaḍ i ɣelḍeɣ
inim-t-id akken iqwem
ass-n i d-nettlal
Ɛni d taki i d leḥmala
acḥal tesεeddaḍ n lweqt deg inadiyen uqbel ad tebduḍ tira
Ɣeṛṛbent wallen-is
ad m-d-ruɣ ad m-d-sḥissfeɣ
lqaɛa tella texla d tilemt
yerẓa awal n tejmaεt
myeqmacen icifaḍ
neεya kan
yella kra i yesserfan tom
d tamcumt teqcict-nni
i d-yettmenni lxaṭer-iw
yegguni-k umihi a tom
times ugemmaḍ ur tesseḥmay ameṣṣaḍ
Ḥemmleɣ acmumeḥ
Ɣeṛ wayi tura
Ǧǧiɣ-am-d tazmilt
ay ineɣ zman d asfel-is
Ḍemɛeɣ deg uɛeṭṭaṛ yittmetran
tarda n leḥwal seg umnaṛ ar daxel
Ԑreḍ kan ayen nniḍen axir-im
ttasen-d si yal abrid
ala ma kfan εamayen
yezmer ad yili d ayen tebɣiḍ
am wass-a ad yali wass ɣef tmurt
ulamma ččewčiwen yegḍaḍ yezga wul-iw yeḥzen
leḥṛam d aseṭṭaf
ad twaliɣ deg-m tayeḍ
am tili-k i tt-tettawiḍ
ssneɣ ad sekreɣ seksu
ad tɛeddim ar wexxam
yella win i itetten
sew kra n ttay
yelha usewwi
irra-yasen a-tt-an dihin daxel n uqiḍun
ass mi telliḍ d askuti
tesεiḍ widak i d yeǧǧan
yessusem kan tom
yella ḥedd sdaxel wexxam-nni
ass mi tekfa daɛwessu
d acu ur tesεiḍ
henni iman-ik seg-sent
ar assa xerben lumuṛ
tqerreb daɣen nna feḍmuca nettat d warraw-is seǧǧden zdat-s
aql-ik ḥaca iman-ik
nettwanas wid ittɛicin
taxxamt-nni ideg yeggan teččur d izan
mi nella d arrac netturar tablibult
aṭas i teglalzeḍ deg wannar n taddart
ad cfuɣ ɣef lxir
kra deg-sent jerḥent
ffɣent-d akk tudrin
d leqmar i yenɣan amɣar
yella kra n yiwen i yettnezzihen
deg-s i rǧiɣ tili
zelgen wussan-ik
iqwem wass-aki
tḥemmlemt ad tnadimt deg aman
cennun kan ɣef teqbaylit wamma d tiṛumiyin i sen-iɛeǧben
ad d-yaweḍ azekka
buh
isteqsa-d felli neɣ xaṭṭi
tḥeqqeɣ belli ad frunt temsal
mi ifukk uselway inaw-is yiwen ur iseffeq
ad temmekti i wayen i nesɛedda d issin
tella tin i yukren ssaɛa-w
ad teswemt lqahwa s uyefki
ur zmireɣ ad uɣaleɣ ma ur teddiḍ
nečča neswa
aṭas n tlawin i t-yessnen
nettlemmim kan
abṛaham akked luṭ mfaraqen abṛaham yuɣal-d si maṣer ɣer nigib netta akked tmeṭṭut-is d wayen akk yesɛa
tfeṛḥemt akk
srid seg otawa
axir ad ččeɣ abelluḍ wala akka d abeṛṛani
abuhal inefɛen iman-is
zhir di tikli ticki teddun deg iberdan
Ḥemmlen-k meṛṛa
di leɛnaya-k qqim di rrif
tamurt tekcem di miḥlal
mačči d yiwet i d-ittɛeddin deg uqerru-yiw
d anagem yinɣa fad
ttasen-d si yal taqbilt
iles isseɛdal-itent
medlemt allen-nkent
i iceṭṭḥen d aserwal
yella iḥemmel-itt ziɣ d talisbyant
sɛant ccṛab
iwwa zzbib-is
tawacult n tsedda teḥbes-itt deg uxxam ayen i tt-yeǧǧan tegzem asirem terra lḥedd i tudert-is
lexbaṛ n tmeddit yewɛeṛ
Ɣef nnif yeɣli wadif
tella kra n yiwet
tekcem-d ass-nni ɣer tneɣrit-nneɣ dɣa teɛreq-iyi tɣuri
sew tajɣimt kan seg-s
isers aseggan
Ḥemmlen ad nadin deg aman
Ẓṛiɣ belli tom meẓẓi fell-i
lwennas meɛtub d win yefkan iman-is d asfel i tmaziɣt
ur as-yufi ara ixf-is i ddunit
laṣel di tmira
tarwa-k ad tuɣal d aṭas am uɣebbar n lqaɛa
nḥemmel ad nmeslay
azekka d ass nniḍen
a zzin iɣef εetbeɣ
tom yettarra dima nnwaḍer n yiṭij ɣas mačči deg berra
awal am talast n wakal
taqbaylit tufrar tennerna teẓweṛ
yes-k i nedhent tezyiwin
deg-s tcubaḍ s lkil
acḥal ur neqqerṣ ara
ddu tiyita skud teḥma
yeẓra-tt tettru ɣef nnbi yuɣ-itt dɣa tbeddel-it s wayeḍ
yezga itett tom
ziɣ tesɛiḍ sin n wulawen nekk d wis sin ay ssneɣ
ikker-d di lezzayer ittusbeɣ d aɛṛab
lɣeṛba teḥkem fell-i
ass-agi neɣ deg wass-nni i nečča asfel
lɣeṛba n win ur neɛmiṛ d aqwiṛ
ur k-ɣucceɣ ara
teẓriḍ d acu i d-tenna
ixleq-iten d ddkeṛ akked nnta
ur ttnamar di lqut
mačči nneɣ kemm
yettaru i yiman-is kan i lmend n usεeddi n wakud
leswam ttalin ɛla ḥsab n wayen yellan akked wayen ṭṭalaben yimdanen
timetti tluɣ s tnafa
Ɛli d weɛli bḍan yiwen wassaɣ
s tutlayt n llufan
tamurt ad teṛtiḥ ad teṛwu asteɛfu
lḥan tlata n wussan deg uneẓruf ur ufin aman
awcic yusef yenna-d "nessaram ad nesbedd asebddad n ugellid cacnaq"
ma d lekra i t-id-ikra d azal kan n lekra ara yefk
iɛawed-d urgaz asuɣu iyyaɣ iyyaɣ yekker-d uqcic yettru
nessarem ad d-yawi warraz-agi ayen yelhan i lwilaya-nneɣ am wakken i t-yewwi warraz n aysat rabaḥ
tuggdi ur tettnuḥ
aɛraben ḥeṛsen iqbayliyen ḥaren ad ten-ssufɣen si tmurt-nsen axaṭer qqaren nedder nedder
ma yebɣa ad t-id-icafeɛ ad s-irnu tis xemsa ɣef ssuma-s
cwi kan terra-yi-d
abernus-nni dinna i t-teggar yemma
tuker-d tidet seg wallen n Ṛebbi
yebda yettuɣal-d usirem n ḥellu-s
xḍu-k i lekdeb
nesneltay ur d-neẓḍi afriwen
neεya seg yiɣimi
d ta i d tameṭṭut ad ak-imlen tudert
ad sweɣ acwari n tkaciyin
gar yiswiyen n ugraw-a asaru d asebɣes d tmerna n ufud i wid ixeddmen ssinima taqbaylit
ibeɛɛacen d iqelwacen kkren-d s izem ad t-qqacen
zwaǧ-is assalen llan isebbaḍen ulac
iclex ṛṛwaḍi n ikeṛṛusen-nsen irra tikli-nsen ẓẓayet
a yemma d talafsa awi-d kan awi-d kan
yir sɣar njer neɣ qqim yir serdun deqqem neɣ qqim yir lɛebd hder neɣ qqim
nečča-d seksu d asgal tewweḍ-d nnuba-nneɣ yekfa useqqi
s wakka ad tṣab lɣella
ad yeɣleq fell-as
tameqrant isem-is nna feḍmuca ma d tamecṭuḥt isem-is meɛǧuṭa
ahat ur ẓerṛeɣ ara tafat i lebda
tḥella-d xemsin n cciεat yemgaraden
win ur nessin lemɛani ur iferru ddɛawi
tamexluqt n Ṛebbi ur teṭṭif deg yiman-is
nekk isax wallaɣ-iw yugin ad yeqbel tilawt-a i d-yefɛefɛen fell-i
a wer tekkremt
lmeṣbaḥ akked dduzan-is tiftilin-is zzit n lmeṣbaḥ
s anda ara truḥeḍ
tekker terbaɛt i lebni n wis sin amzun mačči d yiwen n ubrid i ḍefren
taṭṭucin tizegzawin
yal yiwen deg-sen yettnadi amek ara yessefreḥ wayeḍ
la neẓẓad neggar awren
s wallaɣ-is i yettwarez
amek ar ɣuri
ulac ula d yiwen n wass i deg i ɣriɣ tutlayt-iw deg uɣerbaz
ad teccexmimi s yidammen d dwawi
ur zmireɣ ara ad idireɣ war ma telliḍ s idisan-iw
Ɛeddi-d ad d-teṭṭfeḍ tummeẓt n waman
ur d-yeclig deg wacemma
d taqejjiṛt ugujil i yesɣeṛṣen taṛakna
mi d-tuki i tikelt tis snat iɣegdan-nni ttwaksen
ssiwḍeɣ ad ṭṭseɣ
yesficcet talwit-iw yiwen n ɛelxir s taɣec d tazurant
ad d-rnuɣ ad d-fkeɣ taḥawact n uḥric n waddal d yilmeẓyen
ur yettnecṛaḥ ḥedd d uɣyul-is
nnan-d d netta i d yiwen akken
s ani truḥeḍ akka
iḥdewwes ɣef texṛiṭ-is yal ass d taḥkayt
ur ẓriɣ ara tesneḍ ad temmeslayeḍ akka a tabandit
ad tt-id-ssufɣen yimawlan-is seg uɣarbaz ad tt-fken ula d nettat
tawriqt-nni ara d-nekkes akkenni seg yimi n uqreḍac ad tt-nefreq
ur iyi-d-yettṣaḥ ara akka yal ass
zehwa teqqim deg uxxam weḥd-s
lukan s tidet ḥemmlen taɛellamt ur d-tgerri ara tmurt war aselway
di taddart n ayt tɛisiwt yella yekker umennuɣ gar snat n tamiwin
win iwumi iḍul ubrid iṣemmeṛ aɛudiw
lḥukuma ur tt-yessin laɛmer yebbuṭi
llan daɣen sin n yisenfaren i icudden ɣer usesfer awurman n tutlayt akked ulqaḍ n tefyar
ncudd-itt war tuflin
Ɣezzif yiles-is tegguma ad as-terr ckkel
asteqsi-agi icewwel-itt
yya-w ad nceḍḥet cwiyya n ṛṛamba
ameɣlal iǧǧa-t
tidet tban-d am yiṭij i d-yettḍillin yal ṣṣbeḥ ẓran-t akk medden
bɣant ad rewlent akken seg temdint-nni
rnu snen ccaɣuf-iw ɣef teqbaylit
d tamɣart i d taxeznaǧit n uxxam
yuggad ad ɣilen medden d ameddakel-is
ur tezmir ara ad d-tessali awal
tuki-d seg ushetref-is
ad mejdeɣ yis-m a tilelli
tzemreḍ ad d-tafeḍ awal yifen winna ama deg tfukli-ines ama deg uẓar seg i d-yennulfa
i tessexdem fransa
d acu n wugur i yezmer ad d-yili s ddwa-agi
yettraǧu ad d-tuɣal tafat-is
tfettet tḥedduft teggergeb-itt tweṭṭuft meqret taluft tkeḥḥel tceqquft
tedda d tislit ddren akken kra n wagguren taqcict tcedha imawlan-is
d ibaḥanen yimecṭaḥ-nni i yesseklasen deg common voice
teqbel ayen yebɣu yefka-as-t-id
anda nedda yedda yisem-im
yezmer ad isruḥ leɛqel-is ɣef tikkelt
asenfar wis sin d abrid ameqqran ara yeqqnen gar temdint n tizi uzzu ɣar ubrid asammar-amalu
Ẓer amek yezzer
ad ɣ-d-tettakem yessi-twen ad tettawin yessi-tneɣ
ur yettwasenqed ara
sin n yiberdan kan gar-as d uxxam-nsen
ufiɣ-awent-id win ara kent-yessersen
heddreɣ-ak tugiḍ ad tfehmeḍ
rwumt tura tudert di laḥram
akken kan i as-yehwa anef-as
tabrat n tayri yettawi-tt yid-s d aɛwin
nessaram ad nili di lebɣi n wid ara aɣ-yeslen
sliɣ-as mi tḍegger tilifu-s ɣef tɣerɣert tuzzel-d ad tẓer acu yi-yuɣen
anwa ara sḍelmen
ur d-rrint ara agelzim s axxam
yir lehduṛ am lḥentit akken ay ṛẓagit
nutni ɣur-sen akud yesɛa azal
akka ihi i yekfa musa ccɣel-nni meṛṛa
ur tettsetḥimt ur tettlazamemt
ur fhimeɣ ara acu i yesseḍsayen deg wanect-a
ur yezmir ara ad d-yessali afaylu n imedlis n tensa
d ayen yelhan wayen i d-yellan iseggasen-a ineggura di temnaḍt n yiwennisen
am wakken daɣen i d-yella ufraq n ddeqs n tɣawsiwin i yigerdan leḥlawat tičupiḍin
s kra yekka wass ur teɛriḍ taḥerrift
d ayen i yellan i wass-a
asensi-nni tt-yewwin ɣer uxxam
tefka irden ar tessirt ur ttwafernen
ad ruḥeγ ad awen-ğğeγ tarbut ur nufi awren deg ukufi
s wakka mi ara mlileɣ yid-s ahat ad isteṛḥeb yis-i
ur ttmeslayent ara ɣef lesrar-nsent neɣ ɣef yisental i d-ttawint tullas gar-asent yid-i
yal yiwen anda it-yeffeɣ yiziɣer-is
tqerreb-d tmeɣra
Čenčen zebgi ixreb leɛqel-iw
sεerqen-as abrid
ad as-tiniḍ imiren i ddiɣ d tislit
ur d-tettaẓeḍ ara zdat-i ifassen-ik d ilmawen
nnan wi iḍeεfen yettweḥqer nekkren-t ula d atmaten
wali akk ileqman
ad am-d-ɛawdeɣ i tikelt taneggarut akka i d lqanun
acku argaz d netta i yettqabalen aεdaw n beṛṛa
ur nettaf ara aṭas n umgarad gar tesɣunin yezrin d tagi yetturaǧun ad d-tlal d tamaynut
ad twalim ass-agi amek ara ken-isellek umeɣlal
azekka-nni kkreɣ-d zik akken ad rewleɣ
ccɣel d izem mi tekkreḍ ɣer-s d awtul
ad sermimzen adrar i taqbaylit s tirugza
ur tettlusuḍ ara llebsa yeẓḍan s sin n leṣnaf n lxiḍ
tamesbanit-agi uɣur i d-yessawel umazday ilelli n yinelmaden tebda seg tesdawit akli muḥend ulḥaǧ armi d lwilaya
maca yal yiwen yezmer ad d-yerr agrudem n facebook s teqbaylit ɣas akken ur imid ara
wigi meṛṛa llan s teqbaylit
d acu i ḥesben iman-nsen
ula d lwaεda mi asen-d-tettunefk wa ittbuddu wayeḍ s uḥric yelhan
akessar d akessar Ṛebbi ifka afus
ceɛlen times
acḥal i d-isqam waya
gar yicennayen n taddart-agi i d-yecnan ad nebder marseɣsan
musa yenna-yasen wwtet-tt ihi ass-agi
annar-a yesɛan azal meqqren deg unegmu deg ugezdu n tizi uzzu
a musa
ded uḥeggan ur ttɣafaṛ ur ttmenṭaṛ ay aḍaṛ
tazeqqa n rruz
agraw-agi i d-izedmen ɣer tkebbanit-agi qqaren-asen al qqaɛida
Ḥemmlen taɣult n ssinima bɣan ad temhaz ssinima taqbaylit
yiwen n wass yuḍen ugellid n lḥut yewweḍ γer lmuḥal
mi d-yewwi ddheb-nni yerra-as umɣar-nni tameṭṭut-is
wali akk isental n unaẓur-agi
rwin-t lehyuf
nekk yeqzuzmen gar tlufa d leqdic n uxxam
anda llan yiḥulfan d ccuq-nni-ines n zik
d netta ara iheddṛen i ugdud deg umkan-ik
wwḍen armi d tilisa n falesṭin dɣa beccen iserwula-nsen
ur zmireɣ ara ad dduɣ ass-a
ilaq ad ẓreɣ tagi iḥewwṣen irgazen
ur frineɣ ara abrid-a
tessufɣeḍ-tt i yiberdan
ur sɛiɣ ara tabɣest ad qqimeɣ deg tmetti icerwen tumert-iw ɣef cceḥ
d abelεeṭ kan i tettbelεiṭ
uggadeɣ ad d-akiɣ seg targit-nni
yusef ihdeṛ-asen s leḥnana isseṛtaḥ lxaṭer-nsen
d tidet uguren-is ggten s waṭṭas
baba-tneɣ inna-yaɣ-d uɣalet ad ɣ-d-taǧwem cwiṭ n lqut
netta yella ikerrez tewwi-as ad yečč
nniɣ-am akka maɛna ɣur-m wi isellen Ḥader ad as-tiniḍ i ḥedd
tubiret zegzawen am yilel tuɣal amzun d tiniri seg tmes
isenfaren i yerzan tutlayt taqbaylit deg tetiknulujit d umaḍal umḍin
yeɛya umdan di lqaɛa
tis tlata err ssuq-ik sdat n tewwurt-ik
telzem-ikem tkeffart
ccib ur yezgil anẓad seg uqqeru-ines
mlalen-d meṛṛa deg uzaɣar n sidim yeɛni lebḥeṛ amerɣan
d lqut yettunefken d asfel i tečča tmes i umeɣlal
ameqran amecṭuḥ argaz tameṭṭut ttagaden
rebɛa n wayyuren snat n smanat d xemsa n wussan ur ẓriɣ ara kahina
ilaq ad nessebɣes ilmeẓyen ad xedmen taẓuri
amzun s teglizit yiwen wass kan ad uɣalen d imusnawen
amdan-agi yeṣfa
a wid mazal di tudert ur qebblet ara ad tilim d aklan
yusef inna i watmaten-is qeṛṛbet-d ɣur-i
d netta i ɣef tettezzi tmacahut
acḥal n tikwal i yettidir umdan
yiwen n wass ad n-tuɣaleḍ
imiren ddnub-nni yexdem ad s-ittwasemmeḥ
abɛaḍ a mmi ad d-yerzu ɣer ɣur-k
seg zik ḥninet yerna tetɛeqqel
ilmend n waya aseqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n tizi uzzu yefka tadrimt n ukkuẓ tmerwin n yimelyunen i yal taɣiwant
i lqerḥ akked lferḥ
ikad-iyi-d akka swaswa
tura zrin acḥal d aseggas segmi ten-yecrek wusu n leḥlal
teffeɣ seg-sen leḥnana
Ɛebban-d ɣef ileɣman-nsen leɛqaqer lerwayeḥ akked qeḍran
allen-is yessebɛaden timuɣliwin itteffɣen akkin i usigna d yitran
ad ak-d-yerr adrar d luḍa
ad kem-ḥadreɣ seg ukukru
azekka-nni ṣṣbeḥ mi iṛuḥ yusef ɣur-sen yufa-ten tqelqen
ad tekcem ɣriba
di tecmatin kan i tẓewreḍ
abrid ameqqran
tewweḍ teqbaylit armi d ɣur-s tebded
tanemmirt daɣen i uɣmis n yimaziɣen i yi-d-yefkan tagnit-a
iceffaren d yisekranen yettmenṭaren deg yiberdan
mačči ma telluzeḍ kan ad tsemḥeḍ deg nnif-ik
yal ddurt ttasen-d yimejjayen-nni akken ad iyi-iẓren
azwel usarag akala agrawal d tnaya taɣerfant
Ṣṣbeḥ meddi tettlummu deg zzher-is icennfen
wali amek i iteddu web
taqsiṭ-a tṣeḥḥa
sut wawal azedgan d umeslay iqeεden
d tiqit seg umaḍal
ad d-greɣ tiɣri i yilemẓiyen d tlemẓiyin akken ad d-ddun ɣer yisenfaren-a
yemma mi teṭṭef aḍar-iw ddaw wusu
am wakken nekk mačči d iman-iw
yiwet n tnezzayt yeffeɣ ur d-yuɣal
ad d-nerr nnehta
yeldi-d allen-is sdat n wudem-nni n lmalaykat
tɛedlem akk amek i tettxemimem
ikayaden n taggara n useggas
aql-ik tura uger n useggas d uzgen i telliḍ ɣef uqerru n useqqamu aɣerfan n ugezdu n tizi uzzu
efk-itt i umṛabeḍ ara tt-yefken d asfel ɣef uɛalṭar
teǧǧa axxam-nsen ur d-tuɣal tameddit ur d-tuɣal timeddiyin i d-iḍefren
at isṛayil xedmen ayen akk i s-d-yumeṛ umeɣlal i musa
ahil n uselmed ibeddel
ad am iniɣ warǧin tiṛẓi
mazal ula d tarda ur tt-id-tusi ara
a win iɣef yeshel walluy ḥader iman-ik deg trusi
taqemmuct d taxatemt
rran-d tawwurt
yerna ad cfun fell-i
mi yelḥeq luṭ ɣer temdint n Ṣuɛar icṛeq-d yiṭij
d nekkni i d aseqqamu amenzu i yuran tilwiḥin akk yellan daxel n useqqamu-agi-nneɣ s tmaziɣt
ayagi yegla-d s wugur-nniḍen n lexṣaṣ n yimukan n lembat n medden
d aṭṭan kan i tuḍneḍ tura aql-ik teḥliḍ
ula ilmeẓyen n taddart-agi fkan-d afus n tallelt i wakken ad tili tmeɣra-agi
ur ččiɣ ara tikermusin
Ɣlin d tinnegnit
mi d-mmektaɣ ad iyi-d-tali tegrint
yelli-s n ferɛun tṣubb s asif akken ad tcucef timeddukal-is llant ttmerriḥent ɣef yiri n wasif
ttif ad xedmeɣ ayen iyi-d-ssutren
ziɣ iḥemmel-iyi ula d netta
acku mmi-s n leḥram-nni n urgaz-iw yettwaṭṭef mi d-tlul kan yelli
atan teffɣem-d ass-a deg waggur n tgedrin
nnan bu lbaṭel ma ibges-d yessawaḍ ɣer lmuḥal
d acu i s-iruḥen
yesseɣli i ufzim ṛṛqem
awal am terṣṣaṣt
wwteɣ sin n wayyuren nekk deg liḥala-nni n lqella n yiḍes
yeqqim igumma ad iruḥ
adeg ur t-yeǧǧi di lqaɛa
telzem-aɣ tkeffart
xerṣum ad jemɛeɣ adrim akken ad nerwel nekk d kahina
ad tt-nezwi alma temmug akkit akkayi d taxlaft
mi teffeɣ seg temdint terǧa s yibeddi ɣer ṭṭerf n ubrid
aɛni mačči d tameṭṭut yurǧan aya
ulac ula d arrat unṣib deg lezzayer i d-yaqqaren nekni d imaziɣen
at isṛayil xedmen akken i s-d-yumeṛ umeɣlal i musa
ma d ulli iḍeɛfen ur sent-isrusu ara iɛekkzan-nni
idrimen llan netta yestufa
i iɛeggalen n tddukkla n twennaḍt amgud d wid n tdukkla n waddal n taddart taḥanut
ad neddari akk talsa
isental akk yellan daxel n uḍris ɛejven-iyi s tesnakta-nsen
ssu-yas a Ḥebrurec i udfel ad iɛanec
yemma-s tneddaṛ yelli-s tagujilt temmal i yixef-is
dɣa ma tzemmreḍ ad aɣ-tefkeḍ taḥawact n tezrigt-agi tis sebɛa n temsizzelt aysat rabaḥ n tezdeg
i seṭṭac yid-sen d dderya i s-d-tesɛa zilfa i si mḥemmed
leḥkem amesbaṭli
ad ruḥeγ akin i tagut
Ɛni d nekk i d illu
ayhuh aqcic-ayi akken d ikɛeb
ad neṛwu aḥewwes di champs-elysées
taqcict-a tuḍen imsigman
yessirid daɣen ussu n yimṭarḥen
d nekk i tlum imi ɣliɣ di tcerket-nni
iṣella-d s widak i s ttmenɣan medden
ffer-it ɣum-it
i d-bnan yispenyulen
atas i fessuset fell-as teɛkumt
yessefhem-iyi-d akk ayen yeḍran yid-i
ad d-rnun tixmirt-nniḍen ad s-ɛiwden aslaɣ i uxxam
taqbaylit mi ara tger abernus tettnawal seksu deg uxxam-is
yella-d usmekti-ines deg kra n tamiwin n bgayet am cmini
mi yesla werǧeǧǧi i tewwurt teṣṣerbek tebreq tkerciwt-is zun s ujenwi teftek
tesεiḍ yelli-m
tegguma ad teṭṭef imi-s
asif err-as-d lɛinser
ulawen-sen unagen ɣer yiwen n umaḍal
acu anida-t
ur ẓriɣ anisa
nnbi muḥemmed yejreḥ deg umennuɣ n uḥud qrib yemmut
Ɣef wakken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ ad yili meqqer uxxam-a n tmussni
yiwen ur yetɛedday ɣef wayeḍ
ixuṣ udlisfus ɣur-neɣ
tesεiḍ taqcict
acḥal i nezha nqeṣṣer
Ṣebren tiyita tewweḍ iγes
yeqqim-d ad isel d acu yellan
ur tebni ara fell-asent ad tent-twali
kra din yeddem-it waḍu
win iččan lḥeqq-is issidir i wallen-is
tewɛer tesnakta-a tamaynut armi llan yirgazen i kkatent tlawin-nsen ɣas ur ten-ifent deg tezmert
annaɣ a yelli i yeḍran yid-m
mačči drus i terwa aɛekkaz ɣer yiselmaden-is deg uɣerbaz amenzu
settin n yimsexsiyen i yellan deg unnar akked sin n yikumya imeqqranen i yettuxeṣṣen deg usexsi n tmes n tkebbunay
wali amizzwer n uselkem
qqersen akk di tmurt iqersen
dɣa amzun d timkerḍit i imedlen tiwura-s s lmut n Ɛebdelḥafiḍ idres
ur tetteɣ ara tikermusin
yerna yenna-d belli “lwilayat akk n tmurt ad ilint"
tettalid din yir tariḥt
ferrneɣ iselsa-w tteffɣeɣ deg yiḍ ttedduɣ d warrac
ulac amgired gar yinelmaden yal wa s wazal-is
di sin ad t-nebnu s zzux d tnefxa
Ɣas berriket tzizwit tament-is ẓidet
temmuɣben sudaba tṣebber tamdakelt-is
Ḥelseɣ-d i usennan
tettwasuddes akken ilaq d ayen i tt-yeǧǧan ad tekcem deg umezruy
dayen teqbel tillawt-is
i d-yellan deg tallit taterkit
ur ttrebbiɣ mmi-s n medden
ul ur yestufa ma d allaɣ iɣunfa
s yiniten ara nẓer
ass-a mi d-ufrareɣ ɣef waman
d tin i d-inedhen deg yiwet n tmacint uṭṭun rebεemya uqbel ad teffeɣ anda-nniḍen
dɣa yenna-d “mbeɛd timilit taneggarut i nexdem d sin yixsimen-a nemsefham ad nkemmel qbel ikayaden"
ssiwɛeṛ aqjun-ik ma tebɣiḍ ad ittɛassa
d netta i d tayri-s tamezwarut
mi ara yezweǧ d taɛezrit ara d-yawi
uɣent ddwawi deg tfekka-w
aṭas n tiktiwin i d-iberrqen ɣer wallaɣ-iw
llan wid d-yuḥnanen fell-asen
icelbaḍ tifiriwin akked ccwami ɣef wudem-is
almi i d-yejba urgaz-is
war tadist tettinit
arraw n said uqasi yidir Ǧaɛfaṛ smaɛil akked mexluf
d acu i t-iwwin ɣur-s
yesnagar ur yessagar ur yeggar yessengar abeggar yerna aḥegger anagar tisigar
ziɣ netta mačči d idrimen i yugi yugi ayen akken i xeddmen
anwa ara lummeɣ
reḍleɣ aselkim-iw i gma
d tiḥerci-s i as-yettaken sser
ccuruṭ n zzwaǧ εeddan tilas
ad yili d azwel n usarag-agi-ines
tanemmirt ɣef usteqsi-agi
ad kksen fell-i sser yirgazen s yir lehḍur
teggul-as s laman i tesɛa deg-s
amdan s aggur yuli
yiwen n lbiru kan i yellan
anda d-ggran wawalen-nni ẓiden ḥlawen
ugar n waya ad tili deg uɣerbaz-a yiwet n tzeqqa i leqdic asegtan
lqesba n bgayet tettwajerred deg tegmi taɣelnawt
ala ul-iw ur t-id-wwiγ ara ttuγ-t-in γef rrif n lebḥeṛ
neḍmeɛ ahat yiwwas taqbaylit ad tili d tutlayt tamezwarut deg tmurt n leqbayel
Ɛeddan yiseggasen n yirrij
ad d-neɣlen yijeɛbuben-iw
tetbeε addal teǧǧa leqraya
acḥal n taggayin yellan
teǧǧa-tt ṣṣeḥḥa
yal mi ara arguɣ ifassen-iw ẓemḍen-d ammas-is ɣur-i
deg tuget amawal-nni ulac-it ilaq ad t-id-tesnulfuḍ
tuz ɣer yiwet n tzeqqa iceɛlen akken ilaq
tisegnit d isem n wallal i umyag-is
ad yesteɛfu wemcum
tacabuṭ-iw tulli-d d asawen
tessker aṭas n wulɣuɣen iɣelnawen n tɣiwant n mεatqa yecban naɛman menad d wiyaḍ-nniḍen
illu iwala-d tarwa n leqbayel dɣa iḥunn-d fell-asen
ur ḥwiǧeɣ ara ad iyi-d-tesmektiḍ
nenwa ddunit d awal kan
tiḥdayin ad cmumḥent
tettxemmim anda-tt tifrat
ilaq ad tt-idfeḍḥeɣ
ad yeɣli ad yekker
Ɣli s irebbi n kenɛan
tameṭṭut iḥerrzen tif tayuga ikerrzen
kkant akin nnig lebɣi-nneɣ tlufa
ur yewwiḍ ara yiwen wass i d-iqqimen
ad awen-ğğeγ takurt yeggunin deffir tuγmas
anda-t wugur tura
d aḥullu i ttḥullun deg wawal
aseggas wis xemsa tzemrem ad teččem si lfakya-nsent
la taẓult la tumlilt ula d timmi-s akken kan i as-tunef teqqaccew
rran-tt-id ɣer yir tudert i deg i tella i tikelt niḍen
wekkden-d i tikkelt-nniḍen s keffu n lebni n tnezduɣin deg taggara n useggas
am wakken ara n-yili uselmed n kra n temsal yerzan tafellaḥt deg yidurar akked useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt d ugama
win ixeddmen tameslayt yeqqen ɣer laṣel ad t-yexdem akken ilaq lḥal mebla ma yekkat deg wiyaḍ
yura daɣen timsirin ɣef tjerrumt n tmaziɣt
ur yettwasezmel ara
musa yura ayen akk i s-d-inna umeɣlal
a taɛeṣṣabt n lmerjan fell-am ad xedmen waklan
bdiɣ la ttergigiɣ ɣef wusu amzun akken gerseɣ seg usemmiḍ
werğin yettu ass deg iwala i tikelt tamezwarut sliman azem
ad nemmeslay akked yinelmaden anda ara nesqerdec timsal ɣef yizerfan n umsider
ad tḥemmleḍ lɣir-ik am yiman-ik
acu akka ara txeddmeḍ ay uccen
anda teddiḍ ad tafeḍ iculliḍen ama d aɣrum ama d tiẓidanin
xedmen i tbanta-nni tizuraz s ddheb yeṣfan ẓḍan-tent am wemrar
ulac iman ur nesɛi tafat
weddef-iten ad slefɣen tamurt
wali amaynut n firefox
ikker dda bṛahim iseǧǧed zdat n iḥitiyen imezdaɣ n tmurt-nni
d tigi i d lbaṛakat swayes i ten-iburek baba-tsen
mi akken tihint fell-as
d weltma-k di tuṭṭda
d timsebridin kan ara yegnen gar iɣallen-iw
a-ten-an warraw n bussaɛd Ḥmidan qasi muḥdameqṛan akked muḥdameẓyan
annaɣ i yeḍran d warraw-iw annaɣ i yexdem ufus-iw
d tarwiḥt i terfed di tɛebbuṭ-is i tt-yesfaqayen s ubeddel-nni
ur d-uɣalen ur d-sawlen
nebɣa ad sneqsen tiram n ulmad
tadwilt n unadi d uḥsab n yigḍaḍ n waman yettɛeccicen i yellan di twilayt
teqqar kan aha tura amek ihi
d wigi i d iderman n wat betṛun
acḥal n yineḍruyen i d-yerna d wasmi i yuweḍ yefka-d tiririt i yimeɣri
ad am-d-mmareɣ d igefran
Ɣas iḍul ubrid d uleqrar-is ad d-tban
akka i aɣ-d-yenna mi i t-nesteqsa ɣef yiḍrisen-is
ur d-ggar ara timuɣliwin-ik ɣef yisental yellan deg uḍris s wudem usrid
tekker tṛuḥ tekkes aḥayek-is terra llebsa-s n taǧǧalt
aseggas-a d win iḥuzan tameddurt n ben muḥemed
ad taweḍ tjumma-s tajemmalt ɣer wazal n mitayen uxemsin n lmitrat di tlemmast n uxxam n tnezduɣt
zemreɣ ad kkeɣ timura zemreɣ ad zegreɣ lebḥur
ameɣlal inna-d i musa Ṛuḥ ɣer ferɛun
ggten ttawilat i yessishilen tudert ɣef umdan
idammen-is rekkmen am useqqi di teccuyt
ula d abeṛṛani izedɣen gar-awen ur itett ara idammen
ffeɣ si tudert-nteɣ ur k-nuḥwaǧ ara
d nettat i d-ssugneɣ yid-i dinna
nekk usiɣ-d ɣer da ar ɣur-k
tayerza n ulɣem ayen ikrez ad t-yeɛfes
teẓriḍ tamurt-a d yir nettat
ifka-yas times i teẓgi
asugen n tegrudt ur nessin tudert yerra ɣer tmucuha n setti-s
yesruɣu-kem usafu kemm terniḍ zzux
tameddurt n temẓi-s di taddart d ttin mu yecfa
aɣyul n leɛbas ɛebbi u rkeb fell-as
acu tebɣiḍ ad am-d-iniɣ
tuki terwiḥt-is send ad tt-ifak s uleqqem
tiyita timserreḥt i terbaɛt taɣelnawt
siwel-as kan ad d-ikcem
bru-as i ucebbub
illa yiwen n wawal uɣalen lulen-d ɛacṛa
akken daɣen i nebɣa ad nheggi isaragen deg tesdawiyin
kkset-as aḥram
ad yili yid-s neɣ ad yeglu yis-s
rnu ɣer-s ddeqs n yisenfaren-nniḍen yettwaxdamen deg ugezdu-nneɣ ɣar tama n leqdic n yal ass
taḥanut aɣerbaz amenzu hacmi d warraw-is
s wakka akken i d-issefra yusef tirga-nni i teḍra
ad as-tiniḍ d tuddza n umehraz i yellan deg wul-is
ad awen-d-iniɣ saḥ saḥ kan
uɣal ɣer tmeṭṭut-ik akked warraw-ik
iles n tsusmi
mbeɛd mi teɛedda twaɣit-agi teḍra-d tayeḍ i tt-yecban
zik-nni ttekksen-d ustu seg taḍuṭ
ur ttmuqqulemt ara ɣer deffir
ma txedmeḍ ayen n dir ad k-itbaɛ usajuṛ
d nettat ara yeẓren sser-aki ameqran iḍerrun deg ass n tmeɣra uqbel-is
awennet di tazwara
d tameɛlalt n tedmarin mmi-s iɣunza tuṭṭḍa
seg ulac yuɣal yella yedder
arrac ttazallen ḥafi
di ddunit-a ittruḥun tettuɣal
ur yezmir ara ad d-isali azegrir n iɣewwaṛen
imceḍ-nni ad t-nessers ɣef lḥaǧa
Ččiɣ tament d wudi ssegreɣ amerɣennis
ad ruḥeɣ ɣer tahran
anwa arebit ur nenguga
akken yebɣu yuɣal di rrif tettidir-d ɣur-s tarwa
tamezwarut ur kkat tameṭṭut alemma teqneḍ-tt
siwel-asent kan ad d-kecment
aḍaṛ ileḥḥun ittawi-d neɣ ittaǧǧa-n
nekk ad qucceɣ tamurt
idurar gren tiγri
ihi nekkni seksu-nni i d-nečča d aleǧǧam
ur tettmuqulemt ara ɣer deffir
mbeɛd mi mḥezwarent snat n tuddar-a saḥel di buzgan akked lqelɛa n at Ɛebbas deg yiɣil Ɛli di bgayet
d axxam-im i kem-inefεen a tislit
win yebɣan lesfenǧ yefk nanna-s
lebɣi ad t-id-nessisen
win yeṭṭsen ar azal ad d-yettazzal
ziɣ tella yiwet am nekk
gedlen-iyi ccna
mi ara tnehrem ur hedret ara deg tilifun
ttakiɣ-d tikwal deg yiḍ
gar tuɣmas d wugel
ugar n ṣa tmerwin n tuddar i ijerrden iman-nsent i tezrigt-agi tamaynut
jelleb s igenni ad d-tuɣaleḍ ɣeṛ lqaɛa
yuli ɣer tqeṛṛabt akken ad yejdeb dɣa yufa dinna amṛabeḍ n taddart n at Ɛisi
ad sen-txedmeḍ s ddheb ayen iɣef ara rsen
tikwal ulac tamella deg ugama
ul ur yettaweḍ d amɣar
s ufella yecbaḥ yerqem daxel mi d-teldiḍ yerka
leεyub ttraǧun tewser imiren akk i d-ttlalen
iwakken azekka ur ittuɣal ara d aẓekka
tameṭṭut d tagrawla
cḍeh d ccḍeḥ mačči d tikli
d aḥullu i tettḥullu deg wawal
walaɣ ilaq ad nerwel seg tmurt-a
anwa ara ten-yamnen
deg temẓi tenna-yi yemma ɣer temɣer yenna-yi baba
nxeddem aseɛlem deg merra taɣulin
yak a yemma nniɣ-am lḥeq imeɣban ɣur rebbi i yella ḥedd ur t-yewwi d taḥawact
amek ara tegzuḍ amdan
ur ndimeɣ ara mi ɣriɣ tamaziɣt
tuker-as-d amecwar send ad yerr tadimt i wallen-is
siwa ma yedda yid-nneɣ gma-tneɣ amecṭuḥ ara nuɣal
axaṭer mi ara ṛuḥent ad swent ulli-nni sseḍfarent
cwiṭ kan i d-ǧǧiɣ seg yiwen n ṭṭaq akken ad yeffeɣ wabbu
uccen am win i as-d-yefkan abeqqa
tameṭṭut d lsas argaz d ajgu alemmas
ur zeggir ara i tkeryas d yifurguten
bɣan ad sretmen akk tizeɣwa-nni
a wer tekkreḍ
tameṭṭut yellan d yelli-s n laḥlal ɣur-sen d tin ur ẓerren ara
abeddel n ccɣel d astaɛfu
ur nɣiɣ ur ukireɣ
ad d-uɣaleɣ ɣer wazalen
gma ur d-tesɛi yemma
kahina ur iyi-tesxaqay ara am tullas-niḍen i yezgan d asfuǧǧeɣ
mazal-iyi ddreɣ
musa yexdem ayen akk i s-d-yumeṛ umeɣlal akken i yexdem
teldi-d allen-is s faccal
ikker wabbu deg walim ḥedd ur yeɛlim
d tikkelt tamezwarut ara d-nerzu ɣer da maca nwala-d yiwen n uzayez aqbayli i iḥemmlen idles
acḥal qqaren-as medden gzem-itt
imiren nekk ad yi-nɣen ma d kemm ad kem-ǧǧen ad tidireḍ
Ẓriɣ kan ma tessusmeḍ ɣef lehlak-a acku tuggadeḍ ad hedren fell-ak madden
heddren akk ɣef tikkelt
yeɣli-d igenni ɣef tmurt
tella tezdayt di sseḥra akken‑nni γezzif yixef-is
els ayen yeḥman
nniɣ-as ur yesɛi ara azref ad iyi-iṣewwer s liḥala-nni
ad terr tirigliwin ara yeṭfen lxiḍ
deg ubrid temlal ṛebɛa mačči zaɛma tmuqqel-iten
musa yerra-as wagi d aɛekkaz
Čenčen tizebgatin i am-d-fkiɣ
amek i tettɛeyyiceḍ iman-im akked yelli-m
teqqim huda ṭṭerf n ugezdu n taɛrabt deg Ḥesnawa
ttnadiɣ ɣef tansa-ya
iceyyeε ixeddamen-is i wakken ad as-d-muqqlen uccen
ccɣel-ik xdem-it tregleḍ imeẓẓuɣen-ik
wissen anwa i as-tt-yedɛan
tafekka n werǧeǧǧi yeǧǧan tameddurt tenteḍ ɣer ufurek n tzemmurt
nnan ur yettali wass ɣef win yewwin daεwessu imawlan
tutlayt tayemmat i d lsas n tmusni
tibuwaḍin n ddwa tilmawin
nxeddem daɣen tazabut i usnerni n tzemmar n uqcic
tettezmumug i tlawin-niḍen war tuggdi d leḥya
atan temmeslay fell-i tihin
ur ttagad a yemma lḥeq imeɣban ɣer rebbi i yella ḥedd ur t-yewwi d taḥawact
Γef waya akk amdan ara yegren afus deg uslugen n tutlayt d tamasit tameqqrant
ad ruḥeγ ad awen-ğğeγ berγut i la yessemγayen acciwen
akked unemhal d yiselmaden d umaswaḍ
nettat i t-iεewnen aṭas deg leqdic-a
aḥric ayeffus n yidis asamar
ur iyi-ttaǧǧa ara weḥd-i
zgiɣ kerseɣ i unyir-iw heggaɣ i umcečew d wid iyi-ittɛayaren
awal n taggara i tdiwennit-agi
ad d-tcafɛem daɣen mkul amenzu n warraw-nwen
teɣli-as tadist yiwen ur yesli
musa yuli s adrar dɣa tagut tɣumm adrar
tessaked-it seg tṣegnint armi d tifednin
kra n teflukin atent-a deg ugelmim
akken kan ad fehmen akk yimferǧen
laban isemma-as yagar saduta yeɛni aɛemmuṛ n cchada
allal n usiweḍ i icudden gar leqdicat n tuddsa akked umsider
ahat llant tmental n tismin n tdamsa neɣ ahat n tsertit
telliḍ tceɣleḍ
mi aken i ttruɣ
bɣu neɣ qim
acu kan tamsalt-agi n uselmed s tmaziɣt deg ugezdu n tmaziɣt d tamsalt n yal aselmad
s wakka meẓyan ur ifki ara lqima i lḥeqq-is n umenzu
tura akka akken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ
tuɣaleḍ ass-a d imqezzeb
d acu i ten-iwwin ɣur-sent
mazal ur iyi-d-terriḍ ɣef usteqsi-inu
aman n tala zeddigen yeṣfan
yecɣeb-itt armi tuɣal tekreh iman-is
ur ttaǧǧa ara tarwa-k ɣef yiri n ubrid
uḍan tafat s wudem
iffeɣ-d gma-s deffir-s s lxiḍ-nni azeggaɣ deg ufus-is
ass amezwaru n waggur wis ɛecṛa banent-d tqucac n idurar
ad sɛun gar tlatin d rebεin n yiseggasen
kem d taqezzabt
asmi d-yeḥḍeṛ ukeččum γer ustudyu tekkes-as-tt tebγest
aha tura barka imeṭṭi
yekker ad iruḥ yenna-as umɣar-nni ur tt-tettawiḍ ara
ma tayri d leḥram nɛemmed tijujar
yella-d usmekti n yineḍruyen n tesɛeṭac maggu alef utsɛemya uwaḥed utmanyin
qqaren-iyi-d nḥemmel axeddim-im
tettḥelil-iten ad rren lwelha ɣur-s
a ddin Ṛebbi ayen akka ifrax ttafgen izgaren ala
yal wa s tikta-s yedder
teṭṭfeḍ tabrat-iw
ifadden-is akk sellawit
iqeddacen-is iɛeggalen n uẓeṭṭa n usiḍen n yigḍaḍ d yilemẓiyen n umussu asdukklan
sel-d mliḥ
ečč-d mi llan lwaldin
nebɣa ad d-nessekcem imusnawen n umezruy akken ur nɣelleḍ ara
tessneḍ-as i tmacint-a
ufiɣ allaɣ-is d igenni war tilisa
tiqqit-a n talwit i d-yegran deg tudert-iw
ur tgi ara isurifen ɣer sdat
ur yezmir ara a d-ildi afaylu
iderginen
ssaweḍ akeddab ar tawwurt
wali amek mozilla tettmuddu azal i tudert-inek tabaḍnit nnig n wayen-nniḍen
bɣiɣ ad iliɣ d talast
ar ass-a urεad i banen lecɣal n usenfar akken iwata
melmi ara ifak ddwa-nni
yeqmeḍ-as imi
ggten ɣur-neɣ yizruzaɣ isuriyen
lmuqeddem i t-imuqlen ad yini belli amdan-nni yenǧes
tekfa-d leqraya-s di tesdawit n lmulud at mɛemmer
amulli-w mačči d ameggaz tikelt-a
msefhament ayen yebɣun yeḍru ur qebblent ara ad zewǧent d yiwen seg yiɛeṭṭaren-nni
am wakken daɣen i d-mmeslayen ɣef wamek tteddunt temsal di tuddar n leqbayel
axaṭer dinna i s-d-iḍher yillu mi akken yerwel ɣef gma-s
Ḥaca winna i yellan deg uxxam
ad d-tenser seg lebḥer n tatut
yettɛeddi wakud ttaruɣ ciṭ ciṭ
aɣref ileḥḥun s tɛellamt n weɣref-iḍen ḥseb-it yemmut
mi teɛreḍ ad temmeslay ad tt-teṭṭef tɛuggent
leqdic-agi d atiknikan yebna ɣef tiktiwin tineggura deg tetiknulujiyin timaynutin
ur tessaweḍ ara ad d-tass deg wass acku ɛussen-tt wat taddart
mi nekker ad d-nruḥ negla-d s tquciḍt n yisɣaren
ayen tettbibbi tmeṭṭut tugar adrar
izuyaḍ ttemseḍfaren
yiwi-d lbak ad iruḥ ɣer lafak
tiɣri tecceḍ i yiles
ugar n xemsmeyya n yimelyaṛen ara d-imud i wakken ad kemmlen lecɣal n tnezduɣin-a
deg wass n lɣeṛga yif-it win izedlen
akken teẓram nekni ur nqeddec ara akked tuddsiwin tunṣibin
niqal tella d tidukla syin ɣer-s tuɣal d tuddsa akken i t-id-nniɣ
semman-iyi miḥyaf win ixedmen kra ad t-yaf
heggan-as akeṛṛus-is i ferɛun dɣa iṛuḥ s netta s lɛeskeṛ-is
nniɣ-am kemm a yelli
ur iṣliḥ i wacemma
ad yeqqen lḥenni lbaz imkeḥḥel
tfehmem ayagi meṛṛa
amek akka d acu lberhan-ik sken-d akka d acu umi tzemreḍ
wali asebter dev tools challenger
ad yuzur ad yegluda
imawlan ilaq-asen waṭas n ṣṣber
meyyez qbel aneggez
ur tetteɣ ara tibexsisin
ccah ccah a tamɣart mmi-m yefka-yi taryalt
Ɣliɣ d tinnegnit
ur ẓriɣ ara ɣef wacḥal ara tt-fakeɣ
sfuǧǧuɣent kan ɣef usewwi d ucebbeḥ
ad t-qnen yeslan i lehna n yal ass
tḥettem ɣef zahra ad teddu ɣer yimawlan n temɣart-is di taddart
tettewteḍ tiyita n lmut
taqendurt n teslatin
Ḥebruri taṣebḥit a-tt-an tusa-d twaɣit
tidukla i uḥraz d usnerni n tgemmi tagamant tamezrayt n yiderginen
d acu i t-iwwin ɣur-sen
d lmut ara mmten
Σerḍeɣ-t-id ad yekkes lxiq yeẓẓel iḍarren
d lqanun ara yilin i lebda ɣef ddemma n umeɣlal
lqesba n bgayet tucaɛ aṭas deg temdint
iwweḍ ɣer tama n yiwen n lbir isteɛfa dinna
ad as-zluɣ aḥuli
nɣant-iyi tiram tisemmaḍin deg tallit-nni
ad t-segnen ɣer lqaɛa ad t-id-llsen
ur gziɣ ara ayen win yellan d ameɣbun ur d as-tberru ara
imi d-newweḍ ɣer da
selbec ṭṭṛa itran
ad qqimen d aklan-nwen i lebda
ad ruḥen anda bɣan ad d-qqlen alamma d din
s kra i neɛteb ffɣent-aɣ tirga mxalfa
tɛedda ṭhur
Ḥerz-ik a mmi s lebda
tenniḍ-iyi-d ay ibki neɣ
beɛden ɣef wallen n wid i ten-yessnen
lǧar-inu d ayaẓiḍ
i ak-yefkan lerbayeḥ aṭas
asif wis sin isem-is giḥun izzi-d i tmurt meṛṛa n kuc
ad k-iniɣ kečč a mmi
tettnadi ɣef tmental i t-yeǧǧan ad ibeddel
Ɣef teɣzi n tmesbanit-a ddan yisdawanen s umgarad n tektiwin d yiniten deg talwit s tuɣac n ddkir
udem-im yezga gar wallen-iw
tudert d kemm i tt-icebbḥen ul-iw mi t-tkecmeḍ
serdeɣ gar yiẓekwan
aččadur aberkan ur nemgarad ɣef yiččaduren niḍen s wacemma
yegra-d mmi-s ad yemdegger d wussan-is
tim-iyi-t a baba Ṛebbi
winna s wacu i ttgallan meṛṛa yirgazen
neɣ ad yewwet ubeḥri fell-am
ad kksen zzefra i nneɛma ad kksen tiṭ i yelli ma tella deg laɛnaya n nnbi d lawliya
awimt-t-id seg wasif
acuɣer i tṛuḥem
cfu ɣef wass n usteɛfu ɛzel-it-id d ass imqeddes
tettak-aɣ-d afud d lebɣi ad neṭṭef deg-s
Ɛziz aṭas fell-i
illu yenna daɣen i musa nekk d ameɣlal
d ayen i aɣ-yesferḥen aṭas
tecmumeḥ dihya s usmesxer ɣef wayen i as-tenna tmeṭṭut-nni
amzun akken yella win s-yerran ccac ɣef waṭṭiwen-is
iṭṭewṭew am uqjun mi ara s tiniḍ  ṛṛeẓ
akken i d-nniɣ yakan deg tazwara nesmenyif leqdic i icudden ɣer yisenfaren n uɣbalu yeldin
amedya nexdem yakan ussan n useɛlem ɣef yisafaren n usuddem n uyefki
a lḥif-ik ma d kečč i d argaz
allen-is tizegzawin lxint-d seg yimetti
ferrnen kan tid yeččuren d leḥya d sser
yuzzel fell-am yimru n yimedyazen
zemmem qemmem ṭṭef immi-m sussem
taklit ad as-d-tettagem
yekra taxxamt deg yiwet n lasiti deg temdint n machad
weεrit lehdur n tsumta
nessugun ibeɛɛac
ad wen-d-iqqim wass-nni d lqanun i lebda si lǧil ɣer lǧil
taqbaylit tuɣ amḍiq wis tlata deg umaḍal deffir n teglizit akked telmanit
tettenheqqi ad as-d-tesleḍ seg uzniq
s wakka ad trefdeḍ aqerru-m zdat n medden meṛṛa
qbel ad d-nuɣal temmeɣ teččur-aɣ-d aḍellaɛ n lxeḍra
nnan temẓi tettufaraṣ s lḥir i ttεeddin wussan
ad am-tent-geɣ d tallest
llan daɣen yisenfaren ɣer sdat maca ɣef wakken ttwaliɣ ad ɛeṭṭlen
ad ten-ḥesben am wakken d lɛar
lalla-m d tasedda yehban s ṣṣifa
amzun akken taqcic-nni d taɣerdayt izemren ad as-teffer deg teɣmert neɣ deg uxjiḍ
seg ččan yimawlan xilla
lliɣ ɛeryan tesselsem-iyi
yessenɛet amawal-a ameqqran akken diɣen i d-yella umeslay fell-as
iteddu-yi deg lebɣi
akka alemma d ṭhur
d acu i kent-iwwin ɣur-s
yuli-d ujṛad ɣef tmurt n maṣer iɣumm tamurt meṛṛa
yeṛwa taguni iɣeẓran
d aḥerfi maḍi wungal-is mačči d ayen meqqren
d acu i kem-iwwin ɣur-s
a yemma lebḥer yeḥcer
ass wis sebɛa lmuqeddem ad yuɣal
tettemɛebbar d imeṭṭi ɣef yixef n lecfur itt-yugaren
isawel-asen
ad asen-iniɣ tanemmirt i leḥwal-nni n tḍebbaxt
tesɛiḍ zher imi seg tnezduɣt tasdawant i kem-id-ceggɛen
ad tesɛeddiḍ snat n tzuraz-nni n ddheb di snat n txelxalin-nni yellan ɣef yiran n ufella n tbanta
tettezɣuɣud gar wallen
ad yeqqen lḥenni lbaz akyusi
bɣiɣ lukan ad ččeɣ
tuɣal teffeɣ-itt lkerra
nekk ẓerreɣ iman-iw d amdan kan i d-ilulen deg ukerra-agi n lqaɛa
akka iy-d-nnan
win ara ineɛlen baba-s neɣ yemma-s lmut ara yemmet
ul-nneɣ zeddig
keččmeɣ deg tillas akken ur iyi-tgezzem ara tuzzma i yuɣen aẓar deg timmad-iw
yerna-d wulɣu n tenmehla n tɣellist taɣelnawt d akken ad ilin yiɣallen n laman deg berra n wammasen
werǧeǧǧi-nni yelhan deg unebdu d zzhu ur yufi s wayes ara yessedhu takerciwt-is
ad mmeslayeɣ aṭas akked yemma d yessetma
ayɣer ur zmireɣ ara ad iliɣ am yimdanen akk
tezdeg teqqel tumes
d izri kan i d adɣen
tɛedda kan ciṭ i xemsa utlatin n yiseggasen di leɛmer-is
lqibla tenna amek i d-txedmeḍ i yiman-ik abrid
seg ucrured ɣar tikli
leḥsab a-t-an wacḥal i d-tesqam tnezduɣt aqiḍun n cchada
maca deg yiḍ mi fetren yimdanen aṭas n leqdic i d-yettilin sɣur tiddukkliwin-a iseg i d-nezwar
baba i d-tenna s tugdi
Ɣef yiri n umdun
sebɛa n wussan ara tfeṛḥem zdat n umeɣlal illu-nwen
ur iyi-d-steqsan ara ugar ɣef yiman-iw
sumata axnunnes i yekkaten lqaεa akked yisaffen d axnunnes akruran neɣ d asnudran
ayen i d-yernan sser i tceqquft-a d isefra-nni i d-tettawi
ikna lqedd-nkent
ad yaɣ tasga deg umelɣiɣ
lidya tuɣ-d aɣyul tzuzer tiwlafin-is deg facebook
tabburt n ufrag ad tili d ẓẓerb ara yesɛun ɛecrin n iɣallen
ad d-yawi awren-nni i lmuqeddem
aɛalṭar-nni ixdem-it s tencirin yerna yeqqim d ilem
tessirid ijeqḍuṛen tesmeḥsis i zuhra
muqel kan d acu tferneḍ d tagara i umecwar-ik
ccah la tetteddu tfarres
dduriɣ-ak talaba
ibennun lebṛuj ɣer cceṭ
ayla-s ad t-id-yekkes ula seg teẓrut
aqjun anmeḍri ur itett iɣsan n uxxam
lbaz iɛac sufella-s tasekkurt deg yiẓuran-is
sidi ad k-iḥrez ad k-iṣun
cwiṭ kan akka attah teldi-d tewwurt-nni
syenna yasuɛ ikemmel abrid
teslemdeḍ-iyi tudert tefkiḍ-iyi afud
ugin ad setḥin ɣef yiman-nsen
tefkiḍ-tt i jjiḥ
thedder nek la tt-ttwaliɣ
tebda asnuffes d usuḍu s lemɣawla amzun yenneqḍaɛ deg-s wuffu
ur tt-mmarkan ur s-xdimen lekwaɣeḍ n tmettant
issemlal xemsa n tẓerbiyin akken issemlal setta-nniḍen akken
ur iteffer fell-as kra
anda tewḍem
tisednan la nnif
azal n tmanyin deg meyya n yidlisen ara yersen di temkarḍit tamaynut ad d-ttwaddmen seg tsekla taqbaylit
tikwal yettaweḍ almi d aseggas neɣ sin i wid iḥekmen s ɛecra n yiseggasen d asawen
tenniḍ-iyi-d tḥewseḍ akk iberdan
akken kan i ttḥulfuɣ s tidet lsiɣ kra
naɛman nadir d yiwen n yilemẓi i yesεan tmanya uɛecrin n yiseggasen
lḥeqq-is n ucafaɛ ittalas aseggas
wwteɣ aṭas iman-iw akken ur ttxemmimeɣ ara fell-as
ad d-yeddem imeqyasen seg twemmust-nni
llufan-is wis kraḍ i d-yusan d aqcic s wacu tefreḥ
dinna ulac win ara tt-iɣunzun
qerrceɣ-am egg awackan i yinebgi i am-d-ikecmen
zgan d leḥsab yuli yeṭṭer
yunez-am wul yekna
mi kem-sɛiɣ yid-i ul-iw yess-m yetwennes
teẓra zwaǧ-is d tamsalt n wussan kan
tella deg yiwet tkerrust tettqabal-d tawwurt tameqqrant n tkebbanit
tuffɣa meqqren mbeɛd tin n tefsut n yimaziɣen
yewwet-it yerra-t d azegzaw am nnil
yeɛreḍ amek ara tt-id-yerr ar leɛqel-is akken ad tethedden
ula d netta ad yuɣal d agdud ula d netta ad yimɣur
s yiɣil aberkan i d-yusa uɣrum acebḥan
qqlent ɣer rrif
ahat yessetḥa neɣ ur yesɛi ara tabɣest a t-id-yini akka srid udem s udem
senqes tanhart deg yiḍ
yiwen n wass ad d-tuɣaleḍ alamma d da
dɣa tezmer ad ak-tessiweḍ teswiɛt ad tbeddleḍ ayen i d-tsumreḍ uqbel
sebɛa n wussan mbeɛd wten-d waman d iḥemmalen ɣef ddunit
awimt-iyi-d taciṭa
ma d kenwi ad yi-tilim d tagelda n lmuqeddmin d lǧens imqeddes
kecmet si tebburt iḍeyqen
kečč ay isli ay amnay aras
igzem-as afriwen
ay amuḍin ma ad teččeḍ
i d-iḥal s tezmert-is
yekker rebbi i uleqqem
taṣebḥit aya i d-nemlal
Ɣezzifeɣ tuyat-iw hrawit am yirgazen
iεreq ubrid
wali akk taggayin i k-yerzan nekkni newɛed-ik ak-d-nazen kan ayen tebɣiḍ
werǧin tḥulfa s tiẓeṭ
ayen tebɣu telsa-t ilaq ad tt-qadreɣ
d leqdic i d-thegga tddukkla tadelsant imnar n tdukli n at Ɛissa mimun
ini-yi-d amek ara iliɣ
ad yeqqen lḥenni lbaz ameẓyan
asteqsi-agi yuɣal d asentel n yal ass
at isṛayil ugaden iffeɣ-iten leɛqel dɣa ttɛeggiḍen ɣer umeɣlal
keččini ay isli tissas n yizem aweḥci
i d-yewwi uɛemṛani
ma ifat-ik wawal ini-as sliɣ ma ifat-ik wučči ini-as ṛwiɣ
gar zik d tura deg tmurt n leqbayel
ddren amzun d yiwen umdan
d ass n uzɣal yesruɣen deg unebdu
isem-is i tesnawit ideg teɣriḍ
yes-m dunnit ur tfut
mi yessers uḥeddad afḍis irefd-it mmi-s
teččiḍ seksu d aleǧǧam
cukkeɣ d lawan n yiḍes
neẓra ur nezmir ara ad nidir akken i lebda
yenna-ak ur kkat tameṭṭut
ad kkreɣ kan ad sahleɣ
ad yeglu yis-sen
ttagaden abeddel
si musa n taddart ufella ad isserɣ ayagi deg tqeṛṛabt n si muḥ aɛebbas
get i mmi afud n ddkir
tebɣa tizit ad aɣ-tessufeɣ seg uxxam
a tamɣart bḍu s wul-im akken nella merra d arraw-im
lameɛna s lḥeqq ara tcaṛɛeḍ mmi-s n tmurt-ik
iḥesnawen meṛṛa xedmen ayen i d-yumeṛ umeɣlal i meɛtub d ferḥat
bla ccwer
musa yerra-asen acuɣer akka i tettnadim ccwal
wissen ma ahat ad yezzi wass ad yettu ayen yeḍran yid-s
i yeksan ddaw n udrar
wid yellan yakkan deg unejmuɛ amezwaru
tiweḍ teqcict ɣer wurti i yellan nnig n tzeɣwa tiqdimin
yezmer ad yili n twennaḍt yezmer ad yili n tedbelt neɣ deg useddu n tɣiwant n yal ass
mačči lukan iyi-tunfem ad staɛfuɣ axir
ameɣlal inna-as daɣen err afus-ik deg iciwi-k
yuɣ-itent di tgeẓẓal
ccɣel-agi n win ara ixedmen adlis n uselmed meqqer aṭas
wali akk ayen i d-yeffɣen deg ublug-nneɣ
d tuɣalin s akal
yurad wudem s useɣwen yegzem s tfukal yezdem ɣef ugudi yezḍem
yeccelqef-itt s yiwen n yiɣil

sya ar yimir s umedyez ad d-nettmlil deg yiflisen umellil

tekuferra
iεeggalen n tdukkla asirem guraya d warrac i yerzan ɣer takkuct sεeddan ass yelhan nezzeh

Ẓṛiɣ aqjun
kečč a lɛaziz Ḥimi ay umliḥ n lehḍur
kkreɣ mrawet n tikkal ad sfeqdeɣ amecṭuḥ

ahat yella

Ṛuḥem tura
wwet tom
tanemmirt i tmeṭṭut taqbaylit s demma
inna-asen d ṣṣeḥḥ taqbuct-iw a tt-teswem
Ɣur-i amdan ur nessin ara i tmucuha ttsemmiɣ-as amdan ilem
yeṛṛeẓ
ikurdan d tilkin fell-as ay teddun
ass mi d-nekcem lezzayer nufa-tt-id d lɣaba ukerruc
ihi ayen s ara xedmeɣ jmeɛ-it mi kreɣ ad ruḥeɣ efk-iyi-ten-id
yekcem s axxam uqcic iban ɣef wudem-is leḥcer
yebɣa ula d nekk ad d-ffɣeɣ am netta d taqbaylit taḥrurt tanifit
yal yiwet s wacu tezmer ad tennaɣ
yuba yeǧǧa leqraya
s lkil i tettektilim ara wen-ktilen
ur yewwiḍ ara ad d-isali taggayin

ldi imi-m

tsufri

asmi d-lulen ufan-d iman-nsen myeḥmalen
nugem-d
tikli n ɣriba tettqerrib ɣer tzeqqa-nni

ad as-teṭṭef deg leggam

temmutem
isefra imesden tamuɣli

igen tom

anwa wa

siwzel-it

tɣaḍ-iken
d ṭṭman gren-tt tuli
armi tmeqqer i d-tuɣal ɣer tmurt-is tanaṣlit rǧawna
anwa i d ameẓẓuɣ-ik ay aɣerbi
isem teɣzi d tiɣmi n wallen n teqcict
ttsetḥiɣ
yeṛǧa yuba nnuba-s
xali ad s-issuref ddnub-is imiren ad s-ittwasemmeḥ
aṭas i d-ittusawlen lameɛna drus i yettwaxtaṛen
ass-a nessaweḍ akken ad ten-id-nexlaq di tmurt merra
yusef awcic d aselway n useqqamu aɣerfan n ugezdu n tizi uzzu
aqlih deg ubrid tedduɣ ɣer yiwen n umeddakel-iw
ma diri-tt ɣas kkes-itt
txedmeḍ
abrid duga duga
ad m-ittwaxdem akken i tebɣiḍ
d ṣṣeḥḥ Ṛṛuḥ itḥemmes lameɛna lǧetta ur tezmir ara
bla ccek tella kra n tin i t-yewwin deg ubrid n lkaf
awalen awalen
ad d-tessufeɣ tasɣunt i yettuɣalen d tugna ɣef leqdic i tga
iẓẓel afus-is dɣa yuɣal iṣeḥḥa am ufus-nniḍen
neɣ ad tendemmeḍ i wussan-ik
ma ulac win ik-yettalasen kra deg dunnit-ik ur k-id-yewwiḍ
ttwarun s usekkil alatini ɣer tansa talikṭrunit n tdukkla
iṭṭef-d yuba amkan
baba-twen n igenwan yeẓra belli teḥwaǧem ayagi meṛṛa
s leqdeṛ
aqel-iyi-n gar yidurar tasumta-inu d ileggi

tufam-t

yuba yermes

tettfuḥuḍ
yifen ameqqran n at baɛziz

ruḥet

meḥsub
deg usečču ara rren arazen aseggas-a
ad yeṛwu tiẓidanin akanaf ad yeswecwic
ayen texdem ass-nni yessemɣer-itt deg tiṭ-iw
Ḥemmleɣ dima amek akken i d-tettecmumuḥeḍ ɣur-i
ssawleɣ i uɛiwen
nnḍeɣ-am lemlaḥ s ufus aẓelmaḍ tiṭ tezger akkin agemmaḍ deg laɛnaya n nnbi Ɛumar

iqerreb ɣer wis sin inna-as akken

d lɛib
cucfen

ma tebɣiḍ
