muqel kan
wwiɣ-tent-id ad ay-iceḍḥent
lmeɛna-s ur tt-kkat alemma tesɛa dderya
iwwi-t cciṭan ɣer temdint iqedsen
iffeɣ-d yasuɛ si lǧameɛ iqedsen dɣa iṛuḥ
yeqbel tom
d Ṛebbi i yeẓran leṣlaḥ
i d-tuzneḍ a nnbi ɣer-sen
ihi amek
ansi i awen-d-tusa tikti n lebni-ines d acu i d iswi-nwen deffir waya
awi-d kan ur tettili ara tmes anebdu-a
Ɣur-wat axaṭer ɣer twaɣit i tetteddum
neẓra tettenɛettabem maca ad ternum kra
akken yennum ixeddem deg lqahwa ɣur baba-s
d timeyyatin n tlawin yal yiwet di taɣult-is
teḍṣa
iha iha a taqabubt n tnina
Ččan dɣa nsan deg udrar-nni
akken yennum ixeddem deg lqahwa ɣer baba-s
i lebɣi-nneɣ ad nessnerni
tenεettab
teɛṛeḍ
inimt-aɣ-d tidet
ad t-ifk i yimceyyeɛ d asfel n uḥussu n ddnub
acu-t uxeddim n urgaz-im
tbeddel teswiεt
tinna mačči n wudmawen-nwen
tezdeɣ deg yiwet n taddart deg udrar
argaz xerṣum xas d bu lehyuf neɣ d aceffar yezmer ad iḥulfu i tudert
rezzun-d fell-as merra
ssusfen-t rnan wwten-t s uɣanim s aqerru
limin n wuḥdiq deg wul
ičča seksu d aleǧǧam
gar-asent tamikanikt trisiti d tsenselkimt
yeɛṛeq tom
nemmeslay ɣef urkaḍ n uzref n tmeṭṭut di kra n tegnatin
yewwi-d ad yettwasemres s teqseḥ usaḍuf ɣef wid yebɣan ad kksen azal i tmeṭṭut
d tullist i d-bdiɣ rriɣ-tt ɣer rrif am yiḍrsen-iw akk
shum tom
win ur t-id-newwi aseggas-a ad t-id-yawi qabel
acu tebɣiḍ ad d-tiniḍ
seksu
nekk ur ẓriɣ ara acu ara ḥulfuɣ
tezzi tnifift n ttaṛ
steqneε
teǧǧa-yaɣ ṣṣeḥḥa
mkul yiwen deg-wen ad iqqim deg umkan-is yiwen ur itteffeɣ seg uxxam-is ass wis sebɛa
tbaneḍ mačči am tid-nni i d-ttceyyiɛen ussan-a iɛeddan
qbel ad d-nruḥ negla-d s ugdur n waman
wali amagrad
zwiremt
ad ten-lseɣ ad nesreɣ ɣer berra
ruḥ awer d-tuɣaleḍ
nnan win ijerrben lmeḥna yeẓra meskin rẓaget
ha-t-an yimensi-k a baba iban telluẓeḍ
anelmad ad yili am ccix-is beṛka-t
yekker-as ussan-a uḥraz n tẓegwa n waɣir n bgayet
ibgaytiyen i tettwalim akka ur tettuɣalem ara ad ten-twalim
iruḥ sseɛd-is di twaɣit
Ɣas telliḍ gar-aneɣ
nnan-as a sidi ad d-ldint wallen-nneɣ
ad ruḥeɣ ɣer tahran baba yexdem laksida yerreẓ uḍar-is
acu ixeddem
tuɣalem d imexlal
yuɣal am ucewcew mi yečča imensi a t-tafeḍ yekcem usu
amek tura
xedmet
ilul muḥemmed uharun deg tefrit tamnaḍt n uqbu di bgayet
tikkwal yettuḥettem fell-as ad iɛeṭṭel di lxedma alarma d iḍ
yal tafaska teṭṭafar-itt tesɣunt
d tamerbuḥt tmeɣra yes-s
mačči s yisem-ik i nessufuɣ leǧnun
Ɣef xemsa-agi ixuṣṣen ad tesnegreḍ tamdint meṛṛa
Ṭṭalem
anef-iyi iman-iw bɣiɣ ciṭ n tsusmi
yeḥbes deg laxla ulac akk din tudert
yasuɛ inna-asen ur ḥwaǧen ara ad ṛuḥen
teẓram ad zeggren i talliyin n lḥers
d ayen i izemmren ad ten-iḍuṛ
la ken-sseqdacent
yefka-d ṭṭya am tin n udfel
muḥemmed uharu d yiwen deg-sen ɣas ulac-it maca s wayen i d-yeǧǧa d leqdic d yigerrujen yella
bedren-d isem-ik di tejmaεt
wehmeɣ amek ur teεqileḍ gma-m s yiman-is
sellek-it
yettuɣal-d yal mi ara d-yeḥḍer waggur n yebrir
ziɣen d taseḥḥart i izedɣen din
sliɣ i lbarud yendeh rsas igezzem tizemrin
bexlaf ṣṣebyan deg dduḥ ɣer wasif n txerrubin
tinnegnit ad nejgugel
amer twennɛeḍ iḍelli aseḥseb ass-a afus-ik si yal lxir ad d-yenqeb
d tameṭṭut yesmaren leɛṭer ɣef uqerru n yasuɛ
ini-as
win issebruyen ad d-igri deg iɛwiqen
tikwal llant tuddar s sin n leǧwamaɛ di lawan ideg timesgidiwin ttenqasent rennunt
urgant
yefka-as isem n ai-da ɣef yisem n tmussnawt di tsenselkimt ada lovelace
qim kan d yiman-im ur d-ttban ara
dhem
ad ten-iru uɛdaw-ines
ass-a yeḥma yelha kan i rrwaḥ ɣer teftist
mi yezger umeqran ruḥ s ttawil kan
ad d-ffɣeɣ seg layas i izedlen fell-i
yiwen wass i tkeḥḥel tyaziḍt yečča-tt wuccen
ameɣlal inna-as-d anwa i d-ifkan imi i wemdan
win ur nsekked ara ilaq-as nwaḍer i tenhert
ttxil-wet ɛiwdet
mačči d aḥras i tḥerseḍ iman-ik akken ad d-txelqeḍ tugniwin-a
d adlis-a
maca imasayen n tallit-nni fkan lamer i yiɣallen n laman am tannumi akken ad qerɛen imesbaniyen yessuturen azref-nsen
ula d netta yella d anelmad n yasuɛ
aha d nnuba-k ɛeddi-d kečč
yiwen n wass ad d-tuɣalem
wali amazray n useqdec n tsarut
izad uzɣal ussan-a
tlaq tsudut ara ten-yezdin i wakken ad mlilen yimussnawen-agi ara d-yelhin s ferru n temsal
ur tettmuqqul ara ɣer deffir
nru i sin
ur ttiliɣ
la kent-sseqdacen
dɣa ula d nutenti ugint-iyi gar-asent
ass amezwaru ad wen-yili d ass n temlilit timqeddest
icuf uqerru-w seg wanect-a n usefhem
guli werǧin tufi yelli-s
ad uraren yid-sen
ur ten-ṭṭifen ara merra deg ukayad
urɛad tekfi allus arrac ɣlin ṭṭṣen ala sin
tamɛayt n imeɛraḍen n tmeɣra
xeddmeɣ d taqeddact
kra n wayen ixeddem ufus-is ameɣlal isserbaḥ-it deg-s
di tazwara mačči akka i yella lḥal
acuɣer i yettarra awal ɣer daxel
tewwi-ten
ad yecbu mmi-s n tsedda
mmektit-d
ad ixdem ayen ilaqen akken ad d-yeffeɣ seg-s
yečča imensi yeqqim iluɛa-t baba-s
ur cččiɣ ur swiɣ
ad yettidir deg umaḍal i d-yexleq usugen-is
yeqqim imuqel-it baba-s iɛqel-it
lal n tiddi d ṣṣenɛa
la d-ttlalent ddaw iḍuḍan-is
d afermas
ssis-as-d i yettmenni
niqal ad d-nessuffeɣ amḍan aneggaru n yimttekkiyen deg tezrigt-a imi ass-nni ideg tekfa tallit n ujerred
ay imedyazen
a yemma-s n warraw-iw a mumu n wallen-iw
Ḍset
amcic
Ṭṭfet
dɣa akka i teḍra yiwet n twaɣit ass-nni n warim deg tama n arezyu deg twilayt n wehran
ma twalaḍ yiwen icudd aseɣwen ini-yas mebruk aεmam-ik
Ɣer daxel i tewwet znezla
iwakken ad yejji yiwen ilaq di tazwara ad yeqbel lehlak-is
lmut tezwar ɣur-s
ad ibarek di leεmuṛ-nwen
ad iẓer yemma-s taɛzizt
ttnadin ad s-hedṛen
ad iyi-tessendeh ad d-aɣeɣ ayefki neɣ udi
wehmeɣ deg-k a yiḍ
Ṣeddḥen akk tibḥirt s later
ur kem-id-ɛqileɣ ara
ruḥ akin tesxerbeḍ liman-nneɣ
ssersen-d gar-asen taqedduḥt n zzit tayeḍ n tazart d teḥbult n uγrum
d tuylayt ay itteqqnen iɣerfan ɣer yimezwura-nsen ɣer umezruy-nsen
ttuh ttuh i lemni
s yal tutlayt
ad rnun
tɣunfa-ten lmut
nnal wa
rǧut da
ass-a tendeḥ tmes deg guraya
ad rren ddehn-nsen ɣer wayen yeɛnan tifesniwin n usismeḍ n yisufar-agi
wwin-d awal daɣen ɣef yimeddukkal-nsen i yettwaṭṭfen am Ɛebdelɛaziz merabet Ɛebdelqader gijdu racid adalu
d tagi i d lɛada n yirgazen ḥessben iman-nsen sdat n tlawin-nsen
deg yiwet n tesnawit i neɣra maca ur nemyussan ara
sin-agi am umcic d uɣerda
ttḥulfuɣ am wakken ttuɣ ur xdimeɣ ara kra
tura i ḥwaǧeɣ timεiwna
yezmer lḥal ad ɛeṭṭleɣ ma yella ur d-kcimeɣ ara zik ur iyi-ttraǧut ara
i urgaz-im iɛemmed-am akka ad tettalliḍ di tkerwas 
yenna ar ass mi ara ad d-wḍent lucayeṛ n zzman
mεukkren
acu ara txedmeḍ di tahran
ttmeslayen ɣef yiwen n ubrid
huz adaw-im
acḥal aya i tettmermid di sbiṭar
win i ten-yesɛan deg udrar ur yettaggad aẓaɣar
qabel-iten a dda s ucamar
lučkis yendeh deg udrar rsas igezzem ijebjan
abernus ɣef tuyat
yulin ɣef uqermud iḍegger ibernas
imi ufan deg tezgi-a ayen i asen-yehwan
wali ayen yezmer ad yexdem ufruri deg umussu i yesseḥbibiren ɣef web ilelli yeldin
Ṛuḥen si tirmitin wwḍen s aneẓruf n yemma guraya sbedden iqiḍunen-nsen deg yiwen n umkan iqublen adrar
mi ssulin awal-nsen yella-d uskasi sɣur wid yellan deg tzeqqa-nni
Ɣurwat ad ken-ɣiḍeɣ ad as-tinim meskint
iẓri-w tdel-it tillest
d asarag amenzu i d-thegga tddukkla-a deg waggur-agi n remḍan deg usɣim n waggur azeggaɣ azzayri
nekk usiɣ-d ɣer da ɣer ɣur-k
ad d-tḍil tziri ad truḥ
qeḍɛen at mraw akmaz
ur ssiwḍen ara xmesṭac n yiseggasen di tmeddurt-nsen
ma seg yibeṛṛaniyen ad d-naf maḥmud darwic
d tuzzya ara xedmen ɣer ukkuẓet n twilayin i usenɛet n tmezgunt
i d-yeqqaren ma yella tantaliwin n tefriqt ugafa d yiwet n tutlayt
ma d kayin ur t-iḥsib ara ur d-iqbil ara lweɛda-s
Ǧǧemt-iyi
yesṭebṭeb deg tewwurt n yiwen uxxam
ur d-yegri wacemma seg tugna-s deg wulawen d wallaɣen
azekka ṣṣbeḥ zik mi d-tekkrem ad tkemmlem abrid-nwen
tthabet amkan-iw iqedsen
nebda la nsel leԑğubat
qerriḥ
kemm tfetleḍ seksu s yiffasen-im ma d nekni nettaɣ-it-id si tḥanut
tuyat knant aṭas i bubbent
ismawen n mraw n yimedyazen i d-yufraren
ad d-tawi udi ur icuḥ
ameɣlal inna-as Ḍegger-it ɣer lqaɛa
ad iyi-tt-id-awin
Ṛbiɛ n tmizar weṛṛaɣ
mi ɛeddan sḥab n tmenṭac ay igeḍman n remman
am wakken daɣen i yetturaǧu ad ilin yirmad nniḍen deg unnar sya ɣer sdat s yisem n ugraw-agi
tlexseḍ
mdin-as
ur ssinent ara
mi d-uɣaleɣ ad d-jebdeɣ ayla-w s lfayda
aheggi n teẓrigt tis sḍiset
nnan wi isebbeben i leflas tagara yedda εeryan
nqesd-ik-id s lfutuḥ
ulamma deg lezzayer i d-tekkar maca mazal teḥrez tutlayt-is taqbaylit
keččini a gma a bu sebɛa teḥzamin
Ɣaḍent-t
tewwet akk tazmert-is ad teɛnenni
anda ɛummen iɛeṛḍiyen ay ɛummen ccwaṭen
terna-d lfuḍa yelli-s n yizem aɣilas tucbiḥt deg lḥara
semmum tadeffuyt-a
talwit
Ɛlaḥsab n yimsuddsen n leqdic-a ad tebdu tmeɣra-agi ɣef lɛecra n yiḍ alamma d ṣṣḥur
mi s-slan lɣaci tɛeǧǧben deg uselmed-is
yejmel
ad txedmeḍ lmelḥ i kra n wayen ara tefkeḍ d lweɛda
yetturar waḍu yettawi deg-s yettara
yella yakan win d-yemmeslayen ɣef wassaɣ n tuzuft gar uɣersiw d umdan
tikkwal yettinig ɣer tmura n lbarrani deg ukatar n umahil-ines
serrḥen-asent ad ruḥent
ffeɣ fell-i ur k-tt waliɣ ara gar wallen-iw
s wakka ara tɛerrim imaṣriyen
ad yeggan ad yettnerni
ulac anelmad i d-ikkan nnig ccix-is
ttu
mmeslay
arut yid-i
d acu i as-iruḥen i qessam ma ur neẓẓul
a mmi yella d acu twalaḍ neɣ d acu umi tesliḍ
ma temmugreḍ-d azger neɣ aɣyul n uɛdaw-ik iɛreq awi-as-t
Ṛebbi ad ken-iɛiwen
am Ṭawes Ɛemruc Ḥnifa akk d bahya faraḥ
uhu a baba
ma d abeddel yella wanda imdanen s kra kra ad glun s ubeddel n tseddast n tutlayt
d ayen i d-yewwin syin ɣer sdat aṭas n temliliyin deg yakk tamurt n leqbayel
tessawel yemma i lambilanṣ
ad am t-id-iniɣ s uqinẓi
ad truḥem
ad sen-yili d lqanun i lebda i nutni akked dderya-nsen
lameɛna ad tserseḍ afus-ik fell-as akken ad tidir
abṛaham isɛa-d isḥaq
iɛdawen-nwen ad ɣellin zdat-nwen s ujenwi
xedmet-iyi amkan iqedsen akken ad zedɣeɣ gar-asen
a lalla a lalla
neṭṭallay deg-s amek tlexxi
anwa-ten yinaẓuren i ɣer tmaleḍ
ma yella d aseggas-a azemz n yikayaden d yiwen deg kṛaḍ n yiɣerbazen
qqaren-d tezlez deg jijel
a d agellid-nneγ i yebγan ad yeg tameγra maca yebγa ad yesseḥdeṛ yakk iγersiwen n tmurt
iɛraben meṛṛa ɣzan imerjan tama n wasif ttnadin aman axaṭer ur zmiren ara ad swen aman n wasif
tamacahut n umqerqur d temqerqurt
ticixtin deg uɣerbaz kan i llant ma deg lǧameɛ d awezɣi
kellḥeɣ-am
ad swen warraw-inu
melmi ara yeḥbes usṭeẓṭeẓ-aki deg yiberdan
ur cliɛeɣ ara
ad d-yuɣal
d umennuɣ ɣef tutlayt d yidles
lmumnin ad ak-ḥlun lɛuṣṣat ad mseglun
mačči d tugert i nugar yal wa yettnadi lmetl-is
win ixedmen taɣawsa ad tt-id-isfeḍ ɣuṛ-i
teqqim kan tessirt i ulɣem
i bniɣ wi ɛellaɣ yal ṭṭaq s dheb iruc
tettunefk diɣ tegnit i ccna
beṛka asṭerṭer fell-i
myeḥmalen
tama n tsumta-w
heddreɣ tahungrit
seɣtit-t
iberdan ruḥen mxalfa
ad keyfeɣ di berra
melmi ara sen-fken arazen
melmi kan
kra tekka ddurt d imzenza
yasuɛ ikcem s axxam n buṭrus
ssimnent lɣiḍ-nsent d leḥmala i tent-ḥemmlen
amkan-im iman-im
neɣ yal yiwet d tutlayt iman-s ad d-yeglun s usezdi d useggem n tutlayt tamaziɣt
mi ara terwiḍ tamda ad d-ikker wallaɣ-is
la teqqaṛ
ma tcfiḍ acḥal nesher
mesmuqalent txeddamin n tenmehla i yecfan fell-i seg wakken zgiɣ ɣer-sent
teffeɣ i tfekka-s tamcumt
sliɣ-asen
yewwi-t
ddmet aya
d imezdaɣ s timmad-nsen i ixeddmen tabzert jemmɛen-d azal n tedrimt swayes ara ibedd
zik d tajmeɛt n taddart i iferrun timsal
axnunnes d ayen i yessettwaɣayen tamnaḍt-nneɣ akked tdawsa-nneɣ
berrik ul n Ḥmed
tura akka aṭas i yettmesteqsayen mayella ai-da d tanaẓurt
ddem-it-id efk-asen-t fell-i fell-ak
gma yesteḥres akken ad iruḥ ɣer din weḥd-s
imiren kan argaz-nni yeṣfa si lberṣ-is
aya i kečč
teɣli-d s wawal ur nlaq ara sdat urgaz-is
ttumt-t
ma d ilsawen ur cuḥḥen ara i uqesser d usmeki n wayen sɛeddan deg umkan-a ɛzizen fell-asen aṭas
tekcem-itt tikti n trewla i wayen i tt-yurǧan
acuɣer ara ttwaḥeṛmeɣ seg-wen di sin deg yiwen n wass
mi ara teṭṭṣem yiwen ur kwen-isfeɛfiɛ
ttqadaṛet
yennulfa-d din yiwen n umeɣnas i yettidiren di tmurt n telmant
teqqur deg umkan-is
mbeɛb irna-d gma-s afus-is iṭṭef deg ugerz n meẓyan
ur tgezzmeḍ ara leryaf n tamart-ik
ur ten-ǧǧan ara ad kecmen merra
ad aɣ-tcuḥ ciṭuḥ
ttif win iggunin tacḍaḍt wala tanebḍaḍt
Ɣur-m ad tḥesbeḍ lehdur-iw d aɣurru
ur t-ssexdam ara s leqsaḥa aggad illu-ik
sbeṛ
ayen yellan eǧǧ-it deg ul-ik
waɣzen ibedd sdat n tewwurt
s lefḍel n bu tezmirin
newwi-d awal deg tdiwennit-a ɣef leqdicat n tuddsa akked yisenfaren-is sya d afella
d aqemmuc ičibib i d-iberrun i yizan
tetturaǧu terbaɛt-a ad terzu ɣer yicawiyen di tbatent
Ɣef wawal n wid yessnen ai-da ur yezmir akk yiwen ad ihendez seg tazwara d acu ara d-texdem
leqdic n ben muḥemmed ijeddel tikli i tedwilin tidelsanin
ineggura-a llan teddun ɣer ccɣel-nsen lameεna akken yeqqaṛ yinzi iteddu waḍu akken ur as-yehwi i uɣeṛṛabu
temekta-d sudaba awalen n temdakelt-is zahra
tfudeḍ
win ara yessanzen iman-is ad ittwarfed
yezzi wawal deg-s ɣef waṭas n temsal i d-yeqqnen ɣef usentel-a
ma ulac aɣilif senqed ma yella iɣewwaṛen n umiḍan-inek d imeɣta
Ḍegreɣ tiṭ seg yiɣisi-nni iseg d-tkeccem tafat
ssemɣer ciṭ tira-k
qeɛd-aɣ-d annar i zzedwa
lameɛna ferɛun ur wen-d-ittḥessis ara
tekker tɛeǧǧaǧǧt deg yiḥulfan-iw
win yeččan tasekkurt ar tt-ifak isuk talaba ɣef yimi-s
suden tom
iziɣer-is ad t-neddem
Ḥulfaɣ i yimetman-is yettismiḍen ɣef yiri-w
simal ttnernayent tfesniwin n lḥamu deg wussan-a simal ḍerrunt-d kra n twaɣiyin i d-igellu ucayaḍ-a
yexsef tom
zgan d asḥissef
ula d lmal aɛeggun yeḍṣa ma d tinna i d lǧennet
ad kecmeɣ ɣer lqahwa
nnbi muḥemmed tazwara d lquds i yerra d lqebla
mendas akked zehwa llan qqaren akken deg yiwet n tesnawit
yal wa s wass-is
sεerqen-iyi abrid
nekk ur ẓriɣ ara akk amek
yasuɛ ixebbeṛ-d daɣen s lmut-is akked ḥeggu-s
tabriṭ deg taddart
anect-a ad d-yekk sɣur-wen
keččini ay isli a ddeḥ bu lmerǧan
ad ruḥeγ ad awen-ğğeγ tamurt ur nmegger ur nettifi
am uclim i merzen yiɣuraf
ikna lqedd-nwen
ur tettettem ara aɣrum yesɛan iɣes n temtunt
ferɛun inna i yusef urgaɣ beddeɣ ɣef yiri n wasif
tessuter-as ad d-teččar taqecwalt n tbexsisin
i yiɛeggalen irkkeli
ussan iɛddan ǧǧan-d cwami cwami ur nmeḥḥu i lebda
ayen yuran deg usenduḥ ula aniwer iṛuḥ
yeɛreḍ yimḍebber amezwaru n tesga n tsekliwin d tutlayin mass m imarazen ad yessemsawi taswiɛt
ur wwiḍen ara ayen i ttmennin
areqqeɛ n uxxam n tmusni
tesɛiḍ akud mliḥ
d ayen i yeččuṛen ul i d-itteffɣen seg yimi
lxir-iw lxir-ines
ceggɛen-as inelmaden-nsen akked kra n ihiṛudiyen
tasekkurt n ṣbeḥ
yiwet tsemma-yi ferḥat mhenni tɣil meskint d argaz n menwala
ferḥ-as a tazeqqa yes-s
tayri-w tamezwarut n tidet d tilawt
d netta i d-yemmalen azrireg n tigawin
s dderbuka yak d ṭṭar
ula d tikli sin isuraf kan ad yebɣu ad yeffeɣ wul-iw
teɣli-d seg yigenni teẓẓel
taɣawsa-nni tenǧes
d yeɛqub mmi-s n Ḥalfay akked taday
yettɣunzu-aɣ bab n yigenwan
ihi a mmi uqbel ad terreḍ ɣer ccɣel-a ad sutreɣ deg-k taɣawsa
ala ulac-itt yid-s iman-is i d-tegra yif xir kan ad tt-tettu
imewlan n tnezduɣin yettwajerden deg wahil n tnezduɣin salḥi
sami yerfa
amkan-im ur d-igri gar-aneɣ
ur txeddmem ara acku d timlilit timqeddest
Ɣilleɣ-t am wid-nni yettɛeddayen yakan fell-i di tannumi
ur iyi-d-sellen ara mi ara snejliɣ iziɣer-iw si tfekka-ya i kerheɣ seg zik
zzit timqeddest akked lebxuṛ n leɛqaqer i umkan iqedsen
tecba akk tisekliwin yellan deg ddunit
a lmalayek d-iɛussen
i kemm
ilha umerreḥ tameddit
amatar udmawan deg umaɣun
udem gar wudmawen
ffiɣ-d aman s ugdur si tsebbalt
lliɣ ḥemmleɣ-kem
neṭṭeḍ deg yif adɣes
maca ayɣer
ssemẓi-t
ulac-it
d abrid i t-id-iwwin ara t-irren
nesɛa tazeqqa tmeqqer nezzeh
yessikid-itt ɣer wallen
ma d limaṛat n lewqat ur sen-tessinem ara
imdanen akked lmal ččuṛen d tilkin
abrid n baylek i tkerrusin akk
tura gnent
ur ttili d tanit
silya d tallest tamezwarut s wacu i lemdeɣ d acu-yi
akken daɣen yuget umgired
ad tili tezrigt-a tamaynut gar seεṭac ar setta u εecrin deg yulyu i d-itteddun deg taddart n saḥel
tissirt ma tuɣ-itent deg rryac ula i as-d-gan iɣuraf
d acennay n temnaḍt n at wagennun yeddan deg ubrid n yinaẓuren imeqranen n tama-a
inelmaden ḥemmlen tutlayt-nsen
a yigenni bu itran lqaɛa d igersalen
yeqqel sellaw am yemɣi yeṭṭef uɣurar
ad bḍuɣ yides iḥulfan ad innigeɣ anda akken bɣiɣ nekk
ad yeqqen lḥenni lwerd mi ifetteḥ
gma ameqqran
a targa i deg yegma uhicur mi refdeɣ abendayer
tgen
ur d-ittak ara ugudu lexrif
shurun srebruben
mi yemmut ad nɣeɣ gma yeɛqub
ixdem leεǧeb yerna yeḥǧeb
taqbaylit ladɣa i mi teddem amennuɣ ɣef teqbaylit
ma d tiẓeḍt n temɛict tettas-d s tezdeg n wulawen
ger wallen-is tettwali ḥala tebrek
kerheɣ mi yi-txeddem akka
taddart tebna ɣef uxxam syin n d adrum mbeɛd d taqrart akken alamma tewwḍeḍ ɣer taddart s timmad-is
kkret
nessebɣes diɣ aḥric n usefti deg tfellaḥt nessaweḍ ɣar umḍiq amenzu deg wakal aɣelnaw deg usafar n uyefki
s kra kra zzit-nni tettali-d umbeεed ttawint-tt γer uxxam i wakken ad tt-zzrent s leḥmu
aha ziɣ ẓẓeg-d tagut
qṛeb-d
d acu i ɣilen εni
azelmaḍ yettḥami ɣef uyeffus
d ameqqran bezzaf iḍul
yelli ɣef-s teḍher tafat
Ḥulfaɣ i tedmarin-is ɣef tid-iw
yasuɛ issečč ṛebɛalaf n yirgazen
ad iyi-d-testeqsayem ɣef uxeddim n ugraz-iw
ssuh ssuh ssuhya
argaz ara yeṭṭṣen d ɛemmti-s iḍall ɣef leɛra n ɛemmi-s
Ččiɣ seksu d aleǧǧam
tanezzayt send ad d-yali yiṭij
acku ticki nessuter tasuqlit n tefyar seg teglizit ɣer tmaziɣt d acu ara d-yerr uselkim
ad t-yels usemmiḍ ad susmen yiḍan
nniɣ-am xaṭi
tebɛem tom
ma d nekk ul-iw yenɣa-yi
sǧehdet
ur ncuk ara d lwert n yimawlan lejdud-nsen mačči akka i llan
drus n yineɛraḍen cwiṭ n yimensi yefra wurar
tuɣal tekkes-iyi tuggdi n rrwaḥ ɣer lkabina
ur tewwiḍeḍ sani
myeḥmalen mačči d lhedra n yiles
amzun akken d tameɣra i nga deg uxxam-nneɣ
uggadeɣ lwaḥc n lɣaba a yelli ɣriba
am wakken daɣen tettcebiḥ isura ideg i d-turar amedya axxam n dda meẓyan itij n zira tawrirt yettwattun
isem-is ur iseffeḍ ara imi d azamul gar yizumal n umennuɣ ɣef tidet
Ɣawleɣ
ixdeε-ik
ma aɣ-in-tellim tawwurt ata yeṛẓa-aɣ wansi
nečča pastis s lmaqarun am tmaṣwatin
lebɣi-w yedda d lebɣi-m
d acu i kem-iwwin ɣur-sen
leqdic-nneɣ ɣas akken d ussnan mazal-it deg timmeɣnest acku ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit kan ara nqeddec
a tiberrint n wasif imawlan-im d at nnif
am tseṭṭa gar yisaffen
wali akk amgired
war asirem war layas
yal yiwen anamek i as-yefka i tlelli
deg wagguren imezwura ad ḥettmeɣ fell-as ad iyi-yebru
ad as-d-yesseḥbes takarrust s unehhar i yettagaden rebbi
qessam bu leɛyub ifka taninna i uɣbub
ad am d-igerrez isefra
tijeǧǧigin i d-yemɣin di tqernit
yuba yebges
ur yezmir ara ad d-yeldi afaylu n udras n tirawt
Ǧǧan-aɣ-d yimawlan-nneɣ agerruj
Ṛebban-iyi-d ad ttaggadeɣ tafekka-w
ad as-yettemḥezwar s amḍiq
mazal
alim-d
taxsayt-iw duḥ duḥ
uhulibama tesɛa-as-d yaɛuc yaɛlam akked quraḥ
tusem
teṣber ayen i wumi ur yeṣbir yiwen
ad d-alin yiɛewwamen ad d-mlilen d rric-is
yiwen wass ad rzuɣ ɣur-sen
muten
lameɛna netta yugi
ad ɛeddin iseggasen dayen ad k-ttun
ur zmiren ad bdun ma ulac-iyi
xḍu-k i yizamulen n ddin
imɣur tecbuḍ lkibiya
ad tessuter seg tǧiratin d tmawlatin akken ad grent aẓeṭṭa
ur yi-d-seddayet ara deg uqsiḍ-aki
terfed s tadist tesɛa-d aqcic
inna-asent ur ttagademt ara
yiwet n tikkelt yeɛreḍ yiwen n urgaz i ɣileɣ d amddakel ad yetɛeddi fell-i
a win ijebbden amrar ixef-is ha-t-a da ɣur-i
d tannumi ad tt-id-tafeḍ deg tmetti am wakken yelmed bnadem ayen nniḍen
dɣa tɣumm udem-is s umeḥrem
d tiktiwin tizedganin
Ṛaju kra
ulac deg wacu i d-tcukkeḍ
wali awalen uffiren yettwakelsen
Ḥemmlet iɛdawen-nwen
tajmilt n tmeṭṭut taqbaylit d tameqqrant
ikemmel daɣen yessefhem-d s telqay tuddsa n tejmeɛt n taddart
dayen i d-isebgen unqac i d-isuli ufusnaẓur n vermeyene
kra din yeffer-it deg tekwat n yismektiyen
a tinn-a n ugemmaḍ ur telhiḍ ara
arju nniɣ-ak ur tufiḍ i yellan akk
amasay-nni sṭaxren-t
teṭṭef lemri-nni sdat n tebbucin-is
tumrem yakk
tettemmeɣ-d fell-i ad iyi-tewwet ma d baba iḥudd-iyi-d s ugerger
ad iyi-tt-id-tawi
nek d amaziɣ akka ara mmteɣ
d nnger-im
atah ukaram-ines ma tebɣiḍ a t-teɣreḍ
d acu i k-irran d gma a mmi-s n takna n yemma
aqbayli i yefkan tudert-is i taɣuct taqbaylit
wwint-t
a Ṛebbi seggem-as ussan
ttnadin amek ara seɣlin idabuyen n tefriqt n ugafa akken ad ṭfen awanek nutni
tamurt ideg cergen yimawen
ad yefreḥ wul-inu
yasuɛ yuli ɣer teflukt inelmaden-is tebɛen-t
Ɣef lqis
ur ntettu ara ad d-nebder daɣen kaysa xalifi
nnuɣen
kkret sya
tesla i zzhir n tkerrust n urgaz-is teḥbes-d ɣer tewwurt
taxxamt deg-s kra n yijeqḍuren d wallalen n uxxam
tteɛraḍeɣ ad d-mmektiɣ
win n uḥraz n yidles d yiles
yessusuf ɣer yigenni ttuɣalent-d ɣer yimi-s
aẓeṭṭa mi iger yefra
ayen akk iɣef ara yeqqim ad inǧes
tufiḍ ɣer ddwa-nni i m-d-ifka umejjay
timetti tamaynut tessen kra yellan
d acu i teṭṭfeḍ deg ufus-ik
axeddim-is yegzem kan deg wakal n tɣiwant
yiwen n wass ad n-uɣaleɣ
d acu i kent-iwwin ɣur-sen
d acu i tt-iwwin ɣur-s
i kečč
tettɛawaz fellas uḍan ussan
Ẓṛiɣ aydi
nettbekkir-d tasebḥit akken ad neqḍeɛ lecɣal
isem-is mucaɛ di surya meṛṛa
yasuɛ inna-as Ṛuḥ akkin fell-i a cciṭan
ttawḍeɣ ɣer yimaḍalen-nni n yisafen n crab d wid n tmes
mi ara tibɛid fell-i ugar dɣa ẓriɣ ad iyi-tettu maḍi
illel ad icerreg
tṛuḥ-as
tekker truḥ teǧǧa-t
rran-as imcumen-nni ad ten-ineɣ yir lmut
acḥal ara s-d-isqam uxxam-a
win ara iɛeggben wayeḍ ad ittuɛeggeb ula d netta
bɣiɣ isem-im kemm mačči win n urgaz-im
iru armi i as-ǧǧan yimeṭṭawen ccama deg udem-is
ales-iyi-d tamacahut-im
i kečč d acu i k-id-yewwin ɣer da
tallit ideg i nella d remḍan tuget n yixeddamen senɣasen seg uxeddim rnu azɣal i d-yettilin deg uzal
lliɣ εelmeɣ qbel-ik
ad teččenčen ɣriba tizebgatin n uẓref
d lɛid n usuref taneggarut
iseɣ-im inuda
mass caɛban mahdi yemmeslay-d ɣef wayen yettilin seg umnar n tewwurt ɣer daxel
arrac iqbayliyen ara yilin deg-s tazwara d twacult kan
tura nhedder aṭas ɣef uxnunnes n lgaz n yigenni
isselmad di leǧwameɛ-nsen
mačči d tikkelt neɣ d snat i retɛeɣ inelmaden deg tesnawit
tlata n wagguren i sεeddaɣ di sbiṭar n balwa
igzem-as-d awal
ur d-ffiɣeɣ ara d tasedda akken i yessirem baba ffɣeɣ-d d ayen-niḍen
yeccetka fell-as
ur d-tuɣalem ur d-tsawlem
ula tikkelt ur tezgil ara tiɛad n usebleɛ-nsent
ijexxer lpuṣt-nni ɣas ḥbes-it
i d-yernan lferḥ i wul-iw
iga-asen rebg am wulli
ur εlimeɣ
acu txeddmeḍ
ad ruḥeγ ad awen-ğğeγ tamurt i yekcem waḍu n tisselbi
d ayen iɣder-it yiḍes
mazal-iten ar assa ttargun tamurt izerfan
yessuffuɣ-d daɣ aḍris-nni seg tegreɣlanit
din i yesɛedda ḥdac d aseggas gar ucqerri n tfekka d wawal
teṭṭef aqerruy-is tettxemmim
teqqar-as kan ah a yelli ur tesɛiḍ cwiṭ akka ad kem-isferḥen
ma yeqfel uqerru n yiwen hder-as s tefransist neɣ s teglizit kifkif
Ɣas ma yella kra i ixeṣren a t-nṣeggem
ah ya ddunit ideg i d-negra
yettuɛeggen diɣ ad yili usiher n yimseḍsi neɣ n useḥḥar ɣer tama n tmeɣra n ccna
nemlal-d tiddukkla numidya i tikkelt tamezwarut
asiḍen n yigḍaḍ n waman
teǧǧa-yi
acuɣer a lmektub tesbeɛdeḍ fell-aɣ lebɣi
itekkes i wul-iw aɣmal i t-yulin
fakkent-asen-tent
Ḥulfaɣ-as terfed taduli-w
nezga akken nugi ad nemseɛyu
lameɛna lehduṛ-iw ur fennun ara
yiwen ur iḥess i umɣar
Ɛass imeslayen-im neɣ ad iyi-tḥettmeḍ ad kem-ṭfeɣ ɣer lḥebs
ma teddiḍ s laɛqel ad teččeḍ ayen yewwan
asemmiḍ la deg-s yettazu
d kemmi
aneḥḍur n waṭas n twaculin tiqbayliyin i izedɣen deg temdint-a
bilha taqeddact n lalla xelluǧa tesɛa-as-d lwennas akked yugurten
wi ten-yesεan yeṛwa amdegger yeṛwa akkessar d usawen
nniɣ-am kemm a yelli a taxeddact n yibawen
anwa ara nlumm
tesseṛɣeḍ-iyi-ten
ahat d wa akk ara yillin d afus-im ayfus
ma yella nemmeslay-d ɣef mhenni xalifi ad t-naf iqeddec deg unnar n teqbaylit yefka-as azal meqqṛen
ad yekkes
lferḥ-inu d ameqqran
tɣaḍ-ikem
s reffu yendeh yenna-asen kkset-as aqerru
aḍar-iw yettembiwil
armi uɣalen medden ttawin-ten d amedya
Ḥbes-it
ibedd tom
yessusef-it-id ɣer yejdi
yewwet-iyi urumi ccektaɣ i gma-s
s ssebba neɣ s tayeḍ
llan daɣen wiyaḍ am evernote i zemren ad sqedcen medden meṛṛa
qqimeɣ s lqecc n daxel
tugmemt-d
ssufɣen-iyi-d seg uxeddim
akken ma llant zewjent s yixxamen-nsent
dɣa tigelliwin-is akk s tamment
ansuf s wat tussna
aẓ-d ɣer da
tuqeɛ-iyi seg-m d acu teswiḍ ala juǧ kilu n lebṣel
d ayen i ten-yeǧǧan qeddcen deg unnar n tẓuri tagamant
myeḥmalet gar-awen akken i ken-ḥemmleɣ
ur teẓri acemma ɣef wayen iḍerrun deg-s
ddmet gma-twen tekkrem ad tuɣalem s argaz-nni
a yemma a wi iṛuḥen
yelli-s tettmuqul-it s tayri
sɛiɣ timdukal d yimdukal mebɛid kan
tḥulfa i yimeqyasen urzen ifassen-is d yiḍarren-is
deg tazwara ad d-snekdeɣ iman-iw
yetteflali imeṭṭawen zrargen-d ɣef lḥenk-is
tebɣa ad teffer xas ma weḥdes i tella
d amendil s i begseɣ ixf-iw
d kečč i d ddkir ufud
yal mi ara d-rzun fell-as nettat ɣur-s d tameɣra
aḥḥu
d ayen i d-ittarran rruḥ i wul
Ṛuḥent-aɣ
tezzi-d tmes si mkul tama
zgan tteɛraḍen ad iyi-qennɛen
segmi asen-ffɣeɣ afus
fkan-iyi ur ɛlimeɣ
xeẓẓren
imi ur tezmireḍ ara i terwa-m iwumi i tezweǧeḍ
yemmut umɣar-nni yewweḍ amkan-is
lǧens ad d-ikker ɣer lǧens tageldit ɣer tgelda
mazal ur d-terrim ara s lexbaṛ
lameɛna baba-s yugi inna-as Ẓriɣ a mmi ẓriɣ
ad mmɣeɣ ɣef tjenwit-nni i ttawiɣ yid-i ad d-rreɣ ttar deg tfekka-w
illu iwala belli ayen akk yexdem d ayen yelhan nezzeh
ass mi ara tt-teqneḍ ass-nn kan i tzemreḍ ad tt-tewteḍ
deg-s sebɛa n tezlatin anda i d-yessefra s ccna
Ɣunfan lebɣi ad yessikel
axaṭer s ided n lmefṣel n taɣma i yettwet si mḥemmed
d ayaẓil i ɣ-izzuzfen lḥif i ɣ-izzin
ceyyeɛ-iyi-d izen
dayi
ur ɛzizit ara akteṛ-nsen
yedda lḥal
ur t-ḥemmlent ara
ilaq ad tili teqcict d tin icebḥen tin ttwalin akk yiqcicen
yefka-d ṭṭya am tin n tziri
ayagi d lwajeb fell-aneɣ
s yisurrifen yettɣawalen i teffeɣ i temdint-is tamecṭuḥt
dayen tura fket-aɣ lehna ad d-nheyyi tifranin
fukkent-t
ad tzerrɛem ur tmeggrem d iɛdawen-nwen ara iɣelten
tura iban belli ugur deg facebook i yella mačči deg tuqqna ɣer internet
amek armi i am-yeɛǧeb bu claɣem-ina
akken daɣen ara ɛetben mmi-s n umdan
zemren ad d-asen srid ɣer usarra n tizi uzzu
ur aɣ-tewqiɛ di tlisa
ikerrez deg lawan n tyerza
feṭṭuma tenna d argaz-iw s idammen ɣef ddemma n ṭṭhara
tuɣ cfiɣ
amek twalaḍ tiririt n uzayez
bdan ttemsefhamen gar-asen amek ad iyi-xedmen
yuɣal ugugam-nni iheddeṛ yerna yettwali
ad sen-terrem axaṭer s ufus anezmar i ɣ-d-issufeɣ umeɣlal si tmurt n maṣer seg uxxam n tkelwa
si rezqi d win ur nḥemmel ara ad t-id-asen yinebgawen
ur ḥemmleɣ gma ur ḥemmleɣ wi t-ikkaten
yuba ack-it
isseḥlay-iten
ahat
d mmi-s n tmurt neɣ d abeṛṛani izedɣen gar-awen
wali anerfud yellan
anda teddiḍ ad yeddu yid-k lexyal-nsen ma mmuten ad d-kkren warraw-nsen
ur xdimeɣ ara ula d akken
kenwi d lmelḥ n ddunit
ur tt-mmarkan ara deg tɣiwant armi iɛedda useggas ɣef tlalit-is
Ɣlin deg-s ḍeggren-t beṛṛa n tfeṛṛant dɣa nɣan-t
taswiɛt
taẓrigt tamezwarut n tfaska taɣelnawt n usefru amaziɣ iwumi fkan azwel n “amedyez iflisen umellil”
heggan asuref
ayt smaεel
tafukt d tawraɣt
amawal i tesxedmeḍ yetɛedda d taqbaylit n yal ass
ur yettwasefrak ara
aɣ-itt-id a yiblis ad ak-nefk nnefṣ-is
axaṭer ur tt-fkiɣ ara i mmi cila ad izweǧ yid-s
yahuda yenna i baba-s isṛayil eǧǧ aqcic ad iddu yid-i
mkul yiwen ijmeɛ-d kan ayen ara yečč
acḥal n tikkal i tettwareqqeɛ
nnezlazeɣ
ini-iyi-d ma day tecfiḍ
izdem-d
ad nebdut
wali amek i itteddu
ad teqqim deg uxxam-nsen ad tečč seg yedrimen n tejmaɛt arma tezweǧ
tebra-yaɣ
ad asen-tent-yefk
ad ten-tḥesbem ḥeṛṛmen ur ttettem ara seg uksum-nsen
Ṛǧu ad yibrik yiḍ akken ad d-yesɛu itran
serrḥen-am ad truḥeḍ
ruḥemt deg talwit
ad tsewwqeḍ yid-s
ulac win izemren ad ibedd deg ubrid-nneɣ
Ṛuḥen wa ɣer lexla-s wa ɣer swaleḥ-is
ad xedmeɣ
ečč adfel
ndu ndu ay iɣi
lemwaǧi ɣumment-ten zedren ɣer lqaɛa n lebḥeṛ am yeẓra
win ara yesseɛlin iman-is ad d-ittwanfeḍ
kra n win i cebḥen tifeḍ-t
azal n sin wussan uriɣ-d aḍris yecban wa maca yemxallaf deg usentel
Ɛeqlemt-d
asissen n temsislit
aqcic-a yella iḥemmel medden aṭaṣ imi yettwassen s terbiyya d teḥdeq-is yettqadaṛ ameqqṛan d umectuḥ
anisa d tin i d-yesduklen ɣef teɣzi n umecwar-is gar ccna ssinima d umezgun
akken kan
yerna taẓuri tezdeɣ-iyi deg yidammen
ahat yeɛya
tettekleḍ fell-as
wisen ma mazal yugad neɣ yenwa mazal ad d-uɣalen
testeqsa lǧiran imezdaɣ imznuza imsebriden
lameɛna nekk ad wen-iniɣ ur ttgallat s wacemma
i kečč acuɣer i tnekreḍ sgellin mi k-id-steqsaɣ fell-as
yekcem waɛrab s uqendur ɣer waman
nɣiɣ-am-t
issaweḍ meyya u sebɛa u ṛebɛin n iseggasen di leɛmeṛ-is
yasuɛ inna-as tbeɛ-iyi-d
lameɛna win ara yenɣen amdan d lmut ara yemmet
serreḥ i ufus-iw
rret-t-id
lameɛna win iɣef ara d-iɣli ad t-imḥeq
ad d-ilin ddeqs n leqdicat idelsanen i lmend n yigerdan-a
acuɣer ur testeqsayem ara ma yesɛa tameṭṭut uqbel ad as-tefkem yellitwen
rǧu am uqerruy aniwer i tettazzaleḍ akka
nemyussan
i tura melmi ara ssiwḍeɣ akka ayen i bɣiɣ
acuɣer times tecεel anagar deg tudrin n leqbayel
tesselmadeḍ abrid n yillu s ṣṣwab
tesεiḍ lweqt tura
am tziri n unebdu
deg tenmehla ttmeslayeɣ s teqbaylit
d kemm i d tameṭṭut-is tamaynut
ttemmɣeɣ ad asen-rewlen s yiɣil neɣ s leḥdaqa
tekcem-itt tugdi tuzzel ɣer lkumisarya anida terǧa snat n tsaɛtin
d ajeɣlal
d ṛṛay-ik i ak-tt-igan
Ɛerḍemt
acḥal bnin
yasuɛ ilḥa ɣef waman
yella win yuraren tajeɛlulaqt s umrar iɛelqen ɣar ufurek n tzemmurt
Ɣur-m ad d-iban
yenna-as uyaziḍ "anda yella llqeḍ yid-m a lalla"
yeɛqub isɛa-d yahuda akked watmaten-is
ur tt-yettɛawan deg uṣubbu wala deg usali
tɣaḍ-itt
uḍan n remḍan deg wat wagennun
malleɣ
d kečč i d ddwa n lqerḥ
udem ubxiṣ
gezzuɣ-tt seg wayen i selleɣ d wayen i ttnadiɣ
axṣim ad t-ǧǧeɣ yezza tabaqit ur tt-yewwi
yeqqim-d sdat n baba-s
d tafsut
sǧehdemt
nnig wul
wa mačči d aṭan n teqbaylit ahaw kan wa d asafar yessejjayen
ama d amezzer s waman-is i ittecruruqen am ddheb tizegzewt n umkan neɣ d abeḥri-s aṣemmaḍ azedgan
cennun
sya
ah ya yiwen n uxeddaɛ ay anekkar ur k-ttsamaḥeɣ ara
suffɣet-ten meṛṛa
cukkeɣ inu
ama d asideg afares n ugbur umḍin afares n yisefka isnilsanen neɣ taneflit n yifecka imaynuten s teqbaylit
a yemma ruḥeɣ ruḥeɣ
bdum tura
anejmuε i d-yellan deg waggur n yebrir ɣur i tessawel tddukkla n yimawlan n tnezduɣin n salḥi
ulac d acu i texdem
amek i d-yeffeɣ seksu-nni
jelleb tekkeḍ nnig tebridin ad tifeḍ akk tizyiwin
yerra-as ilindi useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa tajmilt deg waggur n remḍan di temkerḍit tazayezt n bgayet
win i k-iẓuren yugem
nettat d tayemmat
atan japun
ad tmeddiḥen sdat n uxxam-is
tneɛrem a saddat yeqqwan
ad teḍṣeḍ
tusa-d yemma d gma akken ad iyi-iẓren
ma d imalalen yella wanida i temcabin
Ḥebset-t
ad iniɣ ahat kra neɣ ahat kulec kulec yessefraḥ-iyi
a dadda win ɛzizen azrar deg lwizen
mel-iyi a tazmalt mel-iyi mel-iyi win iɛeddan fell-am
win i kem-iẓran yekka lexla
urid
ad nesseḥbiber xerṣum cwit
xas ur ttḥewwis ara amek ara yi-tesɣelṭeḍ
ay at llebsa n leḥrir
yettmuqul udem-is deg lemri iḥulfa i yiman-is aṭas i ibeddlen
d tajmilt ara yuɣalen s tfaska-a i tnaẓurt anisa i d-yelḥan yiwen n umecwar igerrzen di tẓuri
deg wawal i d-newwi yid-s negza belli leqdic-a d axeddim n yiseggasen
ttu-t
iswa tom
ay aɛǧar n ccac
Ɣremt
rjut da
selleɣ-as
tarubut-a yesnulfa-tt-id aidan meller
ur cfiɣ ara mliḥ ɣef wayen akk iyi-d-yeḍran
d awezɣi ad tili si tid ixeddmen yid-s neɣ si tid i d as-yettilin
muqel anida ara tegreḍ leεmeṛ-im
si temdinin d ssḥari
ur wwiḍen yifassen
ma d ameqrad-nni yestkellfen s uɣrum iɛelleq-it
haṛun izweǧ akked ilicaba yelli-s n Ɛaminadab weltma-s n naḥcun
anef-as d nekk i yeẓran d acu i as-ilaqen
qqimet dagi tɛiwzem
a yiḍes yezzuzunen zuzen-iyi yelli ad teṭṭes
nekk iḥemlen ad ḍṣeɣ ad sfuǧɣeɣ akk d temdukkal-iw
ala nniɣ-am ruḥemt kan d nekk ara d-izgen deg uxxam
ilaq ucraḍ mgal tabuzeggaɣt
tḍegger tegrudt ilellucen-is imaynuten
ttnadin-k
nessuli-t s yifegfagen
nɣaḍ-ikem
ad sbeɣsen asenfar-a ilan tixutert meqqren i teqbaylit
ad iyi-yesseɣleḍ
nekk d ilmẓi i ilulen deg tmurt n leqbayel di tɣiwant n uweqqas
a lebsa n uqendur
yella qeḍran d yilili
Ṛebbi d argaz lɛali yerna d anaẓur
tayri-m eǧǧ-itt ɣur-m
efk-d tawarect n wudi
d tameddakelt n temẓi
akken tenɣumbas tegnawt tafat ur telli
ur xeddmet ara lbaṭel di taǧǧalt neɣ deg ugujil
d leqdic ara yilin d agraɣlan ara yesnernin ssinima taqbaylit deg waṭas n tmura n umaḍal
testeqsa-t ɣef urgaz-is
serseɣ-d adrim d lḥenni ḥedqemt a tid wer neɣri
aṣuni yesɛa lmaɛna mačči d aketti kan
yumes userwal-ik
tcelεeḍ
s teɣma
mmi ad yeṭṭes deg tɣurfatin
rrif rrif udarnu
yura-yas
tseffeḍ lufar t-yeddalen sya ɣer da
aṭas ay d-smenɛem d idles tasnagt d tilin n wat zik
wwiɣ-d tasedda n rrxul i yizem aweḥci
d amedyaz n tidet
Ṛajumt kra
yessen ad iqemmer
mmi d izem aheddal
akkenni
llan yeḍrisen ur ddin ara d temsirin n tjerrumt
zzyada akk seg umcum
la ttɣenniɣ yecbeḥ yiles-iw
d iseɛdiyen wid iḥeznen axaṭer ad ttwaṣebbren
deg tmeɣriwin yella usbuɣer yella ucekker
qrib yal ass akken
win yesseɣlen amzun yewwet
ijmeɛ-itt
ul-is ḥnin
musa yesbedd aqiḍun n temlilit isers tikersiyin issuli tincirin isɛedda iɛmuden isbedd tigejda
a-ten-an warraw n raɛuwil naḥat ziraḥ cama akked miza
kul wa yeɛǧeb-it ṛṛay-is ulukan diri-t
ulac limaṛa ara s-d-ittunefken siwa limaṛa n yuna
Ɛeṛqent-as i tom
tura ad as-tiniḍ awal s yedrimen i t-id-yettaɣ
eǧǧet-tt deg yiwen n umkan iqedsen
deg-s i d-iteddu leqrar
ad d-ixleq deg-s aḥulfu n lkerh ɣer tremmeɣt tineslemt
yecba izem bu lhibat
awimt-d tanafa
i d-greɣ mmi ɣer dduḥ
wamma imdanen ttkerricen
lliɣ d abeṛṛani ur testeṛḥbem ara yes-i
qqaren akken nebɣu nḥebbeṛ d rebbi i yettḍebbiren
yerna ad tenɣem lḥiwan-nni
ula d yemma-s icaḍen ih ula d yemma-s
d aseɛdi win iwumi ur ttiliɣ ara d ssebba n tuccḍa
baba Ɛli musa izem
ay urar n wass-a d irgazen lɛali i d-yusan
ad refdeɣ akebbuḍ-iw ad tt-kecmen warraw-is
ala netta ara yeqqimen deg tejmeɛt ad ines i ṭlam weḥd-s
rriɣ s ul-iw
baba-s n teqcict iqubel-itt-id s leɛqel
taqcict tameɣbunt teffeɣ-d si tzeqqa ideg tella akked baba-s
twala takerrust n urgaz-is yefka-tt-id umnar ɣer berra
ul-is idemmek yeččur yebɣa ad ifelleq
kecmemt
Ṭṭṣen
ttreɣ yal ṭṭelba
inimt-as
yenṭeq ɣer ɣur-s baba-s qim-d a mmi
nɣaḍ-itt
i d-nudaɣ deg tmura rniɣ-d tiɛwinin
si mḥemmed ifka asfel deg udrar iɛreḍ-d atmaten-is ad ččen
ass lɛali
zegren i sebɛa lebḥur ur t-id-ttarran ɣer da
mkul ass s uɣilif-is
a lferḥ-iw ass-a nuklal
am wakken i d-yessuter deg yimḍebbren i teεna temsalt ad ḥerzen amḍiq-a acku d agerruj s tidet
mselxiṛ
win ur nelli ara yid-i iqumer-iyi
tuɣal-d ɣer uɛessas-nni yellan ɣer tewwurt testeqsa-t
ur d as-d-nfiqen
Ḥesset
ula d ayen ẓrant wallen-iw ad iyi-teskiddbeḍ
Ɣunfan-tt
sidi Ḥmed u lqaḍi
a-t-an nniɣ-akent-tt-id
yettebder yas-d
d ayen i yeǧǧan imawlan n warrac-a snemmren iselmaden-a
hedren ala γef uyennat ayen i nnan inin drus
tenna-d
rẓiɣ-d asalu tadamcact i wegris
wwin-tt
uccen ijemmeɛ iɣessan
dinna i d-yettban urgaz
muqqlet-tt
bran-am
ala netta d ubeḥri yesnifiḥ fell-as
adef
ur ttmuqulemt ara ɣer deffir
zuzen mmi ad yeṭṭes
cnunnu yufa-d tamdakelt
anwa ara tesseḍlem
tamurt n leqbayel teǧǧa-d izmawen
ad d-isɛu tnac n imeqranen ad t-rreɣ d lǧens ameqran
qeṛṛiḥet
seddaw tilli n lmut
tasusmi
ur tettmekkineḍ ara lɣir-ik ɣer lmut s cchada n ẓẓur
acḥal iyi-txuṣṣem
qqareɣ
Ḍsem
widak i ɣedṛen di lbatel
i d-isuli yiwen n ufus
werǧin i d-rbant akken ad ḥussent
tbezgem
ad wen-tt-id-yawi
Ɛasemt kra
lameɛna mi ara ad d-ḥyuɣ ad ken-zwireɣ ɣer galil
mačči d ayen ikeččmen seg yimi i yessenǧasen amdan
yusef ildi akk lemxazen issaǧaw irden i imaṣriyen
a mmi ma telliḍ d aneɣrum-nsen anda telliḍ ad ak-id-awḍen
ur t-ttafent ara
ssadaqa i win yeṛwan
d acu i tt-iwwin ɣur-sent
tessawel-as a miḥyaf iyyaɣ ad teččeḍ
aḥulfu-s d uḥdiq yessen melmi ara d-yesṭebṭeb
walimt iɣi ma yenda
cwiṭ kan ad yi-nɣen s weṛjam
lameɛna di leɛnaya-k mmekti-yi-d ass mi ara tiliḍ di liser
Ɛebban irden-nsen ɣef yeɣyal-nsen dɣa ṛuḥen syenna
Γeṛ
shum
Ɛṛeḍ ugar
win ara yeɣlin ɣef uẓru-agi ad irreẓ
yeqqim yettmuqul-d kan allen-is d tibaɛrurin yelsa iselsa iberkanen merra
acimi i truḥem ɣur-s
d timenɣiwt n yuḥenna aɣeṭṭas
kra ɣlin deg wakal yelhan
mmesteqsan amek ttilin imiren kecmen s aqiḍun n aderbad
nekk qqareɣ ih netta yeqqar ala
d lbaṭel i txedmeḍ deg yiman-ik
idammen-iw bdan rekkmen
ameɣlal inna Ṛṛuḥ-iw ur ittdumu ara deg umdan
ifukk-it
briɣ-am
Ɛiwed-as
tbeggen-d belli tameṭṭut taqbaylit tezmer ad tecnu s wudem zeddigen
ad mmten s uṛjam ddnub-nsen i yirawen-nsen
tewwiḍ-d mm umzur ad ak-tcebbeḥ axxam
yekker urgaz amcum
trewlem
nesseqdac iẓeḍwan inmettiyen akken ad nebḍu tiktiwin gar-aneɣ
ad as-tinniḍ d iẓuran n lmut naɣ n nnger i iɛelqen din
ur yettwasentem ara
mi iwala lɣaci yasuɛ yuli s adrar dɣa yeqqim dinna
tewwet lbumba deg wul n Ḥemmu
kcem tura ɣer tama n tarawt
tamusni-nsen d aɣilif lemḥiba-nsen d asawen
inna-asen d acu i tebɣam ad yi-t-tefkem
anida-ten
ad d-rsent lemluk yellan deg yigenwan
tbeɛ
anda-kem
yuẓẓaf tom
yiwet n tnezzayt iman-is kan yekkes-as umɛuqqu-nni tt-icewlen
musa yenna-asen ur ttagadet ara
yasuɛ isers tabuciḍant
ula d arraw-nsen aṭṭan n teqbaylit inṭeḍ-iten
iɛeyyen-am
anallas ur tt-id-yenni ara almi d tagara
iqqim-d diɣ amur-nniḍen d agezdu n tubiret i t-ixeddmen
rnut-as ccḍeḥ s userwal aberwali
ay at ccemla
tekker yemma ad d-tniwel seksu s uyaziḍ-nni
temsefhameḍ yid-i ɣef yiwen n udinaṛ mačči akka
yenna-as i yemma-s efk-as-d imensi tesres-as-d yečča
icudd s ufmiḍi ameqqran i tesreṭ tineslemt
kremt ad nger aẓeṭṭa
wali amtawa n turagt n useqdac aneggaru
ulac deg-k ay aswir
sbeṛ kra
yal tiddukkla i d-yernan tewwi-d yid-s amaynut deg wahil-is
Ḥejbeɣ-d lḥenni qbel ad yeḥluli
Ɛeddan wussan zrin wiyaḍ
tesseṛɣeḍ-asen-tt
sentḍen-as tutlayt ur telli d tutlayt-is
rnu aẓalim
yuba ireffu
d umennuɣ ɣef yidles d yiles d tumast n ugdud ur ntettu
walim
ad truḥemt
iselmaden n uɣerbaz amezwaru yehwa-asen waya
maca yal wa s ubrid-is s leɛtab-is d tumert-is
Ɣunfan-aɣ
d tamɛayt n yiɣes n temtunt
ccṛab ajdid ur ittuɣal ara deg iyeddiden iqdimen
i asen-d-yeqqimen ḥala ssber
yal tikelt tessendaf-d leǧruḥ-iw s wawal
deffir n yimensi d tamɛayt
azul a yelli d wagi i d axxam n si yeḥya
yewwi-d tizimert taksast
ad yeqqim deg umezruy
deggreɣ-t ɣer deffir rewleɣ-d fell-as
at ismaɛil wwin yusef ɣer maṣer
rnu yiwen seg yisnulfuyen-is ur yettcabi wayeḍ
yegra-yaɣ-d kan ad nruḥ
lliɣ zhiɣ
urrif di rṣas la ifettel
dinna i neggan meṛṛa
zriɣ…zriɣ…
d tin n zik d tin n tura
wehmeɣ
cacnaq d yiwen yuran isem-is s yisekkilen n ureɣ deg umezruy n tefriqt n ugafa
kra n leǧyub n tmelsa-ines
Ɣret
ad zuxxeɣ yess-kent merra
axaṭer wid yebɣan ad ddmen leɛmeṛ n uqcic mmuten
taḥrem ma rniɣ-tt ula d dqiqa yid-m a nasima
akka kan i d-ilul ur yefrin ara ad yili akka
akken kan i ttizmireɣ ad urareɣ ddabex ad azleɣ am warrac
Ɣaya-ken
kulci bniɣ fell-as
anwa ara yesseḍlem
yiwen n wass ad d-tuɣal alamma d da
i wid yebɣan ad slen aẓawan aḥlawan n teqbaylit d yisefra zeddigen
s wazal n tira deg lawan deg wacu nettidir
wissen acu la testewtiwemt akka
ttasen-d yal ass
ahat d lxeḍra-nneɣ i diri
Ɣas tekfa tudert-nneɣ ttalsen-tt-id wiyaḍ deffir-nneɣ
amek ara tt-iɣḍer lemnam
ad yezder deg-s usnulfu
limmer ad yaf ur yettḥarrik ara seg uxxam
ruɣ daɣen
mi ara d-yaweḍ tura lweqt-ayi n rrbiɛ ad d-kksen taḍuṭ ad d-llsen ikerri
illuẓ
yiwen ɣef uẓelmaḍ wayeḍ ɣef uyeffus
ad tergel tizi tamcumt yekkan gar-i d yigawawen
deg uẓekka-nni i ɣzeɣ di tmurt n kanɛan ara yi-tmeḍleḍ
tanzarin d timeẓyanin d tiɣunǧranin
am lbaz mu yerreẓ yifer neqqben deg-s igerfiwen
wali amek ara txedmeḍ akken ad tḥerzeḍ web yeldi
aru
uɣaleɣ gganeɣ kra
amiḍan i ldin ad ɛiwden wayeḍ
ruḥent am waken d timserrḥin
ur ssineɣ ara
irs-d fell-as
ma d nekni seg tama-nneɣ nessaram-as talwit i yiɣsan-is
di lebḥer bu lemwaji ad asent-yekkes tilwiḥin
ilha ṣṣber
s lxedma almi d iḥal snat n twaracin n ddheb yuɣal-d
inna-asen ad d-yefk yillu aman
a-tt-an tqabact thegga s iẓuran n ṭṭjuṛ
rnu awṛaɣ
eǧǧ-as aɛziz i yemma-s
dehmet
ccmata
xas yemmut yeǧǧa-d isem-is
a tinn-a n ugemmaḍ tuɛwijt n yiḍarren
deg-s ma drus ɛecra n yicennayen ilmeẓyen n taddart-agi
ineqq usaru n leḥrir
aqcic am uwri ma ur iddiz ur iberren
ulamek ara d-tader Ṛebbi di liḥala am tinna
d kečč i d lewli
eh anaɣ a yelli ad d-yuɣal urgaz-im
sya ar sdat ad d-yili ula usuffeɣ n tesɣunt ɣef ssinima taqbaylit
yuba yemmut
amek ɣer ɣur-i
ahat ala
timi tebren am yeqwi
xdem am uletma-k
yerna tura aql-aɣ deg lweqt anda win i wumi teḥkiḍ ad yettaḍsa fell-k
ur wwiḍent ara ayen i ttmennint
anda nteddu
ad tuɣal ad tetεeqqel
iɣurr-ik
winna yessuli-t winnat yerra-t d imeḍbeṛ uyennat
acu yellan akka i d-iɛeggeḍ umsaltu niḍen
ddem kra n lgaṭu deg leεnaya-k
ad yif dderya n medden
d tacḍaṭ-ik ay nettraǧu
nenna-d
tumen rrezg ur t-id-ttaɣen ara s yidrimen
ur d-terrimt ara agelzim s axxam
neggez d akessar
ad wen-fkeɣ ayen ilaqen
d acu ara txedmeḍ ma teffunezreḍ
ilaq arrac-nneɣ ad mwalin d atmaten acku azekka ala gma-k ara tafeḍ s idisan-ik
zrin ɛecra n wussan yeqqel-d urgaz-nni aberrani almi d lqahwa-nni
sekcem awal-ik uffir da
mazal ur tewjiḍeḍ ara
ad t-yeqqen mmi di tcacit
ur sderwicet ara ur sseḥsabet ara
ulamma ɣef zik n lḥal i tebda ccna s ṣṣut-is ḥlawen
iḥun fell-ak bu lefḍal
yuba yettu
wali amek i iteddu
bran-awen
bɣiɣ tadyant-iw ad tili d tamsirt i wid i n-ǧǧiɣ deffir-i
ala taseksut i ur nezdi ara gar-asen
nekk i kečč i wumi iyi-d-fkan
ayen i tebɣa ur as-d-iṣaḥ ara anagar lweḥc n tudert
ad d-yefk ugudu lexṛif
Ɣaḍen-k
ttamnen-t
teḍra yid-wen am lqabla yeslewliwen ala ɣef ayla n medden
d acu ara d-tinim di tezlit-a
kecmem
rnut
d anebdu
seg tama ad bdun axeddim n usebddad-agi s timmad-is
mačči srid i walaɣ lmač-nni
ddren yiwet n tmacahut n tayri i ten-yewwin ɣer yiwen umaḍal n tirga
steqsi-tt
akka ara teḍru di taggara n ddunit
ma tɣileḍ fell-ak i tebna dunnit a tɣelḍeḍ
urgaɣ targit ma ulseɣ-tt i udɣaɣ ad iru
lebni-s yella-d si lebni n lqesba ɣer da
iban sani tleḥḥum
tuɣal tettwali-t amzun d lweḥc
mi ten-iwala ikker immuger-iten dɣa iseǧǧed zdat-sen
n tom
selṭan ibɣa ad ak-iẓer
ur tesɛiḍ iwacuten
usant-d ad agment aman iwakken ad ččaṛent isariǧen anda sswayent taqeḍɛit n baba-tsent
a kra yellan da yers-d uḍebsi n lḥenni
tigeẓẓal d tiṣeffayin n yidammen
ayen yebɣu niwleɣ-t-id yettcekkir-it-id
nuɣal ntteddu afus deg ufus
sliɣ merra i kra i tenniḍ
yewwi udem amaynut
at Ɛaggaca ǧǧan dinna musa dɣa ṛuḥen
nudan ad t-ṭṭfen lameɛna ugaden lɣaci
yettwet tiyita n lmut
awi-yi-d yid-k ṛṛaḥa
Ɣas azen-d ṣṣber i wul-im mmi-m tewwi-t tḍeggalt
weddṛen-t
a leɛǧer n ccac
win i kem-ikesben yertaḥ i wul-is ad yennecraḥ
yahuda yeqsed ad ixdeɛ yasuɛ
ttɛebbiden-iyi di rrayeɛ
brant-am
tḥemmleḍ
yekuferra
ur yezmir ara ad d-yaf tawila n uqeddac n umiḍan firefox
mbeɛd iṛuḥ si tmurt
akka ara teḍru d lǧil-agi amcum
d tagrest
neḍṣa
akken i d-kkren akken i d-tturebban
ma yerbeḥ ad d-icafeɛ iman-is
wagi mačči arma tenniḍ-t-id iban ula i uderɣal
imeqqranen n at ubetṛun n tizi wezzu ṛuḥen ɣer yuba nnan-as-t
tewwiḍ-iyi-d lehna talwit
ihi teskiddibeḍ
nettat tettayzag trekkem
Ṛebbi ad isahel ad zwiɣ tacḍaṭ xeznet lemkaḥel
ur ttmeslayeɣ ara yid-s
yal iḍ akken armi d ass ideg ara d-yuɣal ɣer tmurt
Ṭṭef tamrart
kemmlemt ccna

kra din yuɣal berrik
ad s-tt-id-tawi
rju ad d-qqleɣ

muḥal zzmeɣ-kem
anda-tt jida-m
ur tteɣlaqeɣ acemma
wa ur iḥemmel wa

iɣucc ad tt-iẓer

ad tent-tseggmemt
werǧin iyi-d-isteqsa tom

ad tent-seggment
yekker-aɣ-d baṭel
lliɣ xelεeɣ maḍi
ulac wi itettun am netta
bɣiɣ ad ten-ḥamiɣ
ih xuṣṣent tikta
fernemt s ttawil
ilaq ad teqqimeḍ
iceyyeε-ikent-id
twalam tagellidt
s wacu i tḥemmleḍ seksu
tettḥewwis axeddim
akked temsislit i wakken ad yishil tegzi n tesleḍt nebḍa leqdic-nneɣ ɣef sin yimuren
aya ad k-yesseḥmu

ad teddumt yid-i
mazal-k tbeddeḍ
ad iyi-t-tɛeṛḍem
ad sent-tent-fken
ad iyi-t-tɛeṛḍeḍ
tesεam daɣen lbira
tkellxemt fell-i
tuɣalem d imehbal
yefka-awen-d ayen tebɣam
tezmer ad teddu yid-neɣ
ali ɣer lkar
Ɣur-k takeṛṛust
yenɣa-yakent-ten
yiwen ur ismuzgut
tura i d-temmekta
lebḥer yella ires am zzit
bḍan-iyi-tent-id
yesmekta-d zik-nni
isbehba-yaɣ leεceq
yuba yessen aṭas n medden
joan melliḥ am uletma-s
d acu-tt tnekwa n baba-k
sseqdec-iten anda k-yehwa
efk-iyi-d ayla-w ttxil-k
d acu yellan d tafeggunt
txuṣṣeḍ-as i tom
ur tesɛim ara ul
tettban-d tgerrez
iεǧeb-asen ccrab
yuba yettban d bu tissas
ttnadiɣ ad cektiɣ
teqmeḍ tqenduṛt-a
yettwaxelleṣ tom
ad wen-ten-fkent
kra din d amagnu
qabel ad as-nales
yella wasmi i d-temmektam
aqcic-a d ahwawi
cedhaɣ-kent aṭas
tzewǧem deg tmurt
awi-yasen ad ččen
ad k-tent-tefk
bḍumt-asent-tt-id
bḍan-asen-tent-id
sami ɣeṛ-s leqdic
anda-tt tlemmast umeɣrad
yuba ikad-d yebges
tḥemmleḍ ad tiliḍ weḥd-k
ur yi-tezmireḍ ara
yuba yeǧǧa arraw-is
ur iḥeqqer yiwen
yesεa tamcict d tamellalt
s anda i ten-ẓṛiɣ
ini-d kra n wawal
tban taɣẓint
teṭṭerṭer tmurt-a
tella tcennu akken iwata
la ten-tettnadimt
nekk d tamsaltut
ur sɛiɣ ara lviza
cabḥa tuɣ amenzu i d-yusan
kerheɣ aselkim-iw
ad ten-id-tuqmeḍ
tfehmemt d acu i d-tenna
ad iyi-t-id-awin
rseɣ-d si tmacint
a tiqewwadin
takaniṭ-a d tilemt
ad t-id-temmager
tili tella tifrat
fakk-ik imeṭṭawen
ur mxallafeɣ ara
amek i sserwaten
wiyaḍ merra rjan
qṛib i yemmut tom
uriɣ-am-d tamawt
cukkeɣ ẓran-kem-d
ad iyi-tettuḍ kra n wass
Ɣur-m astilu neɣ akeryun
nettat d tameṭṭut
ad sen-ten-yeɛṛeḍ
tanemmirt i uɛiwen-nkent
meslayemt-iyi-d
ili-ken d ibɣasen
tessneḍ tajuṛjit
takemmict n yizan
xemmem fell-as
yal ass ḥemmleɣ-kem ugar
bɣiɣ ad yi-terjum
am ass-a ad d-yali wass
ahat ilaq ad ṛuḥeɣ tura
truḥ-iyi tcencult
mačči d azmul-iw
tuɣalem d imeslab
ur yi-ttarra ara d aqcic
sel-d akken iwata
bḍu-yasen-t-id
tessawleḍ-as yakan
d tadyant meqqren
anta i yernan
ur yi-d-temla ara sser-is
attan deg usensu
d alɣem n tom
tessneḍ argaz-ihin
aql-iyi ad azzleɣ
ayɣer i tɛeṭṭlemt fell-i
rnan ula d ibawen
cewwlen-ken widak
yerra-yaɣ-ten-id
tzemreḍ ad trekbeḍ yid-i
awi-t neɣ eǧǧ-it
i menhu i d-tukreḍ alɣem
d aqcic n lεali i telliḍ
Ɛelmen akk medden
tesbeɣ-asen-tent
ttεawazeɣ ɣef teɣzi n yiḍ
rrant-ak-t-id
teεǧeb-ak wayla-w
Ɛiwdet asiwel
wicqa ma neqqim
ad turar yid-s
nekk d aceṭṭaḥ
tesɣunfuyeḍ
d lmasiḥ d ssid n dawed
beddet mgal lbaṭel
tesṛuḥemt-t
tella s tadist
yezga d amceččew
seg wakken teɛya truḥ am wakken yettsawam-itt-id yiḍeṣ
tesbeɣ-it-id
ilaq ad as-tinimt
teskerkseḍ fell-i
yuba yessuden mary
ad d-εeddiɣ ɣur-k azekka
Ṣebṛet
yecmumeḥ-d
aselkim-iw yekker
err-itt tura ɣef tegnawt
lliɣ bɣiɣ ad yeḍru waya
la tcennifeɣ
mmuteɣ s εeyyu
Ɣef waya ad d-nger tiɣri i yiqbayliyen akken ad ttarun s waṭas s tutlayt taqbaylit deg facebook
Ɣaḍen-tent
tameṭṭut-a ur tezwij ara
zemren am nekni
tikwal εeyyuɣ deg tikli
llan yisteqsiyen
twalam itri-nni
yya
tḥemmlem lalman
ufiɣ-d tafransist d tifrat i wakken ad d-iniɣ ayen i ttwaliɣ d wayen i txemmimeɣ
ad teswem kra
ahat ad d-uɣalen
ur yettɣullu yiwen
anwa i irebḥen
lɣaci meṛṛa qqimen rrif n lebḥeṛ
tameṭṭut-a tecba taɣzalt
Ṛuḥen zik
aya werjin yeḍri
ugadeɣ ad qerbeɣ ad tagi
teslemdem-iyi-ten
nekk d afellaḥ
yezzem-ik imi tεeṭṭleḍ
ur tecfiḍ ara fell-asen
tezdmem-d
ad tt-ldiɣ
tesseṛɣem-as-tent
tebɣiḍ ad teqqimeḍ ugar
yečča-yi-d wul-iw
teččefčfemt
anwa i yesfayden
tanemmirt ɣef lemɛawna-k
tezzegzew seg yimeṭṭawen
ur itett ara yidir aksum
yerna mazal ur twalaḍ kra
d irgazen lɛali i iḥeḍren
anda i tettuḍ ssiwan-ik
sseṛɣent-aɣ-tt
anda-tt tbanka
ur yelli d anwa t-yifen
asemmiḍ ur k-id-yeṣṣawaḍ
lehl-im akk xiqen
Ṣṣura-w tenṭer tettwaɣ
d rray n lεali
tumen belli tameṭṭut taqbaylit tezmer ad d-tufrar deg yal taɣult
usiɣ-d ad ḍelbeɣ tallelt-im
Ɣaya-kent
yewwet gma-s
ttqadaṛemt
yak nniɣ-am ur ttlusu ara akken mi ara d-taseḍ ɣur-neɣ
tfehmemt neɣ xaṭi
inna deg yiman-is ad qadṛen mmi
tteɛraḍeɣ ad d-jemmɛeɣ akk tizemmar-iw akken ad ssiwḍeɣ ad d-mmeslayeɣ
lqahwa-ya semmḍet
ad m-tt-yeɛṛeḍ
skaddbent merra
ilaq ad taruḍ ungal
senned
yeddem-itent zgelli
imdanen akk ttargun
rrant-d
teɣram
izmer ad yeqqim tom
walaɣ
ad kem-ẓṛeɣ azekka
anfet-iyi ad εerḍeɣ
ruḥ alma d axxam-iw
ad ṛuḥeɣ deg tubeṛ
d menhu yettmeslay
ad uraren yid-sent
yezmel
yesleb
yesεa rriḥa ufennan
nesses
deg oslo i ttidireɣ
ifliweɣ
newhem
qṛib i ssudneɣ tom
tuysem
ziɣen
yuba tekcem-it tegdi
nra tom
klan-t
zemleɣ
di tilawt faleiṭin kecmen-tt waεraben am akken i d-kecmen tamazɣa
acimi akka i tzelgeḍ 
d lekdeb ziɣ mi yi-d-tenniḍ akken ḥemmleɣ-k
aɣyul anezzaf
ciṭ i telwiḥt ciṭ i teṛwiḥt
ccṛeɛ igenni leɛmeṛ yeɣli
awal-is d asxertem ur nettwafham
xellṣeɣ
d wagi i d Ɛisu i d-iǧǧan idumiyen
anuc iɛac tteɛmeyya u xemsa n iseggasen dɣa yemmut
fessrent-t sufella n yiferrugen i yiṭij deg wass i wakken ad yekkiw
aḍu i yetthubbun si yal tama
ma deg imukan anda zedɣen wat sɛada tella tafat
ad kem-ḥwiǧeɣ kan
ur d-ǧǧin imezwura ayen ara ad rnun ineggura
yessebgen-d iman-is d win d-yettawin aɣrum-is s tidi-s
ah a nna taneɛmart teswiḍ ddheb aniwa werǧin yurga ad kem-yekseb
terwi s tmes
i wahil i d-yellan deg wussan-agi n remḍan akked unebdu
ttewteɣ tiyita n lmut
tikwal nessuddus isaragen neɣ tiɣimiyin n usileɣ i lfayda n yilemẓiyen ladɣa wid yeqqaren deg yigezda n tmaziɣt
tnehṛeḍ
mi d-wwḍen imezwura ɣillen ad awin akteṛ
ijemmeɛ-d mkul ṣṣenf n lḥut
i limer ad aɣ-ifaq a tasedda
wali akk amazray n tneflit
ur tettḥerqis ara
mi yekcem s axxam qerrben ɣur-s iderɣalen-nni
ay aɣanim n uẓeṭṭa
zemreɣ ad qqimeɣ da
mbeɛd awal n tazwara n unemhal n uɣerbaz-a amenzu
zzi-d
Ḥemmleɣ-kem s wagu d ṭṭlam
fiḥel asḥisef yal wa d acu i t-ixuṣen
aṭas n lecɣal yettwaxedmen deg ugezdu n tizi uzzu
teffeɣ-am-d teεrurt
daɣen ussan-a kan i yeldi yiwen n lǧamaɛ d amaynut
tetteffɣeḍ d ḥedd
mellken-t imezran ur tt-yufi ara
yexleq-iten di sin seg wakal
ad txedmeḍ afrag i uqiḍun imqeddes
d wid uɣerbaz alemmas i ixeddmen ikayaden d imezwura
amek ara texdem
d allaɣ-iw i t-id-ittexlaqen
taneggarut iseqqef-as s ssuq
ad as-d-tawi blabla
akli ad yili am ssid-is beṛka-t
teɣli-as-d zahra gar yiɣallen-is s wudem yeddem uḥemmal n yimeṭṭawen
ur d-gireɣ ara iman-iw di lebɣi n yilu
ilaq ad sseḥluɣ iman-iw ilaq ad uɣaleɣ d tameṭṭut
azemz n yikayaden
sudaba tɛemmed-as ur terri ara ɣef yiman-is
awal d tenfalit d yizen d umennuɣ ɣef yizerfan n tmeṭṭut
Ṛuḥet sya
a-t-an ad ken-izwir ɣer galil
ggiɣ aẓekka i yiman-iw kufneɣ tirga-w
mbeɛd uɣal ad tefkeḍ lweɛda-k
laqen-iyi idrimen
Ɣer taggara ad d-nesmekti kan belli seldazekka n larebɛa ad tili ṭṭhara n yigerdan-agi deg ssbiṭer n tigzirt
ttḥussuɣ akk i wayen yi-d-yezzin am wakken tɣumm-it tagut
bab n ukembas d ttemyiz
leɛra n tmeṭṭut akked yelli-s ur teṭṭiliḍ ara fell-as
d ayen i d-ntekkes seg tudert n yal ass
ayen akk i d-am-nniɣ yella deg umezruy yakkan
yerna teḍfer abrid-a s tezdeg d ssfa
silya tettqadar-iyi tettezmumug-iyi-d teḥdeq yid-i mačči am tullas-niḍen n uɣerbaz-nneɣ
d acu i tent-id-iwwin ɣur-i
yeṭṭef-iyi zman gar tuɣmas ur ddireɣ ur mmuteɣ
nuder akessar
yal iḍ ad ninig anda yebɣa wul-im
ma d win yeṭṭsen di tṛakna ɣur-s ccetwa d lǧennet
degger tikti ɣer ubrid ad tt-yejmeɛ uɣref
bab-is yezga deg uɣilif amzun d rraǧ i yeswa
kfiɣ
tṛuḥ teččuṛ-d ayeddid-nni tefka-as i uqcic ad isew
d aḍummu i ṭṭummuɣ arazen a nnger-nwen
Ḍeggren-t ɣer tessirt n tudert ad t-tezḍ
Ḥrez waki
ad yi-d-yefk tura akteṛ n tnac n trebbaɛ n lmuluk
ad yeffeɣ s reffu
feṛḥet neggzet si lfeṛḥ
Ɣur-i ssbeɛ bu lkifat
ma d taqcict s tlata kan n iṣurdiyen n lfeṭṭa
tura yekker-d ufrux yesselqaḍen baba-s
nefka tagnit i widak i yebɣan ad d-rnun ɣer tudsa-agi
Ɛni timetti ur tettwali ara acḥal n wid i yettmenṭaren deg yizenqan
ferḥet yid-s a tullas
ad as-anfen ad t-yali uɣebbar n tatut
rabaḥ yeffeɣ-d netta d haṛun seg uxxam n muris
i ma nnan-iyi-d isem-is
tettḥawat deg wid i d-yeslan ad tt-ɛiwnen
aqlaɣ neɣli-d s leḥya
walit
ur teẓri amek ara ffɣen yigemmaḍ-ines
deg wass n usteɛfu ur tesseṛɣayem ara times deg yexxamen-nwen
nehren-iyi ɣer texxamt
yiwen n umγar yewwi-asen-d imensi ad ččen
iṭij-a icerreq-d yal tanezzayt yettak-d tafat i yal yiwen netta ur ixeddem ara miḥyaf
Ḥaca akniwen i d-tettarew
imir dɣa i yebda anadi d usekfel n laṣel
ad d-neɛreḍ merra leḥbab-nneɣ
gezmet
init-aɣ-d kan ma ddren
deg sin abrid ur ɣezzif
nessewxar neqqar mazal
ad cedhiɣ ad sendeɣ ɣef umeṭṛaḥ war ma yesduqqes-iyi-d s teɣwist-is
aglam-ik tzemmreḍ ad as-tefkeḍ udem aweḥci n tineslemt
rniɣ ula d nekkini
taqcict n tmanya n yiseggasen tennejla
snuffset
ifka-yaɣ lεid i tεacurt
i wakken ad arunt tilwiḥin n tnilwin s tmaziɣt
yenṭeq urgaz ameɣbun
aṭas n wawalen imzikiyen ur nessexdam ara
isneḥniḥ deg lweḍyat
ilwiɣ yid-i teẓriḍ ala kem i sɛiɣ
ur ak-tcuḥḥ ara ddunit
ur tkeṛṛheḍ ara gma-k deg wul-ik
neɣ iṭij mi i d-iteddu
yyaw
neḥṣa ad aɣ-inin d isiḍ
ad sen-tt-id-yawi
ad yegmu s tezmert yeqwan
wissen kan ma yefhem d acu i as-nniɣ
ccwi kan tella deg texxamt ufella
ad teɛreḍ ɣriba ad ten-tels s ufriwes
uggadeɣ ad yili kra i t-yuɣen
werǧeǧǧi azehwani kra yekka wass la yekkat agumbri
d tzeqqa n tmeɣriwin n laɛzib uheddad ara d-yesdurin tameɣra-a
ur yeɛdil ara seksu n uftal d seksu n tmacint
d acu i ken-iwwin ɣur-sen
d awezɣi ad wenseɣ askiɛew n wucanen
ur tettmuqquleḍ ara ɣer deffir
yeffud taγuṛi yeswa-d γer umezwaru wis sin yesselmed-as tiwsatin n uẓawan
tekkat s ubendayer n ssadat
yiwet n tmeddit deg tefsut nuɣal ɣer tnezduɣt nekk d kahina
acu yellan
ay ameɣlal anwa yellan am kečč gar iṛebbiten
ad d-taweḍ ɣriba sdat n tewwurt
yewwi-tt-id sidi mmi-s n utbir
ugadeɣ dɣa ṛuḥeɣ ffreɣ aṭalan-ik deg wakal
Ẓdec yettijiq s lǧahd n taɣect
yemma-s mačči d tin akken iwumi i qqaren meryem
lexwal d izmawen aḥerbi ur yettrus

ad yili yuba yelḥa
ad ten-id-tuqmem

ur tetteɣ ara aya
nekk zgiɣ ttaḍṣaɣ
zur wudem-ik a yir sseka
ad dduɣ yid-kent
yuba yelmed leqran
aman-a d iẓidanen
bḍant-asen-tt-id
tettuḍ idrimen-ik
tufam iman-nwen yid-nteɣ
qujjreɣ seg ugris
fakkent-asen-ten
anta i d-imeslayen
amek i tuɣaleḍ d aselmad
tgerrzemt a tullas
nekk lhiɣ kan i useqdec
rran-asent-tt-id
tesseṛɣeḍ-iyi-tt
iselman deg wasif
tili tella tsarut
kemmlemt ajgugel
aql-i εusseɣ-k-id

d acu iwumi neεlem

tewwḍemt ɣer yiswi-nkent

ad iyi-tt-id-awint

ad tt-id-temmagrem

yennecraḥ wudem-is
ad kent-ten-teɛṛeḍ
sseṛɣent-akent-ten
yewwin sin wagguren
nɣant-iyi wallen-im
yuba yekres anyir-is
tebɣiḍ ad yi-tenɣeḍ
ad ten-id-yemmager
awer tesɛuḍ aɣilif
srugmet
Ɣur-neɣ akk ttfaṣil
teslamt-as neɣ ala
ad asent-tt-tefkeḍ
ur iyi-tḥemmel ara
mazal yekkat ugeffur
saεfeɣ-t deg usikel
teẓriḍ akk isura-ya
keṛheɣ-t
wa mačči d agatu-nni
ad tqewwteḍ aqjun-ik
tefka awal i unexḍab
tewwa tetteffaḥt-nni
ur teffiɣ ara fell-i
ur kent-sefcaleɣ ara
melmi i txedmeḍ akka
ulac deg ssuq-ik ziɣ
ihi d wa i d tatoeba
yezmer yuba ad icucef
voṭan medden fell-as s tesɛa utesɛin ticert tesɛa utesɛin ɣef meyya
tevotiḍ neɣ teqqimeḍ kifkif di tmurt-nneɣ
yenna-iyi-d baba belli agrud mi ara yeɣli yettaf duṛu
ihuh ur teṭṭiseḍ ur teǧǧiḍ wi ara yeṭṭsen
wissen ahat ma ad d-nemlil yiwen wass
int-as iruḥ i teεzizt am rruḥ mi ara d-tekker
kateb yasin yessegrawel tasekla deg tmazɣa s wungal-is neǧma
mi ara ɣreɣ aḍris aseklan ad afeɣ awennet di tazwara yettvan-iyi-d icemmet aḍris-nni
d lεali mliḥ wi i ismuzegten i uẓawan
gen di talwit a gma benatou idris d awezɣi ad k-nettu
